tracks.title: Ya Rab Koyi Masuma
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain) X6

Ya Rab Koyi Masuma Zindaa Me Na Tanhaa Ho

(Ya Rab Koyi Masuma Zindaa Me Na Tanhaa Ho) X3

  1. Ya Rab Koyi Masuma Zindaa Me Na Tanhaa Ho (X2)

Paband Naho Aahi, Haye Paband Naho Aahi

Rone Pe Na Pehra Ho

(Ya Rab Koyi Masuma Zindaa Me Na Tanhaa Ho) X3

  2. Thi Jis Ko Nind Ati, Shabbir Ke Sine Par (X2)

Zindaa Dare Zindaa, Haye Zindaa Dare Zindaa

Uske Liye Kazaa Ho

(Ya Rab Koyi Masuma Zindaa Me Na Tanhaa Ho) X3

  3. Zindaano Se Ati Thi Awaaz Ke Thak Ne Ki (X2)

Jese Ke Sakina Ko, Haye Jese Ke Sakina Ko

Har Zindaan Ro Raha Ho

(Ya Rab Koyi Masuma Zindaa Me Na Tanhaa Ho) X3

  4. Ya Rab Koyi Masuma Zindaa Me Na Tanhaa Ho (X2)

Paband Naho Aahi, Haye Paband Naho Aahi

Rone Pe Na Pehra Ho

(Ya Rab Koyi Masuma Zindaa Me Na Tanhaa Ho) X3

  5. Takraye Na Wo Kyu Kar Zindaan Ki Diwaaro Se (X2)

Bhayi Se Aur Phuphi Se, Haye Bhayi Se Aur Phuphi Se

Jisko Juda Kiya Ho

(Ya Rab Koyi Masuma Zindaa Me Na Tanhaa Ho) X3

  6. Zindaano Se Ati Thi Awaaz Ke Thak Ne Ki (X2)

Jese Ke Sakina Ko, Haye Jese Ke Sakina Ko

Har Zindaan Ro Raha Ho

(Ya Rab Koyi Masuma Zindaa Me Na Tanhaa Ho) X3

  7. Zindaan Me Ehmad Bhi Yaad Ayi Sakina Ki (X2)

Dil Roro Keh Raha Hai, Haye Dil Roro Keh Raha Hai

Ab Na Ujaala Ho

(Ya Rab Koyi Masuma Zindaa Me Na Tanhaa Ho) X3

  8. Ya Rab Koyi Masuma Zindaa Me Na Tanhaa Ho (X2)

Paband Naho Aahi, Haye Paband Naho Aahi

Rone Pe Na Pehra Ho

(Ya Rab Koyi Masuma Zindaa Me Na Tanhaa Ho) X3

tracks.title: Suratey Shairey Khuda
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain) X4

(Suratey Shairey Khuda, Jaao Hasham Kiska Hai) X3

  1. (Labey Daria Zara Dekho) X2 Ye Alam Kiska Hai

(Suratey Shairey Khuda, Jaao Hasham Kiska Hai) X2

  2. (Labey Daria Zara Dekho) X2 Ye Alam Kiska Hai

(Suratey Shairey Khuda, Jaao Hasham Kiska Hai) X2

  3. (Alqama Mitt Nahee Sakta Terey Seenay Se Kabhi) X2 Tujko Maaloom Nahee Nakshe Qadam Kiska Hai, (Labey Daria Zara Dekho) X2 Ye Alam Kiska Hai

(Suratey Shairey Khuda, Jaao Hasham Kiska Hai) X2

  4. (Lik Raha Hai Jo Qalam Hokey Wafaoo Kee Kitab) X2 Karbala Deikh To Ye Haath Qalam Kiska Hai (Labey Daria Zara Dekho) X2 Ye Alam Kiska Hai

(Suratey Shairey Khuda, Jaao Hasham Kiska Hai) X2

  5. (Jab Kulay Baab-E Hawa-Ij Ke Muwaanee Muj Par) X2 Tab Me Samja Hoo Ke Muj Par Ye Karam Kiska Hai (Labey Daria Zara Dekho) X2 Ye Alam Kiska Hai

(Suratey Shairey Khuda, Jaao Hasham Kiska Hai) X2

  6. (Koi Bhee Jhoot Qasam Jiskee Nahi Kaa Sakta) X2 Mere Ghazi Ke Ilawa Ye Barham Kiska Hai (Labey Daria Zara Dekho) X2 Ye Alam Kiska Hai

(Suratey Shairey Khuda, Jaao Hasham Kiska Hai) X2

  7. (Nehr Par Laashaey Abbas Tarrap-Ta Kyu Hai) X2 Naam Hotto Pay Sakina Labey Dam Kiska Hai (Labey Daria Zara Dekho) X2 Ye Alam Kiska Hai

(Suratey Shairey Khuda, Jaao Hasham Kiska Hai) X2

  8. (Vo Farishtey Ho Key Insaan Sabhee Shamil Hai) X2 Aisa Duniya Mai Batawo Zarra Gham Kiska Hai (Labey Daria Zara Dekho) X2 Ye Alam Kiska Hai

(Suratey Shairey Khuda, Jaao Hasham Kiska Hai) X2

  9. (Labey Daria Zara Dekho) X2 Ye Alam Kiska Hai

(Suratey Shairey Khuda, Jaao Hasham Kiska Hai) X2

tracks.title: Beemar Kee Aakei
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain) X4

(Beemar Kee Aakei Hai) X2 Akbar Teree Raho Par

(Beemar Kee Aakei Hai Akbar Teree Raho Par) X2

  1. (Beemar Kee Aakei Hai Akbar Teree Raho Par) X2 Deewarey Bhee Rotee Hai Sughra Kee Karaho Par

(Beemar Kee Aakei Hai Akbar Teree Raho Par) X2

  2. (Sughra Ney Kaha Mujko Eik Baar Jo Mil Jaaey) X2 Sar Apna Mai Rak-Doongee Bhaiya Tere Paa-O Par

(Beemar Kee Aakei Hai Akbar Teree Raho Par) X2

  3. (Kyu Bhool Gaye Bhaiya Sughra Kee Khata Kya Hai) X2 Aawaaz Nahi Deitey Kyew Mairee Sada-O Par

(Beemar Kee Aakei Hai Akbar Teree Raho Par) X2

  4. (Vo Kud-Hee Samajley Gee Hai Maara Gaya Bhayi) X2 Deikhengi Nisha Jis Dam Zainab Tere Baho Par

(Beemar Kee Aakei Hai Akbar Teree Raho Par) X2

  5. (Deika Key Lahoo Mai Hai Dooba Huwa Sab Kunba) X2 Kya Khwaab Ootar Aya Sughra Kee Niga-Ho Par

(Beemar Kee Aakei Hai Akbar Teree Raho Par) X2

  6. (Pyasey Rahey Jab Akbar Barsee Na Gata Ko-Ee) X2 Afsos Karey Duniya Ab Aisee Gata-O Par

(Beemar Kee Aakei Hai Akbar Teree Raho Par) X2

  7. (Hai Dhoop Mai Jis Din Sey Laash Ali Akbar Ka) X2 Ma Ashk Girati Hai Har Pair Kee Chawo Par

(Beemar Kee Aakei Hai Akbar Teree Raho Par) X2

tracks.title: Koyi Hussain Sa Sajda
tracks.lyrics:
_



Koyi Hussain Sa Sajda

_

Ya Hussain (X4)



Koyi Hussain Sa Sajda Bhala Adaa To Kare

(Koyi Hussain Sa Sajda Bhala Adaa To Kare) X2



  1. Ye Rashk Jispe, Sadaa Khake Karbala To Kare

(Koyi Hussain Sa Sajda Bhala Adaa To Kare) X2



  2. Shaheed Kon Sa Guzra Hai Pure Aalam Me (X2)

Sina Ki Nok Pe Jo Zikre (X2)

La Ilaah To Kare

(Koyi Hussain Sa Sajda Bhala Adaa To Kare) X2



  3. Labe Farat Wo Bazu Kata Ke Soya Hai (X2)

Abbas Jesi Jaha Me (X2)

Koi Wafaa To Kare

(Koyi Hussain Sa Sajda Bhala Adaa To Kare) X2



  4. Alam Ke Niche Jo Mango Kabul Hoti Hai (X2)

Khulus Dil Se Koi Shaks (X2)

Agar Duwa To Kare

(Koyi Hussain Sa Sajda Bhala Adaa To Kare) X2



  5. Mai Baba Aap Ka Beta Hu Go Ke Asgher Hu (X2)

Kaho Laeen Se Sitam Ki (X2)

Wo Intihaa To Kare

(Koyi Hussain Sa Sajda Bhala Adaa To Kare) X2



  6. Kaha Se Lawonge Aysa Jigar Jo Deen Ke Liye (X2)

Asr Se Pehle Bahatar (X2)

Ko Jo Judaa To Kare

(Koyi Hussain Sa Sajda Bhala Adaa To Kare) X2



  7. Kiya Hussain Ne Jese Hai Sabr Karbal Me (X2)

Ameer Sabr Pe Yu Koi (X2)

Iktifa To Kare

(Koyi Hussain Sa Sajda Bhala Adaa To Kare) X2



  8. Ye Rashk Jispe, Sadaa Khake Karbala To Kare

(Koyi Hussain Sa Sajda Bhala Adaa To Kare) X2

tracks.title: Sughra Ko Rulata Hai
tracks.lyrics:
(Sughra Ko Rulat Hai, Ye Chaand Muharram Ka) X2

  1. (Jab Sam-E Ne Aata Hai) X2 Ye Chand-E Muharram Ka

(Sughra Ko Rulat Hai, Ye Chaand Muharram Ka) X2

  2. Ham Surate Zehra Se, Bhayi Ki Bicharne Ki. Khatune Kayamat-E Ki (Gar Baar Ujar Ne Ki) X2 Rudaade Sunata Hai, Ye Chaand Muharram Ka

(Sughra Ko Rulat Hai, Ye Chaand Muharram Ka) X2

  3. Kata Hai Gala Logo, Sehroz Ke Pyaase Ka. Pamaal Huwa Lasha (Ahmed Ke Nawase Ka) X2 Har Ek Ko Batataa. Ye Chaand Muharram Ka

(Sughra Ko Rulat Hai, Ye Chaand Muharram Ka) X2

  4. Taswir Dikhata Hai, Ahmed Ke Jawane Ka. Har Shaks Ko Duniya Me (Karbal Ki Kahani Ki) X2 Tafsir Batataa Hai, Ye Chaand Muharram Ka

(Sughra Ko Rulat Hai, Ye Chaand Muharram Ka) X2

  5. Karbal Ki Ziyarat-E Ko, Jo Ankh Tarap Ti Thi. Shabbir Tere Gham Me (Jo Ankh Barasti Thi) X2 Us Ankh Ko Bhataa Hai, Ye Chaand Muharram Ka

(Sughra Ko Rulat Hai, Ye Chaand Muharram Ka) X2

  6. Imran Ko Shabbar Ko, Khatun Kayamat Ko. Haidar Ki Kasam Mazhar (Sarkare Risalat Ko) X2 Turbat Me Rulata Hai, Ye Chaand Muharram Ka

(Sughra Ko Rulat Hai, Ye Chaand Muharram Ka) X2

tracks.title: Abbas-E Ke Parcham Ko Hawaa Chum Rahi Hai
tracks.lyrics:
(Abbas Ko Parcham Ko Hawa Chum Rahi Hai) X5

  1. (Lagata Hai Ke Zehra Ki) X2 Duwa Chum Rahi Hai

Abbas Ko………..

  2. (Aa Dekh Sukaina Teri Abbas Ka Lasha)X2

(Darya Ke Kinare Pe Kaza Chum Rahi Hai)

Lagata Hai Ke…………

  3. (Joo Bhi Juki Jati Hai Khaza Chu Ke Alam Ko) X2

(Jese Ke Ye Zainab Ki Rida Chum Rahi Hai)

Lagata Hai Ke………….

  4. (Sar Apna Patak Ta Hai Kinaro Pe Ye Paani)X2

(Ye Arshe Ko Matam Ki Sada Chum Rahi Hai) X2

Lagta Hai Ke……………

  5. (Behta Huwa Pani Hai Ke Abbas Ke Aansu)X2

(Mashkize Ko Umat Ki Jafa Chum Rahi Hai)X2

Lagata Hai Ke……………….

  6. (Sar Chum Ke Ghazi Ka Kaha Ibne Ali Ne)X2

(Abbas Kadam Tere Wafa Chum Rahi Hai) X2

Lagata Hai Ke………………….

  7. (Jalwade Ye Nauha Hai Shahen Shahe Wafa Ka)X2

(Har Lavs Ko Ashko Ki Gata Chum Rahi Hai)X2

Lagata Hai Ke…………………

  8. (Lagata Hai Ke Zehra Ki)X2 Duwa Chum Rahi

Abbas Ko ……………….

tracks.title: Teero Ki Zad Me Agayaa
tracks.lyrics:
(Teero Ki Zad Me Agayaa Zehra Ka Ghulbadan) X3

  1. Sharmaya-E-Rasool Hai, Shahzaadaye Ammal

(Teero Ki Zad Me Agayaa Zehra Ka Ghulbadan) X2

  2. (Poshaak Jiski Khuld Se Laye The Jibraeel) X2 Ab Uske Hai Badan Pe Zakhmo Perehm

(Teero Ki Zad Me Agayaa Zehra Ka Ghulbadan) X2

  3. Sharmaya-E-Rasool Hai, Shahzaadaye Ammal

(Teero Ki Zad Me Agayaa Zehra Ka Ghulbadan) X2

  4. (Barse Hai Teer Itne Lashe Hassan Pe Jo) X2 Zanjeer Hai Lahu Mein Masmoom Ka Dafan

(Teero Ki Zad Me Agayaa Zehra Ka Ghulbadan) X2

  5. Sharmaya-E-Rasool Hai, Shahzaadaye Ammal

(Teero Ki Zad Me Agayaa Zehra Ka Ghulbadan) X2

  6. (Koi Mustafa Se Isko Kaise Judaa Kare) X2 Mumkin Nahi Hai Isse Zakhmi Hai Panjetan

(Teero Ki Zad Me Agayaa Zehra Ka Ghulbadan) X2

  7. Sharmaya-E-Rasool Hai, Shahzaadaye Ammal

(Teero Ki Zad Me Agayaa Zehra Ka Ghulbadan) X2

tracks.title: Hay Lazawaal Dahar Mein
tracks.lyrics:
(Tayree Wafa Ghazee Hay Baqa Ghazee) X2

(Hay Lazawaal Dahar Main Tayree Wafa Ghazee) X2

  1. Fana Nehi Jisay Markay Hay Wo Baqa Ghazi


Tayree Wafa Ghazee...

  2. Faqat Muheet Nehi Kerbala Pay Iski Wafa
Qadam Qadam Pay Hua Moula Par Fida Ghazi

Tayree Wafa Ghazee...

  3. Labay Furat Say Zahra Ki Arahee Thi Sada
Tu Mayri Baitee Ka Wahid Tha Asira Ghazi

Tayree Wafa Ghazee...

  4. Khayamay Alay Aba Main Hua Hay Hashr Bapa
Ali Kay Laal Say Jis Dam Hua Juda Ghazi

Tayree Wafa Ghazee...

  5. Rahi Hay Dair Talak Bazoo Chumti Zainab
Ummulbanin Ko Jim Dam Hua Ata Ghazi

Tayree Wafa Ghazee...

  6. Ameer Iska Badal Koee Nehi Zamanay Main
Jahan Mein Mulkay Wafa Ka Hay Kibriya Ghazi

Tayree Wafa Ghazee...

  7. Fana Nehi Jisay Markay Hay Wo Baqa Ghazi

tracks.title: Shaam Chali
tracks.lyrics:
Note For Reciters : This Nauha Contains "Doray". Doray (Tehtay Lafz) Are Words
Not Recited In A Tone, During The Course Of Recitation. Doray Are Usually
Recited During Processions Or Where There Is A High Response (Matam) From The
People. It Would Be Advisable To Avoid During Normal Mehfil Recitations. These
Are Marked With "------".

(Shaam Chali, Me Shaam Chali) X2

  1. (Pardes Me Gar Lutwaake, Par Tera Din Bachaake) X2 Me Shaam Chali Nana

(Shaam Chali, Me Shaam Chali) X2

  2. (Be Goro Kafan Bhayi Hai Mera, Asbab Luta Hai Gar Bhi Jalaa) X2

So Teer Ghamo Ka Kha Ke, Ankho Se Khun Bahaa Ke Me Shaam Chali Nana

(Shaam Chali, Me Shaam Chali) X2

  3. (Bhayi Ka Gala Kat Te Dekha, Kasim Ka Badan Pamaal Huwa) X2

Akber Ka Dard Utha Ke, Hatho Me Rasan Bandh Waake, Me Shaam Chali Nana

\-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Doray:

Ghazi Tere Alam Ki Hifazat Karungi Me, Ghazi Tere Alam Ki Hifazat Karungi Me,
Duniya Tere Alam Ko Gharo Par Lagayengi, Ghazi Tere Alam Ki Hifazat Karungi
Me, Duniya Tere Alam Ko Gharo Par Lagayengi, Me Aaj Shaam Leke Chali Hu Teraa
Alam, Ek Kowm Sariyon Me, Ek Kowm Sariyon Me, Ye Parcham, Ye Parcham Uthayengi

\-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(Shaam Chali, Me Shaam Chali) X2

  4. (Ghazi Ke Baad Me Ghazi Hu, Me Nade Ali Dohraati Hu) X2

Khutbo Ki Tez Chalaake, Ghazi Ka Alam Lehraake, Me Shaam Chali Nana

(Shaam Chali, Me Shaam Chali) X2

  5. (Rasi Me Sakina Ka He Gala, Sajaad Pehnaakar Tokh Chalaa) X2

Lo Shimr Ke Zulm Khaake, Sabr Hussain Dikha Ke, Me Shaam Chali Nana

(Shaam Chali, Me Shaam Chali) X2

\-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Doray:

Ansoo Tumhare Laasho Pe Me Naa Bahaa Saki, Ansoo Tumhare Laasho Pe Me Na Bahaa
Saki, Do Gunt Bhi Na Tumko Paani Pila Saki, Aansoo Tumhere Laasho Pe Me Na
Bahaa Saki, Do Gunt Bhi Na Tumko Pani Pila Saki, Zalim Ne Mere Haatho Ko
Bandha Rasan Ke Saath, Kiski Ye Khabar Gale Bhi Na Tumko Laga Saki

\-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  6. (Do Laal Fida Bhayi Pe Kiya, Mo Rowi Nahi Dono Ke Liye) X2

Ankho Me Ashk Chchupaa Ke, Bhayi Ka Dard Bacha Ke Me Shaam Chali Nana

(Shaam Chali, Me Shaam Chali) X2

tracks.title: Loriya Se Sone Wale
tracks.lyrics:
(Aa Du Me Loriya) X4

(Loriya Se Sone Wale, So Raha Ho Tum Kaha) X3

  1. (Do Sadaa Maktal Se Asghar) X2 Dhundti Phirti Hai Maa

(Loriya Se Sone Wale, So Raha Ho Tum Kaha) X2

  2. (Hatho Pe Mehndi Lagaa Ti Sar Pe Sehra Bandhti) X2 (Reh Gaye Arman Adhoora) Tum Na Ho Paye Jawaan

(Loriya Se Sone Wale, So Raha Ho Tum Kaha) X2

  3. (Do Sadaa Maktal Se Asghar) X2 Dhundti Phirti Hai Maa

(Loriya Se Sone Wale, So Raha Ho Tum Kaha) X2

  4. (Ro Pari Sham-E-Ghariban Dekh Kar Suwe Khayaam) X2 (Uth Rahe Ho Ma Ke Dil Se) X2 Jaa Ke Khaymo Se Uthaye

(Loriya Se Sone Wale, So Raha Ho Tum Kaha) X2

  5. (Siskiya Bharti Hai Madar Godh Viraan Dekh Kar) X2 (Khali Jula Se Lipat Ke) X2 Rorahi Hu Loriya

(Loriya Se Sone Wale, So Raha Ho Tum Kaha) X2

  6. (Do Sadaa Maktal Se Asghar) X2 Dhundti Phirti Hai Maa

(Loriya Se Sone Wale, So Raha Ho Tum Kaha) X2

  7. (Sharm Se Dariya Ki Lehre Pani Pani Hogaya) X2 (Hai Jab Sukh-E-Labo Par) X2 Fayri Asghar Ne Zabaan

(Loriya Se Sone Wale, So Raha Ho Tum Kaha) X2

  8. (Do Sadaa Maktal Se Asghar) X2 Dhundti Phirti Hai Maa

(Loriya Se Sone Wale, So Raha Ho Tum Kaha) X2

  9. (Maut Ke Aya Paseena Halk-E-Asghar Dekh Kar) X2 (Kampta Tha Teer Hurmala) X2 Haath Me Larzi Kamaan

(Loriya Se Sone Wale, So Raha Ho Tum Kaha) X2

  10. (Do Sadaa Maktal Se Asghar) X2 Dhundti Phirti Hai Maa

(Loriya Se Sone Wale, So Raha Ho Tum Kaha) X2

tracks.title: Bhai Shabbir-E Ka
tracks.lyrics:
(Abbas Hai Abbas, Abbas Hai Abbas, Abbas Hai Abbas, Hai Hai Abbas) X2

(Bhai Shabbir Ka, Haider Ka Piser Aata Hai)

  1. (Jang Karne Bani Hasham) X2 Ka Kamar Aata Hai

Bhai Shabbir………….

  2. Aysa Tanha Ko Bahadur Koi Dekha Na Suna (Abbas Hai Abbas) X3

Aysa Tanha Ko Bahadur (Koi Dekha Na Suna) X2

Zaat Me Apni Jo, Lashkar Sa Nazar Aata Hai

Jang Karne…………….

  3. Yaad Aati Hai Sakina Ki Bari Kalb Ke Sath (Abbas Hai Abbas) X3

Yaad Aati Hai Sakina Ki (Bari Kalb Ke Sath) X2

Name Abbas Ka Hoto Pe Agar Aata Hai

Jang Karne………….

  4. Khoon Bhara Aaya Alam Ro Ke Ye Zainab Ne Kahaa (Abbas Hai Abbas) X3

Khoon Bhara Aaya Alam Ro Ke (Ye Zainab Ne Kahaa) X2

Bhayi Tum Aye Nahi Moo Ko Jigar Aata Hai

Jang Karne…………….

  5. Door Se Apka Alam Dekh Ke Bachi Boli (Abbas Hai Abbas) X3

Door Se Apka Alam Dekh (Ke Bachi Boli) X2

Dekho Darya Ke Chacha Lot Ke Gar Ataa Hai

Jang Karne……………..

  6. Sharm Se Rukta Nahi Neze Pe Abbas Ka Sar (Abbas Hai Abbas) X3

Sharm Se Rukta Nahi Neze Pe (Abbas Ka Sar)X2

Beridaa Kumba Jo Gazi Ko Nazar Aata Hai

Jang Karne…………..

  7. Hote Zainab Ke Madad Ake Karo Ai Bhai (Abbas Hai Abbas)X3

Hote Zainab Ke Madad Ake (Karo Ai Bhai) X2

Awo Abbas Ke Zinddan Ka Gar Aata Hai

Jang Karne………….

  8. Nawha Parta Hai Hasan Kat Ke Kurbal Rehaan (Abbas Hai Abbas)X3

Nawha Parta Hai Hasan Kat Ke (Kurbal Rehaan)X2

Hai Duwa Gazi Ki Kisko Ye Hunar Aata Hai

Jang Karne…………..

tracks.title: Maa Duwa Kartithi
tracks.lyrics:
(Haay Akber) X3

(Maa Duwa Kartithi Akber Tera Sehra Dekhu) X3

(Chand Chchup Jaaye Tera) X2 Chand Sa Chehra Dekhu

(Maa Duwa Kartithi Akber Tera Sehra Dekhu) X2



(Boli Rokar Ali Akber Ki Phuphi Ay Malik) X2

(Kis Tarha Barchi Me) X2 Akber Ka Kaleja Dekhu



(Maa Duwa Kartithi Akber Tera Sehra Dekhu) X2

(Chand Chchup Jaaye Tera) X2 Chand Sa Chehra Dekhu

(Maa Duwa Kartithi Akber Tera Sehra Dekhu) X2



(Lashe Akber Pe Khate Sughra Sunate Hai Hussain) X2

(Bhai Ab Aur Kahaa Tak) X2 Tera Rasta Dekhu



(Maa Duwa Kartithi Akber Tera Sehra Dekhu) X2

(Chand Chchup Jaaye Tera) X2 Chand Sa Chehra Dekhu

(Maa Duwa Kartithi Akber Tera Sehra Dekhu) X2



(Awo Zainab Ye Jawaan Laash Utha Ye Milkar) X2

(Jab Nahi Gazi To Kayoon) X2 Janibe Darya Dekhu



(Maa Duwa Kartithi Akber Tera Sehra Dekhu) X2

(Chand Chchup Jaaye Tera) X2 Chand Sa Chehra Dekhu

(Maa Duwa Kartithi Akber Tera Sehra Dekhu) X2



(Maa Pukari Ke Huwa Waqte Azaan Laal Mere) X2

(Tu Azaa De To Muhammed) X2 Ka Me Lehja Dekhu



(Maa Duwa Kartithi Akber Tera Sehra Dekhu) X2

(Chand Chchup Jaaye Tera) X2 Chand Sa Chehra Dekhu

(Maa Duwa Kartithi Akber Tera Sehra Dekhu) X2

tracks.title: Khanjar Tale
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain) X4

(Khanjar Talay, Hussain Hay, Teero(N) Ki Jhari Hai) X3

  1. (Esi Namaaz Kisne) X2 Zamaane Me Parhi Hai

(Khanjar Talay, Hussain Hay, Teero(N) Ki Jhari Hai) X2

  1. Wo Hay Hussain Khoon Say, Jisnay Wuzu Kiya. Teero(N) Ki Ja-Namaaz Pay, Al-Hamd Di Sadaa (Sajday Ko Dekh Maut Bhi) X2 Hairan Khari Hai

Khanjar Talay, Hussain Hay, Teero(N) Ki Jhari Hai

(Esi Namaaz Kisnay) X2 Zamaane Me Parhi Hai

(Khanjar Talay, Hussain Hay, Teero(N) Ki Jhari Hai) X2

  2. Noke Sina Pe Jisne, Quran Sunaya. Oor Oor Ke Garam Rait Nay, Kafan Uska Banaaya (Halqay Murida Laash Jo) X2 Maqtal Me Pari Hai

Khanjar Talay, Hussain Hay, Teero(N) Ki Jhari Hai

(Esi Namaaz Kisnay) X2 Zamaane Me Parhi Hai

(Khanjar Talay, Hussain Hay, Teero(N) Ki Jhari Hai) X2

  3. Sinay Me Burchi Haath Me, Hay Laal Ka Jigar. Shabbir Ka Jigar He Yay, Shabbir Ka Pisar (Sinay May Jiskay Barchi) X2 Zalim Nay Gari Hai

Khanjar Talay, Hussain Hay, Teero(N) Ki Jhari Hai

(Esi Namaaz Kisnay) X2 Zamaane Me Parhi Hai

(Khanjar Talay, Hussain Hay, Teero(N) Ki Jhari Hai) X2

  4. Apnay Hi Garm Khoon May, Tarpay Ali Akbar. Thaa Teer Galay May Rahay, Hastay Ali Asghar (Yeh Foj-E Hussaini Hi) X2 Karbal Me Lari Hai

Khanjar Talay, Hussain Hay, Teero(N) Ki Jhari Hai

(Esi Namaaz Kisnay) X2 Zamaane Me Parhi Hai

(Khanjar Talay, Hussain Hay, Teero(N) Ki Jhari Hai) X2

  5. Wo Hay Hussain Khoon Say, Jisnay Wuzu Kiya. Teero(N) Ki Ja-Namaaz Pay, Al-Hamd Di Sadaa (Sajday Ko Dekh Maut Bhi) X2 Hairan Khari Hai

Khanjar Talay, Hussain Hay, Teero(N) Ki Jhari Hai

(Esi Namaaz Kisnay) X2 Zamaane Me Parhi Hai

(Khanjar Talay, Hussain Hay, Teero(N) Ki Jhari Hai) X2

  6. Dee(N) Ki Panah Hay Sajda, Haider Kay Pisar Ka. Hay Tera Haan Gawa Hi, Yeh Waqt Asr Ka. (Bikhra Hay Laasha Bun May) X2 Aur Dhoop Kari Hay

Khanjar Talay, Hussain Hay, Teero(N) Ki Jhari Hai

(Esi Namaaz Kisnay) X2 Zamaane Me Parhi Hai

(Khanjar Talay, Hussain Hay, Teero(N) Ki Jhari Hai) X2

tracks.title: Bund Pani Nahi Bhaiya
tracks.lyrics:
Bund Pani Nahi Bhaiya

_

(Hai Sakina, Hai Hai Sakina) X2

(Bund Pani Nahi Bhaiya Na Hawa Aati Hai) X3

(Ab Bhi Zindaan Sai Sakina Ki) X2 Ki Sada Aaati Hai

(Bund Pani Nahi Bhaiya Na Hawa Aati Hai) X2

  1. (Kan Dukhtai Hain Lahoo Hota Hai Zakhmon Sai Ravan) X2

(Yad Jab Qaid Main Zalim Ki) X2 Jafa Aati Hai

(Bund Pani Nahi Bhaiya Na Hawa Aati Hai) X2

(Ab Bhi Zindaan Sai Sakina Ki)X2 Ki Sada Aaati Hai

(Bund Pani Nahi Bhaiya Na Hawa Aati Hai) X2

tracks.title: Maatam Karo Shabbir Ka
tracks.lyrics:
Maatam Karo Shabbir Ka, Hai Zainabe Dilgir Ka. Shabbir Tera Maatam, Momin Ki
Nishani Hai

  1. Bakshish Ki Zamaanat Hai, Jo Aankh Me Paani Hay

Maatam Karo Shabbir Ka, Hai Zainabe Dilgir Ka. Shabbir Tera Maatam, Momin Ki
Nishani Hai

  2. Yeh Daagh Nahin Logo, Hai Mojiza Maatam Ka. Sine Pe Likhi Mere, Kerbal Ki Kahani Hai

Maatam Karo Shabbir Ka, Hai Zainabe Dilgir Ka. Shabbir Tera Maatam, Momin Ki
Nishani Hai

  3. Ghazi Ka Alam Leke, Baazaar Me Aayee Hai. Rudaad Aseeron Ki, Duniya Ko Sunani Hai

Maatam Karo Shabbir Ka, Hai Zainabe Dilgir Ka. Shabbir Tera Maatam, Momin Ki
Nishani Hai

  4. Zainab Ne Shuruu Ki Thi, Zindaan Me Azadari. Sadiyon Se Chali Aayi, Yeh Reet Purani Hai

Maatam Karo Shabbir Ka, Hai Zainabe Dilgir Ka. Shabbir Tera Maatam, Momin Ki
Nishani Hai

  5. Aayi Hai Sadaa Ab Bhi, Kerbal Ki Fizaaon Se. Shabbir Haqeeqat Me, Islam Ka Baani Hai

Maatam Karo Shabbir Ka, Hai Zainabe Dilgir Ka. Shabbir Tera Maatam, Momin Ki
Nishani Hai

  6. De Pursaa Bahatar Ka, Zahra Ke Lute Ghar Ka. Har Saal Muharram Me, Yeh Yaad Dilani Hai

Maatam Karo Shabbir Ka, Hai Zainabe Dilgir Ka. Shabbir Tera Maatam, Momin Ki
Nishani Hai

  7. Mazloom Ke Mataam, Marna Hi Sa’adat Hai. Waise Bhi Jawaan Ek Din, Yeh Jaan To Jaani Hai

Maatam Karo Shabbir Ka, Hai Zainabe Dilgir Ka. Shabbir Tera Maatam, Momin Ki
Nishani Hai

tracks.title: Shakle Ali, Ghazi Mera
tracks.lyrics:
Shakle Ali, Ghazi Mera, Qaayam Rahe, Iski Wafa (Abbas Alam Tera, Jo Log
Uthayenge) X2

  1. Zehra Ki Dua Onke, Saaye Me Woh Aayenge

Shakle Ali, Ghazi Mera, Qaayam Rahe, Iski Wafa (Abbas Alam Tera, Jo Log
Uthayenge) X2

  2. Tehreer Hai Dariya Pe, Ghazi Ki Wafaa Dari. Shabbir Tere Munkar, Kya Isko Mitaa Yenge

Shakle Ali, Ghazi Mera, Qaayam Rahe, Iski Wafa (Abbas Alam Tera, Jo Log
Uthayenge) X2

  3. Hai Tujse Yehi Waadaa, Shabbir Ki Majlis Me. Abbas Tere Gham Me, Hum Khoon Bahaa Yenge

Shakle Ali, Ghazi Mera, Qaayam Rahe, Iski Wafa (Abbas Alam Tera, Jo Log
Uthayenge) X2

  4. Baazu Jo Kalam Hoker, Dariya Pe Gire Tere. Hum Hashr Talak Unkaa, Ab Soug Manaa Yenge

Shakle Ali, Ghazi Mera, Qaayam Rahe, Iski Wafa (Abbas Alam Tera, Jo Log
Uthayenge) X2

  5. Zainab Ki Tamanaa Hai, Khwaahish Hai Sakina Ki. Har Ghar Me Alam Tera, Hum Log Sajaa Yenge

Shakle Ali, Ghazi Mera, Qaayam Rahe, Iski Wafa (Abbas Alam Tera, Jo Log
Uthayenge) X2

  6. Khush Honga Mera Ghazi, Sarwar Bhi Dua Denge. Paani Pe Sakina Ki, Hum Nazr Dilaa Yenge

Shakle Ali, Ghazi Mera, Qaayam Rahe, Iski Wafa (Abbas Alam Tera, Jo Log
Uthayenge) X2

tracks.title: Tanha Ab Tak Ashk Bahaye
tracks.lyrics:
(Haye Akber) X4

(Tanha Abtak Ashk Bahaye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen) X2

Diwaaro Se Sar Takraye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen

(Tanha Abtak Ashk Bahaye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen) X2

  1. (Khun Rawa Hai Ankho Se Aur, Lab Par Nawha Bhayi Kaa) X2

Tabse Gham Ki Deep Jalaye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen

(Tanha Abtak Ashk Bahaye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen) X2

Diwaaro Se Sar Takraye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen

(Tanha Abtak Ashk Bahaye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen) X2

  2. (Darwaze Par Aas Lagaye, Rasta Takti Rehti Hai) X2

Ashko Se Khat Likhti Jaye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen

(Tanha Abtak Ashk Bahaye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen) X2

Diwaaro Se Sar Takraye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen

(Tanha Abtak Ashk Bahaye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen) X2

  3. (Aaja Akber Aaja Akber, Toot Rahi Hai Saas Meri) X2

Zakhme Jigar Kisko Dikhlaye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen

(Tanha Abtak Ashk Bahaye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen) X2

Diwaaro Se Sar Takraye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen

(Tanha Abtak Ashk Bahaye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen) X2

  4. (Kay Shabaan Ramazan Bhi Guzre, Eid Ka Din Bhi Gazar Gaya) X2

Kisko Apna Haal Bataye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen

(Tanha Abtak Ashk Bahaye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen) X2

Diwaaro Se Sar Takraye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen

(Tanha Abtak Ashk Bahaye, Akber Ki Bimar Behen) X2

tracks.title: Maa Ne Asghar Ko Jo
tracks.lyrics:
(Hai Asghar Hai Hai Asghar) X2

(Maa Ne Ashgar Ko Jo Jhule Me Na Paaya Ho Gha) X3

  1. Raat Bhar Chain Use, Kistarha Aaya Hoga

(Maa Ne Ashgar Ko Jo Jhule Me Na Paaya Ho Gha) X2

  2. Maa Yehi Sooch Ke Rooti Thi Lahu Ke Aansu, Sheh Ne Kistarha Kiya Hoga Tere Khoon Se Wuzoo, (Teer Jab Asghare) X2 Beshir Ne Khaya Hoga

(Maa Ne Ashgar Ko Jo Jhule Me Na Paaya Ho Gha) X2

  3. Raat Bhar Chain Use Kistarha Aaya Hoga

(Maa Ne Ashgar Ko Jo Jhule Me Na Paaya Ho Gha) X2

  4. Kuch Jalee Beeghriya Jhule Ki Utha Laayee Thee, Baanu Jab Choot Ke Zindaan Se Ghar Aayee The, (Haal Asghar Ka Youn) X2 Sughra Ko Sunaya Hoga

(Maa Ne Ashgar Ko Jo Jhule Me Na Paaya Ho Gha) X2

  5. Raat Bhar Chain Use Kistarha Aaya Hoga

(Maa Ne Ashgar Ko Jo Jhule Me Na Paaya Ho Gha) X2

  6. Zindagi Bhar Kabhi Saaye Mein Naa Baithi Madar, Kehti Thi Dhoop Me Sota Hai Mera Noore Nazar (Meri To Kabr Pe Bhi) X2 Dhoop Ka Saaya Hoga

(Maa Ne Ashgar Ko Jo Jhule Me Na Paaya Ho Gha) X2

  7. Raat Bhar Chain Use Kistarha Aaya Hoga

(Maa Ne Ashgar Ko Jho Jhule Me Na Paaya Ho Gha) X2

  8. Poochti Rehti Thi Har Ek Se Maa Ashgar Ki, Mujhko Batlao Bani Qabr Kaha Asghar Ki (Uski Turbat Pe Diya) X2 Kisne Jalaaya Hoga

(Maa Ne Ashgar Ko Jo Jhule Me Na Paaya Ho Gha) X2

  9. Raat Bhar Chain Use X2 Kistarha Aaya Hoga

(Maa Ne Ashgar Ko Jo Jhule Me Na Paaya Ho Gha) X2

tracks.title: Sajjad Tere Gham Mein
tracks.lyrics:
(Hai Sajjad Hai Hai Sajjad) X2

(Sajjad Tere Gham Mein Zanjeer Ro Rahi Hai) X3

  1. (Aankhon Mein Khwaab Chupp Hai) X2 Tabeer Ro Rahi Hai

(Sajjad Tere Gham Mein Zanjeer Ro Rahi Hai) X2

  2. (Kaante Biche Hue Hai Jalti Hui Zameen Par) X2 Chaale Tarap Rahe Hai Takdeer Ro Rahi Hai, Aankhon Mein Khwaab Chupp Hai Tabeer Roh Rahi Hai

(Sajjad Tere Gham Mein Zanjeer Ro Rahi Hai) X2

  3. (Abbas-E-Bawafaa Ki Jageer Karbala Hain) X2 Abid Ke Gham Me Sari Jageer Ro Rahi Hai, Aankhon Mein Khwaab Chupp Hai Tabeer Roh Rahi Hai

(Sajjad Tere Gham Mein Zanjeer Ro Rahi Hai) X2

  4. (Abid Na Kaise Rowe Aye Shaamion Bataao) X2 Zakhmee Hai Kaan Jiske Hamsheer Ro Rahi Hai, Aankhon Mein Khwaab Chupp Hai Tabeer Roh Rahi Hai

(Sajjad Tere Gham Mein Zanjeer Ro Rahi Hai) X2

  5. (Sajjad Ke Badan Ka Sabh Khoon Jhal Chuka Hai) X2 Paaon Mein Joo Padhi Hai Zanjeer Ro Rahi Hai, Aankhon Mein Khwaab Chupp Hai Tabeer Roh Rahi Hai

(Sajjad Tere Gham Mein Zanjeer Roo Rahi Hai) X2

  6. (Aankhon Se Khoon Abid Kaise Baha Raha Hai) X2 Ho Kar Har Ek Bibi Dalgeer Ro Rahi Hai, Aankhon Mein Khwaab Chupp Hai Tabeer Roh Rahi Hai

(Sajjad Tere Gham Mein Zanjeer Roo Rahi Hai) X2

tracks.title: Naa Pathar Maaro Mein Zainab Hu
tracks.lyrics:
(Na Maaro Na Maaro Naa Naa Maaro) X2

(Na Pathar Maro Mein Zainab Hu) X2

(Na Maaro Na Maaro Naa Naa Maaro) X2

  1. Mein Bewatan Mein Berida Bhai Mera Maara Gaya, Baba Ali Maa Sayyada Karte Ho Kyo Mujh Pe Jafaa

(Na Pathar Maro Mein Zainab Hu) X2

  2. Mehmaan Bula Kar Lut Liya Kaata Hai Mere Bhai Ka Galaa, Be Gaur-O-Kafan Hai Fauj-E-Khuda Ay Ehle Sitam Ay Ehle Jafaa’ (Mein Zainab-E-Hasta Jigar Jalti Zameen Par Hai Safar) X2 Bahi Ki Ho Mein Nauha Gar Kyo Na Kaho Sar Peet Kar

(Na Pathar Maro Mein Zainab Hu) X2

  3. Aayee Thi Bhara Ghar Lekar Mein Tumne Woh Bhara Ghar Loot Liya, Looti Hai Ridaye Bhi Sar Se Say Rooz Hame Paani Na Diya (Khoon Se Bhara Hai Pehrahan Zakhmi Hai Pehle Se Badan) X2 Ho Thi Seene Mein Dukhan Mein Ho Waqaar-E-Panjetan

(Na Pathar Maro Mein Zainab Hu) X2

  4. Kaanto Pe Chalaate Ho Hamko Bejurm Sataate Ho Hamko, Dikhlake Azeezo Ke Lashe Tumlogh Rulate Ho Hamko (Mein Dukhtar-E-Sher-E-Khuda Nana Mera Hai Mustafa) X2 Cheeni Hai Kyon Meri Ridah Tumko Khuda Ka Waasta

(Na Pathar Maro Mein Zainab Hu) X2

  5. Mehmaan Bula Kar Lut Liya Kaata Hai Mere Bhai Ka Galaa, Be Gaur-O-Kafan Hai Fauj-E-Khuda Ay Ehle Sitam Ay Ehle Jafaa’ (Mein Zainab-E-Hasta Jigar Jalti Zameen Par Hai Safar) X2 Bahi Ki Ho Mein Nauha Gar Kyo Na Kaho Sar Peet Kar

(Na Pathar Maro Mein Zainab Hu) X2

  6. Taurao Na Ootho Ko Aise Bachon Pe Zara Kuch Rehm Karo, Maaon Ke Dilo Ke Ai Zaalim Is Zulm-O-Sitam Tukde Na Karo (Karte Ho Kyo Ham Pe Sitam Ghut Ne Lagaa Bacho Ka Damm) X2 Ham Sab Nabi Ke Hai Haram Tumko Mohammad Ki Kasam

(Na Pathar Maro Mein Zainab Hu) X2

Na Maaro Na Maaro Na Na Maaro

(Na Pathar Maro Mein Zainab Hu) X2

tracks.title: Aye Sham E Gharibaan
tracks.lyrics:
(Ay Shaam-E-Ghariba) X4

Zainab Ki Sada Ayi (Ay Shamm-E-Ghariba) X4

(Kya Bhayi Ki Khata Thi) X2 (Ay Shamm-E-Ghariba) X4

  1. (Sab Khayme Jal Juke Hai Chadar Nahi Hai Sar Per) X2 (Akber Naa Rahaa Naa Ghazi) X2 Ay Shamm-E-Ghariba

(Ay Shamm-E-Ghariba) X4

  2. (Sine Pe Sone Wali Khati Hai Ab Tamache) X2 (Had Ho Gayi Jafa Ki) X2 Ay Sham-E-Ghariba

(Ay Shamm-E-Ghariba) X4

  3. (Jalte Huwe Garo(N) Me Jula Bhi Jal Gaya Hai) X2 (Rota Hai Asma(N) Bhi) X2 Ay Sham-E-Ghariba

(Ay Shamm-E-Ghariba) X4

  4. (Ghash Me Para Hai Abid, Kaise Jagaye Zainab) X2 (Hai Her Taraf Udasi) X2 Ay Sham-E-Ghariba

(Ay Shamm-E-Ghariba) X4

  5. (Be Sar Pare Hai Lashe Zainab Kise Sadaa De) X2 (Luti Gayi Ridaaye) X2 Ay Sham-E-Ghariba

(Ay Shamm-E-Ghariba) X4

  6. (Rehan Ren Me Tarpa Ek Baa Wafaa Ka Lasha) X2 (Zainab Ne Jab Sadaa Di) X2 Ay Sham-E-Ghariba

(Ay Shamm-E-Ghariba) X4

  7. (Bazoo Bandhe Huwe Hai Kaidi Bani Huwi Hai) X2 (Kufe Ki Shahazadi) X2 Ay Sham-E-Ghariba

(Ay Shamm-E-Ghariba) X4

  8. Zainab Ki Sada Ayi Ay Shamm-E-Ghariba

(Ay Shamm-E-Ghariba) X4

  9. (Kya Bhayi Ki Khata Thi) X2 Ay Sham-E-Ghariba

tracks.title: Ham Ne Gazi
tracks.lyrics:
(Lalilah Ki Jaan Hai Maula Gazi Ka Alam, Deen Ki Pehchan Kai Maula Gazi Ka
Alam) X2

(Ham Ne Gazi Ka Alam Ghar Pe Sajaa Rakha Hai) X3

  1. (Ghar Ko Apne Maula Ka) X2 Aza Khanaa Banaa Rakha Hai

(Ham Ne Gazi Ka Alam Ghar Pe Sajaa Rakha Hai) X2

  2. (Uth Ta Hai Majlis-E-Shabbir Me Jo Tera Alam) X2 (Har Musibat Se Hame) X2 Usne Bacha Rakha Hai

(Ham Ne Gazi Ka Alam Ghar Pe Sajaa Rakha Hai) X2

  3. (Aaj Bhi Parcham-E-Abbas Ko Dekha To Kahaa) X2 (Mashk Ko Sine Se) X2 Gazi Ne Lagaa Rakha Hai

(Ham Ne Gazi Ka Alam Ghar Pe Sajaa Rakha Hai) X2

  4. (Kat Gaye Bazu Alamdar Ke Darya Ke Magar) X2 (Phir Bhi Islam Ke) X2 Parcham Ko Uthaa Rakha Hai

(Ham Ne Gazi Ka Alam Ghar Pe Sajaa Rakha Hai) X2

  5. (Ye Sabile Jo Muharram Me Nazar Ati Hai) X2 (Unpe Abbas Ne) X2 Khud Baste Wafa Rakha Hai

(Ham Ne Gazi Ka Alam Ghar Pe Sajaa Rakha Hai) X2

  6. (Har Tere Bhayi Ki Majlis Tera Matam Gazi) X2 (Fatema Zehra) X2 Ko Mehman Bana Rakha Hai

(Ham Ne Gazi Ka Alam Ghar Pe Sajaa Rakha Hai) X2

(Har Farazi Hai Ye Rehan Hassan Sadiq Ki) X2 (Apna Sar Gazi Ke) X2 Kadmo Pe
Jukaa Rakha Hai

(Ham Ne Gazi Ka Alam Ghar Pe Sajaa Rakha Hai) X2

tracks.title: Shabbir Ke Sajde Ko
tracks.lyrics:
(Matam He Ye Shabbir Ka, Haye Chader-E-Tathir Ka) X2 Sugra Dukhi Hamshir Ka,
Haye Asger-E-Bashir Ka

(Shabbir Ke Sajde Ko Khuda Dekh Raha Hai) X3

  1. (Khanjar Tale Pyase Ka) X2 Gala Dekh Raha Hai

Shabbir Ke Sajde Ko Khuda Dekh Raha Hai, Matam He Ye Shabbir Ka, Haye Chader-
E-Tathir Ka, Sugra Dukhi Hamshir Ka, Haye Asger-E-Bashir Ka, Shabbir Ke Sajde
Ko Khuda Dekh Raha Hai

  2. (Gardan Pe Chhuri Sajde Me Sar Lab Pe Dua Hai) X2 Mazloom Ki Har Ek Adaa, Dekh Raha Hai, (Khanjar Tale Pyase Ka) X2 Gala Dekh Raha Hai

Matam He Ye Shabbir Ka, Haye Chader-E-Tathir Ka, Sugra Dukhi Hamshir Ka, Haye
Asger-E-Bashir Ka, Shabbir Ke Sajde Ko Khuda Dekh Raha Hai

  3. (Sar Hai Kahi Tan Hai Kahi, Bahe Labe Dariya) X2 Bikhra Huwa Quran-E- Wafa Dekh Raha Hai, (Khanjar Tale Pyase Ka) X2 Gala Dekh Raha Hai

Matam He Ye Shabbir Ka, Haye Chader-E-Tathir Ka, Sugra Dukhi Hamshir Ka, Haye
Asger-E-Bashir Ka, Shabbir Ke Sajde Ko Khuda Dekh Raha Hai

  4. (Hai Khun Me Dubi Huwi Tasweer Payambar) X2 Umat Se Muhaamd Ko Khafa Dekh Raha Hai (Khanjar Tale Pyase Ka) X2 Gala Dekh Raha Hai

Matam He Ye Shabbir Ka, Haye Chader-E-Tathir Ka, Sugra Dukhi Hamshir Ka, Haye
Asger-E-Bashir Ka, Shabbir Ke Sajde Ko Khuda Dekh Raha Hai

  5. (Jo Ayat-E-Tathir Ki Tafsir Bani Thi) X2 Us Bibi Ki Neze Pe Rida Dekh Raha Hai, (Khanjar Tale Pyase Ka) X2 Gala Dekh Raha Hai

Matam He Ye Shabbir Ka, Haye Chader-E-Tathir Ka, Sugra Dukhi Hamshir Ka, Haye
Asger-E-Bashir Ka, Shabbir Ke Sajde Ko Khuda Dekh Raha Hai

  6. (Jalte Huwe Khayyamm Hai Bikhre Huwe Lashe) X2 Manzar Ye Sare Kabobala Dekh Raha Hai, (Khanjar Tale Pyase Ka) X2 Gala Dekh Raha Hai

Matam He Ye Shabbir Ka, Haye Chader-E-Tathir Ka, Sugra Dukhi Hamshir Ka, Haye
Asger-E-Bashir Ka, Shabbir Ke Sajde Ko Khuda Dekh Raha Hai

  7. (Har Waqt Siya Posh Hai Shabbir Ke Gham Me) X2 Kaabe Ko Bhi Masroof Aza Dekh Raha Hai, (Khanjar Tale Pyase Ka) X2 Gala Dekh Raha Hai

Matam He Ye Shabbir Ka, Haye Chader-E-Tathir Ka, Sugra Dukhi Hamshir Ka, Haye
Asger-E-Bashir Ka, Shabbir Ke Sajde Ko Khuda Dekh Raha Hai

  8. (Jawad Khuda Band Mera Deen-E-Nabi Par) X2 Imran Ke Beto Ki Ata Dekh Raha Hai (Khanjar Tale Pyase Ka) X2 Gala Dekh Raha Hai

Matam He Ye Shabbir Ka, Haye Chader-E-Tathir Ka, Sugra Dukhi Hamshir Ka, Haye
Asger-E-Bashir Ka, Shabbir Ke Sajde Ko Khuda Dekh Raha Hai

tracks.title: Nana Teri Zainab
tracks.lyrics:
(Ujjar Gaiyyan, Nana Mei Ujjar Gaiyyan) X2

(Nana Teri Zainab Ne Woh Dard Utha Ye Hai) X3

  1. (Zalim Ka Zulam Dekha) X2 Aanso Nikal Aye Hai

(Nana Teri Zainab Ne Woh Dard Utha Ye Hai) X3

  2. (Mei Shaam Ki Galiyo Se Sar Nange Guzar Ayi) X2 (Nana Teri Ummat Ne) X2 Din Ye Bhi Dikhaye Hai

(Nana Teri Zainab Ne Woh Dard Utha Ye Hai) X3

  3. (Pathar Jo Baraste The Zehra Ke Garane Par) X2 (Is Haal Pe Suraj Ne) X2 Khud Ashk Bahaye Hai

(Nana Teri Zainab Ne Woh Dard Utha Ye Hai) X3

  4. (Ye Khun Bhara Kurta Hai Tere Nawase Ka) X2 (Bhayi Ki Nishani Hum) X2 Tere Liye Laaye Hum

(Nana Teri Zainab Ne Woh Dard Utha Ye Hai) X3

  5. (Gham Khagaya Zainab Ko Nana Ali Akber Ka) X2 (Mat Pucho Watan Me Hum) X2 Kis Terha Se Aye Hai

(Nana Teri Zainab Ne Woh Dard Utha Ye Hai) X3

  6. (Zindaa(N) Ke Andhere Mei Neend Ayi Sakina Ko) X2 (Hum Qabr Sakina Ki) X2 Waa Chor Ke Aye Hai

(Nana Teri Zainab Ne Woh Dard Utha Ye Hai) X3

  7. (Sawbaat Ka Safar Na Tha Pardes Se Hum Qaydi) X2 (Ye Nil-E-Rasan Ke Hai) X2 Jo Shano Pe Laye Hai

(Nana Teri Zainab Ne Woh Dard Utha Ye Hai) X3

tracks.title: Zindaan Ka Andhera
tracks.lyrics:
Hai Baba Hai Hai Baba (Zindha Ka Andhera Muje Sone Nahi Deta) X3

  1. Roti Hu To Muje Zalim Rone Nahi Deta

(Zindha Ka Andhera Muje Sone Nahi Deta) X2 (Haye Baba Haay Haay Baba) X2

  2. Baba Mere Kano Se (Lahoo Aab Bhi Hai Jari) X2 Mare Hai Tamache (Sakina Ko Tumari) X2 Pehlu Mei Phoophi Ke Rehne Nahi Detaa

(Zindha Ka Andhera Muje Sone Nahi Deta) X2 (Haye Baba Haay Haay Baba) X2

  3. Khakh Par To Muje Neendh Hi (Ati Nahi Baba) X2 Soti Hu To Duro Se (Jaga Dete Hai Adaa) X2 Ye Shimr Muje Sans Bhi Lene Nahi Deta

(Zindha Ka Andhera Muje Sone Nahi Deta) X2 (Haye Baba Haay Haay Baba) X2

  4. Ab Khaab Mei Pani Ki (Tamanna Nahi Karti) X2 Aate Hai Bare Halk Mei (Aur Saas Hai Rukhti) X2 Amu Se Shikayat Koyi Karne Nahi Detaa

(Zindha Ka Andhera Muje Sone Nahi Deta) X2 (Haye Baba Haay Haay Baba) X2

  5. Is Qayd Se Kab Hongi (Rihaayi Mere Baba) X2 Kaise Sahu Asghar Ki (Judaayi Mere Baba) X2 Gham Kumbe Ka Ab To Muje Jine Nahi Deta

(Zindha Ka Andhera Muje Sone Nahi Deta) X2 (Haye Baba Haay Haay Baba) X2

  6. Rehan Buka Karti Thi (Jab Bali Sakina) X2 Khud Maut Ke Maathe Pe Thi (Ata Tha Pasina) X2 Ye Baat Pe Ansu Mere Rukne Nahi Deta

(Zindha Ka Andhera Muje Sone Nahi Deta) X2 (Haye Baba Haay Haay Baba) X2

tracks.title: Tu Rat Na Roya Ker
tracks.lyrics:
(Tu Rat Na Roya Kar) x4

Haw Wailay Puttar Sajjad (Tu Rat Na Roya Kar) x2

Haw Wailay Puttar Sajjad (Tu Rat Na Roya Kar) x4

(Zara Khalke Wo Zainab Ake) x2 
Chum Ke Bimaar Ka Ser
Tu Rat Na Roya Kar

Haw Wailay Puttar Sajjad (Tu Rat Na Roya Kar) x4

Mere Matbal Kazim, Toor Gaye Ne
Na Ghazi Bal Ke Aya Hai
 Ki Hoya Sato Zalim Ne
Je De Wich Darbar Bulaya Hai 
(Tere Khoon De Athro Tak Tak Ke) x2 
Phuphi Zainab Jasi Mer
Toon Rat Na Roya Ker

Haw Wailay Puttar Sajjad (Tu Rat Na Roya Kar) x4

(Yu Soch Sajjad Nu Wich Zindaan, Payi Rat Dey Neer Na Awe) x2
Pardes De Wich Majboor Sajjad Ko Me Pern Boo Kafan Tu Awe, Yu Soch Sajjad Nu Wich Zindaan,
Payi Rat Dey Neer Na Awe, Pardes De Wich Majboor Sayyed Ko Me Pern Boo Kajan
Tu Awe, Kithe Dafnawa Be Pern Diga Naaban Tu Puch Da Chawe 
(Jime Pern Dafnayan Abid) x2 
(Shaala Na Koi) x2 Enj Dafnawe

Way Puch Di To Bimaar Tuke
Kado Weer Agrawa Mukhgawe
Hum Takda We Dil Dana Wich-E-Weer Nu Sawan Mukriyan Ay 
(Hay Puch Di Ro Gal Baba Wan) X2 
Kado Jana Ay Wal De Ghar
Toon Rat Na Roya Ker

Haw Wailay Puttar Sajjad (Tu Rat Na Roya Kar) X4

  4. Akhe Tak Ke Khadiya Kasma Nu, Na Weer De Weer Na Lawa Gi, Jid Kad De Ek Pal Ray Sak Di, Ade Sine Baad Me Soowangi (Bas Ayna Tu Me Dukhiya Ke) X2 Ehsaan Tu Weer Na Ker, Toon Rat Na Roya Ker

Haw Wailay Puttar Sajjad (Tu Rat Na Roya Kar) X4



"(Tak Balwa Aam Nu Rat Roya, Jis Dam Shabbir Da Laale) X2 (Akhe Na Ro Rat Gal
Man Meri Ro) X2 Dukhi Beym Iyo Sawaal, Jitha Babal To Jag Du Puthya, Phuphi
Zainab De Me Ware (Use Dinda Changa Weer Da, Use Dinda Changa Nayi Lagda) X2
Meny Rab Di, Soo Ran Lawe "



Haw Wailay Puttar Sajjad (Tu Rat Na Roya Kar) X4

  5. Jime Pay Diya Akhiya Samdiyaa, Me Ku Yaad-O-Manzar Andaye, Phuphi Ro Ro Ker Marrat Ye (Haay Rat De Khul De Akh De Aratdu, Mayku Ku Lagda Ye Ghar, Toon Rat Na Roya Ker

Haw Wailay Puttar Sajjad (Tu Rat Na Roya Kar) X4

tracks.title: Aao Khaleel Dekho Agaaz Hai Fughan Ka
tracks.lyrics:
(Haae Akber Haa Akber Haae Haae Akber) X2

(Aao Khalil Dekho Aagaaz Hai Fughan Ka) X3

  1. (Kaandhe Zaeef Ke Par) X2 Laashaa Hai Nawjawaan Ka

(Aao Khalil Dekho Aagaaz Hai Fughan Ka) X2

  2. (Thaamo Khalil Dil Ko Shayad Na Dekh Paao) X2 (Hamshakle Mustafa Ke) X2 Sine Me Phal Sina Ka

(Aao Khalil Dekho Aagaaz Hai Fughan Ka) X2

  3. (Pardo Mei Jisko Paala Athara Saal Zainab) X2 (Who Lakht Hai Kaleja) X2 Maqtal Mei Us Jawaan Ka

(Aao Khalil Dekho Aagaaz Hai Fughan Ka) X2

  4. (Naa Sine Ke Jigar Se Sheh Khench Te Hai Barchi) X2 (Dil Gham Se Phat Na Jaae) X2 Khaime Ke Dar Pe Maa Ka

(Aao Khalil Dekho Aagaaz Hai Fughan Ka) X2

  5. (Bechain Hogayi Hai Subhe Ashur Asghar) X2 (Andaaz Hu Ba Hu Hai) X2 Akber Teri Azaan Ka

(Aao Khalil Dekho Aagaaz Hai Fughan Ka) X2

  6. (Sughra Se Koi Kehdo Bibi Diye Bujhaalo) X2 (Naa Aayega Palat Kar) X2 Ham Shakle Nana Jaan Ka

(Aao Khalil Dekho Aagaaz Hai Fughan Ka) X2

  7. (Akber Ke Paak Khun Se Rangi Hai Khak-E-Karbal) X2 (Rang Laal Hogaya Hai) X2 "Jawaad" Aasmaan Ka

(Aao Khalil Dekho Aagaaz Hai Fughan Ka) X2

tracks.title: Ghazi Ka Alam Logo
tracks.lyrics:
(Baba Tera Shere Khuda, Tu Wafaaon Ka Hai Shehenshaa) X2

(Ghazi Ka Alam Logo, Bakshish Ki Zamanat Hai) X3

  1. (Taazim Karo Iski) X2 Zahraa Ki Amanat Hai

(Ghazi Ka Alam Logo, Bakshish Ki Zamanat Hai) X2

  2. Abbas Ka Ye Parcham, Karbal Ki Nishaani Hai

Wabasta Isi Se Kuch Pyaason Ki Kahani Hai

Meyaar Wafaaon Ka Azmat Ki Alamat Hai

(Taazim Karo Iski) X2 Zahraa Ki Amanat Hai

(Ghazi Ka Alam Logo, Bakshish Ki Zamanat Hai) X2

(Taazim Karo Iski) X2 Zahraa Ki Amanat Hai

(Ghazi Ka Alam Logo, Bakshish Ki Zamanat Hai) X2

  3. Zaalim Ne Kiye Dono Baazu Bhi Kalam Dekho

Uncha Hi Raha Phir Bhi Ghazi Ka Alam Dekho

Zainab Ki Duaaon Se Ab Tak Ye Salamat Hai

(Taazim Karo Iski) X2 Zahraa Ki Amanat Hai

(Ghazi Ka Alam Logo, Bakshish Ki Zamanat Hai) X2

(Taazim Karo Iski) X2 Zahraa Ki Amanat Hai

(Ghazi Ka Alam Logo, Bakshish Ki Zamanat Hai) X2

  4. Sar Aaj Bhi Uncha Hai Har Ek Namazi Kaa

Islam Yaqinan Ye Ehsaan Hai Ghazi Kaa

Jo Aaj Talak Teri Saanso Mei Hararat Hai

(Taazim Karo Iski) X2 Zahraa Ki Amanat Hai

(Ghazi Ka Alam Logo, Bakshish Ki Zamanat Hai) X2

(Taazim Karo Iski) X2 Zahraa Ki Amanat Hai

(Ghazi Ka Alam Logo, Bakshish Ki Zamanat Hai) X2

  5. Maula Ki Zarih Piche Aage Hai Alam Dekho

Karbal Ki Tarhaa Abhi Mehsus Huwa Mujko

Matam Ke Juluson Mei Ghazi Ki Kayadat Hai

(Taazim Karo Iski) X2 Zahraa Ki Amanat Hai

(Ghazi Ka Alam Logo, Bakshish Ki Zamanat Hai) X2

(Taazim Karo Iski) X2 Zahraa Ki Amanat Hai

(Ghazi Ka Alam Logo, Bakshish Ki Zamanat Hai) X2

  6. Sine Se Lagaa Rakhna Ghar Ghar Pe Sajaa Rakhna

Har Shaam Diye Iski Chokhat Pe Jalaa Rakhna

"Jawaad" Ye Sadyon Se Momin Ki Ibadat Hai

(Taazim Karo Iski) X2 Zahraa Ki Amanat Hai

(Ghazi Ka Alam Logo, Bakshish Ki Zamanat Hai) X2

(Taazim Karo Iski) X2 Zahraa Ki Amanat Hai

(Ghazi Ka Alam Logo, Bakshish Ki Zamanat Hai) X2

tracks.title: Deke Sar Shabbir Ne
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussein) X4

(Deke Sar Shabbir Ne, Islaam Zindaa Kardiya) X3

  1. (Karbala Ko Jiske Sajde) X2 Ne Mu-Alla Kardiya

(Deke Sar Shabbir Ne, Islaam Zindaa Kardiya) X2

  2. Hashr Tak Koi Yazidi Sar Utha Sakta Nahi, Jiska Badla Zindagi Bhar Deen Jukaa Sakta Nahi, (Fatema Ke Laal Ne) X2 Ehsaan Aisa Kardiya

(Deke Sar Shabbir Ne, Islaam Zindaa Kardiya) X2

Karbala Ko Jiske Sajde, Ne Mu-Alla Kardiya

(Deke Sar Shabbir Ne, Islaam Zindaa Kardiya) X2

  3. Teri Qurbani Se Pehle Deen Ko Aaya Na Chain, Ambiya Se Bhi Mukammil Jo Naho Paaya Hussein, (Ek Sajde Ne Tere Woh) X2 Kaam Pura Kardiya

(Deke Sar Shabbir Ne, Islaam Zindaa Kardiya) X2

Karbala Ko Jiske Sajde, Ne Mu-Alla Kardiya

(Deke Sar Shabbir Ne, Islaam Zindaa Kardiya) X2

  4. Aaj Bhi Naagaah Wafaaen Hai Tere Abbas Par, Nehr Par Ghazi Ke Dono Kat Gaye Baazu Magar, (Taa Abad Islaam Ke) X2 Parcham Ko Uncha Kardiya

(Deke Sar Shabbir Ne, Islaam Zindaa Kardiya) X2

Karbala Ko Jiske Sajde, Ne Mu-Alla Kardiya

(Deke Sar Shabbir Ne, Islaam Zindaa Kardiya) X2

  5. Maar Kar Ibne Ali Ko Cheeni Zainab Ki Ridaa, Jab Parha Kalma Nabi Kaa Phir Sare Karbobala, (Aale Ehmad Ke Liye) X2 Yu(N) Hashr Barpaa Kardiya

(Deke Sar Shabbir Ne, Islaam Zindaa Kardiya) X2

Karbala Ko Jiske Sajde, Ne Mu-Alla Kardiya

(Deke Sar Shabbir Ne, Islaam Zindaa Kardiya) X2

  6. Naazon Se Noke Sinaa Pe Ubhraa Thaa "Jawaad" Jo, Kaise Bhulegaa Zamana Fatema Ke Chaand Ko, (Sar Kataake Usne Apna) X2 Yu(N) Ujaala Kardiya

(Deke Sar Shabbir Ne, Islaam Zindaa Kardiya) X2

Karbala Ko Jiske Sajde, Ne Mu-Alla Kardiya

(Deke Sar Shabbir Ne, Islaam Zindaa Kardiya) X2

tracks.title: Jaltay Huway Khaimay Hain
tracks.lyrics:
(Hai Dukhtare Shere Khuda, Jo Karbala Mei Hai Berida) X2

(Jalte Huwe Khaime Hain, Naa Bhaai Naa Rida Hai) X2

  1. (Ummat Se Milaa) X2 Kaisa Ye Zainab Ko Silaa Hai

(Jalte Huwe Khaime Hain, Naa Bhaai Naa Rida Hai) X2

  2. Aale Abaa Ke Sar Hai Charhe Nouke Sinaa Par, Laashe Pare Hai Harsu Jo Sab Reg-E-Tapaa Par, (Pehnaati Unhe) X2 Ban Mei Kafan Khaake Shafaa Hai

(Jalte Huwe Khaime Hain, Naa Bhaai Naa Rida Hai) X2

Ummat Se Milaa, Kaisa Ye Zainab Ko Silaa Hai

(Jalte Huwe Khaime Hain, Naa Bhaai Naa Rida Hai) X2

  3. Aabid Ko Laa Rahi Hai Woh Kaandho Pe Uthaa Kar, Aur Shimr Ko Kehti Hai Zaraa Khoufe Khuda Kar, (Koi Naa Raha) X2 Ik Yehi Bimaar Bacha Hai

(Jalte Huwe Khaime Hain, Naa Bhaai Naa Rida Hai) X2

Ummat Se Milaa, Kaisa Ye Zainab Ko Silaa Hai

(Jalte Huwe Khaime Hain, Naa Bhaai Naa Rida Hai) X2

  4. Karte Hai Sab Farishte Shabbir Ka Matam, Karti Hai Huro Walma Beshir Ka Matam, (Matam Shahe Be) X2 Kas Ka Sar-E-Arsh Bapaa Hai

(Jalte Huwe Khaime Hain, Naa Bhaai Naa Rida Hai) X2

Ummat Se Milaa, Kaisa Ye Zainab Ko Silaa Hai

(Jalte Huwe Khaime Hain, Naa Bhaai Naa Rida Hai) X2

  5. Is Baat Ki Ai Shaam-E-Gharibaan Hai Gawaah Tu, Saare Nahi Ye Saanie Zehra Ke Hai Aansu, ("Khursheed" Nahi) X2 Aaj To Khud Rota Khuda Hai

(Jalte Huwe Khaime Hain, Naa Bhaai Naa Rida Hai) X2

Ummat Se Milaa, Kaisa Ye Zainab Ko Silaa Hai

(Jalte Huwe Khaime Hain, Naa Bhaai Naa Rida Hai) X4

tracks.title: Gunjti Shaam-E-Ghariba
tracks.lyrics:
(Ujjar Gayi, Haaye Mei Ujjar Gayi) X3

(Gunjti Shaam-E-Ghariba(N) Mei Ye Zainab Ki Sada, Mera Koyi Na Raha) X3

  1. (Na Rahe Bhaayi Na Bete) X2 Chin Gayi Meri Rida

Mera Koyi Na Raha

(Gunjti Shaam-E-Ghariba(N) Mei Ye Zainab Ki Sada, Mera Koyi Na Raha) X2

  2. (Aasre Jiske Behen, Chor Ke Ayi Thi Watan) X2

Mere Parde Ka Jisse, Maa(N) Ne Banaya Zamin

Lab-E-Darya Mere Ghazi Ke, Huwe Bazu Juda

Mera Koyi Na Raha

(Gunjti Shaam-E-Ghariba(N) Mei Ye Zainab Ki Sada, Mera Koyi Na Raha) X2

  3. (Wo Jo Athaara Baras Noori Hijabo(N) Me Raha) X2

Lott Ke Awunga Mei Jisne Tha Sughra Se Kaha

Haaye Barchhi Se Kaleja, Mere Akbar Ka Chhida

Mera Koyi Na Raha

(Gunjti Shaam-E-Ghariba(N) Mei Ye Zainab Ki Sada, Mera Koyi Na Raha) X2

  4. (Mera Ghazi Bhi Gaya, Qasim-O-Akbar Bhi Gaye) X2

Hur Sa Mehma(N) Bhi Gaya, Ibn-E-Mazahir Bhi Gaye

Kisko Ghurbat Mei Sada Du, Karbala Ye To Bata,

Mera Koyi Na Raha

(Gunjti Shaam-E-Ghariba(N) Mei Ye Zainab Ki Sada, Mera Koyi Na Raha) X2

  5. (Maa Ne Maqtal Me Jisse, Dulha Bana Kar Bheja) X2

Mera Qasim Ka Badan, Dasht Me Pamal Huwa

Baal Khole Huwe Roti, Huwi Laashe Pe Kaha

Mera Koyi Na Raha

(Gunjti Shaam-E-Ghariba(N) Mei Ye Zainab Ki Sada, Mera Koyi Na Raha) X2

  6. (Wo Sakina Ke Jisse, Pyaar Tha Baba Se Bara) X2

Yaad Baba Ke Mili Jisko Tamacho(N) Ki Saza

Gur Jo Zalim Ne Utaare, Khun Ankho(N) Se Baha

Mera Koyi Na Raha

(Gunjti Shaam-E-Ghariba(N) Mei Ye Zainab Ki Sada, Mera Koyi Na Raha) X2

  7. (Na Rahe Bhaayi Na Bete) X2 Chin Gayi Meri Rida

Mera Koyi Na Raha

(Gunjti Shaam-E-Ghariba(N) Mei Ye Zainab Ki Sada, Mera Koyi Na Raha) X2

tracks.title: Matam Hai Yeah Meri Baqa
tracks.lyrics:
(Matam Hai Ye Meri Baqa, Karte Rahenge Ham Sada) X2

(Zainab Tere Hussain Ka Gham Karte Rahenge) X3

  1. (Ham Sina Zani Sham-O-Sahar) X2 Karte Rahenge

(Zainab Tere Hussain Ka Gham Karte Rahenge) X2

  2. Ay Sani-E-Zehra Teri, Sunnat Hai Ye Matam

Apne Jo Aqeede Mei Ibadat Hai Ye Matam

(Har Haal Mei Ye Farz Ada) X2 Karte Rahenge

(Zainab Tere Hussain Ka Gham Karte Rahenge) X2

  3. Jisne Teri Chadar Pe Fida, Kardiye Bazu

Kehti Hai Jisse Bibi, Alamdar-E-Wafa Tu

(Har Ghar Tere Ghazi Ke Alam) X2 Sajte Rahenge

(Zainab Tere Hussain Ka Gham Karte Rahenge) X2

  4. Dohraayenge Pyaase Tere, Asghar Ke Kahani

Ta Hashr Jisse Rowenga, Daryao(N) Ka Paani

(Har Ghunt Pe Ham Yaad Usse) X2 Karte Rahenge

(Zainab Tere Hussain Ka Gham Karte Rahenge) X2

  5. Jo Aag Liye Khana-E-Zehra Pe The Aaye

Khayaam Jinho Ne Tere, Karbal Mei Jalaaye

(Wo Naar-E-Jahannam Mei Sada) X2 Jalte Rahenge

(Zainab Tere Hussain Ka Gham Karte Rahenge) X2

  6. Bibi Tere Beto(N) Ke, Biradar Ke Lahu Se

Roshan Jo Huwe Aal-E-Payambar Ke Lahu Se

(Wo Deep Haawaao(N) Mei Sada) X2 Jalte Rahenge

(Zainab Tere Hussain Ka Gham Karte Rahenge) X2

  7. Bhulengi Na Dunya Ye Teri, Dard Kahani

"Jawwad" Ke Labse Kabhi "Sadiq" Ki Zubaani

(Pursa Tere Pyaaro(N) Ka Tujhe) X2 Dete Rahenge

(Zainab Tere Hussain Ka Gham Karte Rahenge) X2

tracks.title: Sajjad Pe
tracks.lyrics:
(Naatawa(N) Aur Qayd Mei, Haay Beemar Haay Haay Sajjad) X2

(Sajjad Pe Wo Kaisi Qayamat Ki Ghari Thi) X3

  1. (Jab Sani-E-Zehra Sare) X2 Darbar Khari Thi

(Sajjad Pe Wo Kaisi Qayamat Ki Ghari Thi) X2

  2. (Haatho(N) Pe Tha Masoom Sakina Ka Janaza) X2

(Aankho(N) Mei Lagi Khun Ke) X2 Ashko(N) Ki Jali Thi

(Sajjad Pe Wo Kaisi Qayamat Ki Ghari Thi) X2

  3. (Jab Sani-E-Zehra Sare) X2 Darbar Khari Thi

(Sajjad Pe Wo Kaisi Qayamat Ki Ghari Thi) X2

  4. (Sar Ko Wo Jhukaaye Huwe, Har Mor Se Guzre) X2

(Tapta Huwa Sehra Tha) X2 Aur Dhoop Kari Thi

(Sajjad Pe Wo Kaisi Qayamat Ki Ghari Thi) X2

  5. (Jab Sani-E-Zehra Sare) X2 Darbar Khari Thi

(Sajjad Pe Wo Kaisi Qayamat Ki Ghari Thi) X2

  6. (Kaanto(N) Ko Rulaati Thi, Teri Aabla Paayi) X2

(Zanjeer Bhi Roti Thi) X2 Jo Paawo(N) Mei Pari Thi

(Sajjad Pe Wo Kaisi Qayamat Ki Ghari Thi) X2

  7. (Jab Sani-E-Zehra Sare) X2 Darbar Khari Thi

(Sajjad Pe Wo Kaisi Qayamat Ki Ghari Thi) X2

  8. (Zinda(N) Ke Andhere Mei, Tanha Thi Sakina) X2

(Aankho(N) Mei Uske Kaisi) X2 Ashko(N) Ki Jali Thi

(Sajjad Pe Wo Kaisi Qayamat Ki Ghari Thi) X2

  9. (Jab Sani-E-Zehra Sare) X2 Darbar Khari Thi

(Sajjad Pe Wo Kaisi Qayamat Ki Ghari Thi) X2

  10. (Shah "Najm" Ne Band Kardiye, Is Pe Sukhan Tamam) X2

(Izzat Bhi Bari Thi To) X2 Musibat Bhi Bari Thi

(Sajjad Pe Wo Kaisi Qayamat Ki Ghari Thi) X4

tracks.title: Zindan Hai Lahad Meri
tracks.lyrics:
(Haay Sakina, Haay Haay Sakina) X2

(Zinda(N) Hai Lahad Meri, Kurta Hai Kafan Mera) X3

  1. (Karna Yahi Janaza) X2 Sajjad Dafan Mera

(Zinda(N) Hai Lahad Meri, Kurta Hai Kafan Mera) X2

  2. (Mei Baap Ke Sine Pe, Bhar Cheyn Se Soti Thi) X2

(Ab Khaak Ke Bistar Pe, Dukhta Hai Badan Mera) X2

(Zinda(N) Hai Lahad Meri, Kurta Hai Kafan Mera) X2

  3. (Sajjad Se Kehti Thi, Zinda(N) Se Riha Hokar) X2

(Tum Jaana Madine Ko, Hai Shaam Watan Mera) X2

(Zinda(N) Hai Lahad Meri, Kurta Hai Kafan Mera) X2

  4. (Kehna Ke Chhine Gohar, Khaaye Hai Tamaache Bhi) X2

(Ay Bhaayi Agar Pooche, Akbar Ki Bahan Mera) X2

(Zinda(N) Hai Lahad Meri, Kurta Hai Kafan Mera) X2

  5. (Kok Ujri Hai Madar Ki, Nam Aankh Hai Khwaahar Ki) X2

(Asghar Ke Bina Bhayya, Suna Hai Sehan Mera) X2

(Zinda(N) Hai Lahad Meri, Kurta Hai Kafan Mera) X2

  6. (Baba Na Chacha Akbar, Qasim Na Ali Asghar) X2

(Ik Din Mei Ujaala Hai, Ummat Ne Chaman Mera) X2

(Zinda(N) Hai Lahad Meri, Kurta Hai Kafan Mera) X2

  7. ("Jawwad" Ye Kehta Hai, Sadqe Mei Sakina Ke) X2

(Saadat Ke Gham Se Hai, Wa Basta Sukhan Mera) X2

(Zinda(N) Hai Lahad Meri, Kurta Hai Kafan Mera) X2

  8. (Karna Yahi Janaza) X2 Sajjad Dafan Mera

(Zinda(N) Hai Lahad Meri, Kurta Hai Kafan Mera) X2

tracks.title: Ro Rahi Hai Aaj Tak
tracks.lyrics:
(Haay Hussain) X4

(Ro Rahi Hai Aaj Tak Shabbir Khak-E-Karbala) X3

  1. (Go Mu’alla Mei Huwi, Afsos Tu Zibha Huwa) X2

(Ro Rahi Hai Aaj Tak Shabbir Khak-E-Karbala) X2

  2. (Jab Chupaaya Mene Daman, Mei Tere Besheer Ko) X2

Zaalimo(N) Ne Nezo(N) Se, Seena Mera Chalni Kiya

(Go Mu’alla Mei Huwi, Afsos Tu Zibha Huwa) X2

(Ro Rahi Hai Aaj Tak Shabbir Khak-E-Karbala) X2

  3. (Thartharayi Khoob Peeti, Aur Rowi Khoob Thi) X2

Hassan Ki Bewa Ke Armaano(N) Ka Chehra Jab Luta

(Go Mu’alla Mei Huwi, Afsos Tu Zibha Huwa) X2

(Ro Rahi Hai Aaj Tak Shabbir Khak-E-Karbala) X2

  4. (Rubaru Mere Huwe The, Ambhiyaa Par Zulm Bhi) X2

Lasha-E-Akbar Tarapta, Mujhe Se Na Dekha Gaya

(Go Mu’alla Mei Huwi, Afsos Tu Zibha Huwa) X2

(Ro Rahi Hai Aaj Tak Shabbir Khak-E-Karbala) X2

  5. (Bacho(N) Ko Ye Aas Di Ke, Chacha Paani Laayenga) X2

Pani Ka Na Pohnchna Ghazi Ke Dil Ko Khaa Gaya

(Go Mu’alla Mei Huwi, Afsos Tu Zibha Huwa) X2

(Ro Rahi Hai Aaj Tak Shabbir Khak-E-Karbala) X2

  6. (Go Mei Parda Ban Gayi Thi, Waris-E-Tatheer Ka) X2

Khaak Sar Zainab Mei Ya Rab Waqt Kaisa Aagaya

(Go Mu’alla Mei Huwi, Afsos Tu Zibha Huwa) X2

(Ro Rahi Hai Aaj Tak Shabbir Khak-E-Karbala) X2

  7. (Lasha-E-Aun-O-Muhammad, Par Koi Waris Na Tha) X2

Sabr Zainab Dekh Kar, Mu(N) Ko Kaleja Aagaya

(Go Mu’alla Mei Huwi, Afsos Tu Zibha Huwa) X2

(Ro Rahi Hai Aaj Tak Shabbir Khak-E-Karbala) X2

  8. (Munkir-E-Sajda-E-Adam, Hoke Shaytaa(N) Hogaya) X2

Sajda-E-Shabbir "Najafi" Azmat-E-Yazdaa(N) Huwa

(Go Mu’alla Mei Huwi, Afsos Tu Zibha Huwa) X2

(Ro Rahi Hai Aaj Tak Shabbir Khak-E-Karbala) X2

  9. (Go Mu’alla Mei Huwi, Afsos Tu Zibha Huwa) X2

(Ro Rahi Hai Aaj Tak Shabbir Khak-E-Karbala) X2

tracks.title: Matam Karo Shabbir Ka
tracks.lyrics:
(Hayya Ala Khairil Amal) X6

(Matam Karo Shabbir Ka Zahra Ki Lo Dua) X2

  1. (Is Se Milega Momino(N)) X2 Jannat Ka Rasta

(Hayya Ala Khairil Amal) X2 (Matam Karo Shabbir Ka Zahra Ki Lo Dua) X2

  2. Matam He Ye Usi Ka Jo Nabiyon Ka Naaz Hai

Sadqe Mein Jiske Aaj Bhi Qayam Namaaz Hai

(Hayya Ala Khairil Amal) X2

Jisne Sulagti Ret Pe Sajda Kiya Ada

Is Se Milega Mominon Jannat Ka Rasta

(Matam Karo Shabbir Ka Zahra Ki Lo Dua) X2

  3. Matam Hai Uska Jisne Watan Chora Ghar Diya

Jisne Saro(N) Se Deen Ka Kashkol Bhar Diya

(Hayya Ala Khairil Amal) X2

Jisne Jalaya Khun Se Islam Ka Diya

Is Se Milega Mominon Jannat Ka Rasta

(Matam Karo Shabbir Ka Zahra Ki Lo Dua) X2

  4. Matam Hai Uska Jispe Qayamat Guzar Gayi

Bhai Ki Laash Par Bhi Jo Matam Na Karsaki

(Hayya Ala Khairil Amal) X2

Ghurbat Pe Jiski Shaam Ka Zindan Rodiya

Is Se Milega Mominon Jannat Ka Rasta

(Matam Karo Shabbir Ka Zahra Ki Lo Dua) X2

  5. Azmat Jo Puchhte Ho To Qura(N) Se Puchhlo

Qurbani Uski Shame Gharibaa(N) Se Puchhlo

(Hayya Ala Khairil Amal) X2

Jisne Bachake Deen Ko Sab Kuch Luta Diya

Is Se Milega Mominon Jannat Ka Rasta

(Matam Karo Shabbir Ka Zahra Ki Lo Dua) X2

  6. Aal-E-Nabi Ke Gham Ke Siwa Koi Gham Na Ho

"Jawwad" Ya Hussain Ki Awaz Kam Na Ho

(Hayya Ala Khairil Amal) X2

Matam Ali Ke Laal Ka Jari Rahe Sada

Is Se Milega Mominon Jannat Ka Rasta

(Hayya Ala Khairil Amal) X6

tracks.title: Haaye Shabbir
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Husain, Wa Hussain) X2

(Wa Hussain) X2

(Haaye Shabbir Bayabaa(N) Ko Basaanay Ke Liye) X3

  1. (Deen Ki Rah Mai(N) Bhare Ghar Ko) X2 Lutane Ke Liye

(Haaye Shabbir Bayabaa(N) Ko Basaane Ke Liye) X3

  2. (Apnay Gulshan Se Chunnay Phool Bahatar Shah-E-Deen) X2

(Karbala Dekh Teri God) X2 Sajane Ke Liye

(Haaye Shabbir Bayabaa(N) Ko Basaane Ke Liye) X3

  3. (Laal Zehra Ka Challa Bakshish-E-Ummat Ke Liye) X2

(Bundh Khanjar Ke Tale Sar) X2 Wo Kataane Ke Liye

(Haaye Shabbir Bayabaa(N) Ko Basaane Ke Liye) X3

  4. (Ali Asgher Ne Musalmaano Se Paani Maanga) X2

(Haaye Ik Teer Milla Pyaas) X2 Bhujaane Ke Liye

(Haaye Shabbir Bayabaa(N) Ko Basaane Ke Liye) X3

  5. (Hakim-E-Shaam Ko Ghalkaar Ke Bole Abbas) X2

(Merai Bazu Hai(N) Tera Naksh) X2 Mitaane Ke Liye

(Haaye Shabbir Bayabaa(N) Ko Basaane Ke Liye) X3

  6. (Bint-E-Zehra Tere Parde Ki Khuda Khair Kare) X2

(Qalma Goh Aaye Hai(N) Khayyam) X2 Jalaane Ke Liye

(Haaye Shabbir Bayabaa(N) Ko Basaane Ke Liye) X3

  7. (Shah-E-Dee(N) Qasim-O-Asgher Ko Nichawar Kar Ke) X2

(Ali Akber Ki Challe Laash) X2 Uthaane Ke Liye

(Haaye Shabbir Bayabaa(N) Ko Basaane Ke Liye) X3

  8. (Daali "Gulzaar" Ne Jab Haal-E-Saqifa Pai Nazar) X2

(Sara Manzar Tha Yeh Zehra Ko) X2 Rulaane Ke Liye

(Haaye Shabbir Bayabaa(N) Ko Basaane Ke Liye) X3

tracks.title: Sughra Ki Aarahi Thi Sada
tracks.lyrics:
(Marjayegi Sughra, Ghabrayegi Sughra) X2

(Sughra Ki Aarahi Thi Sada Saath Le Chalo, Sab Ke Liye Karungi Dua Saath Le
Chalo) X3

  1. (Aadi Nahi Safar Ki Agar Amma Thak Gayee) X2

Asgher Liya Karu(N) Gi Utha Saath Le Chalo

Sab Kai Liye Karu(N) Gi Dua Saath Le Chalo

(Sughra Ki Aarahi Thi Sada Saath Le Chalo, Sab Kai Liye Karun Gi Dua Saath Le
Chalo) X2

  2. (Akber Ki Deed Mai(N) Hai Meri Zindagi Ka Raaz) X2

Akber Sai Yu(N) Karo Na Juda, Saath Le Chalo

Sab Kai Liye Karu(N) Gi Dua Saath Le Chalo

(Sughra Ki Aarahi Thi Sada Saath Le Chalo, Sab Kai Liye Karun Gi Dua Saath Le
Chalo) X2

  3. (Bin Maa Kai Hu(N) Yateem Hi Samjho Agar Mujhe) X2

Allah Karega Sabar Aata Saath Le Chalo

Sab Kai Liye Karu(N) Gi Dua Saath Le Chalo

(Sughra Ki Aarahi Thi Sada Saath Le Chalo, Sab Kai Liye Karun Gi Dua Saath Le
Chalo) X2

  4. (Jungle Main Niklay Dam To Wahi(N) Dafan Kijiye)

Hargiz Nahi Karu(N) Gi Gilla, Saath Le Chalo

Sab Kai Liye Karu(N) Gi Dua Saath Le Chalo

(Sughra Ki Aarahi Thi Sada Saath Le Chalo, Sab Kai Liye Karun Gi Dua Saath Le
Chalo) X2

  5. (Akber Ko Sehra Chahe Sakina Hi Bandhle) X2

De Du(N) Gi Door Se Hi Dua, Saath Le Chalo

Sab Kai Liye Karu(N) Gi Dua Saath Le Chalo

(Sughra Ki Aarahi Thi Sada Saath Le Chalo, Sab Kai Liye Karun Gi Dua Saath Le
Chalo) X2

(Marjayegi Sughra, Ghabrayegi Sughra) X2

tracks.title: Yu(N) Karbala Se
tracks.lyrics:
(Karbal Se Shaam, Qaidi Wo) X2

(Yu(N) Karbala Se Abid-E-Beemar Chale Hai(N)) X2

  1. Ik Zulm Ki Zanjeer Mai(N), Behno Ke Gale Hai(N)

(Yu(N) Karbala Se Abid-E-Beemar Chale Hai(N)) X2

  2. Maqtal Mai(N) Chaarsu Ab Ik Hu Ka Hai Aalam

Na Ghazi Alamdar Na Akber Hai Na Qasim

(Nok-E-Sina Pe Ab Sabhi Naazo(N) Ke Pale Hai(N)) X2

Ik Zulm Ki Zanjeer Mai(N), Behno Ke Gale Hai(N)

(Yu(N) Karbala Se Abid-E-Beemar Chale Hai(N)) X2

  3. Fil Qurba Ki Ayat Ki Ye Tafseer Hai Logo

Nok-E-Sina Pe Chadar-E-Tatheer Hai Logo

(Lash-E-Parhe Hain Her Taraf Aur Khaime Jale Hai(N)) X2

Ik Zulm Ki Zanjeer Mai(N), Behno Ke Gale Hai(N)

(Yu(N) Karbala Se Abid-E-Beemar Chale Hai(N)) X2

  4. Zehra Ki Laadli Pe Yeh Kya Waqat Hai Aaya

Na Sar Pe Rida Aur Na Babul Ka Hai Saaya

(Aal-E-Abaa Pe Isterha Haaye Waqt Dhale Hai(N)) X2

Ik Zulm Ki Zanjeer Mai(N), Behno Ke Gale Hai(N)

(Yu(N) Karbala Se Abid-E-Beemar Chale Hai(N)) X2

  5. Noha Kuna Zameen Hai Khoo(N) Roya Aasmaa(N)

Paband-E-Salasal Hai(N) Chale Meer-E-Karawa(N)

(Khoo(N) Ro Rahe Hai(N) Khaar Jo Paao(N) Ke Tale Hai(N)) X2

Ik Zulm Ki Zanjeer Mai(N), Behno Ke Gale Hai(N)

(Yu(N) Karbala Se Abid-E-Beemar Chale Hai(N)) X2

"Khursheed" Tujh Ko Saani-E-Zehra Ki Dua Hai

(Tere Sukhan Ke Phool Yeh Abhi Phool Phale Hai(N)) X2

Ik Zulm Ki Zanjeer Mai(N), Behno Ke Gale Hai(N)

(Yu(N) Karbala Se Abid-E-Beemar Chale Hai(N)) X2

(Karbal Se Shaam, Qaidi Wo) X2

tracks.title: Ay ibn-e-Zahra (SA)
tracks.lyrics:
La illaha illalah, Laillaha Illalah
Muhammadur rasuloolah
Aliyun waliyullah
Wasiyo rasullallah
 
Shah ast hussain, Badshah ast hussain, Deen ast hussain, Deen panah ast hussain
 
(Ay ibne Zahra, dil murtuza ka, hussain, Tune bachaya, hai deen khuda ka, hussain) x2
 
1.     Teri bahan ye dekhti thi tile par
Tera badan tha teer ke mussale par
Gale pe ahista chhuri chalata tha
Sawaar zalim hoke tere sine par
Kullun qatrah, min dammik mawla, Hussain
dhakara allahu, al-ladhi awla, Hussain
nadhara al-baari, ilayk wa qaala, Hussain
al-deenu yuqtalu, law la dimaaka, Hussain
 
(Ay ibne Zahra, dil murtuza ka, hussain, Tune bachaya, hai deen khuda ka, hussain) x2
 
2.     Laraz rahi thi reyt, andhera tha wo sama(n)
Jab aapke tan se nikal rahi thi jaa(n)
Har aik lasha dasht mei tarapta tha
Ab awo godi me jo kehrahi thi maa(n)
H’eenama qat’a-aa, al-sayfu nah’ra, Hussain
Zalzala al-‘aalam, ‘ala musaaba, Hussain
Tabki az-zahra, bi qurbi jismi, Hussain
Damman mat’arat, wa ra’du fi al-samaa’, Hussain
 
(Ay ibne Zahra, dil murtuza ka, hussain, Tune bachaya, hai deen khuda ka, hussain) x2
 
3.     Tere bahattar me, har ik mujahid tha
Maidan se koyi, na lot ke aya
Habib tha asghar, wo nawjawan tera
Tu apne kandhe par, uthaya har lasha
Wa dammu al-asghar, mala-aa wajha, Hussain
Mala-aa yaduhu, wa rama fi al-samaa’, Hussain
Jismuka nahrun, min al-dimaai, Hussain
S’aabirun anta, ‘ala mus’abika, Hussain
 
(Ay ibne Zahra, dil murtuza ka, hussain, Tune bachaya, hai deen khuda ka, hussain) x2
 
4.     Mashko alam leke, chala tera abbas
Kaha sakina se bujjegi teri pyaas
Jo teer kuze ko laga to phir wapas
Chala tha dariya ki taraf haram ki aas
Ji’ta li Abbas, li tara ghammih, Hussain
kaana hunaak, sehman bi a’ynih, Hussain
kasara qalbik, idha ra aytah, Hussain
wa dhara’ayhi fus’ila a’n jismih, Hussain
 
(Ay ibne Zahra, dil murtuza ka, hussain, Tune bachaya, hai deen khuda ka, hussain) x2
 
5.     Tha imteha(n) allah wo baap par kaisa,
Jawan bête ki jo laash par pohncha
Tarap rahi thi lash jab pidar kehncha
Pisar ke sine se, tutta huwa neza
Dakhala al-rumh’u, fuaad al-akbar, Hussain
Shibluka anta, ya shiblu Haider, Hussain
Raqadha nah’wahu muta’athir, Hussain
Al-rumh’u dakhala, wa takassar, Hussain
 
(Ay ibne Zahra, dil murtuza ka, hussain, Tune bachaya, hai deen khuda ka, hussain) x2
 
6.     wo laal zainab ke, riza-e sheh payei(n)
Ali o jaffar banke dasht me aayei(n)
 Ye kehte the hum Aun aur Muhammad hai(n)
Teri qaza ko saath mei hai ham laayei(n)
Al-akhwayni, ‘aun wa Muh’ammad, Hussain
Ibnaani zainab, ahfaadu ahmed, Hussain
Wa in qutilu, ‘ala yadi al-shar, Hussain
Wa asbah’a al-t’affu lahuma marqad, Hussain
 
(Ay ibne Zahra, dil murtuza ka, hussain, Tune bachaya, hai deen khuda ka, hussain) x2
 
7.     Beparda jab darbaare sham me aayi,
bibi khare hokar jaha(n) ko batlayi
Suno zara me fatema ki beti hu(n)
Yazid se dee(n) ko bacha ke wo layi
Ya akhu al-zainab, Undhur ilayha, Hussain
Hunaak salaasil, bayna yadayha, Hussain
Ibnat az-zahra, innaha fi al-‘shaam, Hussain
Wal hu’uzn zayyid, musaab alayha, Hussain
 
(Ay ibne Zahra, dil murtuza ka, hussain, Tune bachaya, hai deen khuda ka, hussain) x2
 
8.     Jo din me hai suraj, ye arsh pe tare
Jinnat aur insaan aur malak saare
Jo is jahaa(n) me hai, jo us jahaa(n) me hai
Kaha banakar rab, ye sab hai tumhare
s’aahib ul-kawthar, min maa’i mah’room, Hussain
maalik ul-jannah, lakinnah madhloom, Hussain
yaseer al-amri yazeed mahkoom, Hussain
yardoon yat’ee’hum ghasabi mahdhoom, Hussain
 
(Ay ibne Zahra, dil murtuza ka, hussain, Tune bachaya, hai deen khuda ka, hussain) x2
 
9.     Teri har ik qurabni ka ye sadqa hai
Jo aurato(n) ke sar pe aaj parda hai
Jo hai azaa(n) me la illaha illalah
Jo aaj quraa(n) hai, jo aaj Kaba hai
bitta muntas’iran, ‘ala yazeedi, Hussain
Kullu tah’t’eet’ih, minkum ba’eedi, Hussain
kullun Qatrah, min dammik mawla, Hussain
Rasam at-t’areequk, ilaa al-azeezi, Hussain
 
La illaha illalah, Laillaha Illalah
Muhammadur rasuloolah
Aliyun waliyullah
Wasiyo rasullallah
Ay ibne zahra
 
10.                        Tumhe na bhulege humara wada hai
Jabse “tejani” is jahan me zinda hai
yahi humari zindagi ka maqsad hai
lahu me tera naam har aan behta hai
‘indak salaami, quran al-thani, Hussain
Nah’nu fidaka, yaqool “tejani”, Hussain
Majnoonu hubbak allimni maula, Hussain
munqadh lana ant, hadha imaani, Hussain
 
(Ay ibne Zahra, dil murtuza ka, hussain, Tune bachaya, hai deen khuda ka, hussain) x2
 
Ay ibne zahra

tracks.title: Lo agaya bazaar
tracks.lyrics:
(Lo agaya bazaar) x10
 
(Bazaare shaam hai, bazaare shaam hai) x2 Bazaare sham hai
 
Mazlum ka kunba, jab sham ko poncha, abid ka tha nawha, lo agaya bazaar
 
1.     Meri phuphi amma, roti hai(n) be parda, lakhon ka hai majma, lo agaya bazaar
 
(Mazlum ka kunba, jab sham ko poncha, abid ka tha nawha, lo agaya bazaar) x2
 
2.     Ye soch ke rota hu(n), maa behne khule sar hai
Kistarha se dekhuga, jo samne manzar hai
Neze pe hai ik sar, rota hai jo aksar, karta hai jo nawha
 
(Mazlum ka kunba, jab sham ko poncha, abid ka tha nawha, lo agaya bazaar) x2
 
3.     Bazu hai bandhe mere, mei kuch nahi kar sakta
Bochaar hai patthar ki, ham sab hai rassan basta
Hai khun ka darya, jo sar se hai behta, haste hai ye aada
 
(Mazlum ka kunba, jab sham ko poncha, abid ka tha nawha, lo agaya bazaar) x2
 
4.     Har eik qadam baba, qur’an sunaata hai
Aur aag ke pathhar khud, chehre pe wo khata hai
Zahra ka dulara, Ahmad ka nawasa, hai barsare neza
 
(Mazlum ka kunba, jab sham ko poncha, abid ka tha nawha, lo agaya bazaar) x2
 
5.     Parde ka muhaffiz ab, sar apna giraataa hai
Khu(n) rota hai wo ghazi, jab bhi nazar aata hai
Zainab ka khula sar, aur shaam ka manzar, sar pe nahi parda
 
(Mazlum ka kunba, jab sham ko poncha, abid ka tha nawha, lo agaya bazaar) x2
 
6.     ay habsh ke maki(n) ye, fizza ki sada aayi,
thi aapki shahzadi, aur aaj hun me qaidi
ay mere bahaddur, kar itna tassawur,  hun aapki malka,
 
(Mazlum ka kunba, jab sham ko poncha, abid ka tha nawha, lo agaya bazaar) x2
 
7.     aur shimr ye abid se, kis fakhr se kehta hai,
Parda teri zainab ka neze se utara hai,
Quwwat hai ye meri, ahmed ki nawasi, ko shaam me layaa
 
(Mazlum ka kunba, jab sham ko poncha, abid ka tha nawha, lo agaya bazaar) x2
 
8.     wo nanni sakina ko manga hai kanizi me,
me marta hun jiteji maahole sharabi me,
ghabrati hai bachhi,  aur hoke me bhayi,  kuch kar nahi sakta
 
(Mazlum ka kunba, jab sham ko poncha, abid ka tha nawha, lo agaya bazaar) x2
 
9.     Maut ayegi zindaa(n) mei, pyaari meri behna ki
Hathon se banaunga, me qabr sakina ki
Wo khun bhara kurta, har aik tamacha, ye usko hai sehna , lo agaya bazaar
 
(Mazlum ka kunba, jab sham ko poncha, abid ka tha nawha, lo agaya bazaar) x2
 
10.                        maula ko madine me, ik shaks ne jab puchha
jo sab se musibat thi, wo konsa manzar tha,
mola kahe rokar, dil soz tha manzar, nazron me jo chhaya
 
(Mazlum ka kunba, jab sham ko poncha, abid ka tha nawha, lo agaya bazaar) x2
 
11.                        Jis bibi ko suraj ne, hargiz nahi dekha tha,
Beparda khari thi wo, shaitano ka majma tha
Chehre ko “Tejani”, baalo(n) se chupaayi, parhti rahi khutba
 
(Mazlum ka kunba, jab sham ko poncha, abid ka tha nawha, lo agaya bazaar) x2

tracks.title: Abbas (AS) hai naam mera
tracks.lyrics:
Thararahi hai dharti, ye kon aaraha hai
Tu kon hai sawari, lashkar se ye sada hai,
Sar ko buland karke, wo shaks kehraha hai
 
(Sheyr-e-khuda ka hu(n) beta, Mujhse na koi bachega, Abbas hai naam mera) x2
 
1.     Bachpan mei lori sunaakar, mujhko sikhaayi hai madar
Sunlo zara mere bete, Zainab ko hai naaz tumpar
Bolo hai Shabbir aqa, haa(n) bas mei nokar hu(n) uska, Abbas hai naam mera
 
(Sheyr-e-khuda ka hu(n) beta, Mujhse na koi bachega, Abbas hai naam mera) x2
 
2.     Shazadiyo(n) ka jigar hu(n), hashim ke gar ka qamar hu(n)
Zahra ne jo rab se mangi, mei wo dua ka asar hu(n)
Salaar hu mei haram ka, haqdaar hu mei alam ka, Abbas hai naam mera
 
(Sheyr-e-khuda ka hu(n) beta, Mujhse na koi bachega, Abbas hai naam mera) x2
 
3.     Mei josh mei aagaya hu(n), khaybar ka manzar dikhaadu(n)
Talwaar bin bhi tumhaare, aakar mei gardan urhaadu(n)
Ghayro(n) na warna karunga, mushkil mei jeena tumhaara, Abbas hai naam mera
 
(Sheyr-e-khuda ka hu(n) beta, Mujhse na koi bachega, Abbas hai naam mera) x2
 
4.     Saara arab jaanta hai, jarrar ibn-e-jali hu(n)
Tum mei hai jo khof-e-haider, samjho ke khud mei Ali hu(n)
Ehle wafa ka hun kabaa, baba ne is tarha pala, abbas hai naam mera
 
(Sheyr-e-khuda ka hu(n) beta, Mujhse na koi bachega, Abbas hai naam mera) x2
 
5.     Himmat agar hai kissi mei, is sheyr se aake larna,
Maqtal se kyu bhaagte ho, laakho(n) ho tum mei hun tanha
Ik haath mei cheen lunga, dariya ka har eik qatra, Abbas hai naam mera
 
(Sheyr-e-khuda ka hu(n) beta, Mujhse na koi bachega, Abbas hai naam mera) x2
 
6.     Mene Sakina ka kuza, baandha hai apne alam se
Parwa nahi mujhko apni, mashk ko bachawunga dam se
Bacho(n) se mene kaha tha, koi rahega na pyasa, Abbas hai naam mera
 
(Sheyr-e-khuda ka hu(n) beta, Mujhse na koi bachega, Abbas hai naam mera) x2
 
Kitna masum hai pyara hai bhala hai abbas,
Dile haidare karrar ki tamanna hai abbas
God me mus-haffe natiq ki pala hai abbas
To, din me suraj se bara hai abbas
Fatema Zahra ki mun mangi dua hai abbas
Panjaten panch ne ek saath milke dua mangi
Tab kahi jaake zamane ko mila hai abbas
Istarha jang ke maidan me karra hai abbas
Sochiye haidere karrar hai ya hai abbas
To baap agar chehe to dare khaibar lele
Beta agar chillu me chaahe samandar lele
 
7.     Darya mei parcham ko ghaara, haatho(n) mei paani uthaaya
Hai inteha ye wafa ki, Lab par na paani ko laaya
Bola ke kaise piyunga, pyaasi hai meri Sakina, Abbas hai naam mera
 
(Sheyr-e-khuda ka hu(n) beta, Mujhse na koi bachega, Abbas hai naam mera) x2
 
8.     Darya pe ab aagaya hu(n), mashkiza bhi bhar liya hu(n)
Ghore pe hoke sawaari, khaymo(n) ko ab lot'ta hu(n)
Darpe khari hai Sakina, takti hai wo mera rasta, Abbas hai naam mera
 
(Sheyr-e-khuda ka hu(n) beta, Mujhse na koi bachega, Abbas hai naam mera) x2
 
9.     Afsos kat'ke gire the, ghazi ke bazu zami(n) par
Mashkiza bhi chid gaya aur, zee(n) se gira ibn-e-haider
Ghabra ke boli Sakina, ata hai kyu(n) ab na naara, Abbas hai naam mera
 
(Sheyr-e-khuda ka hu(n) beta, Mujhse na koi bachega, Abbas hai naam mera) x2
 
10.                        Duba huwa tha lahu mei, ghazi ka lasha “tejani”
Bazu qalam hogaye aur, jalti zamee(n) pe tha pani
Shabbir rokar ye bola, phir se pukaaro ay bhayya, Abbas hai naam mera

tracks.title: Sughra (SA) ne khat likha
tracks.lyrics:
Veeran hai ye ghar
Marjaawungi idhar
Lelo meri khabar
Bhayya ho tum kidhar
 
(Sughra ne khat likha, dil ki hai iltija, akbar tu lot aa) x3
 
1.     Yaad aarahe ho tum, ashko(n) se likhrahi, hu(n) ab ye khat mera
 
(Sughra ne khat likha, dil ki hai iltija, akbar tu lot aa) x2
 
2.     Wada mujhe karo, Akbar mere akhi
Zair banoge tum, kya qabr par meri
Karti hu(n) me fughaa(n), kuchh to karo bayaa(n), sunlo meri sada
 
(Sughra ne khat likha, dil ki hai iltija, akbar tu lot aa) x2
 
3.     Ankhei(n) hai(n) dhundhti, rota hai dil mera
Jab sunti hu(n) aza(n), hai qalb kaampta
Ab tumko yaad kar, rowungi umr bhar, kehti hu(n) bakhuda
 
(Sughra ne khat likha, dil ki hai iltija, akbar tu lot aa) x2
 
4.     Baba se tum kaho, sughra ko hai ye gham
Bimar hai magar, uthte nahi(n) qadam
Bechayn ab ye dil, jo gham se hai bhara, phat jayenga mera
 
(Sughra ne khat likha, dil ki hai iltija, akbar tu lot aa) x2
 
5.     Tasweer zehn mei, har dam sajaayi hai
Gham is judaayi ka, dil mei samaayi hai
Kya mere pyaar ka, itna hi hai sila, kuchh to kaho zara
 
(Sughra ne khat likha, dil ki hai iltija, akbar tu lot aa) x2
 
6.     Lelo mera salaam, hafiz hai ab khuda
Karti hu(n) roke ab, khat ko mei alvida
Qasid suno zara, akbar ke haath tak, pohncha do khat mera
 
(Sughra ne khat likha, dil ki hai iltija, akbar tu lot aa) x2
 
7.     Ashko(n) ko poch kar, akbar ka tha bayaa(n)
Ye marzi rab ki hai, kar sabr meri jaa(n)
Baba ke sabr ke, saye mei ho pali, tum bhi ho fatema
 
(Sughra ne khat likha, dil ki hai iltija, akbar tu lot aa) x2
 
8.     Khwahar ka ye fughaa(n), akbar ne jab parha,
Tab jhalti reyt par, dam todta raha
Barchi ke dard se, bimar behn ka, ye dard tha bara
 
(Sughra ne khat likha, dil ki hai iltija, akbar tu lot aa) x2
 
9.     Dekha “tejani” ye, sughra ne khaab me,
Bhayya ka milchuka laasha turaab me
Aur khat tha khu(n) mei tar, akbar ke laash ke, janib para huwa

tracks.title: Ay shaam-e-ghariban
tracks.lyrics:
(Shame ghariban, shame ghariban) x2
 
Uthta hai dhuwan, zainab
Chalti hai hawa, zainab
 
Uthta hai dhhuwa(n), chalti hai hawa, aur dekh rahi hai karbobala
 
Ay shame ghariba(n), wawayla, ay shame ghariba(n)
 
1.     Matqool huwa, haider ka pisar
Roti thi zamee(n) rota tha qamar
Thakta tha nahi shaytaan magar
Pamaal huwa zahra ka jigar
Jaise duba suraj ka nishaa(n)
Waise duba dil zainab ka
Aur dekh rahi hai karbobala
 
Ay shame ghariba(n), wawayla, ay shame ghariba(n)
 
2.     Pamal huwe hai sab lashei(n)
Aur khaak huwe sare khaymei(n)
Abbas nahi akbar bhi nahi
Roti hai sakina maqtal mei(n)
Bali bhi chhini daman bhi jala
Sab bibiyon ki chhinti hai rida
Aur dekh rahi hai karbobala
 
Ay shame ghariba(n), wawayla, ay shame ghariba(n)
 
3.     Hai khun ka dariya karbal mei,
Sote hai bahattar maqtal mei
Sab bibiyan hai bechain yahan
Khamosh hai bachei(n) jangal mei
Hota hai yateemo(n) par hamla
Aur maarke haste hai(n) aada
Aur dekhrahi hai karbobala
 
Ay shame ghariba(n), wawayla, ay shame ghariba(n)
 
4.     Ik jalte huwe khaymo me gira
Salaare haram hai ghash me parra
Jal jaye yahan ya ban me chale
Batlado hamme mere maula
Zainab ki pareshani hai yahi
Beparda hai kunba ahmed ka
Aur dekh rahi hai karbobala
 
Ay shame ghariba(n), wawayla, ay shame ghariba(n)
 
5.     Pehre pe hai ab zainab tanha
Hathon me liye tutta neza
Abase harram banna hai usse
Hai asma(n) ab uska parda
Bachhon ko sambhale ya khud ko
Koyi na sahara hai uska
Aur dekh rahi hai karbobala
 
Ay shame ghariba(n), wawayla, ay shame ghariba(n)
 
6.     Kehti hai ye asgher ki madar
Arman mere hai khun mei tar
Maqtal se na aaya phir wapas
Cheh maah ka mera noore nazar
Pani na muyassar usko huwa
Garden pe wo teere sitam khaya
Aur dekh rahi hai karbobala
 
Ay shame ghariba(n), wawayla, ay shame ghariba(n)
 
7.     Masum sakina roti huwi
Ghabra ke yun maqtal me aayi
Chillayi ke ay mere baba
Kis haal me hai beti ye teri
Khati hun tamache chehre par
Paas apne bulalo ay baba
Aur dekh rahi hai karbobala
 
Ay shame ghariba(n), wawayla, ay shame ghariba(n)
 
8.     Pichhe bachi ban me aakar
Kya dekhti hai binte haider
Aaram se soti hai bachhi
Ik besar laash ke sine par
Hai charo taraf khu(n) ka darya
Sunsaan hai jungal ye saraa
Aur dekh rahi hai karbobala
 
Ay shame ghariba(n), wawayla, ay shame ghariba(n)
 
9.     Us laash “tejani” kit hi sada
Sunlo to zara meri behna
Islam bachana hai tumko
Aur saath hai har mushkil sehna
Tum dekh chuki ho jang meri
dekhunga mei ab sabr tera
Aur dekh rahi hai karbobala
 
Ay shame ghariba(n), wawayla, ay shame ghariba(n)

tracks.title: Jaffer-e-Sadiq (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
Allah, Ighfirli khataee wa dhunoobee
Allah, Ultufbee wastoor li ayoobee
Allah, Wa taqabal miman yashfaooli
 
Allah, Ighfirli khataee wa dhunoobee
Allah, Ultufbee wastoor li ayoobee
Allah, Wa taqabal miman yashfaooli
 
(Jaffar-e-sadiq, jaffar-e-sadiq) x2
 
1.     Baba tumhaare baqir, Madar hai umm-e-farwah
Rehmat mei sab se kasrat, Sarkaar mei ho aala
Tum shaam ki siyaahi, ko payrahan banaakar
Har raat mufliso(n) ko, haatho(n) se hai khilaya
 
(Jaffar-e-sadiq, jaffar-e-sadiq) x2
 
2.     Tumhaari aur nabi ki, ik roz hai wiladat
Aur raah-e-adl-o-haq mei, thi aapki shahadat
Ahmed ki ruh teri, ruh se juri huwi hai
Saare malak pe waajib, hai aapki itaa’at
 
(Jaffar-e-sadiq, jaffar-e-sadiq) x2
 
3.     Godi hai jinki khaali, awlaad unhe ataa kar
Maqrooz momino ka, jo karz ho ada kar
Hai be khata jo qaydi, dede unhe bashaarat
Karte hai ham tawassul, haatho(n) ko ab utha kar
 
(Jaffar-e-sadiq, jaffar-e-sadiq) x2
 
4.     Bechayn ye jigar hai, Ham tumse jo juda hai
Yasrab ko tum bulaalo, lab pe yahi dua hai
Aake kare ziyarat, aur ashk ham bahaaye
Tere liye ay maula, ye dil tarap raha hai
 
(Jaffar-e-sadiq, jaffar-e-sadiq) x2
 
5.     Tumko sata raha tha, ashur ka wo manzar
ik behn ne jo dekha, ik bhayi zeyr-e-khanjar
Pyaara sa uska chehra, dekha tha khun mei tar
Rokar wo gir pari jab, tan se juda huwa sar
 
(Jaffar-e-sadiq, jaffar-e-sadiq) x2
 
6.     Angur ka gahal jab, mansur tumko bheja
Tab sakht zehr usne, angur mei tha daala
Khaakar laraz raha tha, Maula badan tumhara
Girya kiya uthaakar, Kazim tumhaara lasha
 
(Jaffar-e-sadiq, jaffar-e-sadiq) x2
 
7.     Baade teri shahadat, duniya mei aaj tak bhi
Zahir tera asar hai, roshan khuda ke raah ki
Dam se tumhaare qayam, iman jaafari ka
Shiyyo(n) ka fakhr tum ho, bole na kyu(n) “Tejani”
 
(Jaffar-e-sadiq, jaffar-e-sadiq) x2

tracks.title: Soja meri Sakina (SA)
tracks.lyrics:
(Soja meri sakina) x3
 
(Lori suna rahi hun, soja meri sakina) x2
 
1.     Baba ke sine se tum jabse juda huwi ho
Ik raat neend ayi, beta nahi hai tumko
Ab me sula rahi hun ajaa meri sakina
 
(Lori suna rahi hun, soja meri sakina) x2
 
2.     Mujhko yahi khabar hai dukh dard ki ho maari
Tumko hai sabr karna ye bhi khuda ki marzi
Tu misle fatema ab banna meri sakina
 
(Lori suna rahi hun, soja meri sakina) x2
 
3.     Ayega ab na koi bhi leke taziyane
Marega na shimar ab rukhsar par tamache
Har aik saans pe na ghabra meri sakina
 
(Lori suna rahi hun, soja meri sakina) x2
 
4.     Kuchh din me to rihayi miljayegi sakina
Zindane gham se chhutke jayege hum madina
Madar ye kar rahi hai wada meri sakina
 
(Lori suna rahi hun, soja meri sakina) x2
 
5.     Dekho ab aagaya hai baba ka sar ay beti
Unko dikhana saare chehre ke zakhm bibi
Jee khol ke tu ab to rona meri sakina
 
(Lori suna rahi hun, soja meri sakina) x2
 
6.     Jab neend agayi thi, phir khaab aayi haaye
Jis mei hussain apni beti se keh rahe the
Ab waqt agaya hai aja meri sakina
 
(Lori suna rahi hun, soja meri sakina) x2
 
7.     Jab qaid me sakina ko maut agayi thi
Bazu hila hila ke madar ye roke boli
Mujhse khata huwi kya batla meri sakina
 
(Lori suna rahi hun, soja meri sakina) x2
 
8.     Abid larazte hathon se ik lahad banaye
ye kehke apni behna ko phir wahi litaaye
Kaise sahunga me gham tera meri sakina
 
(Lori suna rahi hun, soja meri sakina) x2
 
9.     Paye the jab rihayi, ehle haram “tejani”
Banu sisak sisak ke girkar yahi pukari
Kaise watan ko jaun tanha meri sakina

tracks.title: Godi me aawo Asghar (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
(Haaye asghar, haaye asghar) x3
 
(Godi me aawo asghar, jula tera julaun) x2
 
1.     Raton ko jag kar me lori tumhe sunaun
 
(Godi me aawo asghar, jula tera julaun) x2
 
2.     Be teygh ran mei tu aur, qatil ka saamna tha
Dil tut ta hai mera, tu lot ke na aaya
Koi nahi humara, ab kisko me bulaun
 
(Godi me aawo asghar, jula tera julaun) x2
 
3.     Jule ko dekh kar ab, beta me rorahi hun
Pyara sa tera chehra din raat dekhti hun
Kya beet ti hai mujhpar kaise tujhe bataun
 
(Godi me aawo asghar, jula tera julaun) x2
 
4.     Darya ke paas bhi tu, sehroz ka tha pyaasa
Paani ke badle beta, ik teer tune khaaya
Paani ke saath ab mei, kaise nazar milaawu(n)
 
(Godi me aawo asghar, jula tera julaun) x2
 
5.     Kya bezubaan bache, jaate hai suwe maqtal
Pathar dilo(n) se saara, haaye bhara hai karbal,
Lot aawo mere bete, kaise tujhe manaawu(n)
 
(Maan kehti thi asghar mere ghar lot ke aanaa) x2
 
6.     Thi aag ki zami(n) aur, thi pyaas ki wo shiddat
Kis haal me huwi thi, beta teri shahadat,
ye baat janti hu(n), saye me kaise jaun
 
(Godi me aawo asghar, jula tera julaun) x2
 
7.     Puchegi jab sakina, bhayi mera kahaan hai,
Amma zara batao asghar to meri jaan hai
Bechayn hai sakina kaise usse manaun
 
(Godi me aawo asghar, jula tera julaun) x2
 
8.     Neze pe tera sar jab meri nazar me aya,
Thi me rasan mei leykin, ik baat ne sataaya
Zalim ke pathharon se kaise tujhe bachaun
 
(Godi me aawo asghar, jula tera julaun) x2
 
9.     Tu teer khake soya, jalti zamin pe beta
Zindane shaam me phir, marjayegi sakina
Yasrab ko laut kar me, sughra ko kya batawu(n)
 
(Godi me aawo asghar, jula tera julaun) x2
 
10.                        Bacho(n) ko khelte ab, kistarha se mei dekhu(n)
ye baat hai sataati, tumko kahaa(n) se laawu(n)
Ankho(n) ke aansuo(n) se, gham ke diye jalaawu(n)
 
(Godi me aawo asghar, jula tera julaun) x2
 
11.                        Sunti hu teer tumne, halqoom pe hai khaaya
Tera gala chida hai, Tu khun mei nahaaya,
Karbal ki khaak sar par, kaise na ab urhaawu(n)
 
(Godi me aawo asghar, jula tera julaun) x2
 
12.                        Jab ran se laash ayi, kya haal tha “Tejani”
Choti lahad banaake, banu ye roke boli
Tan tera khun me tar, kistarha bhul jaaun
 
(Godi me aawo asghar, jula tera julaun) x2

tracks.title: Hussain (AS) Ya Hussain (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
Ya laytanee kuntu ma’akum,
Fa afooza ma’akum
Wa la farraqallahu baynana
Wa salallahu alaykum
 
(Hussain ya hussain ya hussain ya hussain) x2
 
1.     Wo tera laqab hai sheh-e-mashraqayn, tera nana jaa(n) chalta quran hai
Wo madar tumhari hai khayrun-nisa, wo baba tera kulle imaan hai
Hai fakhr-e-rida haaye behna teri, hassan lawh-e-mehfuz ki jaan hai
 
(Hussain ya hussain ya hussain ya hussain) x2
 
2.     Ay shabbir ke matami sun zara, tu leta hai zahra ke dil ki dua
Ye khutbo(n) mei Zainab batati rahi, zamana karega humari azaa
Hai pursa ye zehra ke gham ke liye, hai zainab ki qurbani ka mojeza
 
(Hussain ya hussain ya hussain ya hussain) x2
 
3.     Hai uncha alam tere abbas ka, bicha hai tera farsh-e-gham har jaga
Bahate rahenge tere naam mei, lahu ka samandar habib-e-khuda
Har ik ashk mei hai likha ya Hussain, Hai pehchaan momin ka matam tera
 
(Hussain ya hussain ya hussain ya hussain) x2
 
4.     Juloosei(n) nikalte hai(n) rasto(n) mei aur, Ye duniya ko dikhlaatei(n) hai(n) tera gham
Kabhi aag par ho rahi hai aza, Ye khud dekhte hai julooso(n) mei ham,
Zamana ye karta hai kohshish magar, Kabhi sar jhukaata nahi hai alam
 
(Hussain ya hussain ya hussain ya hussain) x2
 
5.     Hai afsos ke zikr-e-aal-e-nabi, bari karobaar ab jahaa(n) mei bani
Wo kaise kahe khud ko zakir tera, hai payso(n) pe jinki nigaahei(n) pari
Nahi maantei(n) aise zakir ko ham, jihei(n) kuch khabar bhi nahi shaa(n) teri
 
(Hussain ya hussain ya hussain ya hussain) x2
 
6.     Chalo sab azadaar karbobala, karenge wahaa(n) raat din ham aza
Wahi(n) sar zamee(n) pe jahaa(n) par hussain, ka be sar badan reyt par tha para
Jaha par bujha sheh ka har ik diya, jaha par chhini bibiyo(n) ki rida
 
(Hussain ya hussain ya hussain ya hussain) x2
 
7.     Kyu(n) khof-e-ajal se pareshaa(n) huwe, hai nisbat juri ab to Shabbir se
Hai matam bapa aaj har aan mei, Kabhi haath se aur zanjeer se,
Hai zainab ki sunnat aza-e-hussain, mila hai hamme teri hamsheer se
 
(Hussain ya hussain ya hussain ya hussain) x2
 
8.     Ye matam se milta hai hamko khuda, Ye matam hai khud sunnat-e-ambhiya
Ye matam har ik marz ki hai dawa, ye matam hattata hai har ik bala
Ye matam hai shaytaaniyat ki qaza, ye matam hai sab momino(n) ki baqa
 
(Hussain ya hussain ya hussain ya hussain) x2
 
9.     Haaye kal the Zainab ke bazu bandhe, na kar paayi matam shaheedo(n) ka tab
Meri shaahzadi aza-e-hussain, “Tejani” bapa karte hai aaj sab
Ye baqi rahegi sada nasl mei, lahu mei mila hai tera naam ab
 
(Hussain ya hussain ya hussain ya hussain) x2

tracks.title: La Yawm
tracks.lyrics:
Hussain, hussain, hussain
 
Assalamu alayka ya Aba Abdillah
Assalamu alayka ya Sayyedish-shuhadaa
 
(La yawma kayawmak ya Hussain) x4
 
1.     Your broken and shattered heart

On that day was ripped apart

Your body wounded and scarred 

Stranded from your home so far

Hussain, Your pain, Was not, In vain

Please call us to you soon, ya Hussain

So that we see your tomb, ya Hussain



(La yawm ka yawmak ya Hussain) x2
 
2.     Ishqu hayaati Hussain, nabadu fuaadi al-daami
dhikruka yabqaa Hussain, qatau ra'saka dhaami
An'aak, ahwaak, wiyaak, wiyaak
Hatta al-mamaati ma'ak ya Hussain
Kullu hayaati ma'ak ya Hussain
 
(La yawm ka yawmak ya Hussain) x2
 
3.     Ragrag me mere basta
Hai ishq ka ye dariya 

Wo jiska ik ik qatra 
Parhta hai naam tumhara 
Ye gham, Matam, Har dam, Payhum 

Hai jaan se pyara ya Hussain

Hai khun, hai khun, hai khun mei behta
 
(La yawm ka yawmak ya Hussain) x2
 
4.     There is no day like your day
Until we die we will say
Let us live life in your way
From your path don't let us stray 
Today, The skies, Echo, Your cries
In your love I'm insane
'til death I'll call your name
 
(La yawm ka yawmak ya Hussain) x2
 
5.     Karbobala ka hai ban 
Hussain hai khastatan 
Khanjar tale hai gardan 
Lahu mei duba hai ran 
Quraan, ki jaan, Noke Sinaan 
Hai aaj tak rota ya Hussain
Jahaan ye sara ya Hussain
 
(La yawm ka yawmak ya Hussain) x2
 
6.     Qatalu al-haqqa shaheeda, 
ayna yazeedi al-taaghi
Saara imaami nasheeda, 
dhidda al-dhulmi al-baaghi
Qurbaan, quraan, Ahzaan ahzaan
Shamsuka baaqi abad ya Hussain
Nahjuka saami abad ya Hussain
 
(La yawm ka yawmak ya Hussain) x2
 
7.     Laying is the prophets rose
Upon a bed of arrows 
from your body the blood flows
your pain only Allah knows
Your blood, Was shed, Islam, Was spread 
The saviour of this deen 
Your love has set me free
 
(La yawm ka yawmak ya Hussain) x2
 
8.     "Tejani" ka hai wada
Ta hashr tak ae maula
Karenge hum ye girya
Dete rahenge pursa
Har aan, Ye jaan, Tujpar, qurbaan
Hain hum tere nokar
Bus hai sada lab par

tracks.title: Hussaini
tracks.lyrics:
Anjaam-e-wafa kya hai, ye socha nahi karte
Hussaini kabhi haalat se, sauda nahi karte
Ye rasm sikhaaye hai Hussain ibn-e-Ali ne
Sar sajde mei ho to khanjar se daraa nahi karte
