Zainab lai chadar mangdi, aagaiyan’  paidal sham ai
Vich khutbai dai farmaya haaye habsh di malka nai
Haaye habsh di malka nai
 
(Mazlum da saath mibhaya haaye habsh di malka nai
Haaye habsh di malka nai) x2
 
Jeri  rassiyan vich paband ai, oh Zahra di dilband ai
Bazaar ch’on bheer hatao, oh dadi ghairat mand ai
Harr shami nu samjhaya habsh di malka nai
Haaye habsh di malka nai
 
(Mazlum da saath mibhaya haaye habsh di malka nai
Haaye habsh di malka nai) x2
 
Aai sham de oh badkaaro, ai kufai dai aghyaro,
Sajaad nu kuch na aakho, bai shak fizza nu maro
Darbaar dai vich farmaya habsh di malka nai
Haaye habsh di malka nai
 
(Mazlum da saath mibhaya haaye habsh di malka nai
Haaye habsh di malka nai) x2
 
Ro akhai ujri sairn’ ai, bekafan bhira di bhehrn ai
Kee ajar wafa da daivaa(n), fizza nu veer Hussain ai
Dada ehsaan charhaya habsh di malka nai
Haaye habsh di malka nai
 
(Mazlum da saath mibhaya haaye habsh di malka nai
Haaye habsh di malka nai) x2
 
Tauqir ai zainab cha vai, koi sham dai vich jai aavai
Oh hazri daivran’ pehlai, fizza di qabar tai jaavai
Barn’ kai abbas ddasaya habsh di malka nai
Haaye habsh di malka nai
 
(Mazlum da saath mibhaya haaye habsh di malka nai
Haaye habsh di malka nai) x2

tracks.title: Ammu mere ajawo
tracks.lyrics:
Sunteho Sakina ke, lab par hai fughaa(n) bhaayi
Lot awo mere ammu, pani nahi mangungi
Ab ruth na jawo tum, itna to zara socho
Marjayengi wo bacchi
 
(Pani nahi mangungi, hargis nahi roungi, ammu mere ajawo) x2
 
Barhta hai shimmar lekar hathon me wo ik khanjar
Baba hai zamin par aur hai sajde mei uska sar
Kistarha se baba ko zalim se bachaungi, ammu mere ajawo
 
(Pani nahi mangungi, hargis nahi roungi, ammu mere ajawo) x2
 
Ab bhi hai lahu jari dekho mere kaano(n) se
Daman bhi jala hai aur rukhsar hai ye neele
Is dil ke ye gham saare, mei tumko bataungi, ammu mere ajawo
 
(Pani nahi mangungi, hargis nahi roungi, ammu mere ajawo) x2
 
Ik unth se reti par gir gir ke mei uth ti hun
Aur shimr ke durre bhi, mei pusht pe khati hun
Bin tere safar kaise, is dhoop me katungi, ammu mere ajawo
 
(Pani nahi mangungi, hargis nahi roungi, ammu mere ajawo) x2
 
Manga hai mujhe ammu zalim ne kanizi mei
Ghabrati hun mei lekin paband hun rassi mei
Kistarha se zalim se, mei khud ko chhupaungi, ammu mere ajawo
 
(Pani nahi mangungi, hargis nahi roungi, ammu mere ajawo) x2
 
Kyun nok se girta hai har baar tumhara sar
Kya sharm ye aati hai ham sab hai barehna sar
Pur dard safar ki mei rudaad sunaungi, ammu mere ajawo
 
(Pani nahi mangungi, hargis nahi roungi, ammu mere ajawo) x2
 
Haye tasht tale par ab baba ka rakha hai sar
Usse marta hai zalim honton pe chardi lekar
Is zulm ko mei kaise in aankhon se dekhungi, ammu mere ajawo
 
(Pani nahi mangungi, hargis nahi roungi, ammu mere ajawo) x2
 
Tha khaab yahi mera sab saath challe(n)nge ghar,
Akbar baba aur tum aur nanna ali asghar
Ab tanha watan ko me, kistarha se jaungi, ammu mere ajawo
 
(Pani nahi mangungi, hargis nahi roungi, ammu mere ajawo) x2
 
Haye waqt guzarta tha hoti thi sadaei(n)kam
Zindann me phir ik din us bachhi ka nikla dam
Awaz na ayi phir, pani nahi mangungi, ammu mere ajawo
 
(Pani nahi mangungi, hargis nahi roungi, ammu mere ajawo) x2
 
Ab bhi ay Tejani hai zinada(n) se sada jari
Tanha hun akeli hun, veera(n) se hu(n) ghabrati
Tanhayi mitane ko, me kisko pukarungi, ammu mere ajawo
 
(Pani nahi mangungi, hargis nahi roungi, ammu mere ajawo) x2

tracks.title: Maula haq Imam (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
Hayya ala khayril amal, Hayya ala khayril amal
Ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya hussain
 
(Maula haq imam ya hassan ya hussain) x2
Ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain
 
Teero(n) pe tha lasha tera
Aur jism tha khu(n) se bhara
Jab aya khali zuljanah
Peyro(n) se lipti bibiyaa(n)
 
(Maula haq imam ya hassan ya hussain) x2
Ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain
 
Qasim jawaa(n) maara gaya
Pamaal bhi laasha huwa
Sheh ne kiye tukre jamaa
Roti rahi, qasim ki maa(n)
 
(Maula haq imam ya hassan ya hussain) x2
Ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain
 
Abbas ke bazu kate
Paani baha wo mashk se
Gore ke zeen se jab gire
Thi ye sakina ki fughan
 
(Maula haq imam ya hassan ya hussain) x2
Ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain
 
Sughra ne dekha khwaab mei
Nazro(n) mei ik partaab mei
Asghar sawaal-e-aab mei
Aur khu(n) mei duba sarebaa(n)
 
(Maula haq imam ya hassan ya hussain) x2
Ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain


Nanna gala asghar ka tha
Aur teer bhi uspe chala
Haatho(n) mei sheh ke khu(n) baha
Rote rahe teero kamaa(n)
 
(Maula haq imam ya hassan ya hussain) x2
Ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain
 
Shame ghariban ki ghari
Neze se sab chadar chinni
Aur aag khaymon me lagi
Khamosh tha arz-o-samaa(n)
 
(Maula haq imam ya hassan ya hussain) x2
Ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain
 
Abid ka tha ye imtihaa(n)
Pao(n) mei jakde beriyaa(n)
Hatho(n) mei bandhe rassiyaa(n)
Aur sheh ka sar nok-e-sinaa(n)
 
Sajjad ka wo imtehan, sajjad ka wo imtehan
 
Wo sham ka darbaar tha
Zainab khari thi berida
Zalim ne ye haske kaha
Ab hai tera ghazi kahan
 
(Maula haq imam ya hassan ya hussain) x2
Ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain
 
Ab hai Tejani ki sada
Ay matami sunlo zara
Hai bibi zahra ki dua
Har matami aur nawhakhuan
 
(Maula haq imam ya hassan ya hussain) x2
Ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain, ya Hussain
 
The zakhm wo tan pe hazaar
Tha sine par, zalim sawaar
Khanjar chalaya baar baar
Aur halq se, tha khu(n) rawaa(n)

tracks.title: Ye Zameen-o-Asman
tracks.lyrics:
Ya Hussain Anta harrartal abeed
Ya Hussain dhikruka saara nasheed
Ya Hussain Qata’u minkal wareed
Ya Hussain ya ghareeban ya shaheed
 
(Ye zameen, asman kehraha hai ya Hussain
Momino ke lahu mei behraha hai ya hussain) x2
 
Thi ye sabko khabar, ye jahaa(n) sab hai tera
Haa(n) magar, ye sila tujhko ummat se mila
Tha tera sara tan, teero(n) se itna bhara
Ghirke phir rukgaya teero(n) pe lasha tera
 
(Ye zameen, asman kehraha hai ya Hussain
Momino ke lahu mei behraha hai ya hussain) x2
 
Anta qurban-ul-ilaah, anta lid-deeni fidah
Dammukas-saala ulaah, qaddasal baari sanaah
Ya Hussain, ya Hussain, sirta lid-dunya manaar
Ya Hussain ya Hussain, dhikruka Ad’haa shi’aar
 
(Ye zameen, asman kehraha hai ya Hussain
Momino ke lahu mei behraha hai ya hussain) x2
 
How Yazid tried to bury your name into the sand
Covered up karbala, but this was allah’s command
that hussain will live on in this world in every land
till the end we will mourn our masters final stand
 
(Ye zameen, asman kehraha hai ya Hussain
Momino ke lahu mei behraha hai ya hussain) x2
 
Har jawaa(n) peer ke, dil se uth’ti hai sada
Apne khu(n) se jalaaye gham-e-sheh ka diya
Zindagi kuch nahi(n) gar na ho sheh ki aza
Is ki khatir karenge ham apni jaa(n) fida
 
(Ye zameen, asman kehraha hai ya Hussain
Momino ke lahu mei behraha hai ya hussain) x2
 
Jis liye haaye Zainab tarapti rehgayi
Jisliye umr bhar, roya Abid Khun bhi
Meri maayei(n) bahan, wo rida pehna karo
Shaam ke daastaa(n) se mila kya kuch nahi(n)
 
(Ye zameen, asman kehraha hai ya Hussain
Momino ke lahu mei behraha hai ya hussain) x2
 
Dars ye milraha hai hamme Abbas se
Apne bazu agar, jism se dono kate
Jism se khu(n) ka darya agar behta rahe
Bas hamesha hussai(n) pe wafa jari rahe
 
(Ye zameen, asman kehraha hai ya Hussain
Momino ke lahu mei behraha hai ya hussain) x2
 
Shaam mei haaye bechayn dil zainab ka tha
Chahti thi ke matam kare shabbir ka
Haa(n) magar khu(n) mei tar haath the gardan passé
Dekh ke uski majboori bola ye khuda
 
(Ye zameen, asman kehraha hai ya Hussain
Momino ke lahu mei behraha hai ya hussain) x2
 
Anta harrartal abeed, dhikruka saara nasheed
Qata’u minkal wareed, ya ghareeban ya shaheed
Ya Hussain ya Hussain, bismika ad-dunya tadoor
Ya Hussain ya Hussain, qabrukaz-zaahi yanoor
 
(Ye zameen, asman kehraha hai ya Hussain
Momino ke lahu mei behraha hai ya hussain) x2
 
Ye “Tejani” sada hai hamare khun ki
Dil mei aur ankh mei, karbala bas hai basi
Tera matam nahi(n) ruksakega ab kabhi
Jo rukawat hai ham, tor dalege sabhi
 
(Ye zameen, asman kehraha hai ya Hussain
Momino ke lahu mei behraha hai ya hussain) x2

tracks.title: Amma mujhe sambhalo
tracks.lyrics:
Hal Min Naasareen Yan Sur Naa
(Amma Haye Amma) x4
(Sine se ab lagalo Aghosh me chuupalo Amma mujhe sambhaalo) x2
1.	Nazdeek aa raha hu(n), Wada nibharaha hu(n), Amma mujhe sambhalo
(Sine se ab lagalo Aghosh me chuupalo Amma mujhe sambhaalo) x2
2.	Akbar nahi hai ghazi, darya pe sogaya hai
Raah-e-khuda may sara, kunba ujjar gaya hai
Be aas hogaya hu(n)
Tanha may rehgaya hu(n)
Amma mujhe sambhaalo
Sine se ab lagalo Aghosh me chuupalo Amma mujhe sambhaalo
3.	Awaaz dasht may jab, hal min ki de raha tha
Abbas-e-bawafa ka, lasha tarap raha tha
Maqtal may aa raha hu(n)
Tumko bula raha hu(n)
Amma mujhe sambhaalo
Sine se ab lagalo Aghosh me chuupalo Amma mujhe sambhaalo
4.	Duba huwa lahu may, ye dasht-e-Karbala hai
Chehre pe khoon-e-Asghar, mene yuhi(n) mala hai
Kis haal mei hai amma
Pyaasa ye laal tera
Amma mujhe sambhaalo
Sine se ab lagalo Aghosh me chuupalo Amma mujhe sambhaalo
5.	Zakhmo(n) se mera amma, tan chur hogaya hai
Lashe utha utha ke, dil gham se bhar gaya hai
Charo(n) taraf hai hamlaa
Talwar ki tabar ka
Amma mujhe sambhalo
Sine se ab lagalo Aghosh me chuupalo Amma mujhe sambhaalo
6.	Aankho(n) ke saamne hay, har bachpane ka manzar
Lori suna rahay the, zanu(n) pe tum sulaakar
Ab haal aake dekho
Godi may mujhko lelo
Amma mujhe sambhalo
Sine se ab lagalo Aghosh me chuupalo Amma mujhe sambhaalo
7.	Lut jayengi ridaaey(n), khayme bhi ab jalenge
Pyaari meri Sakina, ke baliyaa(n) chinenge
Shaam-e-gharibaa(n) mei tab
Hogi sada-e-Zainab
Amma mujhe sambhaalo
Sine se ab lagalo Aghosh me chuupalo Amma mujhe sambhaalo
8.	Amma badan ye sara, teero(n) se ab bhara hai
Ghore pe na zamee(n) par, lasha mera para hai
Ab shimr ki churi hay
Gardan pe chal rahi hay
Amma mujhe sambhaalo
Sine se ab lagalo Aghosh me chuupalo Amma mujhe sambhaalo
9.	Sajde mei mera sar hai, talwaar chal rahi hay
Khayme ke dar pe Zainab, bechain ho rahi hay
Tuttegi ab qayamat
Nazdeek hay shahadat
Amma mujhe sambhaalo
Sine se ab lagalo Aghosh me chuupalo Amma mujhe sambhaalo
10.	kaise likhe "Tejani", purdard ka wo manzar
jab shimr ne chalaya, ibne ali pe khanjar
awaaz thi fiza may,
haaye dasht-e-karbala may
amma mujhe sambhalo
Sine se ab lagalo Aghosh me chuupalo Amma mujhe sambhaalo
(Amma mujhe sambhalo) x4
Ya ayyatuhan-nafsul mutma'innah, irji'ee ilaa rabbika raadiyatam-mardiyyah

tracks.title: Bimar Musafir
tracks.lyrics:
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x4
(Bimar musafir hay aur sham ka darbar) x2
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
1.     Hatho(n) me rassiya(n) aur pawo(n) me beriya(n)
Gir gir ke uth raha tha bimar natawa(n)
Gham-o-ranj se, jigar chaak tha
Lahu se bhara, woh poshaak tha
Gira(n) tok ka tha ghardan pe haar
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
(Bimar musafir hay aur sham ka darbar) x2
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
2.     Kistarha lut gaya ye, bekas ka qafla
Beparda binte haider ne roke di sada,
Mera nawjawa(n), mera bezuba(n),
Mera bawafa, mera bhayi jaa(n)
Abhi sab hai neze pe sawaar
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
(Bimar musafir hay aur sham ka darbar) x2
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
3.     Ankho(n) se khu(n) bahaya, ghayrat ke naam me
Beparda maye(n) behne bazaar shaam me
Tamashayi yu(n), rulaate raha
Sitam par sitam, woh dhaate rahe
Thi charo(n) taraf se pathhar ke waar
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
(Bimar musafir hay aur sham ka darbar) x2
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
4.     Seene pe sone waali, girti thi khaak par
Bachi pe raham koi, khaaya nahi shimar
Rida chin gayi, chine baaliyaa(n)
Tamache lage, kabhi seyliyaa(n)
Uthaayi sitam, woh dil par hazaar
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
(Bimar musafir hay aur sham ka darbar) x2
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
5.     Tishnalabi ka aalam, bachhi thi nawhaghar
Pani baha ke zalim, jalti zamin par
Ye hass kar kaha, woh ammu tera,
Kidher kho gaya, thi lab pe bukaa
Sakina ki ghazi baar baar.
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
(Bimar musafir hay aur sham ka darbar) x2
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
6.     Bola yazid hass kar, ay binte murtaza,
Ab aasra tumhara, koyi nahi raha
To baalo(n) se mu(n), chupa kar kahi
Hai khun-e-Ali, se hu(n) mei bani
Zara aazma, ke dekh eik baar
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
(Bimar musafir hay aur sham ka darbar) x2
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
7.     Yasrab me aagaya jab, lut kar ye qafla
Rokar zaeef mola, sar pit ke kaha
Abhi yaad hai, woh bazaar-e-shaam
wo zindan-e-shaam, Wo darbaar-e-shaam
Phire nange sar haaye sogwaar
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
(Bimar musafir hay aur sham ka darbar) x2
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
8.     Sajad ka azaa ruksakta nahi kabhi,
Duniya ko ab "Tejani", payghaam do yahi,
rukaane ki jo, yu(n) koshish kare
azaa-e-hussain, unhi ke sare
pe lanat hamari beshumaar
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) X2
(Bimar musafir hay aur sham ka darbar) x2
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2
(Bimar musafir hay aur sham ka darbar) x2
(Sajad ka woh imteha(n)) x2

tracks.title: Abbas (AS) chale aawo
tracks.lyrics:
(Bazar-e-Shaam) x8
(Haaye shaam ka majma Adaa ka hai nargha Abbas chale aawo) x2
1.	Kotho(n) pe tamashayi haatho(n) me liye patthar
Bacho(n) ke badan zakhmi sajjad ka zakhmi sar
Shabbir ke baazu
Dekho mere aansu
Abbas chale aawo
Haaye shaam ka majma Adaa ka hai nargha Abbas chale aawo
2.	Kistarha se nana ki ummat ne sataya hai
Zalim ne meraa parda neze se utara hai
Me rehgayi tanha
Haste rahe adaa
Abbas chale aawo
Haaye shaam ka majma Adaa ka hai nargha Abbas chale aawo
3.	Aada ne meri khatir bazaar sajaye hai(n)
Pabande rasan humko darbar me laaye hai(n)
Bazu me rasan hai
Majbur bahen hai
Abbas chale aawo
Haaye shaam ka majma Adaa ka hai nargha Abbas chale aawo
4.	Wada wo wafayi ki, kistarha nibhayi hai
Bazar me wo sadme, kistarha uthayi hai
Wo habsh ki malka
Fizza meri amma
Abbas chale aawo
(Ya Makhduma Ya Fizza) x4
5.	Parde ke muhafiz me ab tujhko bulati hu(n)
Kya bhul gaye wada, ab aate nahi ho kyu(n)
Duniya ke madadgaar
Ayi sare bazaar
Abbas chale aawo
Haaye shaam ka majma Adaa ka hai nargha Abbas chale aawo
6.	Bimar mera abid, bazar me jab ayaa
Shaitano(n) ke narghe me, rota huwa jataa tha
maa behne khule sar
har mor pe patthar
Abbas chale aawo
Haaye shaam ka majma Adaa ka hai nargha Abbas chale aawo
7.	Chehre ko mere bhayya, balo(n) se chhupayi hu(n)
Kistarha se dekhoge, darbar me aayi hu(n)
Neze se tera sar
Girta hai zami(n) par
Abbas chale aawo
Haaye shaam ka majma Adaa ka hai nargha Abbas chale aawo
8.	Ye kaisi aseeri hai jo khatm nahi hoti
Darbar ke dukh jhele zinda(n) hai abhi baqi
Koi nahi pursa(n)
Hu(n) besaro(n) saama(n)
Abbas chale aawo
Haaye shaam ka majma Adaa ka hai nargha Abbas chale aawo
9.	"Rehan" wo shehzadi jo saaniye zehra thi
Darbare yazidi me jab ban ke ali boli
Darbar pukara
Ay fatahe dariya
Abbas chale aawo
(Haaye shaam ka majma Adaa ka hai nargha Abbas chale aawo) x2

tracks.title: Ay Alamdaar-e-wafa (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
(Ay alamdare wafa) x6
1.	(Ay shabihe murtaza) x2 Ay duaa-e-sayyeda
(Ay alamdare wafa) x4
2.	(Ghazi jari diler hai, shere khuda ka sher hai) x2
Abbas aysaa naam hai jo ke baghayre zer hai
Babe shehre ilm ko tohfa-e-rabbe awla
(Ay alamdare wafa) x4
3.	(Rag rag hai khune murtaza, shehre wafa ka hai khuda) x2
Tu aysa shah sawar hai zehre qadam hai alqama
Warise tegh o alam maniye harfe wafa
(Ay alamdare wafa) x4
4.	(Akse abu turab bhi chashme ali ka khwab bhi) x2
Apni misal aap hay aapna jawab khud bhi
Khalq ho payaa na phir aysa koyi dusra
(Ay alamdare wafa) x4
5.	(But shikan ki zindagi hasile sad bandagi) x2
Ye qamar hashim ka hai roshni hi roshni
Surajo(n) me chand hai, ye hai uska martaba
(Ay alamdare wafa) x4
6.	(Karbobala ka hai ali ye wali ibne wali) x2
Abru jisne rakhi tashnagi me pyaas ki
Zamzamo qausar ne bhi he jise sajda kiya
(Ay alamdare wafa) x4
7.	(Jang ki khahish liye khud se jo larta raha) x2
Nehr bhar kar mashk me bawafa pyasa raha
Katt gaye bazu magar nehr pe qabza kiya
(Ay alamdare wafa) x4
8.	(Jab zamin par zeen se hoke bebazu gira) x2
Hazrate shabbir ko ehtaraman di sadaa
Juk gayi sheh ki kamar roke dete the sadaa
(Ay alamdare wafa) x4
9.	(Khoo(n) bhara lekar alam jab hussain ibne ali) x2
Aye khayma gah me bolti thi khamoshi
Zainabo kulsum ne kehke ye matam kiya
(Ay alamdare wafa) x4
10.	(Nohaye abbas hai chal adab se ay qalam) x2
Kanpte he is jari ke naam se "rehan" hum
Hoke be bazu bhi jo haath thaame hai mera
(Ay alamdare wafa) x6

tracks.title: Akbar (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
(Akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x 4 Khaayi sina qalb par Hogaya tukre jigar
(Akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x 2 Khaayi sina qalb par Hogaya tukre jigar
1.     (Jab se juda tum huwe cheyn nahi hai mujhe, Koi nahi hai mera haye sada du(n) kise) x2
Chorke maa(n) ko gaye haaye meri jaa(n) kidhar (akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2
(Akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2 Khaayi sina qalb par Hogaya tukre jigar
2.     (Waqt-e-azaa(n) hogaya jaan-e-pidar lot aa Kab se hu(n) darpar khari aa mujhe surat dikha) x2
Dasht-e-bayabaan mei dhund rahi hai nazar (akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2
(Akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2 Khaayi sina qalb par Hogaya tukre jigar
3.     (Saal tha athharwaa(n) ay mere karyal jawaa(n) Teri dulhan lawungi soch rahi thi ye maa(n)) x2
Haaye mere laal ko kha gayi kiski nazar, (akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2
(Akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2 Khaayi sina qalb par Hogaya tukre jigar
4.     (Ranj uthati hu mei ashk bahati hu mei Ab na kabhi aawonge phir bhi bula ti hu mei) x2
Lot ke aajawoge kaash koi de khabar, (akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2
(Akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2 Khaayi sina qalb par Hogaya tukre jigar
5.     (Qalb-e-phuphi ke liye rahat-o-aram the Gulshan-e-madar ke tum laal-o-gulfam the) x2
Sogaye jaakar kahaa(n) khunki-e chashme padar, (akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2
(Akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2 Khaayi sina qalb par Hogaya tukre jigar
6.     (Zindagi bhar ke liye daghe judayi diya Maut se badtar huwa deher mei jeena mera) x2
Maa(n) ko bulalo wahi soye ho beta jidhar, (akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2
(Akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2 Khaayi sina qalb par Hogaya tukre jigar
7.     (Qayd-e-sitam ki taraf meri sawari chali Toot gaye khwaab sab aas bhi tooti meri) x2
Bikhre hai armaa(n) mere aaj to sab khaak par, (akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2
(Akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2 Khaayi sina qalb par Hogaya tukre jigar
8.     (Kya likhu(n) "Rehan" ab saath qalam de na jab Kaise bayaa(n) ho sake dard-o-alam ka sabab) x2
Zinda rahe kistarha sarware jinn -o-bashar, (akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2
(Akbar-e-noor-e-nazar) x2 Khaayi sina qalb par Hogaya tukre jigar

tracks.title: Ya Hassan (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hassan) x12
Ay ruh-e-mustafa, Ay ibn-e-murtaza, ay jaan-e-sayyeda
(Ya hassan-e-mujtaba, ya hassan-e-mujtaba) x2
1.     Zeyr-e-halaa hal mila, tukre jigar hogaya
Teer sitam se huwa surkh kafan aap ka
Aap ka tabut bhi lot ke ghar aagaya
Ay ruh-e-mustafa, Ay ibn-e-murtaza, ay jaan-e-sayyeda
(Ya hassan-e-mujtaba, ya hassan-e-mujtaba) x2
2.     Sulho ka andaaz jo sabz kabahi me tha
Amn ka har marhala raah numayi may tha
Sabr aya(n) aap ka sari khudayi me tha
Ay ruh-e-mustafa, Ay ibn-e-murtaza, ay jaan-e-sayyeda
(Ya hassan-e-mujtaba, ya hassan-e-mujtaba) x2
3.     Seerato qamat me the aap shabi-e-nabi
Aap ali manzilat aap ali azm bhi
Teghe kalam behr me aap ke hatho(n) chali
Ay ruh-e-mustafa, Ay ibn-e-murtaza, ay jaan-e-sayyeda
(Ya hassan-e-mujtaba, ya hassan-e-mujtaba) x2
4.     Khoon se lagan bhargaya kaysa sitam hogaya
Zowja-e badbakht ne aap pe ki thi jafa
Gham se bura haal tha zainabo kulsum ka
Ay ruh-e-mustafa, Ay ibn-e-murtaza, ay jaan-e-sayyeda
(Ya hassan-e-mujtaba, ya hassan-e-mujtaba) x2
5.     Teero(n) ki barish huwi aap ke tabut par
Pehla janaza tha jo lot ke aaya tha ghar
Karbobala ke liye thi yahi pehli khabar
Ay ruh-e-mustafa, Ay ibn-e-murtaza, ay jaan-e-sayyeda
(Ya hassan-e-mujtaba, ya hassan-e-mujtaba) x2
6.     Sara badan sabz tha zehr ki taseer se
Dard ye puchhe koi hazrate shabbir se
Surkh tha ujla kafan aap ka jab teer se
Ay ruh-e-mustafa, Ay ibn-e-murtaza, ay jaan-e-sayyeda
(Ya hassan-e-mujtaba, ya hassan-e-mujtaba) x2
7.     Nana ke pehlu me bhi dafn na hone diya
Kayse sitamghar the baniye zulmo jafa
Kayse laeeno ne ki zulm ki ye inteha
Ay ruh-e-mustafa, Ay ibn-e-murtaza, ay jaan-e-sayyeda
(Ya hassan-e-mujtaba, ya hassan-e-mujtaba) x2
8.     Kya likhu(n) "rehan" ab gham se jigar chaakh he
Aaj ghamo ranj ki sar pe mere khaak hai
Shor bapa aaj ye barsare aflaak hai
Ay ruh-e-mustafa, Ay ibn-e-murtaza, ay jaan-e-sayyeda
(Ya hassan-e-mujtaba, ya hassan-e-mujtaba) x4

tracks.title: Aja mere Asghar (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
(Asghar Mere Asghar) x8
(Aaja mere asghar, maa(n) lori sunaaye) x3
1.	(Tanhaa hai meri Jaan) x2 (Maa Lori Sunaye) x2
(Aaja mere asghar, maa(n) lori sunaaye) x2
2.	Abbas ka mansab to saqqayi tha ay dilbar
Woh rehgaye darya par, (mashkiza hai kaandhe par) x2
Kyu(n) pani nahi pikar, tum lot ke ghar aaye
(Aaja mere asghar, maa(n) lori sunaaye) x2
3.	Dori teri jhule ki, thaami huwi bethi hu
Ghar jaate parindo(n) ko, (ay laal mei takti hu) x2
Aaja meri godi mei, haatho(n) ko hu(n) phelaaye
(Aaja mere asghar, maa(n) lori sunaaye) x2
4.	Tu pehle pehel tanha, nikla hai kahi ghar se
Maydaa(n) mei jo insaa(n) hay, (dil unke hay patthar se) x2
Aise kisi patthar se, thokar na kahi khaaye
(Aaja mere asghar, maa(n) lori sunaaye) x2
5.	Tu nanna mujaahid hay, is dasht mei waahid hai
Qirdaar ka ghazi hai, (afkaar ka zaahid hai) x2
Teywar Ali Akbar ke sab tujhme simat aaye
(Aaja mere asghar, maa(n) lori sunaaye) x2
6.	Haatho(n) pe padar ke, beteygh gaye ran ko
Aabad kiya maqtal, (suna kiya aanghan ko) x2
Ab yaad teri beta, Dilko mere tarpaaye
(Aaja mere asghar, maa(n) lori sunaaye) x2
7.	Ik baar shahadat ka, har ik ne sharaf paaya
Do baar shahadat ka, (sehra tere sar aaya) x2
Tujh jaisa bahaddur ab, Dunya mujhe dikhlaaye
(Aaja mere asghar, maa(n) lori sunaaye) x2
8.	Bazu tere baba ka aur nanna gala tera
Ik teer ne ay beta, (ik wakht may hai cheyda) x2
Us waqt bhi tum beta, honto pe hansi laaye
(Aaja mere asghar, maa(n) lori sunaaye) x2
9.	Inkaar aasmaa(n) ko, razi zamee(n) nahi thi
"Rehan" khoon-e-asghar, (surkhi nabi ke dee(n) ki) x2
Chehre pe mal ke sarwar, khayme mei lot aaye
(Aaja mere asghar, maa(n) lori sunaaye) x2

tracks.title: Qadam qadam pe mili
tracks.lyrics:
(Haay Sakina) x8
(Qadam qadam pe mili karbala sakina ko) x2
1.	kahin na pani pilaya gaya sakina ko
(Qadam qadam pe mili karbala sakina ko) x2
2.	(Na jane kaisay woh samjhi keh hain yehi baba) x3
(bagair sir kay jo lasha mila sakina ko) x2
kahin na pani pilaya gaya sakina ko
(Qadam qadam pe mili karbala sakina ko) x2
3.	(Kabhi jo shimr ney jhidka sehem gayi dukhiya) x3
(bachanay qaidi biraadar utha sakina ko) x2
kahin na pani pilaya gaya sakina ko
(Qadam qadam pe mili karbala sakina ko) x2
4.	(Baghayr baap ka sina, na neend aati thi) x3
(Zindaa(n) may khaak pe sona, para Sakina ko) x2
kahin na pani pilaya gaya sakina ko.
(Qadam qadam pe mili karbala sakina ko) x2
5.	Bataye kisko yeh bemar bhai zindan mein
(Andheri qabr mein dafna diya sakina ko) x2
kahin na pani pilaya gaya sakina ko.
(Qadam qadam pe mili karbala sakina ko) x2

tracks.title: Sayyeda Fatemah (SA)
tracks.lyrics:
(Sayada fatemah) x12
1.	Shohar wali, pidar hai payambar, pisar imam
Jis bibi ka nabi pe, lazim tha ehtaraam
Ummat ko baad-e-ehmad, ayi na kyu(n) haya
(Sayyada fatemah) x8
2.	Duniya ko khalq karke, Allah ne kaha,
Sara jahaan tere, sadqe me hai bana
Uncha hai kitna bibi, ye martaba tera
(Sayyada fatemah) x8
3.	Bibi tumhare dar se humko hai aasra
Zainab ka waasta hay sunlijiye dua
Miljaye roze hashr, chadar ki bas hawa
(Sayyada fatemah) x8
4.	Kehti rahi mei fatema, bint-e-rasool hu(n)
Bagh-e-Fidak ko cheen ke khush ho rahe ho kyun
Bint-e-rasool ki hai, kya hai yahi jaza
(Sayyada fatemah) x8
5.	Tutti huwi kamar hai, mohsin guzar gaye
Ummat ne mujh pe baba kya kya sitam kiye
Qabre rasool par yu(n) karti rahi buka
(Sayyada fatemah) x8
6.	Zainab ko ye wasiyyat deti hai fatema
Bazar-e-sham o kufa ka hoga marhala,
Deene khuda ka us dam, tum hogi aasra
(Sayyada fatemah) x8
7.	Zahra ka laal tha aur, zalim ki fauj thi
Chaaro(n) taraf se aayi, barsaat teer ki,
Gore se jab gire to, sarwar ne di sada
(Sayyada fatemah) x8
8.	Balo(n) se saaf karti, zahra woh sar zami(n)
Jis khaak pe ghiregi, shabbir ki jabi(n)
Kya maa ke dil pe ghuzri, jab sheh ka sar kataa
(Sayyada fatemah) x8
9.	Beparda qafla jab, aale rasul ka,
Karbobala me lut ke, zindan ko chala
Zainab ko har qadam par, deti thi hosla
(Sayyada fatemah) x8
10.	"Shabbir ki dua hai" Abbas ki dua
Jeeteji nawha dono, parhte rahe tera
Marte huwe bhi lab par, bas ho yahi sadaa
(Sayyada fatemah) x8

tracks.title: Zainab Ka Tha Nawha
tracks.lyrics:
(Wawayla Haaye Wawayla) X2

(Zainab Ka Tha Nawha Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan) X2 Zainab Ka Tha Nawha

  1. (Pardes Me Ghar Ujra Haay) X2 Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan

(Zainab Ka Tha Nawha Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan) X2 Zainab Ka Tha Nawha

  2. (Athara Baras Ka Akbar Che Maah Ka Mera Asgher) X2 Che Maah Ka Mera Asghar

(Pyaasa Hi Gayaa Maraa Haay) X2 Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan

(Zainab Ka Tha Nawha Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan) X2 Zainab Ka Tha Nawha

  3. (Ik Raat Ka Dulha Qasim Pamaal Huwa Maqtal Mai) X2 Pamaal Huwa Maqtal Mei

(Khu(N) Rung Huwa Sehra Haay) X2 Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan

(Zainab Ka Tha Nawha Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan) X2 Zainab Ka Tha Nawha

  4. (Do Laal Mere The Dono Bhayi Pe Fida Kardaale) X2 Bhayi Pe Fida Kardaale

(Phirbhi Na Bachaa Bhaya Haay) X2 Me Lut Gayi Babajaan

(Zainab Ka Tha Nawha Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan) X2 Zainab Ka Tha Nawha

  5. (Rukhsaar Sakina Ke Zakhmi Hai Tamacho(N) Se) X2 Zakhmi Hai Tamacho(N) Se

(Daman Bhi Jalaa Uska) X2 Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan

(Zainab Ka Tha Nawha Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan) X2 Zainab Ka Tha Nawha

  6. (Baba Mere Sarse Chadar Zalim Ne Utaari Hai) X2 Zalim Ne Utaari Hai

(Balo(N) Se Kiya Parda Haay) X2 Me Lut Gayi Babajaan

(Zainab Ka Tha Nawha Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan) X2 Zainab Ka Tha Nawha

  7. (Jhula Ali Asgher Ka Jalte Huwe Dekha Hai) X2 Jalte Huwe Dekha Hai

(Kaise Na Karu(N) Giriya Haay) X2 Me Lut Gayi Babajaan

(Zainab Ka Tha Nawha Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan) X2 Zainab Ka Tha Nawha



  8. (Ik Mere Akele Bhayi Ko Maara Hai Hazaaro(N) Ne) X2 Maara Hai Hazaaro(N) Ne

(Bekafan Rahaa Lashaa) X2 Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan

(Zainab Ka Tha Nawha Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan) X2 Zainab Ka Tha Nawha

  9. ("Rehan" Nabi Zaadi Wo Shaam Ki Shahzaadi) X2 Wo Shaam Ki Shahzaadi

(Karti Rahi Wawaila Haay) X2 Me Lut Gayi Babajaan

(Zainab Ka Tha Nawha Me Lut Gayi Baba Jaan) X2 Zainab Ka Tha Nawha

tracks.title: Abbas Ibne Shere Khuda
tracks.lyrics:
(Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda) X4

  1. Mashko Alam Leke Ghar Se Chalaa

Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda

(Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda) X4

  2. Zainab Ne Dam Karke Naade Ali,

Apni Rida Bhayi Par Daaldi,

Dekar Duwa Ghar Se Rukhsat Kiya

Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda

(Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda) X4

  3. Bacho(N) Ke Lab Par Khushi Agayi,

Kuchh Der Me Tashnagi Jayengi,

Darya Ki Janib Chale Hai Chacha

Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda

(Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda) X4

  4. Ghazi Ne Saahil Pe Rakha Qadam,

Khakar Sakina Ke Sar Ki Qasam,

Bharlunga Is Mashk Me Alqama

Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda

(Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda) X4

  5. Parcham Hawa Me Jo Urhne Laga,

Zainab Se Bole Shaahe Karbala,

Bhayi Palat Aaye Mango(N) Duwa

Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda

(Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda) X4

  6. Kehti Thi Bali Sakina Yahi,

Mera Chacha Hai Bahadur Jari,

Rokega Kaise Koi Raasta

Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda

(Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda) X4

  7. Lekin Achanak Ye Kya Hogaya,

Ghazi Ka Parcham Larazne Lagaa,

Bedast Hokar Giraa Bawafaa

Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda

(Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda) X4

  8. Ghazi Jo Zee(N) Se Zami(N) Par Ghira

Rokar Sakina Se Usne Kaha

Sharminda Bali Tera Hai Chacha

Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda

(Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda) X4

  9. Sheh Ki Kamar Gham Se Kham Hogayi,

Taakat Shahe Dee(N) Ki Kam Hogayi,

Lashakar Ka Sardaar Maraa Gayaa

Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda

(Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda) X4

  10. "Rehan" Manzar Wo Kaise Likhu(N)

Mere Qalam Se Tapak Ta Hai Khu(N)

Kehte The Shabbir Bhayi Mera

Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda

(Abbas Ibn-E-Sher-E-Khuda) X4

tracks.title: Akbar Ki Judayi
tracks.lyrics:
(Haye Sughra, Haaye Sughra) X3

(Akbar Ki Judayi Me Na Jee Payegi Sughra) X2

  1. (Tanhayi Me Roro Ke) X2 Marjayegi Sughra

(Akbar Ki Judayi Me Na Jee Payegi Sughra) X2

  2. (Akbar Ko Tasawwur Me, Dulha Bhi Banayengi) X2

(Hum Joliyo(N) Ko Sehra) X2 Dikhlayegi Sughra

(Akbar Ki Judayi Me Na Jee Payegi Sughra) X2

  3. (Dekhengi Kisi Bhayi, Behen Ki Jo Muhabbat) X2

(Akbar Ke Liye Us Pal) X2 Tarap Jaayegi Sughra

(Akbar Ki Judayi Me Na Jee Payegi Sughra) X2

  4. (Dukh Dard Ki Mari Hai, Baba Ki Bhi Pyaari Hai) X2

(Zulmat Ke Andhero(N) Me) X2 Bikharjayegi Sughra

(Akbar Ki Judayi Me Na Jee Payegi Sughra) X2

(Akbar Ki Judayi Me Na Jee Payegi Sughra) X2

  5. (Daadi Ki Lahad Jaaye, Kabhi Nana Ke Roze) X2

(Tanha Hai Akeli Hai) X2 Kaha(N) Jayegi Sughra

(Akbar Ki Judayi Me Na Jee Payegi Sughra) X2

  6. (Beemar Agar Sunle, Akbar Ke Laga Neza) X2

(Marjayengi Ye Kaise) X2 Sun Payegi Sughra

(Akbar Ki Judayi Me Na Jee Payegi Sughra) X2

  7. (Ay Rab-E-Jahaa(N) Usko, Itna To Bataade) X2

(Akbar Se Na Jite Ji) X2 Mil Payegi Sughra

(Akbar Ki Judayi Me Na Jee Payegi Sughra) X2

  8. (Is Aas Pa Zinda Hai, Ayega Ali Akbar) X2

(Qadmo(N) Ke Nisha(N) Kaise) X2 Mitta Payegi Sughra

  9. (Hujra Ali Akbar Ka, Sughra Ko Rulaata Hai) X2

(Veeran Hai Ghar Saara) X2 Na Reh Payegi Sughra

(Akbar Ki Judayi Me Na Jee Payegi Sughra) X2

tracks.title: Ya makhduma ya Fizza
tracks.lyrics:
(Shaam, shaam, shaam, shaam) x2
Ham ko bhi sikha
Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda
Adab-e-wafa
Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda
Ham ko bhi sikha, adab-e-wafa, tujhe Zainab ka wasta
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x4
1.	Jitne zainab ke dil pe ghuzre hai,
Gham wo sab tune bhi uthaaye hai,
Tere bhi sar se chhin gayi chadar,
Tune bhi taaziyane khaye hai
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x2
2.	Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda,
Zainab ne tujhko maa kahaa
Tera bohot hai martaba
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x4
3.	Jis ghari sheh pe chal rahi thi chhuri,
Teri halat bayaa(n) se bahar thi,
Teri ankho(n) se khun jaari tha,
Kehti thi ayiye madad ko ali
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x2
4.	Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda,
Maa banke har shaheed ka,
Matam kiya hai marhaba
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x4
5.	Tu kaneeze batool hai bibi,
Tu duaae rasul hai bibi,
Tu hai ehle azaa ki shahzaadi,
Farshe gham ka tu phool hai bibi
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x2
6.	Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda,
Tu bhi agar kare duwa,
Ttal jaaye sarse har balaa
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x4
7.	Waasta tujhko khune asgher ka
Waasta shahe dee(n) ki dukhtar ka
Humko amno amaa(n) ki dawlat de
Waasta fatema ka haider ka
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x2
8.	Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda,
Maqrooz momineen ka,
Hojoye karz bhi adaa
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x4
9.	Wo jo be ghar hai unko ghar dede,
Be pisar maao ko pisar dede,
Jinke aangan me aagayi hai khiza
Unko sayaa bhara shajar dede
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x2
10.	Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda,
Hum sab tere ghulaam hai
Humko hai aasra tera
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x4
11.	Jitne zainab ke dil pe ghuzre hai,
Gham wo sab tune bhi uthaaye hai,
Tere bhi sar se chhin gayi chadar,
Tune bhi taaziyane khaye hai
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x2
12.	Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda,
Tujhpar bhi hogayi jafaa,
Tera bhi sar khula raha
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x4
13.	Tu kaneeze batool hai bibi,
Tu duaae rasul hai bibi,
Tu hai ehle azaa ki shahzaadi,
Farshe gham ka tu phool hai bibi
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x2
14.	Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda,
Tu bhi agar kare duwa,
Ttal jaaye sarse har balaa
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x4
15.	Pohnche "rehan" ye salaam mera,
Sheh ki nawha ghari hai kaam mera
Bibi teri duawo ke sadqe
Ponche zehra talak kalaam mera
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x2
16.	Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda,
Ye nokri hussain ki,
Karta rahu(n) yuhi sadaa
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x4

tracks.title: Zuljanah ata hai khali
tracks.lyrics:
(Zuljanah zuljanah) x3
(Zuljanah ata hai khali, ya ilaahi khayr ho) x3
1.	(Aas tuti bibiyo(n) ki) x2 Ya ilahi khair ho
(Zuljanah ata hai khali, ya ilaahi khayr ho) x2
2.	Khoon mei duba huwa rahwaar aya hai khuda,
Yeh qayamat ka koi payghaam laya hai khuda,
(Chor kar apni sawari) x2 ya ilahi khair ho
(Zuljanah ata hai khali, ya ilaahi khayr ho) x2
3.	Chor kar baba ko mere aa gaya ay zuljana,
Kar diya pardes my be aasra ay zuljana,
(Yeh sakina ki sada thi) x2 ya ilahi khair ho
(Zuljanah ata hai khali, ya ilaahi khayr ho) x2
4.	Mei kyun bhaayi jaan tere baad zinda reh gai,
Haye kyu(n) na aansuwo(n) ke sath apney beh gai,
(Yeh bahan tum pey ho wari) x2 ya ilahi khair ho
(Zuljanah ata hai khali, ya ilaahi khayr ho) x2
5.	Roza-e-aqdas pe jaake apney nana jaan se,
Eik bibi keh reh rahi hai khwab kuch anjaan sey,
(Thaam kar roze ki jali) x2 ya ilahi khair ho
(Zuljanah ata hai khali, ya ilaahi khayr ho) x2
6.	Ik zaifa baal kholey karbala ko ayi thi,
Apne bete ke liye jo haaye marham laayi thi,
(Kar rahi hay aah-o-zari) x2 ya ilahi khair ho
(Zuljanah ata hai khali, ya ilaahi khayr ho) x2
7.	Apni chadar ko sambhaley bibiyaa(n) roney lagi,
Dekh ke khali sawari yeh buka karne lagi,
(Jal gayi qismat hamari) x2 ya ilahi khair ho
(Zuljanah ata hai khali, ya ilaahi khayr ho) x2
8.	Jisne kandho(n) par nabi ke ki sawari wo hussain
Rehmate jispar khuda ne hai utaari wo hussain
(Hogaya neze pe qari) x2 ya ilahi khair ho
(Zuljanah ata hai khali, ya ilaahi khayr ho) x2
9.	Na raha "arman" koyi bibiyo(n) ka asra
Khoon ke ansoo muhari us ghari rone laga
(Dekh kar khali sawari) x2 ya ilahi khair ho
(Zuljanah ata hai khali, ya ilaahi khayr ho) x2
10.	(Aas tuti bibiyo(n) ki) x2 Ya ilahi khair ho
(Zuljanah ata hai khali, ya ilaahi khayr ho) x2

tracks.title: Ye matam
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya hussain) x8
(Ye Matam, Ye matam, shabbir tera matam) x2
1.	Ta hashr rahenga jaari Ta hashr rehega qayam
(Ye Matam, Ye matam, shabbir tera matam) x2
2.	Ye farshe aza ye giriya ye majlis matam nawha,
Ye ashko(n) ki barsaate ye khoon ka behta dariya
Hum karte rahe he payhum, hum karte rahege har dam
(Ye Matam, Ye matam, shabbir tera matam) x2
3.	Hum matam karne waale hum nawha parhne waale,
Beshak hai duwaaye zehra shabbir pa rone waale,
Ye ashk nahi hai waiz ye zakhmo(n) ka hai marhum
Shah Ast Hussain, Badhshah Ast Hussain, Dee(n) Ast Hussain, Dee(n) panah ast Hussain
4.	Ay munkire matam sunle matam se na rakh bezaari
Zehra ki amanat hai ye kar tu bhi amanatdaari
Milta hai naseebo(n) se ye zehra ke gharane ka gham
(Ye Matam, Ye matam, shabbir tera matam) x2
5.	Zainab ne kiyaa ye matam jab shaam ke zindaano me,
Lagta tha qayamat aayi kuffar ke aywaano me,
Choda so baras guzre hai(n), matam na huwa abtak kam
(Ye Matam, Ye matam, shabbir tera matam) x2
6.	Zanjeer ka ye matam hai sajaad ke zanjeero(n) ka,
Mitsakta nahi hai matam shabbir tere bacho(n) ka,
Marsakta nahi ye matam, gar mar bhi jayege hum
(Ye Matam, Ye matam, shabbir tera matam) x2
7.	Zehra ki tamana hai zainab ke liye pursa hai,
Na sirf azaa khano me ye aag pe bhi hota hai
Rehta hai saro(n) par apne, abbas ali ka parcham
(Ye Matam, Ye matam, shabbir tera matam) x2
8.	Ye farshe aza ye giriya ye majlis matam nawha,
Ye ashko(n) ki barsaate ye khoon ka behta dariya
Hum karte rahe he payhum, hum karte rahege har dam
(Ye Matam, Ye matam, shabbir tera matam) x2
9.	Shabbir tera ye matam naslo me rahega baqi,
"Rehan" ibadat hai ye maula ki matamdaari,
Hum matam hi karte ho, ay kaash nikal jaaye dam
(Ye Matam, Ye matam, shabbir tera matam) x2
(Ya hussain) x8

tracks.title: Azadari
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain Ya Hussain) x3
 
Zahra ke dil ke cheyn Haider ke noore ayn
Ye Jaan Qurban Tujhpar Ay Hussain
(Ya Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain) x4
 
Hum karenge Zahra se wafadari
Na kabhi bhi chorenge azadari
 
(Ya Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain) x2
 
Zindagi Zindagi Zindagi hai azadari  
Azadari hai azadari
Azadari hai azadari
 
Zulm ke aagay kabhi jhuk na saka hai parcham,  
Bekaso ka Matam,  
Yaad hai aaj bhi wo aankhein hui Jo purnam,  
Wo bahatar ka gham,  
Karti thi bibiya Jo dasht me rokar zaari.  
 
Zindagi Zindagi Zindagi hai azadari  
Azadari hai azadari
Azadari hai azadari
  
Khaak hai karbobala Aur hamari wo shifa,  
La maraz Ki hai dawa,  
Hogaye murday bhi is khaak ko malkar zinda,  
Ye hai Zehra Ki jaza,  
Jaan be jaan thi Jo zindagi wo hai baaqi.  
 
Zindagi Zindagi Zindagi hai azadari  
Azadari hai azadari
Azadari hai azadari
 
Huwa nezay pe Jo Quran bayan e sarwar, 
Dekhta hai lashkar,  
Banta hai moti lahu sheh ka zameen per girkar,  
Aur yazeedi Tujhper,  
Lehjae Ibne Ali abuturab hai bhari.  
 
Zindagi Zindagi Zindagi hai azadari  
Azadari hai azadari
Azadari hai azadari
 
Baad Marne ke karunga Mai ye izhar e hussain,  
Hojau waar e hussain,  
Eik din qaum pukaregi hamaray hai Hussain,  
Aya dedar e hussain  
Maut bhi zindagi se honay lagi hai pyari  
 
Zindagi Zindagi Zindagi hai azadari  
Azadari hai azadari
Azadari hai azadari
 
Hai namaz Ibne Ali ki woh vilayat e khuda,  
Aur rab ne di Sada,  
Tere is sajde ne Islam ko dedi hai shifa,  
Ae mere sabr e wafa,  
Eik sajda huwa hai Deen e Nabi per bhari  
 
Zindagi Zindagi Zindagi hai azadari  
Azadari hai azadari
Azadari hai azadari
 
Jaengay Ziarat e Shabbir karay shukr e khuda,  
Ae mere rabb e ulaa,  
Raasta Jannat-e-firdous ye lejaega,  
Saath sarwar Ki dua,  
Kat gaye haath bhi toh hogi sada ye jaari.  
 
Zindagi Zindagi Zindagi hai azadari  
Azadari hai azadari
Azadari hai azadari
 
Mere is Dil me Hussain Ibne Ali rehte hai,  
Ashk ye kehte hai,  
Khoon ke dhaare mere jism se Yun behte hai,  
Ye sada detay hai,  
Karbala ke lahu ne kardi wafa bedaari  
 
Zindagi Zindagi Zindagi hai azadari  
Azadari hai azadari
Azadari hai azadari
 
Pehen ke touq diya khutba ye sajjad ne jab,  
Hogaya kaisa ghazab,  
Kya qayamat ka samah honay laga tha wo ajab,  
Kehti hai ye zainab
Meri Aseeri ka khutba hai ye sab per bhari  
 
Zindagi Zindagi Zindagi hai azadari  
Azadari hai azadari
Azadari hai azadari
 
Sunke “Akbar” duaen deti hai bibi Zehra,  
Khoob Jo tunay likha,  
Hoga Shabbir ke Rozay ke darmiyan Nauha,  
WA hussaina Ki sada,  
Madar-e-shaah se pawoge jazaa “Tejani”
 
Zindagi Zindagi Zindagi hai azadari  
Azadari hai azadari
Azadari hai azadari
Zindagi Zindagi Zindagi hai azadari

tracks.title: Ashkon Ka Wasta
tracks.lyrics:
Bibi Fatemah Zahra
 
Ashkon ka wasta sun lejiye sada 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra
 
Madar hain shahewala ki aap hi to bibi, 
Jinse kaha khuda ne ho ja tu mujhse razi, 
Unke hi sadqe bibi deje hame raza, 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
 
Ashkon ka wasta sun lejiye sada 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra
 
Bechain hai tabiyat dil par nahi hai qabu, 
Hamne bahaye lakhon sheh ke alam me ansu, 
Mushkil me ansuwon ki ab dejiye jaza. 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
 
Ashkon ka wasta sun lejiye sada 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra
 
Purhaul hain fazayen, har samt hain balayen, 
Bibi hamari poori hoti nahi duwayen, 
Karte hain har ghadi bas hum yahi buka. 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
 
Ashkon ka wasta sun lejiye sada 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra
 
Beemariyon ne aysa aakar hame hai ghera, 
Jaise ke zindagi me apni  hua andhera, 
Bibi ba-sadqe aabid deje hame shifa, 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
 
Ashkon ka wasta sun lejiye sada 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra
 
Shabbeer ka gala jo shimre-la'en ne kata, 
Dete hain waasta us sookhe hue gale ka, 
Ho jaye apni hasti se door haadsa. 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
 
Ashkon ka wasta sun lejiye sada 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra
 
Jispar baha rahi thi aah se sakina ansu, 
Nehre-furat par jo kat-kat gaye thhe bazu, 
Sadqe me unke keje qoowat hame ata, 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
 
Ashkon ka wasta sun lejiye sada 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra
 
Jisme utaar di thi zalim ne eik barchi, 
Akbar ke zakhmi seene ka waasta hai bibi, 
Akbar sa hamko jazba miljaaye raaziya 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
 
Ashkon ka wasta sun lejiye sada 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra
 
Teere-sitam se jisko tha hurmula ne cheda, 
Nanhe se us gale ke sadqe me bibi zehra, 
Bacchon ko hum sabhi ke ab deje hausla, 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
 
Ashkon ka wasta sun lejiye sada 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra
 
Tauqeer ye Sharaf ho “Tejani” ko bhi hasil
Fauj-e-imam-e-mahdi Mei ho wo bhi shamil
Miljaaye naasiro(n) ka unko bhi martaba
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
 
Ashkon ka wasta sun lejiye sada 
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra, haan
tere dar pe agaye hain bibi fatemah Zahra

tracks.title: Baadshahe Wafa
tracks.lyrics:
Shehenshaah, baadshaah, aks-e-Ali, tu hai Abbas
 
(Tu hai baadshaah-e-wafa tu hai shehenshaah-e-wafa) x2
(Abbas ya Abbas) x3
Tu hai baadshaah-e-wafa tu hai shehenshaah-e-wafa
(Abbas ya Abbas) x3
 
Maula hai alam bardaar 
akse haidere karaar  
sheh ka qafla salaar 
aisa hai tera kirdaar 
insaano malaik kya  
ye to khud khuda bola 
  
(Abbas ya Abbas) x3
tu hai mushkilkusha 
tu hai hajat rawa 
Mujhko jo jo mila
tere dar ki ata
Ya abbas Ya Abbas
 
Kul ka kul wafa hai tu 
mani e wafa hai tu 
zainab ki rida hai tu 
zahra ki dua hai tu 
bus aisa Sabak dekar  
Madar ne tujhe paala 
 
(Abbas ya Abbas) x3
Tu hai baadshaah-e-wafa tu hai shehenshaah-e-wafa
(Abbas ya Abbas) x3
 
manga tha jo haider ne 
bawaqte namaze shab 
ik beta mujhe dede 
karbal ke liye ya rab 
hafiz bibiyon ka aur 
sheh ka jo kamar hoga 
 
(Abbas ya Abbas) x3
salaare qafla  
sakina ka chacha 
haan zainab ki rida 
duae sayyeda 
Ya abbas Ya Abbas
 
Kitna hogaya raazi 
tujhse akbare mabood 
tere dar se jo mange 
deta hai tu la mahdood  
tu babul hawaij hai 
aisa hai laqab tera 
 
(Abbas ya Abbas) x3
Tu hai baadshaah-e-wafa tu hai shehenshaah-e-wafa

maidaa(n) mei bina talwaar 
hai tareekh mei bus ik 
betegh jo kiya tha waar  
dushman peechhe hatne lage 
pani par kiya qabza 
 
(Abbas ya Abbas) x3
abbas bawafa 
qatile nainawa 
zabihe bekhata 
shaheede Karbala 
Ya Abbas Ya Abbas
 
haan bali sakina ka 
kuza mun se jab chhuta 
paani ret par tune 
jab dekha to dil tutta 
ghorde ka badal kar rukh  
chalay jo sue dariya 
 
(Abbas ya Abbas) x3
Tu hai baadshaah-e-wafa tu hai shehenshaah-e-wafa
(Abbas ya Abbas) x3
 
Sheh ne dekha khayme ke 
dar se khun me dduba alam  
kuza chhid gaya hai aur  
hogaye hain bazu qalam 
zeen se mun pe girta hai 
ghorde se mera bhayya 
 
(Abbas ya Abbas) x3
jo tera khun baha 
bazu bhi katt gaya 
zeen se mun par gira 
sheh ne di ye sada 
 
jab bhi zindagi mei ho 
afat to na ho mayoos

hoja ghazi se manoos

(Abbas ya Abbas) x3
Tu hai baadshaah-e-wafa tu hai shehenshaah-e-wafa
(Abbas ya Abbas) x3

tracks.title: Take Me To Karbala
tracks.lyrics:
Karbala, Karbala, Karbala
 
 
Take me to Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala
 
I am that beggar who comes to your door  
You will answer me of this I am sure  
the one who gave Fitrus his wings  
the one whose praises Allah sings  
do not turn me away
I've come from far away
waiting for just this day
To kiss your shrine and say
 
Take me to Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala
 
To see your shrine if they take my life away 
I'd still come crawling to you oh Hussain
even if I face certain death 
I'll call your name with every breath 
even death can't stop me
it is my only dream
your shine I need to see
Hussain so desperately
 
Take me to Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala 
 
without your love I'd not have a heartbeat 
the blood in my veins the air that I breathe 
you are my start you are my end  
you are more than I can understand  
don't let this distance grow
please call me to your door
look at my tears flow 
I can't wait anymore
 
Take me to Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala
 
 
we have been tortured and been imprisoned  
we are killed daily without a reason 
because we love you oh Hussain 
and we call out your father's name 
ya Ali we will say   
as we will walk your way
every step every day
from your path we won't stray
 
Take me to Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala
 
even in my sleep I dream of your land 
I wish to hold and to kiss the sand 
the dust that cures every disease 
and in itself can intercede 
my master in this life
the only wish of mine
is to die by your side
holding your golden shrine
 
Take me to Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala
 
to be your servant is my life's aim  
everything for you I would give up hussain  
I wish I was there by your side 
and for your love be sacrificed 
despite all of my sins
my master in a blink
you gave me everything
only through your blessings
 
Take me to Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala
 
this is my promise to you oh Hussain 
upon my death bed I’ll call out your name  
I know that in their final breath 
you will cradle your lover’s head 
please come to visit me
so my death can be sweet
take my hand when we meet
and in that time of need
 
Take me to Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala
  
the angels come down to circle your grave  
even the kings come to your door as slaves 
millions crawl on their hands and knees 
and come to you with all their needs 
this Allah guarantees
you can change destinies
and grant us any wish
Rahib is proof of this
 
Take me to Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala, Karbala Karbala

tracks.title: Sajad Ka Wo Imtehaan
tracks.lyrics:
(Sajjad ka wo imtehaan Sajjad ka wo imtehaan) x2
Bimar musafir hay aur sham ka darbar
 
(Sajjad ka wo imtehaan Sajjad ka wo imtehaan) x2
 
(Hatho(n) me rassiya(n) aur pao(n) me beriya(n)) x2

Lahu se bhara, woh poshaak tha
Gara(n) tawq ka tha gardan pe haar

Mera nawjawa(n), mera bezuba(n),
Mera bawafa, mera bhayi jaa(n)
Abhi sab hai(n) neze pe sawaar
 
(Sajjad ka wo imtehaan Sajjad ka wo imtehaan) x2
 
(Ankho(n) se khu(n) bahaya, ghayrat ke naam mei) x2
Beparda maye(n) behne bazaar-e-shaam me
Tamashayi yu(n), rulaate rahe
Sitam par sitam, woh dhaate rahe
Tha charo(n) taraf se pathhar ka waar
 
(Sajjad ka wo imtehaan Sajjad ka wo imtehaan) x2
 
(Seene pe sone waali, girti thi khaak par) x2
Bachi pe tune dhhayaa har ik sitam shimar
Rida chin gayi, chini baaliyaa(n)
Tamache lage, kabhi seyliyaa(n)
Uthaaye sitam, woh dil par hazaar
 
(Sajjad ka wo imtehaan Sajjad ka wo imtehaan) x2
 
(Tishnalabi ka aalam, bachhi thi nawhagar) x2
Pani baha ke zalim, jalti zamin par
Ye hass kar kaha, woh ammu tera,
Kidher kho gaya, thi lab pe bukaa, 
Sakina ki ghazi baar baar.
 
(Sajjad ka wo imtehaan Sajjad ka wo imtehaan) x2
 
(Bola yazid hass kar, ay binte Murtaza) x2
Ab aasra tumhara, koi nahi raha
To baalo(n) se mu(n), chupa ke kaha
main binte ali hun ae behaya
Zara aazma, ke dekh eik baar
 
(Sajjad ka wo imtehaan Sajjad ka wo imtehaan) x2
 
(Yasrab me laut aaya, lut kar ye qafla) x2
maula ne dil ko thhame rokar yahi kaha
Abhi yaad hai, woh bazaar-e-shaam
wo zindan-e-shaam, Wo darbaar-e-shaam
Phire nange sar haaye sogwaar
 
(Sajjad ka wo imtehaan Sajjad ka wo imtehaan) x2
 
(Sajjad ki azaa ruksakti nahi kabhi) x2
Duniya ko ab "Tejani", payghaam do yahi,
jo bhi rokne, ki koshish kare
azaa-e-hussain, wo sab jaanle
unhi pe hai lanat beshumaar
 
(Sajjad ka wo imtehaan Sajjad ka wo imtehaan) x2

tracks.title: Young Army (ft. Zahra Tejani)
tracks.lyrics:
Imam Hussain (AS) on the day of Ashura gave everything up for Allah (SWT) so that we could remain free and that Islam could remain alive today. 
Do you remember when he said Halmin nasirin yansurna – is there anyone to help me? We were not there when Imam Hussain (AS) said that but remember that we can help him today by being good Muslims, by always remembering his message, and by preparing to help the Imam of our time, Imam Mehdi (ATF) 
 
We are your young army 
Oh Hussain and Mehdi 
We are yours, we are yours we are yours 
 
 You have inspired us to be 
The best that we can be 
And from your tragedy 
We have learnt how to live
We will always stay strong 
Standing up against what is wrong 
We are yours, we are yours, we are yours  
 
We are your young army 
Oh Hussain and Mehdi 
We are yours, we are yours we are yours 
 
We can change this world for good 
Stand for why you had stood 
We will fight for the truth 
Being brave in our youth 
We know it's our duty 
To prepare for Mehdi 
We are yours, we are yours, we are yours  
 
We are your young army 
Oh Hussain and Mehdi 
We are yours, we are yours we are yours 
 
You have witnessed suffering 
Your beloved perishing 
Enemies were cheering 
As your tents were all burning
We have learnt from your patience 
To rely on God's wisdom 
We are yours, we are yours we are yours 
 
We are your young army 
Oh Hussain and Mehdi 
We are yours, we are yours we are yours 
 
Seeing you is our dream 
We pray one day we can be 
By your side when you return 
To reform the Prophet's deen 
You are our saviour 
We are your followers
We are yours, we are yours we are yours 
 
We are your young army 
Oh Hussain and Mehdi 
We are yours, we are yours we are yours 
 
This is what Qasim had taught 
When he came bravely and fought 
Nothing is sweeter than death 
If you're on the path of God 
We'll remember his message 
and will show our courage 
We are yours, we are yours we are yours 
 
We are your young army 
Oh Hussain and Mehdi 
We are yours, we are yours we are yours 
 
We will make sure God is pleased 
Through our lives with our deeds 
We will offer our help 
When we see someone in need 
We are the role models 
for tomorrow's children
We are yours, we are yours we are yours 
 
We are your young army 
Oh Hussain and Mehdi 
We are yours, we are yours we are yours 
 
Karbala lives in our hearts 
And we hate being apart 
We will pray besides his shrine 
as we hold onto the bars 
When we're ever in need 
We know he'll intercede 
We are yours, we are yours we are yours 
 
We are your young army 
Oh Hussain and Mehdi 
We are yours, we are yours we are yours

tracks.title: Shia
tracks.lyrics:
Roze alast mei mujhse sawaal ye kiya gaya
Kya tumko hai qubool aliyyun waliyullah
Maine kiya iqrar aur dil shaad huwa tha
Honton se mere bas yahi aati thi ik sada
Aur aaj bhi zubaan ke saath dil hai bolta
Hai fakhr mujhko bus yahi main hu tera shia
 
Jo wahaan kaha tha, wo ab bhi kahunga
 
Mai hu, mai hu tera shia
Mujhe darr nahi lagta mai dil se hu kehta ye ishqay Ali me taqqaya nahi hota.
Mai hu, mai hu tera shia
 
1.    zehra ki Dua hai sarwar ki ata hai
Ye dil nahi Mera ye karbobala hai
Ye zikr se jaari har gham ki dawa hai
Matam gham e shabbir ye rab ki riza hai
  
2.    haq per tu Amal Kar na fatway lagakar,
Abbas ka parcham hatoh me uthakar,
Dil se tu wafakar har mord pe aakar
Jagg jeetlay Sara duniya ko batakari
 
3.    Ye sab ko batao khud se na chupao,
Zalim hai Jo qatil sar uska jhukao,
Quran ke Ghar ka dar jisne jalaya,
Tum karke tabarah usay qaak milao
 
4.    Hindu o musalman har eik Qabeela
 Shabbir ke gham me kehta hai khudara,
 Matam Meri taqdeer matam Meri qismat
matam Meri tafseer turbat ka ujala
 
5.    mujhper ye bharam hai zehra ka Karam hai,
Uncha ye rahega sarwar ka Alam hai,
Ye ashk e aza hai har aankh Jo num hai
Ye Rona hamara batil pe sitam hai....
 
 
6.    pardtay hai namazein karbal ka hai sadqa,
Hoti hai azaa-n jab hota hai khulasa,
Ya Fatima zehra hum Nasir e moula,
Markar Jo shaheedoh ka kehta hai rudba
      
7.    Ulfat hai Ali se seerat pe Amal Kar 
Mushkil khushai se fatwoh ko tu Hal kar,
Ye qaulay nabi hai aur qaulay Ali hai
muhib Meray wo hai Jo rehtay hai milkar
 
8.    Ae saniye haider labbaik ya Hussain,
Ae saqiy e kausar labbaik ya Hussain,
Likha mere Dil per labbaik ya Hussain
Hum hai Tere naukar labbaik ya Hussain
 
9.    hum aashiqay Hyder hum aashiqay sarwar
katjaye zuban gar ho daar pe manzar
Meesam ki tarah ho ye ishqay samundar
Hokar Jo be-zubaan laata hai zubah per
 
10.zulmat ko mitana Ghar apna lutana
Aur sar ko katana Quran bachana,
Islam ki khatir ye jazba dikhana
Har dour me sheh ka goonjega tarana
 
11.har nasl kahegi har dour me aakar
Qismat hai Tejani hum hyderi naukar,
Khushbaqt hai Akbar jumla Tera sunkar
Kehta hai zamana shabbir ke dar per

tracks.title: Akbar Tere Jigar Se
tracks.lyrics:
Kano'n me aayi sarwar ke jab sadaye-akbar,
ghutno'n ke bal shahedee'n pahunche hain sooe-maqtal,
dekha jigar ke tukde ko aidya'n ragadte,
barchi pakad ke bole ye shahedeen us pal.
 
Akbar tere jigar se barchi nahin nikalti
 
1.    Kehte thhe shahewala aayi hai kya museebat
Mushkil me jaa’n hai meri khasta hai teri haalat
Seene pe kaisi tooti beta tere qayamat
 
2.    Akbar tere jigar ka hai zakhm kitna kaari
Choota agar hun mai to hota hai khoon jaari
Kis berahem ne barchi seene pe tere maari
 
3.    Toota hai tu jo beta mai bhi bikhar raha hun,
Barchi nikaalne ki koshish mai kar raha hun
Rukti hai teri sansen pal pal mai mar raha hun
 
4.    Dardo-Alam ba-khoobi mai tere jaanta hun
Zakhmo’n ki tees ko bhi mehsoos kar raha hun
Tu jo tadap raha hai beta mai kaanpta hun
 
5.    Shayed tere jigar me barchi ka phal hai uljha
Kheenchi zara jo barchi tu dard se hai tadpa
Dekhi’n jo teri nazre’n chaane laga andhera
 
6.    Takleef se jo teri haalat bigad rahi hai
Reh reh ke sans meri jaise ukhad rahi hai
Duniya he jaise meri beta ujad rahi hai
 
7.    Tujh pe hai pal ye bhaari, Mujhpe hai waqt mushkil
Barchhi Jo khenchu bas Tu, apna sambhal le dil
Ay mere laal Akbar dushwaar hai ye manzil
 
8.    Naame-Ali jo lekar barchi ko sheh ne Kheencha
Barchi ke sath bahar bas aa gaya kaleja
Fiqra Husain ka phir maqtal me ye na goonja
 
9.    Purdard baapo-Bete ka hai bahut ye qissa,
Khoone-Jigar se jisko  'Tauqeer' ne hai likkha
Honto'n pe hai 'Tejani' ke dil-kharash nauha,

tracks.title: Shame Ghariban
tracks.lyrics:
Waa ghurbata waa museebata
 
Nawha ye Zainab ka tha shame ghariban
Hogayi may beridaa shame ghariban
Wawayla shame ghariban
 
1.    Qasim o Akbar nahi, shame ghariban
berida roti rahi, shame ghariban
Hai sada lab par yahi, shame ghariban
Haaye meri bekasi, shame ghariban
 
2.    Zainabe khasta Jigar, shame ghariban
lutgaya hai jiska ghar, shame ghariban
Jaeygi ab dar badar, shame ghariban
Haye hokey be pisar, shame ghariban
 
3.    Khaak par hai bekafan, shame ghariban
Choor choor hai badan, shame ghariban
tukrdon mei hai sheh ka tan, shame ghariban
Waqt hai kaisa katthan, shame ghariban
 
4.    lutgaye aale nabi, shame ghariban
pehre pe zainab khardi, shame ghariban
agaye baba ali, shame ghariban
jab bacha koi nahi, shame ghariban
 
5.    hai sakina ka bayaan, shame ghariban
baba dekho to yahaan, shame ghariban
gaalon pe mere nishaan, shame ghariban
kaanon se hai khun rawaan, shame ghariban
 
6.    ho kahan shere jali, shame ghariban
Aakay dekho to sahi, shame ghariban
Aag khaimo mein lagi, shame ghariban
Jalgaya jhoola sabhi, shame ghariban
 
7.    ghash mei abid hai parda, shame ghariban
aur bistar hai jala, shame ghariban
tawq mei baandha gala, shame ghariban
berdiyan pehney huwa, shame ghariban
 
8.    berida roti hai maan, shame ghariban
mere akbar nojawaan, shame ghariban
khaake sine mein sinaan, shame ghariban
sogaye ho tum kahaan, shame ghariban
 
9.    karbala tu hai gawaah, shame ghariban
raat kaisi thi siyaah, shame ghariban
hogayi zainab tabah, shame ghariban
bekafan thi lashe shaah, shame ghariban
 
10.hai Tejani ki fughaan, shame ghariban
ho na paega bayaan, shame ghariban
berida sab bibiyaan, shame ghariban
sheh ka sar noke sinan, shame ghariban

tracks.title: Roti Hai Sakina
tracks.lyrics:
Baba Dekho ye Teri Jaan hai
Mu pe tamachein ka nishaan hain
 
Neze ke tale beyth ke roti hai sakina
kyun baba karlin hain bund ankhein
 
Aik baar zara dekhlo baba mera chehra
 
1. Takleef agar hoti thi mujhko kissi pehlu
Ankhon mein meri dekh nahin patay thay ansun
Behta hai meri ankhon say ab ashkon ka darya
 
2. Be rehm hai kitni ye laeeno ki nigahen
Kartay hain sitam bharti hoon jab dard sey aahein
Hota hai kissi qaid mein ronay pe bhi pehra
 
3. kya in mein koi sahibe aulad nahin hai
Kya in Ka makan bachon se abaad nahin hai
Bachpan pe bhi aada ne taras kuch nahin khaaya
 
4. Baba mujhe zalim ke tamacho se bachalo
Aaghosh mein ab apni sakina ko uthalo
Faryaad karoon kissay koi bhi nahin apna
 
5. Yeh shimre laen ghuRkiya kab tak mujhay dega
Yeh zulm o sitam mera jigar kaisay sahay ga
Ghut ghut ke museebat se main marjaoon kahin na
 
6. Yaad ata hai ammu ka meray naaz uthaana
Aur aapka woh haathon ke jhulay mein jhulana
Qismat ne hummay kon sa din aaj dikhaaya
 
7. Chalti hoon to dukhtay hain bohat paaon ke chalay
Kantay jo chubhay hain to inhein kon nikalay
Jalti hai zameen kaisay chaloon dekhlo baba
 
8. Rassi ki jo gardan mein chubhan hoti hai baba
Main saans loon kaisay ke ghuttan hoti hai baba
Boloon bhi to kis tarha ke bola nahin jaata
 
9. Tejani falak ne kabhi dekha na yeh manzar
Neze pe ho sar baap ka aur qaid ho dukhtar
Phatta hai Nigar apna jigar likh ke yeh noha
 
Amman ke bhi haathon ko hai bandha passay gardan
Aur aap ka sar dekh ke barh jaati hai uljhan
Is haal mein maan baap kissay ke hon kabhi na
 
Sar nezey pe Asghar ka hai aur dhoop kaRRi hai
Amman ko bhi is baat ki takleef baRi hai
Woh dekh ke hum dono ko bus karti hain girya
 
Baba phupi Amman ko Mera paas bohat hai
Unko bhi meri pyaas ka ehsaas bohat hai
Woh kiya karein unka bhi koi bass Nahin chalta
 
Shimre laeen ke dar se barhti hai dill ki dharkan
Seenay ke dard se hai sanson mein meri uljhan
Zakhmon ko apne saare dikhlaey gi Sakina
 
Is waqt mere upar zalim ki sakhtiyan Hain
Hai shimr ke tamachay aur meri siskiyaan hain
Ab meray saath ghum ki saari nishaniyan hain
Ab sirf eik yateema kehlaeygi sakina
 
Kaano ka lahu saaf karain kaisay phupi jaa (n)
Majboor hain sab bibyan majboor hain amma (n)
Zakhmi hain lavein khoon baha karta hai baba
 
Jee bhar ke tujhay haye kabhi ro nahin paai
Sona bhi jo chaha to kabhi so nahin paai
Akhein kabhi jhapki to laeen detay hain eeza
 
Agosh se amman ki chuRaya gaya mujhko
Naqey pe akeley hi bithaya gaya mujhko
Naqey ki ragaR se mera chalni hua ceena
 
Is qaide museebat se riha kon karay ga
Baba meray zakhmo ki dawa kon karay ga
Bhai bhi giraftare silasil hai karay kiya

tracks.title: Ummul Baneen Ne Paalaa Hai
tracks.lyrics:
Kehti thi laal meray, Shabbir tera aaqa hai
 
Is tarhan se Ghazi ko ummul baneen ne paala hai
 
1.    jab waqt aaye mushkil zehra ke ladle par
Shabbir ki hifazat karna tu dhaal bankar
Yeh maan ki hai waseeyat, aur yehi hukm mera hai
 
2.    is Ghar mein Tu humesha bankar ghulam Rehna
Aulade fatima Ko Bhai behen na kehna
Khaakar qasam tu kehde, maan tujh say Mera wada hai
 
3.    tujhko namaze Shab mein manga hai khud Ali ke
Rab se duaein ki hain Allah ke wali ne
Tu hai dua Ali ki tu aarzue Zehra hai
 
4.    mainay jo kuch kaha hai rakhna wohi irada
Aale Rasool se tu aisay nibhana wada
Main fakhr se kahoon ke Abbas Mera beta hai
 
5.    kitna hai naaz tujhpar Zehra ki betiyon ko
Hai aas tujhpe beta kis darja bibiyon ko
Saydania ko beta tujhpar bohat bharosa hai
 
6.    karbobala ki khatir paala hai tujhko mainay
Sanchay mein khuda wafa ke dhaala hai tujhko mainay
Jo teer sheh pe aaye, tujhko jigar pe khaana hai
 
7.    ummal Banin jaisi maan par salaam Safdar
Pursa main deraha hoon farshe aza bichakar
Tejani hain baradar, inke labon pe noha hai

tracks.title: Kya Aap Hi Zainab Hain
tracks.lyrics:
Abdullah ne farmaya kya aap hi Zainab hain
 
1.    ye hogaya kya hulya kya aap hi Zainab hain
 
2.    kyun khaak pe bhaythi hain kya hogaya shehzadi
kuchh mujhse bhi famayen kaise hui barbadi
mein kyun nahi pehchana kya aap hi zainab hain
 
3.    main samjha koi bibi aayi hai paye hajat
main dekh ke ghabraya allah re ye ghurbat
mujhko na yaqee(n) ayaa
 
4.    Yeh soch raha tha main hai aaj udaasi kyun
Ghar aati nahin waapis Ahmed ki nawasi kyun
Yeh dekh ke ghabraya kya aap hi Zainab Hain
 
5.    Bachay hain meray kyun kar nazron se nihaan Bibi
Haan Aun o Mohamad ko Chord aain Kahan Bibi
Bibi na kareyn girya kya aap hi Zainab Hain
 
6.    Kyun khaak hain balon mein Kyun Neel Hain bazu par
Yeh khoon ke qatron se rangeen Hai kyun chaadar
Ati hain nazar dukhya, kya aap hi Zaynab Hain
 
7.    Batlaiye shehzadi kyun aap sisakti Hain
Pardes mein kya guzri kyun aisay bilakti hain
Yeh zakhm laga kaisa kya aap hi Zaynab Hain
 
8.    Bibi se Zafar rokar kehtay they yeh Abdullah
Tejani bohat muztar kehtay they yeh Abdullah
Parhti hai Rida noha kya aap hi Zaynab Hain
 
har baar sabhi bhayi ghar chord ne ate the
murd murd ke shahe vala phir dekhte jaate the
ayi(n) hain yahaan tanha
 
ab sabr karein Bibi marjaey na Abdullah
Aye Bibi dua kijeay sab khair karay Allah
Dill soch ke bhar Aya, kya aap hi Zaynab Hain

tracks.title: Muharram Ka Chand
tracks.lyrics:
As-salaam ay maahe gham
Ehle aza, phir agaya, maahe aza, maahe aza
 
Muharram ka ye chaand agaya
 
1.    Zamin ta arshe Azam sirf ek mahol h gham ka
Nabi ki aal ke ghar men utha h shor matam ka
Nahi bhule ghme Karbala
 
2.    Azadari teri jari rahegi hashr tak mola
Shhe karbobala ki yad men hoga yunhi girya
In ankhon ki h ab ye sada
 
3.    Paye gham aise  maayen bachchon ko tayyar Karti hain
Azadari ke sadqe men Naya Mukhtar Karti hain
Ye dete hain adu Ko qaza
 
4.    Ye ayyame aza har ayk Shai se hamko pyara  h
Moharram ke liye maaon ne khud bachchon ko waara h
Moharram par h ye Jaa fida
 
5.    Musalsal ghurbate Shabbir par ashkon se muh dhona
Nahi bhulenge ham Sajjad ka is gham men khu Rona
Rahe raushan aza ka diya
 
6.    Jena walon ko rudade ghame Sarwar sunate hain
Nawase ki museebat par Nabi ansu bahate hain
Shareeke gham hain sab ambiya
 
7.    Sukunat pate hain romal men Zahra ke mahram hain
Hamare ashk hi zakhme shhe Wala ke marham hain
Na girye ka ruke silsila
 
8.    Wo teejani akhi hon ya Hilal is amr ko samjhen
Ye tableeghe azaye shh kisi Surat Ni roken
agar Zahra ki chahen dua
 
 
Ye Nauha majliso matam salamo soz aur griya
Hamari Jan hain ye sab ham in se hi hain wabasta
Azadari h apni baqa
 
Lebase sog zebe tan karo gham ki aza'n dekar
Namze ashk par lo majlise Shabbir men jakar
Khuda dega yaqinan jaza
 
Azakhana shhe di ka sajaya ja Chuka h ab
Musalla farshe matam ka bichhaya ja Chuka h ab
Namaze gham karo sab ada
 
 
Paye deene khuda aabad tha Jo kal madine men
Qareebe alame ghurbat moharram ke mahine men
Shhe di ka wo ghar lut gaya

tracks.title: Day of Ashura (English)
tracks.lyrics:
Let’s all learn about the day of Ashura
Let’s all learn about the land of Karbala
 
1.    This is the day when imam Hussain
gave up his life for you and me
this is the land where millions will come
crawling upon their hands and knees
this is the tale of karbala
and the story of our maula
 
2.    The children like ali asghar
aun and muhammed and qasim
he said death was even sweeter
than the taste of honey for him
they showed us to stay strong in faith
to stand for truth despite your age
 
3.    Imam Hussain had a young son
who he loved called Ali Akbar
he took a spear into his heart
when he fell he called out father
maula hussains vision faded
he pulled that spear out unaided
 
4.    Hazrat Abbas the flag bearer
came forward with the children's flask
he wasn't sent to fight but to
bring back the water was his task
the flask was pierced his hands were cut
his flag was brought back drenched in blood
 
5.    From a very young age we've learnt
to wear black clothes in muharram
our mums and dads took us to sit
in majlis and to do matam
we will teach our children the same
their first words will be ya Hussain
 
6.    These are the merits of ziyarat
of maula Abbas and Hussain
they always protect their zawwar
and keep them safe away from pain
whenever you can visit their shrine
Go there with tears in your eyes
 
7.    Salaam upon you my maula
salaam upon your son ali
salaam upon your companions
salaam upon your family
salutations on you i pay
I'll read this ziyarat everyday

tracks.title: Ark of Salvation (English)
tracks.lyrics:
The sun is burning like this fire inside
I've seen destruction, heaven knows I've cried
 
I'm all alone without a home
There's nowhere left to go
I am the ark of salvation
Trying to guide it through the storm
  
1.    My back is broken I've no sight
My loved ones all have left my side
Though in their blood they all have drowned
They've found salvation through my light
Upon the sands I stand alone
There's nowhere left to go
I made this promise long ago
There's nowhere left to go
I move towards the spears and stones
There's nowhere left to go
 
2.    This ark is strong beyond belief
It can withstand oceans of grief
Though every inch is filled with wounds
A thousand arrows it's received
The course is set far from the coast
There's nowhere left to go
They look at me and laugh and gloat
There's nowhere left to go
I am attacked though they all know
There's nowhere left to go
 
3.    When I was born the Prophet cried
And told my mother how I'll die
He will be drowned in his own blood
There will be no-one by his side
This was my fate since I was born
There's nowhere left to go
In history I will be known
There's nowhere left to go
This final stand to all will show
There's nowhere left to go
 
4.    Just like the animals were saved
When Prophet Nuh was asked to make
By God an ark to ride the waves
The task I have is just the same
To save the righteous and close
There's nowhere left to go
Defeat the enemies of God
There's nowhere left to go
To give humanity a hope
There's nowhere left to go
 
5.    There's no illusion I'm aware
The enemies will try to tear
My loved ones bodies into shreds
Their blood left scattered everywhere
To save religion is my goal
There's nowhere left to go
My loved ones trust me young and old
There's nowhere left to go
This is the path that we all walk
There's nowhere left to go
 
6.    They say that love makes memories
And with all hardships will come ease
Stand for whatever you believe
And you will make your destiny
I know this deep within my soul
There's nowhere left to go
Though I know they will crush my bones
There's nowhere left to go
I trust in what Allah has told
There's nowhere left to go

tracks.title: Babul Hawaij
tracks.lyrics:
Dono bazu ko kataaye, teen din ki pyaas hai
khayme tak pohnche ye paani, dil mei bus ik aas hai
rehgayi uski tamanna, rab ne khaayi ye qasam
aaj se Baabul hawaaij, mera Abbas hai
 
(Baabul hawaij ay Maula Ghazi, aaye hai dar pe tere sawaali) x2
 
1.    hamein khabar hain, Rad nahin hogi
Kabhi is dar se, dua hamari
Is liye Aaye, hai aas lekar
Ay mere Maula, tumhaare dar par
Baabul hawaaij, ay maula ghazi
Dil mei dua hai aansu hai jaari
 
(Baabul hawaij ay Maula Ghazi, aaye hai dar pe tere sawaali) x2
 
2.    Ho sheyr tumhi, sheyr-e-khuda ke
Tum bawafa ho, karbobala ke
Dua-e-zahra ke ho asar tum
Ho paasbaa(n) zainab ki rida ke
Baabul hawaaij, ay maula ghazi
Tumhare jaisa nahi(n) hai koi
 
(Baabul hawaij ay Maula Ghazi, aaye hai dar pe tere sawaali) x2
 
3.    Haatho(n) ko jode, aate hai rokar
Jo bepisar hai, Tumhaare dar par
Unki tamanna, ko rad na karna
Awlaad-e-saaleh unhe ata kar
Baabul hawaaij, ay maula ghazi
Unhi khawateen ki bharde godi
 
(Baabul hawaij ay Maula Ghazi, aaye hai dar pe tere sawaali) x2
 
4.    Be jurm aseero(n), ko tu riha kar
Maqrooz momin ke qarz ada kar
Amn-o-amaan ka tohfa ata kar
Har ik bala ko, hamse hataa kar
Baabul hawaaij, ay maula ghazi
Kistarha lotenge dar se khaali
 
(Baabul hawaij ay Maula Ghazi, aaye hai dar pe tere sawaali) x2
 
5.    Sar ko jhukaaye, dil mei hai ye gham
Apne gunah mei, dubte hai ham
Maaf ho jaayein saari khatayei(n)
Ye istighasa hai taht-e-parcham
Baabul hawaaij ay maula ghazi
Tere hawaale taqdeer meri
 
 (Baabul hawaij ay Maula Ghazi, aaye hai dar pe tere sawaali) x2
 
6.    Saare jahaa(n) mei, hota hai hamla
Har ik taraf hai, lahu ka darya
Yemen-o-bahrain, shaam aur iraq bhi
Hai aaj tak munhadim baqiyyah
Baabul hawaaij, ay maula ghazi
Jald hojaaye, zahoor-e-mehdi
 
(Baabul hawaij ay Maula Ghazi, aaye hai dar pe tere sawaali) x2
 
7.    Ham jee rahei(n) hai, Is aasre par
Teri ziyarat ho zindagi bhar
Jinke dilo(n) Mei hai ye tamanna
Dekho wo roza tumhara aakar
Baabul hawaaij ay maula ghazi
Dil Mei dua hai aansu hai jaari
 
(Baabul hawaij ay Maula Ghazi, aaye hai dar pe tere sawaali) x2
 
8.    shame ghariban Mei jaise ujri 
Zainab-e-muztar haaye akeli 
chadar luta kar, wo ban Mei aayi
Unke labon par bas ye sada thi
Baabul hawaaij ay maula ghazi
Aawo bachaawo ay mere bhaayi
 
(Baabul hawaij ay Maula Ghazi, aaye hai dar pe tere sawaali) x2
 
9.    Hai maula wada, yahi "Tejani"
Rahengi zinda ye nawhakhwaani
Ye nokri ki na intehaa ho
Hamare jeene ki ho kahaani
Baabul hawaaij ay maula ghazi
Ta hashr sheh ki karei(n) ghulaami
 
(Baabul hawaij ay Maula Ghazi, aaye hai dar pe tere sawaali) x2

tracks.title: Imam Reza (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
Assalamu alayka ya ghareebal ghuraba
Assalamu alayka ya mu’eenadhu’afaai walfukaraa
Assalamu alayka ya sultan abal hassan
Aliyyabna musa ar-redhaa
 
(Imam Raza, waris-e-quraan, markaz-e-imaan, jaan-e-man shaah-e-khurasaan)x2
 
1.     the land of mash'had, is like no other
we always leave with, our hearts desire
this is a guarantee, ask with sincerity
and you will see, that what will be
imam raza, call us to your side, you are our guide
when we've called you you have replied
 
(Imam Raza, waris-e-quraan, markaz-e-imaan, jaan-e-man shaah-e-khurasaan)x2
 
2.     Is tarha aayi, tumhe shahaadat
The tum akayle, thi aisi ghurbat
Na chaahne waale, Janaaze pe aaye
Dono jahaan, Ki thi fughaan
Imam Raza, Aasmaan ka, Rang badal gaya
Tan se ruhoo jab juda huwa
 
(Imam Raza, waris-e-quraan, markaz-e-imaan, jaan-e-man shaah-e-khurasaan)x2
 
3.     Aawmadam ay shaah panawham bideh
Khette amaawni zey gunawham bideh
Ay haramat mal jaw'edar mandegawn
Door marawn az daro rawham bideh
Imam Reza, eye gulle bikhaarey gulistaane ishq
Qorbe makawni chu giiyaham bideh
 
(Imam Raza, waris-e-quraan, markaz-e-imaan, jaan-e-man shaah-e-khurasaan)x2
 
4.     Ya noora mash’had, qabran bi toosi
Mutta shaheeda, shamsa-shumoosi
Nabqi alayka sayyidi, yabnar-rasoolil amjadi
Ruhi fidaak, raghma idaak
Imam reda, lil haqqi qur’an, anta alish-shaan
Yabna an-nabiyyil mustafal haadi
 
(Imam Raza, waris-e-quraan, markaz-e-imaan, jaan-e-man shaah-e-khurasaan)x2
 
5.     itna hai uncha, yeh dar tumhara
wohi bana hai, mera sahara
jab bhi parre mushkil, tumhe pukare dil
har hadisa, yun mit gaya
imam raza, aaj ho ya kal, karde bala hal
lab pe bus hai ye dua har pal
 
(Imam Raza, waris-e-quraan, markaz-e-imaan, jaan-e-man shaah-e-khurasaan)x2
 
6.     you travelled so far, away from your home
you met your death when, you were so alone
your sister searched for you, and passed away in Qum
oh Fatima, Al masuma
imam raza, She could never bear, To be anywhere
In the world without you being there
 
(Imam Raza, waris-e-quraan, markaz-e-imaan, jaan-e-man shaah-e-khurasaan)x2
 
7.     Laaw yeqqe vaasley to key man neestam 
 Ezn beyek lahzey nigawham bideh
Ay key hareemat masaley kahrowbawst
Shwqo sabowk kheeziye kawham bideh
Imam Reza, ta keze ishqe tu gudawzam chushaam (like sham marriage)
Garmiye jawn soowz be aawham bideh
 
(Imam Raza, waris-e-quraan, markaz-e-imaan, jaan-e-man shaah-e-khurasaan)x2
 
8.     Man zaara qabrak babul muraadi
Naalashafa’a ya abal jawadi
Sirrul imammati yash’hadi
Bil-mu’jizaati mukhalladi
Tashfil-aleel, ma’wad-dakheel
Imam Reda, lil insi wal-jaan, samawka sultaan
Yabna ar-rasoolil mustafal-haadi
 
(Imam Raza, waris-e-quraan, markaz-e-imaan, jaan-e-man shaah-e-khurasaan)x2

tracks.title: Bibi Zainab (SA) Rondhi (Punjabi)
tracks.lyrics:
(bibi zainab rondhi rehgayi, ae kon hai eda naa kya hai, ae savaal yazid karendha je) x2 bibi Zainab rondhi rehgayi
 
1.    uth uth ke mimbhar ton
ho cha ungli-ishare denda je
 
(bibi zainab rondhi rehgayi, ae kon hai eda naa kya hai, ae savaal yazid karendha je) x2 bibi Zainab rondhi rehgayi
 
2.    (rab jaarne kitne deen guzre, bibi zainab paarni peeta nai) x2
(hik beh koo(n) darbari) x2 bhar jaam sharaab paleyndha je
 
(bibi zainab rondhi rehgayi, ae kon hai eda naa kya hai, ae savaal yazid karendha je) x2 bibi Zainab rondhi rehgayi
 
3.    (ay shahi nay terey babey di, hurn kaidarn barnke aayi hai) x2
(kitthe veer abbas hai vi) x2 enj beghayrat jhirdakendha je
 
(bibi zainab rondhi rehgayi, ae kon hai eda naa kya hai, ae savaal yazid karendha je) x2 bibi Zainab rondhi rehgayi
 
4.    (thalle sirr shabbir musafir da, uthe takhat te zalim beytha haan) x2
(zulfaa(n) vich hatth paake) x2 gustakkhi naal halendha je
 
(bibi zainab rondhi rehgayi, ae kon hai eda naa kya hai, ae savaal yazid karendha je) x2 bibi Zainab rondhi rehgayi
 
5.    (hairaarn hai kyun na nikalgaya, sajaad da dam darbaar andar) x2
(kay vaari zainab koo(n)) x2 baagghi di bbhern saddenda je
 
(bibi zainab rondhi rehgayi, ae kon hai eda naa kya hai, ae savaal yazid karendha je) x2 bibi Zainab rondhi rehgayi
 
6.    (mere hatth paband vich rasiya(n) de, purdard nazaara lagda haan) x2
(Badmashaa koo(n) mangwaa) x2 har sern di vaal dikhendha je
 
(bibi zainab rondhi rehgayi, ae kon hai eda naa kya hai, ae savaal yazid karendha je) x2 bibi Zainab rondhi rehgayi
 
7.    (ik do ghantte di gaal nayi naushaad khardi rayi kayi ghhantte) x2
(koi na de baharn di jaa) x2 ee ho val val hukam surnenda je
 
(bibi zainab rondhi rehgayi, ae kon hai eda naa kya hai, ae savaal yazid karendha je) x2 bibi Zainab rondhi rehgayi

tracks.title: Ya Zainab (SA), Ya Abbas (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
1.     Kon aati hai akeli hai andhera
Jiska raakh se hai siyaah chehra
Jiske sar pe na bacha hai koi parda 
Aage barh rahi hai wo janib-e-darya
 
(Ya Zainab) x6
 
2.     Kya na pehchaana mujhko ay mere bhayya
Khaymo(n) ke dhuwe(n) se hai mu aabdida
dekho ghaur se Mei Hu zainab tumhaari
Tanha pehre pe khari hu leke neza
 
(Ya Abbas) x6
 
3.     Ay khuda na nikaalo aankho(n) se ye teer
Dekh na sakunga mei teri tasweer
Nange sar khari hai waris-e-tatheer
Maarte hai adu unko leke zanjeer
 
(Ya Zainab) x6
 
4.     Chaahti hu ke bataau(n) dukh hamarey
Par ye ddar hai ke ruk na jaayei(n) teri saansein
Sirf itna bataungi ay ghazi
Kaash bhaayi mere tum maare na jaate
 
(Ya Abbas) x6
 
5.     Hai sawaal lab pe mere ay meri behna 
Kiske sine pe ab soeygi Sakina 
Kon hoga Haaye haram ka aasra
Kon hoga bibiyo(n) KA zamin-e-parda
 
(Ya Zainab) x6
 
6.     Kistarha se batau(n) ye ay baraadar
Sorahi hai khaak par shaah ki dukhtar
Aag se JALGAYA hai uska saara tan
Shimr ne kenchliye kaano(n) se gauhar
 
(Ya Abbas) x6
 
7.     Mere bazu na kat’te agar ay dukhiya
Mei tujhe Shimr ke durro(n) se chupaata
Apni maa(n) ki qasam sheh ko mei bachaata
Qafela shaam mei Dar ba dar na phirta
 
(Ya Zainab) x6
 
8.     Saari umeedein thi tere bazuo(n) par
Na bacha tu na rahe qasim-o-akbar
Ho raha tha jab paa-e-maal laash-e-sarwar
Mei sada de rahi thi tujhko ro rokar
 
(Ya Abbas) x6
 
9.     Mei yahi dekh ke hu(n) bohot sharminda
Aag ki bu se bhari hai teri abaa
Zakhmo(n) se surkh hai jo badan tumhara
Dekh ke haal tera haste hai aada
 
(Ya Zainab) x6
 
10.Ay Tejani thi yahi zainab ki fughaa(n)
Mere ghazi tere bazu pe hu(n) qurbaa(n)
Rehgaye HEIN haram be sar-o-samaa(n)
Alvida bhayya mere jaati hu(n) zindaa(n)

tracks.title: Oh Furat (English)
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Abbas) x7
 
As I see my reflection in you, I would take death or pain 
I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
1.    when I hold you in my palms 
my soul and my heart break 
as I see the children's face 
my two hands begin to shake 
I hear the cries of Al atash  
they are calling out my name 
I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
As I see my reflection in you, I would take death or pain 
I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
2.    my parched lips will stay dry 
despite three days of thirst 
until all of the children drink 
I won't drink a drop first 
In you I can just see their face 
my grief I cannot contain 
I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
As I see my reflection in you, I would take death or pain 
I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
3.    Throughout all Arabia 
I am known for my loyalty 
my name is the one called 
when there is a difficulty 
my heart can never bear 
To see anyone in pain 
I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
As I see my reflection in you, I would take death or pain 
I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
4.    Look at me I am the result 
of the prayers of ali 
my eyes did not open until  
my master hussain held me  
from the moment that I was born 
this has been my life's aim 
I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
As I see my reflection in you, I would take death or pain 
I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
5.    with one mission I have been sent 
towards the battlefield 
to bring water back and 
for my sword not to weild 
my master gave me this command 
and in his love I am insane 
 I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
As I see my reflection in you, I would take death or pain 
I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
6.    all my dreams and all of my hopes 
belong in that water flask  
if that ever gets pierced 
it will be the end of abbas 
I will not return to the tents 
because of the guilt and shame
I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
As I see my reflection in you, I would take death or pain 
I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
7.    an arrow is deep in my eye 
I have lost both of my hands 
the flask is clutched to my teeth as 
you spill out upon the sands 
I fall onto the ground upon 
my face from the horses reins 
I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
As I see my reflection in you, I would take death or pain 
I just want to get you, to the children of husain 
(Oh Furat) x3
 
8.    As it brushed against his skin
To Abbas the water replied
Through you my name will be known
We will stay side by side
 so that I can kiss your feet 
In honour as your slave
for all of eternity 
I will circle your grave
(Oh Abbas) x3

tracks.title: Har Aza Khaane
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya hussain, ya hussain) x4
 
(Har azaa khane me hai matam bapaa Shabbir ka) x2
 
1.     (Hai zami(n) se asman tak) x2 tazkira Shabbir ka
 
(Har azaa khane me hai matam bapaa Shabbir ka) x2
 
2.     (Asre ashoora jab aayi rehgaye tanha Hussain) x2
(Ik behen thi saath me) x2 sarpar khuda Shabbir ka
 
(Har azaa khane me hai matam bapaa Shabbir ka) x2
 
3.     (Hur chalaa jataa tha dozakh ki taraf dora huwa) x2
(Phir achanak milgaya) x2 tha raasta Shabbir ka
 
(Har azaa khane me hai matam bapaa Shabbir ka) x2
 
4.     (Bujh gaya suraj yazidi fawj ka ik roz me) x2
(Jal raha hai aaj tak) x2 lekin diya Shabbir ka
 
(Har azaa khane me hai matam bapaa Shabbir ka) x2
 
5.     (Koyi roye ya na roye uski ye taqdir hai) x2
(Khud Muhammad parh rahe hai) x2 marsiya Shabbir ka
 
(Har azaa khane me hai matam bapaa Shabbir ka) x2
 
6.     (Ay falak tu hi bataa ye zayre khanjar kon hai) x2
(Ye Muhammad ka galaa hai) x2 ya galaa Shabbir ka
 
(Har azaa khane me hai matam bapaa Shabbir ka) x2
 
7.     (Teen din ki pyaas me laashe uthaye kis qadar) x2
(Sabr dekho zabt dekho) x2 hosla Shabbir ka
 
(Har azaa khane me hai matam bapaa Shabbir ka) x2
 
8.     (Tu bataa shame ghariba(n) baade shahe karbala) x2
(Khanaaye kaabaa jalaa ya) x2 ghar jalaa Shabbir ka
 
(Har azaa khane me hai matam bapaa Shabbir ka) x2
 
9.     (Khof kya "Rehan" usko hashr ke hangaam se) x2
(Jisko bachpan se rahaa) x2 ho aasra "Shabbir" ka
 
(Har azaa khane me hai matam bapaa Shabbir ka) x2

tracks.title: The Lesson (English)
tracks.lyrics:
Oh my beloved child, I’ve spent my whole life in wait
For you to arrive as a gift from the Ahlulbayt (AS)
So from this day forward I make this vow
That I’ll raise you such that you’ll make them proud
 
(This is the lesson we’ll teach our children, Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain) x2
 
1.     show love to all of humanity
help those within your community
and in their times of difficulty
stand by your brothers with unity
help those who need you when they're in trouble
