your masters message is universal
Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain
 
(This is the lesson we’ll teach our children, Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain) x2
 
2.     always make sure Allah is pleased
when you're in trouble say Ya ali
and send Allah's blessings upon
muhammed and, his family
this is the key to success in your life
and follow this path towards paradise
Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain
 
(This is the lesson we’ll teach our children, Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain) x2
 
3.     one day we'll walk to Karbala
where millions will join us from afar
at the door of maula ali
our journey will start inshallah
like lady zainab we will do the walk
with tears in our eyes to him we will flock
Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain
 
(This is the lesson we’ll teach our children, Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain) x2
 
4.     if you go to the door of abbas
with wishes in your heart and you ask
babul hawaij will listen and
your prayers will be fulfilled so fast
you will never go back empty handed
and all of your wishes will be granted
Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain
 
(This is the lesson we’ll teach our children, Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain) x2
 
5.     before you drink water you should say
Salaam upon you imam husain
before a drop touches your lips
never forget his thirst and pain
remember ali Asghar with sorrow
Whose thirst was quenched with a three pronged arrow
Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain
 
(This is the lesson we’ll teach our children, Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain) x2
 
6.     Aun and Muhammed look what they gave
like them you should.. also behave
don't be afraid to stand for what's right
you're never too young to be brave
listen to me my daughters and my sons
always be strong in your heart my lions
Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain
 
(This is the lesson we’ll teach our children, Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain) x2
 
7.     remember the imam of your time
for him may your life be sacrificed
rocking the cradle through the night
to you I sing this lullaby
in every action, intention and deed
always prepare for your maula mehdi
Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain
 
(This is the lesson we’ll teach our children, Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain) x2
 
8.     there is no honour that is so great
than serving the holy Ahlulbayt
tejani brothers for this we pray
that our children are blessed with this fate
may this live on in ar generations
to spread your mission in every nation
Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain
 
(This is the lesson we’ll teach our children, Oh Hussain, Oh Hussain) x2
 
This is our message to ISIS and all the terrorists
We’ll teach our children to love all of humanity
Though they are kids they’ll break your aim
And make you bow your head in shame
You will not kill, you will not maim
You will not hurt in our name

tracks.title: Maaf Karna
tracks.lyrics:
Jab aseeran-e-karbala qayd se rihaa hokar Karbala ponchey, to Bibi Zainab ne apne bhaayi ki qabr-e-mutahhar par girya karte huwe kaha, ke ay mere maa-jaaye, ham teri Sakina ko sham ke Zindaan mei chor aaye hain, aur teri behen tujhse sharminda hai. Mujhe maaf karna bhaayi, mujhe maaf karna
 
(chhord kar aayi hun, Zindaan mei sakina ko, Maaf karna mujhe , maaf karna) x2
 
1.     maqtale karbobala mei hai
behen nawhagar
Maaf karna mujhe, Maaf karna 


(chhord kar aayi hun, Zindaan mei sakina ko, Maaf karna mujhe , maaf karna) x2
 
2.     guzri maasum pe kuchh aisi musibat bhayya
Maut mei dhhal gayi Bachi ki naqaahat bhayya
khoke pardes mei ayi hun amaanat bhayya
iski tanhaayi pe phat ta hai mera qablo jigar
Maaf karna mujhe, Maaf karna 


(chhord kar aayi hun, Zindaan mei sakina ko, Maaf karna mujhe , maaf karna) x2
 
3.     Pursa lo apni Sakina ka meray maa jaey 
Jisko armaan tha usko hi nahin la paaey 
Ghar chalo kehti rahi aakhri dum tak haaey 
Usko behlaati rahi jaldi chalengay hum ghar
Maaf karna mujhe, Maaf karna 


(chhord kar aayi hun, Zindaan mei sakina ko, Maaf karna mujhe , maaf karna) x2
 
4.     dil ko bechayn kiye deti hain uski yaaden
hum aseeron ki zubaano pe hai uski baaten
yaad mei uski guzarti nahi apni raatein
uski tasveer phirakarti hai ankhon mei magar
Maaf karna mujhe, Maaf karna 


(chhord kar aayi hun, Zindaan mei sakina ko, Maaf karna mujhe , maaf karna) x2
 
5.     bhayi jaa(n) kuchh to kaho seene mei dil hai betaab
bibiyan qabron pe baythi hain bachhashme poor aab
ghashh paghashh khati hain besheer ki turbat pe rabaab
kuchh to bolo unhe sumjhaaun bhhalaa kya kehkar
Maaf karna mujhe, Maaf karna 


(chhord kar aayi hun, Zindaan mei sakina ko, Maaf karna mujhe , maaf karna) x2
 
 
6.     kaun pardes mei hai qabr pe jaane vaalaa
kaun hai shaam dhalle shamma jalaane vaalaa
koi humdard nahi gham ka battane vaalaa
mere maajaae bohot khaai hai humne thokar
Maaf karna mujhe, Maaf karna 


(chhord kar aayi hun, Zindaan mei sakina ko, Maaf karna mujhe , maaf karna) x2
 
7.     bhaijaan apko bhejja hai sakina ne Salam
apne ammu ke liye hai ye bhhatiji ka payaam
bhujjh gai pyaas shikaayat ka nahi koi kalaam
paani ke vaaste sharminda hai ammu kyun kar
Maaf karna mujhe, Maaf karna 


(chhord kar aayi hun, Zindaan mei sakina ko, Maaf karna mujhe , maaf karna) x2
 
8.     Ziyaarat e Naahiya mein kartay hain yeh noha Imam 
Haey us neelgoo(n) rukhsar par ho mera salaam 
Rang sayli sey badaltay rahay jiskay taa Shaam 
Mehdi e Deen ko rulaata hai ussi gham ka asar 
Maaf karna mujhe, Maaf karna 


(chhord kar aayi hun, Zindaan mei sakina ko, Maaf karna mujhe , maaf karna) x2
 
9.     Shaam kay takht par baitha tha yazeed (LA) e azlam 
Imtehaan aapki ulfat ka liya tha jis dam 
Rakhliya paalne vaaly ney muhabbat ka bharam 
Voh tarapney lagi daaman mein liey aapka sar 
Maaf karna mujhe, Maaf karna 


(chhord kar aayi hun, Zindaan mei sakina ko, Maaf karna mujhe , maaf karna) x2
 
10.Nanhi sey jaa(n) ney uthaee hai jafaaein kya kya 
Ik sharaabi ney kaneezi kay liey jab maanga 
Mera  Sajjad bhi ghairat sey lahu rou diya tha 
Bari hasrat sey humay dekh rahi thi muztar 
Maaf karna mujhe, Maaf karna 


(chhord kar aayi hun, Zindaan mei sakina ko, Maaf karna mujhe , maaf karna) x2
 
11.Meri khuddaar Sakina ney yehi mujhse kaha 
Aey Phuppi jab meray Baba ko kafan milna saka 
Yeh phatta kurta mera hoga kafan behr-e-Khuda 
Khoon bharay kurtay mein hai dafan meri khasta jigar 
Maaf karna mujhe, Maaf karna 


(chhord kar aayi hun, Zindaan mei sakina ko, Maaf karna mujhe , maaf karna) x2
 
12.Aey Nigaar aaj bhi hai Shaam misaal e Zindaa(n) 
Maqtal e Karbobala mein wahi faryaad o fughaan 
Kijiey nohay mein Tejani ussi gham ka bayaan 
Aaj bhi kehti ho(n) jaisay yehi Zainab rokar

tracks.title: Labbayk Ya Maula
tracks.lyrics:
Maula, maula, maula, maula mere
 
Dil ke sultaan, tu hai Quraan
Jism-o-jaan, tujhpe qurbaan
Hai yak zabaa(n), ehl-e-imaan
 
Maula, maula, maula, maula mere
 
Ye khoo(n) mei racha basaa ishq-e-ali hi hai, jo har aan labo(n) par eik hi sada hai, (labbayk yam aula) x3
 
Awwaluna Muhammad, awsatuna Muhammad, akhiruna Muhammad, kulluna Muhammad
 
(Labbayk ya maula ya maula ya maula) x4
*Ali ya ali*
1.    Dood mei ishqe ali maan ne pilaya hai hume
aur phir naade ali pardhna sikhaya hai hume
ddar kabhi ayega na humko na aya hai hume
Maut se jeetna karbal ne bataya hai hume
zindagi dena hai sadiyon se humara shheva
ishqe haider mei bahayenge lahu ka darya
Jaan apni hai nisaar, zindagi tujhpe fida
Maut jab aaye hume, lab pe hogi ye sada
 
(Labbayk ya maula ya maula ya maula) x4
 
*Ali ya Ali*
2.    Humko hai fakhr ke kehlaate hain hum tere Shia
daste haider ko utha kar ye nabi ne tha kaha
jiska main maula hun uska hai ali bhi maula
aur koi hai nahi pehla issi haidar ke siwa
wo bhardak jaate hain jo karte hain unse nafrat
jo bhi haq mante hain milti hai unko jannat
Jaan apni hai nisaar, zindagi tujhpe fida
Maut jab aaye hume, lab pe hogi ye sada
 
(Labbayk ya maula ya maula ya maula) x4
 
*Hussain Sarallah*
3.    asre ashur ka hai yaad abhi tak manzar
rukgaya sheh ka badan teeron ke musalle par
shimr ahista chalata tha gale par khanjar
khayme se dekh ke roti thi ali ki dukhtar
ran me pamaal huwa ghordo ke tapo(n) se badan
apne khun se mere maula ne sajaya tha ban
Jaan apni hai nisaar, zindagi tujhpe fida
Maut jab aaye hume, lab pe hogi ye sada
 
(Labbayk ya maula ya maula ya maula) x4
 
*Hussain Sarallah*
4.    khu(n) me aaluda kharda maula sare dashte qitaal
deke halmin ki sada humse ye pucha tha sawaal
zindagi apni bitaasakte ho tum meri misaal
dete hain hum ye sada aapko Zahra ke laal
aap ka ishq humara hi sahaaraa hoga
hashr tak lab pe musalsal yahi naaraa hoga
Jaan apni hai nisaar, zindagi tujhpe fida
Maut jab aaye hume, lab pe hogi ye sada
 
(Labbayk ya maula ya maula ya maula) x4
 
*Ghazi ya Abbas*
5.    aaj tak sheh ka alaamdare wafa wo abbas
tishnalab bachhon ka saqqa jo raha wo abbas
neharr pe jisne alam gardh diya wo abbas
jiske bazu bibi zainab ki rida wo abbas
hubahu haidere karaar hai ye shere jari
bibi ne jiskeliye dil se dua mangi thi
Jaan apni hai nisaar, zindagi tujhpe fida
Maut jab aaye hume, lab pe hogi ye sada
 
(Labbayk ya maula ya maula ya maula) x4
 
*Ghazi ya Abbas*
6.    jaata hai jo bhi ziyarat ke liye karbobala
uska banjaata hai zamin maula Abbas mera
koi mushkil ya pareshaani ho ya ho khattra
sar pe har waqt hifazat ka rahega sayaa
aaj tak hai jo kardha sheh ka muhaffiz bankar
rubaru roza hai phir bhi wo jhukata hai sar
Jaan apni hai nisaar, zindagi tujhpe fida
Maut jab aaye hume, lab pe hogi ye sada
 
(Labbayk ya maula ya maula ya maula) x4
 
*Ali ya Sajjad*
7.    qayd khane mei pardi hai ye aza ki bunyaad
pehli majlis bapa karwate hain aise sajaad
khun ke aansu ko bahate hain juhin karke yaad
paaon mei berdiyan aur lab pe hai bus ik faryaad
sar ko wo peet ke chillate hain ash shaam ash shaam
hosh urrhjata hai jab sunte hain shabbir ka naam
Jaan apni hai nisaar, zindagi tujhpe fida
Maut jab aaye hume, lab pe hogi ye sada
 
(Labbayk ya maula ya maula ya maula) x4
 
*Al-ajal ya Mahdi*
8.    subho shaam bhejhte hain tere muhib tumpe Salam
aur dua karte hain ho jald zahoor mere imaam
zulm aur jaur zamaane mei huwa hai ab aam
aapko zalimon ko dena hai unka anjaam
kaash hum apke ansaaron mei bhi ho shaamil
zindagi ka hai ye maqsad hai humari manzil
Jaan apni hai nisaar, zindagi tujhpe fida
Maut jab aaye hume, lab pe hogi ye sada
 
(Labbayk ya maula ya maula ya maula) x4
 
*Al-ajal ya Mahdi*
9.    momino ke liye to farshe aza hai jannat
kabhi na kehna azadari ko hargiz bid'at
Rona Shabbir pe hai pyaare Nabi ki sunnat
munkire shah kyun karte hain aza se nafrat
haa(n) tejani dile zahra ki dua hai girya
akhri saans talak pardhte rahenge nawha
Jaan apni hai nisaar, zindagi tujhpe fida
Maut jab aaye hume, lab pe hogi ye sada
 
(Labbayk ya maula ya maula ya maula) x4

tracks.title: Forever
tracks.lyrics:
Hussain, Hussain, Hussain
 
Ever place on this earth
This whole universe
Will remember your name
 
You're immortalised
'Cause you sacrificed
Everything that you loved for His sake
 
Ya Hussain, ya Hussain
 
Forever your call
Will live in our soul
Our every beat and every breath
every moment every step
Will be Ya Hussain
 
1. This is our promise to you Hussain
We will remember your grief and pain
Your sacrifices are not in vain
Your message lives on until today
Forever this world
Will call out your name
The cry from all of humanity
In every street in every city
Will be Ya Hussain
 
Forever your call
Will live in our soul
Our every beat and every breath
every moment every step
Will be Ya Hussain
 
2. You stood against thirty thousand men
You were alone in that barren land
Your blood was splattered across the plains
And purified every grain of sand
Forever that land
Is liberated
Where millions flock to see your shrine
The chants on their lips all the time
Will be Ya Hussain
 
Forever your call
Will live in our soul
Our every beat and every breath
every moment every step
Will be Ya Hussain
 
3. Hussain you taught us the way of life
You showed it to us through sacrifice
Your final stand and your final cries
Those moments were witnessed by the skies
Forever we will
Remember your day
It is a day that's like no other
The name the skies will cry forever
Will be Ya Hussain
 
Forever your call
Will live in our soul
Our every beat and every breath
every moment every step
Will be Ya Hussain
 
4. The figure heads we look to today
They all take lessons from you Hussain
whoever struggles against injustice
The fight is theirs but you lead the way
Forever safe guard
And stand for your rights
These are the traits we’ve learnt from you
The meaning of honour and truth
Will be Ya Hussain
 
Forever your call
Will live in our soul
Our every beat and every breath
every moment every step
Will be Ya Hussain
 
5. We say Hussain and we’re filled with hope
Your name enlightens our very soul
There will be a day this world will know
Who is Hussain and what is his goal
Forever living
Your revolution
your legacy shall never die
The movement that will always thrive
Will be Ya Hussain
 
Forever your call
Will live in our soul
Our every beat and every breath
every moment every step
Will be Ya Hussain
 
6. We are the people that are oppressed
Because in your grief we beat our chest
They call us "Rafidh" but they forget
That Fatima prays for our health
Forever we shall
remember your grief
And even if we’re faced with death
The only name on our breath
Will be Ya Hussain
 
Forever your call
Will live in our soul
Our every beat and every breath
every moment every step
Will be Ya Hussain
 
7. We are awaiting the 12th Hussain
When he we will reappear again
He will raise the standard of Abbas
And looking to us he will proclaim
Forever your reign
Shall always remain
And falsehood by nature should fail
the proof to us that truth prevails
Will be Ya Hussain
 
Forever your call
Will live in our soul
Our every beat and every breath
every moment every step
Will be Ya Hussain

tracks.title: Kiye Abbas (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
(Bayne hamaye ishqaaye duniya) x2
Ishq ast abal fazl
 
(Pur-e-alavi fatah-e-dilha) x2
(Ishq ast abal fazl) x2
 
(Maula maula maula maula Abal Fazl) x4
 
1. Ustade nabar da maidan
Bar jism-e-hame alam jan,
Bar takht-e-daleeri Sultan,
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
Az bad-eye-Mardi seeraab,
Qursay-e-qamar alam taab,
Ghanji-e-nayye ishq-e-nayab,
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
Masnad-e-dilawariro sahibe,
Safshikan-e-lashkar-e-maharibe,
Janga war-e-beeharif hast chunkioo
(Puraay 'Ali Ibn-e-Ali Talibaayy) x2


(Ya Abal fazl) x4
(Maula maula maula maula Abal Fazl) x4
 
2. Ay qalb-e-Ali ke armaan
Ay bazu-e-sayyed-e-zeeshaan
Ho aap pe ye jaa(n) qurbaan
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
Maydaan mei saare shaytaan
Tujhe dekh ke hote hai hayraan
Ay sheyr-e-jari-e-yazdaan
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
Tujhpe to Sakina ko naaz hai
Kyun ke tu wafaaon mei faraaz hai
Tu to sheyr-e-haider ka raaz hai
(Sab ke lab pe yahi awaaz hai) x2

(Maula maula maula maula Abal Fazl) x4
 
3. The mirror image of haider
The meaning of honour and valor
You grant every wish and prayer
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
The warrior like no other,
The one that Hussain called brother
You'll be in our hearts forever
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
This is testament to what you gave
That the water circles your holy grave
If our hearts are troubled or in pain
(We look to your flag and call your name) x2


(Ya Abal fazl) x4
(Maula maula maula maula Abal Fazl) x4
 
4. Jaa' al-'Abbas ul-mughwaar
Asad ubnu 'Ali il-karrar
Bil-'harbi kasayfin battaar
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
Harab al-'askary thummah'taar
sayfahu ah'raqahum bin-naar
Mawtun burkaanun washraar
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
Nurullahi nurullahith-thaaqibi
Laythullahi laythullahil-ghalibi
Thaairun lil haqqi mut'aalibi
(Hadhal 'Abbas ubnu Abi T'aalibi) x2

(Maula maula maula maula Abal Fazl) x4
 
5. Wadhi-e-Adab ra Ustad,
Dar baagh-e-wilayat shemshad,
Un ki dilay voo shud abaad,
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
Dar she'r-e-hamasay deewaan,
Paband-e-be ahdo paiman,
Dar bahr-e-shuja'at 'tufaan...
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
Awje hame zebaee ha ruye ust
Rang-e-shebe seene yegi suye Ust,
Teeghay oo saaniye zulfiqaar-e-haq,
(Aseman dar lahzaye hu hu ye Ust) x2
 
(Ya Abal fazl) x4
(Maula maula maula maula Abal Fazl) x4
 
6. Ay alam bardaar-e-Hussaini
Sab bibiyo(n) ki zindagaani
Zimmedaar-e-mashq-o-pani
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
Bazu ki di hai qurbaani
Aur jism se khu(n) ki rawaani
Chillayi ye Zahra saani
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
Jhuk gayi thi tab sheh ki kamar
Jab gira huwa tha tu khaak par
Bole roke haaye wo nawhagar
(Mera ghazi tu hai mera jigar) x2


(Ya Abal fazl) x4
(Maula maula maula maula Abal Fazl) x4
 
7. You were lady zainabs protector
And You were the army's commandeer
You stood as the standard bearer
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
You mastered the art of combat
The whole of Arabia knew that
No one had the skills that you had
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
When you stood against the enemies
You broke through their lines with so much ease
With the Blood of Ali running through your veins
(Sacrificed your two arms for Hussain) x2
 
(Maula maula maula maula Abal Fazl) x4
 
Kashafal-kuffaru 'anil maa'
Kash-shamsi tujlidh-dhalmaa'
Ghadaruhu ghadraj-jubnaa
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
Qat'au kaffay hil-a'daa'
Khaddaba jabhatahu bi dimaa'
Wa hussainun qad sama'a nidaa'
Kiye kiye kiye Abbaseh
Noora 'ayni noora 'ayni ya Hussain
S'aabu 'ayni s'aabu 'ayni ya Hussain
Thaairun lil haqqi mut'aalibi
(Hadhal 'Abbas ubnu Abi T'aalibi) x2
 
(Ya Abal fazl) x4
(Maula maula maula maula Abal Fazl) x4

tracks.title: Hal min nasireen
tracks.lyrics:
Assalaamu ala-shayb il-khadeeb
Assalamu alal khaddit-tareeb
Assalaamu alal badanis-saleeb
 
Kehta hai Zahra ka beta, Halmin nasirin yansurna
Halmin nasirin yansurna, Halmin nasirin yansurna
 
Halmin nasirin yansurna, Halmin nasirin yansurna
Karbal se aati hai sada, Halmin nasirin yansurna
 
1.     Auno Mohammed paas nahi hai, Qasim ka lasha hai tukre
Bazu kata ke mera ghazi, sogaya hai dariya ke kinare
Ghurbat mei thi sheh ki sada, halmin nasirin yansurna
 
Halmin nasirin yansurna, Halmin nasirin yansurna
Karbal se aati hai sada, Halmin nasirin yansurna
 
2.     Dekho zaeefi ran mei sheh ki, baap hai burha beta jawaa(n) hai
Laasha-e-akbar kaise uthaaye, kitna kathan ye imtihaa(n) hai
Kaandhe pe rakh ke sheh ne kaha, halmin nasirin yansurna
 
Halmin nasirin yansurna, Halmin nasirin yansurna
Karbal se aati hai sada, Halmin nasirin yansurna
 
3.     umm-e-rabaab ke ab khayme mei, Sheh ne dekha shor bapa hai
Khud ko giraake jhule se wo, gutniyo pe ab chalne laga hai
Asghar ne jab sunli sada, halmin nasirin yansurna
 
Halmin nasirin yansurna, Halmin nasirin yansurna
Karbal se aati hai sada, Halmin nasirin yansurna
 
4.     Haath mei asghar ka laasha hai, Par nahi hai taqat paawo(n) mei
Kaise dikhaaye laash ye maa(n) ko, paala tha wo jisne chaawo(n) mei
Aage barhe dekar ye sada, halmin nasirin yansurna
 
Halmin nasirin yansurna, Halmin nasirin yansurna
Karbal se aati hai sada, Halmin nasirin yansurna
 
5.     Jhalti zamee(n) par shaah pare hai, shimr sawaar hai ab sine par
Sukhi zabaa(n) hai garm hawa hai, garden pe chalta hai khanjar
Ik ik zarb pe sheh ne kaha, halmin nasirin yansurna
 
Halmin nasirin yansurna, Halmin nasirin yansurna
Karbal se aati hai sada, Halmin nasirin yansurna
 
6.     Khayme jhalaaye ghar ko lutaaye, cheeni hai sab zalim ne chadar
Jaaye kahaan ghayrat ke maare, sehme khare hai aal-e-payambar
Kehti hai zainab beparda, halmin nasirin yansurna
 
Halmin nasirin yansurna, Halmin nasirin yansurna
Karbal se aati hai sada, Halmin nasirin yansurna
 
7.     Kitne sitam sajjad ne jhele, durre lagte the aur patthar
Haath pass-e-gardan to bande the, dekh ke abid bole rokar
Ghazi ka sar fauq-e-neza, halmin nasirin yansurna
 
Halmin nasirin yansurna, Halmin nasirin yansurna
Karbal se aati hai sada, Halmin nasirin yansurna
 
8.     Karbal mei ashur ka din tha, Zainab Khayme ke dar pe khari thi
Bhaayi ko zibha hote huwe wo, ankho(n) se dekhti haaye “Tejani”
Boli hazeen-e-karbobala, halmin nasirin yansurna
 
Halmin nasirin yansurna, Halmin nasirin yansurna
Halmin nasirin yansurna, Halmin nasirin yansurna
Karbal se aati hai sada, Halmin nasirin yansurna

tracks.title: Final Embrace
tracks.lyrics:
No matter what trials I face
The memory won’t be erased
Oh father, the final embrace
No matter what trials I face
The memory won’t be erased
Oh father, the final embrace
 
1. In the desert where you would die
We cried in each others arms
Forever we would be apart
‘cause my fate would be the prison of Shaam
We both will be bloodied and bruised
 And buried without a shroud
The only difference is
I will have no loved ones around
A dark and secluded jail
Is my ultimate resting place
Oh father, the final embrace
 
No matter what trials I face
The memory won’t be erased
Oh father, the final embrace
I’ll never forget that day
Or the moment that we parted ways
Oh father, the final embrace
 
2. I crawled on my hands and knees
And clung onto your horses hooves
I cried and I pleaded with him
To stay still and not to move
Please don’t take my father away
I can’t sleep without his chest
He has been left all alone
Please don’t take him to his death
He is broken and wounded
and thirsty for many days
Oh father, the final embrace
 
No matter what trials I face
The memory won’t be erased
Oh father, the final embrace
I’ll never forget that day
Or the moment that we parted ways
Oh father, the final embrace
 
3. You mean everything to me
The best father that can be
Whenever I would bed asleep 
I would see you in my dreams
You'd catch me when I would fall
You'd come running when I'd call
I'd always sleep on your chest
Oh father do you recall?
Now watching you my heart breaks
When I see the tears on your face
Oh father, the final embrace
 
No matter what trials I face
The memory won’t be erased
Oh father, the final embrace
I’ll never forget that day
Or the moment that we parted ways
Oh father, the final embrace
 
4. I have lost so much today
I've seen everyone get slayed
I can't bear to lose you too
Oh my father please just stay
I will trouble you no more
I will sleep upon the floor
Please stay with me I implore
You know that I'm only four
You know that this is no age
To leave me without a trace
Oh father, the final embrace
 
No matter what trials I face
The memory won’t be erased
Oh father, the final embrace
I’ll never forget that day
Or the moment that we parted ways
Oh father, the final embrace
 
5. You got off your horse and smiled
then opened your arms to me
I ran into your embrace
And held you so lovingly
I said if you have to go
I have got one last request
For only a little while
Please let me sleep on your chest
You laid on the burning sands
Without uttering a phrase
Oh father, the final embrace
 
No matter what trials I face
The memory won’t be erased
Oh father, the final embrace
I’ll never forget that day
Or the moment that we parted ways
Oh father, the final embrace
 
6. I placed my head on your chest
And as my eyes shut I saw
A lady dressed all in black
She cried out let my son go
He may cradle you right now
But soon I will cradle him
When he falls from that great height
 And brutally will be killed
I got off immediately
With tears in my eyes I said
Oh father the final embrace
 
No matter what trials I face
The memory won’t be erased
Oh father, the final embrace
I’ll never forget that day
Or the moment that we parted ways
Oh father, the final embrace
 
7. You told me to make you proud
As we said our last goodbyes
You told my trials and woes
And onto your horse you climbed
you rode into the distance
My eyes fixed on your silhouette
And when you fell off I heard
The dagger on your pure neck
They threw your head in my laps
In the night of the displaced
Oh father, the final embrace
 
No matter what trials I face
The memory won’t be erased
Oh father, the final embrace
I’ll never forget that day
Or the moment that we parted ways
Oh father, the final embrace
 
8. In the palace your pure head
Was placed on the balcony
Let’s see how strong your love is
The tyrant said mockingly      
With my tiny hands in chains
I opened them out to you
Your head came into my arms
And no one knew what to do
I smiled lovingly at you
And placed my cheeks on your face
Oh father, the final embrace
 
No matter what trials I face
The memory won’t be erased
Oh father, the final embrace
I’ll never forget that day
Or the moment that we parted ways
Oh father, the final embrace
 
9. The dark nights of the prison
A place I will not forget
In my final moments there
I missed you so much and wept
To silence my endless cries
Your killers returned your head
I held your head to my chest
I then shut my eyes and slept
My heart finally at peace
I never awoke again
Oh father, the final embrace

tracks.title: Trials of a father
tracks.lyrics:
(My son where are you I cant see, My vision has deserted me) x2
 
1.     Did I raise you for this day, to see you drowned in blood
This is the ultimate test of a Fathers love
A spear in your chest, your final anguished cries
My heart is filled with grief, oh Apple of my eyes
 
(My son where are you I cant see, My vision has deserted me) x2
 
2.     I hear your final cries, to you I try to come
I stumble and I fall, each time I try to run
Crawling across the sand upon my hands and knees
Your father's on his way, my son just wait for me
 
(My son where are you I cant see, My vision has deserted me) x2
 
3.     These hands upon your chest, what do you hide from me
Is it that you have pain, or a wound from which you bleed
Please let your father help you in your time of need
And move your hands away from there so I can see


(My father don’t look down too far, A spear's deep inside my heart) x2
 
4.     The skies are witnessing beneath the scorching sun
A broken father looks down at his dying son
Their bodies trembling, with tears in their eyes
And they embrace one last time as they say goodbye
 
(My father don’t look down too far, A spear's deep inside my heart) x2
 
5.     Father avert your eyes how can you stand to see
You know that there's a spear broken inside of me
This hand of mine is trying to hide my fatal wound
it's time I know my soul will be departing soon


(My father don’t look down too far, A spear's deep inside my heart) x2
 
6.     I will take any pain your pain I cannot see
This wound will hurt you more, more than its hurting me
But I cannot say no father to your request
My life belongs to you, I know that you know best


(My lord this is my sacrifice, My sons dying before my eyes) x2
 
7.     one knee upon the ground, one knee upon his chest
upon a broken spear, my trembling hands rest
his arm around my neck, his hand upon my hand
I beg for patience for this test that I withstand


(My lord this is my sacrifice, My sons dying before my eyes) x2
 
8.     Looking towards najaf, I cry out Ya Ali
The test of Khayber was nothing compared to this
I pull upon the spear taking a deep breath in
In my hand his bleeding heart, my son no longer lives

tracks.title: 12 strikes
tracks.lyrics:
Zainab stands there and looks on at Hussain
Upon arrows, Hussain lays there
He cries and says turn your face away
You won't be able to bear my pain
 
12 strikes to the neck of Hussain
As his soul departs he looks up and says
Oh Allah I gave you everything that I have
If I had to, I'd do it again
 
1. Hussain looks into his killer's eyes
As he sits on his chest with a blunted knife
He takes the knife to the throat of Hussain
He hacks away at his neck again and again
He pulls Hussain by his bloodied beard
With the blood of Hussain his face is smeared
He laughs and says that your end is near
But Hussain says I have never feared
 
12 strikes to the neck of Hussain
As his soul departs he looks up and says
Oh Allah I gave you everything that I have
If I had to, I'd do it again
 
2. The blazing sun, three days of thirst
Not a drop of water for any of us
I saw my six-month old in such distress
Drifting in and out of consciousness
In the grief of my son I lost my sight
I crawled on the sands to be by his side
I will never forget his final cries
As I pulled that spear from his insides
 
12 strikes to the neck of Hussain
As his soul departs he looks up and says
Oh Allah I gave you everything that I have
If I had to, I'd do it again
 
3. A voice is heard around these plains
As a lady embraces the head of Hussain
She cries aloud, puts her neck on his head
I'm his mother cut my neck instead
It's the final strike and Hussain's last breath
He thanks Allah as he meets his death
Lady Zahra cries with a broken heart
As the head and the body come apart

tracks.title: Ya Makhduma ya Fizza (SA)
tracks.lyrics:
(Shaam, shaam, shaam, shaam) x2                                                                 
(Ham ko bhi sikha, adab-e-wafa) x2
tujhe Zainab ka wasta
 
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x2
 
1.     Jitne zainab ke dil pe ghuzre hai,
Gham wo sab tune bhi uthaaye hai,
Tere bhi sar se chhin gayi chadar,
Tune bhi taaziyane khaye hai
 
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x2
 
2.     Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda,
Zainab ne tujhko maa kahaa
Tera bohot hai martaba
 
Ya makhduma ya fizza
 
3.     Jis ghari sheh pe chal rahi thi chhuri,
Teri halat bayaa(n) se bahar thi,
Teri ankho(n) se khun jaari tha,
Kehti thi ayiye madad ko ali
 
Ya makhduma ya fizza
 
4.     Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda,
Maa banke har shaheed ka,
Matam kiya hai marhaba
 
Ya makhduma ya fizza
 
5.     Tu kaneeze batool hai bibi,
Tu duaae rasul hai bibi,
Tu hai ehle azaa ki shahzaadi,
Farshe gham ka tu phool hai bibi
 
Ya makhduma ya fizza
 
6.     Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda,
Tu bhi agar kare duwa,
Ttal jaaye sarse har balaa
 
Ya makhduma ya fizza
 
7.     Waasta tujhko khune asgher ka
Waasta shahe dee(n) ki dukhtar ka
Humko amno amaa(n) ki dawlat de
Waasta fatema ka haider ka
 
Ya makhduma ya fizza
 
8.     Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda,
Maqrooz momineen ka,
Hojoye karz bhi adaa
 
Ya makhduma ya fizza
 
9.     Wo jo be ghar hai unko ghar dede,
Be pisar maao ko pisar dede,
Jinke aangan me aagayi hai khiza
Unko sayaa bhara shajar dede
 
Ya makhduma ya fizza
 
10.                        Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda,
Hum sab tere ghulaam hai
Humko hai aasra tera
 
Ya makhduma ya fizza
 
11.                        Pohnche "rehan" ye salaam mera,
Sheh ki nawha ghari hai kaam mera
Bibi teri duawo ke sadqe
Ponche zehra talak kalaam mera
 
Ya makhduma ya fizza
 
12.                        Bibi kaniz-e-sayyeda,
Ye nokri hussain ki,
Karta rahu(n) yuhi sadaa
 
(Ya makhduma ya fizza) x2

tracks.title: Ali (AS) Ibn Abi Talib
tracks.lyrics:
Asad Allahil Ghalib
Ghalib Ala Kulli Ghalib
Ya mudhilral ajaib        
Ali Ibn Abi Talib
 
1.       You couldn’t hear an orphans cry
And nor a tear in their eyes
You’d give them food whilst in disguise
For this is how you spent your nights
Nabaun fil quraani, ya’rifukal qaas’i wad-daani
Wa lil yataama mut’aalib, ‘aliyubnu abi t’alib
 
Asad Allahil Ghalib
Ghalib Ala Kulli Ghalib
Ya mudhilral ajaib        
Ali Ibn Abi Talib
 
2.       Anta s’iraat’ul mustaqeem, anta ameerul mo’mineen
Anta najaatul muttaqeen, wa fil h’uroobi la taleen
Sayfullahi-dh’’aarib, wa lil kufri kunta muh’arib
Al-burkaanu-thaaqib, ‘aliyubnu abi t’alib
 
Asad Allahil Ghalib
Ghalib Ala Kulli Ghalib
Ya mudhilral ajaib        
Ali Ibn Abi Talib
 
3.	Huwa tha jab maula pe waar
Sajde mei tha wo rozedaar
Sar hogaya tha khun baar
Rone lage the sogwaar            
Kunta lid-deeni salama, s’urta akhan thumma imaama
Wa lil quraani muwaadh’’ib, ‘aliyubnu abi t’alib
 
Asad Allahil Ghalib
Ghalib Ala Kulli Ghalib
Ya mudhilral ajaib        
Ali Ibn Abi Talib
 
4.       Allahu balagha lir-rasool
H’aider was’i h’aider imam
Wa bil ghadeeri baaya’oo
wa khaalafu qawl as-salaam
Waali man waalaahu, a’aadi kulli man a’aadahu
A’wnan likulli naadib, ‘aliyubnu abi t’alib
 
Asad Allahil Ghalib
Ghalib Ala Kulli Ghalib
Ya mudhilral ajaib        
Ali Ibn Abi Talib
 
5.       A lion in the battlefield
Protected the Prophet like a shield
If enemies stood up for the kill
It is as though their fate was sealed
S’ana’as-sayful baari, khaariqu d’arbatahu min naari
Bi dh’il fiqaari d’aarib, ‘aliyubnu abi t’alib
 
Asad Allahil Ghalib
Ghalib Ala Kulli Ghalib
Ya mudhilral ajaib        
Ali Ibn Abi Talib
 
6.	Tejani hamko hai khabar
Mushkil kabhi aaye agar
Mushkil kusha ka saaya hai
Shabbir ke ghamkhwaar par
Ruddat lakash-shamsa, anta ameerul jinni wal insaa
Nurullahi-thaaqib, ‘aliyubnu abi t’alib
 
Asad Allahil Ghalib
Ghalib Ala Kulli Ghalib
Ya mudhilral ajaib        
Ali Ibn Abi Talib
 
Jab khuda ko pukara ali agaye jab ali agaye
Ghusle mayyit na kehna mere ghusl ko
Ujle malboos ko mat kafan naam do
Mein chala hun Ali se mulaqat ko
Jis kit hi aarzu wo gardi aagayi

tracks.title: Our Blood Will Write Hussain (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
You can bomb us, shoot us, kill us, but we’ll never feel the pain
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain
 
1.     You can blow us into pieces, just like glass shatters to shards
Every drop  of our blood will, light up the sky like the stars
You can kill us and our children, we will bear all of the scars
You will never stop our voices, ‘cuz Hussain lives in ar hearts
You can try to do your worst but, All your efforts are in vain
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain
 
You can bomb us, shoot us, kill us, but we’ll never feel the pain
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain
 
2.     You can keep on being cowards, targeting those at no fault
We are gonna stand united, You will never make us fold
We will stand up for our values, we will never sell our soul
We are following Hussain’s path, we will never change our goal
‘Till the day we die we promise, We will always call his name
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain
 
You can bomb us, shoot us, kill us, but we’ll never feel the pain
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain
 
3.     Let me ask you why you’re killing, such a young innocent child
You may try to murder him but, he would turn to you and smile
How can your conscience allow this, Take a look into his eye
What’s he ever done to hurt you, please just tell me whats his crime
Is this what you’ve learnt from your faith, Is this what you call humane
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain
 
You can bomb us, shoot us, kill us, but we’ll never feel the pain
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain
 
4.     Every day we wish we were there, Oh Hussain (as) right by your side
We would have stood to protect you, and for you we would have died
Everything we have in your name, happily we’d sacrifice
You would not need to convince us, or need to even ask us twice
As we breathe our final breath for, you our love we would proclaim
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain
 
You can bomb us, shoot us, kill us, but we’ll never feel the pain
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain
 
5.     We are crying for that martyr who was stranded all alone
He was shrouded by the arrows, he was wounded by the stones
Then the enemy began to cut his neck right to the bone
As the heartbeats ebbed away his, name in history was sewn
‘Pon remembering this image, our grief cant be contained
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain
 
You can bomb us, shoot us, kill us, but we’ll never feel the pain
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain
 
6.     Being told about Hussain’s fate, Fatema cried out aloud
And the prophet then consoled her, as he wiped the tears he vowed
There will come a special nation, that will cry for him no doubt
We are those chosen people, That Muhammed spoke about
The facts will speak for themselves, None of history will change
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain
 
You can bomb us, shoot us, kill us, but we’ll never feel the pain
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain
 
7.     When we listen to your story, the Tejani brothers cry
Our heart is cut to pieces, but we know that every night
Our Imam Mehdi is crying, blood is pouring from his eyes
And his lips keep on repeating, with his every breathing sigh
I’ll avenge karbobala when, I will re-appear again
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain
 
You can bomb us, shoot us, kill us, but we’ll never feel the pain
If you stop our lips from moving, through our blood we’ll write Hussain

tracks.title: Apne Hathon Se
tracks.lyrics:
(Haaye Sajjad, Haaye Sakina) x2
 
Mujhko apne haatho(n) se, Kaise bhayi tum, Dafnawoge
 
1.     Is nanni sakina ne, gham kitne uthaaye
Gohar bhi chine daman, Zalim ne jhalaye
Durre bhi lage mujhko, lagte the tamachein
Behaal mera lasha, Tumko na rulaaye
 
Mujhko apne haatho(n) se, Kaise bhayi tum, Dafnawoge
 
2.     Jis tarha mera baba, Haaye bekafan hai
Jis tarha se zakhmo se, Chur uska badan hai
Is shaam ke zindaan mei, Waise mera tan hai
Ye baap aur beti ki, Taqdeer kathan hai
 
Mujhko apne haatho(n) se, Kaise bhayi tum, Dafnawoge
 
3.     Maloom hai dil gham se, Sailaab hai tumhara
Aankho(n) ne teri dekha, hai Shabbir ka lasha
Pabande rasan dekhe, jo zainab ko beparda
Jab dekhoge mujhko to, Phatjayenga dil bhayya
 
Mujhko apne haatho(n) se, Kaise bhayi tum, Dafnawoge
 
4.     Ye khun bhari aankhein ab, Deti hai gawahi
tum aal-e-payambar ke, Dekhe ho tabaahi
Beparda haram saare, Dekhi hai khudaayi
Qismat hai ye bas meri, Zindaan ki siyaahi
 
Mujhko apne haatho(n) se, Kaise bhayi tum, Dafnawoge
 
5.     Ik behn ko dafnaane, Kis bhaayi ka dil hai
Har eik musibat se, Dil dard se Hamil hai
Kis tarha se hatho se, Ik qabr banegi
Haatho(n) mei jo hai larza, Aur bandhe salasil hai
 
Mujhko apne haatho(n) se, Kaise bhayi tum, Dafnawoge
 
6.     Jab dada ali ghusl, Daadi ko de rahe the
Zakho(n) ko dekh kar tab, Haider bhi rorahe the
Zakhmo se badan saara, Mera bhi bhara hai
Is khasta badan ko tum, Dafnawoge kaise
 
Mujhko apne haatho(n) se, Kaise bhayi tum, Dafnawoge
 
7.     Ati hai qaza meri, Leykin hai tamanna
Zindaan ke andhero mei, Jab mujhko sulaana
Ik chhota diya meri, Turbat pe jalaana
aur ehle haram ka yu, Tum banna sahara
 
Mujhko apne haatho(n) se, Kaise bhayi tum, Dafnawoge
 
8.     Ab bhi hai Tejani ye, Sakina ki guzarish
Tum meri ziyarat ki, Har dam karo kohshish
Andheron mei soti hu, Hai khamoshi ki barish
Mei baba se tumhaari, Karwa dungi bakhshish
 
Mujhko apne haatho(n) se, Kaise bhayi tum, Dafnawoge

tracks.title: Waiting For You
tracks.lyrics:
Mehdi, mehdi, mehdi
 
(Oh mehdi we’re waiting for you) x4
 
1.     Our lives are dark and our hearts are broken
Now is the time for your intervention
there are no choices left there is no option
there is no hope left you are the chosen
our souls are dying whilst we are still alive
how can we go on, how can we now survive
we’re waiting for that, time when you will arrive
so that religion and faith can be revived
The worlds become false, come and make it true,
oh mehdi we re waiting for you
 
(Oh mehdi we’re waiting for you) x4
 
2.     The poor are dying their tears are flowing
They have lost everything their fears are growing
The world is standing by though it is knowing
The persecution that they are facing
Wherever we look there is just bloodshed
There is no love left not even a shred
Now all around the world, the evil has spread
Though hearts are beating, inside they are dead
There’s no sincerity, the good are but a few,
oh mehdi we’re waiting for you
 
(Oh mehdi we’re waiting for you) x4
 
3.     We’ve lost our way Like, a boat without a sail
The smallest winds make, this faith of ours sway
Our sins are countless, we’re filled up with hate
There is no honesty, no love to convey
How can we say that for you we’re ready
We’ve lost perspective of all reality
The essence of life we’ve failed to see
We’re not content we’ve succumbed to our greed
Our faith is losing out, what shall we now do,
oh mehdi we re waiting for you
 
(Oh mehdi we’re waiting for you) x4
 
The times befalling, the lovers of Hussain
Are unprecedented, we’re facing so much pain
So many massacres from place to place
The streets of Pakistan, the roads of Bahrain
The world is crying out for you to bring peace
Avenge the genocides, through your justice
And rid this universe of evil and sin
Allow us to be the ones within your midst
This world has lost love, is hurtful and cruel
Oh mehdi we’re waiting for you,
 
(Oh mehdi we’re waiting for you) x4
 
I think about you everyday
I sit alone, close my eyes and pray
How long’s this gonna take Imam, How long do we have to wait?
Shias dying in Pakistan
Iraq and Afghanistan
Children in Syria and Bahrain
Being massacred day after day after day after day
 
Oh imam we need your reappearance
We’re crying for help maybe you can’t hear us
I know inside that my soul ain’t pure,
I’ve wronged myself, I’m tryn’a find a cure
One day I wanna be your soldier,
My heart keeps growing colder
Every time I get a step closer
There’s another barrier,
I fall, I fall so I need you as the carrier
 
Where are you? We need your guidance
Your lovers are dying at the hands of tyrants
Soldiers bursting into their rooms pulling the trigger
Making all of our lives problems even bigger
Why? Because we love the Ahlulbayt
We follow their path regardless of our fate
We need your help! Its not insanity
It’s a plea from all of humanity
 
You’re gonna come down like a charm
Paradise in your palm
Standing arm in arm
With the purest hearts
You’ll bring about calm
Save our souls from harm
There’ll be no more alarm
As the world will disarm
 
Because
This is the dream that’ll make me
God won’t forsake me
The devil won’t break me
His words won’t shake me
When you will awake me
Your light will save me
The evil will hate me
This world won’t take me
 
InshAllah I will join your army, InshaAllah
My will is strong no one will harm me, InshaAllah
Oh Imam I will stand by your side and rise up to reveal the truth
Whether you’re are the highest peaks or in the deepest valleys
You won’t need to find me because I will come looking for you

tracks.title: Ghazi (AS) De Baad
tracks.lyrics:
(Ghazi de baad Zainab , Sir di rida lutaake, barri der tayi(n) royi) x2
 
1.     Jaddo(n) khaymei(n) jhal gaye sann
Seene alam nu(n) laake
barri der tayi(n) royi
 
(Ghazi de baad Zainab , Sir di rida lutaake, barri der tayi(n) royi) x2
 
2.     Zalim te Tur gayya si, Khayyam nu(n) jhala ke
Zahra di laadli de, Hatthanch Rassiyaa(n) paake
Makhduma do alam de, Vaalanch mu(n) lukaake
barri der tayi(n) royi
 
(Ghazi de baad Zainab , Sir di rida lutaake, barri der tayi(n) royi) x2
 
3.     Jaddo(n) ghash cho(n) hosh kita, Vekhi ajab lachaayi
Mazlum-e-karbala da, Pucheyya jaddo(n) muhaari
Eywaal karbala da, Sajjad nu(n) sunaa ke
barri der tayi(n) royi
 
(Ghazi de baad Zainab , Sir di rida lutaake, barri der tayi(n) royi) x2
 
4.     Likheyya ay raviyaa(n) ne, Gum hogayi Sakina
Reyya maarda tamaachei(n), Ruksaar te kamina
Zainab bhiraa di dhide, Chole to(n) baa bachaa ke
barri der tayi(n) royi
 
(Ghazi de baad Zainab , Sir di rida lutaake, barri der tayi(n) royi) x2
 
5.     Neze de naal Zalim, Chadar sarro(n) lahaai
Medi sayn apne sar vich, Karbal di khaak paaee
Abbas bawafa di, Gall naal mashk laake
barri der tayi(n) royi
 
(Ghazi de baad Zainab , Sir di rida lutaake, barri der tayi(n) royi) x2
 
6.     Lashe Hassan de chann da, Jis vaqt khamei(n) aaya
Kubra ne sine laake, Roya batool jaaya
Gathri batool jaayi, Farva di jholi paake
barri der tayi(n) royi
 
(Ghazi de baad Zainab , Sir di rida lutaake, barri der tayi(n) royi) x2
 
7.     Ujjri Rabaab da mai(n), Ajj haal ki sunaavan
Jaddo(n) godiyaanch chaake, Bachre khiddaye maava(n)
Ay bibi ladle de, Jholich chole paake
barri der tayi(n) royi
 
(Ghazi de baad Zainab , Sir di rida lutaake, barri der tayi(n) royi) x2
 
8.     Zamin hai matamdi di, Mehshar’ch Zahra Jaayi
Deen-e-Khuda di jiss ne, “Tauqeer” hai vadhaayi
Baaghi nahi(n) namaazi, Shabbir nu(n) manaake
barri der tayi(n) royi
 
(Ghazi de baad Zainab , Sir di rida lutaake, barri der tayi(n) royi) x2

tracks.title: Breaths Whisper
tracks.lyrics:
Hussain you are my guide, in my hour of need
When I am all alone, and there’s no-one with me
Submerged in darkness, its all that i see
When I will search for you, I know that I’ll be free
                        
Hussain you are the light, inside my darkest night
Hussain you’ve made me whole,
Through you I’ve found my soul
And everyday I say Ya Hussain
 
Your body was lying there, without a shroud
Completely ravaged making no sound
The enemies watched, standing so proud
As Lady Zainab cried out aloud
 
Hussain you are the light, inside my darkest night
Hussain you’ve made me whole,
through you I’ve found my soul
And everyday I say Ya Hussain
 
(Ya Hussain, Ya Hussain) x2
 
You taught us the art of dying, And giving others life
By being that light that’s shining, In the darkest of the nights
You showed us the way of giving, The ultimate sacrifice
Stand for what you believe in, even if you have to die
 
When I have got no hope, I remember your day
When I feel like I can’t cope, I think of your pain
When life can’t go on, My heart beats your name
When I’ve lost it all, My breaths whisper Hussain
Breaths whisper Hussain
Breaths Whisper Hussain

tracks.title: Labbayk Ya Hussain (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
Labayk ya Husain, labbayk Ya Hussain, labbayk ya Hussain
 
(Labayk ya Husain, labbayk Ya Hussain) x2
 
1.     Aanch aye na kabhi bhi, is din-e mustufa pe.
Har chiz hi fida hai, zehra pe murtaza pe
 
(Labayk ya Husain, labbayk Ya Hussain) x2
 
2.     Barso se beh raha hai, is qaum ka lahu.
Barpa magar hussain ka, Matam hai ku ba ku
 
(Labayk ya Husain, labbayk Ya Hussain) x2
 
3.     Baahen jhuri huwi hai, shiat ki karbala se.
qawle khudaae paak se Or qawle mustafa se
 
(Labayk ya Husain, labbayk Ya Hussain) x2
 
4.     Naame ali ko dood me, maa ne pilaa diya.
Kurbaniy-e- hussain ka Maqsad bataa diya
 
(Labayk ya Husain, labbayk Ya Hussain) x2
 
5.     Jitnaa bhi ba asr bane, ye waqt ka yazeed.
Majlis bapaa karenge ham Har dor me mazeed
 
(Labayk ya Husain, labbayk Ya Hussain) x2
 
6.     Wo haath hi jalade, Chinega jo alam.
Rokega kon majlis Rokega kon matam
 
(Labayk ya Husain, labbayk Ya Hussain) x2
 
7.     Burhe jawaan hamare, sab shaah ke hai nokar.
Likh denge dastaane Apne lahu ko dekar
 
(Labayk ya Husain, labbayk Ya Hussain) x2
 
8.     Hai aaj ye “Ali Deep” Ddarkar nahi rahega
Mazhab ka mere har ik baccha yahi kahega
 
(Labayk ya Husain, labbayk Ya Hussain) x2

tracks.title: Abbas (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
Haider ne namaazo me jo Allah se manga
Kehte the khuda de mujhe Abbas sa beta
Wo jisko kahe sara arab Ghaziyo Jarrar
 
(Abbas-E-Alamdaar, Abbas-E-Alamdaar) x2
 
1.     Tum bazuwe shabbir ho haider ke pisar ho
Lashkar ke alamdar Sakina ka jigar ho
Jitey hai(n) tumhe(n) dekh ke bas sayyede abraar
 
(Abbas-E-Alamdaar, Abbas-E-Alamdaar) x2
 
2.     Paani pe alam tere siwaa kisne lagaya
Mashkize me darya ko tumhi ne hai uthaya
Tum lashkar-e-shabbir ke ho haider-e-karrar
 
(Abbas-E-Alamdaar, Abbas-E-Alamdaar) x2
 
3.     Tum Fatema Zehra ki duwawo ka asar ho
Tum dhoop me Zainab ke liye misle shajar ho
Parcham ka pharayra hai tera aisa hawaadar
 
(Abbas-E-Alamdaar, Abbas-E-Alamdaar) x2
 
Ya Abbas
 
4.     Zainab ne dam karke naade ali,
Apni rida bhayi par daaldi,
Apni rida bhayi par daaldi
Dekar duwa ghar se rukhsat kiya
Abbas ibn-e-sher-e-khuda
 
(Abbas ibn-e-sher-e-khuda) x4
 
5.     Ghazi ne saahil pe rakha qadam,
Khakar sakina ke sar ki qasam,
Bharlunga is mashk me alqama
Abbas ibn-e-sher-e-khuda
 
(Abbas ibn-e-sher-e-khuda) x4
 
6.     Lekin achanak ye kya hogaya,
Ghazi ka parcham larazne lagaa,
Bedast hokar giraa bawafaa
Abbas ibn-e-sher-e-khuda
 
(Abbas ibn-e-sher-e-khuda) x4
 
7.     Ghazi jo zee(n) se zami(n) par ghira
Rokar Sakina se usne kaha
Sharminda Bali tera hai chacha
Abbas ibn-e-sher-e-khuda
 
(Abbas ibn-e-sher-e-khuda) x4
 
8.     "Rehan" manzar wo kaise likhu(n)
Mere qalam se tapak ta hai khu(n)
Kehte the shabbir bhayi mera
Abbas Ibne Shere Khuda
 
(Abbas ibn-e-sher-e-khuda) x4

tracks.title: Hussain (AS) Vai
tracks.lyrics:
Ya aba abdillah
Ay shaheed-e-karbala
Badshah-e-naynawah
Ay zabeeh-e-bekhata
 
(Hussainu minni, wa ana minnal hussain) x2
 
(Hussain wai, wai, wai) x2
 
Mazloom bekas tu bewatan
Itna gharib tha shah-e-zaman
Haa(n) teero(n) pe tha tera badan
Tera lahu tha tera kafan
Kaise bhulaayei(n) ham wo ghari
Tere gale pe chali churi
Khayme ke dar pe bahan khari
Kehti thi Zainab roke yahi
 
(Hussain wai, wai, wai) x2
 
H’arqul khiyaama fi karbala’
Wartaf’a dukhanu ilas-samaa’
Faqadna h’aameena’al mashra’a
La dhil wa la h’ami wa la maa’
Man-il-ladhee sayasaa’adna
Wa sawfa yamsah’ damu’ana
Wa yastami’oon bukaa’na
Wa yashfaqu ‘ala ‘haalana
 
(Hussain wai, wai, wai) x2
 
Shab hame shab Asheghoone
hey mikhoonam Hussain Hussain
Yaadam nemire taa abad
Shabaaye BeinolHaramein.
Yadesh bekheyr Che hali bood
misookhtam az omghe vojood
Masti booodo Eshgh o Jonoon
oon Naale o Ashk o Sojoood.
 
(Hussain aqa, hussain maula, hussain janam) x2
 
We cant control the tears that flow
Oh master we all want you to know
The flame of your love will always glow
In our hearts it will always grow
Today your name runs in our veins
When our heartbeats it beats your name
On our lips is Hussain hussain
When we hear your grief and your pain
 
(Hussain wai, wai, wai) x2
 
Tumhara gar kaise lutgaya
Qasim ka lasha tukre huwa
Soya tha ghazi bazu bina
Akbar ko ran mei neza laga
Nanna sa asghar khu(n) mei naha
Tumhara pyasa gala kata
Zainab ke sar se chini rida
Salaar-e-kunba abid bana
 
(Hussain wai, wai, wai) x2
 
The brother that she did so adore
The one that she did love to her core
The heart of Zainab stopped when she saw
Your headless body upon the floor
To trample you all the horses rushed
Beneath their hooves all your bones were crushed
From every piece of body blood gushed
Your daughter cried saying al-atash
 
(Hussain wai, wai, wai) x2
 
Your deaths were such an atrocity
And yet you thanked god almighty
You showed love with high intensity
and treated faith with such surety
you sacrificed with sincerity
and are the meaning of purity,
The definition of piety
You will live on for eternity
 
(Hussain wai, wai, wai) x2
 
Karbobala mei thi ye sada
Hal min nasirin yan surna
Tamam momin ki hai buka
Labbayk maula ki hai sada
Har ik zubaa(n) pe hai ye tera
Juloos-o-majlis nawha aza
Sara jahaa(n) hai ye bolta
Hussain hussain, Hussain Maula mera
 
(Hussain wai, wai, wai) x2
 
You put your head in sujood and said
This is the promise that I had made
That every drop of blood I would shed
For you my lord I would give my head
I am coming back to you Allah
Accept this deed in karbobala
A voice came from up above afar
Come back oh nafsul mutmainnah
 
(Hussain wai, wai, wai) x2
 
Nawha “Tejani” ne jo likha
Tere madad se jo hai parha
Ye nawha khaani haaye aza
Qabool karlo maula mera
Hamare lab pe hai iltija
Roz-e-qayamat mei do sada
Ye mere bande hai ay khuda
Qareeb unko mere bulaa
 
(Hussain wai, wai, wai) x2

tracks.title: Akhir Hussain (AS) Maan Hun
tracks.lyrics:
Amma badan ye sara teero se ab bhara hai
Gore pe na zameen par, lasha mera para hai
Ab shimr ki churi hai, garden pe chal rahi hai,
Amma mujhe sambhalo
 
(Ay mere pyare hussain) x3
 
(Kaise gale pe tere, khanjar me chalta dekhun, akhir hussain maan hun) x2
 
Garden pe tere rakh ke,
apna gala kataa lun,
akhir hussain maa hun
 
(Kaise gale pe tere, khanjar me chalta dekhun, akhir hussain maan hun) x2
 
Chakki ko pees kar me, bachpan me tujhko pala,
Raton ko jag kar me, jula tera julaya,
Sowo na ab zamin par, godi me aa sulalun, akhir hussain maan hun
 
(Kaise gale pe tere, khanjar me chalta dekhun, akhir hussain maan hun) x2
 
Akbar ko apne kandhei(n), pe kistarha uthaya
Chotti lahad mei asghar, ko kistarha sulaya
Tumhari bekasi par, kaise na khun bahawu, akhir hussain maan hun
 
(Kaise gale pe tere, khanjar me chalta dekhun, akhir hussain maan hun) x2
 
Zainab ki imethaa(n) ka, karbal se ibtida hai
Bazaar-e-shaam-o-kufa, ka ab bhi marhala hai
Har simt saath hogi, wada ye kar rahi hu(n), akhir hussain maa hu
 
(Kaise gale pe tere, khanjar me chalta dekhun, akhir hussain maan hun) x2
 
Jinno malak the sare, koi na dekh paya,
Tanha tu reha gaya hai, koi nahi sahara
Har ik qadam pe hun me, Mei kaise saath choru(n), akhir hussain maan hun
 
(Kaise gale pe tere, khanjar me chalta dekhun, akhir hussain maan hun) x2
 


Pamaal ho na jaaye, laasha tumhara ran mei
Mera jigar hai tukre, quwwat nahi badan mei
Tere badan ke tukde, kaise mei khud uthaawu(n), akhir hussain maa(n) hu
 
(Kaise gale pe tere, khanjar me chalta dekhun, akhir hussain maan hun) x2
 
Kayse sambhal sakoge, gorre pe mere beta,
Teeron se bhargaya hai, beta tumhara lasha,
Har aik teer apne, hathon se me nikalun, akhir hussain maan hun
 
(Kaise gale pe tere, khanjar me chalta dekhun, akhir hussain maan hun) x2
 
Barhta hai ek zalim, hathon me leke khanjar,
Gore se ab gire ho, sajde me hai tera sar,
Sar tera katt na jaye, awo tumhe chhupalun, akhir hussain maan hun
 
(Kaise gale pe tere, khanjar me chalta dekhun, akhir hussain maan hun) x2
 
Tere gale pe zalim, khanjar chala raha hai
Darya lahu ka tere, garden se beh raha hai
Hasta hai tera qatil, mei gham se kampti hu(n)
 
(Kaise gale pe tere, khanjar me chalta dekhun, akhir hussain maan hun) x2
 
Nawha tha ye “Tejani”, Mazloom maa(n) ke lab par
Suki hai teri gardan, aur shimr ka hai khanjar
Ab kaise tere tan se, jaan ko nikalta dekhun, akhir hussain maan hun
 
Gore se jab gire, Shabbir khaak par
Haa(n) teer se bhara, tan tha lahu mei tar
Bola tha shimr ye, Baalo(n) ko khench kar,
pyaasa tumhe zibha, kardunga reyt par
Ajaawo mere laal, chillayi Fatemah
Ay shimr roklo, khanjar jo hai tera
Zahra se wo magar, mu apna pheyr kar
Mazloom halq pe, uski pari nazar
Haay haay lahu ki pyaas, wo shimr ka barha
Pyaasa gala hussain ka khanjar se kat gaya

tracks.title: Abbas (AS) Ho Kahaan
tracks.lyrics:
(Mere Abbas ho kahaa(n)) x2
Abbas ho kahaa(n), mere Abbas ho kahaa(n)
 
Bemakhna aur be chadar
Kehti hai bibi Zainab rokar
Ay sheyr-e-karwaa(n)
 
(Aal-e-nabi aur sham ka rasta, Koi nahi zainab ka sahara, Abbas ho kahaa(n)) x2
 
Sharm ye ati hai mujhko ke, sar pe nahi koi bhi parda
Sharm ki had hai ye ghazi ke, dekh rahe ho tum ay bhayya
Kaise karu(n) baalo(n) ki chadar
Khaak-e-shifa ko sar pe rakh kar
Ab hu(n) mei yak-zabaa(n)
Mere abbas ho kahaa(n)
 
(Aal-e-nabi aur sham ka rasta, Koi nahi zainab ka sahara, Abbas ho kahaa(n)) x2
 
Gham se bhara hai qalb ye mera, Sham ke is darbaar ke andar
Tasht tille pe bhayi ka sar hai, nok-e-sina par tu ay dilawar
Zakhm hazaro(n) hai ye dil mei(n)
Mei hu(n) anbaar-e-qatil mei(n)
Hu aayina-e-maa(n)
Mere abbas ho kahaa(n)
 
(Aal-e-nabi aur sham ka rasta, Koi nahi zainab ka sahara, Abbas ho kahaa(n)) x2
 
Ponch gaye shiree(n) ke gar pe, pooch rahi hai wo hasrat se
Saath mei aye hai kya maula, ayi hai Zainab kya ghurbat se
Boli ke haaye mei hu(n) Zainab,
Aal-e-muhammad ke bete sab,
Neze pe hai(n) yahaa(n)
 
(Aal-e-nabi aur sham ka rasta, Koi nahi zainab ka sahara, Abbas ho kahaa(n)) x2
 
Choti si qabrei(n) kitni banawu(n), sham ke raste mei bacho(n) ke
Sukhi zabaa(n) hai garm hawa hai, hosh nikalti hai pyaaso(n) ke
Eik rasan aur bara gale hai
Taziyaa(n) aur durre lagte hai
Hai pusht par nishaa(n)
Mere abbas ho kahaan
 
(Aal-e-nabi aur sham ka rasta, Koi nahi zainab ka sahara, Abbas ho kahaa(n)) x2
 
Jiske gale par khud ahmad ne, bose lagaaye the roro kar
Khaymo(n) ke dar se dekh rahi thi, hone laga jab tan se juda sar
Tha bachpan mei sawaar-e-payambar
Aya hai jo ye Nok-e-sina par
Hai natiq-e-quraa(n)
Mere abbas ho kahaan
 
(Aal-e-nabi aur sham ka rasta, Koi nahi zainab ka sahara, Abbas ho kahaa(n)) x2
 
tum bhi nahi mere ghazi aur, na akbar hai na asghar hai
had hai ke ab mere sar par bhi, bhayi nahi koi chadar hai
khake pathar zalim se ye
Sham ke zinda(n) ko behne ye
Jaati hai al-amaa(n)
Mere abbas ho kahaan
 
(Aal-e-nabi aur sham ka rasta, Koi nahi zainab ka sahara, Abbas ho kahaa(n)) x2
 
Bali sakina ko zinadan me, chhoti lahad me dafn karke
Yaad ayi apne bhayi ki, us pal binte ali ko had se
Phat’ta hai dil likh kar ay “Tejani”
Zinda(n) mei zainab ye pukari
Lekar jo siskiyaan
Mere Abbas ho kahaa(n)

tracks.title: Labbayk ya Hussain (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
Labbayka ya hussain
 
(dete rahenge ye sada ya hussain, saara jaha(n) tum pe fida ya hussain) x2

Teeron ki barish huwi, Asr ka waqt agaya
Dekh raha tha falak, hoti thi tumpar jafa,
Zeen pe na khaak pe aap ka lasha para
Aap ke halqoom par shimr ka khanjar chala,
jalasa shimran ‘ala s’adri-zaki
wa h’az nah’r al-h’ussain ibn ‘ali
 
(dete rahenge ye sada ya hussain, saara jaha(n) tum pe fida ya hussain) x2

Qasimo asghar nahi, akbaro abbas bhi,
Shame ghariban hai aur, bibiyan sab hai khari
Khaymon me ab hai dhuwan, sar se rida chingayi
Sham talak berida roti hai binte ali
ya rayt h’az nah’ri qabal nah’ruka
Wa la ara ‘ala at-tirbaan jismuka
 
(dete rahenge ye sada ya hussain, saara jaha(n) tum pe fida ya hussain) x2

ayi wo beti teri sham ke bazaar me
kaano(n) se bali chini, jisko tamache lage
sham talak rororahi thi yahi kehte huwe
baba kahan ho mere awo bachawo mujhe
ayna tara bint imam-al-huda
h’awlaha al-a’adaa wa ru’us fawqaha
 
(dete rahenge ye sada ya hussain, saara jaha(n) tum pe fida ya hussain) x2


Askhk bahate hai hum, karte hai matam tera,
Hum tere hi naam me karte hai majlis bapa
Jine ka maqsad hai tu, tu hai humari baqa
akhri sanse talak dete rahenge sada
nah’nu jamee’an sarakhna lak hussain
Wa naqoolu kulna fida lak hussain


(dete rahenge ye sada ya hussain, saara jaha(n) tum pe fida ya hussain) x2


Khuda hi janta hai haqiqat hussain ki,
Mustafa se pucho izzat hussain ki,
Jibreel se pucho khidmat hussain ki,
Kul ambhiya se pucho ibadat hussain ki,
Mola ali se pucho azmat hussain ki,
Fatima se pucho fazilat hussain ki,
Sakina se pucho mohabbat hussain ki,
Sajjad se pucho wasiyat hussain ki,
Behlool se pucho jannat hussain ki,
Rahib se pucho sakawat hussain ki,
Kul karbala se pucho karamat hussain ki,
Yazeed say pucho zara taqat hussain ki.

aaj talak goonjti hai ye jahan me sada
tha tere lab pe buka barsare karbobala
kehte hai labbayk hum, har gari aur har jaga
kaash yun hote to hum, saath bhi dete tera
laytana kunna ma’ak fi karbala’
Li Nasfika fi h’ubbika ad-dimaa’
 
(dete rahenge ye sada ya hussain, saara jaha(n) tum pe fida ya hussain) x2

chaand sitaron pe aur, arsh pe hai tera naam
koyi na jo karsaka tune dikhaya wo kaam
dono jahaan me har aik, karte hai tujhko salaam
tune bachaya hai deen ay mere pyare imam
haqaqta hilman bi himayat ad-deen
baqayta dawman a’wnan li ash-shakireen


(dete rahenge ye sada ya hussain, saara jaha(n) tum pe fida ya hussain) x2

aaj bhi tere muhibbon pe hai zulmo jafa
ghazza medina najaf, karbobala samarra
humko hai ab dekhna, badla-e-karbobala
awo imame zamaan hai yahi dil ki dua
 Hatta mata yudh’bahu h’ub al-‘wasi
Wa dhanbuna huwa h’ub aali ‘ali


(dete rahenge ye sada ya hussain, saara jaha(n) tum pe fida ya hussain) x2

hai ye “tejani” dua ay mere parwardigaar
bhejiye mehdi ko ab, kehte hai hum baar baar
lashkare mehdi me ho saare hussaini shumaar
jitenga islaam aur, hogi wo zulmat ki haar
hadha ad-dua’ minna ya rabb ya shafi’
‘ajjil dhuhoor s’ah’ib ul-‘asr ya sami’
 
(dete rahenge ye sada ya hussain, saara jaha(n) tum pe fida ya hussain) x2

tracks.title: Ay Mere Aun-o-Muhammad (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
(Ay mere aun-o-muhammad, ay mere aun-o-muhammad) x3
 
Mujhe khabar hai ke pyaase, bohot ho tum mere bête
Magar tumhari nigahei(n), na jaaye darya kinaare
Tumhe pilayengi paani, maa fatemah lab-e-kausar, ay mere aun-o-muhammad
 
(Ay mere aun-o-muhammad, ay mere aun-o-muhammad) x2
 
Tumhe khabar hai ke mamu, bohot zaeef hai tere
Subha se leke abhi tak, unho(n) ne laashei(n) uthaaye
Giro jo zee(n) se to kehna, faqat salaam ay dilawar , ay mere aun-o-muhammad
 
(Ay mere aun-o-muhammad, ay mere aun-o-muhammad) x2
 
Tumhare maamu ke rishte, mei jis tarha se hai dilbar
Adab wafa aur muhabbat, wo aye tujh mei simat kar
Ye yaad ho ke ho dono, ik doosre ke biraadar, ay mere aun-o-muhammad
 
(Ay mere aun-o-muhammad, ay mere aun-o-muhammad) x2
 
Pukaare Aun-o-Muhammad, kalaam maa ka ye sunkar
Na sharm ayegi tumko, na khof kar haaye madar
Ham is tarha se larenge, ke khud kahenge ye haider, ay mere aun-o-muhammad
 
(Ay mere aun-o-muhammad, ay mere aun-o-muhammad) x2
 
Lare the aisi tarha se, Kahe ye lashkar-e-kuffaar,
lo agaye hai ye ran mei, ali-o-jaffer-e-tayyaar
khayaam se jo ye dekhe, pukare fakhr se sarwar, ay mere aun-o-muhammad
 
(Ay mere aun-o-muhammad, ay mere aun-o-muhammad) x2

the teen din ke wo pyaase, lare to kitne larenge
har ik taraf se tha hamla, wo gir ke reyt pa aaye
gire ye dono to Zainab, rakha tha sajde me yu(n) sar, ay mere aun-o-muhammad
 
(Ay mere aun-o-muhammad, ay mere aun-o-muhammad) x2
 
Ye maa(n) ka sabr hai aisa, ke karbala se madina
Wo apne bête ke khatir, bahayi ashk kabhi na
Ki apne bhayi ka girya, kabhi na boli ye madar, ay mere aun-o-muhammad
 
(Ay mere aun-o-muhammad, ay mere aun-o-muhammad) x2
 
Sambhaal payi na dil ko, Zainab jo ponchi yu(n) ghar mei
Nanne musalle ko chume, kabhi wo chume khilonei(n)
Khamosh gar mei akeli, pukari maa(n) ye sissak kar, ay mere aun-o-muhammad
 
(Ay mere aun-o-muhammad, ay mere aun-o-muhammad) x2
 
Yu(n) sabira hai wo leykin, wo maa(n) bhi hai ay “Tejani”
Unhe rulayegi haaye, pisar ki daagh-e-judaayi
Har eik saans kahegi, har eik dam zindagi bhar, ay mere aun-o-muhammad

tracks.title: Ya Ali-Un-Naqi (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
(Maula sakhi, ibn-e-sakhi, Bul askari, aliyyun naqi) x2
 
(Ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi, ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi) x2
 
Aap ki maa hai bibi sumaana khatoo(n),
aap ke baba jaa(n) hai Muhammad Taqi
tumne che saal ke umr mei paayi thi,
zimmedari imamat ki aur aal ki
Tu hai shahzada-e-do jahaa(n),
ranj ki hai teri daastaa(n)
 
(Ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi, ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi) x2
 
Tumko darbaar mei laaya zalim ne jab,
mutawakkil tha bad-mast yu(n) takht par
Aap koh ke ashaaro(n) ko parhke kiya,
zer baari wo zalim ka us waqt par
Tere lafzo(n) ka tha ye asar,
khun roya tha bedaadgar
 
(Ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi, ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi) x2
 
Mutakabbir wo zalim tha itna bara,
teri azmat ko pehchaan paya nahi(n)
Khud ko afzal samajh ke sitamghaar yu(n),
sheyr ke ghaar mei phenke tumko la’ee(n)
Hai buland ye tera martaba,
Tumko sheyro(n) ne sajda kiya
 
(Ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi, ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi) x2
 
Jis tarha se madine ko rukhsat kiya,
Misl-e-shabbir tune bhi rukhsat kiya,
Jangal-e-karbala ko chale the hussain,
jangal-e-samarra tha wo manzil tera
Wo huwe karbala mei qatal,
samarra mei thi teri ajal
 
(Ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi, ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi) x2
 
Mere shahzade sunlo ye dil ki dua,
Tumko Zainab ki chadar ka hai wasta
Jiske dil mei hai hajat wo maqbool kar,
Asra har muhibbo(n) ka bas hai tera
Jiske dil mei hai hajat bhari,
unke lab pe sada hai yahi
 
(Ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi, ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi) x2
 
Sab yateemo(n) ko saya-e-rahmat mile,
har pareshaan dil ko salamat mile
Zalimo(n) ko saza aur qayamat mile,
hashr mei momino(n) ko shafa’at mile
Aap sab hajato(n) ke ho dar,
Kyu(n) ke hai aapka paak gar
 
(Ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi, ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi) x2
 
Zehr tumko khilaya gaya ya imam,
Mutawakkil ki zulmat ki thi inteha
Ye asar tha ke tha tera tukre jigar,
marte bhi dard se tan tha tera bhara
Haaye maula ye ghurbat teri,
the janaze pe bas askari
 
(Ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi, ya sakhi ya aliyyun naqi) x2
 
Baad-e-rehlat sukoo(n) bhi huwa na naseeb,
zalimo(n) ne kiya munhadim samarra
Ayenge jab “Tejani” imam-e-zamaa(n),
lenga tab badla-e-zulm wo bakhuda
Leke wo ayega zulfiqaar,
hogi tab sare zalim ki haar
 
Raah par hai hamari nigaahei(n) pari
Dekhna hai zamane ko ab us ghari
Ayega ghayb se jo hamare imam
Lega tab samarra ka wohi inteqaam
Zulfiqar uspe chaljaayegi jo bhi tha
Qatil-e-asghar-o-mohsin-o-fatemah
Samarra aur baqiyyah ke zalim suno
Ghayb se ibn-e-zahra ik din ayega
Har adu ka badaljayenga din se shaam
Is tarha se chalayega apni niyaam
Badla-e-shaam-o-karbal  wo tab payenge
Aur sajjad ke ashk tham jaayenge

tracks.title: Shaam Bulawo
tracks.lyrics:
As-salaam alayki ya binte ameeral mo’mineen
As-salaam alayki ya binte khairu nisaail alameen
As-salaam alayki ya zainabal kubra
 
(sham bulawo, sham bulawo, ay meri bibi, sham bulawo) x2
 
itni duayen aaye hai leykar,
mang rahe hain aapke dar par
rad na karo jo kehte hain rokar
(sunlo sadaen, shah ki khahar) x2
sar pe jo gham hai, usse chhurawo, ay meri bibi shaam bulawo
                                               
(sham bulawo, sham bulawo, ay meri bibi, sham bulawo) x2
 
aik gari aur, jee nahi sakte
kyun ke abhi hum, door hai tumse
ankhon se ansu, girte rahenge
(humko sada do marne se pehle) x2
jo bhi rukawat, hai wo hatawo, ay meri bibi, sham bulawo
 
(sham bulawo, sham bulawo, ay meri bibi, sham bulawo) x2
 
jinno bashar ho, ya ho farishta
tere hi dar par kerta hai sajda
binte ali ye martaba tera,
(teri ziyarat karti hai duniya) x2
ab tera roza, humko dikhawo, ay meri bibi sham bulawo
 
(sham bulawo, sham bulawo, ay meri bibi, sham bulawo) x2
 
itne masayib jhele hai dilpar
karbobala aur sham ka manzar
khaymon se dekha kat ta huwa sar
(bhayi ka tumne jalti zamin par) x2
sabr ki malka, sabr sikhawo, ay meri bibi shaam bulawo
 
(sham bulawo, sham bulawo, ay meri bibi, sham bulawo) x2
 


 
zulm se ddubi, aaj hai duniya
rote hain mazloom, karte hai nawha
dil me dua aur lab pe hai nara
(kisse kahe ab dard ye dil ka) x2
jine ki surat, humko sikhawo, ay meri bibi sham bulawo
 
(sham bulawo, sham bulawo, ay meri bibi, sham bulawo) x2
 
shaam me aake dekhenge janat,
kaash humari, hogi ye kismat
maut bhi aye aur qayamat,
(tumse na hargiz, hoge yu(n) rukhsat) x2
jaan humari, ake bachawo, ay meri bibi sham bulawo
 
(sham bulawo, sham bulawo, ay meri bibi, sham bulawo) x2
 
jinki bhi ab tak, godi hai khali
bete ata kar, unko ay bibi
mang rahe hai, tumse ye jo bhi
(karde ata sab barde wo joli) x2
ab to madad tum, karne ko awo, ay meri bibi sham bulawo
 
(sham bulawo, sham bulawo, ay meri bibi, sham bulawo) x2
 
dekhna hai humko tera roza
aake sunaenge yahi nawha
tujhse kahenge dil ki tammanna
(ab hai “tejani” ka yahi wada) x2
humko sada do, aur bulawo, ay meri bibi sham bulawo
 
(sham bulawo, sham bulawo, ay meri bibi, sham bulawo) x2

tracks.title: Ya Abbas (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas, Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas) x3
 
Hai laqab ghazi tera, tu hai akse murtaza
Bhaayi ho shabbri ka, aur Zainab ki rida
Tu hai Zahra ki dua, aur alamdare wafa
 
(Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas, Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas) x2
 
Jo pareshaa(n) haal hai, unke gham ko door kar
Jo dua hai la-qabool, Rab se wo manzoor kar
Momino(n) ke har gunaah, rab se tu maghfoor kar
 
(Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas, Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas) x3
 
Kal mila tha ye alam, jaffar-e-tayyar ko
Jang-e-khayber mei mila, haider-e-karrar ko
Aur karbal mei mila, ghazi-e-jarrar ko
 
(Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas, Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas) x3
 
Har namaaze shab mei ye, thi ye Haider ki dua
Mere bête ke liye, ik sahara bhejna
Eik ik insaa(n) mei se, tumko Allah ne chuna
 
(Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas, Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas) x3
 
Nang-e-sar darbaar jo, ayi bint-e-fatemah
Puchta tha ye yazeed, kon hai ab aasra (hai kahaa(n) ghazi tera)
Dekh ke bhaayi ka sar, roke zainab ne kaha
 
(Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas, Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas) x3
 
Kya tumhe hai ye khabar, mei hu haider ka pisar
Jaise baba sheyr the, hai mera waisa jigar
Bhaglo ab waqt hai, aaraha hai ye qamar
 
(Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas, Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas) x3
 
Ay adu sunlo zara, roko na rasta mera
Chahte ho tum agar, ab ajal ka raasta
Maut se darta nahi, hu ali ka ayina
 
(Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas, Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas) x3
 
Bazuo(n) dono kate, haaye mashkiza chida
Gurz sar pe jab laga, bawafa zee(n) se gira
As-salaam aqa mere, roke ghazi ne kaha
 
(Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas, Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas) x3
 
Ponch kar abbas ke, laash par sheh ne kaha
Tum to meri aas the, aur aankho(n) ka diya
Rut na jawo abhi, aankhei(n) kholo phir zara
 
(Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas, Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas) x3
 
Hai alam abbas ka, har hussaini ka nishaa(n)
Hai “tejani” muntazir, aur ye sara jahaa(n)
Ke uthaaye khud alam, aake maula-e-zamaa(n)
 
(Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas, Ya abbas, abbas ya abbas) x3

tracks.title: Hussain (AS) Hussain (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
(Hussain, O’ Hussain, Hussain, O’ Hussain) x2
 
Son of Ali, and Fatemah
Brother of Abbas and mujtaba
You are the grandson of Mustafa
 
(Hussain, O’ Hussain, Hussain, O’ Hussain) x2
 
My saviour my guide hussain hussain
The meaning of life hussain hussain
Ill say till i die hussain hussain


Your name rings out in the generations,
You taught us how to live as a nation
You are my leader and inspiration
You are my goal and my destination
For me you are like a glowing star
The owner of my soul and my heart
The love of my life thats what you are
 
My saviour my guide hussain hussain
The meaning of life hussain hussain
Ill say till i die hussain hussain

That desert where you were cruelly murdered
That land where innocent souls were slaughtered
Your family your sons and your brother
I wanna see that place like no other
I cry and say this in my salaah
Accept this one wish oh my allah
Just send me once to karbobala
 
My saviour my guide hussain hussain
The meaning of life hussain hussain
Ill say till i die hussain hussain





 
you are my saviour, you are my saviour
you are my leader, you are my leader
you are my master
you are forever
the king of all kings, the king of all kings
the sacrificing, the sacrificing
the ever living
the never ending
you showed submission
determination
and through your passion
you saved religion
you showed us all the path to our lord
by placing your head under the sword
and saying this is for you my god


My saviour my guide hussain hussain
The meaning of life hussain hussain
Ill say till i die hussain hussain

How have you shown us the art of giving
The art of worship, the art of living
You sacrificed for what you believed in
In love of allah the most forgiving
From all the angels high in the sky
Blessings are sent on you day and night
My master your status is so high


My saviour my guide hussain hussain
The meaning of life hussain hussain
Ill say till i die hussain hussain

Your daughters and sisters were paraded
Their hands were tied and they were unaided
The tyrant enemies were elated
But through allahs will their power faded
then lady zainab stood up and said
all those of you who have been misled
our names will live on and on instead


My saviour my guide hussain hussain
The meaning of life hussain hussain
Ill say till i die hussain hussain





Hussain is your name, Hussain is your name
The one who was slain, The one who was slain
whose blood fell like rain
so much was your pain
we cry upon you, we cry upon you
the pious and true, the pious and true
like you there are few
who have that virtue
the one and only
the true and holy
we are so lowly
lead us to glory
the grandson of prophet of islam
you saved the world oh my third imaam
peace be upon you we send salaams


My saviour my guide hussain hussain
The meaning of life hussain hussain
Ill say till i die hussain hussain

the worlds become cruel and lost its conscience
the meaning of peace has lost its essence
the times come for mehdis reappearance
how can we go on without his guidance
when allah chooses to lift the veil
then only truth and love will prevail
dishonesty and deceit will fail


My saviour my guide hussain hussain
The meaning of life hussain hussain
Ill say till i die hussain hussain

“tejani brothers” are yours forever
‘cause master like you there is no other
your love flows in our hearts like a river
we are your slaves and you are our master
we wanna stand up on judgement day
to be by your side and hear you say
I am your leader please come this way
 
My saviour my guide hussain hussain
The meaning of life hussain hussain
Ill say till i die hussain hussain
 
(Hussain, O’ Hussain, Hussain, O’ Hussain) x2

tracks.title: Zainab (SA)
tracks.lyrics:
(Haaye Zainab, haaye Zainab) x2
 
Issi Hussain ko roya hai umr bhar Sajjad
Issi Hussain ka jangal mei ghar huwa barbaad
Issi Hussain ki khaahar hai Zainab-e-nashaad
Likha hai jiski rida par Hussain Zindabad
Uthi to shaam-e-ghariba(n) ki roshni bankar
Aur chali to sare shaheedo(n) ki zindagi bankar
Qasam khuda ki, Zainab ki mehnat se baaqi hai kaayenaat
Ye zindagi hai uski nikaali huwi zakaat
 
(Haaye Zainab, haaye Zainab) x2
Zainab
 
(Hai tuhi jaane sayyeda zainab, dine ahmad ka aasra zainab) x3
 
1.     (Tere darbaar me jo jayega, jolia(n) bharke lot aayega) x2
Joliyaa(n) bhar ke lot aayenga, Hai tera naam mojeza zainab
 
(Hai tuhi jaane sayyeda zainab, dine ahmad ka aasra zainab) x2
 
2.     (mujhko wo cheez milgayi rab se, mere lab pe thi jo dua kab se) x2
mere lab pe thi jo dua kab se, bas tera waasta diya zainab
 
(Hai tuhi jaane sayyeda zainab, dine ahmad ka aasra zainab) x2
 
3.     (Tere dar par wo aake roti hai, jo bhi khatu(n) ki god khaali hai) x2
Jo bhi khatu(n) ki god khaali hai, Tohfa bacho(n) ka kar ata Zainab
 
(Hai tuhi jaane sayyeda zainab, dine ahmad ka aasra zainab) x2
 
4.     (Tere roze pe jab nazar jaaye, ashk se dil hamara bhar jaaye) x2
Ashk se dil hamara bhar jaaye, Tute dil ki hai tu dawa Zainab
 
(Hai tuhi jaane sayyeda zainab, dine ahmad ka aasra zainab) x2
 
5.     (tere dar par malak bhi aate hain, apni hajaat ka ajr paate hain) x2
Apni haajat ka ajr paate hai, kitna uncha hai martaba zainab
 
(Hai tuhi jaane sayyeda zainab, dine ahmad ka aasra zainab) x2
 
6.     (Sharm se ghazi ro raha hoga, Takht se jab yazid ne pucha) x2
Takht se jab yazid ne pucha, Hai kaha(n) ghazi ab tera Zainab
 
(Hai tuhi jaane sayyeda zainab, dine ahmad ka aasra zainab) x2
 
7.     (Tegh khutbon ki yu(n) chalaayi thi, ke hukumat ko cheen laayi thi) x2
Ke hukumat ko cheen laayi thi, Tu hai islam ki baqa zainab
 
(Hai tuhi jaane sayyeda zainab, dine ahmad ka aasra zainab) x2
 
8.     (gham ko dilpar tumhe uthaana hai, tumko darbaar mei bhi jaana hai) x2
Tumko darbaar mei bhi jaana hai, Fatema ki ho ayina zainab
 
(Hai tuhi jaane sayyeda zainab, dine ahmad ka aasra zainab) x2
 
9.     (Aise sheyr-e-khuda ke lehje mei, apne khutbe sunaaye majme mei) x2
Apne khutbe sunaaye majhme mei, tujhse razi huwa khuda zainab
 
(Hai tuhi jaane sayyeda zainab, dine ahmad ka aasra zainab) x2
 
10.     (Kya guzarti rahi tere dilpar, samne tha shimar liye khanjar) x2
Saamne tha shimar liye khanjar, Tere bhayi pe jab chala zainab
 
(Hai tuhi jaane sayyeda zainab, dine ahmad ka aasra zainab) x2
 
11.     (tere ghazi ka hai saja parcham, aaj ghar ghar bapa hai jo matam) x2
Aaj ghar ghar bapa hai jo matam, hai “tejani” teri dua zainab
 
(Hai tuhi jaane sayyeda zainab, dine ahmad ka aasra zainab) x2

tracks.title: Ya hussain ibn-e-Ali
tracks.lyrics:
(Hussain ya hussain) x4
Kullu yawmin ashura, kullu ardin karbala
(Hussain ya hussain) x2
 
Waris-e-ilm-e-nabi, ya hussain ibn-e-ali
(Waris-e-ilm-e-nabi, ya hussain ibn-e-ali, tere sadqe se mili, zindagi hamko yahi) x2
 
1.     Dasht karbal me tera, laash teeron pe para,
Rorahi thi ye zami(n), aasma(n) rota raha
Haaye madar wo teri, bayn ye karti rahi,
Ay mere pyaare hussain, god me aawo zara
Sarakhat fatematah, al Hussainun qatalah,
yarqudu alas-seham, waa Habibi waladi
 
(Waris-e-ilm-e-nabi, ya hussain ibn-e-ali, tere sadqe se mili, zindagi hamko yahi) x2
 
2.     Tere asghar ka gala, tere akbar ka jigar,
Bhaayi abbas ke gham, me teri tutti kamar,
Aur paamal badan, ran me qasim ka huwa
Eik din me hi luta, karbala me tera ghar
DhubiHoo kullu baneen, tasjudu anta jabeen,
tashkuru khaaliqaka, ya ilaaha al-azali
 
(Waris-e-ilm-e-nabi, ya hussain ibn-e-ali, tere sadqe se mili, zindagi hamko yahi) x2
 
3.     Ran me talwar bina aaye abaase ali,
Har taraf hamla huwa, mashke paani bhi chidi,
Ankh me teer laga aur paywast huwa,
Dono bazu ko kata, ke gira asbe jari
Wa huwa kullu al-wafa’, yasrukhu bar wa samaa’,
saqat Abbas jari, min Hisaanin khashbi
 
(Waris-e-ilm-e-nabi, ya hussain ibn-e-ali, tere sadqe se mili, zindagi hamko yahi) x2
 
4.     Haaye besheer tera, bezaba(n) qatl huwa,
Pyaas ke badl jisse, zulm ka teer mila
Alqama roti rahi, larzi karbal ki zami(n)
Tumne jab uska lahu, apne chehre pe mala
Wa baka nahrul furaat, raahat min jismi hayaat,
‘inda waslis sahami, ‘ala Hulqoom iz-zaki
 
(Waris-e-ilm-e-nabi, ya hussain ibn-e-ali, tere sadqe se mili, zindagi hamko yahi) x2
 
5.     Asr ashur ka waqt, kaise hum bhool sake
Ayi awaaze aza(n), aap gore se gire,
Khayme ke darpe teri, behn khu(n) roti rahi
Tha tera paak gala, shimr ke tegh tale
Aktubu kayfa ana, rabbuka yandhurka,
thumma Allah yaqool, irji’ee ila rabbuki
 
(Waris-e-ilm-e-nabi, ya hussain ibn-e-ali, tere sadqe se mili, zindagi hamko yahi) x2
 
6.     Aag se khayme jale, sar se chaadar bhi chhini,
Dasht me tanha sakina teri roti rahi
Toq me bandha gaya, tere abid ka gala,
Teri mazlum behan, berida shaam chali
Ash’alu kullul khiyam, feeha abnaaul imaam,
udhhibu ahlan-nabi, ila qasar il-umawi
 
(Waris-e-ilm-e-nabi, ya hussain ibn-e-ali, tere sadqe se mili, zindagi hamko yahi) x2
 
7.     Tere sajde se bachaa, hai namaaz aur qura(n)
Aaj masjid se jo aati hai awaaze azaa(n)
Humko karbal ne sikhaya hai jine ka hunar,
Teri qurbaani se baqi hai ye arz-o-samaa(n)
Ya imaam al-abraar, anta ya bal ahraar,
saabirun ibn sabur, ya ameeral al-abadi
 
(Waris-e-ilm-e-nabi, ya hussain ibn-e-ali, tere sadqe se mili, zindagi hamko yahi) x2
 
8.     Aaj ghar ghar hai saja, tere ghazi ka alam,
Umr bhar humko rulaata rahega tera gham
Har gali aur shahr, tera matam hai bapa
Khu(n) bahaate hi rahenge tere naam pe hum
‘umruna feeka fida, ahluna kullu laka,
nadhkurooka sayyidee, ya Hussain ibni ‘Ali
 
(Waris-e-ilm-e-nabi, ya hussain ibn-e-ali, tere sadqe se mili, zindagi hamko yahi) x2
 
9.     Hai “tejani” ka qalam, aur dil nawha kunaa(n)
Ye muqaddar hi tera, kistarha hoga bayaa(n)
Jalti reyti pe para, tera laasha bekafan
Aapke paak badan, se huwa khun rawaa(n)
Jismuka fawqa turab, wa damun kullu thiyaab,
ihtaraq jismuka min, barri wa ash-shamsi ghali
 
(Waris-e-ilm-e-nabi, ya hussain ibn-e-ali, tere sadqe se mili, zindagi hamko yahi) x2
 
(Hussain ya hussain) x2

tracks.title: Kya kya batawu(n) mei nana
tracks.lyrics:
Ye teri zainab, laut ke aayi,
Khu(n) bhara kurta, bhayi ka laayi
Kistarha nana me batawu(n) ye,
Na bacha ghazi, na bacha bhayi
 
(Kya kya batau(n) me nana, karbal me kayse luta ghar) x2
 
1.     Roro ke zainab pukari, nana ke roze pe jaakar
 
Kya kya batau(n) me nana, karbal me kayse luta ghar
 
2.     Tile se mene ye manzar, khud apni ankho(n) se dekha,
Teero(n) ki jab darmiya(n) me, bhayi ka laasha para tha,
Gardan pe ahista zalim, hass ke chalata tha khanjar
 
Kya kya batau(n) me nana, karbal me kayse luta ghar
 
3.     Karyal jawaa(n) mera akbar, dam tordta tha jalti zami(n) par,
Halqum par teer khakar, khamosh tha nanna asghar,
Karbal me maa(n) fatema ka, ik pal me ujra bhara ghar
 
Kya kya batau(n) me nana, karbal me kayse luta ghar
 
4.     Mashkiza jab chid gaya tab, abbas ki aas tutti,
Bazu qalam hogaye aur, zee(n) se gira mera ghazi,
Maqtal me lasha para aur, aya alam khunn me tar
 
Kya kya batau(n) me nana, karbal me kayse luta ghar
 
5.     Shame ghariba(n) ka manzar, bhulugi me na kabhi bhi,
Khayme jale sab humare, sar se rida chhin gayi thi,
Had he ke chhina gaya tha, bimar abid ka bistar
 
Kya kya batau(n) me nana, karbal me kayse luta ghar
 
6.     Bara gale ik rasan me, burdhe jawa(n) sab bandhe the,
Beparda thi binte zahra, bazaar saare saje the,
Kayi baar girta zamin par, neze se abbass ka sar
 
Kya kya batau(n) me nana, karbal me kayse luta ghar
 
7.     Amma ki tarha bhi mene laal apne dono lutaaye,
Baba ki tarha bhi khanjar, khutbo(n) ki mene chalaaye,
Bazaar me yu(n) phiri hu(n), chadar ko apni lutaakar
 
Kya kya batau(n) me nana, karbal me kayse luta ghar
 
8.     Manga sakina ko shaami, ne jab kanizi me nana,
Sajaad ghayrat ke maare, darbar me margaya tha,
Pardes me kaysi ghurbat dhhaterahe yu(n) sitamgar
 
Kya kya batau(n) me nana, karbal me kayse luta ghar
 
9.     Nana me na lasaki hu(n), bhayya ki wo ik amanat,
Viran zinda(n) me jiski, haye huwi thi shahadat
Daman bhi uska jala aur, zalim ne chhine the gohar
 
Kya kya batau(n) me nana, karbal me kayse luta ghar
 
10. zainab ki faryad sunkar, turbat se awaaz ayi
islam tune bachaaya, ay meri pyari nawaasi
sunke “tejani” bapa tha, kohram yasrab ke andar
