(Kya kya batau(n) me nana, karbal me kayse luta ghar) x2

tracks.title: Faryad suno meri
tracks.lyrics:
(Ay mere akhi abbas) x3
 
(Faryad suno meri, ik baar mujhe bhaayi, kehkar to bula ghazi) x2
 
1.     bachpan me tera jhula, haathon se jhulaaya tha
hathon ko tere lekar, chalna bhi sikhaaya tha
ab in hathon se me, kistarha uthaauga, bin baazu ye laash teri
 
(Faryad suno meri, ik baar mujhe bhaayi, kehkar to bula ghazi) x2
 
2.     Aankho(n) ka diya tum ho, Khaliq ki ata tum ho
Baba ne jo maangi thi, rabse wo dua tum ho
Saqqaye Sakina ho, Zainab ki rida tum ho, tum hi ho kamar meri
 
(Faryad suno meri, ik baar mujhe bhaayi, kehkar to bula ghazi) x2
 
3.     Teero(n) ke musalle par, sar ko mei kataawunga
Kya dekh sakoge tum, mei khu(n) mei nahawunga
Zakhmi mere sine se, har khun ke qatre se, awaaz ye aayengi
 
(Faryad suno meri, ik baar mujhe bhaayi, kehkar to bula ghazi) x2
 
4.     Akbar ka kaleja hai, nazro(n) mei mere bhayya
Asghar ka lahu hoga, haatho(n) mei mere bhayya
May kisko pukarunga, may kisko sada dunga, batlaado mere ghazi
 
(Faryad suno meri, ik baar mujhe bhaayi, kehkar to bula ghazi) x2
 
5.     Sunteho Sakina ke, lab par hai fughaa(n) bhai,
Lot aao mere ammu, paani nahi mangungi
Ab rut na jaawo tum, itna to zara socho, marjaayegi wo bachi
 
(Faryad suno meri, ik baar mujhe bhaayi, kehkar to bula ghazi) x2
 
6.     Maut aayengi zindaa(n) mei, Masoom Sakina ko
Ro ro ke sada degi, ammu mere ajaawo
Jaan(n) apni gawakar wo phir sham ke zinda(n) se, na lot ke aaegi
 
(Faryad suno meri, ik baar mujhe bhaayi, kehkar to bula ghazi) x2
 
7.     Rukh karke najaf ka phir ghazi ne kaha baba
Ab paas nahi baazu, may kya karu ya Zahra
Maula hai akela ab, karbal me bachi hai bas, Shabbir ki tanhayi
 
(Faryad suno meri, ik baar mujhe bhaayi, kehkar to bula ghazi) x2
 
8.     Sunkar ye sada sheh ki, abbas ka tan tarpa
Jalti huwi reti par ghazi ka badan larza
Kaese mere aaqa may, jaau(n) dare khaime par, jab paas nahi paani
 
(Faryad suno meri, ik baar mujhe bhaayi, kehkar to bula ghazi) x2
 
9.     Aaqa may sue khaima, hargiz nahi jaaunga
May kaise sakina ko, mu(n) apna dikhaunga
Ab roze qayamat tak, Darya ke kinaare se, uthwaana na laash meri
 
(Faryad suno meri, ik baar mujhe bhaayi, kehkar to bula ghazi) x2
 
10. Karbal me “Tejani” thi shabbir ki ye haalat
Ik baar kaho bhaayi, puri ho meri hasrat
Abbas ke hoto(n)se, ek baar sada aai, shabbir mere bhayi

tracks.title: Pathar ki barish
tracks.lyrics:
(Pathar ki barish, shahzaadiyo(n) par, Kusloom ke sar, par thi na chadar) x2
 
1.     Qasim nahi hai(n), Akbar nahi hai(n)
Had hai yahi ke, Asghar nahi hai(n)
Ab na bacha hai, koi sahara
Kulsoom ka hai, ye bayn lab par
 
(Haaye shaam ka majma, aada ka hai nargha, abbas chale aawo) x2
 
2.     Aun-o-Muhammad, ko laayi zainab
Bacho(n) ko qurbaan, kar aayi zainab
Sadmaa-e-kulsoom bas yahi tha,
Qurbaan kardu(n), mei kisko sheh par
 
(Pathar ki barish, shahzaadiyo(n) par, Kusloom ke sar, par thi na chadar) x2
 
3.     Abbas aaye khaime me dekha,
Sar ko jukaaye bethi thi behna,
Kulsum tumhaare naam par me,
sar apna dunga maqtal me jaakar
 
(Pathar ki barish, shahzaadiyo(n) par, Kusloom ke sar, par thi na chadar) x2
 
4.     Kulsum kaise bhoole wo manzar
Jalte the khayme, chhinti thi chaadar
Abid ko jhalte khaymo(n) se Zainab
Kaandho(n) pe laayi, abbas bankar
 
(Pathar ki barish, shahzaadiyo(n) par, Kusloom ke sar, par thi na chadar) x2
 
5.     Shaam-e-gharibaa(n), jab ban me chaayi
Bali Sakina, maqtal me aayi
Kulsoom tanha, ban mei khari thi
Koi nahi tha, munis-o-yawar
 
(Pathar ki barish, shahzaadiyo(n) par, Kusloom ke sar, par thi na chadar) x2
 
6.     Masum bachi, darbaar ka dar,
Noke sina par hai baap ka sar,
Har ik taraf hai ghayron ka majma
Kisko bulaaye, sarwar ki dukhtar
 
(Pathar ki barish, shahzaadiyo(n) par, Kusloom ke sar, par thi na chadar) x2
 
7.     Parde ka zamin, Abbas ka sar
Rehta nahi hai, nok-e-sina par
Bazaar mei jab, kulsoom aayi
Manzar na sehpaya wo dilawar
 
(Pathar ki barish, shahzaadiyo(n) par, Kusloom ke sar, par thi na chadar) x2
 
8.     Kaise chalengi, beti ali ki,
chaaro(n) taraf hai majma sharabi
Zalim ka majma, sarwar ka kunba
Guzrenge kaise, aal-e-payambar
 
(Pathar ki barish, shahzaadiyo(n) par, Kusloom ke sar, par thi na chadar) x2
 
9.     Darbaar me jab zalim ne pucha
Tumme se zainab hai naam kiska
Darbar ka dar rokar pukara
Ho tum kahaan ay fatahe khaybar
 
(Pathar ki barish, shahzaadiyo(n) par, Kusloom ke sar, par thi na chadar) x2
 
10. Bus ye dua hai kulsoom bibi,
Nawha sunaaye jab bhi “tejani”
Har dam rahe hum dono pe qayam,
Ghazi ke parcham, ka saya sar par
 
(Pathar ki barish, shahzaadiyo(n) par, Kusloom ke sar, par thi na chadar) x2

tracks.title: Al ajal
tracks.lyrics:
Ayna talibu bi dhuhulil anbiya, ayna talibu bi damil maqtooli bi karbala
 
(Alajal ya imam, ya imame zamaan) x4
 
1.     Har taraf jahan me zulm aur jafa hai
Aaj aake dekho, waqt kya para hai
Saare momino ke lab pe ye sada hai
Inteqame karbala humko dekhna hai
Har gari hamare dil me bus dua hai
 
(Alajal ya imam, ya imame zamaan) x4
 
2.     Ab munfiqat ka dor chal raha hai,
Bekhata lahu ko jo bahaa raha hai
Zulm ki hukumat, aaj har jaga hai
Samarra me dekho, haye kya huwa hai
Aaj be alaamat, qabr-e-sayyeda hai
 
(Sayyeda fatemah, sayyeda fatemah) x4
 
3.     Tum bhi mere maula ibne sayyeda ho
Jaane mustafa ho, ibne murtaza ho
Maula askari kai, aap mehlaqa ho
Aaj aap maula, shaahe karbala ho
Zalimo(n) ke sar ki, aap hi qaza ho
 
(Alajal ya imam, ya imame zamaan) x4
 
4.     Aap ayiye ab, muntazir hai kabaa
leke awo khanjar, shahe la fatah ka
aap ayenge jab, inqelab hoga
aap ka hai sadqa, ye jahaan saara
naam leraha hai, har malak tumhara
 
(Alajal ya imam, ya imame zamaan) x4
 
5.     parchame hussaini haath me uthaawo
mausame adalat, aap leke aawo
farsh ab aza ka, har jaga bichaawo
aur diya aza ka, har taraf jalaawo
Rab se jo kiya hai, wada tum nibhaawo
 
(Alajal ya imam, ya imame zamaan) x4
 
6.     Kaise bhool jaaye(n), Karbala ka manzar
Shaah-e-karbala tha, zee(n) pe na zamee(n) par
Pyaasa wo gale par, chal raha tha khanjar
Khayme se ye Zainab, keh rahi thi rokar
Babajaa(n) bachaawo, karbala mei aakar
 
(Alajal ya imam, ya imame zamaan) x4
 
7.     Darke niche zahra jabke gir rahi thi
Haath tha kamar par baap ko sada di
Mohsine ali ko jabke kho rahi thi
Marte marte zahra deti thi duhayi
Ab hai unki badla teri zimmedari
 
(Alajal ya imam, ya imame zamaan) x4
 
8.     Kayinaat me hai har zaba(n) pe naaraa
Inteqame zahra lijiye khudaaraa,
Aap ko “tejani” ne hai ab pukaaraa
Dijiye qalam ko aap ka sahaaraa
Nohay jab parhe ham saath ho tumhaaraa
 
(Alajal ya imam, ya imame zamaan) x4

tracks.title: Paas apne bulaalo
tracks.lyrics:
Shaame ghariba(n), ban me andhera
Maqtal me aayi, bali sakina,
Rokar pukari haaye wo dukhiya,
Kaha(n) ho baba, kaha(n) ho baba
 
(Baba me dhundti hun, jungle me khogayi hu(n), paas apne bulalo) x2
 
1.     Ik baar bas me sine, par sona chahti hu(n), paas apne bulalo
 
(Baba me dhundti hun, jungle me khogayi hu(n), paas apne bulalo) x2
 
2.     Begoro bekafan hai, baba tumhara lasha
Hai khun ka samandar or raat ka andhera
Sina tumahara baba, laasho(n) mei dhundti hu(n), paas apne bulalo
 
(Baba me dhundti hun, jungle me khogayi hu(n), paas apne bulalo) x2
 
3.     Bus ye mujhe bataado, me kaise tumko pawun
Din raat yaad karke, baba me mar na jawun
Phelaaye haath apne, maidan me khari hu(n), paas apne bulalo
 
(Baba me dhundti hun, jungle me khogayi hu(n), paas apne bulalo) x2
 
4.     Kis jaa ho mere baba, aawaz do me aawu(n)
Mei bewatan hu(n) baba, kisko mei ab bulaawu(n)
Ye soch soch kar mei, maqtal mei ro rahi hu(n), paas apne bulalo
 
(Baba me dhundti hun, jungle me khogayi hu(n), paas apne bulalo) x2
 
5.     Asghar ko leke baba, maydaan me sogaye ho,
Soye jahan ho baba, mujhko wahi bulaalo
Godi me kya tumhare, me bhi nahi pali hu(n), paas apne bulalo
 
(Baba me dhundti hun, jungle me khogayi hu(n), paas apne bulalo) x2
 
6.     Karbobala ke ban mei, ghar lut gaya hamara
Bhayi chacha nahi hai, sab lut gaye sahaara
Veeran ghar hai saara, tanha mei rehgayi hu(n), paas apne bulalo
 
(Baba me dhundti hun, jungle me khogayi hu(n), paas apne bulalo) x2
 
7.     Ammu mere kaha(n) ho, tum sheyr-e-bawafa ho
Bali meri chhini hai, daman jala hai dekho,
Mangungi ab na pani, bas itna chahti hu(n), paas apne bulalo
 
(Baba me dhundti hun, jungle me khogayi hu(n), paas apne bulalo) x2
 
8.     Ab khaliye tamaache, chadar chhini hai sar se
kaano(n) se khu(n) hai jaari, hai khaak mere sar pe
Meri taraf bhi dekho, kis haal mei pari hu(n), paas apne bulalo
 
(Baba me dhundti hun, jungle me khogayi hu(n), paas apne bulalo) x2
 
9.     Kya aa rahi hai tum tak, roneki ye saddae(n)
Ay karbala sunaado, baba ko ye nidaae(n)
Beythi huwi zamee(n) par, mei haath jordti hu(n), paas apne bulalo
 
(Baba me dhundti hun, jungle me khogayi hu(n), paas apne bulalo) x2
 
10. Sunkar sada "Tejani", ik laash ne pukara
Aawo meri sakina, baba hun me tumhara
Kehna na ab meri jaan, baba me khogayi hu(n), paas apne bulaalo

tracks.title: Teer-e-sitam chala ke
tracks.lyrics:
(Kya milgaya sitamgar, teere sitam chalaa ke) x2
 
1.     (Zahra ka dil dukhaya) x2 asghar ka khu(n) bhahaa ke
 
(Kya milgaya sitamgar, teere sitam chalaa ke) x2
 
2.     (Tash-heere zulm apni khud ki hai zalimo(n) ne) x2
(Akhir huwe paresha(n)) x2 naizo(n) pe sar charhaa ke
 
(Kya milgaya sitamgar, teere sitam chalaa ke) x2
 
3.     (Asghar ke baad kisko mayda(n) mai(n) shah laaye(n)) x2
(Kuchh teer reh gaye hai(n)) x2 tarkash mei(n) hurmala ke
 
(Kya milgaya sitamgar, teere sitam chalaa ke) x2
 
4.     (Laashe jawaa(n) pisar hai abbas jald awo) x2
(Shabbir hai(n) sarhaane) x2 hum shakle mustafa ke
 
(Kya milgaya sitamgar, teere sitam chalaa ke) x2
 
5.     (Jur’at ki manzilo(n) se azmat ki inteha tak) x2
(Lehra rahe hai(n) parcham) x2 zainab teri rida ke
 
(Kya milgaya sitamgar, teere sitam chalaa ke) x2
 
6.     (“ashoor” khune na haq awaaz de raha hai) x2
(zamin huwe hai(n) asghar) x2 islam ki baqa ke
 
(Kya milgaya sitamgar, teere sitam chalaa ke) x2

tracks.title: Ya panjetan (AS)
tracks.lyrics:
Innama yureedullahu li yudh’hiba ‘ankumur-rijsa, ahlal bayti way u tahhirakum tatheera
 
(Ya mustafa, ya murtaza, ya zahra, ya hassanain) x2
 
1.     Tumhaare naam ke sadqe mei, Mile hai(n) dono jahaa(n) humko
Tumhare naam ki hai ye zami(n), mila hai tumse qur’a(n) humko
Kiya hai rab ne karam apna, tumhaare khatir aalam par
Tumhare noor ke qatro(n) se, mila hai noor-e-jahaa(n) hamko
 
(Ya mustafa, ya murtaza, ya zahra, ya hassanain) x2
 
2.     Wo kaysa zakhm-e-judaayi tha, Nabi ke paak gharaane par
Ghame firaaqe mohammed ko, kabhi na bhool sake haider
Sahara Fatemah ka hai china, gale mei haider ke rassi
Fidak ko chheen chheenenge zalim, jalega tera yaqeenan dar
 
(Ya mustafa, ya murtaza, ya zahra, ya hassanain) x2
 
3.     Azeem rab ki qasam khaakar, nahi hai isme koi bhi shak
Ali ki tarha bahaddur to, jahaa(n) mei koi nahi ab tak
Nahi mukammal inke bina, payghaam-e-Ahmed deen-e-khuda
Ali ke naam pe chalta hai, ye kayinaat ka har maslak
 
(Ya mustafa, ya murtaza, ya zahra, ya hassanain) x2
 
4.     Wo dar ko kyu(n) nahi pehchaana, jise rasul bhi bosa de,
Wo dar jalaya zalim ne, jaha pe maut ijaazat le,
Wo pasliyo(n) pe giraya dar, ye kaysa waqt hai zahra par
Ke ghash me binte payambar thi, wo darpe fizza sadaae de
 
(Ya mustafa, ya murtaza, ya zahra, ya hassanain) x2
 
5.     Urawo khaak azadaro, ye matami ka taqaza hai
Abhi firaaqe zahra ka, jigar me zakhm bhi taza hai
Jigar ke tukre waha nikle, kafan hai aapka khun me tarr
Nahi hai jurm siwa iske, ye mujtaba ka janaza hai
 
(Ya mustafa, ya murtaza, ya zahra, ya hassanain) x2
 
6.     Wohi Hussain jisse ahmed, dete the gardan par bosa
Wo jalti rayt pe karbal me, para hai zahra ka jaaya
Gala hussein ka pyaasa hai, jo kund khanjar se hai kata,
Shimar laeen tha sine par khanjar jo has ke chalata tha
 
(Ya mustafa, ya murtaza, ya zahra, ya hassanain) x2
 
7.     Ye kayse log the karbal me, khudara zulm hai ye kaysa,
Jo mustafa ka tha pyaara, ussi hussein ko hai maaraa
Ab imtehan hai ye logo, abhi hai shaam abhi kufa
Ali ki betiya(n) hai dar dar, hujoom ghayr ka hai saaraa
 
(Ya mustafa, ya murtaza, ya zahra, ya hassanain) x2
 
8.     Zamana dekh raha hai ab, teri duao(n) me kya dam hai,
Ke do jahaan mei ay zahra, tere Hussain ka matam hai
Rakhenge zinda qayamat tak, Yahi "Tejani" ka wada hai
Kabhi na hoga ye gham kam, hamare sine me ye dam hai
 
(Ya mustafa, ya murtaza, ya zahra, ya hassanain) x2

tracks.title: Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko
tracks.lyrics:
(Shah Ast Hussain, Badshaah Ast Hussain, Dee(N) Ast Hussain, Dee(N) Panah Ast
Hussain) X2

(Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko, Rota Hai Ye Saraa Jahaan) X3 Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko

  1. (Teen Din Ki Pyaas Me Shabbir Ka Wo Imtihaan) X2

Sar Zamine Karbala Roti Thi Roya Aasmaan

(Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko, Rota Hai Ye Saraa Jahaan) X2 Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko

  2. (Samne Darya Tha Lekin Tashnalab Asgher Raha) X2

Kehti Thi Bali Sakina Hai Labo Par Meri Jaan

(Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko, Rota Hai Ye Saraa Jahaan) X2 Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko

  3. (Hazrate Abbas Ke Bazu Kalam Jab Hogaye) X2

Kehti Thi Zainab Saro Se Uth Gaya Hai Sayebaan

(Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko, Rota Hai Ye Saraa Jahaan) X2 Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko

  4. (Sinaye Akbar Me Barchi Toot Kar Jab Rehgayi) X2

Kehte The Imdaad Ko Jald Aayiye Ay Baba Jaan

(Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko, Rota Hai Ye Saraa Jahaan) X2 Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko

  5. (Khoon Me Asgher Naha Kar Sogaya Maidan Me) X2

Deyr Tak Rote Rahe Asgher Pe Sab Teero Kamaan

(Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko, Rota Hai Ye Saraa Jahaan) X2 Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko

  6. (Jab Sare Shabbir Zindaa(N) Me Sakina Ko Milaa) X2

Roke Dikhlane Lagi Rukh Par Tamaacho Ke Nishaan

(Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko, Rota Hai Ye Saraa Jahaan) X2 Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko

  7. (Yaad Ajaata Tha Akbar Madare Akbar Ko Phir) X2

Jab Kabhi Kaano Me Aajati Thi Awaaze Azaan

(Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko, Rota Hai Ye Saraa Jahaan) X2 Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko

  8. (Tukre Tukre Hogaya Kasim Ka Laasha Dasht Me) X2

Laash Ke Tukre Uthate Rehgaye Shahe Zamaan

(Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko, Rota Hai Ye Saraa Jahaan) X2 Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko

  9. (Kal Ghame Shabbir Me Zainab Ko Na Rone Diya) X2

Ro Raha Hai Aaj Maula Aap Ko Saaraa Jahaan

(Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko, Rota Hai Ye Saraa Jahaan) X2 Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko

  10. (Hazrate "Shabbir" Ho Ya Hazrate "Abbas" Ho) X2

Degaye "Rehan" Dine Haq Pe Dono Apni Jaan

(Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko, Rota Hai Ye Saraa Jahaan) X2 Aaj Bhi Shabbir Ko

tracks.title: Abbas-E-Alamdar
tracks.lyrics:
(Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar) X4

  1. Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar, Tumsa To Zamaane Me Nahi Koyi Wafadar,

(Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar) X2

  2. Hai Naame Wafa Aaj Talak Tujse Hi Baaki

Rakhi Jo Sare Aab Hai Bunyaad Wafaa Ki

Is Baat Se Karsakta Nahi Koyi Bhi Inkaar

(Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar) X2

  3. Kha Sakta Nahi Jhooti Kassam Koyi Tumhaari

Hai Ek Siffat Baab-E-Hawaaij Bhi Tumhaari

Tu Chahe To Ruk Jaaye Abhi Waqt Ki Raftaar

(Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar) X2

  4. Ik Mashk Bhari Nehr Se, Ik Mashk Diya Khoon

Jab Mashk Chidi Behgaya Sine Se Tera Khoon

Zainab Ne Kahaa Maara Gaya Mera Madadgaar

(Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar) X2

  5. Dharas Tha Sakina Ki Alamdar Ka Peykar

Jab Tak Raha Zindaa Na Chini Bibi Ki Chadar

Baad Aap Ke Dakhil Huwe Khaymo(N) Me Sitamghar

(Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar) X2

  6. Tum Bazuwe Shabbir Ho Haider Ke Pisar Ho

Lashkar Ke Alamdar Sakina Ka Jigar Ho

Jitey Hai(N) Tumhe(N) Dekh Ke Bas Sayyede Abraar

(Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar) X2

  7. Tum Ruh-E-Ali, Jaan-E-Hussain, Ibn-E-Ali Ho

Tum Ibne Wali, Ibne Wali, Ibne Wali Ho

Hai Dushamne Dee(N) Ke Liye Bazu Teri Talwaar

(Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar) X2

  8. Paani Pe Alam Tere Siwaa Kisne Lagaya

Mashkize Me Darya Ko Tumhi Ne Hai Uthaya

Tum Lashkar-E-Shabbir Ke Ho Haider-E-Karrar

(Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar) X2

  9. Tum Fatema Zehra Ki Duwawo Ka Asar Ho

Tum Dhoop Me Zainab Ke Liye Misle Shajar Ho

Parcham Ka Pharayra Hai Tera Aisa Hawaadar

(Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar) X2

  10. Haider Ne Namaazo Me Jo Allah Se Manga

Kehte The Khuda De Mujhe Abbas Sa Beta

Wo Jisko Kahe Sara Arab Ghaziyo Jarrar

(Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar) X2

  11. "Rehan" Kalam Zikre Alamdar Karenga

"Abbas" Ke Munkir Ko Jo Talwaar Lagenga

Wo Mere Madadgaar Hai Mai Unka Hu Ghamkhwaar

(Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar) X2

  12. Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar, Tumsa To Zamaane Me Nahi Koyi Wafadar,

(Abbas-E-Alamdar, Abbas-E-Alamdar) X2

tracks.title: Zainab Ne Kaha Bhayi
tracks.lyrics:
(Ay Mere Bhayi Hussain) X4

(Zainab Ne Kaha Bhayi, Sadaa Kyu Nahi Dete) X3

  1. (Sote Ho Kahaa(N) Mujko) X2 Bataa Kyu Nahi Dete

(Zainab Ne Kaha Bhayi, Sadaa Kyu Nahi Dete) X2

  2. (Zainab Ka Khula Sar Hai, Majma Hai Laeeno Ka) X2

Chadar Koyi Zainab Ko Urha Kyu Nahi Dete

Sote Ho Kahaa(N) Mujko Bataa Kyu Nahi Dete

(Zainab Ne Kaha Bhayi, Sadaa Kyu Nahi Dete) X2

  3. (Lo Kayd Huwi Bhayya, Zindaa(N) Ko Chali Behna) X2

Hai Chaaro Taraf Aada Hataa Kyu Nahi Dete

Sote Ho Kahaa(N) Mujko Bataa Kyu Nahi Dete

(Zainab Ne Kaha Bhayi, Sadaa Kyu Nahi Dete) X2

  4. (Gohar Jo Sakina Ko Pehnaye The Ay Bhayi) X2

Wo Shimr Ne Chhine Hai Dila Kyu Nahi Dete

Sote Ho Kahaa(N) Mujko Bataa Kyu Nahi Dete

(Zainab Ne Kaha Bhayi, Sadaa Kyu Nahi Dete) X2

  5. (Bhaya Tere Laashe Ko Pehnawu Kafan Kaise) X2

Qaydi Hu Laeeno Se Chura Kyu Nahi Dete

Sote Ho Kahaa(N) Mujko Bataa Kyu Nahi Dete

(Zainab Ne Kaha Bhayi, Sadaa Kyu Nahi Dete) X2

  6. (Kis Tarha Se Kufe Ka Tanhaa Me Safar Katoo(N)) X2

Sajjad Ko Tum Ghash Se Jagaa Kyu Nahi Dete

Sote Ho Kahaa(N) Mujko Bataa Kyu Nahi Dete

(Zainab Ne Kaha Bhayi, Sadaa Kyu Nahi Dete) X2

  7. (Ab Zulm Laeeno Ke Me Seh Nahi Pawu(N)Gi) X2

Bhayya Muje Marne Ki Dua Kyu Nahi Dete

Sote Ho Kahaa(N) Mujko Bataa Kyu Nahi Dete

(Zainab Ne Kaha Bhayi, Sadaa Kyu Nahi Dete) X2

  8. (Rehan Naa Ghabrawo Tum Qabr Ke Manzar Se) X2

Ek Nawha Farishto Ko Sunaa Kyu Nahi Dete

Sote Ho Kahaa(N) Mujko Bataa Kyu Nahi Dete

(Zainab Ne Kaha Bhayi, Sadaa Kyu Nahi Dete) X2

tracks.title: Qasim Ke Janaaze Pe
tracks.lyrics:
(Haaye Qasim, Haay Haay Qasim, Shahzada Mera Qasim) X2

(Qasim Ke Janaaze Pe Kya Dard Ka Manzar Hai) X3

  1. Roti Hai Phuphi Uski, Haaye Roti Hai Phuphi Uski, Nawhaa Kuna Madar Hai

(Qasim Ke Janaaze Pe Kya Dard Ka Manzar Hai) X2

  2. (Sab Khu(N) Me Bharaa Sehra Poshaak Darida Hai) X2

Pamaal Badan Saara, Haaye Pamaale Badan Saraa, Aur Khaak Ka Bistar Hai

(Qasim Ke Janaaze Pe Kya Dard Ka Manzar Hai) X2

  3. (Mehndi Hai Lahu Wali Nawhshaah Ke Haatho Mei) X2

Saaye Ke Liye Sar Par, Haaye Saaye Ke Liye Sar Par, Bas Dhoop Ki Chadar Hai

(Qasim Ke Janaaze Pe Kya Dard Ka Manzar Hai) X2

  4. (Tukre Tha Jigar Jese Ay Maula Hassan Tera) X2

Tukro Mei Yahaa Maula, Haaye Tukro Me Yahaa Maula, Waise Tera Dilbar Hai

(Qasim Ke Janaaze Pe Kya Dard Ka Manzar Hai) X2

  5. (Maa Kehti Thi Qasim Ki Ay Laal Kahaan Jawu(N)) X2

G(H)Ayre Huwe Khaymo Ko, Haaye G(H)Ayre Huwe Khaymo Ko, Kuffar Ka Lashkar Hai

(Qasim Ke Janaaze Pe Kya Dard Ka Manzar Hai) X2

  6. (Ik Gathri Me Laate Hai(N) Shabbir Ye Kya Ran Se) X2

Awaaze Falak Ayi, Haaye Awaaze Falak Aayi, Lakhte Dile Shabbar Hai

(Qasim Ke Janaaze Pe Kya Dard Ka Manzar Hai) X2

  7. (Behno Ne Kiya Matam Qasim Ke Janaaze Par) X2

Masroofe Fughaa Saari, Haaye Masroofe Fugha Saari, Awlaade Payambar Hai

(Qasim Ke Janaaze Pe Kya Dard Ka Manzar Hai) X2

  8. (Shah Kehte The Ay Qasim Kyu(N) Tuj Ko Ajal Ayi) X2

Sine Me Mere Beta, Haaye Sine Me Mere Beta, Ik Dard Ka Khanjar Hai

(Qasim Ke Janaaze Pe Kya Dard Ka Manzar Hai) X2

  9. (Bikhra Hai Tera Sehra Jalti Huwi Reyti Par) X2

Har Phool Ki Ankho(N) Me, Haaye Har Phool Ki Ankho(N) Me, Ashko Ka Samandar
Hai

(Qasim Ke Janaaze Pe Kya Dard Ka Manzar Hai) X2

  10. ("Rehan" Zaraa Socho Laashe To Bahattar Hai(N)) X2

Rone Ke Liye Tanha, Haaye Rone Ke Liye Tanha, "Shabbir" Ki Khahar Hai

(Qasim Ke Janaaze Pe Kya Dard Ka Manzar Hai) X2

tracks.title: Har Aza Khane Me Hai
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain, Ya Hussain) X4

(Har Azaa Khane Me Hai Matam Bapaa Shabbir Ka) X2

(Hai Zami(N) Se Asman Tak) X2 Tazkira Shabbir Ka

  1. (Asre Ashoora Jab Aayi Rehgaye Tanha Hussain) X2

(Ik Behen Thi Saath Me) X2 Sarpar Khuda Shabbir Ka

(Har Azaa Khane Me Hai Matam Bapaa Shabbir Ka) X2

  2. (Hur Chalaa Jataa Tha Dozakh Ki Taraf Chalta Huwa) X2

(Phir Achanak Milgaya) X2 Tha Raasta Shabbir Ka

(Har Azaa Khane Me Hai Matam Bapaa Shabbir Ka) X2

  3. (Bujh Gaya Suraj Yazidi Fawj Ka Ik Roz Me) X2

(Jal Raha Hai Aaj Tak) X2 Lekin Diya Shabbir Ka

(Har Azaa Khane Me Hai Matam Bapaa Shabbir Ka) X2

  4. (Koyi Roye Ya Na Roye Uski Ye Taqdir Hai) X2

(Khud Muhammad Parh Rahe Hai) X2 Marsiya Shabbir Ka

(Har Azaa Khane Me Hai Matam Bapaa Shabbir Ka) X2

  5. (Ay Falak Tu Hi Bataa Ye Zayre Khanjar Kon Hai) X2

(Ye Muhammad Ka Galaa Hai) X2 Ya Galaa Shabbir Ka

(Har Azaa Khane Me Hai Matam Bapaa Shabbir Ka) X2

  6. (Teen Din Ki Pyaas Me Laashe Uthaye Kis Qadar) X2

(Sabr Dekho Zabt Dekho) X2 Hosla Shabbir Ka

(Har Azaa Khane Me Hai Matam Bapaa Shabbir Ka) X2

  7. (Tu Bataa Shame Ghariba(N) Baade Shahe Karbala) X2

(Khanaaye Kaabaa Jalaa Ya) X2 Ghar Jalaa Shabbir Ka

(Har Azaa Khane Me Hai Matam Bapaa Shabbir Ka) X2



  8. (Khof Kya "Rehan" Usko Hashr Ke Hangaam Se) X2

(Jisko Bachpan Se Rahaa) X2 Ho Aasra "Shabbir" Ka

(Har Azaa Khane Me Hai Matam Bapaa Shabbir Ka) X2

  9. (Hai Zami(N) Se Asman Tak) X2 Tazkira Shabbir Ka

(Har Azaa Khane Me Hai Matam Bapaa Shabbir Ka) X2

(Matam Bapaa Shabbir Ka) X3

tracks.title: Maa Kehti Thi Asghar
tracks.lyrics:
(Haaye Asghar, Haay Haay Asghar) X3

(Maa Kehti Thi Asghar Mere Ghar Lawt Ke Aana) X3

  1. Royi Hu Bhare Ghar Ko, Muje Tum Na Rulaana

(Maa Kehti Thi Asghar Mere Ghar Lawt Ke Aana) X2

  2. (Tu Bol Nahi Sakta Hai, Kya Mangega Paani) X2

Ay Nehr Mere Laal Ko, Tu Paani Pilaana

(Maa Kehti Thi Asghar Mere Ghar Lawt Ke Aana) X2

  3. (Talwaar Utha Sakte Nahi, Tum Mere Beta) X2

Tum Teer-E-Tabassum Hi Ko Hathyaar Banaana

(Maa Kehti Thi Asghar Mere Ghar Lawt Ke Aana) X2

  4. (Maydan Me Barsaat Hai Teero(N) Ki Meri Jaan) X2

Ay Laal Mere Teero(N) Se, Tum Khud Ko Bachana

(Maa Kehti Thi Asghar Mere Ghar Lawt Ke Aana) X2

  5. (Aah Nad-E-Ali Dam Karoo(N) Gardan Pe Teri Mei) X2

Hai Radde Balaa Ke Liye, Nuskha Ye Puraana

(Maa Kehti Thi Asghar Mere Ghar Lawt Ke Aana) X2

  6. (Sunti Hu(N) Lagaa Teer Gale Par Tere Beta) X2

Ye Zakhme Guloo Khuld Mei, Daada Ko Dikhana

(Maa Kehti Thi Asghar Mere Ghar Lawt Ke Aana) X2

  7. (Maloom Tha Mujhko Ke Tumhe Pyaas Hai Kaysi) X2

Marne Ke Liye Paani Ka, Karte The Bahaana

(Maa Kehti Thi Asghar Mere Ghar Lawt Ke Aana) X2

  8. ("Rehan" Dua Karta Hu(N) Nohay Ke Sile Me) X2

"Shabbir" Ka Shaair Hi, Kahe Mujhko Zamana

(Maa Kehti Thi Asghar Mere Ghar Lawt Ke Aana) X2

(Haaye Asghar, Haay Haay Asghar) X3

tracks.title: Bekafan Bhayi Ka Chehlum
tracks.lyrics:
Haye Zainab, Haay Haay Zainab, Haaye Zainab, Haaye Zainab

(Bekafan Bhayi Ka Chehlum Karne Ayi Hai Bahan) X3

  1. (Phool Ashko Ke Kafan) X2 Chadar Ka Layi Hai Bahan

(Bekafan Bhayi Ka Chehlum Karne Ayi Hai Bahan) X2

  2. (Dekh Ay Mazloom Bhayi, Ay Mere Be Sar Hussain) X2

(Sar Tera Ehle Sitam) X2 Se Cheen Layi Hai Bahan

(Bekafan Bhayi Ka Chehlum Karne Ayi Hai Bahan) X2

  3. (Teri Majlis Ki Binaa Mei Daal Ayi Shaam Mei) X2

(Tujpe Rone Ke Liye) X2 Zindaa(N) Se Ayi Hai Bahan

(Bekafan Bhayi Ka Chehlum Karne Ayi Hai Bahan) X2

  4. (Kehti Thi Abbas Ke Lashe Pe Aake Nawha Ghar) X2

(Bhayi Tere Baad To) X2 Khu(N) Me Nahayi Hai Bahan

(Bekafan Bhayi Ka Chehlum Karne Ayi Hai Bahan) X2

  5. (Mene Tere Halk Per Chalti Huwi Dekhi Hai Tegh) X2

(Dil Jigar Zakhmi Hai Sab) X2 Gham Ki Sataayi Hai Bahan

(Bekafan Bhayi Ka Chehlum Karne Ayi Hai Bahan) X2

  6. (Lashaaye Shabbir Se Aati Thi Ye Peyham Sadaa) X2

(Yu(N) Na Ro Tere Liye) X2 Maghmoom Bhayi Hai Bahan

(Bekafan Bhayi Ka Chehlum Karne Ayi Hai Bahan) X2

  7. (Karbala Se Shaam Tak Tha Me Tere Saath Bahan) X2

(Chot Jo Tere Laghi) X2 Wo Mene Khayi Hai Bahan

(Bekafan Bhayi Ka Chehlum Karne Ayi Hai Bahan) X2

  8. (Lashaye Abbas Tarpa Dekh Kar Ye Haal Zaar) X2

(Neel Shaano Par Liye) X2 Jis Waqt Ayi Hai Bahan

(Bekafan Bhayi Ka Chehlum Karne Ayi Hai Bahan) X2

  9. (Bhayi Se Kehti Thi Tere Abid-E-Bimaar Ko) X2

(Tera Lasha Dafn Karne) X2 Saath Layi Hai Bahan

(Bekafan Bhayi Ka Chehlum Karne Ayi Hai Bahan) X2

  10. (Lashaye "Shabbir" Se Ati Thi Awaaz "Rehan") X2

(Amma Meri Laash Par) X2 Rone Ko Ayi Hai Bahan

(Bekafan Bhayi Ka Chehlum Karne Ayi Hai Bahan) X2

  11. (Phool Ashko Ke Kafan) X2 Chadar Ka Layi Hai Bahan

(Bekafan Bhayi Ka Chehlum Karne Ayi Hai Bahan) X2

tracks.title: Ya Haider-E Karrar
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Haider-E Karrar) X9

  1. Jibreel Nawha Parte Hai, (Mare Gaye Ali) X2

Maula-E-Kayinaat Pe Talwaar Chalgayi

(Ya Haider-E Karrar) X6

  2. Masjid Udaas Mimbare Kufa Udaas Hai

Tar Khoon Me Khuda Ke Wali Ka Libaas Hai

Rota Hai Asmaan Zami(N) Ghamse Phat Gayi

Jibreel Nawha Parte Hai, (Mare Gaye Ali) X2

Maula-E-Kayinaat Pe Talwaar Chalgayi

(Ya Haider-E Karrar) X6

  3. Masjid Me Rozadar Par Kaysa Sitam Huwa

Kabe Se Aa Rahi Hai Sadaa Wa Musibata

Ghamse Nabi Ki Kabr Bhi Ab Kaampne Lagi

Jibreel Nawha Parte Hai, (Mare Gaye Ali) X2

Maula-E-Kayinaat Pe Talwaar Chalgayi

(Ya Haider-E Karrar) X6

  4. Haay Haay Yateem Shabbar-O-Shabbir Hogaye

Abbas Dilko Thaamke Rote Huwe Chale

Sarse Ridaaye Zainab-O-Kulsum Girgayi

Jibreel Nawha Parte Hai, (Mare Gaye Ali) X2

Maula-E-Kayinaat Pe Talwaar Chalgayi

(Ya Haider-E Karrar) X6

  5. Duniya Mei Bekaso Ka Sahara Nahi Raha

Utraa Tha Jo Falak Se Sitara Nahi Raha

Arshe Bareen Pe Farshe Azaa Aaj Bichgayi

Jibreel Nawha Parte Hai, (Mare Gaye Ali) X2

Maula-E-Kayinaat Pe Talwaar Chalgayi

(Ya Haider-E Karrar) X6

  6. Maula Mera Jo Khoon Me Apne Naha Gaya

Bole Farishte Haye Ye Kaisa Sitam Huwa

Hurrain Ye Roke Kehti Thi Duniya Ujargayi

Jibreel Nawha Parte Hai, (Mare Gaye Ali) X2

Maula-E-Kayinaat Pe Talwaar Chalgayi

(Ya Haider-E Karrar) X6

  7. Zehra Lahad Me Roti Hai Haider Ke Waste

Kehti Hai Cheyn Kabr Ke Andar Nahi Muje

Bacho Pe Mere Gham Ki Ghata Aaj Chhagayi

Jibreel Nawha Parte Hai, (Mare Gaye Ali) X2

Maula-E-Kayinaat Pe Talwaar Chalgayi

(Ya Haider-E Karrar) X6

  8. "Rehan" Mere Saath Me Rone Lagaa Kalam

Aankho Se Mere Jaari Huwe Ayse Ashke Gham

Chalte Huwe Kalam Ke Mere Saas Rukh Gayi

Jibreel Nawha Parte Hai, (Mare Gaye Ali) X2

Maula-E-Kayinaat Pe Talwaar Chalgayi

(Ya Haider-E Karrar) X6

tracks.title: Rozey Per Mustafa Kay
tracks.lyrics:
Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

Rokar Pukari Nana Aay Faryad Laaie Hoon, Mai Choor Kar Hussain Ku Jungal Main
Aaie Hoon

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

  1. Nana Ajeeb Saanahai Ham Par Guzar Gaya
Ranj-O-Alam Ne Gher Liyaa Hum Jidhar Gaye
Nana Khudaa Kai Ghar Mai Na Hum Ku Amaan Mili
Bhaaie Ne Shahar Choor Ke Jangal Ki Raah Li

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

  2. Nana Hamain Na Chain Mayassar Kahain Huwa
Paani Bhi Bandh Hum Pai Layenoon Nai Kardiya
Nana Tumhari Aal Pai Kya Kya Sitam Huwai
Bachai Tarap Kai Mar Gaye Paani Kai Waastai

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

  3. Nana Shaheed Ho Gaye Bhayee Kai Jaannisar
Ek Ek Kar Kai Mar Gaye Ashab-E-Zee Waqar
Nana Bala Kai Ban Main Qayamat Ka Run Para
Bhayee Sai Bhayee Baap Sai Beta Bichar Gaya

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

  4. Nana Zameene Karbobalaa Laa Hogayi
Qasim Ki Laash Ghooron Se Paamaal Hogayi
Nana Kataa Ke Shanon Ku Abbas Margaye
Ghurbat Me Bhaaijaan Ko Be Aas Kargaye

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

  5. Nana Tumhari Shakl Ka Farzand Ek Jo Tha
Khaa Kar Sina Jigar Mai Wo Mehru Bhi Chal Basa
Nana Shaqi Ki Teer Se Asgar Huwa Shaheed
Aisa Huwa Na Hoga Jahaan Main Sitam Shadeed

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

  6. Nana Hussain Bai Kas-O-Bai Yaar Hogaie
Aamada Qatl Karnai Ku Kuffar Hogaie
Tarpai Jo Zer Khanjare Bai Aab Shahai Deen
Shimre Layeen Kai Zulm Sai Thar Ra Gaye Zameen

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

  7. Nana Hamare Ghar Ka Sab Asbab Lut Gaya
Nana Hamare Sar Pe Na Baqi Rahee Rida
Nana Hazaar Tarha Jafa Ki Layeeno Ne
Khaimo Mai Aag Lagaadi Laeeno Ne

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

  8. Nana Huwi Aseer Tumhaari Nawasiyaan
Kauno Makaan Main Chaa Gayi Gham Ki Udaasiyaan
Nana Haram Hussain Kai Bazaar Main Gaye
Hum Sar Barehna Kufe Ke Darbar Main Gaye

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

  9. Nana Tumhaari Aal Gayi Mulke Shaam Mai
Pohnchi Ali Ki Betiyaan Darbaare Aam Mai
Nana Haqeer Sahebbe Tatheer Hogaye
Ham Log Shehr Shaam Main Tash-Heer Hogaye

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

  10. Nana Aseer Bara Thai Hum Ek Thi Rasan
Baandhe Gaye Thai Misle Gunaahgaar-E-Khastatan
Nana Hum Apne Haal Pe Rote Thai Zaar Zaar
Nana Hamaare Roonai Pe Haste Thai Badshaiaar

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

  11. Nana Ajeeb Haal Hamaaraa Tha Us Ghadi
Ek Bibi Pichhe Dusri Bibi Kai Chupti Thi
Us Wakt Thar Thari Si Merai Tan Main Par Gayi
Sad Haif Hai Zammen Main Zainab Na Ghar Gayi

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

  12. Itne Me Ek Shaami Nai Nana Ghzab Kiya
Saidani Ku Kaneezi Main Apni Talab Kiya
Hoti Thi Laakh Zillaten Hum Dekhte Rahe
Hans Hans Ke Taaziyaane Sitam Jhelte Rahe

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

  13. Nanaa Tabaah Hoke Ham Aaye Hain Shaam Se
Ek Daaghe Nau Sakina Ka Laaye Hai Shaam Se
Nana Hamare Tan Pe Nishaano Ko Dekh Lo
Ab Tak Hai Neel Rassi Ke Shaanon Ko Dekh Lo

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

  14. Zainab Dekha Kai Shanoon Ku Jab Karrahi Thi Bayaan
Tharaa Rahaa Tha Rouzae Sultaane Mashraqain
Bas Khatm Kar Nashar Ye Ghamnaak Daastaan
Rotai Hain Is Alam Main Zameen Aur Aasmaan

Roze Pe Mustafa Ke Udasee Si Chaaie Hai, Kunbe Ku Khoke Zainabe Nashaad Aaie
Hai

tracks.title: Ammu Bhi Gayae
tracks.lyrics:
Jis Dam Jale Khayame, Shahin Shaah-E-Bahr-O-Bar, Ek Bachi Nikli Khimese, Us
Dam Barehna Saar, Jalta Tha Daaman Aag Sai, Kapre Thay Khoon Main Tar, Maqtal
Ki Simt Rukh Kiye, Jaati Thi Nauhagar, Saab Ran Main Jaake Rehgaye, Tanha
Hamai Kiya, Aadane Chini Chadarain, Khaima Jala Diyaa

(Ammu Bhi Gayae, Baba Bhi Gayae) X4

  1. (Taa Hadde Nazar Laashae Hain Parae) X2 (Bandhe Halqa Aada Hain Khare) X2 (Ghar Jalta Hai Zar Luta Hai) X4 Waaris Na Rahe

(Ammu Bhi Gayae, Baba Bhi Gayae) X2

  2. (Luta Zewar Chini Chadar) X2 (Hain Al-E-Muhammad Nange Saar) X2 (Karte Hain Jafa Hum Par Aada) X4 Koun Ab Roke

(Ammu Bhi Gayae, Baba Bhi Gayae) X2

  3. (Bar Waqt Phuphi Khime Main Gayi) X2 (Bistar Hi Jala Bas Khair Huwai) X2 (Tap Hai Aysa Gash Main Bhayya) X4 Aabid Hain Pare


(Ammu Bhi Gayae, Baba Bhi Gayae) X2

  4. (Dam Ghut Ta Hai Phaila Hai Dhuwan) X2 (Ab Jaayan Kahan Jo Payan Aaman) X2 (Hai Kaun Yahan Jo Ja Kai Wahan) X4 Qasim Sai Kahai

(Ammu Bhi Gayae, Baba Bhi Gayae) X2

  5. (Aathara Baras Youn Pala Tha) X2 (Pardes Main Akbar Hongai Juda) X2 (Seena Kubi Karti Hai Phuphi) X4 Kar Kai Naalai


(Ammu Bhi Gayae, Baba Bhi Gayae) X2

  6. (Naloon Sai Kaleja Phat Taa Hai) X2 (Ek Dard Saa Dil Main Uth Taa Hai) X2 (Maa Roti Hai Jaan Khoti Hai) X4 Asghar Na Rahe

(Ammu Bhi Gayae, Baba Bhi Gayae) X2

tracks.title: Shabhi E Payambar
tracks.lyrics:
(Shabih-E-Payambar Akbar, Nauha Kare Maa) X2

  1. Shaah Ka Dilbar Akbar, Nauha Kare Maa


Shabih-E-Payambar Akbar, Nauha Kare Maa. Shaah Ka Dilbar Akbar Nauha Kare Maa

  2. (Armaan Bohot Tha Main Tere Shaadi Rachawoon) X2 (Ek Roz Dulhan Chand Si Main Bayaah Kai Laawoon) X2 Bayaah Kai Laawoon. Par Laash Pe Roti Hai Tere Kookh Jali Maa


Shabih-E-Payambar Akbar, Nauha Kare Maa. Shaah Ka Dilbar Akbar Nauha Kare Maa

  3. (Zinda Thay Tumhe Dekh Ke Ab Kaysai Jienge) X2 (Socha Tha Terai Bayaah Ki Poshak Sienge) X2 Poshak Sienge. Par Tujh Ku Kafan Bhi Na Mila Haaie Meri Jaan


Shabih-E-Payambar Akbar, Nauha Kare Maa. Shaah Ka Dilbar Akbar Nauha Kare Maa

  4. (Roti Hai Phuphi Jis Nai Tumhe Laad Sai Pala) X2 (Tum Kya Gayae Rukhsat Huwa Is Ghar Sai Ujala) X2 Is Ghar Sai Ujala. Ek Baap Zaiefe Main Huwa Be Sar-O-Saman


Shabih-E-Payambar Akbar, Nauha Kare Maa. Shaah Ka Dilbar Akbar Nauha Kare Maa

  5. (Mar Jaie Jawaan Lal Agar Dour Watan Sai) X2 (Mahroom Ho Ghurbat Kai Sabab Gor-E-Kafan Sai) X2 Gor-E-Kafan Sai. Tarpata Hai Is Waqt Mai Kya Tangi-E-Daman


Shabih-E-Payambar Akbar, Nauha Kare Maa. Shaah Ka Dilbar Akbar Nauha Kare Maa

  6. (Abbas Ka Sadma Bhi, Abhi Kam Na Huwa Tha) X2 Aysai Mai Meri Jaan Tera Waqt-E-Ajal Aaya X2 Waqt-E-Ajal Aaya. Tum Margayai Kuyn Mar Na Gaie Lal Teri Maa


Shabih-E-Payambar Akbar, Nauha Kare Maa. Shaah Ka Dilbar Akbar Nauha Kare Maa

  7. (Bimaar Behan Takti Hai Beta Tera Raasta) X2 (Pardes Main Aayae To Rahaa Yaad Na Waada) X2 Yaad Na Waada. Maqtal Kiya Aabaad Madina Kiya Wiraan


Shabih-E-Payambar Akbar, Nauha Kare Maa. Shaah Ka Dilbar Akbar Nauha Kare Maa

  8. (Phir Ta Hai Meri Ankh Main Ab Tak Wahi Manzar) X2 (Ay Jaan-E-Pader Noor-E-Nazar Ay Ali Akbar) X2 Ay Ali Akbar. Hamshakl-E-Nabi Kehte Thay Tum Ku Shah-E-Zeeshaan


Shabih-E-Payambar Akbar, Nauha Kare Maa. Shaah Ka Dilbar Akbar Nauha Kare Maa

  9. (Allah Nigehban Tumhara Mere Pyaare) X2 (Ham Loge Rasan Basta Sue Shaam Sidhare) X2 Shaam Sidhare. Sota Hai Terai Saath Yahin Asghar-E-Naadan


Shabih-E-Payambar Akbar, Nauha Kare Maa. Shaah Ka Dilbar Akbar Nauha Kare Maa

  10. (Pyaase Thay Bohot Pyaas Ye Kis Tarah Bujhaai) X2 (Is Chaand Sai Sine Pe Sinaa Zulum Ki Khayi) X2 Zulum Ki Khayi. Tum Sote Ho Maa Jaati Hai Beta Suie Zindaan


Shabih-E-Payambar Akbar, Nauha Kare Maa. Shaah Ka Dilbar Akbar Nauha Kare Maa

tracks.title: Ya Ali Ya Aliya
tracks.lyrics:
Ya Ali Ya Ayliya Ya (Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab) X2 Bhayi Mera Katl Huwa Ayiye
Baba Shitaab Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab

  1. Lo Phel Gaya Sham-E-Ghariban Ka Andhera

Asbaab Luta Jal Gaya Sadaat Ka Khayme

Be Goro Kafan Ran Me Hai Shabbir Ka Lasha

Sab Mare Gaye Dasht Mein Zainab Huwi Tanha

Asghar-E-Besheer Ko Rone Lagi Umme Rabaab

Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab, Ya Ali Ya Ayliya Ya (Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab) X2 Bhayi
Mera Katl Huwa Ayiye Baba Shitaab Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab

  2. Mare Gaye Ek Roz Me Sab Foj-E-Hussaini

Har Lamha Musibat Thi Nahi Hamne Jo Dekhi

Be Moniso Ghamkhwaar The Yawar Na Tha Koyi

Tha Asr Ka Hangaam Ke Awaaz Ye Gunji

Mara Gaya Haider Ka Pisar Dasht Mei Be Aab

Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab, Ya Ali Ya Ayliya Ya (Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab) X2 Bhayi
Mera Katl Huwa Ayiye Baba Shitaab Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab

  3. Haye Wo Behen Jiske Hu Athaare Biradaar

Aur Baap Bhi Jis Beti Ka Ho Fatha-E-Khayber

Narge Me Laeeno Ki Wo Mazloom Khule Sar

Kaise Na Kare Nawha Wo Phir Khaak Uraa Kar

Nawha Kunaa Khuld Mei Hai Ruh-E-Risalat Mu’aab

Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab, Ya Ali Ya Ayliya Ya (Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab) X2 Bhayi
Mera Katl Huwa Ayiye Baba Shitaab Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab

  4. Kat Ke Jo Gire Khaak Pe Abbas Ke Bazu

Ruktehi Na The Ankh Me Shabbir Ke Ansu

Mei Khayme Me Roti Thi Wo Rote The Labe Ju

Matam Hi Tha Matam Hi Tha Matam Hi Tha Har Su

Kehte The Shabbir Ke Yaa Laytani Kuntu Turaab

Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab, Ya Ali Ya Ayliya Ya (Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab) X2 Bhayi
Mera Katl Huwa Ayiye Baba Shitaab Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab

  5. Akbar Ka Jigar Hogaya Barchi Se Do Paraa

Aur Asghar-E-Masoom Bhi Mara Gaya Pyaasa

Tukre Huwe Maydaan Me Naushaah Ka Lasha

Mara Gaya Wo Sher Jo Tha Sab Ka Sahara

Aun-O-Muhammad Ka Mila Khaak Mei Kaisa Shabaab

Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab, Ya Ali Ya Ayliya Ya (Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab) X2 Bhayi
Mera Katl Huwa Ayiye Baba Shitaab Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab

  6. Asghar Ke Lagaa Teer Me Roti Rahi Baba

Mare Gaye Shabbir Me Roti Rahi Baba

Haste Rahe Bepeer Me Roti Rahi Baba

Sheh Pe Chali Shamsheer Me Roti Rahi Baba

Dekhiye Pardes Me Kismat Huwi Meri Kharaab

Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab, Ya Ali Ya Ayliya Ya (Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab) X2 Bhayi
Mera Katl Huwa Ayiye Baba Shitaab Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab

  7. Ab Bali Sakina Ko Sataate Hai Sitamghar

Kuch Kar Nahi Sakti Ke Rasan Basta Hai Madar

Paband Salaasil Hai Mera Abid-E-Muztar

Zainab Ke Kaleje Par Chale Zulm Ke Khanjar

Kya Karu Baba Mere Me Dijiye Kuch To Jawaab

Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab, Ya Ali Ya Ayliya Ya (Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab) X2 Bhayi
Mera Katl Huwa Ayiye Baba Shitaab Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab

  8. Asghar Ke Lagaa Teer Me Roti Rahi Baba

Mare Gaye Shabbir Me Roti Rahi Baba

Haste Rahe Bepeer Me Roti Rahi Baba

Sheh Pe Chali Shamsheer Me Roti Rahi Baba

Dekhiye Pardes Me Kismat Huwi Meri Kharaab

Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab, Ya Ali Ya Ayliya Ya (Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab) X2 Bhayi
Mera Katl Huwa Ayiye Baba Shitaab Bul Hassan Ya Bu Turab

tracks.title: Ae Alamdar-E Husain
tracks.lyrics:
(Ah Uftaz-E Sitam. Dasht-E Alamdar-E Husain.) X2

(Ae Alamdar-E Husain) X6

  1. (Ay Bahan, Ay Bahan, Matam-E Abbas-E Ali Ki Jo Bapa.) X2

Karte The, Karte The Pit-E Ke Sar Hazrat-E Shabbir Pukar

Ho Gaya Katl-E Mera Bhayi Nahi Dil Ko Chain



Ah Uftaz-E Sitam. Dasht-E Alamdar-E Husain.

(Ae Alamdar-E Husain) X6



  2. (Bi Khabar, Bi Khabar, Pehle Yuhi Fazle Alamdar Huwe) X2

Chadare, Chadare Gir Pariye Sinte Haram Ke Sar Se

Karti Thi Aa Nahi Baki Na Tere Laam Se Bain



Ah Uftaz-E Sitam. Dasht-E Alamdar-E Husain.

(Ae Alamdar-E Husain) X6



  3. (Ay, Bahan, Ay Bahan, Tere Bira Gar Ki Kamar Khun Se Jari) X2

Bhayi Ka, Bhayi Ka Pyaaz-E Meri Kuwat-E Dillu Se Chali

Kyu Na Matam Karo Sar Pito Karu Rokar Bain



Ah Uftaz-E Sitam. Dasht-E Alamdar-E Husain.

(Ae Alamdar-E Husain) X6



  4. (Khayme Ke, Khayme Ke Dard-E Azi Band He Sakina, Zainab) X2

Ye Khabar, Ye Khabar Sunke Na Marjaye Hasina, Zainab

Kistar Ha Uske Bataayenge Je Mazloom-E Husain



Ah Uftaz-E Sitam. Dasht-E Alamdar-E Husain.

(Ae Alamdar-E Husain) X6



  5. (He Kaha, He Kaha Sowdaye Abbas Yaha Bulwalo) X2

Uska Hum, Uska Hum Dainge Une Bacho Ko Bhi Layawo

Haye Duniya Se Utha Mustaza Ka Noore Ayn



Ah Uftaz-E Sitam. Dasht-E Alamdar-E Husain.

(Ae Alamdar-E Husain) X6

tracks.title: Kufe Ka Aur Shaam Ka Manzar
tracks.lyrics:
Kufe Ka Aur Shaam Ka Manzar

_

Kufe Ka Aur Shaam Ka Manzar

1. Yaad Jab Aajata Hai Baba, Dil Mera Phat Jaata Hai Baba,

Kufe Ka Aur Shaam Ka Manzar

2. Kabr Pe Shabbir Ki Karte The Abid Bhuka,

Hogayi Kya Kya Jafa, Suniye Shahe Karbela,

Sar Pe Kisi Ke Na Thi Chadar

Yaad Jab Aajata Hai Baba, Dil Mera Phat Jaata Hai Baba,

Kufe Ka Aur Shaam Ka Manzar

3. Ek Rasan Me Bandhe Chote Baro Ke Gale,

Barsare Darbar Sab Is Tarha Laaye Gaye,

Kothe Se Barsaat The Pathar,

Dil Mera Phat Jaata Hai Baba,

Yaad Jab Aajata Hai Baba, Dil Mera Phat Jaata Hai Baba,

Kufe Ka Aur Shaam Ka Manzar

4. Kufe Ke Baazar Me Majma-E Kafar Me,

Ek Tamasha Sa Tha, Aale Sitam Gaar Me,

Ayse Me Maa Behne Khule Sar,

Yaad Jab Aajata Hai Baba, Dil Mera Phat Jaata Hai Baba,

Kufe Ka Aur Shaam Ka Manzar



5. Tok Se Hargis Na Tha Baba Mera Sar Juka,

Hath Kari Aur Beri Ka Koi Muje Gham Na Tha,

Arey Dekha Nahi Jata Tha Manzar,

Yaad Jab Aajata Hai Baba, Dil Mera Phat Jaata Hai Baba,

Kufe Ka Aur Shaam Ka Manzar

6. Arey Bali Sakina Ka Gham Dil Ye Nahi Bhul Ta,

Sab Ke The Shaane Bandhe Uska Bandha Tha Galaa,

Arey Dard Se Wo Roti Thi Mustar,

Yaad Jab Aajata Hai Baba, Dil Mera Phat Jaata Hai Baba,

Kufe Ka Aur Shaam Ka Manzar

7. Maktalo Tarikh Ki Kar Na Sake Hak Ada,

Likha Ani Se Hazi Girya-E Abid Kiya,

Arey Kahte The Ye Abide Muztar,

Yaad Jab Aajata Hai Baba, Dil Mera Phat Jaata Hai Baba,

Kufe Ka Aur Shaam Ka Manzar

albums.title: Ham Hussaini Hai Duniya Mei Phele Huwe

tracks.title: Tamam Alam Me Aaj Matam
tracks.lyrics:
(Tamam Alam Me Aaj Matam, Husain Bekas Ka Ho Raha Hai) X2

  1. Alam Garo(N) Me Saje Huwe Hai. Dilo(N) Me Farshe, Aza Bicha Hai

(Tamam Alam Me Aaj Matam, Husain Bekas Ka Ho Raha Hai) X2

  2. (Siyaah Kapre, Siyaah Chadar. Gamo Ke Gardo Gabaha Asr Par) X2 Hai Sog Waaro Ke Ashk Jari. Ke Saniye Zehra Be Ridaa Hai

(Tamam Alam Me Aaj Matam, Husain Bekas Ka Ho Raha Hai) X2

  3. (Hussain Piri, Me Dil Sambhale. Ke Dil Se Ulji, Sina Nikale) X2 Jawan Beta Lahu Me Duba. Zami Pe Eri Ragar Raha Hai

(Tamam Alam Me Aaj Matam, Husain Bekas Ka Ho Raha Hai) X2

  4. (Na Maro Barchi, Dil-E-Nabi Par. Abhi Huwe Hai, Jawan Akbar) X2 Ye Katl Jisko Tu Kar Raha Hai. Yehi To Hum Shakl Mustafa Hai

(Tamam Alam Me Aaj Matam, Husain Bekas Ka Ho Raha Hai) X2

  5. (Madine Walo, Khamosh Rehna. Gharib Zainab, Se Kuch Na Kehne) X2 Basa Huwa Gharjo Legayi Thi. Wo Karbala Me Ujar Gaya Hai

(Tamam Alam Me Aaj Matam, Husain Bekas Ka Ho Raha Hai) X2

  6. (Na Chashm Purnaam Ho Kyu(N) Sawaali, Juloos Hai Zuljanah Khaali) X2 Ke Mere Duldul Sawaar Maula, Zameen-E-Karbal Mei So Raha Hai

(Tamam Alam Me Aaj Matam, Husain Bekas Ka Ho Raha Hai) X2

  7. (Alam-E-Mashk-E-Sakina Dekho, To Momino(N) Bas Ye Kehke Rolo) X2 Chacha Bhateeji Mei Kya Hai Nisbat, Wafa-E-Abbas Ki Kya Wafa Hai

(Tamam Alam Me Aaj Matam, Husain Bekas Ka Ho Raha Hai) X2

  8. (Azaye Shabbir Hai Ibadat. Janabe Zainab Ki Hai Amanat) X2 Ye Nawha Tere Kalam Se Mehshar. Janabe Zehra Ki Ik Ata Hai

(Tamam Alam Me Aaj Matam, Husain Bekas Ka Ho Raha Hai) X2

tracks.title: Maa Or Ali Akbar Ki Maa
tracks.lyrics:
Jab Ali Akbar Se Beta, Shah-E Ko Rab Ne Diya. Is Ataaye Kibriya Par, Karbala
Ne Di Sadaa.

(Maa Or Ali Akbar Ki Maa) X2

1. Uska Matha Chum Tithi Ume Layla Bar Bar,

Uska Chehra Dekh Kar Kehtithi Ay Parwardigar,

Ye Bahare Zindagi Hai, Ye Mere Gar Ki Bahaa,

Ye Meri Pehli Tamana, Ye Mere Dil Ka Karaar.

(Maa Or Ali Akbar Ki Maa) X2

2. Kali Dori Bandti Nani Kalaai Me Kabhi,

Nane Sine Par Kabhi Kar Tithi Dam Nade Ali,

Kehti Thi Murjaye Na Maula Mere Dil Ki Kali,

Ye Dile Shabbir Hai, Hai Hamari Zindagi

(Maa Or Ali Akbar Ki Maa) X2

3. Gutniyo Chalne Laga Jis Waqt Unka Sheerkhwaar,

Saaf Karti Apne Anchal Se Wo Uski Reh Guzar,

Eh Khuda Na Khaasta Chub Jaye Na Bache Ki Khaal,

Chalte Chalte Jab Wo Thakta Pusht Pe Karti Sawaar

(Maa Or Ali Akbar Ki Maa) X2

4. Khayr Se Jab Umr Bhar Kar Uska Is Kabul Huwi,

Jis Me Gehware Ki Khahish Ho Na Maa Ki God Ki,

Bachpana Rukhsat Talab Ho Aur Shabab Ahmed Ghari,

Jab Jawani Aa Rahi Ho Aur Masi Ho Bhigti

(Maa Or Ali Akbar Ki Maa) X2

5. Sab Kunu Ne Harb Sikla Te The Abbase Jari,

Sehn Me Khursi Bicha Kar Maa Bhi Aksar Dekhti,

Mashk Ke Doran Ek Din Yuhi Neze Ki Ani,

Chu Gayi Sine Se Layla Par Ghashita Ri Huwi

(Maa Or Ali Akbar Ki Maa) X2

6. Kya Khabar Thi Umme Layla Ke Wo Din Bhi Ayenga,

Byah Ka Arman Dil Ka Dil Me Hi Rehjayenga,

Laashe Qasim Ki Tarha Tukro Me Dil Katjayenga,

Nawjawaan Ki Laash Par Sehra Sajaa Ya Jayenga

(Maa Or Ali Akbar Ki Maa) X2

7. Umme Layla Dil Sambalo Arsh Se Aayi Sadaa,

Barchiyo Ki Simtey Jaata Hai Tumhara Meh Lakaa,

Ye Karo Ruksat Ke Jaise Ho Tamam Baraat Ka,

Khak Me Miljayengi Nana Shabi Ho Mustufa

tracks.title: Bhayi Me Zainab Hu
tracks.lyrics:
(Bhayi Me Zainab Hu) X4

Pehchano Mujko Ay Mere Gazi Zainab Hu Me Bhayi

(Bhayi Me Zainab Hu) X4

Ye Karbala Hai Jagir Tere (Ham Aye Tere Jagir Me) X2

Marjaye Zindan Me Hi Sakina (Yehi Likha Tha Takdir Me) X2

Pehchano Mujko Ay Mere Gazi……..

Zindan Se Chut Kar Me Agayi Hu (Ranjo Alam Ki Chadar Liye) X2

Bazar Kufa Me Hai Jo Guzri (Ankho Me Sare Manzar Liye) X2

Pehchano Mujko Ay Mere Gazi……..

Bhaya Tumhari Gairat Ki Khatir (Balonse Parda Karti Rahi) X2

Chadar Nahi Thi Sarpar Jo Meri (Ek Ek Kadam Par Marti Rahi) X2

Pehchano Mujko Ay Mere Gazi……..

Bazaar Kufa Se Wo Guzarna (Ehle Haram Ke Salaar Ka) X2

Bhaya Sajaya Tha Ashkiyane (Ek Ek Kona Bazaar Ka) X2

Pehchano Mujko Ay Mere Gazi……..

Bhaya Sakina Ko Ek Shaki Ne (Manga Kanizi Me Jis Gari) X2

Me Binte Zehra Me Binte Haider (Bhaya Larazkar Me Rehgayi) X2

Pehchano Mujko Ay Mere Gazi……..

Kaise Andhera Zindan Tha Wo (Jisme Sakina Jaage Gayi) X2

Baba Chacha Se Mujko Milado (Maasuma Roro Kehti Rahi) X2

Pehchano Mujko Ay Mere Gazi……..

Kurta Jo Uska Khun Me Bhara Tha (Usko Banaya Meine Kafan) X2

Jab Dafn Karte The Usko Abid (Tharra Raha Tha Unka Badan ) X2

Pehchano Mujko Ay Mere Gazi……..

albums.title: Mujhpe Kyu Band Karte Ho Paani

tracks.title: Mujpe Kyu Band-E Karte Ho Pani
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain) X6

(Mujpe Kyu Band Karte Ho Pani, Kya Muhammad Kya Pyaara Nahi Hu) X4

  1. Mujpe Kyu Band Karte Ho Pani, Kalma Goyo Muhammad Ke Shaami, Kya Me Mehman Aya Nahi Hu. Kya Me Zehra Ka Jaya Nahi Hu

(Mujpe Kyu Band Karte Ho Pani, Kya Muhammad Kya Pyaara Nahi Hu) X2

  2. Mera Baba He Mushkil Kusha (Meri Madar Bhi Hai Sayyida) X2 Mera Beta Hai Zainul Ibaa (Mere Nana Ka Kalma Parha) X2 Jiske Saye Ko Tum Dhundte Ho. Kya Me Uska Hi Saya Nahi Hu

(Mujpe Kyu Band Karte Ho Pani, Kya Muhammad Kya Pyaara Nahi Hu) X2

  3. Tumne Maktub Likh Ke Kahi (Ayiye Jald Ibn-E-Ali) X2 Deen Ki Roshni Kam Huwi (Sham-E-Islam Bujhne Lagi) X2 Tumne Chahaa Tha Me Agaya Hu. Khud Madine Se Aya Nahi Hu

(Mujpe Kyu Band Karte Ho Pani, Kya Muhammad Kya Pyaara Nahi Hu) X2

  4. Das Taras Me Meri Kya Nahi (Ilm Takwa Shuja'at Yakee(N)) X2 Mere Pairo Ke Niche Zamee(N) (Jispe Rakhe Farishte Jabee(N)) X2 Mei Hi Sardar-E-Ahle Jina Hu, Koi Tuta Sitara Nahi Hu

(Mujpe Kyu Band Karte Ho Pani, Kya Muhammad Kya Pyaara Nahi Hu) X2

  5. Meri Gardan Pe Khanjar Chale (Aag Lagti Hai Ghar Me Lage) X2 Bint-E-Zehra Ki Chadar Chine (Hath Dunga Na Apna Tujhe) X2 Hath Mera Ye Dast-E-Khuda Hai, Mai To Munkir Khuda Ka Nahi Hu

(Mujpe Kyu Band Karte Ho Pani, Kya Muhammad Kya Pyaara Nahi Hu) X2

  6. Sath Zehra Ki Hai Betiya (Mohtaram Inka Koi Kaha) X2 Pyas Ki Dhoop Ki Sakhtiya (Sabke Chehre Huwe Hai Dhuwa) X2 Betiya Fatema Ki Hai Pyasi, Sirf Ik Me Hi Pyasa Nahi Hu

(Mujpe Kyu Band-E Karte Ho Pani, Kya Muhammad Kya Pyaara Nahi Hu) X3

  7. Hukm Abbas Ko Du Agar (Nehr Le Aaye Wo Cheen Kar) X2 Karbala Hogi Zeyr-O-Zabar (Laash Serengi Har Mouj Par) X2 Mei Nahi Chahta Jang Karna. Fauj Larne Ko Laaya Nahi Hu

(Mujpe Kyu Band-E Karte Ho Pani, Kya Muhammad Kya Pyaara Nahi Hu) X3

  8. Ghunji Hal Min Ki Aisi Sadaa (Sheh Ko "Rehan" Kehte Sunaa) X2 Ya Ali Ya Ali Eliya (Waqt Imdad Ka Agaya) X2 Mere Bache Bhi Lagte He Pyaase. Phir Bhi Kya Muskuraya Nahi Hu.

(Mujpe Kyu Band-E Karte Ho Pani, Kya Muhammad Kya Pyaara Nahi Hu) X3

tracks.title: Saye Me Sayyida Ke
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain) X4

(Saye Me Sayyida Ke, Azadare Rahenge) X2

  1. (Jab Hoga Sawaa Neze Pe Khurshido Qayamat) X2

(Saye Me Sayyida Ke, Azadare Rahenge) X2

  2. (Barta Hi Chalaa Jayenge Shabbir-E Ka Matam) X2 Aaye Jo Gham-E Sheh Ke, Alamdar-E Rahenge

(Saye Me Sayyida Ke, Azadare Rahenge) X2

  3. (Hum Kabre Me Sojayenge Jab-E, Be Khaberi Se) X2 Matam Ki Nishaa Ruh, Me Be De Daar-E Rahenge

(Saye Me Sayyida Ke, Azadare Rahenge) X2

  4. (Har Chiz-E Ko Duniya Me Fanaa, Hona Hai Ik Din) X2 Qayam Ghame Shabbir-E Ke Aasaar Rahenge

(Saye Me Sayyida Ke, Azadare Rahenge) X2

  5. (Janat Me Agar Majlise Shabbir-E Jo Hogi) X2 Ham Ehle Azaa Khuld-E Se Bezaar-E Karenge

(Saye Me Sayyida Ke, Azadare Rahenge) X2

  6. (Be Jaan-E Khuda-O Se Kaha, Binte Asad-E Ne) X2 Kaabe Me To Ab Haidar-E Karrar-E Rahenge

(Saye Me Sayyida Ke, Azadare Rahenge) X2

  7. (Ek Baar-E Zara Nam-E Ali, Leke To Dekho) X2 Mushkil Me Madad Gaar-E Wo Har Bar-E Rahenge

(Saye Me Sayyida Ke, Azadare Rahenge) X2

  8. (Zainab Ke Khule Sar Bhare Dar, Bar-E Me Jaanaa) X2 Sajjad-E Isi Dard-E Se Bimaar-E Rahenge

(Saye Me Sayyida Ke, Azadare Rahenge) X2

  9. (Wo Mashk-E Ka Chidna Wo Sakina Ka Bilakna) X2 Abbas-E Ka Sine Pe, Sadaa War-E Rahenge

(Saye Me Sayyida Ke, Azadare Rahenge) X2

tracks.title: Aa Dekh Mere Ghazi
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Abbas) X4

(Aa Dekh Mere Gazi, Uncha Hai Alam Tera) X2

(Dil Sine Me Jab Tak Hai Bhulega Na Gham Tera) X2

Aa Dekh Mere……….

(Zainab Ki Duwa Bankar Ik Waqt Wo Aayenga) X2

Har Gar Me Saja Honga, Abbas Alam Tera

Dil Sine Me Jab Tak Hai Bhulega Na Gham Tera

Aa Dekh Mere……….

(Ajati Hai Zehra Bhi Zainab Bhi Ziyarat Ko) X2

Jab Aat Muharam Ko Ut Tha Hai Alam Tera

Dil Sine Me Jab Tak Hai Bhulega Na Gham Tera

Aa Dekh Mere……….

(Tabut Jab Ut Tha Hai Shabbir Ka Ay Gazi) X2

Tabut Ke Age Bhi Chalta Hai Alam Tera

Dil Sine Me Jab Tak Hai Bhulega Na Gham Tera

Aa Dekh Mere……….

(Wo Kon Se Sadme The Sheh Toot Gaye Jis Se) X2

Ik Dard Tha Zainab Ka Aur Doosra Gham Tera

Dil Sine Me Jab Tak Hai Bhulega Na Gham Tera

Aa Dekh Mere……….

(Parcham Ka Pharera Tha Ya Aas Thi Zainab Ki) X2

Zainab Ke Kaleje Se Ham Kaise Ho Kam Tera

Dil Sine Me Jab Tak Hai Bhulega Na Gham Tera

Aa Dekh Mere……….

(Bazar Me Zinda Me Darbar Me Har Lamha) X2

Zainab Ki To Sanso Pe He Naam Rakam Tera

Dil Sine Me Jab Tak Hai Bhulega Na Gham Tera

Aa Dekh Mere……….

(Jab Beh Gaya Sab Paani Tab Aas Teri Tooti) X2

Tha Sine Ke Andariya Mashkize Me Dam Tera

Dil Sine Me Jab Tak Hai Bhulega Na Gham Tera

tracks.title: Aay Khuda Dast E Karam
tracks.lyrics:
Yaad-E Abbas. Sara Shaam-E Ghariba Aaya. Dukhtare Hazrat-E Shabbir. Hira
Saaya.

  1. Bekasi Asi Aya Thi Ban Me (X2) Lasha Pamal Huwi Jab Rang Me. Aag Zehra Ki Laghi Gulshan Me. Yaade Abbas Ki Or Ehle Harram

Ay Khuda Dast-E Karam (X3) Shaam-E Gariba (X3)

  2. Qasimo Akbaro Abbas Tuja Raftanda. Haaye Kar Dashte Balaa Yaade Shahid Aaya. Qasimo Akbaro Abbas Nahi. Kuch Bhi Sine Me Bajusi Aas Nahi. Ab To Jine Ke Bhi Kuch-E Aas Nahi. Saaye Afdan Nahi Gazi Ka Alam.

Ay Khuda Dast-E Karam (X3) Shaam-E Gariba (X3)

  3. Ya Kase Nis Se Ayat Pare Imdad-E Harram. Is Safina Tarefe Yu Rashe Tuf Aaya. Koi Imdad Ko Aya Kyu Kar. Kat Gaya Akbaro Abbas Ke Sar. Gham Ka Tufan He Or Yaad-E Badar. Char Janif Bahe Ranjo Alam.

Ay Khuda Dast-E Karam (X3) Shaam-E Gariba (X3)

  4. Sal-E Ye Shimr-E Baro Sar-E Sakina Sad-E Hai. Chuba Zulmo Se Tama Dushman-E Imaa Aya. Haya Wo Bhul Se Ruksar Tere. Shimr-E Ne Jispe Tamache Mare. Nil Ruksar Ke Dekhe Na Gaya. Roya Neze Pe Sahe Shahe Umam.

Ay Khuda Dast-E Karam (X3) Shaam-E Gariba (X3)

  5. Mika Shad Na Laze Hazrat Sare Darbar-E Yazid. Bi Muhaban-E Khaya Le Dare Zindaaya. Sare Darbar Fugaa Zainab-E Ki. Ay Kufe Huwi Binte Ali. Lahada Shahe Najaf Dil Me Lagi. Ashke Zainab Ke Jo Parze Pe Hum.

Ay Khuda Dast-E Karam (X3) Shaam-E Gariba (X3)

  6. Haye Faa Alam-E Gurbat Me Sakina Girya. Yaad-E Alsaf-E Badan Baga Mo Hir Ma Aya. Dasht-E Gurbat Me Sakina Ki Fugaa. Baba Dasta He Andhera Zindaa. Jald Aawo Ke Nikal Jayena Jaan. Aap Ki Yaad Me Mar Jayenge Hum.

Ay Khuda Dast-E Karam (X3) Shaam-E Gariba (X3)

tracks.title: Na Rakh Ab Chadar
tracks.lyrics:
Na Rakh Ab Chaadar Bazuo Pe Tunie Le Daag Chupa Nahi Zehra Ki Jaa Sharma Nahi

Tera Nana Ka Ye Roza Hai Koi Kufa Sham Ka Raah Nahi

Zehra Ki Jaa Sharma Nahi…..

(Jo Chadar Ujli Thi Teri Rang Uska Kaise Laal Huwa) X2

(Ab Sar Pe Tere Ay Shehzadi) X2

Wo Kyu Mojud Rida Nahi

Zehra Ki Jaa Sharma Nahi…..

(Athaara Jo Tere Bhayi The Kis Baat Pe Tuj Se Rooth Gaye) X2

(Wo Shehzade Kyu Saath Nahi) X2

Kyu Saath Tera Abbas Nahi

Zehra Ki Jaa Sharma Nahi…..

(Ye Kon Jawan Hai Saath Tere Hai Kapre Jiske Khun Se Bhare) X2

(In Zakhmo Se Ye Chur Huwa) X2

Ankho Se Bhi Kyu Rukh Nahi

Zehra Ki Jaa Sharma Nahi…..

(Kis Haal Me Karbal Se Ayi Ay Zainab Apne Shehr Me Tu) X2

(Ab Is Se Siwa Afsos Ho Kya) X2

Pehchan Saki Sugra Nahi

Zehra Ki Jaa Sharma Nahi…..

(Wo Bachi Jisko Sine Pe Shabbir Sulaya Kartethe) X2

(Mere Ankhe Dundh Ke Haar Gayi) X2

Nahi Milta Uska Pata Nahi

Zehra Ki Jaa Sharma Nahi…..

(Ek Gunja Dahan Masum Bhi Tha Naam Uska Asger Raakha Tha) X2

(Kyu Khali God Rabab Ki Hai) X2

Asbab Me Kyu Jula Nahi

Zehra Ki Jaa Sharma Nahi…..

tracks.title: Shah Jo Kayo Matam
tracks.lyrics:
(Shaa Jo Kayo Matam) X4

  1. (Har Kushi-E Har Gham Me, Shah Jo Kayo Matam) X2

(Shaa Jo Kayo Matam) X4

  2. Is Rasool-E Royenta, Sayyida Bhi Royanti. In Hussain-E Ke Gham Me, Kayenaat-E Royenti. Din-E Ay Shariyat-E Aa

(Shaa Jo Kayo Matam) X4

  3. Hur-E Ay Farishta Bhi. Karbala Se Royenta. Har Zamin-E Karbal Me, Awliya Bhi Royenta. Sunnat-E Risalat-E Aa

(Shaa Jo Kayo Matam) X4

  4. Din-E Jo Saharo Aa. Nawjawa Ali Akbar. Din-E Jo Sipaai Aa, Be Zubaa Ali Asghar. Ay Rabaab-E Laila Se

(Shaa Jo Kayo Matam) X4

  5. Shaam Me Sakina Aa. Sughra Aa Madine Me. Ghayr Shaam Me Aisa, Karbala Ji Sine Me. Dard Ji Kahani Aa

(Shaa Jo Kayo Matam) X4

  6. Ulfat-E Payambae Ne. Pan Ke Sadaye To. Din-E Ay Shariyat-E Ke, Pan Ke Sada Aye To. Ulfate Payambar Me

(Shaa Jo Kayo Matam) X4

  7. Ay "Rehan" Hi Gham Bhi. Arz Ay Muhabat Aa. Ehle Bait-E Ki Ulfat, Farz Ay Ibadat Aa. Ehle Dil Ji Dharkan Aa

(Shaa Jo Kayo Matam) X4

tracks.title: Yeh Sham E Ghareeban
tracks.lyrics:
(Ye Shame Gariban Hai, Dariya Ki Rawani Hai) X2

Pyase Na Rahe Baki Phir Kisliye Paani Hai

Ye Shame………..



(Asger Tere Lashe Ko Maa Ban Ke Zamin Rakhe) X2

(Ujri Huwi Godi Ki) X2

Masum Nishani Hai

Ye Shame………..



(Khun Kaise Ruke Logo Akber Ka Jawani Mai) X2

(Ai Khun Naya Lekin) X2

Barchi Ko Purani Hai

Ye Shame………..



(Malum Na Tha Sheh Ko Khud Apne Hi Hathose) X2

(Shabbar Ki Nishani Bhi) X2

Mati Me Milani Hai

Ye Shame………..



(Shabbir Ko Khanjar Se Zyaad Aa Ye Aziyat Hai) X2

(Taklif Jo Zindan Me) X2

Bachi Ko Uthani Hai

Ye Shame………..



(Zainab Ne Kaha Thero Me Dasht Me Aati Hu) X2

(Bhaya Tume Akber Ki) X2

Ab Laash Uthani Hai

Ye Shame………..



(Har Gham Ko Bhula Denge Har Yaad Mitadenge) X2

(Zehra Tere Bacho Ki) X2

Bas Yaad Manani Hai

tracks.title: Abad-E Huwi Karbobala
tracks.lyrics:
Abad-E Huwi Karbobala

_

(Abad-E Huwi Karbobala, Ujra Madina. Barbad-E Huwi Mai) X2

  1. Zainab Ko Narasaya Muharram Ka Mahina

(Abad-E Huwi Karbobala, Ujra Madina. Barbad-E Huwi Mai) X2

  2. Ek Din Tha, Ke Is-E Shehr-E Ki Karti Thi Me Shahid (Or Aaj-E Tabahi) X2 Be Ghusl-E Para Mor-E Nabuwat-E Ka Nagina. Barbad-E Huwi Mai

(Abad-E Huwi Karbobala, Ujra Madina. Barbad-E Huwi Mai) X2

  3. Kis Laah-E Pe Rowe Kis Chor-U Me Baraa Dar (Lash-E He Bahat Tar) X2 Had Ye He Ke Rone Ki Ijazat-E Bhi Mili Na. Barbad-E Huwi Mai

(Abad-E Huwi Karbobala, Ujra Madina. Barbad-E Huwi Mai) X2

  4. Asghar Ka Gala Bhayi Ka Sar, Sinaye Akbar (Sab Goharo Chadar) X2 Is Dasht-E Me Luta Gaya Zainab-E Ka Khazina. Barbad-E Huwi Mai

(Abad-E Huwi Karbobala, Ujra Madina. Barbad-E Huwi Mai) X2

  5. Maye Binaa Pehchan-E Saki, Bacho Ke Chehre (Bikhre Huwe Sehre) X2 Hai Khun-E Ke Darya Me Gharibo Ka Safian. Barbad-E Huwi Mai

(Abad-E Huwi Karbobala, Ujra Madina. Barbad-E Huwi Mai) X2

  6. Ek Aag-E Hai, Khaymo Me Kayamat-E Ka Samaa Hai (Ghazi Tu Kaha Hai) X2 Dekho To Ridaa Chin-E Liya, Shimr-E Kamina. Barbad-E Huwi Mai

(Abad-E Huwi Karbobala, Ujra Madina. Barbad-E Huwi Mai) X2

  7. Chadar Chini, Dur Lay Liye Ab-E Zulmana Dhawo (Baba Se Milawo) X2 Neze Ke Tale Betth-E Ke Roti Hai Sakina. Barbad-E Huwi Mai

(Abad-E Huwi Karbobala, Ujra Madina. Barbad-E Huwi Mai) X2

  8. Paband-E Rasan Bibiya Bazar-E Khule Sar (Har-E Mor-E Pe Pathar) X2 Masum-E Yatimo Ka Baha. Surkh-E Pasina. Barbad-E Huwi Mai

(Abad-E Huwi Karbobala, Ujra Madina. Barbad-E Huwi Mai) X2

tracks.title: Asghar Ka Janaza
tracks.lyrics:
Asgar Ka Janaza Asgar Ka Janaza

Ay Momino Jab Khoon Me Duba Huwa Aaya

Asgar Ka Janaza Asgar Ka Janaza X2

Shabbir Ne Ek Maa Se Use Kaise Chupaaya

Asgar Ka Janaza Asgar Ka Janaza X2

Hatho Pe Janaza Ali Asgar Ko Uthakar

Rukh Suwe Falak Karke Sada Det The Sarwar

Allah Yehi Hadya E Aakhir Hai Hamara

Chehre Pe Mere Khoon Hai Mere Guncha Dahan Ka

Murjaya Hai Ye Ful Muhammad Ka Chamanka X2

Ay Nana Tere Din Pe Karta Hu Mai Sadka

Sangdil Tha Layin Bache Pe Kuch Rahm Na Khaaya

Pani Ke Talab Kame Pe Khoon Uska Bahaya X2

Islam Ko Ab Hashr Talak Kar Gaya Zinda

Jab Rat Ko Maa Apne Tasawur Ko Jagati

Awaz Use Jule Ki Nauha Ye Sunati X2

Kya Bhul Gaye Hatho Pe Sarwar Ke Jo Dekha

Maa Kehti Thi Ay God Ke Paale Ali Asgar

Thi Aarzu Dekhugi Me Sehra Tere Sarpar X2

Kyu Waqt Ne Muz Kokh Jali Ko Hai Dikhaya

Yad Aagaya Zinda Me Jo Bhayya Ka Humakna

Sajjad Se Tab Kehne Lagi Bali Sakin X2

Kya Khake Taras Dhup Se Logo Ne Uthaya

tracks.title: Aye Ya Shaam
tracks.lyrics:
(Ayi Ya Sham-E Ka Nana, Tunji Pyari Zainab) X3

Me Haa, Le Likha Kya, Us Validaa, Jad Husain Madinay Aa

Kitna Ve Ayay Nana De Raza Te, Khun Wale Batool Le Dijay

Marveer-E Kaya Me Jigar Palde, Sadi Chees-E Bachi Na Khayi.

Jad-O Shaam Ghariba Aaiyi Nana, Meko Kal La Karde Bhaaiy

(Ayi Ya Sham-E Ka Nana, Tunji Pyari Zainab) X2

  1. (Ayi Ya Sham-E Ka Nana, Tunji Pyari Zainab) X2 Dadi Majboor-E Huwi Dar Deji Mari Zainab.

(Ayi Ya Sham-E Ka Nana, Tunji Pyari Zainab) X2

  2. Gut Kasim Narayo Aay, Ali Asghar Narayo. Aai Afsos-E Tha Adsha, Tha Jo Dilbar Na Rayo. Dadi Majboor-E Huwi Dar Deji Mari Zainab

(Ayi Ya Sham-E Ka Nana, Tunji Pyari Zainab) X2

  3. Beri Islam-E Ji Tufan, Tha Bachaayi Shabbir. Jan-E Kurban-E Kayi Din-E Ta Asghar, Be Shir. Dadi Majboor-E Huwi Dar Deji Mari Zainab

(Ayi Ya Sham-E Ka Nana, Tunji Pyari Zainab) X2

  4. Rayo Armaan-E Kafan Sab, Thajiya Haa Nana. Munji Takdir-E Me Ho Shaam-E Jo Zindaan Nana. Dadi Majboor-E Huwi Dar Deji Mari Zainab

(Ayi Ya Sham-E Ka Nana, Tunji Pyari Zainab) X2



  5. Kali Chadar Na Mili Sham-E Kha Kufaa Tayi. Rakhte Rowand Rayo Munjo Muhari Sayi. Dadi Majboor-E Huwi Dar Deji Mari Zainab

(Ayi Ya Sham-E Ka Nana, Tunji Pyari Zainab) X2

  6. Bibi Anband-E Kayo Shaam-E Je Bazar Ran Me. Zainab Khutbo Teno Aa Shaam-E Je Bazar Ran Me. Dadi Majboor-E Huwi Dar Deji Mari Zainab

(Ayi Ya Sham-E Ka Nana, Tunji Pyari Zainab) X2

  7. Matam-E Shaa Hayi Badat, Ha Hamesha Randho. Je Taro Ro Kawo Matam, Ke Wadan Do Randho. Dadi Majboor-E Huwi Dar Deji Mari Zainab

(Ayi Ya Sham-E Ka Nana, Tunji Pyari Zainab) X2

  8. Lashe Akbar Tha Ajab Ware Kiya Ehle Haram. Shaha Ke Maa Ra Beyo Ak-Baro Asgar Jo Gham. Dadi Majboor-E Huwi Dar Deji Mari Zainab

(Ayi Ya Sham-E Ka Nana, Tunji Pyari Zainab) X2

  9. Satke Shabbir Je Matam, Thi Ya Razmi Gar Gar. Shahe Jo No Ho Pare Shaam, Ha Jo Nokar Sarwar. Dadi Majboor-E Huwi Dar Deji Mari Zainab

(Ayi Ya Sham-E Ka Nana, Tunji Pyari Zainab) X2

  10. (Ayi Ya Sham-E Ka Nana, Tunji Pyari Zainab) X2 Dadi Majboor-E Huwi Dar Deji Mari Zainab.

tracks.title: Itni Ghareeb Hogaye
tracks.lyrics:
Hai Zainab Hai Zainab

(Itni Gharib Hogaye Gham Yu Lipat Gaye)X2

(Zainab Ke Aik Libaas Mai Do Sal Kat Gaye)X2

(Itni Gharib Hogaye Gham Yu Lipat Gaye)X2



(Kya Kya Ghuzar Gaye He Muharam Ke Chaand Mai)X2

(Saydaniyo Ke Waqt Achanak Ulat Gaye)X2

(Itni Gharib Hogaye Gham Yu Lipat Gaye)X2



(Zainab Ka Dil Bhi Kya Tha Ghamo Ki Kitab Thi)X2

(Aik Dil Mai Us Gharib Ke So Gham Simat Gaye)X2

(Itni Gharib Hogaye Gham Yu Lipat Gaye)X2



(Hatho Se Maa Ke Khayme Ka Parda Ulat Gaya)X2

(Hatho Pe Shah Ke Jis Gari Asghar Ulat Gaye)X2

(Itni Gharib Hogaye Gham Yu Lipat Gaye)X2



(Bole Hussain Beti Se Pani Na Mangana)X2

(Jin Bazuo Pe Mashk Thi Wo Bazu Katgaye)X2

(Itni Gharib Hogaye Gham Yu Lipat Gaye)X2



(Marne Chale Hussain To Rehwar Ruk Gaya)X2

(Do Nanne Nanne Hath Sumo Se Lipat Gaye)X2

(Itni Gharib Hogaye Gham Yu Lipat Gaye)X2



(Kaise Utha Sakege Bhala Laash Ko Hussain)X2

(Aaza Hassan Ke Laal Ke Tukro Me Bat Gaye)X2

(Itni Gharib Hogaye Gham Yu Lipat Gaye)X2

tracks.title: Sakina Shaam Mei Mar Kar
tracks.lyrics:
(Sakina Sakina) X2

(Sakina Shaam Mein Mar Kar Yehi Samja Geyi Logo) X2

(Judaye Baap Kay Seene Ki) X2 Muj Ko Kha Geyi Logo

  1. (Khafas Ghurbat, Udasi Shimr Ka Dar Pyaas Ki Shiddat) X2

Sitam Itne Huwe Masoom Ku Maut Aa Geyi Loogo

(Sakina Shaam Mein Mar Kar Yehi Samja Geyi Logo) X2

(Judaye Baap Kay Seene Ki) X2 Muj Ko Kha Geyi Logo

  2. (Wo Ma Jo Dhoop Mein Akhsar Ali Asghar Ko Roti Thi) X2

Sakina Ki Khaza Us Par Kayamat Dhaa Geyi Logo

(Sakina Shaam Mein Mar Kar Yehi Samja Geyi Logo) X2

(Judaye Baap Kay Seene Ki) X2 Muj Ko Kha Geyi Logo

  3. (Bandhe Haatho Pe Aik Meemar Laya Behan Ki Mayyit) X2

Ye Aulad E Nabi Par Kaise Ghurbat Chaa Geyi Logo

(Sakina Shaam Mein Mar Kar Yehi Samja Geyi Logo) X2

(Judaye Baap Kay Seene Ki) X2 Muj Ko Kha Geyi Logo

  4. (Behan Ki Laash Hatho Pe Liye Sajjad Kehte Thay) X2

Gulistan E Imamat Ki Kali Murjha Geyi Logo

  5. (Padar Ki Khoo Bhari Gardan Pe Bacchi Ne Jo Lab Rakhay) X2

Yeh Manzar Deekh Kar Khud Khaza Ghabra Geyi Logo

  6. Chacha Baba Baradar Sab Ke Sab Tou Karbala Sooye

Sakina Ko Na Jaane Shaam Kaise Dhaa Geyi Logo

(Sakina Shaam Mein Mar Kar Yehi Samja Geyi Logo) X2

(Judaye Baap Kay Seene Ki) X2 Muj Ko Kha Geyi Logo

tracks.title: Tu Hai Bara Rehman
tracks.lyrics:
Aoozu Billahe Minash Shaitanir Rajim

Bismillah Hir Rahmanir Rahiym

Ar-Rahman Allamal Quran Khalaqal Insana Allamahul Bayan

Ya Rahman Ya Rahim…..X3

Ya Hayyo Ya Qayyum, Ya Razzak Ya Azim

Al Nooro Al Mohanniyo Azizo Ya Karim,

Gaffar Tu Sattar Tu Jabbar Ya Hakim Quddoos Ya Shakur Ya Gafooro Ya Rahim

Maula Tu Bara Rehman ……..X3

Tu Hai Bara Rehman Maula Tu Bara Rehman …X2

Ehsan Hampe Hai Tera Ay Rabbe Zuljalal

Ummatne Uski Paida Kiya Jo Hai Be Misal

Dukhtar Batul Jiski Hassan Or Hussain Lal

Lehmo Ka Lehmi Jiska Ali Jaisa Ba Kamal

Qurano Ahlebait Ko Tune Kiya Yakjan

Adam Se Taubeme Diya Aakhir Teri Etaat

Tere Karam Ke Bar Tale Sare Ambiya

Musa Ke Haq Me Nil Me Rastaa Banadiya

Masloob Hoke Essa Ke Labpar Thi Ye Sada

Har Dilme Tu Makin Hai Kehneko Laamakan

Meraj Par Gaye Jo Rasule Falak Janab

Maabudo Abd Me Na Raha Jab Koi Hijab

Allah Ne Nabise Kiya Us Gari Khitab

Darkar Kya Hai Tumko Mujhe Chahiye Jawab

Bole Rasul Bakhshde Ummat Ko De Amaan

Rabne Kaha Adaa Karo Haqqe Payambari

Jis Waqt Aaye Rahme Manzil Gadirki

Taqmile Din Kama Hai Us Waqt Ay Nabi

Maidane Qum Me Is Tarah Maula Huwe Ali

Akmalto Lakum Din Ka Ho Jayenga Saman

Zehra Ka Ghar Sitara Jo Utra To Ye Khula

Mehboob Panjetan Ko Bahot Rakhta Hai Khuda

Maktab Hasan Hussain Ka Ye Ghar Bana Raha

Masnad Nabiki Isme Musalla Ali Ka Tha

Chaukhatpe Jiski Rehta Hai Jibrail Se Darban

Is Gharka Fard Fard Kuda Se Tha Hamkalam

Sajdeme Sar Hussainka Labpar Khuda Ka Naam

Khanjar Tale Khuda Se Ye Kehte Rahe Imam

Sar Teri Nazr Kartahu Ghar De Chuka Tamam

Aata Hu Teri Simt Mai Deta Huwa Azaan

Akbar Nisar Kar Diya Asghar Bhi Ro Chuka

Abbas Or Kasimo Hur Ko Bhi Ro Chuka

Zainab Ke Dono Bachoko Sehra Me Kho Chuka

Ab Daste Zulm Chadare Zainab Ka Kya Gaya

Le Dekhle Hussain Ke Chehre Ka Imtihan

Khaimo Se Aag Aag Se Uthta Huwa Dhuwa

Nanna Sa Ek Jula Hai Sholo Ke Darmiyan

Daman Jala Sakina Ka Kaise Bujaye Maa

Bandhi Gayi Hai Hato Me Zainab Ke Reshma

Ujra Huwa Hai Kafela Sajjad Saarva

Aayi Sada Hussain Ki Ay Kadiro Kadir

Beti Ali Ki Meri Bahan Ho Gayi Asir

Be Dast Mera Bhai Hai Tu Sabka Dastagir

Kufeki Shahzadiya Kaisi Huyi Fakir

Fir Bhi Mai Nouke Naiza Pe Deta Hu Ye Bayan

tracks.title: Waqt Sajjad Ne Kaise
tracks.lyrics:
(Mera Bimar Imam)X2

(Waqt Sajaad Ne Kaise Wo Guzaara Hoga) X4



(Wakt Sajjad Ne Kaise Wo Guzaara Honga) X2

Naam Zainab Ka Jo Gairo Ne Pukaarahoga

(Waqt Sajaad Ne Kaise Wo Guzaara Hoga)



Ya Rab Koi Mil Jaye Na Pehchaannewala

(Bazaar Ne Sajjad Dua Mang Raha Hai)X2



Lo Hussain Ibne Ali Pyaase Zibha Hone Lage X2

Kitna Sharminda Who Darya Ka Kanara Hoga

(Waqt Sajaad Ne Kaise Wo Guzaara Hoga)



Wo Gira Zinse Zainab Ki Rida Ka Zamin X2

Kon Ab Fatema Jayi Ka Sahara Hoga

(Waqt Sajaad Ne Kaise Wo Guzaara Hoga)



Sare Maidan To Jane To Laga Hai Asgar X2

Kis Tarah Tere Bina Maa Ka Guzaara Hoga

(Waqt Sajaad Ne Kaise Wo Guzaara Hoga)



Nauke Neza Pe Bahane Lage Ansoo Maula X2

Fir Sakina Ko Kisi Shaks Ne Mara Hoga

(Waqt Sajaad Ne Kaise Wo Guzaara Hoga)



Roze Mehshar Ka Hame Dar Nahi Koi Shaukat X2

Hath Shabbir Ke Kadmo Pe Hamara Hoga

(Waqt Sajaad Ne Kaise Wo Guzaara Hoga)

tracks.title: Zuljanah Akbal Minal Maydan
tracks.lyrics:
Zuljanah Akbal Minal Maydan

_

Zuljanah Akbal Minal Maydan, Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina Ay Wa Gharib. Haye
Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Shaheed. Haye Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Mazloom. Haye Wa Hussaina.
Zuljanah Akbal

Minal Maydan Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina.

  1. (Shor-E Huwa Lo, Khali Aya) X2 Chor-E Ke Zainab-E Ka Ma Jaya. Bage Kati Hai Khun Me Nahaya. Zainab-E Ne Dukhra Ye Sunaya.

Zuljanah Akbal Minal Maydan, Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina Ay Wa Gharib. Haye
Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Shaheed. Haye Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Mazloom. Haye Wa Hussaina.
Zuljanah Akbal

Minal Maydan Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina.

  2. (Khun-E Me Tar Rahe, Waar-E Ko Dekha) X2 Roi Tarap-E Kar Bali Sakina. Boli Kaha Hai Mera Baba. Chin-E Liya Kyu Mera Sahara.

Zuljanah Akbal Minal Maydan, Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina Ay Wa Gharib. Haye
Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Shaheed. Haye Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Mazloom. Haye Wa Hussaina.
Zuljanah Akbal

Minal Maydan Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina.

  3. (Me Tere Sadke, Me Tere Wari) X2 Tu Mere Baba Ki Hai Sawari. Tere Badan Se Khun-E Hai Jari. Zakhm-E Lage Hai Jism-E Pe Tari.

Zuljanah Akbal Minal Maydan, Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina Ay Wa Gharib. Haye
Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Shaheed. Haye Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Mazloom. Haye Wa Hussaina.
Zuljanah Akbal

Minal Maydan Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina.

  4. (Baat-E Na Mani, Tu Ne Meri) X2 Roi Bohat-E Kadmo Se Lipti. Boli Kaha Hai Mera Baba. Chin-E Liya Kyu Mera Sahara.

Zuljanah Akbal Minal Maydan, Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina Ay Wa Gharib. Haye
Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Shaheed. Haye Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Mazloom. Haye Wa Hussaina.
Zuljanah Akbal

Minal Maydan Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina.

  5. (Chor-E Diya Kyu, Ran Me Akayla) X2 Chur-E Ghamo Se Tha Mera Baba. Jisne Uthaya Lash-E Pe Lasha. Tanha Kyu Maktal Se Ayaa.

Zuljanah Akbal Minal Maydan, Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina Ay Wa Gharib. Haye
Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Shaheed. Haye Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Mazloom. Haye Wa Hussaina.
Zuljanah Akbal

Minal Maydan Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina.

  6. (Zainab-E Ke Lab-E, Par Ye Fugaa Thi) X2 She Na Sakungi Sheh Ki Judaayi. Tune Kyu Gardan Ne Jukayi. Reh Gaya Kyu Maktal Me Bhayi.

Zuljanah Akbal Minal Maydan, Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina Ay Wa Gharib. Haye
Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Shaheed. Haye Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Mazloom. Haye Wa Hussaina.
Zuljanah Akbal

Minal Maydan Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina.

  7. (Banu Pukari, Phenk-E Ke Chadar) X2 Lut Gayi Me Barbad-E Huwa Gar. Ran Se Na Aye Sibt-E Payambar. Chalte Hai Mere Kalb-E Pe Khanjar.

Zuljanah Akbal Minal Maydan, Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina Ay Wa Gharib. Haye
Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Shaheed. Haye Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Mazloom. Haye Wa Hussaina.
Zuljanah Akbal

Minal Maydan Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina.

  8. (Katl-E Huwa Shabbir-E Jo Ran Me) X2 Gunji Sadaa Rehan-E Jo Ban Me. Aag-E Lagi Zehra Ke Chaman Me. Ponchio Khabar Sughra Ko Watan Me.

Zuljanah Akbal Minal Maydan, Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina Ay Wa Gharib. Haye
Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Shaheed. Haye Wa Hussaina. Ay Wa Mazloom. Haye Wa Hussaina.
Zuljanah Akbal

Minal Maydan Khali Wawayla Haye Wa Hussaina.

tracks.title: Bujgayi Pyaas Chacha
tracks.lyrics:
(Bujgayi Pyas Chacha) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

  1. (Puri Kardo Ye Duwa) X2

(Bujgayi Pyas Chacha) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

  2. Janti Hu Ke Kattey, Apke Bazu Ran Me.

Aapke Bad Bacha, Kya He Mere Daman Me.

(Kuch Nahi Karte Gila) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

(Bujgayi Pyas Chacha) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

  3. Hote Jatta He Bohot, Sham Ke Gehra Saaye.

Koyi Bhi Gar Me Nahi, Kone Muja Pehlaye

(Unko Deti Hu Sadaa) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

(Bujgayi Pyas Chacha) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

  4. Mujko Maloom Na Tha, Dur Watan Se Aakar.

Aap So Jaayenge Dar, Ya Pe Alam Lehra Kar.

(Lo Chacha Dunga Dhala) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

(Bujgayi Pyaas Chacha) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

  5. Ay Chacha Dekh Ye Chin, Ti Hai Phuphi Ki Chadar.

Bhayi Sajad-E Ke Khaym, Chaahe Laeene Bistar.

(Janahi Tumko Pata) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

(Bujgayi Pyaas Chacha) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

  6. Maa Ye Kehti Hai Ke Hum, Qayd Bhi Honga Amu.

Chingayi Baliya Tha, Pe He Tamacha Amu.

(Dekho Damande Jalaa) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

(Bujgayi Pyaas Chacha) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

  7. Nanmne Jule Me Kabhi, Ghod Me Madar Ki Kabhi.

Dekhti Hu Ke Mehek, Pawo Kahi Asgher-E Ki.

(Sathe Asgar Ki Chacha) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

(Bujgayi Pyaas Chacha) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

  8. Roke Zainab Ne Kaha, Bali Sakina Meri.

De Chacha Or Ke Badar, Hona He Kismat Teri

(Kisko Deti He Sadaa) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

(Bujgayi Pyaas Chacha) X2 (Lot Ke Gar Me Aawo) X2

tracks.title: Garam Reeti Pe Mei
tracks.lyrics:
Haay Asr Ka Waqt Hai

Shabbir Ki Aati Hai Sada

Chur Zakhmo Se Badan Hogaya Ama Mera

Apani Agosh Me Ab Mujko Chupalo Ama

Are Dhoop Hai Apni Aba Aan Ke Dalo Ama

1. (Garm Reti Pa Me Gir Ta Hu Sambhalo Ama)X2

2. Thak Gayaa Lash Utha Kar Me Bhare Lashkar Ki

Laash Qasim Ki Me Laya Hu Kabhi Akber Ki

Khud Baniyi He Lahad Me Ne Ali Asger

Do Tasali Muje Sine Se Lagalo Ama

Garm Reti……………

3. Teer Talwar Se, Khanjar Se Badan Zakhmi Hai

Khaak Jalti Hai To Zakhmo Chubhan Hoti Hai

Mere Zakhmo Se Mere Dil Ka Lahu Jari Hai

Apni Chadar Ko Mere Zakhm Pe Dalo Ama

Garm Reti……………..

4. Mera Abbas Khafa Hogaya Amma Moojse

Wo Nahi Aaya Utha Laya Tha Bazu Uske

Aap Ek Kaam Kare Nehre Kanare Jaake

Mere Ruthe Huwe Bhayi Ko Manaalo Ama

Garm Reti…………….

5. Chakiya Pisi Hai Godi Me Bithakar Mujko

Jaag Ti Rehti Thi Zaanu Pe Sula Kar Mujko

Loriya Detithi Jule Me Jula Kar Mujko

Ek Dafa God Me Phir Apni Sulalo Ama

Garm Reti……………..

6. Aur Kuch Der Ka Mehmaan Hu Tum Paas Raho

Ret Zakhmo Me Hai Aachal Se Usey Saaf Karo

Aati Hai Rone Ki Aawaz Sakina Dekho

Jaawo Tum Jaake Sakina Ko Sambhalo Ama

Garm Reti……………..

7. Dekh Wo Aag Lagi Shame Ghariba Aayi

Dekho Gabra Ke Nikal Aayi Meri Ma Jaayi

Dekho Behoosh Sakina Ka Para Hai Bhayi

Jawo Sajad Ko Sholo Se Nikalo Ama

Garm Reti……………..

8. Hai Ghuzarish Meri Tumse Abitni Madar

Ama Baba Ki Kasam Dhamp Lo Moo Par Chadar

Dekh Jayenga Na Ab Tumse Ye Khooni Manzar

Apni Hota Ho Nighaho Ko Hataalo Ama

Garm Reti………………

tracks.title: Ghar Ghar Matam
tracks.lyrics:
Gar Gar Matam

_

(Ya Hussain)

(Gar Gar Matam, Dar Dar Matam, Tera Hota Rahe Maula Matam) X2

1. (Basti Basti Farya Farya, Tera Hota Rahe Maula Matam) X2

(Gar Gar Matam, Dar Dar Matam, Tera Hota Rahe Maula Matam) X2

2. Tere Matami Ay Mere Maula, Dunya Ke Kisi Kone Me Gayaa

(Musruf Raha Matam Me Tere) X2

Deta He Sukoon Tera Matam

(Gar Gar Matam, Dar Dar Matam, Tera Hota Rahe Maula Matam) X2

3. Jab Dil Ne Kaha Ayi Zehra, Mere Gar Me Bahaane Ashke Azaa

(Bas Maine Bichake Farshe Azaa) X2

Kuch Der Kiya Barpa Matam

(Gar Gar Matam, Dar Dar Matam, Tera Hota Rahe Maula Matam) X2

4. Kal Haath Bandhe The Zainab Ke, Majboor Behen Thi Matam Ke

(Majlis He Teri Ghar Ghar Barpa) X2

Ab Karti Hai Sab Dunya Matam

(Gar Gar Matam, Dar Dar Matam, Tera Hota Rahe Maula Matam) X2

5. Abbas Ke Shane Kat To Gaye, Masum Tere Pyaase Hi Rahe

Gazi Ke Liye Bacho Ke Liye,

(Gazi Ke Liye Bacho Ke Liye) X2

Ab Karta Hai Darya Matam

(Gar Gar Matam, Dar Dar Matam, Tera Hota Rahe Maula Matam) X2

6. Aashoor Ko Jab Suraj Nikla, Zehra Ke Bhare Gar Ko Dekha,

(Par Chand Ne Zainab Ko Dekha) X2

Karti Hai Bhare Gar Ka Matam

(Gar Gar Matam, Dar Dar Matam, Tera Hota Rahe Maula Matam) X2

7. Karbal Se Safar Tha Shaam Ka Jab, Lashe Pe Pukari Ye Zainab,

(Taa Hashr Teri Mazloomi Par) X2

Karnaa Hai Mujhe Bhaya Matam

(Gar Gar Matam, Dar Dar Matam, Tera Hota Rahe Maula Matam) X2

8. Jo Karbobala Se Sham Gayi, Wo Binte Zahra Binte Ali,

(Sab Maye Behne Milkar Ab) X2

Karti Hai Sadaa Uska Matam

(Gar Gar Matam, Dar Dar Matam, Tera Hota Rahe Maula Matam) X2

9. Bimar Tha Aur Zanjeere Thi, Pairo Ke Tale Jalti Thi Zamin,

(Sajad Ke Gham Me Roro Kar) X2

Karta Hai Har Ek Rasta Matam

(Gar Gar Matam, Dar Dar Matam, Tera Hota Rahe Maula Matam) X2

10. (Basti Basti Karya Kaya) X2

Tera Hota Rahe Maula Matam

(Gar Gar Matam, Dar Dar Matam, Tera Hota Rahe Maula Matam) X2

tracks.title: Haye Shaam Ka Bazar
tracks.lyrics:
(Haai Shaam Ka Baazaar) X4

Sajjad Se Rone Ka Sabab Puch Raha Hai

(Haai Shaam Ka Baazaar) X2

Jo Shaam Me Guzri Hai Woh Sab Puch Rahaa Hai

(Haai Shaam Ka Baazaar) X2

  1. Woh Lakho Tamasai Be Parda Fufi Behne

Aise Na Lahu Roye Bimaar Ki Fir Aakhen

Is Gam Ki Aziyyat Ne Use Maar Diya Hai


(Haai Shaam Ka Baazaar) X2

  2. Kis Tarah Karaar Aaye Bimaar Ko Ay Logon

Sar Naizon Pe Pairon Ke Aate Hai Nazar Jisko

Yeh Juror Musafir Ki Yeh Kaisi Sazaa Hai


(Haai Shaam Ka Baazaar) X2

  3. Aakhon Se Hai Khun Zaari Khar Hai Bimaari

Janjir Hai Pairon Me Aur Tawk Bhi Hai Bhaari

Jalti Hai Zamin Saari Aur Garm Hawaa Hai


(Haai Shaam Ka Baazaar) X2

  4. Zaagir Nahi Maangi Zanjir Nahi Badli

Saaye Me Nahi Baitha Poshaak Nahi Badli

Maan Behno Ki Khaatir Woh Rida Maang Raha Hai


(Haai Shaam Ka Baazaar) X2

  5. Zinda Se Masaaeb Bhi Har Waqt Rulaate Hai

Mar Jaye Na Zainab Ye Kahi Shoch Rha Hai

(Haai Shaam Ka Baazaar) X2

  6. Jinda Se Rihaa Hoke Bhi Jinda Me Hain Sajjad

Ek Nanhi Si Turbat Karti Hai Faryaad

Markar Bhi Rahun Qaid Me Kya Meri Khataa Hai


(Haai Shaam Ka Baazaar) X2

  7. Be Zakhm Bhi Sajjad Ko Jine Nahi Deta

Zakhmon Se Sakina Ke Jo Chipkaa Raha Kurtaa

Woh Khun Bharaa Kurta Hi Kafan Us Ko Banaa Hai

(Haai Shaam Ka Baazaar) X2

  8. Baazaar Me Darbaar Me Jinda Me Roye
Chaalis Baraz Mawt Ke Armaan Me Roye
Rehan Mera Maula Tadaptaa Hi Rahaa Hai


(Haai Shaam Ka Baazaar) X2


Sajjad Se Rone Ka Sabab Puch Rahaa Hai


(Haai Shaam Ka Baazaar) X2


Jo Shaam Me Guzri Thi Woh Sab Puch Raha Hai


(Haai Shaam Ka Baazaar) X2

tracks.title: Hogi Yeh Majlis
tracks.lyrics:
(Hogi Yeh Majlis To Hogi Hogaa Yeh Maatam To Hogaa) X2

  1. (Aarzu Hai Yeh Nabi Ki) X2

Ruk Nahi Sakti Kabhi

(Hogi Yeh Majlis To Hogi Hogaa Yeh Maatam To Hogaa) X2

  2. Chawdaa Sadiyaan Ho Gayi Hai

Majlise Shabbir Ko
Khun Se Iikhte Rahe Ham
Gham Ki Iss Tehrir Ko

(Yeh Sadaa Hai Karbalaa Ki) X2

Yeh Sadaa Shabbir Ki Hogi Yeh Majlis To Hogi

(Hogi Yeh Majlis To Hogi Hogaa Yeh Maatam To Hogaa) X2

  3. Tegon Ke Saayen Me Palte Hai

Husaini Nawjawaan

Maut Se Larna Sikhati Hai

Hame Lori Me Maa

(Apne Khun Se Morte Hai) X2

Har Gam To Teg Ki

(Hogi Yeh Majlis To Hogi Hogaa Yeh Maatam To Hogaa) X2

  4. Sunnate Zainab Ye Majlis

Sunnate Zainul Ebaa

Shaam Ke Darbaar Me

Majlis Huwi Maatam Huwa

(Ruk Na Paee Shaam Me Jab) X2

Kya Rukengi Ab Sabi

(Hogi Yeh Majlis To Hogi Hogaa Yeh Maatam To Hogaa) X2

  5. God Ka Bacchaa Ho Koyi

Yaa Jawano Pir Ho

Dekho Usko Uss Gadhi

Jaab Maatame Shabbir Ho

(Ek Hai Raftaar Sabki) X2

Ek Hai Aawaaj Bhi

(Hogi Yeh Majlis To Hogi Hogaa Yeh Maatam To Hogaa) X2

  6. Saw Janaaze Ham Uthaae

Apne Pyaaron Ke To Kya

Ruk Nahi Sakta Azaadari

Kaa Yeh Silsilaah

(Apne Hi Khun Me Naha Kar) X2

Ham Pukaarenge Yahi

(Hogi Yeh Majlis To Hogi Hogaa Yeh Maatam To Hogaa) X2

  7. Chin Bhi Jaaye Gar Hussaini

Maaon Se Unke Jawaan

Yaad Karke Zakhme Akbar

Ko Kahengi Sab Yeh Maa

(Tha Aliakbar Sa Sadqa) X2

Laal Mera Maatami

(Hogi Yeh Majlis To Hogi Hogaa Yeh Maatam To Hogaa) X2

  8. Keh Raha Hai Parchame

Abbas Ka Panja Yehi

Hath Kat Jaye To Matam

Ruk Nahi Sakta Kabhi

(Sar Ko Takra Kar Karenge) X2

Aag Par Chal Kar Kabhi

(Hogi Yeh Majlis To Hogi Hogaa Yeh Maatam To Hogaa) X2

  9. Ai Azaadaro Hussain

Ibne Ali Ke Maatami

Yu Guzaro Tum Azadari Me

Apni Zindagi

(Pairwi Karte Hi Rehna) X2

Abu Zaro Salman Ki

(Hogi Yeh Majlis To Hogi Hogaa Yeh Maatam To Hogaa) X2

tracks.title: Labbaik Labbaik Yaa Imaam
tracks.lyrics:
Aaiye Ab Baarwen Imaam....
Labbaik Labbaik Labbaik Yaa Imaam...
Aaiye Ab Baarwen Imaam....

Labbaik Labbaik Labbaik Yaa Imaam...
Kijiyee Zahur Yaa Imaam

Labbaik Labbaik Labbaik Yaa Imaam...
Aaiye Ab Baarwen Imaam....

Kijiyee Zahur Yaa Imaam
Labbaik Labbaik Labbaik Yaa Imaam...

Aaiye Ab Baarwen Imaam....

  1. Keh Rahi Hai Zulm-O-Jabar

Ki Muhib Aandhiyaan
Gir Rahi Hai Moaminon Ke

Qalb-O-Jaa(N) Pe Bijliyaan
Uth Rahi Hai Dine Mustufa Ki

Simt Ungliyan

Hujjat-E-Khudaa Hai Aap Jee Ko Dijiye Amaan

Har Kadam Pe Ab To Ek (Karbalaa Hai Yaa Imaam) X2

(Kijiye Zahur Yaa Imaam) X2

Labbaik Labbaik Labbaik Yaa Imaem...

Aaiye Ab Baarwen Imaam....

  2. Har Baras Areezay Mauj Ke Supurd Kar Chuke

Zakhm-E-Intezaar Se Jigar Hamaare Bhar Chuke

Kitne Log Ji Rahe Hain Kitne Log Mar Chuke

Waqt Ke Tamaam Raston Se Ham Guzar Chuke
Lab Pe Aap Ke Zahur Ki

(Dua Hai Yaa Imaam) X2

(Kijiyee Zahur Yaa Lmaam) X2

Labbaik Labbaik Labbaik Yaa Imaem...

Aaiye Ab Baarwen Imaam....

  3. Chawdaa So Baras Se Zulm Seh Rahe Hai Yaa Imaam

Raaz-E- Karbalaa Har Ek Se Keh Rahe Hain Yaa Imaam

Sheh Ke Gam Me Ashk Ab Bhi Beh Rahe Hai Yaa Imaam

Zulm Ke Muqaable Pe Dat Gaye Hai Yaa Imaam

Aap Ka Jo Dil Ko Ek

(Hauslaa Hai Yaa Imaam) X2

(Kijiyee Zahur Yaa Imaam) X2

Labbaik Labbaik Labbaik Yaa Imaam...

Aaiye Ab Baarwen Imaam....

Labbaik Labbaik Labbaik Yaa Imaam...

  4. Jad Hai Aap Ke Ali Ali Hai Shere Kibriyaa

Sirate Batul Kya Hai Aap Kaa Hai Madrasa

Dars-E-Sabr Aap Ne Husain Hi Se Hai Liya

Khatemaa Karenge Aa Ke Zulm-O-Jabr Kaa

Saath Aap Ke Duwaaen (Sayyadaa Hai Yaa Lmaam) X2

(Kijiyee Zahur Yaa Imaam) X2

Labbaik Labbaik Labbaik Yaa Imaam...

Aaiye Ab Baarwen Imaam....

  5. Jis Ko Gaib Par Yakin Nahi Jise Woh Munkire Khuda Hai

Jis Ko Gaib Par Yakin Wohin Padhegaa Laa Elaah

Laa Illah Padh Ke Ho Gayaa Rasul Ashnaa

Jo Rasule Aashnaa Hai Woh Mohib Hai Aapkaa

Yeh Nabi Ka Our Khudaa Kaa

(Faislaa Hai Yaa Imaam) X2

(Kijiyee Zahur Yaa Imaam) X2

Labbaik Labbaik Labbaik Yaa Lmaam...

Aaiye Ab Baarwen Imaam....

  6. Ek Do Nahi Kahi Jawaan Shahid Ho Gaye

Karbalaa E Asr Me Sitam Mazid Ho Gaye

Zulm Ke Tamaam Silsile Shadid Ho Gaye

Pairawe Yazid Aaj Khud Yazid Ho Gaye

Aapka Husainiyon Ko

(Aasraa Hai Yaa Imaam) X2

(Kijiyee Zahur Yaa Imaam) X2


Labbaik Labbaik Labbaik Yaa Imaam...

Aalye Ab Baarwen Imaam....

  7. Maaon Ne Pisar Behen Ne Bhai Nazar Kar Diye

Bacche Bhi Yatim Huwe Shuhaag Bhi Ujad Gaye

Baap Ne Game Husain Me Lahu Jigar Kiye

Jaari Aaj Bhi Hai Majlis-E-Aza Ke Silsile

Aaiye Ke Panjetan Kaa (Wastaa Hai Yaa Imaam) X2

(Kijiyee Zahur Yaa Imaam) X2

Labbaik Labbaik Labbaik Yaa Imaam...

Aaiye Ab Baarwen Imaam....

  8. Laash Jab Husain Ne Uthayi Thi Jawaan Ki

Kabr Jab Banayi Thi Sagire Be Zubaan Ki

Aankh Nam Huwi Thi Jab Zamin-O-Aasmaan Ki

Yaad Hai Wohi Gari Husaini Imtehan Ki

Apna Gam Isi Sabab (Bhulaa Diya Hai Yaa Imaam) X2

(Kijiyee Zahur Yaa Imaam) X2

Labbaik Labbaik Labbaik Yaa Imaam...

Aaiye Ab Baarwen Imaam....

Assalaamo Alaika Ya Sahibul Asre Waz Zamaan

Al Amaam Al Amaan Al Amaan Min Fitnatil Zamaan

Assalaamo Alaika Ya Khalifatar Rahman

Assalaamo Alaika Ya Imaamal Inse Wal Jaan

Assalaamo Alaika Ya Sharikal Qur'an

Ajjalallaho Ta'aala Farajak

Wa Sharallaho Makhrajak

Wa Zahurak

Wa Rahmatullahe Wa Barakaatuh

tracks.title: Parcham Abbas Ka
tracks.lyrics:
(Parchame Abbas) X2

  1. Ha Yehi Parcham Hussaini, Foj Ka Bankar Nishan. Jis Gari Pocha Tha Foj-E-Ashkiya Ke Darmiya(N). Har Taraf Se Aa Rahi Thi, Bas Sadaa-E-Alamaa(N). Nara-E-Abbas Tha Or Thi Farishto Ki Zuban

(Parcham Abbas Ka) X4

  2. Is Alam Ke Sath He Jo, Saath Mash Kiza Bandha. Bazu Abbas Parje, Se Ho Tawize Bapa. Na Alam Isse Juda Hai. Na Alam Se Ye Juda. Is Alam Pe Saya Afgan, He Dua-E-Sayyeda

(Parcham Abbas Ka) X4

  3. Ha Yahi Parcham Ali Ke, Haath Me Har Jange Me. Karbala Poncha Dua-E-Sayyeda Ke Ran Me. Ha Isi Parcham Pukara, Tha Ali Ne Sang Me. Dorta Hai Khun Isko, Dekhe Kar Rang Rang Me.

(Parcham Abbas Ka) X4

  4. Ha Isi Parcham Se Aya, Karbala Me Inkilaab. Leke Isko Jab Gaya Darya Pe Ibne Buturab. Jumuli Maujoone Bhar Kar, Aspe Gazi Ki Rakaa. Iske Panje Ki Chamak Se, Roshni Le Aftaab

(Parcham Abbas Ka) X4

  5. Jab Talak Uncha Raha Par, Ban Me Gazi Ka Alam. Aa Sakena Khaymay-E-Sarwar Me Ada Ke Kadam. Ye Alam Tandha Huwa Rone Lage Shahe Umam. Roke Kehte The Yahi Tha, Mere Lashkar Ka Bharam

(Parcham Abbas Ka) X4

  6. Ye Alam Tha Raasta Zainab, Or Sakina Ke Liye. Dhup Me Icha Uthaye, Shah-E-Wala Ke Liye. Is Ka Girna Mawt-E-Se Bar, Kar Tha Akaa Ke Liye. Mawt Ke Payghame Ye Parcham Tha Adaa Ke Liye

(Parcham Abbas Ka) X4

  7. Aaj Har Ghar Par Alam Hai, Mere Ghazi Ka Sajaa. Hazrat-E-Zainab Ki Puri, Hogayi Akhir Dua. Marhaba Abbas-E-Gazi, Marhaba Sad Marhaba. Asamaa(N) To Juk Gaya Tera Alam Uncha Raha

(Parcham Abbas Ka) X4

  8. Is Alam Ki Shaan To Us, Roz Dekhenga Jahaa(N). Ayenga Jis Roze Is Parcham Ka Waris Bayebaa(N). Kufr Ki Basti Pe Tute, Ye Hazaro Bijliyaa(N). Momino Ke Sar Pe Honga, Is Alam Ke Sahiba

(Parcham Abbas Ka) X4

tracks.title: Pyaase Pe Ajab
tracks.lyrics:
