(Yaa Husain Yaa Husain) X3
(Pyaase Pe Ajab Waqt Qayaamat Ka Para Hai) X2
(Pyaase Pe Ajab Waqt Qayaamat Ka Para Hai) X2

  1. Ek Laash Abhi Laayaa Hai Ek Lene Chala Hai

(Pyaase Pe Ajab Waqt Qayaamat Ka Para Hai) X2

  2. (Yeh Hur Ka Hai Woh Bhai Kaa Yeh Bete Kaa Iaashaa) X2

(Zehra Ka Pisar Ganje Ganje Shahida Me Para Hai) X2

(Pyaase Pe Ajab Waqt Qayaamat Ka Para Hai) X2

  3. (Zainab Teri Chaadar Ka Khuda Hafiz O Naasir) X2

(Lashkar Na Alam Our Na Alamdar Bachaa Hai) X2

(Pyaase Pe Ajab Waqt Qayaamat Ka Para Hai) X2

  4. (Yeh Aakhri Hadyaa Tha Husain Ibne Ali Kaa) X2

(Yeh Bachchaa Abhi Tir Se Jo Maaraa Gaya Hai) X2

(Pyaase Pe Ajab Waqt Qayaamat Ka Para Hai) X2

  5. (Munh Dhaank To Ammaa Nazar Aye Na Neaje) X2

(Neajon Se Yehi Oono Mohammed Ki Sadaa Hai) X2

(Pyaase Pe Ajab Waqt Qayaamat Ka Para Hai) X2

  6. (Chhup Chhup Ke Use Royi Thi Ek Raat Ki Biyahi) X2

(Woh Dulha Jo Be Goro Kafan Ran Me Para Hai) X2

(Pyaase Pe Ajab Waqt Qayaamat Ka Para Hai) X2

  7. (Iaila Tere Akbar Ne Nahi Khaya Hai Neza) X2

(Yeh Neaja Dile Sibte Payambar Me Laga Hai) X2

(Pyaase Pe Ajab Waqt Qayaamat Ka Para Hai) X2

  8. (Maa Julaa Julaati Hai Khayalon Me Abhi Tak) X2

(Ab Julne Waalaa Nahi Baaki Ye Pata Hai.) X2

(Pyaase Pe Ajab Waqt Qayaamat Ka Para Hai) X2

  9. (Jis Khaak Par Khun Beh Gaya Zehra Ke Jigar Ka) X2

(Woh Fakat Khaak Nahi Khaake Shifa Hai) X2

(Pyaase Pe Ajab Waqt Qayaamat Ka Para Hai) X2

tracks.title: Ale Rasool Kucha-O Bazaar Ya Ali
tracks.lyrics:
(Sarkaar Ya Ali) X2

Aale Rasul Kuch-O Bazaar Ya

Roti To Hogi Aap Ki Talwar Ya Ali

Aale Rasul……….

Shahzadiyawo Ke Sar Pe Ridaye Nahi Rahi,

Bacho Ke Pas Bacho Ki Mayen Nahi Rahi,

(Khushya To Kya Khushi Ki) X2

Hawaye Nahi Rahi,

Luti Gayi Hai Aap Ki Sarkar Ya Ali

Aale Rasul……….

Abbas Jo Hussain Ke Lashkar Ki Aas Tha,

Lagta Tha Saath Hai Jab Tak Wo Paas Tha,

(Na Khof Koi Tha) X2

Kisi Ko Ye Raas Tha,

Utha Hai Sar Se Saaya-E-Diwarya Ali

Aale Rasul……….

Chini Gayi Sitam Se Sakina Ki Baliyan,

Rukhsar Par Namaya Tamacho Ke Hai Nishan,

(Shimre Layin Jo Bacho Ko) X2

Deta Hai Gurkiya,

Maktal Mein Kaap Ta Hai Alamdar Ya Ali

Aale Rasul……….

Ab Shaam Ka Safar Aur Nabi Ki Nawasiyan,

Pahne Huwe Hai Sayade Sajad Beriyan,

(Zalim Jo Leke Aaye Hai) X2

Lasho Ke Darmiyan,

Ankho Se Khun Bahaata Hai Bimar Ya Ali

Aale Rasul……….

Wo Dekho Buzuwo Me Hai Zainab Ke Resuma,

Sar Nange Jiski Maa Ko Na Dekhe Hai Aasmaa,

(Balwe Me Sar Khule Hai) X2

Wo Makhdumiye Jahan,

Koi Nahi Hai Muniso Ghamkhwar Ya Ali

Aale Rasul……….

Zehra Lahad Ko Chor Ke Yasrab Aayi Hai,

Faryad Apne Lab Pe Khadija Bhi Laayi Hai

(Makhtul Karbala Me) X2

Jo Zainab Ki Bhayi Hai,

Mara Gaya Khuld Ke Sardar Ya Ali

Aale Rasul……….

Bazu Kalam Huwe Alam Hai Lahu Lahi,

Asger Ki Khun Se Kar Liya Shabbir Ne Wudhu,

(Faili Huwi Hai Gham) X2

Fiza Aisi Charsu,

Jisme Hai Sans Lena Bhi Dushwar Ya Ali

Aale Rasul……….

(Roti To Hogi Aap Ki)X2

Talwar Ya Ali

Aale Rasul……….

tracks.title: Baita Houn Mei Ali Ka
tracks.lyrics:
Hussain Ya Hussain

_

Hussain Ya Hussain X6

1. (Beta Hu Mein Ali Ka, Nawasa Rasul Ka) X2

Zainab Behen Hai Meri, Chahita Butul Ka,

Kurbaniya Ye Meri Bhulayi Na Jayengi,

Jab Karbala Basengi Sadayen Ye Ayengi

Hussain Ya Hussain,

Hussain Be Kafan,

Hussain Be Khataa,

Hussain Shah X4

2. Baaba Ali Ke Hatho Men Jo Zulfikaar Hai,

Mukhsas Uski Kufri Ki Naslo Pe Waar He,

Mai Jang Kyu Ki Hasan Ka Mai Bhayi Hu,

Tum Munkire Khuda Mai Khuda Ka Fidayi Hun,

Hussain Ya Hussain,

Hussain Be Kafan,

Hussain Be Khataa,

Hussain Shah X4

3. Mere Liye Rasul Ke Sajdo Me Tool Hai,

Marzi Meri Khuda Ko Nabi Ko Kubulhai,

Sukhe Gale Pe Mere Jo Kanjar Chalayenga,

Markad Me Fatema Ko Ali Ko Satayenga

Hussain Ya Hussain,

Hussain Be Kafan,

Hussain Be Khataa,

Hussain Shah X4

4. Utra Tha Aasman Se Sitara Hamera Gar,

Kahe Ki Simt Dekho To Diwar Me Ho Daar,

Payasa Hu Be Watan Hu Gharibud Dayaar Hu,

Zehra Ki Betiyon Ke Liyen Dil Fighar Hu,

Hussain Ya Hussain,

Hussain Be Kafan,

Hussain Be Khataa,

Hussain Shah X4

5. Larneka Kasar Kar Ke Jo Aata Watan Se Dur,

Bacho Ko Saath Apne Na Lata Watan Se Dur,

Behne Bhi Betiyan Bhi Mere Saath Saath,

Mehmaan Karbala Me Tera Hum Furat Hai

Hussain Ya Hussain,

Hussain Be Kafan,

Hussain Be Khataa,

Hussain Shah X4

6. Chahun To Sangrejon Se Paani Nichor Du,

Daste Balaa Ke Sehra Se Kausar Ko Jor Dun,

Khud Se Khuda Ke Hukm Se Majbur Kar Liya

Pani Se Apne Aap Ko Lo Dur Karliya,

Hussain Ya Hussain,

Hussain Be Kafan,

Hussain Be Khataa,

Hussain Shah X4

7. Paani Hai Meri Maa Ke Meher Maan Likha Huwa,

Bacho Ko Mere Phir Bhi Paani Na Mil Sakaa,

Se Raab Ho Rahe Hai Sutr Aur Asf Bhi,

Aale Nabi Ke Hoto Pe Likhi Hai Tashnagi,

Hussain Ya Hussain,

Hussain Be Kafan,

Hussain Be Khataa,

Hussain Shah X4

8. Ab Mere Baad Ehle Haram Dukh Uthayenge,

Be Parda Ashkiyan Unhe Balwe Me Layenge,

Sine Pe Sone Wali Tamache Jo Kayengi,

Mujko Sadayen Dengi Chacha Bulayengi,

Hussain Ya Hussain,

Hussain Be Kafan,

Hussain Be Khataa,

Hussain Shah X4

tracks.title: Bibiya Rowe Zaro Zaar
tracks.lyrics:
Hussain Hussain X4

Bibiya Rowe Zaro Zaar, Shezadiya Rowe Zaaro Zaar, Lut Gaya Karbal Mein
Gharbaar,

Hussain Hussain X2

Ai Aale Nabi Ki Aur Darbar, Hussain Hussain X2

Zanjir Mein Jakra Hai Bimar, Hussain Hussain X2

Bibiya Rowe Zaaro Zaar……….

1. (Koi Bayn Kare Bacho Ke Liye Koi Ro Ke Kahe Bhayi Na Rahe) X2

(Nahi Zainab Ka Koi Ghamkhwar) X2

Karbobala Me Hai Ye Pukaar

Hussain Hussain X2

Ai Aale Nabi Ki Aur Gharbaar……………….

2. (Akbar Ka Jigar Asger Ka Galaa, Abbas Ke Baazu Tegh Jafaa) X2

(Hai Halke Shahidan Aur Talwar) X2

Karbobala Me Hai Ye Pukaar

Hussain Hussain X2

Ai Aale Nabi Ki Aur Gharbaar……………….

3. (Kasim Ka Badan Pamaal Huwa, Aati Thi Sadaa Dulha Dulha) X2

(Gar Aaja Bas Tu Ek Baar) X2

Karbobala Me Hai Ye Pukaar

(Hai Aaj Qayamat Ke Aasar) X2

Karbobala Me Hai Ye Pukaar

Hussain Hussain X2

Ai Aale Nabi Ki Aur Gharbaar……………….

5. (Roro Ke Sakina Bayn Kare, Darya Pe Gaya Amu Mere) X2

(Ab Kon Karenga Mujko Pyar) X2

Karbobala Me Hai Ye Pukaar

Hussain Hussain X2

Ai Aale Nabi Ki Aur Gharbaar……………….

6. (Be Parda Huwe Sab Ehle Haram, Jab Thanda Huwa Ghazi Ka Alam) X2

(Jina Hai Sakina Ka Dushwar) X2

Karbobala Me Hai Ye Pukaar

Hussain Hussain X2

Ai Aale Nabi Ki Aur Gharbaar……………….


7. (Jalte Huwe Khayme Ahle Haram, Hai Shame Ghariban Aur Matam) X2

(Haye Kafela Jaane Ko Tayar) X2

Hussain Hussain X2

tracks.title: Kullo Yaumin Ashura
tracks.lyrics:
Yaa Hussain

Ya Hussain, Ya Hussain

(Kullo Yaumin Ashura, Kullo Arzin Karbala) X2

(Yaa Abal Abrar) X2 Yaa Hussain

  1. Kabhi Nabi Ke Kalmago The Kabhi Namazen Parte The Karbobala Me Sibte Nabi Ke Khoon Ke Lekin Pyase The

(Hifz Kiya Quraan Magar Ye Qaule Nabi Naa Yaad Raha) X2

(Har Kuleman Haramahum Wa Silmun Liman Saal Mahum) X2

Inse Rifaqat Mujhse Rifaqat Inka Adu Dushman Hai Mera

(Yaa Abal Abrar) X2 Yaa Husain

Yaa Husain, Yaa Husain. (Kullo Yaumin Aashura Kullo Arzin Karbala) X2 (Yaa
Abal Abrar) X2 Yaa Husain

  2. Sab Ko Khabar Hai Sabko Pata Hai Khuld Bari Ke Malik Hai

Saaqi-E-Qausar Kasime Jannat Arsho Zami(N) Ke Malik Hai

(Shimre Sitamgar Such Zara To Kaat Raha Hai Kiska Gala) X2

(Ad Gule Man Ada Hum Va Mohibbun Leman Ahbahum) X2

Inka Adu Hai Mera Dushman, Dost Hai Inka Dost Mera

(Yaa Abal Abrar) X2 Yaa Husain

Yaa Husain, Yaa Husain. (Kullo Yaumin Aashura Kullo Arzin Karbala) X2 (Yaa
Abal Abrar) X2 Yaa Husain

  3. Laymo Ka Laymi Damo Ka Dami Nafso Ka Nafsi Jin Ko Kaha

Pyar Na Bas Hasnayno Zahera Maula Ali Thi Zere Kissa

(Sad Afsos Bhulaya Tumne Kaule Rasule Akram Ka) X2

Ruhe Payambar Ruhe Zahera Keyu Na Kare Phir Vavayla

Yaa Husain, Yaa Husain. (Kullo Yaumin Aashura Kullo Arzin Karbala) X2 (Yaa
Abal Abrar) X2 Yaa Husain

  4. Jiske Liye Tathir Ki Chadar Aayat Ban Kar Aayi Thi

Dasht-E-Bala Me Nange Sar Wo Zaynab, Zahera Jayi Thi

(Balo Se Parda Karti Thi Karti Thi Ye Aaho Buka) X2

Qatl Kiya Mere Bhai Ko Chhinli Mere Sarse Rida

Yaa Husain, Yaa Husain. (Kullo Yaumin Aashura Kullo Arzin Karbala) X2 (Yaa
Abal Abrar) X2 Yaa Husain

  5. Bade Nabi Ke Zulm Uthhaye Ahele Sitam Ne Zahera Par

Qati Kiya Jalti Reti Par Binte Nabi Kaa Lakhte Jigar

(Ik Taraf Tha Pyas Kaa Chehra Ek Taraf Behta Dariya) X2

Laasha-E-Sarvar Ahle Jafaa Ne Ghoro(N) Se Pamal Kiya

Yaa Husain, Yaa Husain. (Kullo Yaumin Aashura Kullo Arzin Karbala) X2 (Yaa
Abal Abrar) X2 Yaa Husain

  6. Subhe Dahem Shabbir Ne Jab Akber Se Kaha Azan Kaho

Wale Shahadat Aa Pahucha Hai Shukre Khuda Har Aan Karo

(Ham Nati Ke Quraan Hain Beta Quraan Suno Quraan Paro) X2

Teri Aza Aagaz Hai Beta Our Anjam Sajda Mera

Yaa Husain, Yaa Husain. (Kullo Yaumin Aashura Kullo Arzin Karbala) X2 (Yaa
Abal Abrar) X2 Yaa Husain

tracks.title: Munjho Mola Hussain
tracks.lyrics:
Mujo Mulula Hussain Mujo Aaka Hussain

Mera Ishk Bhi Tu Meri Jaan Bhi Tu X 2

Mera Din Bhi Tu Imman Bhi Tu

Mera Aan Bhi Tu Meri Sham Bhi Tu

Mera Pir Bhi Tu Sultan Bhi Tu Sab Waliyanja Agvan Bhi

Ay Har Momein X2

1. Ay Har Momein Je Dilje Sada

Mujo Mula Hussain Mujo Aaka Hussain.

Gulzar Banaya X2 Ay Dine Khuda

Mujo Maula Hussain………….

2. Tu Pyasa Teree Pyaas Bari, Hai Din Ko Tujsi Aas Bari,

Tere Naam Se Zinda Naame Khuda Tere Dam Se Hai Islaam Bacha

Mujo Maula Hussain…………

3. Tu Ibne Baaye Bismillah, Tu Lase Kaha Illallah,

Ai Ibne Ali, Ai Abde Khuda, Kurane Khudanaize Pe Para

Mujo Maula Hussain…………

4. Sardare Jinaa Sardaare Irm, Ye Saara Rab Ye Saara Jag,

Sab Tere Liye Hai Rab Ki Kasam, Hai Noore Muhammed Noore Tera,

Mujo Maula Hussain…………

5. Makhdum Mere Mere Sayad, Hoi Khatm Sitam Ki Tujh Par Had,

Parsabr Tera Allah Hu Samad, Allah Ne Dedi Apni Raza,

Mujo Maula Hussain…………

6. Sahbaz Jo Hai Sehwan Waale, Nalan Ki Tere Rakhwale,

Maidan Me Hai Dere Dale, Hai Laal Kalandar Ki Bhi Sadaa

Mujo Maula Hussain…………

7. Ham Sab Hai Matam Daar Tere, Zindaa Hai Teri Majlis Ke Liye,

Ai Maula Tere Gham Ke Sadke, Jo Maanga Khuda Ne Ham Ko Diya,

Mujo Maula Hussain…………

8. Majlis Me Teri Ghazi Ka Alam, Karta Hai Tere Gham Mein Matam,

Awaz Ye Aati Hai Hardam, Zinda Hai Dilo Mein Dard Tera,

Mujo Maula Hussain…………

9. Gulzar Banaya, Gulzar Banaya,

Ei Dine Khuda

Mujo Maula Hussain…………

tracks.title: Tere Kinary Furat
tracks.lyrics:
(Shiyaa Ne Maa. Nawha Kuna. Kushta Shud Sibte Rasulallah) X2 (Tere Ka Nare
Furaat) X2

Barbad Huwi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Luti Gayi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Kaidi Bani Mai. Hai
Wawaila.

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

  1. Tere Ka Nare, Khayme Hamare. Afsos-E Ye Hai, Lagne Na Paya. Tu Chup Rahi Thi, Sar Ko Jukake. Farte Alam Se, Lab Par Thi Aye

Barbad Huwi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Luti Gayi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Kaidi Bani Mai. Hai
Wawaila.

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

(Shiyaa Ne Maa. Nawha Kuna. Kushta Shud Sibte Rasulallah) X2

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

  2. Malike Kausar, Pani Ko Tarse. Ankho Se Ansu, Zehra Ke Dar Se. Tere Ka Nare, Aaya Jo Gar Se. Pyaase Ko Neza, Guzra Jigar Se.

Barbad Huwi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Luti Gayi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Kaidi Bani Mai. Hai
Wawaila.

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

(Shiyaa Ne Maa. Nawha Kuna. Kushta Shud Sibte Rasulallah) X2

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

  3. Gazi Ke Bazu, Tere Ka Nare. Pani Ki Khatir, Kat Ke Gire The. Gham Na Ke Manzar, Bhoolungi Kaise. Wo Pyaas-E Bache, Be Aab-E Kuze

Barbad Huwi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Luti Gayi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Kaidi Bani Mai. Hai
Wawaila.

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

(Shiyaa Ne Maa. Nawha Kuna. Kushta Shud Sibte Rasulallah) X2

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

  4. Itna Jo Pitaa, Kitna Sa Pani. Masum-E Asghar, Sheh Ki Nishani. Baki He Ab Tak, Tish Na Dahani. Kaise Dikhaye, Hai Be Zubani

Barbad Huwi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Luti Gayi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Kaidi Bani Mai. Hai
Wawaila.

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

(Shiyaa Ne Maa. Nawha Kuna. Kushta Shud Sibte Rasulallah) X2

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

  5. Barchi Jigar Par, Akbar Ne Khayi. Sukhe Labo Tak, Tu Kyu Na Ayi. Zanjir-E Kisne, Tujko Pehnayi. Mar Gaya Pyaasa, Sughra Ka Bhayi

Barbad Huwi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Luti Gayi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Kaidi Bani Mai. Hai
Wawaila.

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

(Shiyaa Ne Maa. Nawha Kuna. Kushta Shud Sibte Rasulallah) X2

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

  6. Mera To Sab-E Kuch-E, Lut Gaya Ban. Ek Ek Sipahi, Mar Gaya Ran Me. Tir-E Lagar Sarwar Ke Badan Me. Ab He Judayi, Bhayi Bahan Me

Barbad Huwi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Luti Gayi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Kaidi Bani Mai. Hai
Wawaila.

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

(Shiyaa Ne Maa. Nawha Kuna. Kushta Shud Sibte Rasulallah) X2

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

  7. Be Ghusle Lashe, Tere Ka Nare. Chalis Thi Din Tak, Ese Parhe The. Ye Bat-E Koi, Ab Tujse Puche. Kya Kiya Ada Wakt, Sibt-E Nabi Se

Barbad Huwi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Luti Gayi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Kaidi Bani Mai. Hai
Wawaila.

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

(Shiyaa Ne Maa. Nawha Kuna. Kushta Shud Sibte Rasulallah) X2

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

  8. Ase Huwa Jo, Bhi Ta Hona. Kismat Me Teri, Likha Karona. Ta Hashre Abto, Yuhi Tarap Na. Mar Gayi Pyaasi, Bali Sakina

Barbad Huwi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Luti Gayi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Kaidi Bani Mai. Hai
Wawaila.

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

(Shiyaa Ne Maa. Nawha Kuna. Kushta Shud Sibte Rasulallah) X2

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

  9. Shaam Se Lutkar, Ayi He Zainab. Chaas Thi De Sar, Layi He Zainab. Sharminda Tumse, Bhayi Ye Zainab. Kho Ke Sakina, Ayi He Zainab

Barbad Huwi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Luti Gayi Mai. Hai Wawaila. Kaidi Bani Mai. Hai
Wawaila.

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

(Shiyaa Ne Maa. Nawha Kuna. Kushta Shud Sibte Rasulallah) X2

(Tere Ka Nare Furaat) X2

tracks.title: Tere Shehr Say
tracks.lyrics:
(Tere Shehr-E Se Jaate Hai, Dai Humko Dua Nana) X2



  1. (Aabad Karenge Hum) X2 Hay Ab Karbobala Nana

Tere Shehr-E Se Jaate Hai, Dai Humko Dua Nana

  2. (Tera Din-E He Mushkil Me, Me Kaise Raho Gar Me) X2

(Tiflin-E Koi Wada) X2 Ha Tujse Kiya Nana

Tere Shehr-E Se Jaate Hai, Dai Humko Dua Nana

  3. (Roze Pe Tera Aake, Ham Sham-E Jalaa Tethe) X2

(Ho Ab-E Kon-E Mujawir Hai) X2 Sugra Ke Siwa Nana

Tere Shehr-E Se Jaate Hai, Dai Humko Dua Nana

  4. (Is Tarha Parinde Bhi, Makhtal Se Nahi Jaata) X2

(Gurbaat Me Muja Jaise) X2 Hai Abb Jaane Para Nana

Tere Shehr-E Se Jaate Hai, Dai Humko Dua Nana

  5. (Bache Hai Bohot Chota, Garmi Ka Zamaana Hai) X2

(Pohchayenga Manzir Par) X2 Ab Humko Khuda Nana

Tere Shehr-E Se Jaate Hai, Dai Humko Dua Nana

  6. (Amaa Ki Lahad Chuti, Roza Bhi Tera Chuta) X2

(Us Wakta Kaleje Par) X2 Khanjar Se Chalaa Nana

Tere Shehr-E Se Jaate Hai, Dai Humko Dua Nana

  7. (Aabad Karenge Hum) X2 Hay Ab Karbobala Nana

tracks.title: Aao Sab Ali Ali Karein
tracks.lyrics:
(Haq Hai Ali) X3, Ali Ali

(Haq Hai Ali) X3, Ali Ali

  1. (Jidhar Haq Hai Uthar Maula) X2 Jidhar Maula Udhar Haq Hai Ali


(Haq Hai Ali) X3, Ali Ali

(Haq Hai Ali) X3, Ali Ali


(Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen, Ali Ali Karen) X2 Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen

  2. Ali Wali Key Nam-E-Pak Say Ager Tumhein Hai Pyar

Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen, Ali Ali Karen, Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen


(Ali Ali, Ali Ali, Ali Ali, Ali Ali) X2

Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen, Ali Ali Karen, Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen

  3. Likha Ali, Parha Ali, Kaha Ali, Suna Ali, (Pilaya Maa Ne Dudh Mein Bas Eik Naam Ya Ali) X2 Nagar Nagar, Gali Gali, Chaman Chaman, Kali Kali, Dono Hath Uthao Aur Dil Se Bolo Bar Bar


Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen, Ali Ali Karen, Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen

  4. Malang Ki Sada Ali Hai, Sab Ka Asra Ali, (Kaha Hai Jibraeil Ne Fakat Hain La Fatah Ali) X2 Zamin Zamin Falak Falak, Ali Ki Har Jagah Jalak, Qalandar-O-Malang Ki Zuban Par Hai Yehi Pukar


Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen, Ali Ali Karen, Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen

  5. Gadeer Aur Mubahela, Khuda Ka Ghar Ho Ya Kisa (Nabi Key Sath Sath Hain, Ali Ba Hukm-E-Kibriya) X2 Kadam Kadam Liye Alam.nabi Key Sath Dam Ba Dam, Ali Chaley Hain Is Tarha, Key Maan Key Sath Sheer Khwar

Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen, Ali Ali Karen, Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen

  6. Khudaya Kaysa Mojeza, Ali Key Nam Ko Diya (Key Jis Ne Ya Ali Kaha Buland Martaba Huwa) X2 Ali Key Gun Jo Gaey Ga, Kamal-E-Fun Wo Paega, Miley Gi Nusratey Ali To, Fatah Hoga Hum Kinar

Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen, Ali Ali Karen, Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen

  7. Wasila-E-Najat Hai, Shahur-E-Dinyat Hai (Khuda Key Sath Hai Ali Khuda Ali Key Sath Hai) X2 Khuda Khuda Ali Ali, Sada Jo Harf Mein Dhali, Alam Nabi Ne De Diya, Khuda Ne Bheji Zulfiqar


Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen, Ali Ali Karen, Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen

  8. Nazar Jo Karbala Gai Too, Rooh Thar Thara Gai (Galey Pay Thi Hussain Key Baqa-E-Deen Mein Churi) X2 Zuban Zuban Jigar Jigar, Harm Tamam Nauha Ger, Pukarti Thin Bibiyan Tamam Ho Key Ashq Bar

Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen, Ali Ali Karen, Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen

  9. Rida Saroon Sey Chin Gayee, Bacha Nahi Sitam Koi (Ali Ki Betiyon Key Jab Rasan Galoon Mein Bandh Gain) X2 Buka Buka, Foogan Foogan, Fiza Thi Sab Dhooan Dhooan, Ali Ki Piyari Betiyan Pukarin Ho Key Beqarar


Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen, Ali Ali Karen, Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen

  10. Aalam Shaded Hain Bhot, Abhi Yazid Hain Bhot (Kiya Yazid-E-Asar Ne Jawan Shahid Hain Bhot) X2 Utho Utho Chalo Chalo, Alam Ali Ka Tham Lo, Mita Doo Khaq Mein Chalo, Yazidiyoon Ka Ekhteyar


Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen, Ali Ali Karen, Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen

  11. Aaser Ghamzada Haram Jigar Key Khoon Sey Ankh Nam (Qadam Qadam Pay Sakhteyan, Qadam Qadam Naye Sitm) X2 Lahoo Lahoo Dil-O-Jigar, Bara Ajeeb Tha Safar, Thay Abley Joo Paoon Mein Too Abloon Mein Lakh Khar


Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen, Ali Ali Karen, Aao Sab Ali Ali Karen

tracks.title: Muje Abbas Kehte Hai
tracks.lyrics:
(Muje Abbas Kehte Hai) X3

  1. (Me Kamre Bani Hasham Hu, Sarkar Hu Me Lashkar Ka) X2 (Shabbir Mera Akaa Hai, Me Beta Hu Haider Ka) X2 (Maslat Me Wafaadari Hai, Manzar Me Alamdari Hai) X2 Abbas Kehte Hai

(Muje Abbas Kehte Hai) X3

  2. Zehra Ne Kaha Hai Beta, Hai Sare Arab Me Charcha. Shabbir Ki Dil Ki Takat (Hu Chand Bani Hasham Ka) X2 (Me Karbobala Ka Haider, Jibril Bachaale Sheh Par) X2 Abbas Kehte Hai

(Muje Abbas Kehte Hai) X3

  3. Ho Chaho Hasham Rakh Ta Hu, Shaano Pe Alam Rakh Ta Hu. Lo Rok Sakoto Roko (Darya Me Kadam Rakh Ta Hu) X2 (Me Hashra Bapa Kardunga Sar Dan Se Judaa Kar Dunga) X2 Abbas Kehte Hai

(Muje Abbas Kehte Hai) X3

  4. Talwar Hai Mere Bazu, He Mujme Wafaa Ki Kushbu. Me Dekh Nahi Sakta Hu (Zainab Ki Nazar Me Asu) X2 (Kar Ghaiz-E Me Aa Kar Dekhu, Pani Me Aag Laga Du) X2 Abbas Kehte Hai

(Muje Abbas Kehte Hai) X3

  5. Bacho Ko Tasali Daikar, Me Aaya Hu Dar Ya Par. Bacho Ki Aas Ne Tute (Bas Ek Dua Hai Lab Par) X2 (Pani Jo Na Poncha Unga, Khaymo Me Nahi Jaa Unga) X2 Abbas Kehte Hau

(Muje Abbas Kehte Hai) X3

tracks.title: Ankhiya Mal Mal
tracks.lyrics:
Akh'ya'n Mal Mal Zainab Vekh'di Nai Veer Pachanya Janda Hey X2

Akh'ya'n Mal Mal Zainab Vekh'di Nai Veer Pachanya Janda Hey X2 [Chorus]



Lay-Bas Gharibi Da Pehan Kar X 2

O Sardar Gharib Ko Handa Hey



Akh'ya'n Mal Mal Zainab Vekh'di Nai Veer Pachanya Janda Hey X2



Jada Ghazi Qamar Nu Tore Gaya X2

Unda Qasim Jigar Maror Gaya [Chorus]

Jinu Akbar Putar

Chore Gaya [Chorus]

Woh Ono Rasta Nazar Na Aanda Hey



Akh'ya'n Mal Mal Zainab Vekh'di Nai Veer Pachanya Janda Hey X2



Roh Akbar Dee Ur Ja Wae Gee X2

Uno Moat Yake-Nan Aa Way Gee [Chorus]

Shabbir De Yarib

Khair Howay [Chorus]

Oo Pay-Ya Barchi No Phat Pawn-Da Hey



Akh'ya'n Mal Mal Zainab Vekh'di Nai Veer Pachanya Janda Hey X2



Didhta Barchi Khaanda Akbar Noo X2

Bin Bazoo Abbas Dilawar No [Chorus]

Kur Rayte Tay Rakh Kay

Asghar No [Chorus]

O Paye Kabar Be Aap Ba-Nanda Hey



Akh'ya'n Mal Mal Zainab Vekh'di Nai Veer Pachanya Janda Hey X2



Bin Kafan Nu Veer Shabbir Dekhay

Bin Chadar Tey Hamsheer Dekhay [Chorus]

Ali A Abid Zanjeer

Qis Dil Say [Chorus]

Oo No Aap Yatim Ba-Nanda Hey



Akh'ya'n Mal Mal Zainab Vekh'di Nai Veer Pachanya Janda Hey X2



Jis Basti Pew Da Raj Uthay

Bee-Biyan Chadar Dee Mohtaj Uthay [Chorus]

Zainab Deya Nabzan

Thak Dea Nay [Chorus]

Dil Sina Which Ghab-Rawnda Hey



Akh'ya'n Mal Mal Zainab Vekh'di Nai Veer Pachanya Janda Hey X2



Lay Bas Gharibi Da Pehan Kar X 2

O Sardar Gharib Ko Handa Hey



Akh'ya'n Mal Mal Zainab Vekh'di Nai Veer Pachanya Janda Hey X3

tracks.title: Dekho Ay Kufiyo
tracks.lyrics:
Haye Zinab, Zainab (X3)

Dekho Ay Kufiyo. Me Zainab-E Dilgir-E Hu (X4)

  1. Sar Nange, Muje Kyu He Phiraya (X2) Me Wari Se Tathir-E Hu

Dekho Ay Kufiyo. Me Zainab-E Dilgir-E Hu (X2)

  2. Ale Ahmed-E Ka Tamasha, Dekhene Aaye Ho Kyu. Apni Ghairat-E Ka Janaza, Dekhene Aaye Ho Kyu. Bebadan Me, Do Pe Lasha, Dekhene Aa Ye Ho Kyu. Me Usi, Mazlum-E Karbal (X2) Ki Dukhi Hamshir-E Hu.

Dekho Ay Kufiyo. Me Zainab-E Dilgir-E Hu (X2)

  3. Jiska Sajda Kal Pe Yazda, Me Samaya Ho Husain. Gir Ke Gore Pe Zamin Par, Jo Na Aaya Ho Husain. Sar Pe Apne Jisko Tiro Ne Uthaya, Wo Husain. Me Usi, Mazlum-E Karbal (X2) Ki Dukhi Hamshir-E Hu.

Dekho Ay Kufiyo. Me Zainab-E Dilgir-E Hu (X2)

  4. Puchete Ho Mujse Rone, Ka Sabab Ehle Japaa. He Tumhari Orte Parde Me Or Mai Be Ridaa. Mere Bache Mera Bhaayi, Be Khata Mara Gaya. Me Usi, Mazlum-E Karbal (X2) Ki Dukhi Hamshir-E Hu

Dekho Ay Kufiyo. Me Zainab-E Dilgir-E Hu (X2)

  5. Be Kafan Jalti Zami Par, Aaj-E Bhi Sota He Jo. Ashke Ki Khayti Zamin Par, Aaj-E Bhi Hota He Jo. Be Ridaa Me Par Meri Neze Pe Hi Rota Hai Jo. Me Usi, Mazlum-E Karbal (X2) Ki Dukhi Hamshir-E Hu

Dekho Ay Kufiyo. Me Zainab-E Dilgir-E Hu (X2)

  6. Wo Phase Gardan Se Jisko, Tere Dar Be Maar-E Kar. Kat-E Ke Sarlash-E Bedar, Chordi Thi Khaake Par. Phir Usi Ki Laash-E Par Le Aaye Mujko, Nange Sar. Me Usi, Mazlum-E Karbal (X2) Ki Dukhi Hamshir-E Hu

Dekho Ay Kufiyo. Me Zainab-E Dilgir-E Hu (X2)

  7. Jiska Ghazi So Gaye Darya Kanare Tash-E Na Lag. Kat Gaaye Bazu Jari Par, Or Kya Honga Gazab. Berida Me Hogayi Hu, Jiske Marne, Ke Sabab. Me Usi, Mazlum-E Karbal (X2) Ki Dukhi Hamshir-E Hu

Dekho Ay Kufiyo. Me Zainab-E Dilgir-E Hu (X2)



  8. Oor Kandho Par Uthakar, Laaye Jo Akbar Ki Lash. Dafne Kardi Jisme Jalti, Khak-E Me Asghar Ki Lash. Bekafan Be Ghor-E Hai Shaah-E Bero Kar Ki Lash. Me Usi, Mazlum-E Karbal (X2) Ki Dukhi Hamshir-E Hu

Dekho Ay Kufiyo. Me Zainab-E Dilgir-E Hu (X2)

  9. Sar Nange, Muje Kyu He Phiraya (X2) Me Wari Se Tathir-E Hu

Dekho Ay Kufiyo. Me Zainab-E Dilgir-E Hu (X2)

tracks.title: Jaane Wale Karbala Kay
tracks.lyrics:
(Karbala Karbala Karbala Hey Karbala) X2

(Jane Wale Karbala Kay Karbala Ley Chal Muje) X4

  1. (Jane Wale Karbala Kay, Karbala Lay Chal Muje) X2

Roza E Shabbir Par Dunga Dua Ley Chal Muje

(Jane Wale Karbala Kay Karbala Lay Chal Muje) X2

  2. (Hay Jaha Ganje Shahida Hey Jahaa Nehre Furaat) X2

Jis Jaga Syed Mera Pyaasa Rahaa Ley Chal Muje

(Jane Wale Karbala Kay Karbala Lay Chal Muje) X2

  3. (Jis Jagaa Jagi Thi Kismat Hur Ki Wo Dekhunga Mai) X2

Aasyo Par Kaise Hoti Hai Ataa Ley Chal Muje

(Jane Wale Karbala Kay Karbala Lay Chal Muje) X2

  4. (Is Kadar Nadaar Uza May Safar Kuch Bhi Nahi) X2

Dosh Par Apni Dikha Kar Ay Hawaa Ley Chal Muje

(Jane Wale Karbala Kay Karbala Lay Chal Muje) X2

  5. (Jis Jaga Abbas Ke Bazu Kalam Ho Kar Gire) X2

Us Jaga Mai Bhi Karu Matam Zara Ley Chal Muje

(Jane Wale Karbala Kay Karbala Lay Chal Muje) X2

  6. (Dil Ullaj Kar Agaya Barchi Mai Akber Ka Jahan) X2

Dil Waha Mai Bhi Karu Apna Fida Ley Chal Muje

(Jane Wale Karbala Kay Karbala Lay Chal Muje) X2

  7. (Jal Gaye Sham-E Ghariban Mai Jaha Khayme Tama) X2

Jis Jaga Nana Sa Ek Jula Jala Ley Chal Muje

(Jane Wale Karbala Kay Karbala Lay Chal Muje) X2

  8. (Haye Wo Maktal Jaha Bali Sakina Raat Me) X2

Dhoond Ti Phir Ti Thi Sina Baap Ka Ley Chal Muje

(Jane Wale Karbala Kay Karbala Lay Chal Muje) X2

  9. (Jane Wale Karbala Kay, Karbala Lay Chal Muje) X2

Roza E Shabbir Par Dunga Dua Ley Chal Muje

tracks.title: Na Ro Zainab Na Ro
tracks.lyrics:
Shame Gariban (X2)

Zainab Tanha

Ghore Andhera

Mot Ka Saya

Badal Banke Sar Par Chaya

Awaz Ayi Tabo Ki Ubri

Kown Jale Kaymo Ki Janib

Tayz Kadam Se Chalta Aya

Poch Ansoo Zainab Dekhi Dekhete Kya Hai Uska Baba

Baap Ke Sine Par Sar Rakhkar Bilak Bilak Kar Tarap Tarap Kar Aysa (Rowi) X2

(Naro Zainab Naro, Ha Mere Jigar Ke Tukre Naro) X2

(Me Kaise Na Rowu Baba Mai Ujar Gayi Baba) X2

Ha Mera Akber

Ha Mera Asger

Ha Mera Gazi

Ha Tera Dilber

tracks.title: Shabir Agar Teri
tracks.lyrics:
Na Dil Rota, Na Gham Hota, Na Aisa Kahi Matam Hota (X2)

Shabbir Agar Teri, Azadari Na Hoti (X2)

  1. Mazloom Ki Duniya Me (X2) Tarafadari Na Hoti

Shabbir Agar Teri, Azadari Na Hoti (X2)

  2. Shabbir Ka Maksad Jo, Samaj Leta Zamanaa (X2)

Quran Ko Samajne Mei (X2) Ye Dushwaari Na Hoti

Shabbir Agar Teri, Azadari Na Hoti (X2)

  3. Kya Fayeda Ankho Ka, Rehjata Zara Socho (X2)

In Ankho Me Mawla Ki (X2) Jo Ghamkhwari Na Hoti

Shabbir Agar Teri, Azadari Na Hoti (X2)

  4. Shabbir Ke Roze Pe, Kuch Roz Jo Rehte (X2)

Tumko Kabhi Janat Ki (X2) Talabghaari Na Hoti

Shabbir Agar Teri, Azadari Na Hoti (X2)

  5. Do Roz Bhi Janat Me, Rehna Hame Mushkil Tha (X2)

Zehra Tere Bacho Ki (X2) Jo Sardari Na Hoti

Shabbir Agar Teri, Azadari Na Hoti (X2)

  6. Gazi Tere Jesa Jo, Alamdar Na Hota (X2)

Dunya Me Alam Hote (X2) Alamdari Na Hoti

  7. Sharminda Sakina Se, Agar Hota Na Pani (X2)

Ye Rasm Sabilo(N) Ki (X2) Kabhi Jari Na Hoti

  8. Namoos-E-Muhammad Ko, Jo Pehchanti Dunya (X2)

Zainab Ke Khule Sar Pe (X2) Ye Sangbaari Na Hoti

Shabbir Agar Teri, Azadari Na Hoti (X2)

tracks.title: Woh Khamein Jal Rahay Hain
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain) X5

Ya Hussain. Yazid-E Bola, Bari Foj-E Mere Hath-E Me Hai. Hussain-E Bole,
Hussain-E Bole. Hussain-E Bole Natijaa, Khuda Ke Hath-E Me Hai. Yazid-E Bola,
Jo Bayyat Karo Khazaana Hai. Hussain. Hussain-E Bole Ke Nana Ko Mu Dikhaana
Hai. Yazid-E Bola Me Zalim Hu, Zulm-E Karta Hu. Hussain, Ya Hussain, Hussain-E
Bole Me Sayaddir Hu, Sabr-E Kar Ta Hu.

(Ya Husain) X2

(Wo Khayme Jal Rahe Hai, Ye Sham-E Gariba Hai) X3

  1. (Ye Ban Me Bikhri Lashe) X2 Ab Sham-E Ka Zindan Hai

(Wo Khayme Jal Rahe Hai, Ye Sham-E Gariba Hai) X2

  2. (Ik Do Peher Me Ujra. Ghar Ek-E Fatema Ka) X2 (Ye Jis Jagaa Pe Khayme) X2 Ab Us Jagaa Dhuwa Hai.

(Wo Khayme Jal Rahe Hai, Ye Sham-E Gariba Hai) X2

  3. (Akbar Ne Jab Azan Di. Ye Bekasi Kahaa Thi) X2 (Wo Subho Ki Azan Thi) X2 Ye Sham-E Ki Azan Hai.

(Wo Khayme Jal Rahe Hai, Ye Sham-E Gariba Hai) X2

  4. (Besar Koi Namaazi. Be Dast-E Ko Ilazi) X2 (Sine Me Ik-E Jawaa Ke) X2 Tuti Huwi Sinaa Hai.

(Wo Khayme Jal Rahe Hai, Ye Sham-E Gariba Hai) X2

  5. (Pehra Badal Gaya Hai. Zainab Ye Karbala Hai) X2 (Zainab Ke Hath-E Me Aa) X2 Abbas-E Ka Nishan Hai.

(Wo Khayme Jal Rahe Hai, Ye Sham-E Gariba Hai) X2

  6. (Kya Dhund-E Thi Hai Sinaa. Awaaz Di O Sakina) X2 (Sine Pe Sone Wali) X2 Baba Tera Yahaa Hai.

(Wo Khayme Jal Rahe Hai, Ye Sham-E Gariba Hai) X2

  7. (Ye Ban Me Bikhri Lashe) X2 Ab Sham-E Ka Zindan Hai

(Wo Khayme Jal Rahe Hai, Ye Sham-E Gariba Hai) X2

tracks.title: Yeh Majlis E Hussain
tracks.lyrics:
He Sog-E Jis Jagaa Bhi. Shahe Mashrakain-E Ka. Khud-E Pursa Zehra Ne Di He.
Is-E Noor-E Ain-E Ka. Rona Sawab Jispe Na Rona Haraam He.

Chashme Khuda Me Iska Baraa Aitiraam He.

Yeh Majlis-E Husain, Alaihis Salaam He. Chashme Khudaa Me Iska Baraa Ehtiraam
He.

  1. Ye Majlis-E He Hamde Khuda Naat-E Mustafa. In Majliso Me Hota He Quran-E Lab Kusha. In Majliso Me Miltaha Janat Ka Rasta. In Majliso Ki Hoti He Kuch Asi Ikhtidaa. Zakir Ke Lab Pe Pehle Khudaa Ka Kalaam He.

Chashme Khuda Me Iska Baraa Aitiraam He.

Yeh Majlis-E Husain, Alaihis Salaam He. Chashme Khudaa Me Iska Baraa Ehtiraam
He.

  2. In Majliso Me Hoti He Insaniyat Ki Bat. Zikra Gham-E Husain He Waydaniyat Ki Bat. Ya Majlise Rasool Ki Hakaniyat Ki Bat. Rak Karthi He Ye Majlise Sufyani Yat Ki Bat. In Ke Sabab To Hur Bhi Alaihis Salaam Hai.

Chashme Khuda Me Iska Baraa Aitiraam He.

Yeh Majlis-E Husain, Alaihis Salaam He. Chashme Khudaa Me Iska Baraa Ehtiraam
He.

  3. In Majlis-O Ko Ajra Risalaat Kaha Gaya. Roze Azal Se Rone Ka Fitrat Kaha Gaya. Dilki Lugat Me Isko Mohabbat Kaha Gaya. Yani Ise Batul Ke Sunnat Kaha Gaya. Har Rone Ankh-E Ko Mere Salaam He.

Chashme Khuda Me Iska Baraa Aitiraam He.

Yeh Majlis-E Husain, Alaihis Salaam He. Chashme Khudaa Me Iska Baraa Ehtiraam
He.

  4. Ik Majlise Azaa Jo Huwi Mulk-E Shaam Me. Zainab Ne Sab Bichayi Diya Be Imam Ne. Ansu Chope He Yaad-E Shahido Ke Naam Me. Matam Huwa Jo Yaad-E Shah-E Tish Na Kam Me. Tabse Gham-E Husain-E Zamaan-E Me Aam He.

Chashme Khuda Me Iska Baraa Aitiraam He.

Yeh Majlis-E Husain, Alaihis Salaam He. Chashme Khudaa Me Iska Baraa Ehtiraam
He.

  5. Majlis Me Zikre Bali Sakina Ki Yaad Karo. Pani Piyo To Yaad Shahe Karbala Ki Ho. Majlis Me Tazgaraa Ali Asghar Ke Jab Suno. Ik Raha Sar De Bhar Ke Tarap Kar Yahi Kaho. Asghar Bara Shahido Me Tera Mukaam He.

Chashme Khuda Me Iska Baraa Aitiraam He.

Yeh Majlis-E Husain, Alaihis Salaam He. Chashme Khudaa Me Iska Baraa Ehtiraam
He.

tracks.title: Aa Mere Hussain
tracks.lyrics:
Ashur-E Ka, Suraj-E Hai, Kayamat Ki Gari Hai. Bhayi Ka, Galaa Kat Ta, Bahan-E
Dekh Rahi Hai. Maktal Me Kisi Maa Ki, Sadaa Gunj-E Rahi Hai. Aa E Mere
Husain-E Meri God-E Me Aajaa. Aajaa, Mere Bache, Meri Aa Gosh-E Me Aajaa.

(Aajaa Mere Bache Meri Aa Gosh-E Me Aajaa) X2

  1. Mere Liye Ay Laal-E Tu Asghar Ki Tarha He. Godi Meri Gehwaara Hai Bistar Ki Tarha Hai. Is Dhupe Me Daman Mera Chadar Ki Tarha Hai.

Aa E Mere Husain-E Meri God-E Me Aajaa. (Ajaa Mere Bache Meri Aa Gosh-E Me
Aajaa) X3

  2. Me Maa Hu Mera Dil, Nahi Sin-E Me Sambhalta. Nazuk-E Ye Badan Te Ra Ye Jalta Huwa Sehra. Or Is Me Sitam Ye, Na Ke Tu Rehgaya Pyaasa

Aa E Mere Husain-E Meri God-E Me Aajaa. (Ajaa Mere Bache Meri Aa Gosh-E Me
Aajaa) X3

  3. Me God-E Me Laylu, Tuje Sine Se Lagaa Lu. Sine Pe Sakina Ki Tarha Tujko Sulaalu. Sine Me Tere Tir-E Me Palko Se Nikalu.

Aa E Mere Husain-E Meri God-E Me Aajaa. (Ajaa Mere Bache Meri Aa Gosh-E Me
Aajaa) X3

  4. Aakar Mere Zanu Pe Jo So Jaa Te The Beta. Chuki Ki Mushakkat Ke Bhi Pehlu, Nahi Badlaa. Ab Kese Tuje Chor-E Du Maktal Me Akela

Aa E Mere Husain-E Meri God-E Me Aajaa. (Ajaa Mere Bache Meri Aa Gosh-E Me
Aajaa) X3

  5. Meri Bhi To Awlad-E He Tu Bhi To Padar Hai. Awlad-E Ka Gham Kya Hai Ye Tujko Bi Khabar Hai. Gham Bachche Ka Sehjaye Ye Kis Maa Ka Jigar He.

Aa E Mere Husain-E Meri God-E Me Aajaa. (Ajaa Mere Bache Meri Aa Gosh-E Me
Aajaa) X3

  6. Tu Let-E Gaya Thakke Ke Tu Ise Jalti Zamin Par. Ye Kiska Lahu Tun-E Malaa Ruhe Hasi Par. Mat Khakh Me Pe So Lal Teri Maa Hai Yahi Par.

Aa E Mere Husain-E Meri God-E Me Aajaa. (Ajaa Mere Bache Meri Aa Gosh-E Me
Aajaa) X3

  7. Jo Dil Pe Tere Ghuzri Me Sub Dekh-E Rahi Thi. Har Lash-E Uthane Me Tere Sath-E Gayi Thi. Ab Bat-E Wo Kehti Tujo Bach-E Pan Me Kahi Thi.

Aa E Mere Husain-E Meri God-E Me Aajaa. (Ajaa Mere Bache Meri Aa Gosh-E Me
Aajaa) X3

tracks.title: Ali Maula Ali Maula
tracks.lyrics:
Ali Maula Ali Maula X3

Ali Ki Badshaahi Hai, Ali Isme Ilaahi Hai

Har Ek Mizan Me Tola, Zuba Ke Saath Dil Bola

Ali Maula Ali Maula X2

Lage Jab Haidari Naara

Jaha Mai Gunj Hoti Hai,

Ali Maula Ali Maula

Ali Ki Badshaahi Hai, Ali Isme Ilaahi Hai

Har Ek Mizan Me Tola, Zuba Ke Saath Dil Bola

Kabhi Naade Ali Parkar Kaho Ya Fat-He Khaibar,

To Mushkil Hogi Mushkil Mai, Ali Ka Naam Sunkar

Ali Ki Badshaahi Hai, Ali Isme Ilaahi Hai

Har Ek Mizan Me Tola, Zuba Ke Saath Dil Bola

Nusairi Ne Khuda Mana, Khuda Ne Lafata Jaana

Khuda Ko Wohi Samjhenga, Ali Ne Ko Jisne Pehchaana

Ali Ki Badshaahi Hai, Ali Isme Ilaahi Hai

Har Ek Mizan Me Tola, Zuba Ke Saath Dil Bola

Ali Suraj Ko Paltade, Ali Darya Ko Theraade,

Ali Chaahe To Munkir Par, Kazaa Ki Aag Barsade,

Ali Ki Badshaahi Hai, Ali Isme Ilaahi Hai

Har Ek Mizan Me Tola, Zuba Ke Saath Dil Bola

Ali Aamil Ali Kaamil, Ali Kashti Ali Sahil,

Agar Insaaf Se Pucho, Ali Islam Ka Hai Dil,

Ali Ki Badshaahi Hai, Ali Isme Ilaahi Hai

Har Ek Mizan Me Tola, Zuba Ke Saath Dil Bola

Ali Hai Mazhare Yazdan, Ali Hai Bolta Quran,

Nabuwat Jism Ki Surat, Ali Us Jism Mai Hai Jaan,

Ali Ki Badshaahi Hai, Ali Isme Ilaahi Hai

Har Ek Mizan Me Tola, Zuba Ke Saath Dil Bola

tracks.title: Amma Baar Baar
tracks.lyrics:
Zindane Shaam Me Jaha, Bibi Ka Hai Mazar

Raato Ko Dhimi Dhimi Si Aati Hai Ek Pukar

Kano Se Mere Khoon X2

Abhi Bhi Tapakta Hai, Amma Baar Baar X3

Amma Baar Baar Gala Mera Dookhta Hai Amma Baar Baar

Uthti Hai Jab Bhi Aap X2

Mera Saas Rukta Hai, Amma Baar Baar

Haa, Amma Baar Baar……….

Soyi Nahi Hoo Shaame Gariba Ke Baad Main

Ab Kya Jiungi Shaam Ke Zindan Ke Baad Main

Be Aas Ab Hoon Shahe Shahida Ke Baad Main

Saya Azal Ka Amma Mere Sath Chalta Hai

Amma Baar Baar…………….

Kano Ka Khoon Aankhon Ke Aansu Se Mil Gaya

Har Zakhm Phool Banke Badan Par Hai Khil Gaya

Baba Ko Dhoond Laoon Ke Seenese Dil Gaya

Be Jaan Mere Jism Main Kyun Dil Dharakta Hai

Amma Baar Baar……….



Ay Amma Jab Se Baba Se Main Door Ho Gayi

Ye Zindagi Mere Liye Naasoor Ho Gayi

Paar Kya Karoon Naseeb Se Majboor Ho Gayi

Hijre Padar Se Seene Me Ek Dard Uthta Hai

Amma Baar Baar……………..

Kante Pare Hai Halq Main Ay Amma Pyaas Se

Darti Hoon Jhonka Guzre Hawa Ka Jo Paas Se

Neend Urgayi Hai Aankhon Se Khawfo Hiras Se

Rone Pe Mere Shimr Layeen Kyun Jhirakta Hai

Amma Baar Baar………………

Asgar Ke Bad Paan Piyoo Main Nahi Nahi

Ammu Ke Baad Zinda Rahoon Main Nahi Nahi

Fariyaad Kuch Shaki Se Karoon Main Nahi Nahi

Paan Main Ab Se Chehraye Asgar Jhalakta Hai

Amma Baar Baar…………………..

Lagta Hai Qaid Jan Se Rihayi Qarib Hai

Ai Amma Jano Tum Se Rihayi Qarib Hai

Ab Mout Mujhko Kabr Ke Laayi Qarib Hai

Daman To Jal Chuka Hai Mera Dil Sulagta Hai

Amma Baar Baar…………..

Kounain Mai Ye Kaisa Hai Qanoon Poochiye

Marne Ke Baad Mujhko Rihayi Nahin Mile

Ye Kaisi Qaid Hai Ke Lahad Bhi Yahin Bane

Qaidi Kabhi To Qaid Se Ghar Ko Palat Ta Hai

Amma Baar Baar………………….

Amma Rehai Paake Watan Tum To Jaaongi

Sugra Meri Bahan Ko Gale Se Lagaaongi

Puchengi Jab Mujhe To Use Kya Batawoongi

Reh Reh Ke Ek Sawal Mere Dil Mai Uthta Hai

Amma Baar Baar……………….

tracks.title: Mere Baba Khairiat Se Ho
tracks.lyrics:
(Sughra Gash Se Chownk Kar Uthi) X2 Boli Sar Ko Pit'ti Huwi. (Haye Meri Nind
Ur Gar Ayi) X2 (Mere Baba Khairiat Se Ho) X2

(Mere Baba Khairiat Se Ho) X4

  1. Dekha Aj Mene Kaisa Khwaab. Reyt Par Pare Hai Kuch Gulab. Chun Rahe Hai Jinko Buturab. Khun Ro Raha Hai Aftab. Haye Meri Nind Ur Gayi

(Mere Baba Khairiat Se Ho) X4

  2. Ik Taraf Alam Hai Khun Me Tar. Juk Gayi Hai Shah Ki Kamar. Jaa Rahi Hai Jis Taraf Nazar. Bibiya Khari Hai Nang Sar. Haye Meri Nind Ur Gayi

(Mere Baba Khairiat Se Ho) X4

  3. Hay Hay Kasim-E-Jawaan. Bayn Kar Rahi Hai Jiski Maa. Hil Gayi Zamin Or Asman. Tori Jab Dulhan Ne Churiya. Haye Meri Nind Ur Gayi

(Mere Baba Khairiat Se Ho) X4

  4. Ek Bachi Sina-E-Padar. Dundh Ti Rahi Idhar Udhar. Baap So Raha Tha Khak Par. Jis Ke Tan Se Kat Chukaa Tha Sar. Haye Meri Nind Ur Gayi

(Mere Baba Khairiat Se Ho) X4

  5. Kayd Hai Rasul-E-Zadiya. Hath Me Bandhe Hai Rassiya. Bekajaawa Hai Amaariya. Khun Ro Raha Sarebaa(N). Haye Meri Nind Ur Gayi

(Mere Baba Khairiat Se Ho) X4

  6. Khwab Ye Bara Ajeeb Tha. Badshah Dee(N) Gharib Tha. Kya Yahi Mera Nasib Tha. Bekafan Mera Tabib Tha. Haye Meri Nind Ur Gayi

(Mere Baba Khairiat Se Ho) X4

tracks.title: Hussain No Gham
tracks.lyrics:
(Hussain No Gham Sheher Sheher Che. Hussain Matam, Gali Gali Che) X2

  1. (A Ghamme Dilme, Basave Ene) X2 Dua-E-Zehra, Maligayi Che

(Hussain No Gham Sheher Sheher Che. Hussain Matam, Gali Gali Che) X2

  2. (Hawe To Duniya Amone Samje, Hawe To Duniya Amone Jane) X2 Amara Aka Hussain Mawla, Amara Mawla, Ali Ali Che

(Hussain No Gham Sheher Sheher Che. Hussain Matam, Gali Gali Che) X2

  3. (Ho Reno Badro, Ohad Ne Khandaq. Narai Kheibar, Ni Kehrahi Che) X2 Bahadori Maa Ali Na Same Batawo Koni, Barabari Che

(Hussain No Gham Sheher Sheher Che. Hussain Matam, Gali Gali Che) X2

  4. (Furat Upar, Kari Ne Kabzo. Na Bundh Pani, Jene Pidho) X2 Wafaa-E-Abbas, Saw Wafaa Che, Furat Sajda, Kari Rahi Che

(Hussain No Gham Sheher Sheher Che. Hussain Matam, Gali Gali Che) X2

  5. (Jawaan-E-Akbar, Na Dil Thi Barchi. Ne Kadhi Mawla Rarirea Che) X2 Salaam Sabre Hussain Tamne, Jigar Ma Barchi, Rahi Gayi Che

(Hussain No Gham Sheher Sheher Che. Hussain Matam, Gali Gali Che) X2

  6. (Nihari Asghar, Ne Roze Mehshar. Ajab Nathi Khud, Khuda Kahe Pan) X2 Rubab Tari Matta Ki Keemat, Behesht Puri Adhuri They Che

(Hussain No Gham Sheher Sheher Che. Hussain Matam, Gali Gali Che) X2

  7. (Jarak Dhemee Thi Bolo Zainab, Jarak Dhemee Jagaro Zainab) X2 Ke Lash Maidan Ma Nihari Sakina Bibi, Dari Gayi Che.

(Hussain No Gham Sheher Sheher Che. Hussain Matam, Gali Gali Che) X2

  8. (Mari Jo Zindan Thi Rihaai, Ali Ni Puttri Rari Ne Boli) X2 Ke Mara Bhai Ni Ik Nishani, Aa Kaid Khana Rahi Gayi Che

(Hussain No Gham Sheher Sheher Che. Hussain Matam, Gali Gali Che) X2

tracks.title: Jhola Jholaon
tracks.lyrics:
Aa Ali Asghar

_

(Aa Ali Asghar)X2

(Tujhko Jo Pawoo Mere Asghar) X2 Jula Julao Aa Mere Asghar.

Jula Julao Lori Sunao Dood Pilao Aa Mere Asghar.

Tujko Jo Paao Aa Mere Asghar.



  1. Mere Mujahid Mere Sipahi (Khatme Huwi Mein Dame Larayi) X2

Ghar Ko Sidharo Maa Ko Pukaro. Mein Chein Pawu Aa Mere Asghar. Jula Julao…



  2. Yaad Arahi Hein Masum Bete (Din Mein Sukun Hai Bechein Raate) X2 Ji Na Sakungi Roti Rahungi. Ansu Bahao Aa Mere Asghar. Jula Julao…



3. Puch Rahi Hai Bali Sakina (Kyu Nahi Aya Lot Ke Bhayya) X2 To Hi Batade
Maidan Se Aake. Mein Kya Batawu Aa Mere Asghar. Jula Julao…



4. Pehre Huwe Hai Shaam Ke Saye (Ab To Parinde Bhi Lot Aaye) X2 Mein Rorahi
Hu Jaan Ko Rahi Ho. Tujko Sulao Aa Mere Asghar. Jula Julao…

5. Mehsus Mujko Ye Ho Raha Hai (Jese Ke Jula Bhi Roraha Hai) X2 Ay Mere Beta,
Ye Rota Jula. Kaise Julawu Aa Mere Asghar. Jula Julao…



6. Maktal Se Ayi Aise Khabar (Khurta Lahu Sab Tera Tar Hai) X2 Teer Laga Hai
Zakhmi Gala Hai. Mein Marna Jawo Aa Mere Asghar. Jula Julao…



![](Http://Www.nawhas.com/Acounter.php?Acid=1)

tracks.title: Na Bhoole Na Bhoole
tracks.lyrics:
Na Bhoole Na Bhoole

_

Har Majlise, Shabbir Me, Aati Hai Maa Shabbir Ki. Kehti Hai Kya, Ay Momino.
Tumse Ye Maa Roti Huwi. Zakhmi Hai Mera Ladla. Zakhmi Hai Mera Ladli. Marham
Muje Dedo Koi. Marham To Hai Ashke Azaa. Rumale Me, Lejawungi.

  1. In Asuwo Ne Bhar Diye. Sab Zakhmato Dilgeer Ke. Do Gaawo Ese Hai Magar, Bharte Nahi Shabbir Ke.

(Na Bhoole Na Bhoole. Shabbir Nahi Bhoole) X2 (Ek Chadar Zainab Ki) X2 Ik Sina
Akbar Ka.

  2. Matam Karo, Matam Karo, Gar Lut Gaya Shabbir Ka. Maa Agayi Shabbir Ki, Matam Karo Shabbir Ka. Khanjar Tale Neze Pe Bhi, Karte Rahe Shukre Khuda

(Na Bhoole Na Bhoole. Shabbir Nahi Bhoole) X2 (Ek Chadar Zainab Ki) X2 Ik Sina
Akbar Ka.

  3. Tiro Pe Tha, Lasha Tere. Roti Rahi Karbobala. Khayme Ka Jab Parda Utha, Boli Bahan Bhayya Mera. Lasha Tarap Kar Reh Gaya Karte Rahe Shukre Khuda

(Na Bhoole Na Bhoole. Shabbir Nahi Bhoole) X2 (Ek Chadar Zainab Ki) X2 Ik Sina
Akbar Ka.

  4. Sughra Udhar Roti Rahi, Mawla Idhar Rote Rahe. Wa Muntazir Bimar Thi, Ya Katl Sab Hote Rahe. Sehra Me Ghar Lut Ta Raha Karte Rahe Shukre Khuda

(Na Bhoole Na Bhoole. Shabbir Nahi Bhoole) X2 (Ek Chadar Zainab Ki) X2 Ik Sina
Akbar Ka.

  5. Lipti Sume, Aspas Thi. Wo Ladli Beti Teri. Maloom Tha Mawla Tuje. Ab Na Milengi Ye Kabhi. Phir Bhi Suwe Maktal Gaye Karte Rahe Shukre Khuda

(Na Bhoole Na Bhoole. Shabbir Nahi Bhoole) X2 (Ek Chadar Zainab Ki) X2 Ik Sina
Akbar Ka.

  6. Darbar Me, Bazar Me. Zindan Me Har Aan Me. Kaise Sitam Sehti Rahi. Beti Teri Behna Teri. Dekha Ke Ye Neze Pe Sar Karte Rahe Shukre Khuda

(Na Bhoole Na Bhoole. Shabbir Nahi Bhoole) X2 (Ek Chadar Zainab Ki) X2 Ik Sina
Akbar Ka.

  7. Neze Pe Bhi, Sar Hai Tera. Phir Bhi Tera Kya Shan Hai. Ye Sar Hai Ke Mawla Tera. Ya Bolta Quran Hai. Tanse Juda Sar Hogaya Karte Rahe Shukre Khuda

(Na Bhoole Na Bhoole. Shabbir Nahi Bhoole) X2 (Ek Chadar Zainab Ki) X2 Ik Sina
Akbar Ka.

tracks.title: Na Milenga Tuje Shabbir Sa Bhayi
tracks.lyrics:
Na Milenga Na Milenga X4

Na Milenga Tujhe Shabbir Sa Bhai Zainab X2

Dhundhne Jayegi Gar Sari Khudai Zainab

Na Milenga Tujhe Shabbir Sa Bhai Zainab X2

Aapne Ashko Se Jala Jala Shame Gariba Ke Chirag X 2

Tu Hai Atthara Chirago Ki Ekai Zainab

Na Milenga Na Milenga

Na Milenga Tujhe Shabbir Sa Bhai Zainab X2

Jene Keya Shame Gariba Me Sitam Tute Hai

Umar Bhar Chain Se Fir So Nahi Pai Zainab

Na Milenga Na Milenga

Na Milenga Tujhe Shabbir Sa Bhai Zainab X2

Do Pisar Tune To Do Bazu Diye Gazi Ne X2

Pahle To Rasume Wafa Tune Nibhai Zainab

Na Milenga Na Milenga

Na Milenga Tujhe Shabbir Sa Bhai Zainab X2

Surkh Ye Kiske Lahoo Se Hui Poshak Teri

Lash Keya Sine Se Akbar Ki Lagai Zainab

Na Milenga Na Milenga

Na Milenga Tujhe Shabbir Sa Bhai Zainab X2

Pani Ko Dekh Ke Kyukar Na Jigar Tukde Ho

Kha Gai Hai Tere Gazi Ko Tarai Zainab

Na Milenga Na Milenga

Na Milenga Tujhe Shabbir Sa Bhai Zainab X2

Hay Kis Shan Se Nikli Thi Watan Se Zainab

Kaisi Gurbat Ko Samete Huye Aai Zainab

Na Milenga Na Milenga

Na Milenga Tujhe Shabbir Sa Bhai Zainab X2

Ruhe Abbas Alamdar Na Tadpe Kyukar

Be Rida Sham Ke Darbar Me Aai Zainab

Na Milenga Na Milenga

Na Milenga Tujhe Shabbir Sa Bhai Zainab X2

Beyth Kar Laash-E-Sakina Pe Ye Abid Ne Kaha

Maar Dala Unhe Baba Ki Judaayi, Zainab

Na Milenga Na Milenga

Na Milenga Tujhe Shabbir Sa Bhai Zainab X2

Na Milenga Na Milenga

Na Milenga Tujhe Shabbir Sa Bhai Zainab X2

Dhundhne Jayegi Gar Sari Khudai Zainab

Na Milenga Na Milenga

tracks.title: Qafla Aik Mei
tracks.lyrics:
Ay Zainab Meri Behna (X4)

Kafela Ik Me Laya Tha Kafela Ik Layja Zainab (X2)

  1. Raast-E Mushkil He To Kya (X2) Naade Ali Dohra Zainab

Kafela Ik Me Laya Tha Kafela Ik Layja Zainab (X2)

  2. Meri Dua Hai Sath Tere. Gham Na Kar Jo Haat-E Bandhe. Saath-E Mera That Karbal Tak. Jaana He Ab-E Shaam-E Tuje. Ayk Wazifa Ho Tera (X2) Naade Ali Dohra Zainab

Kafela Ik Me Laya Tha Kafela Ik Layja Zainab (X2)

  3. Leke Alam Tu Gazi Ka. Aaj-E Se Khud Gazi Banja. Tu Bhi Ali Ki Beti Hai. Zakhmo Se Gabhran-E Kya. Rukh Na Sake Paygham-E Mera (X2) Naade Ali Dohra Zainab

Kafela Ik Me Laya Tha Kafela Ik Layja Zainab (X2)

  4. Ansu Ponch-E Le Daman Se. Aaj-E Guzar Jaa Makhtal Se. Meri Bahan He Tu Zainab. Sabr-E Ki Manzil Te Karle. Lakh-E Mukhalif-E Ho Ye Hawaa (X2) Naade Ali Dohra Zainab

Kafela Ik Me Laya Tha Kafela Ik Layja Zainab (X2)

  5. Bali Sakina Jab-E Roye. Mera Bina Jab-E Na Soye. Us Ko Tasali Tum Dena. Ponchenga Aram-E Muje. Sunle Mere Dilki Ye Sadaa (X2) Naade Ali Dohra Zainab

Kafela Ik Me Laya Tha Kafela Ik Layja Zainab (X2)

tracks.title: Hussain Shahid-E Karbala
tracks.lyrics:
(Ay Karbala Ay Karbala) X4

(Hussain Shahid-E Karbala) X8

  1. (Zabi He Bekhataa Shudi) X4 Atile Dasht-E Nainawah

(Hussain Shahid-E Karbala) X3

  2. (Zabi He Bekhataa Shudi) X4 Atile Dasht-E Nainawah

(Hussain Shahid-E Karbala) X3

  3. (Shudast-E Naaz-E Hal Ataa) X2 (Ila Jidar Dela Dawaa) X2 (Jahaa Hai Dard-E Karbala) X4 Waha Waha, Karbala

(Hussain Shahid-E Karbala) X3

  4. (Bikaar-E Shash Minam Koi) X2 (Shahid-E Motaram Koi) X2 (Jahaa Hussain-E Ranuma) X4 Waha Waha, Karbala

(Hussain Shahid-E Karbala) X3

  5. (Shabab-E Akbar-E Jawaa) X2 (Nishaa Na Kar Dushamiya) X2 (Jahaa Jawaa Ka Gham Bapa) X4 Waha Waha, Karbala

(Hussain Shahid-E Karbala) X3

  6. (Bahar Rukhu, Bahar Jihaa) X2 (Baka Baka, Hussainiya) X2 (Jahaa Khuda He Ba Khuda) X4 Waha Waha, Karbala

(Hussain Shahid-E Karbala) X3

  7. (Shahide Karbala Hussain) X2 (Bina Illah, Illah Hussain) X2 (Jahaa Jahaa Teri Sadaa) X4 Waha Waha, Karbala

(Hussain Shahid-E Karbala) X3

  8. (Alam Juloos-E Taziye) X2 (Ye Majlise, Ziyarate) X2 (Jahaa Charage Mustafa) X4 Waha Waha, Karbala

(Hussain Shahid-E Karbala) X3

  9. (Saji Huwi, Abadiya) X2 (Ridaa Baghayre Bibiya) X2 (Jahaa Dikhayi De Ridaa) X4 Waha Waha, Karbala

(Hussain Shahid-E Karbala) X3

  10. (Jigar Jigar Sinaa Sinaa) X2 (Lahu Lahu Dhuwa Dhuwa) X2 (Jahaa Hussain-E Silsila) X4 Waha Waha, Karbala

(Hussain Shahid-E Karbala) X3

tracks.title: Kya Raha Khaymo Me Shehe Ke
tracks.lyrics:
Shame Gham Aagayi, Shame Gham Aagayi…X4

Kya Raha Khaymo Me Sheh Ke Ek Udasi Reh Gayi X3

Sirf Rone Ko Muhammad Ki Nawasi Rehgayi

Saj Gai Kasim Ko Tukro Se Udhar Karbobala X3

Maa Idhar Bete Ki Dulhan Sso Sajaati Rehgayi

Chhinta Tha Shimr Chadar Or Zainab Baar Baar X3

Apni Chadar Ke Muhafiz Ko Bulaati Rehgayi

Khune Dil Abbas Ka Sab Behgay Ran Me Magar X3

Dil Me Bas Ek Baat Zainab Ki Rida Ki Rehgayi

Ay Musalmano Tumhari Gairato Kya Hogayi X3

Tum Tamashai The Zainab Muh Chupati Rehgayi

Qaid Me Baali Sakina Ko Mila Baba Ka Sar X3

Muh Pe Muh Rakh Kar Jo Soi Maa Jagaati Rehgayi

Madare Asghar Na Baithi Saaye Me Asgar Ke Baad X3

Saaye Me Aayi To Zinda Laash Baki Rehgayi

Har Tamache Par Sakina Muh Par Rakhkar Nanhe Haath X3

Neel Rukhsaro Ke Gazi Ko Dikhaati Rehgayi

tracks.title: Abbas Aa Rahe Hai
tracks.lyrics:
Abbas Aa Rahe Hai

_

(Ek Shor Hai, Al Amaan) X4

(Abbas Aa Rahe Hai) X2

(Ek Shor Hai, Al Amaan) X4

(Abbas Aa Rahe Hai) X2

(Ek Shor Hai, Al Amaan) X4

(Abbas Aa Rahe Hai) X2

Ek Haath Mein Alam Aur Mashke Sakina

(Abbas Aa Rahe Hai) X2

Ek Haath Mein Alam Aur Mashke Sakina

(Abbas Aa Rahe Hai) X4

  1. Kaandhe Pe Mashk Mashk Mein Dil Hai Diler Ka

Darya Ko Chin Lena Nahi Kaam Der Ka

Ehsan Tishnagi Me Hilega Na Ghair Ka

(Bighra Hua Mizaj Hai) X2

Bighra Hua Mizaj Jai Hyder Ke Sher Ka

(Abbas Aa Rahe Hai) X2

  2. Chehra Hai Wal Kamar Ki Ziyao Se Mur Nur

Aankho Se Jaakhta Hua Wan Najal Ka Surur

Bala Kadi Hai Aaisi Ke Sharmae Koheyr

(Zulfe Daraz Aisi) X2

Zulfe Daraz Aisi Ke Wal Lail Ka Shaur

(Abbas Aa Rahe Hai) X2



  3. Pyaasa Hai Sher Ghat Ka Rasta Na Rokna

Aankhe Jukawo Sher Ki Janib Na Dekhna

Kaise Bache Ye Jaan Ye Lazim Hai Sochna

(Abbas Hai Jalaal Mai) X2

Abbas Hai Jalaal Mai Hargiz Na Tokna

(Abbas Aa Rahe Hai) X2



  4. Tewar Beta Rahe Hai Kayamat Uthayega

Tege Nazarse Iski Khuda Hi Bachayega

Aaya Jo Samne Koi Who Mara Jayenga

(Ek Mashk Me Furat Ko) X2

Ek Mashk Me Furat Ko Bharkar Dikhaega

(Abbas Aa Rahe Hai) X2

  5. Kabza Hua Furat Par Al Kissa Mukhtasar

Paani Ko Dekha Phat Gayaa Abbas Ka Jigar

Aankhe Lahu Lahu Hui Bachcho Ki Pyas Par

(Baali Sakina Bacho Se) X2

Baal Sakina Bacho Se Kehti Rahi Udhar

(Abbas Aa Rahe Hai) X2

  6. Khayme Ke Dar Par Pyaasi Sakina Thi Muntazar

Jumbish Alam Ki Dekh Ke Deti Thi Yeh Khabar

Tishna Labo Dua Me Tumhari Hua Asar

(Who Dekho Aa Raha Hai) X2

Wo Dekho Aa Raha Hai Chacha Ka Alam Nazar

(Abbas Aa Rahe Hai) X2

  7. Aaya Alam Zurur Magar Khun Me Bharaa

Zainab Ne Sar Ko Pitt Ke Shabbir Se Kaha

Kyun Kham Kamar Hai Aap Ki Gaazi Kaha Gaya

(Bole Hussain Ab Koi) X2

Bole Hussain Ab Koi Pyaasa Na De Sadaa

(Abbas Aa Rahe Hai) X2

  8. Ek Haath Me Alam Aur Mashke Sakina

(Abbas Aa Rahe Hai) X2

(Ek Shor Hai, Al Ama) X4

tracks.title: Acchi Nahi Ye Baat
tracks.lyrics:
Acchi Nahi Ye Baat

_

Ashur Ki Shab Hai Sakina Ka Wo Rona. Aur Sayyade Mazlum Ke Beti Se Yeh Kehna.
Are Tu Roya, Me Yeh Dekh Nahi, Sakta Sakina.

(Achi Nahi Ye Baat Na Roya Karo Bibi) X2

  1. (Pehlu Me Kabhi Maa Ke Bhi Soya Karo Bibi) X2

(Achi Nahi Ye Baat Na Roya Karo Bibi) X2

  2. Kya Howe Kisi Shab Ko Jo Ham Ghar Me Na Aaye

Tum Hamko Na Pao Tumhe Hum Bhi Nahi Paye

Tarpogi Nahi Dard Se Wada Karo Bibi

(Pehlu Me Kabhi Maa Ke Bhi Soya Karo Bibi) X2

(Achi Nahi Ye Baat Na Roya Karo Bibi) X2

  3. Are Baitha Karo Kuch Der Charago Ko Buja Kar

Samja Karo Is Khaak Ko Ay Laadli Bistar

Baali Kabhi Yuhi Nahi Pehna Karo Bibi

(Pehlu Me Kabhi Maa Ke Bhi Soya Karo Bibi) X2

(Achi Nahi Ye Baat Na Roya Karo Bibi) X2

  4. Are Kuch Der To Yeh Farz Karo Ham Na Rah Aagar

Baaki Na Rahe Haath Koi Rakhne Ko Sar Par

Mahaul Yatimo Ka Bhi Socha Karo Bibi

(Pehlu Me Kabhi Maa Ke Bhi Soya Karo Bibi) X2

(Achi Nahi Ye Baat Na Roya Karo Bibi) X2

  5. Aadat Zara Tanhayi Me Rehne Ke Bhi Dalo

Taswir Tasawur Mai Asiri Ki Banalo

Aazad Parindo Ko Na Dekha Karo Bibi

(Pehlu Me Kabhi Maa Ke Bhi Soya Karo Bibi) X2

(Achi Nahi Ye Baat Na Roya Karo Bibi) X2

  6. Are Asghar Ko Na Manoos Karo Pyaar Se Apne

Akbar Ki Urusi Ke Na Dekha Karo Sapne

Sugra Ki Karib Itna Na Baitha Karo Bibi

(Pehlu Me Kabhi Maa Ke Bhi Soya Karo Bibi) X2

(Achi Nahi Ye Baat Na Roya Karo Bibi) X2

tracks.title: Ha Karo Matam Hussain Ka Azadaro
tracks.lyrics:
Paro Kalma Nabi Ka Ka Musalmano

(Haa(N) Karo Matam Husain Ka Azadaro) X5

  1. Deen Ne Maula Shabbir Ko Di Sada

Amma Zehra Ke Markaz Se Rukhsat Huwa

Lab Pe Naame Khuda Dil Me Thi Karbala

Din Bhi Gharmi Ke The Saath Bachcho(N) Ka Tha

(Phir Bhi Marne Wo Chala Masalmano) X2

(Haa(N) Karo Matam Husain Ka Azadaro) X3

  2. Shaih Ke Hamraah Thi Bibiya Betiya(N)

Nawjawaa(N) Saath The Saath Tha Bezuba(N)

Haaye Kis Shaan Se Wo Huwe The Rawaa(N)

Ek Bimar Leti Rahi Hichkiyaa(N)

(Shor Mataam Utha Tha Musalmano) X2

(Haa(N) Karo Matam Husain Ka Azadaro) X3

  3. Do Muharram Ko Karbobala Aa Gaye

Alqama Ke Kanare Jo Khaime Lage

Ashkiya Ne Kaha Aakar Shabbir Se

Apne Khaime Yaha Se Utha Lijiye

(Waqt Kya Aa Gaya Tha Musalmano) X2

(Haa(N) Karo Matam Husain Ka Azadaro) X3

  4. Khatm Qarbobala Me Larayi Hui

Saari Fauje Khuda Khak Par Soo Gai

Aai Shaame Gariba Raha Na Koi

Itrate Mustafa Sue Zindan Chali

(Nange Sar Bibiyaa(N) Hai Musalmano) X2

(Haa(N) Karo Matam Husain Ka Azadaro) X3

  5. Haaye Bazare Kufa Ka Who Marhala

Betiyaa(N) Thi Mohammad Ki Jab Be Rida

Gir Ke Naako Se Bacho Ki Thi Ye Sada

Alwida Madare Gamzada Alwida

(Aasman Ro Raha Tha Musalmano) X2

(Haa(N) Karo Matam Husain Ka Azadaro) X3

  6. Mere Sajjad Boli Ye Binte Ali

Jaanti Hai Mujhe Shaam Ki Har Gali

Khaak Urhawo Ke Mujh Ko Na Dekho Koi

(Yeh Tha Zainab Ka Nawha Masalmano) X2

(Haa(N) Karo Matam Husain Ka Azadaro) X3

  7. Bole Sajjad Hatho(N) Me Zanjir Hai

Be Ridai Phuphi Ab To Taqdir Hai

Sabr Aale Mohammed Ki Jagir Hai

Hum Hai Aale Nabi Bas Yeh Teksir Hai

(Keh Ke Ye Ro Diya Tha Masalmano) X2

(Haa(N) Karo Matam Husain Ka Azadaro) X3

tracks.title: Bhayaa Muje Bhool Na Jaana
tracks.lyrics:
Sab Phulo Ke Gehne Me Sawaari Dulhan Aaye.

Tum Jese Ho Bas Ese Hi Pyaari Dulhan Aaye.

(Sar Pe Agar Sehra Sajana, Hatho Pe Kangnaa Jo Bandhana) X2

(Bhaya Muje Bhool Na Jaana) X2

Sarpe Agar Sehra Sajaana

(Bhaya Muje Bhool Na Jaana) X2

  1. Fatema Sugra Ne Ye Akber Ko Likha Hai,

Bhayi Salaamat Raho Behna Ki Duwa Hai,

Baad Duwa Dil Me Ye Armaan Basaa Hai,

Masne De Shaadi Jo Bichaana,

Bhayaa Muje Bhool Na Jaana…………..

  2. Baba Ki Aggosh Me Me Bhi To Pali Hu,

Bhaya Teri Ungli Pakar Kar Me Chali Hu,

Kyu Me Tere Chaawo Se Mehroom Rahi Hu,

Baba Ki Jab Chawo Me Janna,

Bhaya Muje……………….

  3. Baba Se Kehna Ke Meri Jald Khabar Le,

Toot Na Jaaye Kahi Baba Meri Saase,

Kataa Nahi Din Na Guzarti Hai Ye Raate,

Khat Mera Baba Ko Sunana,

Bhaya Muje………..

  4. Bhaya Teri Baad Jo Din Eid Ka Aya,

Eid Ke Din Eid Me Gham Mene Hi Paaya,

Mujko Bhare Gar Ki Judaayi Ne Rulaaya,

Dukh Ye Mera Sab Ko Bataana,

Bhaya Muje……………

  5. Sunti Hu Kerbal Ki Bohot Garm Hawaa Hai,

Amma Se Kehne Ke Ye Sugra Ne Kahaa Hai,

Phool Saas Gar Jo Mera Sath Gayaa Hai,

Dhoop Se Jab Usko Bachaana,

Bhaya Muje ………….

  6. Behno Ka Dil Jaane Jigar Hota Hai Bhayi,

Ankh Geher Ti Hai Jigar Hota Hai Bhaayi,

Mere Tarap Ne Ka Asar Ho Ta Hai Bhayi,

Tum Ho Jaha Mujko Bulana,

Bhaya Muje …………….

  7. Bhaya Muje Rehta Hai Har Waqt Ye Ehsaas,

Bhool Gaye Kya Muje Mere Chacha Abbas,

Aye Alam Aye Sakina Ho Mere Paas,

Aas Meri Tor Na Jana,

Bhaya Muje…………….

  8. Ama Se Kehna Ke Sakina Ki Kasam Hai,

Faisela Ab Kabre Se Bimaar Ka Kam Hai,

Der Na Ker Na Ke Mere Hoto Pe Dam Hai,

Haat Duwa Ko Jo Uthana,

Bhaya Muje…………….

tracks.title: Kehti Thi Zainab
tracks.lyrics:
_

Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina

_

(Haye Hussaina) X4

(Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina) X2

(Hogayi Barbad Ye Behna, Karbobala Me) X2 Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina

  1. Karbobala Kuch Na Diya Karbo Aziyat Ke Siwaa, Mere Daman Me Bacha Kya Hai Musibat Ke Siwa (Karbala Tujse Mila Kya Hai Kayamat Ke Siwaa) X2 (Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina) X2

(Hogayi Barbad Ye Behna, Karbobala Me) X2 Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina

  2. Subhe Ashur Azaane Ali Akbar Ki Kasam. Mere Bhayi Pe Chale Tir Hazaaro Payham (Chup Rahi Karbobala Hote Rahe Ham Pe Sitam) X2 (Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina) X2

(Hogayi Barbad Ye Behna, Karbobala Me) X2 Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina

  3. Mera Athara Baras Wala Jiya Laa Akbar. Kha Gayi Uske Bhi Ay Karbobala Teri Nazar (Mene Dekha He Isi Laal Ka Barchi Me Jigar) X2 (Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina) X2

(Hogayi Barbad Ye Behna, Karbobala Me) X2 Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina

  4. Bhayi Athar The Do Bete The Koyi Na Raha. Ab To Tanhayi Meri Deti He Mujko Pursa (Kya Bhara Gar Tha Mera Kar Diya Mujko Tanha) X2 (Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina) X2

(Hogayi Barbad Ye Behna, Karbobala Me) X2 Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina

  5. Mere Abbas Pe Kya Guzri Batawu Kese. Mashk Ik Bharne Me Do Bazu Kalam Ho Ke Gire (Uske Marne Se He Mehrum Behen Chadar Se) X2 (Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina) X2

(Hogayi Barbad Ye Behna, Karbobala Me) X2 Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina

  6. Bekhata Katl Huwa Bhayi Mera Jangal Me. Saynkhro Zakhm Kaleje Pe Lage Ik Pal Me (Aag Pani Ne Laga Di Hai Mere Anchal Me) X2 (Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina) X2

(Hogayi Barbad Ye Behna, Karbobala Me) X2 Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina

  7. Mere Allaha Muje Shaam Talak Janaa Hai. Koyi Bhi Apna Nahi Shehr Bhi Beganaa Hai (Teri Kush Nudi Me Rasi Me Mera Shaana Hai) X2 (Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina) X2

(Hogayi Barbad Ye Behna, Karbobala Me) X2 Kehti Thi Zainab, Haye Hussaina

tracks.title: Hussain Zindabad
tracks.lyrics:
(Suno Husseinio) X2 (Hussain-E Wo Jo Zehre Tegh Has Ke Sogaya) X2 (Yazid-E Wo
Jo Zillatio Ka Naam-E Hogaya) X2 Hussain Wo Jo Marziye Khuda Kharid-E Le,
Yazid-E Wo He Jiska Koi Nam-E Bhi Ne Le (Yazid-E Zinda Re Ke Murdabaad Hogaya)
X2 Hussain-E Sar Kata Ke Zindabad-E Zindab-E Zindabad Hogaya. (Zindabad) X5

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

Ye Kal Bhi Zindabad-E Tha Wo Ab Bhi Zindabad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

  1. (Quran-E Me Hadis-E Me Yazid-E Ka Bayaa Nahi) X2 (Yazid-E Ki To Kabr-E Ka Kahi Bhi Koi Nishaa Nahi) X3 Ajaa Bajaa Hai Dehre Me, Hussain-E Ki Awlaad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

Ye Kal Bhi Zindabad-E Tha Wo Ab Bhi Zindabad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

  2. (Burayi-O Ke Dehr-E Me Yazid-E Aam-E Kargaya) X2 (Hussain-E Se Laraa To Apni Mot-E Aap-E Margaya) X3 Ye Kal Bhi Murdabaad-E Tha Wo Abh Bhi Murdabad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

Ye Kal Bhi Zindabad-E Tha Wo Ab Bhi Zindabad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

  3. (Har Ik-E Sharif-E Zehne Se, Yazid-E Itna Gir Gaya) X2 (Kisi Ne Apni Laal-E Ka Yazid-E Naam-E Na Rakha) X3 Ye Kal Bhi Naam Murad Tha Wo Ab Bhi Naam Murad-E Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

Ye Kal Bhi Zindabad-E Tha Wo Ab Bhi Zindabad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

  4. (Yazid-E Wale Takht-E Par, Nasib-E Ke Kharab-E Hai) X2 (Hussain-E Wala Kayd-E Me Bhi Reh Ke Kamiyaab-E Hai) X3 Hussainyat Ki Thokare Yazid Aur Ibne Ziyaad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

Ye Kal Bhi Zindabad-E Tha Wo Ab Bhi Zindabad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

  5. (Jahaa Me Sab Se Zyadaa Ashk-E Jiske Naam-E Par Baha) X2 (Zamaana Laa Ghame Hussain-E Ka Koi Jawaab-E La) X3 Gineez-E Buk Ko Bus Mere Hussain-E Se Anaad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

Ye Kal Bhi Zindabad-E Tha Wo Ab Bhi Zindabad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

  6. (Yazid-E Ek Lakh-E Ho Mukaable Pe Gham Nahi) X2 (Hussain-E Wale Ek Ho To Lash Karo Se Kam Nahi) X3 Hussain-E Ko Ki Apne Matami Pe Etimaad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

Ye Kal Bhi Zindabad-E Tha Wo Ab Bhi Zindabad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

  7. (Ali Ki Beti Zainab-E Hazi Hussain-E Ban Gayi) X2 (Sharikatul Hussain-E Thi, Yazidiyat Pe Cha Gayi) X3 Hussain-E Se Parha Huwa, Sabak Jo Isko Yaad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

Ye Kal Bhi Zindabad-E Tha Wo Ab Bhi Zindabad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

  8. (Tara Na Hai Hussain-E Hai, Ha Sath-E Do Hussainiyo) X2 (Hussain-E Se Murad-E Lo Murad-E Lo Hussainiyo) X3 Hussain-E Jisko Dete Uski Nasle Va Muraad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

Ye Kal Bhi Zindabad-E Tha Wo Ab Bhi Zindabad Hai

(Hussain Zindabad) X4

tracks.title: Mazloom Ka Matam
tracks.lyrics:
Mazloom Ka Matam

_


(Mazloom Ka Matam Hai, Mazloom Ka Matam) X2

  1. (Logo Ye Tamashaa Nahi) X2

Logo Ye Tamasha Nahi, Is Rone Pe Hasna Nahi

(Mazloom Ka Matam Hai, Mazloom Ka Matam) X2

  2. (Logo Ye Tamashaa Nahi) X2

Logo Ye Tamasha Nahi, Is Rone Pe Hasna Nahi

(Mazloom Ka Matam Hai, Mazloom Ka Matam) X2

  3. Kya Milta Hai Matam Me, Kis Tarha Bataaye

(Mazloom Ko Rote Hai Mazloom Jahaa Mai) X2

(Pathar Nahi Sine Me) X2

Pathar Nahi Sine Me Dil Hai To Ye Matam

(Mazloom Ka Matam Hai, Mazloom Ka Matam) X2

  4. Gar Fatema Zehra Ka Kis Tarha Say Ujra

(Jab Hogi Qayamat To Yu Ayengi Zehra) X2

(Ik Haat Me Do Bazu) X2

Ik Haat Me Do Bazu, Ik Haat Me Parcham

(Mazloom Ka Matam Hai, Mazloom Ka Matam) X2

  5. Jab Pyaare Muhammad Se Me Pyaar Karunga

(Phir Uske Nawaase Ka Matam Bhi Karunga) X2

(Jis Gar Me Muhammad Hai) X2

Jis Gar Me Muhammad Hai Us Gar Ke Ya Matam

(Mazloom Ka Matam Hai, Mazloom Ka Matam) X2

  6. Logo Nabi Zadi Ka Bazaro Me Aana

(Aur Band Ke Rassi Me Darbaro Me Laana) X2

(Is Baat Pe Rote Hai) X2

Is Baat Pe Rote Hai Is Dard Ka Matam

(Mazloom Ka Matam Hai, Mazloom Ka Matam) X2

  7. Zanjiro Me Jadka Hai Shabbir Ka Beta

(Maa Behne Khule Sar Thi Khun Rota Tha Mawla) X2

(Sajjad Se Pucho To) X2

Sajjad Se Pucho To Kyu Hai Ye Kamar Kham

(Mazloom Ka Matam Hai, Mazloom Ka Matam) X2

  8. Khat Fatema Sughra Ka Kis Waqt Mila Hai

(Jab Bhayi Sina Khaye Reti Pe Paraa Hai) X2

(Khat Kon Parhe Tera) X2

Khat Kon Parhe Tera Tanhayi Ka Alam

(Mazloom Ka Matam Hai, Mazloom Ka Matam) X2

  9. (Logo Ye Tamashaa Nahi) X2

Logo Ye Tamasha Nahi, Is Rone Pe Hasna Nahi

(Mazloom Ka Matam Hai, Mazloom Ka Matam) X2

tracks.title: Ya Wajiha Indallah
tracks.lyrics:
Ya Wajiha Indallah

_

Aaoozoo Billahi Minash Shaitanir Rajim. Bismillahir Rahmanir Rahim. Allahuma
Ini Asaluka Wa Atawajja Hu Ilayka. Binabiyi Ka Nabiyir Rahma. Muhammadin
Salalahu Alayhi Wa Ali. Ya Abal Kasim. Ya Rasulullah. Ya Imamar Rahma. Ya
Sayyidi Na Wa Mawla Na. Inna Tawaj Jahna Wastash Fahna Watawasal Na Bika
Ilallah. Wa Kaddam Na Ka Bayna Yaday Hajaa Ti Na.

(Ya Wajiha Indallah, Ishfalana Indallah) X2

  1. (Bare Ilah Ha Banke Sawali Tere Huzur) X2 Daman Me Apne Laye Hai Be Inti Ha Khusur. Lakin Hamare Sino Pe Matam Ka Dekh Noor. Apne Nabi Ke Sadke Me Bakshenga Tu Zurur

(Ya Wajiha Indallah, Ishfalana Indallah) X2

  2. Mawla Ali Ka Rab Be Jahaa Tujko Wasta. Ya Rab Baraye Fatema Siddika Tahera. Be Ilm-E Or-E Rizt-E Ka Sagar Bharaa Huwa. Tute Na Nemato Ka Mere Ghar Ke Silsilaa

(Ya Wajiha Indallah, Ishfalana Indallah) X2

  3. Malik Tuje Imam-E Hasan Ka He Wasta. Jiske Lahu Se Karbobala Ki Hai Ibtidaa. Ha Us Imam-E Aman Ka Sadke Kibriya. Is Mulk Me Ho Amane Ka Parcham Khula Huwa.

(Ya Wajiha Indallah, Ishfalana Indallah) X2

  4. Ab Wasta Hussain Alaihis Salaam Ka. Parwar Digar Sabr Shahe Tish Na Kam Ka. Jiske Labo Pe Vird Tha Tere Hi Nam Ka. Khanjar Tale Jo Kari Tha Tere Kalam Ka

(Ya Wajiha Indallah, Ishfalana Indallah) X2

  5. Ya Rab Tu Meri Hasti Ko Aisa Sawar De. Tu Apni Rehmato Se Mera Ghar Nikhaar De. Sajad Ka Tu Sadkaye Parwar Digar De. Bimar Ko Shifaa De Mukammal Karar De

(Ya Wajiha Indallah, Ishfalana Indallah) X2

  6. Malik Imam-E Baqar Or Jafar Ka Wasta. Majlis Me Mai Hussain Ki Karta Hu Ye Dua. Dono Ka Wasta Tuje Deta Hu Ay Khuda. Makrooz-E Jo Hai Ghaib Se Kar Unka Karz Ada.

(Ya Wajiha Indallah, Ishfalana Indallah) X2

  7. Ya Rab Baraye Musa-E Kazim Ali Raza. Mashhad Me Aur Najaf Me Jo Hai Kibla-E Dua. Tu Inke Wasta Se Wo Aulad Kar Ata. Maa Bap Jis Se Shad Ho Jinki Jo Ye Sadaa

(Ya Wajiha Indallah, Ishfalana Indallah) X2

  8. Ya Rab Baraye Mawla Naqi Taqwa-E Taqi. Be Jas Baye Jihad-E Bashar Shaan-E Askari. Mehdi Ka Bhi Zahur Dikha De Isi Sadi. Teri Huzur Meri Dua He Ye Akhri

(Ya Wajiha Indallah, Ishfalana Indallah) X2

Ya Wasiyal Hassan. Wal Khalafal Hujjah. Ya Sayyidi Na Wa Mawla Na. Inna Tawaj
Jah Na Watawassal Na Bika Ilallah. Wa Kad Dam Naka Bayna Yaday Hajaati Na.

tracks.title: Sallam Nana Ke Roze
tracks.lyrics:
(Chalaa Me Wada Nibhaane)X2

Salaam Ma Ke Mazaar

(Sallam Nana Ke Roze, Salam Ma Ke Mazaar) X2

  1. (Chalaa Me Waada Nibhaane) X2

Sallam Ma Ke Mazaa

Sallam Nana……….

  2. Me Tera Din Bacha Woonga,

Ay Mere Nana,

Me Apna Khoon Bahaa Woonga,

Ay Mere Nana,

(Husain Ja Ta Hai Marne) X2

Salaam Ma Ke Mazaar

Sallam Nana……………

  3. Meri Shari Ke Safar Banke,

Sath Chal Ama,

Safar Pe Jaata Hu Kapre,

Mere Badal Ama

(Libaas Khuld Sajaa De) X2

Badan Pe Phir Ek Baar

Sallam Nana……………….

  4. Dua Karu Koi Sar Be,

Rida Na Ho Ama,

Namaaz Zohke Shahadat,

Kazaa Na Ho Ama,

(Na Aye Mere Chaman Pe) X2

Sitam Ki Gardo Guba

Sallam Nana………………….

  5. Diyaa Jalane Ko Nana,

Tumhare Roze Par,

Zuroor Ayegi Sugra,

Har Ek Sham-O-Sahar,

(Khuda Kare Rahe Roshan) X2

Sada Tumhara Mazaar

Sallam Nana……………

  6. Tumhare Jesaa Hai Nana,

Ye Mera Laal Akber,

Dua Karo Na Lage Isko,

Asmaan Ki Nazar,

(Lute Na Door Watan Se)

Hamare Dil Ka Karar

Sallam Nana……………..

  7. Tamam Phool Se Bache Hai,

Aur Garm Hawaa,

Hamare Khoon Ki Pyaasi Hai,

Foje Zulmo Jafaa

(Safar Me Koi Shajar Bhi) X2

Nahi Hai Saaya Adaa

Sallam Nana………………..

  8. Ha Ek Phool To Esa Hai,

Jo Khila Bhi Nahi,

Na Paye Pani Ko Kar Sakta,

Wo Gila Bhi Nahi,

(Wo Jiske Dehne Se Aati) X2

Hai Dood Ki Mehkar

Sallam Nana…………….

  9. Meri Sakina Kaha Aur,

Rasan Ke Bandh Kaha,

Zamin Garm Pe Chalna,

Use Pasand Kaha,

(Kadam Wo Phool Se Nazook) X2

Wo Raste Purkhar

Sallam Nana…………..

  10. (Challa Me Waada Nibhaane) X2

Sallam Ma Ke Mazaa

tracks.title: Aao Alam Ke Saye Me
tracks.lyrics:
Aao Alam Ke Saye Me

_

Ye Teri Dunya, Ye Dunya Dari.

Insaniyat-E Ha, Be Chene Sari

Anjane Khadshi, Ye Be Karari

Sub Kuch Hai Phir Bhi, Sabse Be Zari

Lakin Ye Mano, Koi Khuda Hai, Uska Wasila, Kuch Kehraha Hai.

(Jab Bhi Koi Gham Ka, Ahsas Pawo) X2

(Aao Alam Ke, Saye Me Aawo) X3

  1. (Jab Bhi Koi Gham Ka, Ahsas Pawo) X2

(Aao Alam Ke, Saye Me Aawo) X3

  2. (Dunya Ye Teri, Kya Tujko Dengi, Kisko Diya Hai, Jo Tujko Dengi) X2 (Apni Murade, Gazi Pe Pawo) X2

(Aao Alam Ke, Saye Me Aawo) X3

  3. (Tere Sahare Tuta Gaye Kya, Apne Paraye Ruth Gaye Kya) X2 (Ruthe Huwo Ko, Apne Manawo) X2

(Aao Alam Ke, Saye Me Aawo) X3

  4. (Jab Gham Rulaye, Jab Dil Ho Bojhal, Teri Wafaa Ka, Ne Dekho Ek Pal) X2 (Kya Gham He Gham Ko, Ab Bhul Jawo) X2

(Aao Alam Ke, Saye Me Aawo) X3

  5. (Saye Me Mera, Abhi He Rehti, Meri Sakina, Pyari Bhatiji) X2 Jab Awo Bacho, Ko Sath Lawu

(Aao Alam Ke, Saye Me Aawo) X3

  6. (Kush Hogi Tumse, Meri Sakina, Gharmi Ka Jab Bhi, Aye Mahina) X2 (Pani Parindo, Ko Bhi Pilawo) X2

(Aao Alam Ke, Saye Me Aawo) X3

  7. (Ai Mere Aka, Ye Pursadaaro, Aai Nawhakhano, Matam

Guzaro) X2 (Jawo Jahan Bhi, Majlis Karao) X2

(Aao Alam Ke, Saye Me Aawo) X3

  8. (Mere Alam Par, Bibiyo Ana, Sar Ko Khudara, Apna Chupana) X2

(Sab Na Sataya, Tum Na Sata Wo) X2

(Aao Alam Ke, Saye Me Aawo) X3

  9. (Aath Muharaam, Parcham Saja Kar, Bacho Ko Apne, Sakka Bana Kar) X2 (Nam –E- Sakina Pani Pilawo) X2

(Aao Alam Ke, Saye Me Aawo) X3

  10. (Beta Hu Mai Bhi, Mushkil Khusha Ka, Pyara Hun Mai Bhi, Hajat Rawa Ka) X2 (Thokar Lage Jab, Jab Chot Khawo) X2

(Aao Alam Ke, Saye Me Aawo) X3

tracks.title: Jaag Sakina Jaag
tracks.lyrics:
Hogayi Rihaayi, Lo Kafela Chalaa,

Sar Jab Har Ek Shahid Ka, Sajaad Ko Mila

(Tab Markade Sakina) X2 Pe Sajaad Ne Kahaa

(Jaag Sakina Jaag Baba Ka Sar Aaya) X3

  1. (Baba Tumhara Aya) X2

Gaya Waqt Nind Ka

Jaag………..

  2. Sine Pe Sonewali (Matti Pe Sogayi) X2

Baba Ko Rote Rote (Jo Khamosh Ho Gayi) X2

(Roro Ke Maan Kabre) X2 Sakina Pe Ye Kaha

Jaag………….

  3. Bibi Karo Salaam (Adab Ka Makaam Hai) X2

Bibi Tere Sarhana Shahe (Tishna Kaam Hai) X2

(Ay Jaan Jaldi Badlo) X2 Ye Kurta Phata Huwa

Jaag…………

  4. Baba Ko Dund Ti Thi (Sakina Utho Utho) X2

Raato Ko Jaag Ti Thi (Sakina Utho Utho) X2

(Lo Agaye Hai Baba) X2 Ay Jaan Jag Ja

Jaag………….

  5. Baba Ke Paas Sona (Na Sona Zamin Par) X2

Rakho Labo Ko Lab Par (Jabi Ko Jabin Par) X2

(Aada Ki Gurkiyo Ka) X2 Zamaana Guzar Gaya

Jaag………….

  6. Payghaam Roz Deti (The Amu Ke Naam Tum) X2

Roti Thi Yaad Kar Ke (Une Subh Shaam Tum) X2

(Jaago Ko Jaa Rahe Hai) X2 Jaha Sote Hai Chacha

Jaag…………

  7. Kistarha Soyi Baali (Sakina Na Puchiye) X2

Ranjo Alam Se Pathta (Hai Sina Na Puchiye) X2

(Jaagi Na Phir Kabhi Wo) X2 Bohot Maa Ne De Sadaa

Jaag………..

tracks.title: Aa Alamdar
tracks.lyrics:
(Aa Alamdar Haye Alamdar) X3

  1. Karte The Roro Ke Ya Hazrat Bayan Torgayi Meri Kamar Bhayijan

(Aa Alamdar Haye Alamdar) X3

  2. Roti He Khayme Me Sakina Waha Sote He Abbas Zamin Par Yahaa

(Aa Alamdar Haye Alamdar) X3

  3. Aare Lash Uthayenga Kon. Shehre Jawaan Margaya. Aare Kabre Banayanga Kon. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Aare Humko Sambhalenga Kon. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Toro Na Gurbat Me Meri Aas Utho. Utho Husain Aaye Ha Abbas Utho. Rota He Mazlum Basat Yas Utho. Utho Basab Gar Me Chalo Bhayijaan.

(Aa Alamdar Haye Alamdar) X3

  4. Aare Kon Khabare Le Meri. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Haye Meri Bekasi. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Chalti He Dil Par Churi. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Kya Huwa Sakkaye Sakina Ko Aa. Kisne Kiya Mere Bhara Gar Tabaa. Kya Huwi Abbas Biradar Ki Chaah. Ab Gayi Wo Pyaar Ki Baate Kaha.

(Aa Alamdar Haye Alamdar) X3

  5. Aare Margaya Akbar Pisar. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Thaam Lo Meri Kamar. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Aare Lut Gaya Bakas Ka Gar. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Kuwate Bazu Mera Kya Hogaya. Zinate Pehlu Mera Kya Hogaya. Aashik Dil Yu Mera Kya Hogaya. Kya Huwa Afsos Mera Ab Qadradan

(Aa Alamdar Haye Alamdar) X3

  6. Aare Jhume Khayme Me Wa. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Karti He Zainab Fugaa. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Aare Kise Karu Me Bayan. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Hath Se Khoya Dile Gamkhwar Ko. Paawu Kaha Apne Alamdar Ko. Geri Huwi Khanjar-E Khu Khar Ko. Jalad Gale Parho Mere Ab Rawaa.

(Aa Alamdar Haye Alamdar) X3

  7. Aare Ab Koi Chara Nahi. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Aare Zist Gawara Nahi. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Aare Koi Hamara Nahi. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Maa Hai Bani Hasheme Wala Nahi. Usme Mere Mehru Ka Ujala Nahi. Haaye Mere Chahane Wala Nahi. Nazro Me Tarikh Ha Sara Jahan.

(Aa Alamdar Haye Alamdar) X3

  8. Aare Lash Uthayenga Kon. Shehre Jawaan Margaya. Aare Kabre Banayanga Kon. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Aare Humko Sambhalenga Kon. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Toro Na Gurbat Me Meri Aas Ko. Utho Husain Aaye Ha Abbas Utho. Rota He Mazlum Basat Yas Utho. Utho Basat Gar Me Chalo Bhayijaan.

(Aa Alamdar Haye Alamdar) X3

  9. Aare Ankho Ka Tara Mera. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Aare Chand Ka Tukra Mera. Shehre Jawan Margaya. Are Gar Ka Ujala Mera. Ruhe Ali Jaan-E Nabi Alvida. Ashiko Shaidai Akhi Alvida. Laasha-E Abbase Ali Alvida. Aate Ha Ab Ham Bhi Chalo Bhayijaan.

(Aa Alamdar Haye Alamdar) X3

  10. Karta Roro Ke Ya Hazrat Bayan Tor Gaye Meri Kamar Bhayijaan

(Aa Alamdar Haye Alamdar) X3

  11. Roti Hai Khayme Me Sakina Waha Sote Ho Abbas Zamin Par Yaha

(Aa Alamdar Haye Alamdar) X3

![](Http://Www.nawhas.com/Acounter.php?Acid=1)

tracks.title: Jab Mawla Ayenge
tracks.lyrics:
(Al Ajaal Labayk-E Mawla) X3

(Sari Dunya Me Ujalaa, Noor Ka Hojayenge) X3 Khanaaye Kaaba Ki Chath Par Ek
Alam Lehrayenga

(Jab Mawla Ayenge) X4

  1. Dekhene Ek Roz-E Manzar Istarha Ka Aayenga. Manzaro Par Ek Manzar Mustakil Hojayenga (Ha Yahi Manzar Qayamat, Ki Khabar Banjayenga) X2 (Sari Dunya Me Ujalaa, Noor-E Ka Hojayenga) X3 Khanaaye Kaaba Ki Chath Par Ek Alam Lehrayenga

(Jab Mawla Ayenge) X4

  2. Ay Azadaro Sunonge Jald-E Mawla Ki Sadaa. Qayaame Ale-Muhammad Askari Ka Mai Laqa (Aaraha He Aaraha He Marhaba Sad-E Marhaba) X2 (Majlis-E Shabbir Me Ab Shorkhiaah Dekhena) X3 Pursadaro Farshe Gham Par Apne Mawla Dekhna

(Jab Mawla Ayenge) X4

  3. Surkh Andhiyaa Uthengi Phir Samaj Me Aayenga. Jiski Dunya Muntazir Thi Phir Wo Manzaar Aayenga (Mosame Insaaf Laykar Mera Mawla Aayenga) X2 (Kufra Hujro Me Chupenga Darbadar Ho Jayengaa) X3 Mukhtasir Lashkar Imaam-E Asr-E Ka Cha Jayenga

(Jab Mawla Ayenge) X4

  4. Aayenga Jab Haideri Talwar Ka Wo Virsidaa. Dekhna Chalti He Kaise Dekh Shere Kirdigaar (Phir Zamino Aasmaa Tak Ek Hi Hongi Pukaar) X2 (Shahe Marda Sher-E Yazdaa Kuwate Parwardigaar) X3 La Fataa Ilaa Ali Lah Saif-E Illah Zulfiqar

(Jab Mawla Ayenge) X4

  5. Dekhena Istarh Mawla Majlis-E Karwayenge. Majliso Me Karbala Wale Bulaye Jayenge (Naraye Haydar Lagenga Panjatan Jub Ayaange) X2 (Dekhene Un Majliso Me Har Shahidaa Ajayenga) X3 Phir To Wo Mataam Karenge Asmaan Hiljayenga

(Jab Mawla Ayenge) X4

  6. Chand Narjis Ka Falaak Se Jab Zamin Par Aayenga. Aayenge Saare Farishte Awliya Or Ambhiya (Abe Kawsar Ki Sabile Ki Lagengi Jabaja) X2 (Unke Aate Hi Sitaraa Khud Zamin Par Aayenge) X3 Dekhena Shehr-E Khamosha Me Diye Jaljayenge

(Jab Mawla Ayenge) X4

  7. Akbaro Abbas Kasim Ke Liye Girya Quna. Royange Matam Karenge Jub Imam-E Insaja (Fatema Zehra Ki Aayegi Ye Awaaz-E Fugaa) X2 (Ay Gharibo Be Watan Ay Karbala Wale Hussain) X3 Tera Nana Kar Rahahe Teri Mazloomi Pe Bain

(Jab Mawla Ayenge) X4

tracks.title: Piyaas Achi Hai
tracks.lyrics:
(Aap Ache Hai Cha Cha) X2

Per Ye Zamaana Nahi Acha

Piyaas Achi Hai Magar,

Aap Ka Jaana Nahi Acha (X3)

Aap Ache Hai………..

  1. Asaman Royenga Khaymo Me Kayamat Hogi (X2)

Din Alam Daye Alam Khaymo Me Lana Nahi Acha

Aap Ache Hai…………

  2. Sirf Ek Raat Me Kyu Bura Huwa Hai Sajaad (X2)

Sar Khule Mawo Ke Beto Ko Dikhana Nahi Acha

Aap Ache Hai…..….

  3. Ek Shehzadi Thi Jis Shehre Ki Bibi Zainab (X2)

Iske Bazaaro Me Zainab Ko Phiraana Nahi Acha

Aap Ache Hai………

  4. Jese Zindan Me Sakina Hai Mili Baba Se (X2)

Istarha Baap Se Beti Ko Milana Nahi Acha

Aap Ache Hai……….



  5. Khush Nassebi Hai Jo De Bap Ko Beta Kandhaa (X2)

Bap Ka Lashe Jawaa Haye Uthana Nahi Acha

Aap Ache Hai……….

  6. Kabr Asger Ki Banaa Kar Hai Bari Shaan Hussain (X2)

Aag Si Reth Me Ek Phool Chupaana Nahi Acha

Aap Ache Hai………….

  7. Ab Hame Shaa Me Rahugi Isi Zindan Me Cha Cha(X2)

Me Na Kehti Thi Muje Chor Ke Jaana Nahi Acha

Aap Ache Hai………….

  8. Sar Khule Bibiya Roti Hai Azakhano Me(X2)

Shabe Ashur Charago Ko Jalaana Nahi Acha

Aap Ache Hai……………

  9. Har Khushi Sadke Me Zainab Ke Khuda De Tujko (X2)

Ha Muharram Me Khushi Koi Manaana Nahi Acha

Aap Ache Hai…………..

tracks.title: Maa Me Naize Pe Hu
tracks.lyrics:
Neze Se Asghar Ko Nazar Ayi Jo Madar. Dekha Khula Sar Hai Pareshan He Muztar.
Rone Lage Kehne Lage Tab Ali Asghar. (Maa Muje Apna Sine Se Lagaale. Maa Muje
Apni Godi Me Chupale) X2

(Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2 Maa Muje Apni Sine Se Lagaale. Maa Muje Apni Godi Me
Chupale (Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2



  1. Amaa Bohat Din Huwe Jule Me Na Soya. Maa Teri Izat Ki Kasam Phir Bhi Na Roya. Ab Tuje Dekha To Mere Lab Huwa Goya. Aaj Bandhe Hatho Ko Jula Sa Banaa Le. Sine Se Lagaale. Maa Me Naize Pe Hu.

(Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2 Maa Muje Apni Sine Se Lagaale. Maa Muje Apni Godi Me
Chupale (Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2

  2. Jism Kahaa Sar He Kahaa Haye Mukaddar. Amaa Badan Rehgaya Karbal Ki Zamin Par. Amaa Tere Sath Chalaa Aye Mera Sar. Karta Tuje Kaise Laaino Ke Hawale. Sine Se Lagaale. Maa Me Naize Pe Hu

(Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2 Maa Muje Apni Sine Se Lagaale. Maa Muje Apni Godi Me
Chupale (Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2

  3. Garm Hawaa Garm Zamin Jalta Huwa Tir. Amaa Zara Socho Mera Kad Se Baraa Tir. Kaise Kahoo Halk Pe Jis Wakht Lagaa Tir. Hogaye Bahosh Muje Dekhne Wale. Sine Se Lagaa Le. Maa Me Naize Pe Hu

(Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2 Maa Muje Apni Sine Se Lagaale. Maa Muje Apni Godi Me
Chupale (Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2



  4. Kabse Sakina Ne Nahi Mujko Kiya Pyaar. Karbobala Kufa Kaha Sham Ka Bazaar. Darti Hai Kya Khun Se Bhare Dekhke Ruksar. Neze Ke Nazdik Zara Usko Bulale. Sine Se Lagaale. Maa Me Naize Pe Hu.

(Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2 Maa Muje Apni Sine Se Lagaale. Maa Muje Apni Godi Me
Chupale (Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2

  5. Duph Me Tune Na Kabhi Gar Se Nikaala. Amaa Bare Pyaar Se Tune Muje Palaa. Aaj Nahi Koi Muje Dekhane Wala. Tuhi Muje Dhoop Se Shiddat Se Bachaale. Sine Se Lagaa Le. Maa Me Naize Pe Hu.

(Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2 Maa Muje Apni Sine Se Lagaale. Maa Muje Apni Godi Me
Chupale (Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2

  6. Dekh Tera Lakhte Jigar Yun To He Asger. Neza Sawaari He Akabar Ke Baraa Bar. Noke Sina Par He Sitaara Sa Mera Ghar. Meri Shujaat Pe Gale Mujko Lagaale. Sine Se Lagaale. Maa Me Naize Pe Hu.

(Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2 Maa Muje Apni Sine Se Lagaale. Maa Muje Apni Godi Me
Chupale (Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2

  7. Baba Ka Sar Bhayi Ka Sar Noke Sina Par. Aap Ke Sarpe Nahi Ama Koi Chadar. Kaise Me Bardash Karu Ama Ye Manzar. Jalti Huwi Khak Se Moo Apna Chupale. Sine Se Lagaale. Maa Me Naize Pe Hu.

(Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2 Maa Muje Apni Sine Se Lagaale. Maa Muje Apni Godi Me
Chupale (Maa Me Naize Pe Hu) X2

tracks.title: Je Karta He Mera Mawla
tracks.lyrics:
Ye Virsa Marte, Marte Bhi, Ye Virsa Marte, Marte Bhi, Hum Naslo Ko Dejayenge

(Majlis Matam Karwayenge) X2 Je Karta Hai Mere Mawla, Sab Karbobala Ko Jayenge
(Majlis Matam Karwayenge)

  1. (Gazi Ka Alam Utayange) X2 Dunya Se Kafle Ayenge

(Majlis Matam Karwayenge) X2 Je Karta Hai Mere Mawla, Sub Karbobala Ko Jayenge
(Majlis Matam Karwayenge)

  2. Jab Subh Ho Hogi, Karbal Me, (Ham Khake Shifaa Ko Chumange) X3 Din Rat Waha Sab Ehle Azaa, Mawla Ka Sog Manayenge

(Majlis Matam Karwayenge) X2 Je Karta Hai Mere Mawla, Sub Karbobala Ko Jayenge
(Majlis Matam Karwayenge)

  3. Jab Dekhe Chand Muharram Ka, (Sab Jaye Khayame Hussaini Par) X3 Abbas Ke Khayme Par Rukh Kar Gab Izne Ziyaraat Payenge

(Majlis Matam Karwayenge) X2 Je Karta Hai Mere Mawla, Sub Karbobala Ko Jayenge
(Majlis Matam Karwayenge)

  4. Jab Ponchenge Use Manzil Par (Asgher Ke Lagaa Tha Tir Jahaa) X3 Bulwayenge Nane Bacho Ko Subeko Pani Pilwayenge

(Majlis Matam Karwayenge) X2 Je Karta Hai Mere Mawla, Sub Karbobala Ko Jayenge
(Majlis Matam Karwayenge)

  5. Matam Na Rukenga Ehle Aza (Akber Ka Jaha Neza Tha Laga) X3

Ham Khun Ali Akber Ki Kasam Nauha Sugra Ka Sunayenge



(Majlis Matam Karwayenge) X2 Je Karta Hai Mere Mawla, Sub Karbobala Ko Jayenge
(Majlis Matam Karwayenge)

  6. Darya Ke Kanara Beth Ke Ham (Royenge Wo Manzar Soch Ke Ham) X3 Jab Khun Me Bhara Aya Tha Alam Ye Soch Ke Ashk Bahayenge

(Majlis Matam Karwayenge) X2 Je Karta Hai Mere Mawla, Sub Karbobala Ko Jayenge
(Majlis Matam Karwayenge)

  7. Jab Aath Muharram Ayenge (Bacho Ko Banayenge Sakaa) X3 Us Roz Sajaa Kar Mashk – O - Alam Sharbat Pe Nazar Dilwayenge

(Majlis Matam Karwayenge) X2 Je Karta Hai Mere Mawla, Sub Karbobala Ko Jayenge
(Majlis Matam Karwayenge)

  8. Jab Shaam-E Ghariba Ayaangi (Kya Kya Na Hama Rulwayengi) X3 Ek Jalte Huwe Jula Ki Shabi Yaad Ayi To Marjayengi

(Majlis Matam Karwayenge) X2 Je Karta Hai Mere Mawla, Sub Karbobala Ko Jayenge
(Majlis Matam Karwayenge)

  9. Jis Tila Se Zainab Ne Kabhi (Kat Te Huwa Dekha Bhayyi Ka Sar) X3 Yaad Ayenga Roze Ashura Sine Se Gham Phat Jayenge

(Majlis Matam Karwayenge) X2 Je Karta Hai Mere Mawla, Sub Karbobala Ko Jayenge
(Majlis Matam Karwayenge)

  10. Ashur Ka Din Jab Hogaya (Mawla Se Kahenge Roro Kar) X3 Daman Me Chupalijiye Mawla Ham Lot Ke Gar Na Jayenge

(Majlis Matam Karwayenge) X2 Je Karta Hai Mere Mawla, Sub Karbobala Ko Jayenge
(Majlis Matam Karwayenge)

tracks.title: Al Quran
tracks.lyrics:
Aa Oozoo Billahi Minash Shaytanir Rajim. (Bismillah Hir-Rahman Nir Rahim) X2
Inna Nahno Nazzal Na Zikra Wa Inna Lahu La Hafizun

(Quran-E Wo Kitab He, Jo Dars-E Inkalaab-E He. Ha Mari Darsagah, He Sidha
Raasta Karbala, Karbala) X2 Quran-E Wo Kitaab-E He

  1. Bismi Rabbi Jaha Bismillah. Subhanallah Ye Quran Allah Allah. Ummul Kitaab-E He Ye Mashallah, Ik Ik Surah He Universalloh.

(Quran-E Wo Kitab He, Jo Dars-E Inkalaab-E He. Ha Mari Darsagah, He Sidha
Raasta Karbala, Karbala) X2 Quran-E Wo Kitaab-E He

  2. Quran Ki God Ka Ek Ek Surah. Wo Ma-Aaeda Hu Ki Yasin Wa Taha. Sura-E Maryam Wa Rehman Wa Shora. Parte Hi Rehtehe Rab Ka Kasida.

(Quran-E Wo Kitab He, Jo Dars-E Inkalaab-E He. Ha Mari Darsaga, He Sidha
Raasta Karbala, Karbala) X2 Quran-E Wo Kitaab-E He

  3. Quran Ki He Shaan He Shaane Muhammed. Quran He Mizan-E Muhammed. Farma Ne Rab Farma Ne Muhammed. Nukta-E Baa Quran-E Muhammed.

(Quran-E Wo Kitab He, Jo Dars-E Inkalaab-E He. Ha Mari Darsaga, He Sidha
Raasta Karbala, Karbala) X2 Quran-E Wo Kitaab-E He



  4. Kaise Quran He Hum Tak Aaya. Kisne Sikhaaya He Kisne Parhaaya. He Kis Gara Ne Ka Ye Sarmaya. Jan Deke Isko He Kisne Bachaaya.

(Quran-E Wo Kitab He, Jo Dars-E Inkalaab-E He. Ha Mari Darsaga, He Sidha
Raasta Karbala, Karbala) X2 Quran-E Wo Kitaab-E He

  5. Din Bhi Bacha Quran Bhi Dekho. Baki Raha Imaan Bhi Maano. Kiya Gaya Kiska Ye Bhi To Socho. Gar To Luta Sayada Ka Hai Logo

(Quran-E Wo Kitab He, Jo Dars-E Inkalaab-E He. Ha Mari Darsaga, He Sidha
Raasta Karbala, Karbala) X2 Quran-E Wo Kitaab-E He

  6. Wo Karbala Wo Nabi Ka Gar Aana. Quran Idhar To Udhar He Zamaana. Ik Ik Par-E Ka Maqtal Jaana. Khun Me Nahaa Ke Ye Sab Ko Bataa Na

(Quran-E Wo Kitab He, Jo Dars-E Inkalaab-E He. Ha Mari Darsaga, He Sidha
Raasta Karbala, Karbala) X2 Quran-E Wo Kitaab-E He

  7. Ye Karbala Ye He Shaam-E Ghariba. Wo Jalte Khayme Wo Aayate Quran Khaymo Me Bali Sakina Pareshan. Zainab Pukari Ye Barsare Mayda

(Quran-E Wo Kitab He, Jo Dars-E Inkalaab-E He. Ha Mari Darsaga, He Sidha
Raasta Karbala, Karbala) X2 Quran-E Wo Kitaab-E He

tracks.title: Zuljanah
tracks.lyrics:
Zuljanah. Ay Zuljanah. Zuljanah. Ay Zuljanah.

(Zuljanah, Zuljanah, Bigo Kujo Baba Husaina) X2

Gumshuda Baba Kuja. Zuljana Bigoh. Ah Cha Shud Baba Raa. Zuljanah Bigoh. Jood
Bigo Majarah. Zuljanah Bigoh.

(Zuljanah, Zuljanah, Bigo Kujaan Baba Husaina) X2

  1. (Zuljanah Tera, Haye Ye Rona) X2 Karta He Mushkil Ab Mera Jina. (Puch Rahi Hai, Tujse Sakina) X2 Bol Kaha He Mera Baba.

Zuljanah, Zuljanah, Bigo Kujaan Baba Husaina

Gumshuda Baba Kujaa......

  2. (Chor Ke Tanha, Aya Jo Tu He) X2 Math-E Pe Tere, Kiska Lahu Hai. (Isme To Mere Baba Ki Bu Hai) X2. Bol Kaha Hai Mera Baba.

Zuljanah, Zuljanah, Bigo Kujan Baba Husaina

Gumshuda Baba Kujaa......

  3. (Aath Pahar Se, Pyasa Tha Baba) X2 Lasho Pe Lashe, Laya Tha Baba (Zakhmi Badan Tha, Zakhmi Kaleja) X2 Bol Kaha He Mera Baba.

Zuljanah, Zuljanah, Bigo Kujan Baba Husaina

Gumshuda Baba Kujaa.........

  4. (Pehle Hi Tujse, Mene Kaha Tha) X2 Baba Ko Mere, Run Me Na Layja (Haye Na Mana, Tu Mera Kehna) X2 Bol Kaha He Mera Baba

Zuljanah, Zuljanah, Bigo Kujan Baba Husaina

Gumshuda Baba Kujaa.............

  5. (Zuljanah Lay Chal, Baba Jaha He) X2 Itna Bataa De, Soye Kaha He (Tujko Pataa He, Wo Meri Jaan Hai) X2 Bol Kaha He Mara Baba

Zuljanah, Zuljanah, Bigo Kujan Baba Husaina

Gumshuda Baba Kujaa.............

  6. (Jab Tu Chalaa Tha, Baba Ko Lay Kar) X2 Yaad To Hoga, Tujko Wo Manzar (Tere Sumon Se, Lipti Thi Rokar) X2 Bol Kaha He Mera Baba

Zuljanah, Zuljanah, Bigo Kujan Baba Husaina

Gumshuda Baba Kujaa.......

Zuljanah, Zuljanah, Bigo Kujo Baba Husaina

tracks.title: Aa Mere Pyaare Husain
tracks.lyrics:
(Aa Mere Pyasse Husain) X3

  1. Aa Meri God Ke Pale, Mere Husain Aa. Mere Garib Aa Zara, Maa Ke Karib Aa. Sinaa Phigar He Tera, Mujko He Ye Pataa. Dashte-E Balaa Me Fatema, Zehra Ki Thi Sadaa.

(Aa Mere Pyaare Husain) X2

  2. Kisne Mere Jigar Pe, Ye Khanjar Chalaa Diya. Kisne Mere Husain-E Ko, Pani Nahi Diya. Khud Chal Ke Kyu Na Agaya, Darya Ko Kya Huwa. Ek Bar Maa Pukar Ke, Godi Me Let Jaa.

(Aa Mere Pyaare Husain) X2

  3. Sehroz Ki Ye Pyaas Ye, Jalti Huwi Zamin. Chehra Lahu Lahu Tera, Donim He Jabin. Mazloom Mere Lal Ke, Jeisa Koi Nahi. Tiro Se Mere Lal Ka, Sina Bhara Huwa.

(Aa Mere Pyaare Husain) X2

  4. Pehle To Babajan Ko, Royi Me Zar-E Zar. Royi Ali Ko Kabr Pe, Dil Ho Gaya Figaar. Ik Lal Tha Hasan Mera, Uski Hu Sogwar. Ab Tere Gham Me Kabr Me, Rehne Nahi Diya.

(Aa Mere Pyaare Husain) X2

  5. Ataa Hai Yaad Mujko, Madine Me Apna Gar. Chakki Ma Pisti Thi, Magar Tum Pe Thi Nazar. Tum Ko Sulaya Karti Thi, Raato Ko Jaag Kar. Ab Me Jagaane Ayi Hu, Ay Lal Jaag Jaa.

(Aa Mere Pyaare Husain) X2



  6. Ik Bar Maa Pukar Le, Bilkul Usi Tarah. Jule Me Julte Huwe, Kehte The Jis Tarha. Wo Bachpane Tera Muje, Bhulenga Kis Tarha. Mere Bahgair Chain Se, Ik Pal Nahi Raha.

(Aa Mere Pyaare Husain) X2

  7. Ma Hu Muje Bataa, Tera Sine Pe Kya Huwa. Kyu He Kamar Juki Huwi, Chehra Lahu Bhara. Abbas He Kaha, Ali Akbar Kaha Gaya. Ha Thak Gayaa He Aa Meri, Godi Me Lal Aa.

(Aa Mere Pyaare Husain) X2

tracks.title: Ghazi Alam Tere Uncha Rahenga
tracks.lyrics:
(Yabne Zehra, Ya Abbas) X2 (Ya Abbas) X5

(Ghazi Alam Tera Uncha Rahenga) X2

  1. (Kal Bhi Alam Tere Uncha Rahe He) X3 Aj Bhi Hai Or Kal Bhi Rahenga

(Ghazi Alam Tera Uncha Rahenga) X2

  2. (Tere Alam Ke Saye Me Duniya, Apni Murade Mang Rahi He) X2 (Tere Alam Ke Saye Me Aakar) X2 Jo Nahi Manga Wo Bhi Milanga.

(Ghazi Alam Tera Uncha Rahenga) X2
