  3. (Isko Abu Talib Ne Banaya, Mere Nabi Ne Isko Sajaya) X2 (Binte Asad Ne Sehra Charhaya) X2 Zehra Ke Bacho Pe Saye Kareynga.

(Ghazi Alam Tera Uncha Rahenga) X2

  4. (Ha Ye Alam Hamza Ka Alam Hai, Ha Ye Alam Jafar Ka Alam Hai) X2 (Ha Ye Ghadeer-E Qum Ke Bharam Hai) X2 Sab Parchomo Ka Ye Mawla Rahenga.

(Ghazi Alam Tera Uncha Rahenga) X2

  5. (Chadare Zehra Iska Pharera, Patka Bhi Hai Zainab Ke Dua Ka) X2 (Aise Bandhe He Mashk-E Sakina) X2 Rishta Alam Se Iska Rahenga.

(Ghazi Alam Tera Uncha Rahenga) X2

  6. (Bhula Nahi Sakta Ye Zamana, Pani Pe Parcham Ka Lehrana) X2 (Hat Katana Mashk-E Bachana) X2 Banke Wafaa Tu Zinda Rahenga.

(Ghazi Alam Tera Uncha Rahenga) X2

  7. (Yuto Bohot Zainab Pe Sitam Tha, Lakin Wo Gham Jo Kohe Alam Thaa) X2 (Wo Tera Gham Tha, Wo Tera Gham Tha) X2 Dil Tere Gham Me Rota Rahenga.

(Ghazi Alam Tera Uncha Rahenga) X2

  8. (Kal Bhi Alam Tere Uncha Rahe He) X3 Aj Bhi Or Kal Bhi Rahenga

(Ghazi Alam Tera Uncha Rahenga) X2

tracks.title: Acha Kiya Baba
tracks.lyrics:
Acha Kiya Baba

_

Chahat Ka Meri Kaisa. Ye Mujko Silaa Diya. Acha Kiya Baba Jo Mujko Bhula Diya.
Baba.

(Acha Kiya Baba) X2 Jo Mujko Bhula Diya (Acha Kiya Baba) X2

  1. Zinda Raho Hazaro Baras Shad Ma Raho. Baba Zamin Pe Ban Ke Sada Asman Raho. Quran Tum Pe Saya Kare Tum Jaha Raho (Parti Hu Har Namaaz-E Me) X2 Baba Yahi Dua. Baba.

(Acha Kiya Baba) X2 Jo Mujko Bhula Diya (Acha Kiya Baba) X2

  2. Baba Tumhare Hijir Me Khushiyo Se Dur Hu. Lakin Tumhare Raah Me Thakti Zaroor Hu. Bimar Naatwa Hu Ghamo Se Me Chur Hu (Ab Ke To Din Bhi Eid Ka) X2 Rokar Guzar Gaya. Baba.

(Acha Kiya Baba) X2 Jo Mujko Bhula Diya (Acha Kiya Baba) X2

  3. Rato Ko Jaag Jaag Ke Karti Hu Ye Dua. Kumbe Ko Raas Aye Mere Dashte Karbala. Darya Ke Pas Khayma Ho Shah Ka Lagaa Huwa (Garmi Ke Din He Ama) X2 Jo Sar Par Rahe Rida. Baba.

(Acha Kiya Baba) X2 Jo Mujko Bhula Diya (Acha Kiya Baba) X2

  4. Asgher Ko Bhej Do Ali Akbar Ko Bhej Do. Kuch Roz Ko Sahi Meri Madar Ko Bhej Do. Koi Nahi To Bas Meri Khwahar Ko Bhej Do (Hoto Pe Ab To Sughra) X2 Ka Dam He Ruka Huwa. Baba.

(Acha Kiya Baba) X2 Jo Mujko Bhula Diya (Acha Kiya Baba) X2

  5. Karta He Kon Yun Bhi Marizo Se Itna Pyaar. Me Gulkhizaan Rasidaan Hu Tum Ho Meri Bahar. Wesay Bhi Ab Nasib Me Mere He Intizar (Bujta Huwa Charag Hu) X2 Apne Mazar Ka. Baba.

(Acha Kiya Baba) X2 Jo Mujko Bhula Diya (Acha Kiya Baba) X2

  6. Ha Ye Kalak He Ama Ne Mujko Kiya Na Yaad. Akber To Lene Ayenge Kitna The Ehtemad. Allah Ab To Puri Karenge Meri Murad (Ayenga Jab Madine Me) X2 Karbal Ka Kafela. Baba.

(Acha Kiya Baba) X2 Jo Mujko Bhula Diya (Acha Kiya Baba) X2

  7. Lagta He Meri Kabr Pe Awonge Aai Pidar. Wo Bhi Agar Pohonch Gayi Takdir Se Khabar. Talkin Par Na Pawongi Bazu Ko Tham Kar (Tanhaiya Uthayengi) X2 Tabut Bhi Mera. Baba.

(Acha Kiya Baba) X2 Jo Mujko Bhula Diya (Acha Kiya Baba) X2

tracks.title: Chaliye Madina
tracks.lyrics:
(Chaliye Madina, Chaliye Madina) X2 Chaliye Madina Ay Phupi Chaliye Madina.

(Chaliye Madina, Chaliye Madina. Chaliye Madina Ay Phupi Chaliye Madina) X2

  1. (Hogaya Chehlum, Kar Chuki Matam. Zindagi Bhar Hai, Ab To Muharram) X2 Are Taaba Qayaamat, Ab Hai Tarap Ne. Chaliye Phupi Amaa Watan Chaliye Madina.

(Chaliye Madina, Chaliye Madina. Chaliye Madina Ay Phupi Chaliye Madina) X2

  2. (Ban Gayi Kabre, Nazre Dilaadi. Ashko Ki Chadar, Sab Ko Urhaa Di) X2 Gar Chalo Ab To, Ji Khol Ke Rona. Chaliye Phupi Amaa Watan Chaliye Madina.

(Chaliye Madina, Chaliye Madina. Chaliye Madina Ay Phupi Chaliye Madina) X2

  3. (Ay Phupi Amaa, Hogi Qayaamat. Puch-E Jo Baba, Ham Se Barikkat) X2 Are Kyu Nahi Ayi Bali Sakina. Chaliye Phupi Amaa Watan Chaliye Madina.

(Chaliye Madina, Chaliye Madina. Chaliye Madina Ay Phupi Chaliye Madina) X2

  4. (Are Kabre Nabi Par, Pehle Chalenge. Girya Ya Karenge, Nawha Parenge) X2 Are Guzri Jo Ham Par, Nana Se Kehna. Chaliye Phupi Amaa Watan Chaliye Madina.

(Chaliye Madina, Chaliye Madina. Chaliye Madina Ay Phupi Chaliye Madina) X2

  5. (Are Sughra Ka Shikwa, Chal Ke Mitaa Do. Gash Me He Sughra, Usko Jagaa Do) X2 Are Mar Gaye Akbar, Ye Na Bataa Na. Chaliye Phupi Amaa Watan Chaliye Madina.

(Chaliye Madina, Chaliye Madina. Chaliye Madina Ay Phupi Chaliye Madina) X2

  6. (Soyenge Kab Tak, Nehre Kinaare. Ab Naa Milenge, Amu Hamare) X2 Are Ham Ko Alam Hai, Unka Uthaana. Chaliye Phupi Amaa Watan Chaliye Madina.

(Chaliye Madina, Chaliye Madina. Chaliye Madina Ay Phupi Chaliye Madina) X2

  7. (Kayd Me Guzra, Saraa Muharram. Majliso Matam, Kar Na Sake Ham) X2 Gar Me Azaa Ka, Farsh Bichaana. Chaliye Phupi Amaa Watan Chaliye Madina.

(Chaliye Madina, Chaliye Madina. Chaliye Madina Ay Phupi Chaliye Madina) X2

tracks.title: Yeh Chand-E Tare
tracks.lyrics:
Yeh Chand-E Tare

_

(Ya Hussain) X4

(Yeh Chand Tare, Yeh Phool Kaliya) X2 Husain Ka Gham Mana Rahe Hai

(Yeh Chand Tare, Yeh Phool Kaliya) X2 (Husain Ka Gham Mana Rahe Hai) X2

  1. (Yeh Chand Tare, Yeh Phool Kaliye) X2 (Hussain Ka Gham Manaa Rahe Hai) X2 (Jaha Mai Sare Hussain Wale) X3 (Hussain Ka Gham Manaa Rahe Hai) X2

(Yeh Chand Tare, Yeh Phool Kaliya) X2 (Husain Ka Gham Mana Rahe Hai) X2

  2. (Khalil-E Kaaba Kaha Ho Awo) X2 (Khalil-E Karbobala Ko Dekho) X2 (Hussain-E Jalti Huwi Zami Se) X3 (Pisar Ki Mayyat Utha Rahe Hai) X2

(Yeh Chand Tare, Yeh Phool Kaliya) X2 (Husain Ka Gham Mana Rahe Hai) X2

  3. (Hussain Ke Ye Jigar Ke Takat) X2 (Hai Jis Se Ayub Ko Bhi Hairat) X2 (Gale Pe Khanjar Rawaa He Lakin) X3 (Hussain Kalma Suna Rahe Hai) X2

(Yeh Chand Tare, Yeh Phool Kaliya) X2 (Husain Ka Gham Mana Rahe Hai) X2

  4. (Kahi Pe Akbar Sa Gulbadan Hai) X2 (Kahi Pe Qasim Ghule Hassan Hai) X2 (Jigar Ke Tukra Se Shah-E Wala) X3 (Zamin-E Maktal Sajaa Rahe Hai) X2

(Yeh Chand Tare, Yeh Phool Kaliya) X2 (Husain Ka Gham Mana Rahe Hai) X2

  5. (Na Jane Zainab Ne Kaise Dekha) X2 (Ajib-E Manzar Wo Karbala Ka) X2 (Hussain-E Gir Gir Ke Uth Rahe Hai) X3 (Tarap Ke Akbar Bula Rahe Hai) X2

(Yeh Chand Tare, Yeh Phool Kaliya) X2 (Husain Ka Gham Mana Rahe Hai) X2

  6. (Charage Khayma Bujaa Ke Sarwar) X2 (Banaa Gaye Hai Ek Aisa Lashkar) X2 (Unhi Charaago Ki Roshni Se) X3 (Charag-E Sabjag Maga Rahe Hai) X2

(Yeh Chand Tare, Yeh Phool Kaliya) X2 (Husain Ka Gham Mana Rahe Hai) X2

  7. (Ye Urte Badal Ye Behte Darya) X2 (Suno Zaraa Kya Bataa Rahe Hai) X2 (Jahaa Khudaa Hai Waha Hussaini) X3 (Hussain Ka Gham Mana Rahe Hai) X2

(Yeh Chand Tare, Yeh Phool Kaliya) X2 (Husain Ka Gham Mana Rahe Hai) X2

  8. (Pidar Ke Sine Pe Sone Wali) X2 (Sumo Se Rehwar Se Hai Lipti) X2 (Sakina Shayad Samaj Gayi Hai) X3 (Ke Baba Marne Ko Jaa Rahe Hai) X2

(Yeh Chand Tare, Yeh Phool Kaliya) X2 (Husain Ka Gham Mana Rahe Hai) X2

tracks.title: Arey O Shaam Walo
tracks.lyrics:
Sakina, Ki Sadaa Hai. Arey O, Shaam Walo. Arey O, Kufe Walo.

Arey O, Shaam Walo. Sakina, Ki Sadaa Hai.

(Arey O, Shaam Walo. Kafan, Baba Ko Day Do) X3 Arey O, Shaam Walo.

  1. Arey O, Shaam Walo. Arey O, Kufe Walo. Mere Pyaare Jo Amu Aj Hote. Kabhi Naa Is Kadar Majbur Hote. Gada-I Karke Late. Magar Tumse Na Kehte.
Arey O, Shaam Walo. Kafan, Baba Ko Day Do. Arey O, Shaam Walo.

  2. Arey O, Shaam Walo. Arey O, Kufe Walo. Chacha Ka Sar Ye Neze, Se Hatado. Sarey Shabbir Parda Urado. Ye Gham, Kitna Baraa Hai. Meri Maa Be Ridaa Hai.

Arey O, Shaam Walo. Kafan, Baba Ko Day Do. Arey O, Shaam Walo.

  3. Arey O, Shaam Walo. Arey O, Kufe Walo. Me Khatoon-E Jinaa Ka Aayina Hu. Rasan Basta Asiro, Be Ridaa Hu. Meri, Janib Na Dekho. Mera, Kurta Phataa Hai.

Arey O, Shaam Walo. Kafan, Baba Ko Day Do. Arey O, Shaam Walo.



  4. Arey O, Shaam Walo. Arey O, Kufe Walo. Wo Sina Mere Baba Ka Kaha Hai, Suna Hai Bar Sare Dega Tapa Ha, Nahi Haye Wo Sine. Kaha, Soye Sakina.

Arey O, Shaam Walo. Kafan, Baba Ko Day Do. Arey O, Shaam Walo.

  5. Arey O, Shaam Walo. Arey O, Kufe Walo. Mere Gar Ke Kaniz-E, Ba Ridaa Hai. Kayamat, Hogayi Hum Be Ridaa Hai. Sitam, Kitna Bara Hai. Phuphi Ka Sar Khula Hai.

Arey O, Shaam Walo. Kafan, Baba Ko Day Do. Arey O, Shaam Walo.

  6. Arey O, Shaam Walo. Arey O, Kufe Walo. Yatimo Ko Sataa Na, Kab Rawaa Hai. Dukhe Dil, Ko Dukhana, Kab Rawaa Hai. Sitam, Jo Chahe Karlo. Magar Ik Kam-E Kar Do

Arey O, Shaam Walo. Kafan, Baba Ko Day Do. Arey O, Shaam Walo.

  7. Arey O, Shaam Walo. Arey O, Kufe Walo. Rihayi Ki Tamanna, Mar Chuki Hai. Ye Zindaa Meri Manzil, Akhri Hai. Magar, Baba Se Kehna. Aba Ana Shaam Aana.

Arey O, Shaam-E Walo. Kafan, Baba Ko Day Do. Arey O, Shaam-E Walo.

tracks.title: Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula
tracks.lyrics:
Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula

_

(Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula) X5

Dil Me Sajaa Ke Rakha Hai

(Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula) X2

Dil Me Sajaa Ke Rakha Hai

(Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula) X2 Har Maula-E Kehta Hai (Ya Ali Maula, Haider
Maula) X2

  1. (Bigri Banaa De Aye Sawali, Koyi Na Jaaye Khali) X2 Aaje Gadiri Jaame Pilaa De (Ay Waliyo Ke Wali) X2 Teri Ankhe Mere Mawla (Subko Dekhne Wali) X2 Chashme Karam Ne Teri Mawla, Gamse Bachaa Ke Rakha Hai

(Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula) X2 Har Maula Ye Kehta Hai (Ya Ali Maula, Haider
Maula) X2

  2. (Nagri, Nagri, Tere Mawali, Tere Kalandar Mawla) X2 Dharti Dharti Tere Gadagar (Fakhra Tawangar Mawla) X2 Be Dar Tere Dar Pe Akar (Hogaye Buzar Mawla) X2 Apna Wazifa Nade Ali Ko, Subne Banaa Ke Rakha Hai

(Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula) X2 Har Maula Ye Kehta Hai (Ya Ali Maula, Haider
Maula) X2

  3. (Pir Fakir Malang Mawali, Aur Kalander Saai) X2 Kambar Mesum Buzar Salman (Malik-E Ashtar Aae) X2 Karte Rahe Hai Karte Rahe Hai (Haider, Haider Saae) X2 Aaj Bhi Sindne Mawla Kadam Ko, Sar Pe Utha Ke Rakha Hai

(Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula) X2 Har Maula Ye Kehta Hai (Ya Ali Maula, Haider
Maula) X2

  4. (Tera Nara Sunke Mushkil, Mushkil Me Parja Ye) X2 Dushman-E Imaan Dekh Kar Tujko (Dharti Me Gar Jaye) X2 Lakho Ke Lashkar Se Mawla (Tanha Tu Larjaye) X2 Tere Khuda Ne Tujko Apni Teg Bana Ke Rakha Hai

(Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula) X2 Har Maula Ye Kehta Hai (Ya Ali Maula, Haider
Maula) X2

  5. (Tera Ghar Noorani Mawla, Ghar He Tera Noorani) X2 Tere Ghar Me Jo Surat He (Surat He Qurani) X2 Tu Kule Imaane Mawla (Zikr-E Tere Imaani) X2 Rabne Tere Nam Se Apna Naam-E Mila Ke Rakha Hai

(Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula) X2 Har Maula Ye Kehta Hai (Ya Ali Maula, Haider
Maula) X2

  6. (Tere Sakhi Darbar He Mawla, Sari Duniya Jaane) X2 Koi Khuda Kehta Hai Koi (Saki Ye Kausar Mane) X2 Koi Nahi Pehchana Tujko (Sirf Nabi Pehchane) X2 Shehr Ilm Ne Tujko Apna, Darjo Banaa Ke Rakha Hai

(Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula) X2 Har Maula Ye Kehta Hai (Ya Ali Maula, Haider
Maula) X2

  7. (Malik-E Kausar, Malik-E Janat, Waris-E Quran Hoke) X2 Ik Ek Bhund Ko Nehre Kinaare (Tere Bache Tar Se) X2 Jalgaya Khayme, Lut Gaya Saman (Chin Gayi Chadar Sar Se) X2 Dil Ko Tere Karbobala Ne, Haye Dukha Ke Rakha Hai

(Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula) X2 Har Maula Ye Kehta Hai (Ya Ali Maula, Haider
Maula) X2

  8. (Karbobla Ne Ath Peher Me, Kya Manzar Dikhlaya) X2 Fatema Zehra Ne Markad Me (Ek Pal Chayn Na Paya) X2 Lash Pe Tere Lal Ki Mawla (Goro Ko Doraya) X2 Neze Par Tere Pyaaro Ke, Sar Ke Utha Ke Rakha Hai

(Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula) X2 Har Maula Ye Kehta Hai (Ya Ali Maula, Haider
Maula) X2 Har Maula Ye Kehta Hai (Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula) X2

Dil Me Basaa Ke Rakha Hai

(Ya Ali Maula, Haider Maula) X2 Dil Me Basaa Ke Rakhe Hai (Ya Ali Maula,
Haider Maula) X2

tracks.title: Aao Ek Kaam Kare
tracks.lyrics:
Aao Ek Kaam Kare

_

(Ay Mere Desh-E Ke Logo Meri Awaaz Suno. Meri Awaaz-E Me Maktal Ka Ye Aghaaz
Suno) X2 (Kya Khabar Tum Na Raho) X2 Kya Khabar Ham Na Rahe

(Ao Ek Kaam Kare, Karbala Aam Kare) X2

  1. Jis Tarha Saniye Zehra Ne Ise Aam Kiya. Ik-E Zanjir-E Ki Jankar Ne Wo Kaam Kiya. Jis Tarha Se Shohada Ne Safar-E Sham Kiya. Yani Nezo Se Bulandor Bhi Islam Kiya. Ham Isi Darse Qayadat Ki Ada Aam Kare. (Kya Khabar Tum Na Raho) X2 Kya Khabar Ham Na Rahe

(Ao Ek Kaam Kare, Karbala Aam Kare) X2

  2. Ye Jo Majlis He Madawa Hay Har Ek Gham Ke Liye. Ek Sawghat He Ye Bidaye Purnam Ke Liye. Soze Dil Chahiya Tezib Muharram Ke Liye. Koyi Tafreeq-E Nahi Halkae Matam Ke Liye. Rone Walo Ke Liye Farsh-E Aza Aam Kare (Kya Khabar Tum Na Raho) X2 Kya Khabar Ham Na Rahe

(Ao Ek Kaam Kare, Karbala Aam Kare) X2

  3. Ao Dekho Ke Ye Khayma Ye Alam Kiska Hai. Khoon Se Naam Ye Sehra Pe Rakam Kiska Ka Hai. Ab Bhi Tarik Se Aghe Ye Kadam Kiska Hai. Sari Duniya Ko Batade Ke Ye Gham Kiska Hai. Sari Duniya Ke Liye Gham Ki Fiza Aam Kare (Kya Khabar Tum Na Raho) X2 Kya Khabar Ham Na Rahe

(Ao Ek Kaam Kare, Karbala Aam Kare) X2

  4. Tum Bhi Sine Me Ye Gham Leke Chalo Ham Bhi Chale. Tum Bhi Inkar-E Sitam Leke Chalo Ham Bhi Chale. Tum Bhi Hak Ka Ye Hasham Leke Chalo Ham Bhi Chale. Tum Bhi Ghazi Ka Alam Leke Chalo Ham Bhi Chale. Har Zamane Ke Liye Zikre Wafaa Aam Kare. (Kya Khabar Tum Na Raho) X2 Kya Khabar Ham Na Rahe

(Ao Ek Kaam Kare, Karbala Aam Kare) X2

  5. Aisa Ay Jaaz To Tarik-E Ne Dekha Na Suna. Jo Diya Noor Ke Hato Shabe Ashur Buja. Sab Shahido Ke Dilo Me Wo Diya Jake Jala. Aj Bhi Roshni Deta Hai Wohi Ek Diya. Har Andhere Me Wohi Ek Diya Aam Kare. (Kya Khabar Tum Na Raho) X2 Kya Khabar Ham Na Rahe

(Ao Ek Kaam Kare, Karbala Aam Kare) X2

  6. Bad Shabbir Ke Apne Bhi He Aghyaar Bhi Hai. Khandane Bani Hashim Bhi Hai Ansar Bhi Hai. Hur Bhi Hai John Bhi Hai Akbaro Jarrar Bhi Hai. Jane Dene Ke Liye Subho Se Tayyar Bhi Hai. Aise Maktal Ki Fizaa Ko Ba Khuda Aam Kare. (Kya Khabar Tum Na Raho) X2 Kya Khabar Ham Na Rahe

(Ao Ek Kaam Kare, Karbala Aam Kare) X2

  7. Kafela Rehgaya Ik Dashte Bala Me Pyasa. Jinki Miras Thi Kausar Unhe Pani Na Mila. Ye Sabile Unhe Pyaso Se Wafaa He Ba Khuda. Koi Pyaasa Na Rahe Thi Sakina Ki Dua. Har Zamin Par Ye Sakina Ki Dua Aam Kare. (Kya Khabar Tum Na Raho) X2 Kya Khabar Ham Na Rahe

(Ao Ek Kaam Kare, Karbala Aam Kare) X2

  8. Rehnumaa Katle Huwa Katle Kayadat Na Hui. Ik Imam Or Bara Khatm-E Imamat Na Hui. Jisme Rondhe Gaye Pamal Shariat Na Hui. Chadare Chin Gayi Batil Ki Hukumat Na Hui. Ye Muhammad Ke Garane Ki Wafaa Aam Kare. (Kya Khabar Tum Na Raho) X2 Kya Khabar Ham Na Rahe

(Ao Ek Kaam Kare, Karbala Aam Kare) X2

  9. Mere Mawla Mere Aka Ye Tera Gham Na Ruke. Kitne Tufaan Bhi Hilalaaye Magar Ham Na Ruke. Ay Azadar Ye Majlis Ye Muharram Na Ruke. Wakt-E Kitna Hi Badal Jaye Ye Matam Na Ruke. Ye Shahido Ka He Matam Ba Khuda Aam Kare. (Kya Khabar Tum Na Raho) X2 Kya Khabar Ham Na Rahe

(Ao Ek Kaam Kare, Karbala Aam Kare) X2

tracks.title: Mein Yeh Nahi Kehti
tracks.lyrics:
Jane Lage Shabbir To Sughra Ne Kaha. Le Chalo Mujko Bhi Bimar Tumhe Dengi Dua.
Ho Jaana Khafaraha Me Gar Rowengi Sughra. Ya Ninde Kab Aati Hai, Jo Wa Soyengi
Sughra. Baba. Baba. Tanhiyi Sazaa Hai Muje, Aisi Na Sazaa Do. Mein Yeh Nahi
Kehti Ke, Amaari Me Bitha Do.

(Mein Yeh Nahi Kehti Ke, Amaari Me Bitha Do) X2

  1. Baba. Baba. Baba Muje Fiza Ki Sawari Me Bitha Do

(Mein Yeh Nahi Kehti Ke, Amaari Me Bitha Do) X2

  2. Sab Bethe Sawari Pe, Me Pedal Hi Chalungi. Wada Hai Kisi Ko Koyi, Taklif Na Dungi. Baba. Baba. Amaa Se Me Har Giz Na Kahungi Ke Dawaa Do.

(Mein Yeh Nahi Kehti Ke, Amaari Me Bitha Do) X2

  3. Palko Se Me Saya Ali Asghar Ke Karungi. Amaa Ki Sawari Se, Bahot Dur Rahungi. Baba. Baba. Ha Kehke Meri Jist Ke Kuch Roz Barhado.

(Mein Yeh Nahi Kehti Ke, Amaari Me Bitha Do) X2

  4. Me Pani Pilawungi, Sawaari Ko Tumhari. Behlawungi Raste Me, Sakina Ko Tumhari. Baba. Baba. Jo Kam Kanizo Ki Hai, Sab Mujko Bataa Do

(Mein Yeh Nahi Kehti Ke, Amaari Me Bitha Do) X2

  5. Sab Nazre Churaate Hai, Koi Dam Nahi Bharta. Sach Hai Koi Murde Se, Muhabbat Nahi Karta. Baba. Baba. Tawkire Meri Ye Hai, To Marne Ki Dua Do.

(Mein Yeh Nahi Kehti Ke, Amaari Me Bitha Do) X2

  6. Kya Guzrengi Jab Garse, Chale Jayenge Akbar. Kaise Muje Har Baat Me Yaad Ayenge Akbar. Baba. Baba. Kab Ayenge Lene Muje, Bhaya Ye Bataa Do.

(Mein Yeh Nahi Kehti Ke, Amaari Me Bitha Do) X2

  7. Ha Apni Muhabbat Ka Me, Izhaar To Karlu. Thehro Ali Asger Ko, Zaraa Pyaare To Karlu. Baba. Baba. Na Kaise Jalak Nane Musafir Ki Dikhado.

(Mein Yeh Nahi Kehti Ke, Amaari Me Bitha Do) X2

  8. Baba. Baba. Baba Muje Fiza Ki Sawari Me Bitha Do

(Mein Yeh Nahi Kehti Ke, Amaari Me Bitha Do) X2

tracks.title: Ya Zehra
tracks.lyrics:
Ya Zehra

_

Ya Fatema Zehra (Ya Zehra) X8 Ma Dardo Jahan Fatema Jan Dil Bado Basti
(Muhibaan Du Hasti) X2

Ma Dardo Jahan Fatema Jan Dil Bado Basti. Muhibaan Do Hasti.

Muhibaan Do Hasti.

  1. (Ay Umme Abhi Haa) X2 (Ay Umme Faki Haa) X2 Ay Umme Abhi Habajaza Bager Ye Dasti (Muhibaan Do Hasti) X2

Ma Dardo Jahan Fatema Jan Dil Bado Basti. Muhibaan Do Hasti.

Muhibaan Do Hasti.

  2. Ummide Shifa Azze Tu Ay Fatema Zehra. Khatune Jina Warise Tathir Sarafaa. Ashrafe Nisaa Akse Nabi Abde Hudayda. Mizane Wafaa Ruhe Dua Fatema Zehra. Ya Fatema Zehra, Ya Fatema Zehra

Ma Dardo Jahan Fatema Jan Dil Bado Basti. Muhibaan Do Hasti.

Muhibaan Do Hasti.

  3. Uftaade Dare Khaana Tora Pehlu Shakista. Ummat Ne Tera Hak Na Diya Fatema Zehra. Mohsin Ki Shahadat Ka Sabab Ban Gayi Duniya. Virsa Hai Tera Ashke Azaa Fatema Zehra. Ya Fatema Zehra, Ya Fatema Zehra

Ma Dardo Jahan Fatema Jan Dil Bado Basti. Muhibaan Do Hasti.

Muhibaan Do Hasti.

  4. Ay Ashke Fisha Bada Nabi Binte Payambar. Tha Sog Me Baba Ke Azaa Khana Tera Ghar. Rote The Tere Sath Ali Sawaro Shabbar. Ay Khasta Jigar Mehre Bukaa Fatema Zehra. Ya Fatema Zehra, Ya Fatema Zehra

Ma Dardo Jahan Fatema Jan Dil Bado Basti. Muhibaan Do Hasti.

Muhibaan Do Hasti.

  5. Dar Karbobala Tishna Labi Tere Pisar Ki. Ta Raj Huwi Kistarha Zehra Tere Gar Ki. Begoro Kafan Lash Rahi Noore Nazar Ki. Alam Ba Khuda Sog Me Tha Fatema Zehra. Ya Fatema Zehra, Ya Fatema Zehra

Ma Dardo Jahan Fatema Jan Dil Bado Basti. Muhibaan Do Hasti.

Muhibaan Do Hasti.

  6. Bacho Pe Tere Foje Sitamgar Ki Alghar. Zanjir Bakaf Toke Gara Abide Bimar. Darbare Alam Kayde Sitam Dukhtare Ghamkwar. Ada Ke Sitam Kunba Tera Fatema Zehra. Ya Fatema Zehra, Ya Fatema Zehra

Ma Dardo Jahan Fatema Jan Dil Bado Basti. Muhibaan Do Hasti.

Muhibaan Do Hasti.

(Ya Zehra) X8

tracks.title: Kulsum Ne Mehmil Ke Jo Parde Ko Uthaya
tracks.lyrics:
(Yasrab Nazar Aaya) X4

Kulsum Ne Mehmil Ke Jo Parde Ko Uthaya

(Yasrab Nazar Aaya) X2

Kulsum Ne Mehmil Ke Jo Parde Ko Uthaya

(Yasrab Nazar Aaya) X2

(Apna Tha Watan Aur) X3

Paraya Nazar Aaya

Kulsum Ne Mehmil Ke Jo Parde Ko Uthaya

Apna Tha Watan Aur

Paraya Nazar Aaya

(Yasrab Nazar Aaya) X2

1. Mun Dhamp Ke Rone Lagi Ahmed Ki Nawaasi,

Viraan Taro Baam The Allah Ki Udasi,

(Ujra Bani Hashim Ka) X3

Mehella Nazar Aaya

Kulsum Ne Mehmil Ke Jo Parde Ko Uthaya

Apna Tha Watan Aur

Paraya Nazar Aaya

(Yasrab Nazar Aaya) X2

2. Wo Galiya Jaha Awno Muhammad Kabhi Khele,

Abdulla Wahaa Phirte The Khamosh Akele,

(Har Simt Me Bacho Ka) X3

Sarapa Nazar Aaya

Kulsum Ne Mehmil Ke Jo Parde Ko Uthaya

Apna Tha Watan Aur

Paraya Nazar Aaya

(Yasrab Nazar Aaya) X2

3. Sugra Ne Khabar Payi Ke Lawt Aaye Musafir,

Khush Hogayi Roze Pe Nabi Ke Koyi Hazir

(Kya Socha Tha Sugra Ne) X3

Use Kya Nazar Aaya

Kulsum Ne Mehmil Ke Jo Parde Ko Uthaya

Apna Tha Watan Aur

Paraya Nazar Aaya

(Yasrab Nazar Aaya) X2

4. Ujri Huwi Har Maang Ti Har God Thi Khali,

Asger Ka Shalo Ka Tha Sakina Ki Thi Baali,

(Abbas Ka Parcham Bhi) X3

Akela Nazar Aaya

Kulsum Ne Mehmil Ke Jo Parde Ko Uthaya

Apna Tha Watan Aur

Paraya Nazar Aaya

(Yasrab Nazar Aaya) X2

5. Jis Waqt Ruki Nana Ke Roze Pe Amaari,

Na Khese Giri Khak Pe Wo Dard Ki Maari,

(Rota Huwa Nana Ka) X3

Jo Chehra Nazar Aaya

Kulsum Ne Mehmil Ke Jo Parde Ko Uthaya

Apna Tha Watan Aur

Paraya Nazar Aaya

(Yasrab Nazar Aaya) X2

6. Sugra Ne Kaha Amaa Se Kyu God Hai Khali,

Kis Aaha Bhari Banu Ne Kuch Moo Se Na Boli,

(Rone Lagi Jalta Huwa) X3

Jula Nazar Aaya

Kulsum Ne Mehmil Ke Jo Parde Ko Uthaya

Apna Tha Watan Aur

Paraya Nazar Aaya

(Yasrab Nazar Aaya) X2

7. Bin Bhayi Ke Dakhil Huwi Jo Apne Hi Gar Me,

Gash Aagaya Takat Na Rahi Kalbo Jigar Mein,

(Be Goro Kafan Bhayi Ka) X3

Laasha Nazar Aaya

Kulsum Ne Mehmil Ke Jo Parde Ko Uthaya

Apna Tha Watan Aur

Paraya Nazar Aaya

(Yasrab Nazar Aaya) X2

8. Ujre Me Nazar Aaye Nahi Qasimo Akber,

Kehne Lagi Mein Chor Gayi Thi Ye Bhara Gar,

(Har Kabr Ke Mahol Mein) X3

Dhalta Nazar Aaya

Kulsum Ne Mehmil Ke Jo Parde Ko Uthaya

Apna Tha Watan Aur

Paraya Nazar Aaya

(Yasrab Nazar Aaya) X2

9. Bistar To Waha Awno Muhammad Ke Saje The,

Aur Taak Mein Asgher Ke Khilone Bhi Rakhe The,

(Lekin Na Koyi Khelne) X3

Waala Nazar Aaya

Kulsum Ne Mehmil Ke Jo Parde Ko Uthaya

Apna Tha Watan Aur

Paraya Nazar Aaya

(Yasrab Nazar Aaya) X2

tracks.title: Karbela Na Bhulenge
tracks.lyrics:
Karbela Na Bhulenge

_

(Bhul Jayenge Har Gham) X2

Gham Tera Na Bhulenge

(Karbela Na Bhulenge) X2

(Karbela Na Bhulenge) X2

1. (Bhul Jayenge Har Gham) X3

Gham Tera Na Bhulenge

(Karbela Na Bhulenge) X4

2. Kaise Bhul Jaye Maktale Hussain Ko,

(Kaise Bhul Jaye Fatema Ke Bain Ko) X2

(Ba Khuda Na Bhulenge) X3

Gham Tera Na Bhulenge

(Karbela Na Bhulenge) X4

3. Wo Sitam Wo Zulm Wo Jaffa Ke Silsilay,

(Al Kama Ke Samene Khayam Jal Gaye) X2

(Nainawa Na Bhulenge) X3

Gham Tera Na Bhulenge

(Karbela Na Bhulenge) X4

4. Jis Jaga Hussain Ka Jawaa Huwa Shahid,

(Jis Jaga Huwa Tha Ek Be Zubaan Shahid) X2

(Wo Jaga Na Bhulenge) X3

Gham Tera Na Bhulenge

(Karbela Na Bhulenge) X4

5. Wo Lahu Bhara Alam Wo Mashk Khun Bhari,

(Intizar Aab Me Sakina Margayi) X2

(Majera Na Bhulenge) X3

Gham Tera Na Bhulenge

(Karbela Na Bhulenge) X4

6. Khun Rowe Jiske Gham Me Umre Bhar Imam,

(Laygayi Thi Lut Ke Rida Jo Foje Shaam) X2

(Wo Ridaa Na Bhulenge) X3

Gham Tera Na Bhulenge

(Karbela Na Bhulenge) X4

7. As Salaam Karbela Ke Khak As Salaam,

(As Salaam Dafn Jisme Paak As Salaam) X2

(Ye Sadaa Na Bhulenge) X3

Gham Tera Na Bhulenge

(Karbela Na Bhulenge) X4

8. (Bhul Jayenge Har Gham) X3

Gham Tera Na Bhulenge

tracks.title: Utho Hussain
tracks.lyrics:
Utho Hussain

_

Ye Me Hu Me Meri Tanhayi. Ye Tamashayi. Lo Ayi Gyaara Muharram Hai.

Kya Khabar Layi. Chali Ye Janibe Zindan Tumhari Maa Jayi.

Sawaar-E Ham Ne Kiya Tha Tumhe Mere Bhayi.

1. (Ab Awo Ya Mujhe Kehdo Na Intizaare Karo) X3

(Utho Hussaine Bahan Ko Zara Sawaare Karo) X2

2. Sawar Hum Ne Kiya Tha, Tumhe Dame Rukhsat,

Lagaam Thaam Thi Maine, Bahaa Late Rikat,

Kahaa Gayi Wo Muhabat, Kahaa Gayi Chahat,

(Tamam Apna Mere Sarpe, Saaya Baar Karo) X2

(Utho Hussaine Bahan Ko Zara Sawaare Karo) X2

3. Watan Se Door Hu Kuch Aur, Door Jaati Hu,

Utho Utho Mere Bhaya, Tumhe Jagaa Ti Hu,

Koyi Bhi Aata Nahi Mai, Jise Bulaa Ti Hu,

(Karaar Jab Mere Mujko Na, Bekaraar Karo) X2

(Utho Hussaine Bahan Ko Zara Sawaare Karo) X2

4. Safar Madine Se Kaisa Tha, Ye Safar Kya Hai,

Na Mehmile He Na Haudaj, Na Koi Parda Hai,

Ay Sar Mein Khwab Ye Karbobala Ka Sehra Hai,

(Na Jee Sakungi Tere Baad, Etebar Karo) X2

(Utho Hussaine Bahan Ko Zara Sawaare Karo) X2

5. Dare Furat Pe Ay Sone, Wali Jaag Zaraa,

Alam Ke Saye Me Rukhsat, Bahan Ko Kar Bhaya,

Suna Hai Sakht Kathan Hai, Ye Sham Ka Rasta,

(Sehen Ye Raasta Abbas Se, Naamdaar Karo) X2

(Utho Hussaine Bahan Ko Zara Sawaare Karo) X2

6. Mein Awoongi Mere Bhaya, Zuroor Awoongi,

Kafan Urhawungi Markad, Tera Banawoongi,

Jahaa Bhi Jawoongi Farshe, Azaa Bichaawoongi,

(Mein Kayd Kaat Ke Lot Awoo, Intizar Karo) X2

(Utho Hussaine Bahan Ko Zara Sawaare Karo) X2

7. (Ab Awo Ya Mujhe Kehdo Na Intizaare Karo) X2

tracks.title: Shahzada Akbara
tracks.lyrics:
(Shahzada-E-Akbara) X4

Shazada Akbara Laasha Pase Loona Waktano Bahaarde

(Shahzada-E-Akbara) X4

Shazada Akbara Laasha Pase Loona Waktano Bahaarde

(Shahzada-E-Akbara) X2 Shazada Akbara Laasha Pase Loona (Waktano Bahaarde) X2

  1. Khat Liktee Hai Sughra. Bhaiyya Watan Aaja Waktano Bahaarde

(Shahzada-E-Akbara) X2 Shazada Akbara Laasha Pase Loona (Waktano Bahaarde) X2

  2. (Khat Liktee Hoo Ashko Se Bheega Hai Mera Daman) X3 Aaja Ke Bahar Aee Sona Hai Mera Aangan. Ai Bhai Khuda Ra Laasha Pase Loona Waktano Bahaarde

(Shahzada-E-Akbara) X2 Shazada Akbara Laasha Pase Loona (Waktano Bahaarde) X2

  3. (Phir Goonje Aza Teree Nana Ke Madiney Me) X3 Phir Bharte Khuda Bhaiiya Thandak Mere Seeney Me. Poora Karo Waada Laasha Pase Loona Waktano Bahaarde

(Shahzada-E-Akbara) X2 Shazada Akbara Laasha Pase Loona (Waktano Bahaarde) X2

  4. (Dekoo Me Tera Sehra Dulhan Teree Ghar Aey) X3 Deedar Tera Bhaiiya Pus Neg Me Miljaye. Aanchal Mera Pela Laasha Pase Loona Waktano Bahaarde

(Shahzada-E-Akbara) X2 Shazada Akbara Laasha Pase Loona (Waktano Bahaarde) X2

  5. (Beemar Bahan Rowe Kya Tum Ko Gawara Hai) X3 Bhaiiya Teree Furkat Ne Bin Maut Se Maraa Hai. Kehtee Hai Yeh Behnaa Laasha Pase Loona Waktano Bahaarde

(Shahzada-E-Akbara) X2 Shazada Akbara Laasha Pase Loona (Waktano Bahaarde) X2

  6. (Gul Khilne Ki Rut Aee Pardesi Mere Bhai) X3 Tum Door Watan Se Ho Mehoo Meree Tanhaee. Tarpao Na Bhaiiya Laasha Pase Loona Waktano Bahaarde

(Shahzada-E-Akbara) X2 Shazada Akbara Laasha Pase Loona (Waktano Bahaarde) X2

  7. Khat Liktee Hai Sughra. Bhaiyya Watan Aaja Waktano Bahaarde

(Shahzada-E-Akbara) X2 Shazada Akbara Laasha Pase Loona (Waktano Bahaarde) X2

tracks.title: Jaise Pinjre Me Ho Panchi
tracks.lyrics:
Sabr Kaise Ho Rehano Sarwar, Hum To Aaye He Khud Shaam Ho Kar, Aaj Bhi Shaam
Dhalti He Jab Bhi, Ek Sadaa Kaat Thi He Kaleja, Aawo Baba Jaan.

(Jaise Pinjre Me Ho Koi Panchi, Aise Zindaan-E Me Hai Sakina) X2

  1. Kabhi Amaa Ke Pehlu Me Rona, Kabhi Bhaiya Se Apne Lipat Na. Kabhi Takrana Diwaro Darse Kabhi Zindaa Ke Darpe Ye Kehna. Aawo Baba Jaan.

(Jaise Pinjre Me Ho Koi Panchi, Aise Zindaan-E Me Hai Sakina) X2

  2. Aise Takra Ti Phir Ti Thi Bachi (Jese Pinjre Me Zakhmi Ho Panchi) X2 Kaise Tare Kafus Tor Dale, Ho Rihaai Ka Koi Kareena. Aawo Baba Jaan.

(Jaise Pinjre Me Ho Koi Panchi, Aise Zindaan-E Me Hai Sakina) X2

  3. Mot-E Se Pehle Ajaawo Baba (Ye Sakina Pe Ehsaan Hoga) X2 Baad Mere Na Baba Ye Kehna Mene Tumko Pukaara Nahi Tha. Aawo Baba Jaan.

(Jaise Pinjre Me Ho Koi Panchi, Aise Zindaan-E Me Hai Sakina) X2

  4. Ae Phuphi Ab Mera Dil He Kehta (Mujko Miljayenga Mera Baba) X2 Dadi Zehra Ki Mano Kahaani, Milgaya Tha Suna Ran Ka Beta. Aawo Baba Jaan.

(Jaise Pinjre Me Ho Koi Panchi, Aise Zindaan-E Me Hai Sakina) X2

  5. Hogayi Khair-E Aayaa Na Asghar (Wo To Marjataa Zindaa Me Gutkar) X2 Kaise Sota Andhere Me Bhaiya, Qaid-E Hojataa Zindaa Me Jule. Aawo Baba Jaan.

(Jaise Pinjre Me Ho Koi Panchi, Aise Zindaan-E Me Hai Sakina) X2

  6. Haye Khun Me Bhara Sar Jo Ayaa (Baap Ke Sarse Beti Ne Pucha) X2 Mu Pe Mu Rakh Ke Sona Sakungi, He Kaha Mere Baba Ke Sina. Aawo Baba Jaan.

(Jaise Pinjre Me Ho Koi Panchi, Aise Zindaan-E Me Hai Sakina) X2

tracks.title: Raj Matam Kar
tracks.lyrics:
Ye Shame Ghariba Hai. Bin Chadar Zainab Roti Hai, Khaymo Ka Salayaa Karti Hai.
Dekha Ke Sawaar Ke Ata Hai. Samji Koi Lutne Ataa Hai. Zainab Ki Awaaz Ayi. Ke
Rukje Sawaar Tu, Dukhe Dil Pe Karta Hai War Kyu. Wo Aane Wala Ye Bol Utha
Pehchane Me Baba Hu Tera. Pehchane Ke, Pehchane Ke Baba Ko Zainab Gayi Bibiyo
Ki Janib Zainab. Are Meda Baba Aya Hai Bibiyo, Koyi Chadar Sirpe Dalne (Koi
Chadar Sirpe Dalne) X3 Me Baba Ali Aaha Zainab. Me Baba Ali Aaha Zainab. Meri
Sine Lag Gabra Nai.

(Ha Raj Matam Kar Gabra Nay) X4

  1. Me Baba Ali Aaha Zainab. Kar Matam Kar Gabra Nay.

(Ha Raj Matam Kar Gabra Nay) X3

  2. (Meri Zainab Meri Jaan Hai Tu, Mere Kunbe Ka Arman Bhi Tu) X2 Mere Kunbe Ka Arman Hai Tu (Yu Gut Gut Ke Na Ro Zainab) X2 Kar Matam Kar Gabra Nay.

(Ha Raj Matam Kar Gabra Nay) X3

  3. (Tu Sabir Sayyide Zadi Hai. Konayn Ki Tu Shehzadi Hai) X2 Konayn Ki Tu Shehzadi Hai (Tu Tarsi Lagti Hai Matam Ki) X2 Kar Matam Kar Gabra Nay.

(Ha Raj Matam Kar Gabra Nay) X3

  4. (Ye Karbal Desh Paraaya Hai. Be Gour Tera Maa Jaaya Hai) X2 Be Gour Tera Maa Jaaya Hai (Ye Shame Ghariba Hai Zainab) X2 Kar Matam Kar Gabra Nay.

(Ha Raj Matam Kar Gabra Nay) X3

  5. (Aathaara Baradar Wali Tu, Aaik Chadar Ki Hai Sawali Tu) X2 Aaik Chadar Ki Hai Sawali Tu (Kya Haal Hua Tera Zainab) X2 Kar Matam Kar Gabra Nay.

(Ha Raj Matam Kar Gabra Nay) X3

  6. (Akbar Ki Maut Ne Maar Diya, Seena Hai Tera Zakhmo Se Bhara) X2 Seena Hai Tera Zakhmo Se Bhara (Teri Chadar Loot Gayee Karbal Mei) X2 Kar Matam Kar Gabra Nay.

(Ha Raj Matam Kar Gabra Nay) X3

tracks.title: Zindan Se Rihaa
tracks.lyrics:
(Haye Hussaina) X6

(Zindan Se Rihaa Hogaye Sadaat) X3

  1. (Allah Ye Kya Hogaye Sadaat) X3 Kuch Karbobala Hogaye Sadaat

(Zindan Se Rihaa Hogaye Sadaat) X2

  2. (Ye Kaysi Rihaayi He Ke Dil Khush Nahi Hota) X2 (Kya Rehgayaa Zindaan Me Ke Har Qaydi Hai Rota) X2 Ho Apni Sakina Se Judaa Hote Hai Sadaat. Allah, Mere Allah

(Zindan Se Rihaa Hogaye Sadaat) X2

  3. (Ay Shamiyo Ab Chayn Se Araam Se Sona) X2 (Be Chayn Karenga Na Kisi Bachi Ka Rona) X2 Jo Shaks Wo Bukaa Karti Thi Rowengi Kabhi Maa. Allah, Mere Allah

(Zindan Se Rihaa Hogaye Sadaat) X2

  4. (Zainab Ne Kaha Qayd Me Hai Mera Khazana) X2 (Ay Aurto Jab Shaam Chale Is Taraf Anaa) X2 Gurbat Pe Sakina Ki Piya Ret Jalaa Na. Allah Mere Allah

(Zindan Se Rihaa Hogaye Sadaat) X2

  5. (Sajjad Pe Zewar Jo Asiri Ke Utare) X2 (Sukhe Huwe Sab Zakhm Har Ik Kho Gaye Sare) X2 Sar Dekh Ke Baba Ka Tarap Kar Wo Pukaare. Allah Mere Allah

(Zindan Se Rihaa Hogaye Sadaat) X2

  6. (Zainab Ne Ridaa Pak Kaha Shukr Khudaa Hai) X2 (Abbas Mere Bhayi Magar Sadma Baraa Hai) X2 Sar Nange Hame Saraa Jahaa Dekhta Hai. Allah Mere Allah

(Zindan Se Rihaa Hogaye Sadaat) X2

  7. (Mazloom Jo Ik Lafz Abhi Tashnagi Boli) X2 (Is Lafz Rasan Bazu Ki Sajjad Ne Kholi) X2 Kehne Lagi Kya Jaaye Watan Khali Hai Joli. Allah Mere Allah

(Zindan Se Rihaa Hogaye Sadaat) X2

  8. (Ye Kafla Jab Karbobala Lot Ke Aya) X2 (Dekha Ke Para Doop Me Hai Bhayi Ka Lahsa) X2 Zainab Ne Sare Khaak Balaa Khud Ko Giraaya. Allah Mere Allah

(Zindan Se Rihaa Hogaye Sadaat) X2

  9. (Kya Shaan Thi Sadaat Ki Jab Ghar Se Chale The) X2 (Mehmil Thi Amari Thi Mashkize Bhare The) X2 Abbas-E-Alamdar Alam Khole Huwe The. Allah Mere Allah

(Zindan Se Rihaa Hogaye Sadaat) X2

  10. (Galiyo Me Madine Ki Ajab Shor Bapaa Hai) X2 (Sughra Se Abhi Aake Kisi Ne Ye Kaha Hai) X2 Aa Sughra Tera Baba Watan Lot Raha Hai. Allah Mere Allah

(Zindan Se Rihaa Hogaye Sadaat) X2

tracks.title: Ek Pyaase Ki Jung Dekho
tracks.lyrics:
Roze Ashoor Hai. Zuljanah Par Sawaar. Ghum Ka Seene Pei Haar. Kown Maqtal Mein
Aata Hai Parwardigaar. Dil Mein Bhaayi Ka Beton Ka Apno Ka Gham. Sehra Ha Hai
Musalsal Sitam Par Sitam. Khoon Mein Duba Libaas-E-Ghareebi Liye. Ran Mein
Dekho Hussain Aa Raha Hai. Khushk Honto Se Sukhi Zabaan Se. Jo Sada Pe Sada De
Rahaa Hai.

Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Aawo Maqtal Mein Aawo. (Ek Pyaase Ki Jung Dekho)
X2 (Allahu Akbar Allahu Akbar) X2

  1. Naam Mere Khuda Ka Raheyga. Qalma-E-Laa Ilaaha Raheyga. Deen Qur'aan Kaaba Raheyga. Mera Islaam Zinda Raheyga. Tegh Meri Qaza Mein Dhali Hai. Mere Baazu Mein Zoor-E-Ali Hai.

Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Aawo Maqtal Mein Aawo. (Ek Pyaase Ki Jung Dekho)
X2 (Allahu Akbar Allahu Akbar) X2

  2. Karbala Haq Ki Taaqat Raheygi. Ye Lahu Ki Tamazat Raheygi. Meri Dharti Ki Izzat Raheygi. Mere Parcham Ki Hurmat Raheygi. Khatm Ho Jaayegi Har Ghulaami. Mujhko Tareekh Degi Salaami.

Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Aawo Maqtal Mein Aawo. (Ek Pyaase Ki Jung Dekho)
X2 (Allahu Akbar Allahu Akbar) X2

  3. Tum Ho Sairaab Aur Mein Hun Pyaasa. Tum Hazaron Ho Aur Mein Hun Tanha. Margaya Hai Jawaan Bhaai Mera. Le Gaya Nur Aankhon Ka Beta. Jung Ka Naam Ab Tum Na Loge. Kyaa Ali Aagaye Ye Kahoge.

Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Aawo Maqtal Mein Aawo. (Ek Pyaase Ki Jung Dekho)
X2 (Allahu Akbar Allahu Akbar) X2

  4. Khoon Kyun Aadmi Ka Bahayen. Amn Ke Phool Har Jaa Khilayen. Saari Insaniyat Ko Jagayen. Zulm Se Haan Magar Haath Uthaayen. Tum Ne Majboor Mujh Ko Kiya Hai. Ab Meri Tegh-O-Amr-E-Khuda Hai.

Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Aawo Maqtal Mein Aawo. (Ek Pyaase Ki Jung Dekho)
X2 (Allahu Akbar Allahu Akbar) X2

  5. Wo Jo Laashon Pe Laashe Uthaaye. Ek Katra Jo Paani Na Paaye. Jis Ka Ghora Bhi Thakkar Karaa Hai. Jung Us Ki Hazaron Se Haaye. Phir Bhi Jinn-O-Malak Jung Dekhe. Arsh Waale Meri Jung Dekhe.

Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Aawo Maqtal Mein Aawo. (Ek Pyaase Ki Jung Dekho)
X2 (Allahu Akbar Allahu Akbar) X2

  6. Mere Baba Ali Aa Chuke Hain. Mere Bhaya Hasan Aa Chuke Hai. Daad Abbas Bhi De Rahen Hain. Mujh Ko Akbar Mere Dekhte Hain. Dar-E-Khayma Pe Behne Khari Hain. Amma Zahra Dua De Rahi Hai.

Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Aawo Maqtal Mein Aawo. (Ek Pyaase Ki Jung Dekho)
X2 (Allahu Akbar Allahu Akbar) X2

  7. Jab Kiya Parh Ke Takbeer Hamla. Shoor Uthne Laga Al Amaan Ka. Shola-E-Zulfiqaar Aisa Chamka. Paaon Tak Khoon Mein Duba Tha Ghora. Ran Mein Uth Ne Lagi Khoon Ki Mowjein. Jaa Ke Kufe Se Takraayi Fowjein.

Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Shaamiyon Aawo Maqtal Mein Aawo. (Ek Pyaase Ki Jung Dekho)
X2 (Allahu Akbar Allahu Akbar) X2

  8. Jab Ye Dekha Falak Se Ye Manzar. Bola Jibreel Se Rabb-E-Akbar. Kehdo Shabbir Se Ab Ye Jaakar. Imtehaa Khatm Hai Ibne Haider. Mutmain Nafs Waale Palat Aa. Rab Tera Tujhse Raazi Huwa. Tera Zaakir Hai Tera Khudaa. Ay Hussain Irjaaee Ay Hussain Irjaaee. Irjaeee Marhaba. Shor Raihaan-O-Sarwar Uthaa. Asr-E Aashoor Ka Waqt Tha. Aa Rahi Thi Azaan Ki Sadaa. Sheh Ne Sajde Mein Sar Rakhdiyaa.

Ya Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

tracks.title: Koi Ho To Chaale Khudaya
tracks.lyrics:
(Khudaya) X4

Koi Ho To Chale Khudaya. Koi Ho To Chale Istighasa Hai Sar-E-Daar Koi Ho To
Chale Aik Pyaase Pe Hai Yalghaar. Koi Ho To Chale Istighasa Hai Sar-E-Daar

(Koi Ho To Chale) X2

  1. (Qaafile So Gaya Maqtal Mein Sare Shaam Sabhi) X2 Reh Gaya Qaafila Saalar

(Koi Ho To Chale X2)

  2. (Aik Beta Hai Jo Gehwaare Se Utra Naa Kabhi) X2 Doosra Beta Hai Beemar(

Koi Ho To Chale X2)

  3. (Khud Ko Jhule Se Ghira Dete Hai Jaane Waale) X2 Kown Aisa Hai Wafaadar

(Koi Ho To Chale X2)

  4. (Reh Gaya Naizon Ke Jangal Mein Musaffir Tanha) X2 Ye Shahadat Ke Hain Aasar

(Koi Ho To Chale X2)

  5. (Lamha Lamha Ye Sadaa Deti Hai Aashoor Ki Shaam) X2 Beriyan Hoti Hain Tayyar

(Koi Ho To Chale X2)

  6. (Allah Allah Ye Lahu Pehnaye Huwe Tanhaayi) X2 Lut Gayi Kis Ki Ye Sarkaar

(Koi Ho To Chaale X2)

  7. (Ye Hain Naamoos-E-Nabi Khayme Se Kaise Nikle) X2 Kya Kare Saahib-E-Kirdaar

(Koi Ho To Chale X2)

  8. (Jaane Ye Kown Pase Khayma Hai Girya Girya) Hai Koi Is Ka Azaadar

(Koi Ho To Chale X2)

  9. (Jis Tarha Se Dare Zindaan Pe Sakina Ro Eey) X2 Saath Roo-Ay- Daro Deewaar

(Koi Ho To Chale X2)

  10. (Kis Ke Lehje Mein Ali Bol Rahen Hai Logo) X2 Kown Bola Sar-E-Darbaar

(Koi Ho To Chale X2)

  11. (Beriyaan Jis Ki Musibat Pe Lahu Roti Hain) X2 Kown Aaya Sar-E-Baazar

(Koi Ho To Chale X2)

  12. (Jo Ho Us Fawj-E-Mukhaalif Ka Sipahi Na Chale) X2 Han Magar Hur Ka Tarafdaar

(Koi Ho To Chale X2)

  13. (Ye Sadaa Aaj Bhi Maqtal Se Hilal Aati Hai) X2 Kown Haq Ka Hai Talabgaar

(Koi Ho To Chale X2)

Koi Ho To Chale Khudaya Koi Ho To Chale Khudaya

tracks.title: Alam Abbas Ka
tracks.lyrics:
Al Qama Bata

Ay Al Qama Bata

Ay Karbala Bata, Ay Al Qama Bata

Tanha Hussain Dekh, Rahe The Ye Majra

Aya Tha Kis Tarha Say, Tarai Me Ba Wafa

Or Kis Tarha Se Khun May Tar Ho Kai Reh Gaya

(Alam Abbas Ka, Alam Abbas Ka) X2

  1. Ye Wo Alam Hai Jis Say, Shahidon Ki Shaan Hai Qurbanion Ka Naam, Wafaa Ka Nishan Hai Bachon Ki Abroo Hai, Sakina Ki Jaan Hai

(Alam Abbas Ka, Alam Abbas Ka) X2

  2. Lehra Raha Hai Iska Pharera Hawaon Mai Iski Bulandyo Ka Hai Charcha Fizaon Mai Sab Karbala Hai Iskai Phareray Ki Chaon Mai

(Alam Abbas Ka, Alam Abbas Ka) X2

  3. Phaila Huwa Iska Jo Saya Hussain Tak Rasta Isi Ne Sub Ko Dikhaya Hussain Tak Hur Bhi Isi Ko Dekh Kar Aya Hussain Tak

(Alam Abbas Ka, Alam Abbas Ka) X2

  4. Piyaso Ka Is Alam May Safina Bhi Dekhiye Panjay Mai Roshni Ka Khazina Bhi Dekhiya Lipti Hui Hai Mashk-E-Sakina Bhi Dekhiye

(Alam Abbas Ka, Alam Abbas Ka) X2

  5. Dekh Is Alam Kay Saye Mai Yakja Hai Kon Kon Qasim Hai Baheb-E-Kalbiyo Aabis Umairo Oun Akbar Say Khoob Ruke Barabar Kharain Hain John

(Alam Abbas Ka, Alam Abbas Ka) X2

  6. Ghazi Kai Khun Sai Jo Mili Hai Baqa Isay Hazir Ye Iftikhar Rahay Ga Sada Isay Har Dor Main Uthayengay Ahle-E-Aza Isay

(Alam Abbas Ka, Alam Abbas Ka) X2

Bete Bichar Gaye Hain Ye Dil Ko Malal Hai Lakin Bahan Ko Bhai Kai Haq Ka Sawal
Hai Zainab Ko Har Dua Mai Isi Ka Khayal Hai

(Alam Abbas Ka, Alam Abbas Ka) X2

  7. Ay Tashnalab Wafao Kay Darya Salam Lai Har Apne Soghwar Ka Piyasa Salam Lai Ay Karbala Kai Dast-E-Guridan Salam Lai

(Alam Abbas Ka, Alam Abbas Ka) X2

tracks.title: Sakina Kahani Suno
tracks.lyrics:
_

Sakina Kahani Suno_



Siyah Raat Mai

Zindan Ke Dar Pay Ro Ro Kai

Sakina Kehti Hai, Baba Ye Shab Sata Ti Hai

Judaye Aap Ki, Us Par Ye Khak Ka Bistar

Kahin Andhaire Mai Bachon Ko Neend Uraati Hai

Ye Sun Kay Zainab-E-Mazloom Boli Gham Na Karo

Kahani Kehti Hu May Ek, Suno Sakina Suno

Sakina Kahani Suno, Sakina Kahani Suno

  1. Ek Shahanshah Tha, Haye Sakina, Ek Shahanshah Tha, Yasrab Mai Raha Karta Tha, Us Ka Ghar Wo Tha Kay Quran Jahan Utra Tha, Dar Pay Gibreel Ka Darban Raha Karta Tha, Us Ka Angan Bhi Sitaro Say Bhara Rehta Tha, Uskai Darwazai Say Khali Na Koi Ja Ta Tha, Asman Us Ki Sakhawat Ki Qasam Khata Tha

(Haye Sakina Kahani Suno)X2

  2. Uskai Baba Ko Dar-E Ilm Kaha Jata Tha, Maa Nai Shahzadi-E Qawnain Laqab Paya Tha, Us Kai Baiton Mai Nazar Aks-E Nabi Ata Tha, Baitiyon Ko Gule Pakiza Kaha Jata Tha, Us Kai Ek Bhai Ki Rag Rag Mai Wafa Behti Thi, Ek Bahan Sath Me Saye Ki Tarha Rehti Thi

(Haye Sakina Kahani Suno)X2

  3. Ek Din Kia Hoa, Haye Sakina, Ek Din Kia Hoa, Wo Ghar Say Safar Par Nikla, Uska Sab Kunba Bhi Quran Ki Hifazat Ko Chala, Ashkia Nai Usai Pher Dashtai Bala Me Ghaira, Teen Din Tak Use Pani Bhi Mayyassar Na Hoa, Ho Gaye Aam Har Ek Joro Jafa Us Kai Liye, Or Phir Jang Ka Maidan Saja Us Kai Liye

(Haye Sakina Kahani Suno)X2

  4. Us Kai Ek Baitay Kai Sinay Me Sina Toot, Gaye Bhai Kay Hath Katay, Tir Laga, Mashk Chidee, Lash Pamal Bhatijae Ki Bhi Maqtal Mai Huwi, Bay Zuban Qatl Hoa, Khasta Churee Us Pay Chali, Us Shahanshah Kai Kunbay Pai Ghareebi Chayee, Bujh Gaye Sarai Diyai Shameghariban Aye

(Haye Sakina Kahani Suno)X2

  5. Khaymai Jalnai Lagay Nazdeek Sitamgar Aaye, Us Shahanshah Ki Bachi Nai Tamachai Khaye, Kaan Zakhmi Howai Khun Ankhon Say Tapka Haye, Dhundnai Bap Ko Maqtal Mai Wo Kaisay Jai, Jaltai Daman Ko Liye Ganjai Shaheedan Mai Gaye, Rassi Gardan Mai Bandhi Shaam Kay Zindan Mai Gaye

(Haye Sakina Kahani Suno)X2

  6. Phir Sakina Nai Kaha, Haye Sakina, Phir Sakina Nai Kaha Rehtai Hain Wo Loog Kahan, Boli Zainab Kai Howay Sab Wo Asirai Zindan, Qissa Akhir Hoa Neend Aayi Na Tumko Meri Jaan, Boli Ro Ro Kai Sakina Phuphi Ab Neend Kahan, Tum To Kehti Thi Kahani Suno Neend Aati Hai, Is Kahani Say Meri Neend Uri Jati Hai

(Haye Sakina Kahani Suno)X2

  7. Boli Ro Ro Kai Sakina Ye Mera Qissa Hai, Is Kahani Ka Shahanshah Mera Baba Hai, Neza Jis Kay Laga Sinai Main Mera Bhayya Hai, Mera Asghar Hai La’eeno Nai Jisai Mara Hai, Bay Rida Tum Ho Phuphi Jaan Meri Jaati Hai, Ye Kahani To Merai Ghar Ki Nazar Aati Hai

(Haye Sakina Kahani Suno)X2

  8. Jisko Sinai Pe Shahanshah Kai Neend Aati Thi, Dasht-E Main Haye Chacha Keh Kai Jo Chillati Thi, Jiskai Kaano Say Laho Behta Tha Jo Piyasi Thi, Apnai Baba Ki Jodaye Main Mari Jati Thi, Us Shahanshah Ki Baiti Wo Sakina Mai Hon, Jis Ka Dushwar Huwa Qaid Main Jina Mai Hon

(Haye Sakina Kahani Suno)X2

  9. Khatm Jab Shaam Ke Zindaan Mai Kahani Ye Huwi, Wo Jo Sunti Thi Kahani Wo Sakina Na Rahi, Thame Zanjeer Naa Kahast Se Utha Ek Qaidi, Ek Nanni Si Lahad Kapte Haatho Se Bani, Sar Shahenshah Ka Godi Me Lahu Rota Tha, Wa Hussaina Ka Bas Ek Shor Bapaa Hota Tha

tracks.title: Waqt-E Rukhsat
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain)X3

Waqt-E- Rukhsat Bap Ko Baitay Ka Mor Kar Dekhna

(Haye Haye) X2

Waqt-E- Rukhsat Bap Ko Baitay Ka Mor Kar Dekhna

(Haye Haye) X2

  1. Karbala, Karbala, Karbala, Ab Imtihan-E Sabr-E Sarwar Dekhna

(Haye Haye) X2

Waqt-E- Rukhsat Bap Ko Baitay Ka Mor Kar Dekhna

  2. Door Tak Jatay Howay Dekha Kiay Kartay Hussain. Thukaray Kha Kha Kay Khud Sambhla Kiay Kartay Hussain Aiye Ali Akbar Zara Peechay Palat Kar Dekhna

(Haye Haye) X2

Waqt-E- Rukhsat Bap Ko Baitay Ka Mor Kar Dekhna

  3. Ma Kay Armaano Ki Chadar Ka Amaama Sar Pe Hain. Fatima Sughra Ki Ankho Ka Ujala Sar Pe Hain. Bigray Ga Ek Pal May Kitno Ka Muqaddar Dekhna

(Haye Haye) X2

Waqt-E- Rukhsat Bap Ko Baitay Ka Mor Kar Dekhna

  4. Dosh Par Bikhree Hovey Zulfay Ura Ti Thee Hava. Bikhrey Zulfo Say Nikalty Ja Rahi Thee Karbala. Maut Ki Jurrat Nahi Thi Ankh Bhar Kar Dekhna

(Haye Haye) X2

Waqt-E- Rukhsat Bap Ko Baitay Ka Mor Kar Dekhna

  5. Uth Raha Hai Gir Raha Hai Ek Parda Bar Bar Umme Laila Ka Ye Khayma Hai Meray Parwardigar Lash Jab Aiye To Mar Jaiyengi Madar Dekhna

(Haye Haye) X2

Waqt-E- Rukhsat Bap Ko Baitay Ka Mor Kar Dekhna

  6. Haye Maqtal Ghutnio Kay Bal Chala Hai Is Qadar Kehta Hai Awaz De Mujhko Meray Noor-E-Nazar Kho Gaye Beenayi Meri Meray Dil Bhar Dekhna

(Haye Haye) X2

Waqt-E- Rukhsat Bap Ko Baitay Ka Mor Kar Dekhna

  7. Aye Hussain Ibn-E Ali Jao Na Akbar Kay Karib Zulm Aisa Hu Gaya Hai, Tab La Saktay Nahi Kia Gawara Hai Sina Sinay Kay Andar Dekhna

(Haye Haye) X2

Waqt-E- Rukhsat Bap Ko Baitay Ka Mor Kar Dekhna

  8. Imtiha Hai Burhay Kandhoo Ka Jawan Baitay Ki Lash Khu Mai Dubee Kis Tarhan Daikhay Gi Ma Baitay Ki Lash Is Jaga Awlad Waloo Khud Ko Rakh Kar Dekhna

(Haye Haye) X2

Waqt-E- Rukhsat Bap Ko Baitay Ka Mor Kar Dekhna

  9. Mar Te Dam Akbar Ko Dar Hai Ma Na Ajaye Kahi Bahraha Hai Khu Meray Sinay Say Rangin Hai Zamin Kehdo Amma Say Mujhe Yu Na Taraptay Dekhna

(Haye Haye) X2

Waqt-E- Rukhsat Bap Ko Baitay Ka Mor Kar Dekhna

  10. Baba Meri Ma Meray Gham Ko Utha Sakti Nahi Neend Aisey Arahi Hai, Ma Jaga Sakti Nahi Zakhm Mera Ma Ki Nazro Say Bacha Kar Dekhna

(Haye Haye) X2

Waqt-E- Rukhsat Bap Ko Baitay Ka Mor Kar Dekhna

tracks.title: Dua-E-Komail
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Sari Ar-Reza) X6

Ighfir Leman La Yamleko Ilad Dua, Fa Innaka Fa'alool Lema Tasha, Ya Manismahu
Dawa Wa Zikrahu Shifaa, Wa Tahtahu Ghenan

  1. Tu Hi Kabir Tu Hi Kibriya Tu Rehnuma, Rage Gulu Se Bhi Nazdeek Tu Har Ek Lamha, Hai Tere Naam Ki Taasir Har Maraz Ki Dawa, Hai Tere Zikr Me Poshida Mere Hak Me Shafa, (Baghair Maange Hi Karta Hai Tu Ataa Pe Ataa) X2 Sadaa Se Pehle Hi Sunta Hai Sahilo Ki Sada

(Ya Sari Ar Reza) X2 Ighfir Leman La Yamleko Ilad Dua, Fa Innaka Fa'alool Lema
Tasha, Ya Manismahu Dawa Wa Zikrahu Shifaa, Wa Tahtahu Ghenan

  2. Ali Wasila Bane Aur Komail Paye Shafa, Usi Ke Naam Se Mansoob Hogayi Ye Dua, Shabe Jumaa Hai Dua-E-Komail Shukr Tera, Ye Ibteda Hai To Hai Imtehan Hadise Kisaa, (Elahi Teri Riza Ke Siwaa Kuch Aur Nahi) X2 Ke Mere Paas Dua Ke Siwa Kuch Aur Nahi

(Ya Sari Ar Reza) X2 Ighfir Leman La Yamleko Ilad Dua, Fa Innaka Fa'alool Lema
Tasha, Ya Manismahu Dawa Wa Zikrahu Shifaa, Wa Tahtahu Ghenan



  3. Mere Khuda Wo Zabaane Jo Teri Hamd Kare, Wo Tere Panjatan-E-Paak Ki Dua Me Rahe, Kabhi Wo Nare Jahanum Ki Sakhtiya Na Sahe, Pule Siraat Se Bekhof Bekhatar Guzre, (Gunahagaro Ko Ye Aasra Hai Subho Masa) X2 Khula Huwa Hai Musalsal Tera Dare Tawba

(Ya Sari Ar Reza) X2 Ighfir Leman La Yamleko Ilad Dua, Fa Innaka Fa'alool Lema
Tasha, Ya Manismahu Dawa Wa Zikrahu Shifaa, Wa Tahtahu Ghenan



  4. Rasule Paak Ke Sadke Me Ay Khuda Ghar Ghar, Sho Aaye Ilm Ki Kirno Ka Mustakil Ho Guzar, Khula Rahe Mere Bacho Pe Shahre Ilm Ka Dar, Rahe Jawaano Ki Har Dam Teri Riza Pe Nazar, (Teri Riza Ki Bina Riske Ilm Kya Ho Ataa) X2 Jo Tune Chahe Dare Ilm Khil Nahi Sakta

(Ya Sari Ar Reza) X2 Ighfir Leman La Yamleko Ilad Dua, Fa Innaka Fa'alool Lema
Tasha, Ya Manismahu Dawa Wa Zikrahu Shifaa, Wa Tahtahu Ghenan

  5. Tu Mere Aib Chupata Hai Daal Kar Parda, Elahi Deta Hu Mai Tujko Waasta Uska, Wohi Jo Shaame Ghariban Me De Rahi Thi Sadaa, Nahi Hai Kuch Bhi Mere Paas Is Rida Ke Siwaa (Rasool Zadi Ke Parde Ki Laaj Rakhlena) X2 Haram Duaawo Ka Meri Bhi Aaj Rakhlena

(Ya Sari Ar Reza) X2 Ighfir Leman La Yamleko Ilad Dua, Fa Innaka Fa'alool Lema
Tasha, Ya Manismahu Dawa Wa Zikrahu Shifaa, Wa Tahtahu Ghenan



  6. Shakhista Pahlue Zehra Ka Wasta Ay Khudaa, Jo Waqte Gusle Ali Ne Basad Buqa Dekha, To Apne Aasu Ali Saat Jari Na Rok Sakaa, Khuda Ka Shehr Bhi Ek Cheekh Maar Kar Roya, (Usi Rasool Ki Beti Ka Waasta Ay Khudaa) X2 Ho Waalidain Ko Sehat Ke Saath Umr Ataa

(Ya Sari Ar Reza) X2 Ighfir Leman La Yamleko Ilad Dua, Fa Innaka Fa'alool Lema
Tasha, Ya Manismahu Dawa Wa Zikrahu Shifaa, Wa Tahtahu Ghenan

  7. Wo Ek Mariz Jo Bas Shaam Keh Ke Rota Tha, Jukaaye Sar Wo Hayadar Rota Jaata Tha, Pahen Ke Beriyaan Jo Karbala Se Shaam Gaya, Usi Mariz Ke Sadke Se Mangta Hai Shafa, (Maraz Se Pehle Dawa Khalk Tune Ki Hai Khuda) X2 Baraye Sayyade Sajaad De Hame Bhi Shifa

(Ya Sari Ar Reza) X2 Ighfir Leman La Yamleko Ilad Dua, Fa Innaka Fa'alool Lema
Tasha, Ya Manismahu Dawa Wa Zikrahu Shifaa, Wa Tahtahu Ghenan

tracks.title: Mere Sar Pe Lillah
tracks.lyrics:
Haay. Salaam Laeeno. Ne Kya Kya Jafaa Ki. Nashakhi Huwi Yaa Mushkil Kusha Ki.
Thi Shame Ghariban Qayamat Bapa Ki, Ke Ik Hath Zainab Ki Chadar Tak Ayaa. Ho
Zainab Ke Lab Par Fakat Ik Sadaa Thi

(Mere Sar Pe Lillah Rehne De Chadar) X2

Kuch Ai Shimr Kimat Samaj Is Ridaa Ki, Ke Ye Paak Chadar Hai Khayrun Nisaa Ki

(Mere Sar Pe Lillah Rehne De Chadar) X2

  1. (Khule Sar Jise Bhayiyo Ne Na Dekha) X2 (Uthaa Raat Me Jiski Maa Ka Janaaza) X2 Wo Din Me Hai Motaj Bas Ek Ridaa Ki

(Mere Sar Pe Lillah Rehne De Chadar) X2

  2. (Lo Bandho Mere Haath Kehti Thi Zainab) X2 (Na Chhino Rida Kehke Roti Thi Zainab) X2 Mai Mazlum Beti Hu Mushkil Khushaa Ki

(Mere Sar Pe Lillah Rehne De Chadar) X2

  3. (Zara Jaag Ay Mere Gayyur Bhayi) X2 (Ke Ab Baat Meri Ridaa Tak Hai Aayi) X2 Behen Ko Zarurat Hai Teri Wafaa Ki

(Mere Sar Pe Lillah Rehne De Chadar) X2

  4. (Utho Mere Sajjad Jalte Hai Khayme) X2 (Sumbhaloo Akeli Mai Bachho Ko Kaise) X2 Me Kaise Sahu Sakhtiya Ashkiya Ki

(Mere Sar Pe Lillah Rehne De Chadar) X2

  5. (Wo Shaame Ghariban Me Baba Ka Aana) X2 (Wo Zainab Ka Haatho Se Chehra Chhupaana) X2 Khuda Se Rida Ke Liye Ilteja Ki

(Mere Sar Pe Lillah Rehne De Chadar) X2

  6. (Tamaashayi Kufe Ki Galiyon Me Kehte) X2 (Zamane Badalte Hai Lamho Me Kitne) X2 Ke Sar Nange Zainab Hai Kudrat Khudaa Ki

(Mere Sar Pe Lillah Rehne De Chadar) X2

  7. (Wo Mayen Wo Behne Kanizane Zainab) X2 (Jo Hai Aaj Bhi Pursadaarane Zainab) X2 Rakhe Laaj Zainab Ki Bas Us Sadaa Ki

(Mere Sar Pe Lillah Rehne De Chadar) X2

tracks.title: Akhpala Baba Jaana
tracks.lyrics:
(Pyaare Baba Jaan) X5 (Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 Khudshe Zuljanah Na Maake Sohre
Dale Dina

(Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 (Khudshe Zuljanah Na Maake Sohre Dale Dina) X2

(Pyaare Baba Jaana) X2 Utro Zuljanah Se Baba Haal Sunke Jaana

(Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 (Khudshe Zuljanah Na Maake Sohre Dale Dina) X2

  1. (Is Tunshakatal Kana) X2 Maadar Tadata Zuljanah Ab Khaine Wale Dina

(Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 (Khudshe Zuljanah Na Maake Sohre Dale Dina) X2

  2. (Qatl Gay Na Jaana) X2 Sar Kadam Pe Zuljanah Ke Rakhti Hai Sakina

(Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 (Khudshe Zuljanah Na Maake Sohre Dale Dina) X2

  3. Ay Baba Garm Reti Par Tum Zara Si Der Baith Jao, Milonge Ab Hame Kahan Tum Sakina Ko Bataake Jaawo (Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 Karbala Ke Ban Me Baba Mujh Ko Na Rulaana

(Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 (Khudshe Zuljanah Na Maake Sohre Dale Dina) X2

  4. (Matapa Garm Rego Ke Na) X4 (Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 Wede Karbala Watan Ke Dejadele Dina

(Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 (Khudshe Zuljanah Na Maake Sohre Dale Dina) X2

  5. Ay Baba Akbare Jawaan Ka, Hai Dil Pe Zakhm Mere Tazaa, Sunehri Zulf Khoon Mein Dubi, Zameene Garm Pe Hai Laasha (Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 Khul Zama Ko Baba Mere Dhup Se Uthana

(Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 (Khudshe Zuljanah Na Maake Sohre Dale Dina) X2

  6. Ay Baba Alqama Ka Sahil, Chacha Ke Khun Se Hai Rangin, Qalam Huwe Jo Unke Bazu, Hai Mauj Alqama Ki Gamgin (Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 Khoon Bhare Alam Ko Baba Sine Se Lagaana

(Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 (Khudshe Zuljanah Na Maake Sohre Dale Dina) X2

  7. Ay Baba Gultha Shah Qasim, Bikhar Gaya Hai Ah Qasim, Lagai Kis Liye Thi Mehndi, Huwa Tha Kyun Biyaha Qasim (Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 Tukre Tukre Lasha Baba Gul Samajh Kar Lana

(Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 (Khudshe Zuljanah Na Maake Sohre Dale Dina) X2

  8. Ay Baba Be Zaba Ka Jhula, Ruka Huwa Hai Andhiyo Mein, Labo Pe Jiske Tabassum, Badal Gaya Hai Hichkiyon Mein (Akhpala Baba Kaana) X2 Loriyan Sunaake Baba Dasht Mein Sulaana

(Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 (Khudshe Zuljanah Na Maake Sohre Dale Dina) X2

  9. Ay Baba Dur Hu Watan Se, Dari Huwi Hun Khuni Ban Se, Chale Gaye Jo Aap Ran Mein, Khiza Na Jayengi Chaman Se (Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 Dekho Baba Sina Apna Tiro Se Bachaana

(Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 (Khudshe Zuljanah Na Maake Sohre Dale Dina) X2

  10. Ay Baba Kaan Ki Ye Bali, Tumhare Hathon Se Jo Pehni, Mujhe Ye Khauf Aa Raha Hai, Chine Na Aap Ki Nishaani (Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 Mannati Ye Bali Baba Khud Badha Ke Jaana

(Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 (Khudshe Zuljanah Na Maake Sohre Dale Dina) X2

  11. Kaha Hussain Badshah Ne, Hame To Ghera Hai Kazaa Ne, Chale Hai Ham To Shahzadi Watan Se Dur Sar Kataane (Gul Sakina Jaane) X2 Qatl Gehne Beta Hamko Dhundne Na Aana

(Akhpala Baba Jaana) X2 (Khudshe Zuljanah Na Maake Sohre Dale Dina) X2

tracks.title: Nabi Nabi Honga
tracks.lyrics:
Awozobilahe Menashaitan Nir Rajim, Bismillah Hir Rahmin

Saari Tarife Us Khuda-E-Buzurgho Barkat Ke Naam, Ke Jis Ke Kabzae Kudrat Me
Kainat Ka Har Nizam Hai Doorudo Salam Mohamed Wa Ale Mohamed Par

(Allahumma Salle Ala Mohammedin Wa Ale Mohammed) X3

Ya Nabi Allah Ya Habib Allah Ya Kalim Allah Ya Shafi Allah Ya Rasool Allah Ya
Nabi Allah

(Ya Rasool Allah) X4

  1. Zamin Jab Na Thi, Na Aasma Koi, Na Chand Tare The, Na Keh Kasha Koi, Hooruf Bhi Na The, Na Thi Zaba Koi (Tha Ayse Alamme Bhi Mehrba Koi) X2 Khuda Bas Ayse Me Yeh Keh Raha Hoga Mere Hawale Se Jo Taskera Hoga

(Nabi Nabi Hoga) X2 Chaman Chaman Hoga Kali Kali Hoga

  2. Habib Mera Hai Libas-E-Rehmat Me, Banayi Hai Dunia Isi Ki Chahat Me, Sanaa Isi Ki Hai, Kalame Kudrat Me (Doorud Isi Per Hai Meri Ibadat Me) X2 Jo Saktiya Jhele Meri Mohabat Me, Shafi-E-Mehshar Bhi Fakat Yahi Hoga

(Nabi Nabi Hoga) X2 Chaman Chaman Hoga Kali Kali Hoga

  3. Wo Mere Bando Ko, Mera Pata Dega, Who Besaharo Ko Bhi Aasra Dega, Who Zakham Kayega Magar Duwa Dega (Isi Ka Kunba To Gala Kata Dega) X2 Husain Sab Apne Diye Buja Dega, Andhera Jab Fayle, Who Roshni Hoga

(Nabi Nabi Hoga) X2 Chaman Chaman Hoga Kali Kali Hoga

  4. Nabi Ka Roza Hai Hamare Sino Me, Hasino Yakta Hai Who Sab Hasino Me, Isi Ka Charcha Hai Falak Nashino Me (Jali Hai Naam Iska Sabhi Sahifo Me) X2 Likha Hai Naam Is Ka Sabhi Safino Me, Ab Humko Tufan Se Na Dar Koi Honga

(Nabi Nabi Hoga) X2 Chaman Chaman Hoga Kali Kali Hoga

  5. Duwaye Karte Hai Tere Wasile Se, Mariz Jitne Hai Unhe Shifa Dede, Nabi Ke Sadke Me Ye Martaba Dede (Yaki(N) Ki Manzil Ka Tu Raste Dede) X2 Nabi Ke Bachho Ka Tu Khake Pe Dida Kahaa Tera Jaysa Koi Sakhi Honga

(Nabi Nabi Hoga) X2 Chaman Chaman Hoga Kali Kali Hoga

(Ya Ali Maula) X4

Imamul Momineen, Imamul Muttaqeen, Imamul Saddiqeen, Imamul Alimeen, Imamul
Awaleen, Imamul Akhireen

(Ya Kaheral Aduwe, Wa Waliyal Wali, Ya Mazharal Ajaaeb, Ya Murtaza Ali) X2

  6. Nabi Ne Manga Tha, Khudaase Ek Nasir, Ali Ki Surat Me, Huwa Hai Wo Zahir, Nabi Ne Jab Chaaha Ali Huwe Hazir (Ali Ki Midhat Se Zaban Hai Kasir) X2 Ali Sar-E-Mimber Salooni Ka Zakir, Jaha Nabi Honga, Waha Ali Honga

(Nabi Nabi Hoga) X2 Chaman Chaman Hoga Kali Kali Hoga

  7. Ali Ko Baksha Hai, Khudaane Kya Rutba, Nabi Sa Bhayi Hai, Batool Si Zawjah, Ali Nazar Aya, Ali Ka Har Beta (Nabi Ki Hiqmat Ka Ali Hai Darwazah) X2 Na Dusra Haider, Na Dusra Kaba, Na Ho Saka Pehle, Na Ab Kabhi Hoga

(Nabi Nabi Hoga) X2 Chaman Chaman Hoga Kali Kali Hoga

  8. Who Asr-E-Ashoora, Ali Ka Ek Beta, Rasool The Jisse, Rasool Se Jo Tha, Tamam Lasho Ko Uthata Tha Tanha (Jo Zere Khanjar Ye, Bayaan Deta Tha) X2 Rahenga Deen Ab To Hamare Nana Ka, Zamin-E-Maqtal Per Likha Yahi Honga

(Nabi Nabi Hoga) X2 Chaman Chaman Hoga Kali Kali Hoga

  9. Ali Ke Kunbe Per, Sitam Huwe Kya Kya, Kahi Jale Khayme Kahi Luta Parda, Kahi Kate Bazu, Kahi Chida Seena (Kisi Ka Maqtal Me Bikhar Gaya Lasha) X2 Ye Zulm Dekha To Khuda Pukar Utha, Hussain Jo Kehde Sada Wahi Honga

(Nabi Nabi Hoga) X2 Chaman Chaman Hoga Kali Kali Hoga

Nabi Nabi Hoga, Ali Ali Honga Chaman Chaman Hoga Kali Kali Hoga

(Ya Rasool Allah) X4

Salallaho Alayhi Wa Aali Hi Wa Sallam

tracks.title: Jo Bhi Masroof
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain) X4

(Jo Bhi Masroof-E-Salaame, Shohada Rehta Hai) X4

  1. Wo To Rehta Nahi Par Naam, Sadaa Rehta Hai

Jo Bhi Masroof Salaa Mein, Shohada Rehta Hai, To Wo Rehta Nahi Par Naam, Sadaa
Rehta Hai

  2. (Shimr Kehta Tha Yahi Maa Hai, Ali Akber Ki) X3 Jiska Ek Haath Kaleje Pe, Dharaa Rehta Tha Hai

Jo Bhi Masroof Salaa Mein, Shohada Rehta Hai, To Wo Rehta Nahi Par Naam, Sadaa
Rehta Hai

  3. (Hai Yeh Sharmindagi Paani Ke, Na Ponchaane Ki) X3 Naize Pe Bhi Sar-E-Abbas, Jukaa Rehta Tha Hai

Jo Bhi Masroof Salaa Mein, Shohada Rehta Hai, To Wo Rehta Nahi Par Naam, Sadaa
Rehta Hai

  4. (Shaam Hoti Hai To Unto Se, Ootarte Hai Haram) X3 Par Sar-E-Shah To Naize Pe, Charaa Rehta Hai

Jo Bhi Masroof Salaa Mein, Shohada Rehta Hai, To Wo Rehta Nahi Par Naam, Sadaa
Rehta Hai

  5. (Roke Yeh Hind Ki Beti Ne, Sakina Se Kaha) X3 Sar Tera Kisliye Har Waqt, Khulaa Rehta Hai

Jo Bhi Masroof Salaa Mein, Shohada Rehta Hai, To Wo Rehta Nahi Par Naam, Sadaa
Rehta Hai

  6. (Wo Lagi Kehne Yatimo Ki, Nishaani Hai Yehi) X3 Kurta Beywarsi Bacho Ka, Phataa Rehta Hai

Jo Bhi Masroof Salaa Mein, Shohada Rehta Hai, To Wo Rehta Nahi Par Naam, Sadaa
Rehta Hai

  7. (Khawfe Kaaba Ka Tuje Showk Hai, Asbaast-E-Dabeer) X3 Mustarib Dil Siffat-E-Kibla, Numaa Rehta Hai

Jo Bhi Masroof Salaa Mein, Shohada Rehta Hai, To Wo Rehta Nahi Par Naam, Sadaa
Rehta Hai

tracks.title: Subhe Ashoor
tracks.lyrics:
Subhe Ashoor, Subhe Ashoor Ali Akber (Teri Azan) X3

Subhe Ashoor Ali Akber (Teri Azan) X3

  1. Kaleja Thaam Ke Khayme Me (Royi Maa) X2 Teri Azan

Subhe Ashoor Ali Akber (Teri Azan) X3

  2. (Salaam Lehjaye Rasool Ki Shabahat, Salaam Marzie Mabood Per Shahadat) X3 Shahadato Ki Zami Per Thi Aasma, Thi Aasma Teri Azan

Subhe Ashoor Ali Akber (Teri Azan) X3

  3. (Who Tum Jo Ashado An Laillaha Bole, Dhariche Kudsiyo Ne Khole) X3 Khuda Ke Zikr Se Saji Huwi Zabaan, Saji Huwi Zabaan, Teri Azan

Subhe Ashoor Ali Akber (Teri Azan) X3

  4. (Hussain Jisko Sun Ke Roye, Parinde Shaak Per Na Soye) X3 Sadaay-E-Gham Suni Gayi Kaha Kaha, Kaha Kaha Teri Azan

Subhe Ashoor Ali Akber (Teri Azan) X3

  5. (Who Khayma Gah Tak Jo Ayi, Teri Azan-E-Karbalayi) X3 Jigar Ko Tham Ke Yeh Keh Rahi Thi Maa, Rahi Thi Maa Teri Azan

Subhe Ashoor Ali Akber (Teri Azan) X3

  6. (Hawa Ke Dosh Per Watan Tak, Azan Pohonch Gayi Behen Tak) X3 Behan Tarap Ne Lagi Le Ke Hichkiya, Hichkiya Teri Azan

Subhe Ashoor Ali Akber (Teri Azan) X3

  7. (Sina Jigar Pe Tumne Khayi, Azan Ki Aabru Bachaayi) X3 Rahe Na Tum Magar Bachi Rahi Azan, Rahi Azan, Teri Azan

Subhe Ashoor Ali Akber (Teri Azan) X3

tracks.title: Nind Ayengi
tracks.lyrics:
Jab Khaime Me Rukhsat Ko Shahe Bayro Baraye,

Chilaee Sakina Mere Bekas Padar Ayee

Sheh Keh Te The Bibi Hame Ro Ker Na Rulawo

Phir Pyar Kare Ham Tumhe Mu Aage Ko Lawo

Woh Kehti Thi Hamrah Muje Leke To Jawo Mai Kya Karu Maidan Me Ghar Ja Ke Na
Awo

(Need Ayengi Jab Aap Ki Bu Pawungi Baba) X2 Me Raat Ko Maktal Me (Chali Awungi
Baba) X2

(Nind Ayengi Jab Aap Ki Bu Pawungi Baba, Chali Awungi Baba) X2

  1. Farmaya Nikalti Nahi Sayyedaniya Bahar Sine Pe Sulayengi Tumhe Raat Mai Madar Kyu Kehti Ho Maktal Me Chali Awungi Baba, Mai Raat Ko Maktal Mai (Chali Awungi Baba) X2

Nind Ayengi Jab Aap Ki Bu Pawungi Baba, Chali Awungi Baba

  2. Nanhe Se Kaleje Pe Mere Chalti Hai Talwar, Khulta Nahi Kyu Aap Ne Bandhe Hai Ye Hathyar, Mai Aap Ko Kho Ker Na Kabhi Pawoungi Baba Mai Raat Ko Maktal Mai (Chali Awoungi Baba) X2

Nind Ayengi Jab Aap Ki Bu Pawungi Baba, Chali Awungi Baba

  3. Aa Ti Hai Bala Sarpe To Pehle Muje Waro, Mar Jawongi Baba Na Sidharo Na Sidharo, Jawonge Jahan Mai Bhi Wahin Jawoungi Baba Mai Raat Ko Maktal Mai (Chali Awoungi Baba) X2

Nind Ayengi Jab Aap Ki Bu Pawungi Baba, Chali Awungi Baba

  4. Shab Hongi To Phir Khak Pe Soenge Kaha Aap, Sine Pe To Asgher Ko Sulayenge Waha Aap, Acha Mai Wahi Khakh Pe So Jawongi Baba

Mai Raat Ko Maktal Mai (Chali Awoungi Baba) X2

Nind Ayengi Jab Aap Ki Bu Pawungi Baba, Chali Awungi Baba

  5. Aane Do Agar Pyas Se Gash Ayenga Baba, Tum Jite Raho Pani Bhi Miljayenga Baba, Mai Aap Ko Dekhungi To Jijawungi Baba

Mai Raat Ko Maktal Mai (Chali Awoungi Baba) X2

Nind Ayengi Jab Aap Ki Bu Pawungi Baba, Chali Awungi Baba

  6. Kuch Door Na The Ham Ke Tumhe Nind Na Aye, Kiya Hoyenga Jab Hogi Mahino Ki Judayi, Bibi Na Kaho Mai Nahi So Pawungi Baba

Mai Raat Ko Maktal Mai (Chali Awoungi Baba) X2

Nind Ayengi Jab Aap Ki Bu Pawungi Baba, Chali Awungi Baba

  7. Farmaya Nikalti Nahi Sayyedaniya Bahar, Sine Pe Sulayengi Tumhe Raat Mai Madar, Kyu Kehti Ho Maktal Me Chali Awungi Baba, Mai Raat Ko Maktal Mai (Chali Awungi Baba) X2

Nind Ayengi Jab Aap Ki Bu Pawungi Baba, Chali Awungi Baba

  8. Nanhe Se Kaleje Pe Mere Chalti Hai Talwar Khulta Nahi Kyu Aap Ne Bandhe Hai Ye Hathyar, Mai Aap Ko Kho Ker Na Kabhi Pawoungi Baba, Mai Raat Ko Maktal Mai (Chali Awoungi Baba) X2

Nind Ayengi Jab Aap Ki Bu Pawungi Baba, Chali Awungi Baba

  9. Woh Hal Anis Ab Nahi Ho Sakta Hai Marku, Jis Tarha Chuti Bap Se Woh Dukhtare Mazlum, Nawha Tha Yahi Jiska Na Ji Pawongi Baba,

Mai Raat Ko Maktal Mai (Chali Awoungi Baba) X2

Nind Ayengi Jab Aap Ki Bu Pawungi Baba, Chali Awungi Baba

tracks.title: Aysa Alam
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Abbas) X2

(Aysa Alam Hai Kaha, Aysa Jawaan Hai Kaha) X2

  1. Ye Hai Abu Talib Ka Gharana, Is Pe Khuda Ka Khas Karam Hai, Sare Arab Me Sare Ajam Me, Kisko Mila Ye Jaaho Hasham Hai (In Me Koi Yasin-O-Muzammil, In Me Koi Sardar-E-Iram Hai) X2 Uski Alag Hi Shan Hai Maula, Jisko Mila Haider Ka Alam Hai

(Aysa Alam Hai Kaha, Aysa Jawaan Hai Kaha) X2

  2. Kaisa Saja Hai Kaisa Hasin Hai, Karbobala Mei Shah Ka Lashkar, Yu To Sabhi Hai Sheyr-E-Dilawar, Auno Muhammad Qasimo Akbar (Ibne Mazahir Wehbe Kalbi, John Bhi Hur Bhi Sare Dilawar) X2 Apni Jagha Ye Sab Hai Bahaddur, Foj Me Teri Ay Shah-E-Safdar

(Aysa Alam Hai Kaha, Aysa Jawaan Hai Kaha) X2

  3. Baade Namaz-E-Fajr Ziyarat, Tere Alam Ki Karta Hu, Sharf Ghulami Ka Mil Jaye, Mai Ye Wazifa Parhta Hu (Karke Ziyarat Tere Alam Ki, Phir Me Ghar Se Chalta Hu) X2 Saye Mei Chawda Masoomo Ke, Shukhre Khudaa Mei Rehta Hu

(Aysa Alam Hai Kaha, Aysa Jawaan Hai Kaha) X2

  4. Ham To Saje Darbar Ali Hai, Khas Ye Tujse Rishta Hai, Jad Bhi Hai Tera Kool Ka Maula, Tu Bhi Hamara Aaka Hai (Tere Fakiro Me Ay Ghazi, Arsh Nashi Bhi Rehta Hai) X2 Sindhme Aawo Maula Kadam Par, Laal Kalandar Kehta Hai

(Aysa Alam Hai Kaha, Aysa Jawaan Hai Kaha) X2

  5. Shaam Ke Lashkar Me Halchal Thi, Kaun Jari Ab Aata Hai, Burhe Jawaano Se Kehte The, Yeh To Ali Ab Aata Hai (Sar Pe Khuda Thokar Me Kazaa Hai, Kehre Jali Ab Aata Hai) X2 Kehna Para Ahmed Ko Ali Se, Tera Wasi Ab Aata Hai

(Aysa Alam Hai Kaha, Aysa Jawaan Hai Kaha) X2

  6. Teri Shahadat Se Kunbe Par, Kaisi Qayamat Tut Gayi, Jis Ko Kaha Karte The Aaka, Katl Huwa Wo Bhayi Bhi (Sar Se Chini Zainab Ke Chadar, Teri Sakina Qayd Huwi) X2 Hayi Teri Majboori Ghazi, Maa Zehra Ye Kehti Rahi

(Aysa Alam Hai Kaha, Aysa Jawaan Hai Kaha) X2

tracks.title: Zakhmi Zuljanah
tracks.lyrics:
(Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah) X4

  1. Mera Maaja Hai Kaha, Chor Aya Tu Kaha, Teero Ke Darmiyan

Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah, Hay Zakhmi Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah,
Zakhmi Zuljanah

  2. Zainab Ka Dil To Pehle Se Zakhmi Hai Zuljanah, Akbar Ke Gham Ke Sine Me Barchi Hai Zuljanah, Zakhmi Badan Liye, Aya Hai Kis Liye, Karta Huwa Fughaa

Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah, Hay Zakhmi Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah,
Zakhmi Zuljanah

  3. Ay Gham Nasib Zakhmi Badan Zuljanah Bataa, Saye Me Mera Bhayi Tha Jab Zeen Se Ghira, Khanjar Tha Jab Karib, Pani Huwa Nasib, Ya Kushk Thi Zaban

Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah, Hay Zakhmi Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah,
Zakhmi Zuljanah

  4. Ek Do Peher Me Apne Bhare Ghar Ko Royi Hu, Hur Ko Habib Ko Ali Asgher Ko Royi Hu, Abbas Ki Kasam, Shabbir Ka Ye Gham, Uthenga Ab Kaha

Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah, Hay Zakhmi Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah,
Zakhmi Zuljanah

  5. Ay Rahawaar Tu To Wafadar Hai Bahot, Apne Sawaar Se To Tujhe Pyaar Hai Bahot, Ya Kis Ka Hai Lahu, Khamosh Kyu Hai Tu, Chup Hai Teri Zaban

Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah, Hay Zakhmi Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah,
Zakhmi Zuljanah

  6. Kulsum Aawo Madar-E-Akbar Ho Tum Kaha, Fizza Urhaawo Khaak Qayamat Huwi Aya, Bhayi Ko Chor Kar, Apne Lahu Me Tar, Aaya Hai Nawha Khwaan

Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah, Hay Zakhmi Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah,
Zakhmi Zuljanah

  7. Kadmo Pe Tere Bali Sakina Ne Sar Rakha, Ay Zuljanah Dasht Me Baba Ko Ley Na Ja, Wo Kaise Soyengi, Ghabra Ke Royengi, Hai Tera Imethan

Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah, Hay Zakhmi Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah,
Zakhmi Zuljanah

  8. Ley Chal Waha Jaha Dil-E-Zehra Ka Chayn Hai, Jalti Huwi Zamin Pe Jis Jaa Hussain Hai, Mai Zakhm Dhowungi, Gurbat Pe Rowungi, Ley Ley Ke Hichkiya

Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah, Hay Zakhmi Zakhmi Zuljanah, Zakhmi Zuljanah,
Zakhmi Zuljanah

tracks.title: Amma Achi Amma
tracks.lyrics:
Dakhil Jo Madine Me Huwe Ahl-E-Madina

Jaate Huwe Kuch Aur The Ab Kya Hai Karina

Na Akbaro Abbas Na Hamrah Sakina

Aur Gham Se Har Ik Bibi Ka Labrez Tha Sina

Jab Ghar Ke Karib Aagayi Kunbe Ki Sawaari

Sughra Ne Jo Dekha To Ye, Roro Ke Pukaari

Amma, Amma

Hay (Amma Achi Amma Mera Kunba Kaha Hai, Amma Achi Amma Mera Baba Kaha Hai) X3

  1. Sughra, Kya Puch Liya Sughra Tune, Sab Kuch To Ayaa Hai Chehre Se, Le Dekh Safed Yeh Baal Mere, Mat Puch Kaha Hai Ab Kunba

(Amma Achi Amma Mera Kunba Kaha Hai, Amma Achi Amma Mera Baba Kaha Hai) X2

  2. Sughra, Jis Jaan Se Pyaara Kehti Thi, Din Jis Ke Liye Tu Ginti Thi, Be Goro Kafan Hai Baba Tera, Mat Puch Kaha Hai Ab Kunba

(Amma Achi Amma Mera Kunba Kaha Hai, Amma Achi Amma Mera Baba Kaha Hai) X2

  3. Sughra, Jis Kunbe Ko Tu Puchti Hai, Wo Karbobala Ki Khaak Huwa, Sab Chand Chupe Karbal Me Tere, Mat Puch Kaha Hai Ab Kunba

(Amma Achi Amma Mera Kunba Kaha Hai, Amma Achi Amma Mera Baba Kaha Hai) X2

  4. Sughra, Wo Eik Zaeef Jawaan Jo Hai, Pehchaan Isse Sajjad Hai Ye, Isse Shaam Ki Galiya Maar Gayi, Mat Puch Kaha Hai Ab Kunba

(Amma Achi Amma Mera Kunba Kaha Hai, Amma Achi Amma Mera Baba Kaha Hai) X2

  5. Sughra, Wo Asghar Jo Cheh Maah Ka Tha, Wo Bhi Na Raha, Wo Bhi Na Raha, Maa Dhoop Me Baythi Roti Hai, Mat Puch Kaha Hai Ab Kunba

(Amma Achi Amma Mera Kunba Kaha Hai, Amma Achi Amma Mera Baba Kaha Hai) X2

  6. Sughra, Jab Shaam-E-Ghariba Ayi Thi, Zainab Pe Bari Tanhaayi Thi, Ghar Jalta That Chinti Thi Rida, Mat Puch Kaha Hai Ab Kunba

(Amma Achi Amma Mera Kunba Kaha Hai, Amma Achi Amma Mera Baba Kaha Hai) X2

  7. Sughra, Darti Thi Andhere Se Jo Bahot, Wo Bali Sakina Teri Behen, Ab Tak Hai Wo Zindaa Mei Sughra, Mat Puch Kaha Hai Ab Kunba

(Amma Achi Amma Mera Kunba Kaha Hai, Amma Achi Amma Mera Baba Kaha Hai) X2

tracks.title: Maa Bulati
tracks.lyrics:
Hai Bistare Se Thar Tharaa Ke Uthhi Thaam Kar Asaa, Qabr-E-Nabi Pe Fateha-E-
Aakhri Parha, Hum Saaiyon Ke Ghar Gayi Rukhsat Ko Aur Kaha

Izza Thi Tum Sabhon Ko Mere Shaur-O-Shain Se, Kal Fatema Na Hogi So Owege Tum
Chain Se, Nagahh Showr Utha Ke Zehra Guzar Gayin, Amama Sar Se Phaink Ke Rowe
Imaam-E-Deen Rotithi Milke Zainab-O- Kulsum Thi Qarib, Aur Door Se Hussain
Rotethe Khare, Fizza Pukari Aap Yahan Kya Na Aayenge, Bole Hussain Amma Pukare
To Jaayenge

Tute Bande Kafan Fatema Ke Aur Phir Haath Nikle Kafan Se, Aayi Aawaz Aa Ay
Hussain, Maa Bulati Hai Aa Ay Hussain

(Maa Bulati Hai Aa Ay Hussain) X2 (Aa Mere Paas Aa Ay Hussain) X2

  1. (Aye Shabbir Zehra Ke Lab Yu Hile) X2 Chakiya Pis Ke Maine Palaa Tuje, Aa Mere Laal Aa Maa Ke Laag Ja Gale, Wakt-E-Ruksat Hai Aise Nahi Ruth Te

(Maa Bulati Hai Aa Ay Hussain) X2 (Aa Mere Paas Aa Ay Hussain) X2

  2. Teri Khaatir Mein Jaa Kar Palat Aayi Hun, Dekh Kar Tere Aansu Mein Ghabrayi Hun, Dekh Zere Kafan Gham Se Tharayi Hun, Tujh Ko Behlaane Jannat Se Mein Aayi Hun

(Maa Bulati Hai Aa Ay Hussain) X2 (Aa Mere Paas Aa Ay Hussain) X2

  3. Aa Mere Laal Aa Aik Ye Kaam Kar, Mere Seene Pe Kuch Dair Aaram Kar, Tu To Chalta Tha Ungli Meri Thaam Kar, Yaad Woh Subho Kar Yaad Woh Shaam Kar

(Maa Bulati Hai Aa Ay Hussain) X2 (Aa Mere Paas Aa Ay Hussain) X2

  4. Tu Ne Khaana Bhi Khaaya Ke Khaaya Nahin, Kehde Maa Se Ke Aaj Tu Pyaasa Nahi, Subh Se Muh Kisi Ne Dhulaya Nahi, So Gayi Mein Tujhe Kyun Sula Ya Nahi

(Maa Bulati Hai Aa Ay Hussain) X2 (Aa Mere Paas Aa Ay Hussain) X2

  5. Daste Zainab Mein Phir Deke Daste Hussain, Boli Zahra Kafan Mein Basad Showr O Shain, Dekh Zainab Meri Laadli Noor E Ayn, Ye Jo Roya To Zahra Na Paayegi Chain

(Maa Bulati Hai Aa Ay Hussain) X2 (Aa Mere Paas Aa Ay Hussain) X2

  6. Jaaiyo Saath Iske Ye Jaaye Jidhar, Mere Bache Ki Zainab Hai Tu Humsafar, Karbala Ka Musaffir Hai Mera Pisar, Gham Ki Badli Na Chaaye Mere Chaand Par


(Maa Bulati Hai Aa Ay Hussain) X2 (Aa Mere Paas Aa Ay Hussain) X2

  7. Haaye Karbobala Mein Wo Din Aagaya, Shimr Ka Halqe Sarwar Pe Khanjar Chala, Amma Amma Ki Aane Lagi Jab Sada, Baal Bikhrake Zehra Ne Ro Kar Kaha

(Maa Bulati Hai Aa Ay Hussain) X2 (Aa Mere Paas Aa Ay Hussain) X2

tracks.title: Shaah Ast Hussain
tracks.lyrics:
(Shaah Ast Hussain Badshaah Ast Hussain, Deen Ast Hussain Deen Panah Ast
Hussain) X2

  1. (Sar Daad Na Daad Dast Dar Dast-E-Yazeed) X3 Haqqa Ke Bina La Illah Ast Hussain


Shaah Ast Hussain Badshaah Ast Hussain, Deen Ast Hussain Deepanah Ast Hussain

  2. Sardaaro Shehenshaah Ay Shaahe Shaheedan, Qaari Sare Naiza Ay Waarise Quran (Kehti Hain Namazein Ab Tak Sare Maidaan) X2 Suno Zindaa Hai Hussain Suno Zinda Hai Hussain

Shaah Ast Hussain Badshaah Ast Hussain, Deen Ast Hussain Deepanah Ast Hussain

  3. Azaon Namaaze Milad-E-Mohammed, Ye Majlis-O-Matam Abbas Ka Parcham (Kehti Hain Sabilein Kehta Hai Muharram) X2 Suno Zinda Hai Hussain Suno Zinda Hai Hussain

Shaah Ast Hussain Badshaah Ast Hussain, Deen Ast Hussain Deepanah Ast Hussain

  4. Akbar Ka Kaleja Halq-E-Ali Asgher, Abbas Ke Baazu Zainab Ka Khula Sar (Kehte Hain Ye Tujhse Ay Shaam Ke Lashkar) X2 Suno Zinda Hai Hussain Suno Zinda Hai Hussain

Shaah Ast Hussain Badshaah Ast Hussain, Deen Ast Hussain Deepanah Ast Hussain

  5. Marqad Se Nikal Kar Khud Fatema Zahra, Maqtal Ki Zameen Par Deti Rahi Pehra (Khanjar Se Sina Se Kehti Rahi Zahra) X2 Suno Zinda Hai Hussain Suno Zinda Hai Hussain

Shaah Ast Hussain Badshaah Ast Hussain, Deen Ast Hussain Deepanah Ast Hussain

  6. Zanjeer-E-Sitam Ne Rasta Nahi Roka, Pehne Huwi Bairi Chalte Rahe Mawla (Kehta Hai Abhi Tak Sajjad Ka Sajda) X2 Suno Zinda Hai Hussain Suno Zinda Hai Hussain

Shaah Ast Hussain Badshaah Ast Hussain, Deen Ast Hussain Deepanah Ast Hussain

  7. Adaa Ke Tamache Rukhsaare Sakeena, Jhalta Huwa Damaan Gharmi Ka Mahina (Kehti Thi Phuphi Se Har Aik Se Kehna) X2 Suno Zinda Hai Hussain Suno Zinda Hai Hussain

Shaah Ast Hussain Badshaah Ast Hussain, Deen Ast Hussain Deepanah Ast Hussain

  8. Beemare Madina Woh Fatema Sughra, Darwaaze Pe Baithi Takti Hai Jo Rasta (Khud Ko Yehi Kehkar Deti Hai Dilasa) X2 Suno Zinda Hai Hussain Suno Zinda Hai Hussain

Shaah Ast Hussain Badshaah Ast Hussain, Deen Ast Hussain Deepanah Ast Hussain

  9. Sarwar Sare Majlis Zikre Shahe Waala, Raihaan Musalsal Is Gham Ka Hawala (Dorahta Hai Har Dam Tareekh Ka Jumla) X2 Suno Zinda Hai Hussain Suno Zinda Hai Hussain

Shaah Ast Hussain Badshaah Ast Hussain, Deen Ast Hussain Deepanah Ast Hussain

  10. (Sar Daad Na Daad Dast Dar Dast Yazeed) X3 Haqqa Ke Bina La Illaaha Ast Hussain


Shaah Ast Hussain Badshaah Ast Hussain, Deen Ast Hussain Deepanah Ast Hussain

tracks.title: Ya Hussain
tracks.lyrics:
(Hussain Hussain Hussain) X3

(Mere Lahu Ke Har Qatre Mei Gunj Raha Hai Ya Hussain, Ab To Sabka Vird
Zubaa(N) Bhi Rehna Laga Hai Ya Hussain) X2

  1. Aap Ki Kya Shaan Hai Maula, Bolta Quran Hai Maula

Fatema Ki Jaan Hai Maula, Marzi-E-Subhan Hai Maula

(Mere Lahu Ke Har Qatre Mei Gunj Raha Hai Ya Hussain, Ab To Sabka Vird
Zubaa(N) Bhi Rehna Laga Hai Ya Hussain) X2

  2. Karbala Ka Fat'he Azaam Bakhuda Hai Waris-E-Adam

Jabajaa Phehle Tere Par Aam Ta Abad Hoga Tera Matam

(Mere Lahu Ke Har Qatre Mei Gunj Raha Hai Ya Hussain, Ab To Sabka Vird
Zubaa(N) Bhi Rehna Laga Hai Ya Hussain) X2

  3. Teen Din Ki Tishnagi Maula Haaye Teri Bekasi Maula

Khushk Ghardan Par Churi Maula, Karbala Kehti Rahi Maula

(Mere Lahu Ke Har Qatre Mei Gunj Raha Hai Ya Hussain, Ab To Sabka Vird
Zubaa(N) Bhi Rehna Laga Hai Ya Hussain) X2

  4. Kistarha Bhoolenge Wo Manzar Jab Chala Tha Halk Pe Khanjar

Jab Sina Ki Nok Pe Tha Sar Bol Tha Qur'an Tere Lab Par

(Mere Lahu Ke Har Qatre Mei Gunj Raha Hai Ya Hussain, Ab To Sabka Vird
Zubaa(N) Bhi Rehna Laga Hai Ya Hussain) X2

  5. Ye Sabile Ye Azakhana Aankh Mei Ashko(N) Se Paymaane

Matmi Laaye Hai Nazraane Ab Janaab-E-Sayyeda Jaane

(Mere Lahu Ke Har Qatre Mei Gunj Raha Hai Ya Hussain, Ab To Sabka Vird
Zubaa(N) Bhi Rehna Laga Hai Ya Hussain) X2

  6. Ye Teri Maula Azadari Zindagi Se Bhi Hame Pyaari

Hai Yahi Tujse Wafadari Ashk Ankho(N) Se Rahe Jaari

(Mere Lahu Ke Har Qatre Mei Gunj Raha Hai Ya Hussain, Ab To Sabka Vird
Zubaa(N) Bhi Rehna Laga Hai Ya Hussain) X2

  7. Waris-E-Qur'an Zindabaad Rehbar-E-Insaan Zindabad

Mazhar-E-Imaan Zindabad Fatema Ki Jaan Zindabad

(Mere Lahu Ke Har Qatre Mei Gunj Raha Hai Ya Hussain, Ab To Sabka Vird
Zubaa(N) Bhi Rehna Laga Hai Ya Hussain) X2

  8. As-Salaam Ay Malike Kausar As-Salaam Ay Kushta-E-Khanjar

As-Salaam Ay Jaan-E-Payghambar Kehte Hai "Rehan-O-Sarwar"

(Mere Lahu Ke Har Qatre Mei Gunj Raha Hai Ya Hussain, Ab To Sabka Vird
Zubaa(N) Bhi Rehna Laga Hai Ya Hussain) X2

tracks.title: Bhaayi Shabbir
tracks.lyrics:
Le Chala Karvaan Khuda Hafiz,

(Haaye Shabbir Fiamanillah, Chali Hamsheer Fiamanillah) X2

(Zamin Ye Bikhre Huwe Noor Is Behen Ka Salaam) X2

Badan Darida O Majboor Is Behen Ka Salaam

Chali Hai Tumse Bohot Door Is Behen Ka Salaam

Misaale Fatema Har Dukh Me Muskuraungi

Hussaim Zindaa Hai Duniya Ko Me Bataungi

Bhayi Shabbir Fiamanilla, Chali Hamsheer Fiamanillah

  1. Salaam Umme Abiha Ke Godh Ke Paale,

Salaam Karte Hai Zehra Ke Haath Ke Chaale,

Salaam Zulfe Muhammed Se Khelne Waale,

(Parenge Durre To Me Sabr Aazmaungi) X2

Hussaim Zindaa Hai Duniya Ko Me Bataungi

Bhayi Shabbir Fiamanilla, Chali Hamsheer Fiamanillah

  2. Ye Gham Nahi Hai Ke Me Sogwaar Kaydi Hun,

Abu Turaab Ki Aur Fatema Ki Beti Hun,

Me Is Kaleje Mai Kuwwat Ali Ki Rakhti Hun,

(Yazide Waqt Ke Khayber Ki Mai Garaaungi) X2

Hussaim Zindaa Hai Duniya Ko Me Bataungi

Bhayi Shabbir Fiamanilla, Chali Hamsheer Fiamanillah

  3. Rahe Wafaa Ke Bahattar Masafiron Ki Kassam,

Labe Farat Sulagte Huwe Gharon Ki Kassam,

Sina Ki Nok Pe Rakhe Huwe Saron Ki Kassam

(Jalaale Hazrate Abbas Banke Jaaungi) X2

Hussaim Zindaa Hai Duniya Ko Me Bataungi

Bhayi Shabbir Fiamanilla, Chali Hamsheer Fiamanillah

  4. Khushi Se Ehle Sitam Bandha De Mere Bazu,

Benege Nuh Ka Tufaan Ab Mere Ansuu,

Na Chhut Sakegi Ye Khune Hussain Ki Khushbu,

(Me Sar Khule Huwe Darbaare Shaam Jaungi) X2

Hussaim Zindaa Hai Duniya Ko Me Bataungi

Bhayi Shabbir Fiamanilla, Chali Hamsheer Fiamanillah

  5. Nigaah Janibe Dariya Uthi To Itna Kahaa,

Mere Diler Alamdaar Fathaye Dariya

Tujhe Khabar Hai Mere Sarse Chhingayi Hai Rida

(Tere Alam Ka Pharera Rida Banaaungi) X2

Hussaim Zindaa Hai Duniya Ko Me Bataungi

Bhayi Shabbir Fiamanilla, Chali Hamsheer Fiamanillah

  6. Jo Ponchi Shaam To Bazaar Ko Sajaa Dekha,

Kabhi Najaf To Kabhi Sue Karbala Dekha

Pukaari Baba Mera Tumne Hosla Dekha

(Jahaa Bhi Jawungi Farshe Azaa Bichaungi) X2

Hussaim Zindaa Hai Duniya Ko Me Bataungi

Bhayi Shabbir Fiamanilla, Chali Hamsheer Fiamanillah

  7. Suna Hai "Sarwaro Rehan" Khwahare Shabbir

Ali Ke Lehje Me Karti Ye Jis Ghari Takreer

Yazeedon Shimr Ke Sine Pe Chalti Thi Shamsheer

(Wo Jab Ye Kehti Thi Wade Ko Me Nibhaaungi) X2

Hussaim Zindaa Hai Duniya Ko Me Bataungi

Bhayi Shabbir Fiamanilla, Chali Hamsheer Fiamanillah

(Le Chala Karvaan Khuda Hafiz) X3

tracks.title: Aun-O-Muhammad
tracks.lyrics:
Kehti Thi Zainab Ay Mere Sheyro, Kehti Thi Zainab, Mere Dilero

(Aun-O-Muhammad Mere, Aun-O-Muhammad) X4

  1. Khwaab Ye Zainab Ka Tha, Chaand Sitare Mere (Chaand Sitare) X2

Mamu Pe Hogaye Fida, God Ke Pale Mere (God Ke Pale) X2

Khwaab Ye Sacha Huwa, Sar Mere Uncha Raha, Hone Ko Sheh Par Fida Laal Mere,
Sheyr Mere Chaand Mere

(Aun-O-Muhammad Mere, Aun-O-Muhammad) X2

  2. Jaffar-E-Tayyar Ke Khun Ke Akkas Ho (Khun Ke Akkas) X2

Husn Mei Akbar Ho Tum Josh Mei Abbas Ho (Josh Mei Abbas) X2

Jang Ke Maydaan Mei Maut Ke Armaan Mei, Saya-E-Qur'an Mei, Aise Utho Aise Paro
Maut Pe Tum Qud Paro

(Aun-O-Muhammad Mere, Aun-O-Muhammad) X2

  3. Ha Meri Tafeed Par Dhyan Tumhara Raho, (Dhyaan Tumhara) X2

Jake Lab-E-Nehr Bhi Pyaas Gawara Rahe (Pyaas Gawara) X2

Dud Na Bakshungi Mei, Mu Bhi Na Dekhungi Mei, Sheyr Ki Beti Hu Mei, Wada Karo
Aao Chalo, Tum Na Raho

(Aun-O-Muhammad Mere, Aun-O-Muhammad) X2

  4. Maana Ke Pyaase Ho Tum, Pyaas Pe Kabu Rahe (Pyaas Pe Kaabu) X2

Sheh Ke Alamdar Ki, Saans Mei Khushbu Rahe (Saans Mei Khushbu) X2

Bas Ye Tamanna Meri, Laaj Rahe Khun Ki, Hai Ye Wasiyat Meri, Khawo Qasam,
Jaawo Hasham, Hoga Na Kam

(Aun-O-Muhammad Mere, Aun-O-Muhammad) X2

  5. Aun Ye Kehna Laga, Bhaayi Muhammad Suno (Bhaayi Muhammad) X2

Eik Taraf Mei Baro, Eik Taraf Tum Barho (Eik Taraf Tum) X2

Jang Ho Fowj-E-Sitam, Jang Kare Aise Ham, Maamu Hame De Alam, Deke Hame Amma
Kahe Jite Rahe

(Aun-O-Muhammad Mere, Aun-O-Muhammad) X2

  6. Dono Jari Jang Ko Surat-E-Andhi Bare, (Surat-E-Andhi) X2

Nana Ali Ki Tarha, Maut Pe Havi Rahe (Maut Pe Havi) X2

Milke Jo Hamla Kiya, Meymana-O-Mesra, Eik Me Dam Hogaya, Teygh-E-Ali, Aise
Chali, Dhum Machi

(Aun-O-Muhammad Mere, Aun-O-Muhammad) X2

  7. Dekh Rahi Thi Jo Maa Khayme Ke Darpar Khari, (Khayme Ke Dar Par) X2

Saath Wahi The Khare Hazrat-E-Abbas Bhi, (Hazrat-E-Abbas) X2

Bhaayi Behen Saath The, Sahib-E-Awlaad The, Waris-E-Ajdaad The, Kehne Lage
Khub Lare Sheyr Mere

(Aun-O-Muhammad Mere, Aun-O-Muhammad) X2

  8. Larte Kaha Tak Bhala Pyaas Ke Maare Huwe (Pyaas Ke Mare) X2

Jalti Huwi Khaak Par Dono Tarapne Laga (Dono Tarapne) X2

Bhaayi Se Kehne Lagi, Fakhr Se Bint-E-Ali, Surkhru Zainab Huwi, Sar Pe Tere
Bhaayi Mere, Laal Huwe

(Aun-O-Muhammad Mere, Aun-O-Muhammad) X2

  9. Aun-O-Muhammad Na The, Wo Dur-E-Nayaab The (Wo Dur-E-Nayaab) X2

"Sarwar-O-Rehan" Wo Wakif-E-Adab The (Wakif-E-Adab) X2

Hukm Jo Maa Ne Diya Rukh Na Kiya Nehr Ka, Pyaas Ka Sadma Saha, Maa Ne Kaha
Shukhr-E-Khuda, Huwe Fida

(Aun-O-Muhammad Mere, Aun-O-Muhammad) X2

tracks.title: Allah Jaane Kaha
tracks.lyrics:
Jab Shaam Ke Zindaan Mei Huwi, Shaam Haram Ko. Ik Aan Na Rahat Ki Na Araam
Haram Ko. Har Baar Tapakta Tha Lahu, Ashk Rawaan Se (Zindaan Larazta Tha) X2
Sakina Ki Fugha Se

(Allah Jaane, Kaha Ho Ay Baba) X2

Baba Kitni Rate Guzar Gayi Baba

Allah Jaane, Kaha Ho Ay Baba

(Chote Se Sin Mei Qaydi Zindaan Hogayi) X3

(Baba Mei Kyu Na Aap Pe) X2 Qurbaan Hogayi

(Allah Jaane, Kaha Ho Ay Baba) X2

  1. Din Mei Jo Mere Dard Hai Khaliq Ke Hai Ayaa(N)

Kisko Kahu(N) Mei Baap Mere, Baap Hai Kahaa(N)

Tum Bekafan Mei Besaro Samaan Hogayi

(Baba Mei Kyu Na Aap Pe) X2 Qurbaan Hogayi

(Allah Jaane, Kaha Ho Ay Baba) X2

  2. Kya Kya Na Khalq Karne Hakarat Se Behgayi

Mei Bekasi Se Dekhke Muh Sabka Rehgayi

Kurta Phata Huwa Meri Pehchaan Hogayi

(Baba Mei Kyu Na Aap Pe) X2 Qurbaan Hogayi

(Allah Jaane, Kaha Ho Ay Baba) X2

  3. Dar Aah Ki To Shimr Pukara Khamosh Ho

Aur Chup Huwi To Be Padari Ne Kaha Ke Ro

In Afato Mei Girse Pareshaan Hogayi

(Baba Mei Kyu Na Aap Pe) X2 Qurbaan Hogayi

(Allah Jaane, Kaha Ho Ay Baba) X2

  4. Be Jurm Kaan Zakhmi Huwe Aur Tamache Khaaye

Jo Chaahe Mujh Falak Ki Sataayi Ko Phir Sataaye

Shehzaadi-E-Hussain Ki Ye Shaan Hogayi

(Baba Mei Kyu Na Aap Pe) X2 Qurbaan Hogayi

(Allah Jaane, Kaha Ho Ay Baba) X2

  5. Sadke Gayi Bataawo Kaha Hai Mere Padar

Aaye Padar To Jaaye Sakina Bhi Apne Ghar

Kyu Aise Zalimo(N) Ki Mei Mehman Hogayi

(Baba Mei Kyu Na Aap Pe) X2 Qurbaan Hogayi

(Allah Jaane, Kaha Ho Ay Baba) X2

  6. Poti Hu(N) Uski Jo Ke Hai Kohnain Ka Ameer

Jisne Hazaro Qayd Se Churwaaye Diyey Aseer

Ummat Nabi Ki Dekhke Anjaan Hogayi

(Baba Mei Kyu Na Aap Pe) X2 Qurbaan Hogayi

(Allah Jaane, Kaha Ho Ay Baba) X2

  7. Jab Sarpe Shah-E-Deen Ke Sakina Ne Phiri Nazar

Chillaayi Roke Haye Gazab Mar Gaye Padar

Baba Ke Sar Ko Dekhke Hayraan Hogayi

(Baba Mei Kyu Na Aap Pe) X2 Qurbaan Hogayi

(Allah Jaane, Kaha Ho Ay Baba) X2

  8. Mu Rakh Ke Mu Pe Shaah Ko Royi Jo Dil Fighaar

Sadma Huwa Nikaalne Lagi Tan Se Jaan-E-Waar

Nanhi Si Jaan Jaan Se Bejaan Hogayi

(Baba Mei Kyu Na Aap Pe) X2 Qurbaan Hogayi

(Allah Jaane, Kaha Ho Ay Baba) X2

  9. Bas Ay "Anees" Bazm Mei Hai Giryaa-O-Buka

Sadiyo(N) Talak Rulaayenga Sabko Ye Marsiya

Bali Sakina Qarb Ka Unhwaan Hogayi

(Baba Mei Kyu Na Aap Pe) X2 Qurbaan Hogayi

(Allah Jaane, Kaha Ho Ay Baba) X2

Baba Kitni Rate Guzar Gayi Baba

Allah Jaane, Kaha Ho Ay Baba

tracks.title: Jaao Ke Na Ab Deyr Karo
tracks.lyrics:
Qafela Lutgaya Amma Mera Lashkar Na Raha, Amma Nana Ki Nishaani Ali Akbar Na
Raha, Rehgaya Dard-E-Kamar Haaye Baradar Na Raha. Ab Khabar Aapne Li Ghar Ki
Ke Jab Ghar Na Raha. Aur Ab Dam-E-Zibha Ye Pure Mere Armaa(N) Karna. Arsh Ke
Niche Na Baalo(N) Ko Parishaa(N) Karna

(Jaao Ke Na Ab Deyr Karo, Dekho Na Amma, Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na
Zamee(N) Par) X3

  1. Aap Aayi Hai Amma Mei Salaami Ko Na Uttha

Hai Dard Kaleje Mei Jo Uthna Nahi Deta

Hasrat Se Tere Pehle Mei Dam Mera Nikalta

Mei Cheyn Se Sojata Tere God Mei Madar

Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na Zamee(N) Par, Jaao Ke Na Ab Deyr Karo, Dekho
Na Amma, Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na Zamee(N) Par

  2. Are Kuch Deyr Mei Neze Pe Rakha Honga Mera Sar

Na Dekhna Us Waqt Mujhe Madar-E-Muztar

Chaljayenga Us Waqt Tere Qalb Pe Khanjar

Gore Abhi Dorenge Meri Laash Ke Uppar

Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na Zamee(N) Par, Jaao Ke Na Ab Deyr Karo, Dekho
Na Amma, Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na Zamee(N) Par

  3. Mei Subh Se Ta Asr Uthata Raha Lashe

Daman Mei Chune Qasim-E-Nawshaah Ke Tukre

Lipta Ali Akbar Ka Kaleja Tha Sina Se

Amma Mere Chehre Pe Hai Khun-E-Ali Asghar

Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na Zamee(N) Par, Jaao Ke Na Ab Deyr Karo, Dekho
Na Amma, Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na Zamee(N) Par

  4. Is Haal Mei Amma Hai Teri God Ka Pala

Maqtal Mei Mera Khogaya Har Eik Ujaala

Hai Kon Sakina Ko Meri Poochne Wala

Soeyngi Mere Sine Pe Kaise Meri Dukhtar

Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na Zamee(N) Par, Jaao Ke Na Ab Deyr Karo, Dekho
Na Amma, Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na Zamee(N) Par

  5. Dekho To Qayamt Hai Bapa Ehl-E-Haram Mei

Khayme Se Nikal Aayi Hai Zainab Mere Gham Mei

Ab Ane Ko Hai Bibiya(N) Bahar Koi Dam Mei

Samjaawo Unhe Amma Rahe Khayme Ke Andar

Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na Zamee(N) Par, Jaao Ke Na Ab Deyr Karo, Dekho
Na Amma, Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na Zamee(N) Par

  6. Lo Saans Ubharne Lagi Dil Doob Raha Hai

Nazro(N) Mei Meri Zainab-E-Muztar Ki Rida Hai

Abid Se Thi Umeed So Wo Ghash Mei Para Hai

Kya Honga Mere Baad Sakina Ka Muqaddar

Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na Zamee(N) Par, Jaao Ke Na Ab Deyr Karo, Dekho
Na Amma, Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na Zamee(N) Par

  7. Ay "Sarwar-O-Rehan" Bayaan Kaise Ho Manzar

Sheh Kehte The Amma Ye Kara Waqt Hai Mujpar

Kistarha Kaleje Se Lagu Aapke Uth Kar

Kyu Munga Qadam Aapke Ab Mei Lab-E-Quasar

Ke Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na Zamee(N) Par, Jaao Ke Na Ab Deyr Karo,
Dekho Na Amma, Ab Laal Tera Zeen Pe Hai Aur Na Zamee(N) Par

tracks.title: Musafiran-E-Musibat
tracks.lyrics:
Na Mehmil Hai Na Haudaj Hai,

Na Lashkar Ki Wo Sajdhaj Hai,

Na Sarpe Alam Na Chadar Hai,

Allah Ye Kaisa Manzar Hai,

(Musafirane Musibat, Watan Me Aate Hai) X2

  1. Safar Se Aate Hai Soghate Dard Laate Hai

(Musafirane Musibat, Watan Me Aate Hai) X2

  2. Kiya Salaam Muhammed Ke Aastane Ko,

Pataa Ke Aaye Hai Zehra Ke Sab Gharane Ko,

Na Kar Kubool Tu Hum Bekaso Ke Aane Ko,

Ye Nawha Karte Hai Aur Ashk Khu(N) Bahaate Hai

(Musafirane Musibat, Watan Me Aate Hai) X2

  3. Madina Hum Tere Waali Ko Aaye Hai Kho Kar,

Madina Kufe Me Sar Nange Hum Phire Dardar,

Madina Daaghe Rasan Hai Humare Shaano Par,

Uthaa Ke Haath Madine Ko Ye Sunaate Hai

(Musafirane Musibat, Watan Me Aate Hai) X2

  4. Har Ek Kadam Hai Buka Kab Labo Pe Bayn Nahi,

Hamaye Zindaa Pa Zehra Ka Noor Ayn Nahi,

Madina Akbaro Qasim Nahi Hussain Nahi,
