Ye Kaise Kaise Jawaan The Jo Yaad Aate Hai

(Musafirane Musibat, Watan Me Aate Hai) X2

  5. Madine Waalo Kaho Us Behan Ki Kya Taqdir,

Jo Dekhe Apne Biradar Ke Halq Par Shamsheer,

Lahu Me Ghark Jo Dekhe Hussain Ki Tasveer,

Lahu Me Kya Yuhi Baayi Ka Sar Dikhate Hai

(Musafirane Musibat, Watan Me Aate Hai) X2

  6. Batawo Kahte Hai Kya Sab Us Amma Jayi Ko,

Jo Arbaeen Talak De Kafan Na Bhayi Ko,

Bahan Dikhayegi Mu(N) Kis Tarha Khudayi Ko,

Kafan Diya Hai Na Unki Lehed Banaate Hai

(Musafirane Musibat, Watan Me Aate Hai) X2

  7. Chala Bashir Ye Deta Huwa Khabar Har Jee,

Magar Mehelaye Hashim Me Dekhta Hai Kya,

Ke Ik Mariza Sare Raah Hai Khari Tanha,

Hai Muntazir Ke Wo Kunbe Ke Log Aate Hai

(Musafirane Musibat, Watan Me Aate Hai) X2

  8. Khabar Ye Phayli To Matam Har Aik Ghar Me Huwa,

Nikal Nikal Pari Sab Aurate Barehnapaa,

Ghiri Zamin Pe Sughra Ke Uspe Charkh Gira

Ye Soghwaar Hai Sughra Ke Paas Ate Hai

(Musafirane Musibat, Watan Me Aate Hai) X2

  9. Fizae Dard Me Lekar Udaasiya Aayi,

Shapar Se Lit Ke Idher Bhukhi Pyasiya Aayi,

Utho Rasul Tumhari Nawasiya Ayi,

Ye Khudko Untho Se Ehle Haram Ghiraate Hai

(Musafirane Musibat, Watan Me Aate Hai) X2

  10. Jo Aayi Kaan Me Awaaze Banue Muztar

Kaha Ho Ay Mere Wali Imame Jinno Bashar,

Tarap Ke Rehgayi Sughra Bapa Huwa Mehshar,

"Kabir" Bas Ab Falaq Thartharate Hai

(Musafirane Musibat, Watan Me Aate Hai) X2

tracks.title: Abbas Hamara Hai
tracks.lyrics:
(Abbas-E-Ali Aaye Karib-E-Shah-E-Abrrar) X2

Bhayi Ko Alam Deke Kiya Sheh Ne Bohot Pyar

Has Has Ke Rafiko Se Ye Karne Lage Guftaar, Jaisi Ye Meri Fowj Hai Waisaa Hi
Alamdar

Gazi Sa Koyi Deen Ka Sardar Na Hoga, Abbas Sa Dunya Mai(N) Alamdar Na Hoga

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X2 Hashim Ka Kamar Haider-E-Karrar
Pyara

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X2

  1. Haider Ke Garane Ki Sakhawat Sakhi Abbas, Khoone Abu Talib Ki Sadakat Sakhi Abbas, Zehra Ki Duwao Ki Taharat Sakhi Abbas, Kudrat Ne Banaya Nahi Phir Aisaa Dubaraa.

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X2

  2. Qur'an-E-Wafa Sheyr-E-Nayafshaan-E-Ali Hai, Zehra Ki Tamanna Hai Dil-O-Jaan-E-Ali Hai, Is Ke Liye Bachpan Hi Se Farmaan-E-Ali Hai, Mei Ilm Ka Darya Hu Ye Darya Ka Kanara

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X2

  3. Paida Huwe Abbas To Gaudi Me Utha Ker, Zainab Ne Rakha Naam Kaleje Se Lagaa Ker, Chotaa Sa Alam Sheh Ne Diya Unko Sajaa Ker, Dekha Jo Alam Ne To Alam Khud Ye Pukara

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X2

  4. Ye Panjetan-E-Pak Ke Lashker Ka Nisha(N) Hai, Kehte Hai Ye Shabbir Meraa Shere Jawaa(N) Hai, Aisa Koyi Dunya Me Alamdar Kaha Hai, Shehwan Se Hai Sheh Baaz Kalandar Ka Ye Naaraa

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X2

  5. Abbas-E-Ali Ruh-E-Wafaa Jaan-E-Wafa Hai, Abbas-E-Ali Fatema Zehra Ki Duwaa Hai, Har Waqt Alam Chumti Rehti Ye Hawaa Hai, Bhulaa Nahi Abbas Ko Darya Ka Kanaraa

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X2

  6. Dunya-E Shahadat Me Kaha(N) Uskaa Hai Sani, Jo Saare Shahido Ki Safo Me Raha Ghazi, Be Dast Bhi Ho Ker Jo Bhare Joliyaa(N) Sabki, Hashim Ka Kamar Sare Fakiro Ka Sahara

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X2

  7. Haider Ke Garane Ki Sakhawat Sakhi Abbas, Khoone Abu Talib Ki Sadakat Sakhi Abbas, Zehra Ki Duwao Ki Taharat Sakhi Abbas, Kudrat Ne Banaya Nahi Phir Aisaa Dubaraa.

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X2

  8. Ye Panjetan-E-Pak Ke Lashker Ka Nisha(N) Hai, Kehte Hai Ye Shabbir Meraa Shere Jawaa(N) Hai, Aisa Koyi Dunya Me Alamdar Kaha Hai, Shehwan Se Hai Sheh Baaz Kalandar Ka Ye Naaraa

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X2

  9. Lazim Hai Ke Ham Dekhe(N)Ge Ik Roza Ye Manzar, Farmayenge Jab Mehdiyo Dora Dar-E-Mimbar, Kabe Se Namudaar Jo Hoga Mera Lashkar, Hoga Yahi Lashkar Ka Alamdar Hamaraa.

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X2

  10. Yad Ata Hai Wo Rukhsate-E-Abbas Ka Manzar, Wo Rona Sakina Ka Phareyra Ko Pakar Kar, Wo Dekhna Zainab Ka Kabhi Sar Kabhi Chadar, Kehti Thi Palat Aye Behen Bhayi Ka Pyara

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X2

  11. Abbas Gaye Hogaya Maula Mere Tanha, Dekha Kabhi Maydaa(N) To Kabhi Janib-E-Darya, Nagaah Alam Nehr Pe Girte Huwe Dekha, Zainab Se Kaha Sheyr Gaya Nehr Pe Mara

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X2

  12. Ay "Sarwar-O-Rehan" Ye Imaan Hai Apna, Abbas Ke Parcham Ka Sada Sarpe Hai Saya, Parne Ke Liye Hashr Mei Shabbir Ka Nawha, Abbas Bulaayenge Hame Karke Ishara

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X2

(Hashim Ka Kamar) X2 Haider-E-Karrar Ka Pyaara

Sakhi (Abbas Hamara Hai(N) Alamdar Hamara) X4

tracks.title: Haay Sughra Bata
tracks.lyrics:
_

Haay Sughra Bata_

Maula Matal Mei Sar Ko Jhukaaye

Laash-E-Akbar Pe Tanha Khare Hai

Dheeme Dheeme Tapakte Hai Aansu

Haay Sughra Ka Khat Parh Rahe Hai

(Bole Kya Mei Jawaab Is Ka Du) X2

Haay Sughra Bata Kya Likhu(N)

(Aur Sughra Bata Kya Likhu(N)) X5

  1. Mei To Pardes Mei Lut Gaya

Apne Lashkar Ko Mei Ro Chuka

(Tera Baba Ghareeb Hogaya) X2

Aur Iske Siwa Kya Likhu(N)

(Haay Sughra Bata Kya Likhu(N)) X2

  2. Aandhiya Mera Ghar Legayi

Mere Lakht-E-Jigar Legayi

(Mera Noor-E-Nazar Legayi) X2

Aur Iske Siwa Kya Likhu(N)

(Haay Sughra Bata Kya Likhu(N)) X2

  3. Khat Tera Ab Sunaawu Kise

Kon Meri Sada Par Uthe

(Shab Ko Jaage Huwe Sogaye) X2

Aur Iske Siwa Kya Likhu(N)

(Haay Sughra Bata Kya Likhu(N)) X2

  4. Haay Sughra Wo Bhaayi Tera

Jisne Tujh Se Tha Wada Kiya

(Kha Gayi Usko Karbobala) X2

Aur Iske Siwa Kya Likhu(N)

(Haay Sughra Bata Kya Likhu(N)) X2

  5. Pyaar Tune Tha Jisko Likha

Ghutinyo Bhi Jo Na Chal Saka

(Haa(N) Wo Asghar Bhi Ab Na Raha) X2

Aur Iske Siwa Kya Likhu(N)

(Haay Sughra Bata Kya Likhu(N)) X2

  6. Shab Ko Dulha Banaya Jisse

Raas Aayi Na Mehendhi Jisse

(Royi Sehre Ki Lariyaa(N) Jisse) X2

Aur Iske Siwa Kya Likhu(N)

(Haay Sughra Bata Kya Likhu(N)) X2

  7. Ab Sakina Ka Hafiz Khuda

Waqt Zainab Pe Bhi Hai Khara

(Mujh Ko Ghere Huwe Hai Qaza) X2

Aur Iske Siwa Kya Likhu(N)

(Haay Sughra Bata Kya Likhu(N)) X2

  8. Ye To Accha Huwa Laadli

Apne Ghar Mei Tu Rehgayi

(Beridaayi Se To Bachgayi) X2

Aur Iske Siwa Kya Likhu(N)

(Haay Sughra Bata Kya Likhu(N)) X2

  9. Khat Wo "Rehan-O-Sarwar" Tha Kya

Khaak Se Mera Maula Utha

(Laash-E-Akbar Pe Khat Rakhdiya) X2

Aur Iske Siwa Kya Likhu(N)

(Haay Sughra Bata Kya Likhu(N)) X2

_|

![](Hayesughra1.Jpg)

![](Hayesughra2.Jpg)
---|---

tracks.title: Ham Dekhenge
tracks.lyrics:
Allahuma Salle Ala Muhamaddi-Wa Aal-E-Muhammad

Bismillahir Rahmanir-Rahim

Ya Muhammado Ya Aliyyo, Ya Aliyyo Ya Muhammad

Ikfayanee Fa Innakuma Kaafeyaa(N)

Wansuraani Fa Innakuma Naasiraan

Ya Mawlana Ya Sahebuz-Zamaan

Al Ghauth, Al Ghauth, Al Ghauth

Adrikni, Adrikni, Adrikni

As-Saa'at, As-Saa'at, As-Saa'ah

Al-'Ajal, Al-'Ajal, Al-'Ajal

(Yabnaz-Zahra) X3 Maa Zehra

(Yabnaz-Zahra) X3 Ya Fatema

Ya Sayyedi, Ya Murshadi

Ya Maulaayi, Ya Hassan Mujtaba

Shaam-O-Sahar, Ay Rahabar

Ay Tajdaar-E-Kaun-O-Makaan

Noor-E-Khuda, Ay Muntazar

Hai Muntazir Ye Saara Jahaan

(Yabnaz-Zahra) X3 Ya Fatema

(Yabnaz-Zahra) X3 Ya Fatema

Kehte Hai Sab, Jinn-O-Bashar,

Arz-O-Samaan-O-Dashta-E-Jamal

Hai Mushrekee(N), Lakho(N) Agar

Hai Muhskilo(N) Ka Tu Hi Hal

Aane Lagi, Dekho Sada

(Hayya Ala Khayril Amal) X2

(Ham Dekhenge) X2 Lazim Hai Ke Ham Bhi Dekhenge (Ham Dekhenge) X2

  1. (Wo Roz Ke Jiska Wada Hai) X2

Jo Lauh-E-Azal Pe Likha Hai

Jo Tera Hai Jo Mera Hai

Konain Mei Jiska Charcha Hai

Jab Lauh-O-Qalam Ke Chehre Se

Parde Sarkaaye Jaayenge

Ham Dekhenge, Lazim Hai Ke Ham Bhi Dekhenge, Ham Dekhenge

  2. (Kuch Raat Gayi Kuch Baki Hai) X2

Pardo(N) Mei Sahar Kuch Kehti Hai

Dil Par Jo Ye Dastak Hoti Hai

Ghaybat Mei Koi Ik Haadi Hai

Jo Hazir-O-Nazir-O-Qaaim Hai

Wo Aayenge Haa(N) Ayenge

Ham Dekhenge, Lazim Hai Ke Ham Bhi Dekhenge, Ham Dekhenge

  3. Haa(N) Dekh Badalte Mausam Ko

Kya Ho Gaya Nazm-E-Aalam Ko

Cheyn Aata Nahi Hai Akhir Kyu(N)

Be Chayniye Nasl-E-Adam Ko

Dene De Sada Us Qaaim Ko

Har Uljhan Wo Suljaayenge

Ham Dekhenge, Lazim Hai Ke Ham Bhi Dekhenge, Ham Dekhenge

  4. (Ye Jaffer-E-Sadiq Ne Hai Kahaa) X2

Wo Roz Juma Hai Ashura

Jab Unki Sawaari Ayengi

Tazeem Karengi Karbobala

Kaabe Se Azaa(N) Phir Gunjengi

Wo Eik Alam Lehraaenge

Ham Dekhenge, Lazim Hai Ke Ham Bhi Dekhenge, Ham Dekhenge

  5. Wo Masjid-E-Kufa Mei Aakar

Majlis Ka Sajaayenge Mimbhar

Wo Pursa Lenge Duniya Se

Shabbir Ka Khud Zakir Bankar

Zainab Ke Masaaib Karke Bayaa(N)

Mimbhar Pe Hi Ghash Khaajayenge

Ham Dekhenge, Lazim Hai Ke Ham Bhi Dekhenge, Ham Dekhenge

  6. (Ankho(N) Mei Imam-E-Zamana Ki) X2

Rehti Hai Sada Ik Sath Hijri

Kehte Hai Ziyarat-E-Nahiya Mei

Mei Bhool Nahi Sakta Hu Kabhi

Maa Baine Zameen-O-Zeen Jo Tha

Wo Laasha Bhool Na Paayenge

Ham Dekhenge, Lazim Hai Ke Ham Bhi Dekhenge, Ham Dekhenge

  7. (Paighaame Imam-E-Zamana Hai) X2

Gar Jald Mujhe Bulwaana Hai

Taqwe Ke Musalle Par Jaakar

Paighame Amal Pheylaana Hai

Jab Ilm Ke Deep Jalaawonge

Ham Ghaybat Se Aajayenge

Ham Dekhenge, Lazim Hai Ke Ham Bhi Dekhenge, Ham Dekhenge

  8. (Tajeel Ho Ab Ibn-E-Zehra) X2

Hai Vird "Rehan-O-Sarwar" Ka

Duniya Ko Zaroorat Aap Ki Hai

Deti Hai Sadaaye Karbobala

Wo Roz Ke Jis Ka Wada Hai

Wo Wada Aap Nibhaayenge

Ham Dekhenge, Lazim Hai Ke Ham Bhi Dekhenge, Ham Dekhenge |

![](Humdekhenge1.Jpg)

![](Humdekhenge2.Jpg)
---|---

tracks.title: Ham Honge Kahi
tracks.lyrics:
Sheh Kehte The Bibi Hame Ab Jaane Do Ghar Se

Wo Kehti Thi Saya Jo Ye Uth Jaayenga Sar Se

Haay Haay Mei Tumhe Dhundh Ke Laawungi Kidhar Se

Sheh Kehte The Maqtal Hi Mei Paawongi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

  1. Dhundonge To Phir Ham Ko Na Paogi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

Dhundonge To Phir Ham Ko Na Paogi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

  2. Jab Umr Thi Kam Ham Bhi Chute The Yuhi Maa(N) Se

Sote The Lipat Kar Yuhi Khatoon-E-Jina Se

Kuch Unka Huwa Saamne Ankho(N) Ke Jahaa(N) Se

Sadme Yahi Ab Tum Bhi Uthaaogi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

Dhundonge To Phir Ham Ko Na Paogi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

  3. Jangal Mei Bohot Qaafle Lut Jaate Hai Bibi

Barso Jo Rahe Saath Wo Chut Jaate Hai Bibi

Hasrat Se Ye Dam Seeno Mei Ghut Jaate Hai Bibi

Chut Jaaogi Baba Ko Na Paaogi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

Dhundonge To Phir Ham Ko Na Paogi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

  4. Din Hijr Ke Aa Pohonche Gaye Wasl Ke Ayyam

Likha Tha Bohot Kam Teri Taqdeer Mei Aaraam

Dikhlayegi Ye Subh Yateemi Ki Tumhe Shaam

Kis Tarha Se Ye Daakh Uthaogi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

Dhundonge To Phir Ham Ko Na Paogi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

  5. Yu Kehne Lagi Seene Pe Mu(N) Rakh Ke Wo Nadaan

Kehti Hai Yateemi Se Ke Mei Aap Pe Qurbaan

Hazrat Se Kaha Sakht Musibat Hai Meri Jaan

Cheyn Aisi Aziyyat Mei Na Paaogi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

Dhundonge To Phir Ham Ko Na Paogi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

  6. Ab Aaya Samajh Mei Ye Sukha Honto Pe Laana

Kyu(N) Kehte The Zainab Isse Chati Pe Sulaana

Are Baano Mere Peeche Na Sakina Ko Rulaana

Dil Kehta Tha Baba Ko Na Paaogi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

Dhundonge To Phir Ham Ko Na Paogi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

  7. Khamosh "Anees" Ab Ke Jigar Chaak Hai Gham Se

Behta Hai Lahu Ashk Ki Jaan Dida-E-Nam Se

Doori Ye Ziyarat Sahi Jaati Nahi Ham Se

Kya Roze Pe Apne Na Bulaaogi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina

Dhundonge To Phir Ham Ko Na Paogi Sakina

Ham Honge Kahi Tum Kahi Jawongi Sakina |

![](Hamhonge.jpg)
---|---

tracks.title: Khanjar Qareeb
tracks.lyrics:
(Jab Mera Hussain, Fatema Ka Cheyn) X2

Pushte Raahwaar Se Khaak Pe Ghira

(Ya Hussain) X3

Khanjar Qareeb, Zanu-E-Qatil Qareeb Hai

(Ya Hussain) X2

(Khanjar Qareeb, Zanu-E-Qatil Qareeb Hai, Aaj Imtehaan Sabr-E-Husain-E-Ghareeb
Hai) X2

  1. Jaan Kar Qareeb Tar Mera Parwardigaar Dekh

Aashiq Ka Apne Reyg-E-Tapaa(N) Par Qaraar Dekh

Mera Yakeen Dekh Mera Etebaar Dekh

Mei Kitna Mutmain Hu(N) Idhar Eik Baar Dekh

Khanjar Qareeb, Zanu-E-Qatil Qareeb Hai, Aaj Imtehaan Sabr-E-Husain-E-Ghareeb
Hai

  2. Pyaasa Hu(N) Teen Roz Ka Zakhmo(N) Se Choor Hu(N)

Ya Rab Gawaah Rahiyo Ke Mei Bekasur Hu(N)

Che Maah Ho Gaye Mei Watan Se Bhi Door Hu(N)

Ab Teri Baargaah Mei Tere Huzoor Hu(N)

Khanjar Qareeb, Zanu-E-Qatil Qareeb Hai, Aaj Imtehaan Sabr-E-Husain-E-Ghareeb
Hai

  3. Ek Qalb-E-Natawaan Be Bahattar Ka Daagh Hai

Athara Saal Ke Ali Akbar Ka Daagh Hai

Bazu Burida Sher Ka Asghar Ka Daag Hai

Lagna Abhi Luti Huwi Chadar Ka Daagh Hai

Khanjar Qareeb, Zanu-E-Qatil Qareeb Hai, Aaj Imtehaan Sabr-E-Husain-E-Ghareeb
Hai

  4. Eh Keh Ke Jo Khamosh Huwe Sibt-E-Payambar

Dekh Ke Sarhaane Khari Hai Madar-E-Muztar

Shehzadi Ke Sar Par Hai Pari Khaak Ki Chadar

Kehti Wo Sar God Mei Shabbir Ka Lekar

Khanjar Qareeb, Zanu-E-Qatil Qareeb Hai, Aaj Imtehaan Sabr-E-Husain-E-Ghareeb
Hai

  5. Mazloom Ki Imdaad Ko Aata Nahi Koi

Paani Dam-E-Marg Pilata Nahi Koi

Zakhmo(N) Pe Lagi Khaak Churaata Nahi Koi

Haay Haay Mere Bache Ko Bachata Nahi Koi

Khanjar Qareeb, Zanu-E-Qatil Qareeb Hai, Aaj Imtehaan Sabr-E-Husain-E-Ghareeb
Hai

  6. Haider Se Kaha Zehra Ne Khof Ata Hai Saheb

Maa(N) Hu(N) Mera Dil Dard Se Tharrata Hai Saheb

Ye Dekhiye Duniya Se Pisar Jaata Hai Saheb

Khanjar Ko Liye Shimr Chala Aata Hai Saheb

Khanjar Qareeb, Zanu-E-Qatil Qareeb Hai

(Aaj Imtehaan Sabr-E-Husain-E-Ghareeb Hai) X2

  7. Farmaane Lage Maa(N) Se Basad Ranj Ye Maula

Kuch Deyr Mei Ab Kooch Hai Duniya Se Hamara

Ay Amma Chali Jaaye Maqtal Se Khudara

Kis Tarah Se Dekhogi Tarapta Huwa Laasha

Khanjar Qareeb, Zanu-E-Qatil Qareeb Hai

(Aaj Imtehaan Sabr-E-Husain-E-Ghareeb Hai) X2

  8. Ek Baar Jo Khaymo(N) Ki Taraf Yaas Dekha

Dekha Ke Dar-E-Khaymaa(N) Pe Roti Hai Sakina

Ek Hook Uthi Qalb Mei Rone Lage Maula

Zainab Se Ishaaro(N) Se Kaha Ay Meri Behna

Khanjar Qareeb, Zanu-E-Qatil Qareeb Hai

(Aaj Imtehaan Sabr-E-Husain-E-Ghareeb Hai) X2

  9. (Aawaz-E-Ghaib Aayi Palat Aa Hussain Aa) X2

Ab Imtehaan Tera Mukammal Yaha Huwa

Khun-E-Pisar Se Tu Hai Wuzu Ab To Kar Chuka

Ye Sun Ke Sheh Ne Sajde Mei Sar Rakh Ke Ye Kaha

Khanjar Qareeb, Zanu-E-Qatil Qareeb Hai

(Aaj Imtehaan Sabr-E-Husain-E-Ghareeb Hai) X2

  10. Jab Ponchi Behen Bhaayi Ke Laashe Pe Khule Sar

Dekha Ke La'ee(N) Pher Chuka Halq Pe Khanjar

Aur Shimr Liye Jata Hai Sar Gesoo Pakar Kar

Ay "Sarwar-O-Rehan" Karo Yaad Wo Manzar

Khanjar Qareeb, Zanu-E-Qatil Qareeb Hai, Aaj Imtehaan Sabr-E-Husain-E-Ghareeb
Hai

As'salaamu Alayka Ya Tharallahi Wabna Thaari

Wal Witral Mawtoor, Ash'hadu Annaka Qad Aqamtas-Salaat

Wa Ataytaz-Zakaat, Wa Amarta Bil Ma'aroofi Wa Nahayta Annil Munkar

Wa Ata'tallahu Wa Rasoolahu, Hatta Ataaqal Yakeen

As'salaamu Alayka Ayyuhash-Shaheed

As'salaamu Alayka Ayyuhal-Mazloom, Wabnul-Mazloom |

![](Khanjarqareeb.jpg)
---|---

tracks.title: Kaun Qaail Tha
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain, Ya Hussain) X2

(Kaun Qaail Tha Salaami Ke Jinaan Aur Bhi Hai) X4

  1. Karbala Dekhi To Ham Samjhe Ke Haa(N) Aur Bhi Hai

(Kaun Qaail Tha Salaami Ke Jinaan Aur Bhi Hai) X2

  2. (Farq Hai Us Dil Ke Jo Ho Hubbe Ali Se Abaad) X2

Usse Behter Koi Dunya Mei Makaan Aur Bhi Hai

Karbala Dekhi To Ham Samjhe Ke Haa(N) Aur Bhi Hai

(Kaun Qaail Tha Salaami Ke Jinaan Aur Bhi Hai) X2

  3. (Naam-E-Shabbir Pe Be Sakhta Girya Hona) X2

Baade Qalme Ke Ye Imaan Ka Nishaan Aur Bhi Hai

Karbala Dekhi To Ham Samjhe Ke Haa(N) Aur Bhi Hai

(Kaun Qaail Tha Salaami Ke Jinaan Aur Bhi Hai) X2

  4. (Barchiyaa(N) Maarke Akbar Ko Pukaare Ada) X2

Sheh Se Poocho Koi Farzand-E-Jawaa(N) Aur Bhi Hai

Karbala Dekhi To Ham Samjhe Ke Haa(N) Aur Bhi Hai

(Kaun Qaail Tha Salaami Ke Jinaan Aur Bhi Hai) X2

  5. (Falake Peer Tujhe Sheh Ki Zaeefi Ki Qasam) X2

Ali Akbar Sa Zamaane Mei Jawaan Aur Bhi Hai

Karbala Dekhi To Ham Samjhe Ke Haa(N) Aur Bhi Hai

(Kaun Qaail Tha Salaami Ke Jinaan Aur Bhi Hai) X2

  6. (Maa(N) Ne Qasim Se Kaha Subho Ko Tum Hoge Shaheed) X2

Is Liye Biyaah Ki Jaldi Meri Jaan Aur Bhi Hai

Karbala Dekhi To Ham Samjhe Ke Haa(N) Aur Bhi Hai

(Kaun Qaail Tha Salaami Ke Jinaan Aur Bhi Hai) X2

  7. (Baal Khole Huwe Laashe Pe Jo Ayi Zahra) X2

Khul Gaya Hur Pe Dam-E-Nazra Ke Maa(N) Aur Bhi Hai

Karbala Dekhi To Ham Samjhe Ke Haa(N) Aur Bhi Hai

(Kaun Qaail Tha Salaami Ke Jinaan Aur Bhi Hai) X2

  8. (Apne Farzando Ke Marne Pe Bhi Girya Na Kiya) X2

Daher Mei Zainab-E-Mazloom Si Maa(N) Aur Bhi Hai

Karbala Dekhi To Ham Samjhe Ke Haa(N) Aur Bhi Hai

(Kaun Qaail Tha Salaami Ke Jinaan Aur Bhi Hai) X2

  9. (Sheh Se Zainab Ne Kaha Tum Jo Ho Mushtaq-E-Qaza) X2

Meri Amma Ka Koi Fateha Khwaan Aur Bhi Hai

Karbala Dekhi To Ham Samjhe Ke Haa(N) Aur Bhi Hai

(Kaun Qaail Tha Salaami Ke Jinaan Aur Bhi Hai) X2

  10. (Laashe Pamaal Sar-E-Shaam Jo Hote Hai "Nazeer") X2

Baagh-E-Zahra Pe Sitam Baagh-E-Khizaan Aur Bhi Hai

Karbala Dekhi To Ham Samjhe Ke Haa(N) Aur Bhi Hai

(Kaun Qaail Tha Salaami Ke Jinaan Aur Bhi Hai) X2 |

![](Konqayltha.jpg)
---|---

tracks.title: Mujhe Paidal Chalna
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain) X2

Zindaan Se Riha Hokar Jis Dam

Jab Karbobala Mei Aaye Haram

Naaqe Se Giri Zainab Dukhiyaa

Aur Zakhmi Zakhmi Rakhti Qadam

Rokar Ghazi Se Kehne Lagi

Baba Ne Mujhe Samjhaaya Tha

Ay Beti Ghar Mei Paidal Chal

Chalna Hai Tujhe Meelo(N) Tanha

(O Mere Ghazi Ghayrat Waale) X2

Haan Meri Chadar Ke Rakhwaale

Haan Mujhe Ghir Ke Sambhalna Aagaya

Haan Mujhe Paidal Chalna Aagaya, Abbas

(Meko Paidal Turna Aagaya, Abbas) X2

  1. Mashk-O-Alam Wale Mere

Shahe Wafa Awaaz De

Ummul Baneen Ke Laadle

Har Gham Se Guzarna Aagaya

Haan Mujhe Paidal Chalna Aagaya, Abbas

(Meko Paidal Turna Aagaya, Abbas) X2

  2. Qendhi Thi Ro Pai Serheenye

Majboor Wo Teri Bherheeye

Na Gar Jise De Panrheeye

Jiwe Zalim Rassiyaa(N) Paagaya

Haan Mujhe Paidal Chalna Aagaya, Abbas

(Meko Paidal Turna Aagaya, Abbas) X2

  3. Le Shaam Se Mei Aagayi

Ghazi Mei Kyu Zinda Rahi

Saaya Tha Na Meelo(N) Koi

Mujhe Dhoop Mei Chalna Aagaya

Haan Mujhe Paidal Chalna Aagaya, Abbas

(Meko Paidal Turna Aagaya, Abbas) X2

  4. Dukhi Bheyr Da, Ghazi Bhiraa(N)

Hur(N) Ki Karaa(N), Menu Desa

Chali Veer Ve, Mei Berida

Tera Jarnraa(N) Mar Muka Gaya

Haan Mujhe Paidal Chalna Aagaya, Abbas

(Meko Paidal Turna Aagaya, Abbas) X2

  5. Dekhe Saje Ada Ke Ghar

Nezo(N) Pe The Pyaaro(N) Ke Sar

Tukre Huwa Mera Jigar

Mujhe Yaad Madina Aagaya

Haan Mujhe Paidal Chalna Aagaya, Abbas

(Meko Paidal Turna Aagaya, Abbas) X2

  6. Gaya Dard Ay Dil Cheer Ay

Vekhi Zulam, Di Akheer Ay

Wich Zulm Di, Zanjeer De

Rukh Bapardah Hai Khaagaya

Haan Mujhe Paidal Chalna Aagaya, Abbas

(Meko Paidal Turna Aagaya, Abbas) X2

  7. Bazaar Tha Darbaar Tha

Zanjeer Thi, Beemar Tha

Jeena Mera Dushwaar Tha

Har Dard Ko Sehna Aagaya

Haan Mujhe Paidal Chalna Aagaya, Abbas

(Meko Paidal Turna Aagaya, Abbas) X2

  8. La La Nuwe, Jaara(N) Tera

Wich Shaam De, Jaraa(N) Tera

Sang Zulm De, Khora(N) Tera

"Khursheed" Nu Neer Rawagaya

Haan Mujhe Paidal Chalna Aagaya, Abbas

(Meko Paidal Turna Aagaya, Abbas) X2

  9. Ay "Sarwar-O-Rehan" Ab

Socho Zara Kya Tha Ghazab

Bint-E-Ali Kehti Thi Jab

Mujhe Jeena Marna Aagaya

Haan Mujhe Paidal Chalna Aagaya, Abbas

(Meko Paidal Turna Aagaya, Abbas) X2 |

![](Mujhepaidal1.Jpg)

![](Mujhepaidal2.Jpg)
---|---

tracks.title: Purta Shaah Baba
tracks.lyrics:
(Alvida Baba Alvida Baba) X2

(Gham Zada Karwandai Porta Shah Baba) X2

(Shamta Rawan Dai Porta Shah Baba) X2

(Shamta Rawan Dai Porta Shah Baba) X2

  1. (Rukta Pareshanyama) X2 Porta Shaah Baba

Sakina Nazanda Porta Shaah Baba

Gham Zada Karwandai Porta Shah Baba

Shamta Rawan Dai Porta Shah Baba

  2. (Bain Sakina Ka Tha Alvida Baba) X2

Haay Shaheed-E-Jafa Alvida Baba

Gham Zada Karwandai Porta Shah Baba

Shamta Rawan Dai Porta Shah Baba

  3. Gyaarah Muharram Huwi Dasht-E-Bala Mei

Aur Izafa Huwa Zulm-O-Jafa Mei

Koi Bhi Bibi Nahi Ab To Rida Mei

Haay Hussaina Ka Hai Shor Fiza Mei

Sakht Pareshanyama Porta Shaah Baba

Sakina Nazanda Porta Shaah Baba

Gham Zada Karwandai Porta Shah Baba

Shamta Rawan Dai Porta Shah Baba

  4. Zakhmi Badan Bekafan Pyaase Musafir

Tashna Dahan Be Watan Pyaase Musafir

Sayyad-O-Shaah-E-Zaman Pyaase Musafir

Dasht Mei Pamaal Tan Pyaase Musafir

Sakht Pareshanyama Porta Shaah Baba

Sakina Nazanda Porta Shaah Baba

Gham Zada Karwandai Porta Shah Baba

Shamta Rawan Dai Porta Shah Baba

  5. Kushta-E-Zakhmi Jigar Wo Gul-E-Laila

Khaak Basar Khaak Par Wo Gul-E-Laila

Aap Ka Noor-E-Nazar Wo Gul-E-Laila

Khoordo Sina Dar Jigar Wo Gul-E-Laila

Sakht Pareshanyama Porta Shaah Baba

Shamta Rawan Dai Porta Shah Baba

Gham Zada Karwandai Porta Shah Baba

Shamta Rawan Dai Porta Shah Baba

  6. Kushtan-E-Sad Chaak Ra Qaasim-E-Kamsin

Kushtan-E-Asfa Kuja Qasim-E-Kamsin

Tukre Badan Be Khata Qasim-E-Kamsin

Kushta-E-Raah-E-Khuda Qasim-E-Kamsin

Sakht Pareshanyama Porta Shaah Baba

Sakina Nazanda Porta Shaah Baba

Gham Zada Karwandai Porta Shah Baba

Shamta Rawan Dai Porta Shah Baba

  7. Asghar-E-Man Be Zabaan Kushta-E-Paikaan

Baba Tere Saath Hai Barsar-E-Maidan

Jaan-O-Dil-E-Maa(N) Fida Shaah-E-Shaheedan

Mei To Chali Dekhiye Jaanib-E-Zindaan

Sakht Pareshanyama Porta Shaah Baba

Sakina Nazanda Porta Shaah Baba

Gham Zada Karwandai Porta Shah Baba

Shamta Rawan Dai Porta Shah Baba

  8. Bali Sakina Ki Jaan Alvida Baba

Shaam Chala Karwaan Alvida Baba

Chain Mujhe Ab Kahan Alvida Baba

Karti Rahungi Fughaan Alvida Baba

Sakht Pareshanyama Porta Shaah Baba

Sakina Nazanda Porta Shaah Baba

Gham Zada Karwandai Porta Shah Baba

Shamta Rawan Dai Porta Shah Baba

  9. (Hafiz-O-Nasir Khuda Ay Bin-E-Zehra) X2

Jaati Hai Is Dasht Se Bali Sakina

"Sarwar-O-Rehan" Tha Bachi Ka Nawha

Kushta-E-Tegh-E-Jafa Alvida Baba

Sakht Pareshanyama Porta Shaah Baba

Sakina Nazanda Porta Shaah Baba

Gham Zada Karwandai Porta Shah Baba

Shamta Rawan Dai Porta Shah Baba |

![](Purtashaah1.Jpg)

![](Purtashaah2.Jpg)
---|---

tracks.title: Wah Mere Laal
tracks.lyrics:
Abbas Abbas Abbas

(Ghazi Abbas Ko Deke Dee(N) Ka Alam) X2

Bole Sibt-E-Nabi Mera Ik Kaam Kar

Mere Bazu Alamdar-E-Shaah-E-Wafa

Ay Ghani-O-Sakhi Mera Ik Kaam Kar

Ay Khuda-E-Wafa Sayyeada Ki Dua

Jurraton Ke Wali Mera Ik Kaam Kar

Ay Sabke Wali Ay Meri Zindagi

Misle Naade Ali Mera Ik Kaam Kar

Chahta Hai Ye Shabbir Bhai Mere

Aaj Tak Tera Jaaho Hasham Dekhle

Is Tarah Shamiyon Se Tu Kar Guftagoo

Lahjaye Haidery Ka Bharam Dekhle

Ab Ye Parda Utha Inko Jaake Bata

Azme Shabbir Azme Hussaini Hai Kya

Hum Muhafiz Hai Quran-O-Islam Ke

Kis Liye Aaya Hai Bar Sare Karbala

Bol Aise Ke Khaliq Ko Kehna Pare

Zate Haider Ke Aqqas Kya Baat Hai

Aaj Nehje Balagha Ka Khaliq Kahe

(Wah Mere Laal Abbas Kya Baat Hai) X2

Zaate Haider Ke Aqqas Kya Baat Hai

(Mere Ghazi Jari Teri Kya Baat Hai) X2

  1. (Baat Aqa Ki Ghazi Ne Jis Dam Suni) X2

Daftan Sher Ne Ek Angraee Li

Shaam Ki Fauji Mein Mach Gayi Khalbali

Log Kehne Lage Aa Gayi Kya Ali

(Aur Roohe Ali Muskurane Lagi) X2

Wah Mere Laal Abbas Kya Baat Hai

(Mere Ghazi Jari Tere Kya Baat Hai) X2

  2. Bole Abbas Ye Lashkare Shaam Se

Wo Jo Waqif Nahi Hai Mere Naam Se

Ba Khabar Wo Nahi Apne Anjaam Se

Munsalik Mei Bhi Hu(N) Unke Paighaam Se

(Yu(N) Nawaza Mujhe Sheh Ne Inaam Se) X2

Wah Mere Laal Abbas Kya Baat Hai

(Mere Ghazi Jari Tere Kya Baat Hai) X2

  3. Mei Bataawu Tumhe Kon Shabbir Hai

Aqse Islam Quran Ki Tafseer Hai

Khuld Baagh-E-Iram Uski Jageer Hai

Uske Qadmo(N) Tale Hur Ki Taqdeer Hai

(Mere Baare Mei Uski Ye Taqreer Hai) X2

Wah Mere Laal Abbas Kya Baat Hai

(Mere Ghazi Jari Tere Kya Baat Hai) X2

  4. Ye Ghulaami Ye Sheh Ka Sharaf Hai Mila

Malkae Khuld Ne Mujh Ko Beta Kaha

Naam Abbas Zainab Ne Mera Rakha

Jhula Shabbir Ne Hai Jhulaya Mera

(Phir Hassan Ne Gale Se Laga Kar Kaha) X2

Wah Mere Laal Abbas Kya Baat Hai

(Mere Ghazi Jari Tere Kya Baat Hai) X2

  5. Pyaas Bacho(N) Ki Laayi Yaha Tak Mujhe

Mashk Ek Bhar Ke Le Jaawunga Neher Se

Mere Aaqa Ne Roka Laraayi Se Hai

Warna Roke Mujhe Hosla Hai Kise

(Mei Hu Betab Sunlo Yahi Ek Sada) X2

Wah Mere Laal Abbas Kya Baat Hai

(Mere Ghazi Jari Tere Kya Baat Hai) X2

  6. Jab Mukammal Huwa Zindagi Ka Safar

Bola Shabbir Se Bawafa Nehr Par

Apne Pairo(N) Pe Rakh Lijiye Mera Sar

Khush Ho Ummul Banee(N) Jab Sune Ye Khabar

(Mere Bete Se Shabbir Ne Keh Diya) X2

Wah Mere Laal Abbas Kya Baat Hai

(Mere Ghazi Jari Tere Kya Baat Hai) X2

  7. Haay "Rehan-O-Sarwar" Ajab Waqt Tha

Hoke Be Dast Jab Mera Ghazi Ghira

Bawafa Ka Alam Khu(N) Mei Tar Hogaya

Ruh-E-Zehra Pukaari Sar-E-Karbala

(Tune Saqqayi Ka Haq Ada Kar Diya) X2

Wah Mere Laal Abbas Kya Baat Hai

(Mere Ghazi Jari Tere Kya Baat Hai) X2 |

![](Wahmerelaal2.Jpg)
---|---

tracks.title: Salaam Ya Hussain
tracks.lyrics:
(Salaam Salaam Salaam Ya Hussain) X6

Yaa Khdaa Yaa Khudaa Surkh Hai Asmaan Chikh Ti Hai Fizaa

Salaam Salaam Ya Hussain Ghayb Se Aa Rahi Hai Musalsal Sada

Lo Aftab-E-Shahadat Tuloob Ho Gaya

(Salaam Ya Hussain) X3

(Hussain Yaa Hussain) X3

(Salaam Ya Hussain Salaam Ya Hussain) X2

  1. Bar Zabano Dilam (Ya Hussain) X2

Marhaba Mohtaram Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

(Salaam Ya Hussain Salaam Ya Hussain) X2

  2. Azeem Tha Azeem Hai Azeemtar Hai Yaa Hussain

Khuda Ye Paak Ki Nazar Se Teri Nazar Hai Ya Hussain

Ye Dil Bhi Teraa Dil Nahi Khuda Ka Ghar Hai Ya Hussain

Wahaa(N) Wahaa(N) Azan Hai Jidher Jidher Hai Ya Hussain

Sina Ki Nok Par Azaa(N) Tera Jigar Hai Ya Hussain

(Sina Ki Nok Per Buland) X3 Zindagi Ko Ker Diya Azim Kaam Ker Diya

(Salaam Ya Hussain Salaam Ya Hussain) X2

  3. Hussain Woh Jo Maqtalo Ko Maktabo Me Dhaal De

Hussain Woh Jo Mushkilo Se Dee(N) Ko Nikaal Le

Khudaa Agar Talab Kare Hussain Apne Shaal De

Hussain Jo Talab Kare Woh Rab-E-Zuljalaal De

Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

Hussain Woh Sakhi Hai Jo Gala Besawaal De Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

(Kamaal Yeh Hai Khud Khudaa) X3 Kahe Kamaal Bhar Diya Ajeeb Kaam Ker Diyaa

(Salaam Ya Hussain Salaam Ya Hussain) X2

  4. Bulandiyo Se Puchlo Sina Sina Hussain Hai

Kadam Kadam Hussain Hai Nishaa(N) Nishaa(N) Hussain Hai

Dilo Me Ahlebayt Ke Rawaa Dawaa Hussain Hai

Zamanaa Puchta Hai Ye Kahaa(N) Kahaa(N) Hussain Hai

Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

Jahaa(N) Jahaa(N) Rasool Hai Wahaa(N) Wahaa(N) Hussain Hai Ya Hussain

(Kudaa Ne Is Shaheed Ko) X3 Ajeeb Ye Samar Diyaa Azeem Ye Kaam Ker Diyaa

(Salaam Ya Hussain Salaam Ya Hussain) X2

(Hussain Ya Hussain) X3

  5. Ajeeb Hai Ye Marhalaa Ajeeb Hai Ye Hosela

Bichar Gayaa Hai Kafele Se Ye Ameer-E- Kafelaa

Ghiraa Hai Foj-E-Shaam Me Akelaa Ibne Sayeeda

Hai Door Khaimaa Gaah Se Ye Fatema Ka Ladlaa

Ya Hussain, Ya Hussain

Sukoon Apnaa De Chukaa Karaar Apnaa De Chukaa, Ya Hussain

(Hussain Ne Khudaayi Ko) X3 Bhi Be Karaar Ker Diyaa Azeem Kaam Ker Diyaa

(Salaam Ya Hussain Salaam Ya Hussain) X2

(Hussain Ya Hussain) X3

  6. Idhar Guloo-E-Khusht Per Hussain Ke Churi Chali

Udhur Gharib-E-Alqamaa Tarap Ke Rehgayaa Jari

Behen Ko Hosh Na Raha Sakina Khakh Per Giri

(Hussain Ya Hussain) X3

Sanaye Gunj Ne Lagi Hussain Ya Hussain Ki

Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

Ye Khud Ne Apnaa Sar Diya Khudayi Cheekh Ne Lagi, Ya Hussain

(Sina Se Sar Ke Khun Ne) X5 Salaam-E-Akhri Kiyaa, Azeem Kaam Ker Diyaa

(Salaam Ya Hussain Salaam Ya Hussain) X2

(Hussain Ya Hussain) X2

  7. Hussain Badshaah Per Salaam Her Zamaan Kaa

Salaam Ho Salaam Ho Zamin Aur Asmaan Ka

Salaam Ibne Sayaada "Sarwar-O-Rehan" Kaa

Har Eik Rang Falak Likha Her Zabaan Kaa

Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

Kalaam Shah-E-Karbala Khuda-E-Mehrebaan Kaa, Ya Hussain

(Khuda Ka Zikr Do Jahaa(N)) X2 Me Tune Aam Ker Diyaa Ajeeb Kaam Ker Diya

(Hussain Ya Hussain) X3

tracks.title: Behti Rahi Furaat
tracks.lyrics:
(Aay Shaam-E-Ghariba) X5

(Behti Rehi Furat) X4

  1. Khoon Ho Ker Beh Gaya Akber Kaa Dil

Muskura Kar Ker Khatam Asger Ho Gaye

(Behti Rahi Furat) X2

  2. Karbala Ke Dasht Me Jaisaa Andhera Cha Gaya

Aa Gaye Sham-E-Gharibaa Surkh Hai Khak-E-Shifaa

Jhal Gaye Khaim-E-Sar-E-Shamm-E-Alamin

Kitne Manzar Khaakh Ho Ker Reh Gaye

(Behti Rahi Furat) X2

  3. Dhal Gaya Dil Shaam Aayi Shaam Phir Aisi Ke Baad

Do Paher Ke Baad Chayi Aisi Tanhayi Ki Baad

Kis Terhaa Zehra Kaa Ghar Lutaa Gaya

Kis Terha Be Sar Bahater Ho Gaye

(Behti Rahi Furat) X2

  4. Aaj Subhe Tak Ye Ghar Roshan Bhi Tha Abaad Bhi

Sab Ke Waris The Salamaat Bhayi Bhi Awlaad Bhi

Ik Hawaa Asi Chali Perdes Me

Be Zabaan Bache Bhi Be Sar Ho Gaye

(Behti Rahi Furat) X2

  5. Ye Hai Woh Sham-E-Gharibaa Jo Kayamaat Bangayi

Dukhtar-E-Zehra Ke Sar Se Jisne Chadare Chin Li

Ya Rasulallah Kayamat Ho Gayi

Dakhile Khayma Sitamgar Hogaye

(Behti Rahi Furat) X2

  6. Aik Ik Katre Ko Tarse Ban Me Ab Faal-E-Hussain

Mashk Zakhmi Khali Quze Laash Pamaal-E-Hussain

Reh Gayaa Maidaan Me Be Kas Kaa Tan

Jashan Me Masroof Lashkar Hogaye

(Behti Rahi Furat) X2

  7. Marte Dam Pani Pisar Mange Padar Majboor Hai

Tu Bataa Sham-E-Ghariba Al Qamaa Kiya Door Hai

Waye Nehre Al Qamaa Behti Rahi

Aur Pyaase Qatl Akber Hogaye

(Behti Rahi Furat) X2

  8. Hai Wohi Manzar Wohi Khaimay Wohi Tishna Labi

Aaye Hai Sham-E-Gharibaa Khu(N) Rulaane Aaj Bhi

Gham Hame "Rehan -O-Sarwar" Kyu Na Ho

Mahve Mataam Jab Payambar Hogaye

(Behti Rahi Furat) X2

  9. Khoon Ho Ker Beh Gaya Akber Kaa Dil

Muskura Kar Ker Khatam Asger Ho Gaye

(Behti Rahi Furat) X2

tracks.title: Abbas Meer-E-Karwan
tracks.lyrics:
(Kaarwaan) X6

Yasrab Se Suwe Karbala

Ik Karwaan Rukhsat Huwa

Sar Pe Alam Saaya Fighan

Ghazi Ki Aati Hai Sada

Pehla Safar Zainab Ka Hai

Sunsaan Kardo Raasta

[(Kaarewaan) X2 Abbas Meer-E-Karwaan] X2

  1. Kya Shaan He Kya Dab Daba

Kya Log Hein Quraanuma

Salle Ala Sale Ala Ayaat Ka He Qaafla

Mashko Alam Inka Nishaan

Abbas Meere Karwaan

[(Kaarewaan) X2 Abbas Meer-E-Karwaan] X2

  2. Allah Ke Pyaare Hein Ye

Aale Nabi Saare Hein Ye

Quran Ke Pare Hein Ye

Kaunain Ke Tare Hein Ye

Zere Qadam He Asmaan

Abbas Meere Karwaan

[(Kaarewaan) X2 Abbas Meer-E-Karwaan] X2

  3. Koi Shabih-E-Mustafa

Koi Hasan Ka Dilruba

Hai Koi Aks-E-Sayyeda

Shabbir Ka Ye Qaafila

Thaame Alam Jo Hai Jawaan

Abbas Meere Karwaan

[(Kaarewaan) X2 Abbas Meer-E-Karwaan] X2

  4. Yasrib Se Taba Karbala

Har Din Tawaafe Kaafila

Abbas Karta Hi Raha

Parde Ka Zimmedaar Tha

Yun Mutmain Thi Bibiyaan

Abbas Meere Karwaan

[(Kaarewaan) X2 Abbas Meer-E-Karwaan] X2

  5. Abbas Woh Kirdaar He

Baade Ali Salaar Hai

Aysa Alam Bardaar Hai

Maydan Mein Be Talwar He

Phir Bhi Alam Ka Paasbaan

Abbas Meere Karwaan

[(Kaarewaan) X2 Abbas Meer-E-Karwaan] X2

  6. Lo Agaya Uska Alam

Ghazi Jise Kehte Hein Hum

Kehte Chalo Ye Dambadam

Abbas Meer-E-Lashkaram

Babul Hawaaij Mehrabaan

Abbas Meere Karwaan

[(Kaarewaan) X2 Abbas Meer-E-Karwaan] X2

  7. Jab Shaam Pohoncha Qafla

Khutba Ye Zainab Ne Diya

Sunle Ye Qaum-E-Ashkiya

Hum Hein Bina-E-Lailaah

Kashti He Dee(N) Hum Baadbaa(N)

Abbas Meere Karwaan

[(Kaarewaan) X2 Abbas Meer-E-Karwaan] X2

  8. Tha Hashr Mein Mola Ali

Ye "Sarwar-O-Rehan" Bhi

Nazre Karam Se Aapki

Rakhte Hein Ummeed-E-Qawi

Nawhon Se Denge Ye Bayaan

Abbas Meere Karwaan

[(Kaarewaan) X2 Abbas Meer-E-Karwaan] X2

tracks.title: Mei Nok-E-Sina
tracks.lyrics:
Jab Khatima Ba Qaid Huwa Foje Shah Ka

Kausar Pe Qaafila Gaya Pyaasi Sipaah Ka

Ghar Luta Gaya Janaab-E-Risaalat Panaah Ka

Khaak Urh Rahi Thi Haal Ka Ye Baargaah Ka

Haaye Maqtal Mein Aayi Fatima Zehra Barehna Sar

Chillayi Zere Tegh Hai Baba Mera Jigar

Areh Unnis Saw Hein Zakhm Tan-E-Chak Chak Par

Areh Zainab Nikal Hussain Tarapta Hai Khaak Par

Haayi Pohonchi Behan Jo Bhai Ke Maqtal Mein Nawhaghar

Dekha Sar-E-Hussain He Neze Ki Nok Par

Are Sadqe Gayi Luta Gaye Ghar Wadagah Mein

Haaye Junbish Labon Ko He Abhi Zikre Ilaah Mein

(Mera Waada Huwa Pura Nana, Mera Waada Huwa Pura) X2 Mein Noke Sina Par Hun

Mera Waada Huwa Pura Nana, Mera Waada Huwa Pura

  1. (Nana Dekho Nawaasa Kahaan Aagaya) X2

Meine Karbobala Ko Mu'allah Kiya

Khoon Mera Aaj Khaak-E-Shifa Ban Gaya

Meine Bachpan Ka Waada Wafa Kardiya

Mera Waada Huwa Pura

Mein Noke Sina Par Hun, Mera Waada Huwa Pura Nana, Mera Waada Huwa Pura

  2. Mera Ghar Mere Bachhe Meri Zindagi

Aap Ke Deen Pe Sab Meine Qurbaan Ki

Mere Maathe Pe Woh Tha Do Ab Aakhri

Bar Sare Noke Neza Sawaari Chali

Mera Waada Huwa Pura

Mein Noke Sina Par Hun, Mera Waada Huwa Pura Nana, Mera Waada Huwa Pura

  3. Deeno Qura(N) Bache Tera Kaaba Bacha

Ta Qayamat Rahegi Azaan Ki Sada

Madressa Bangayi Aaj Se Karbala

Haaye Nana Magar Mera Ghar Na Raha

Mera Waada Huwa Pura

Mein Noke Sina Par Hun, Mera Waada Huwa Pura Nana, Mera Waada Huwa Pura

  4. Chakkiyan Peesne Waali Maa Ki Qasam

Meri Aaghosh Mein Tora Akbar Ne Dam

Kaise Laashe Jawaan Laaya Suwe Haram

Apne Wade Pe Kehta Raha Gham Pe Gham

Mera Waada Huwa Pura

Mein Noke Sina Par Hun, Mera Waada Huwa Pura Nana, Mera Waada Huwa Pura

  5. Kitne Laashe Uthaaye Hein Ik Roz Mein

Kitne Aansun Bahaaye Hein Ik Roz Mein

Sekro(N) Teer Khaaye Hein Ik Roz Mein

Saare Wade Nibhaaye Hein Ik Roz Mein

Mera Waada Huwa Pura

Mein Noke Sina Par Hun, Mera Waada Huwa Pura Nana, Mera Waada Huwa Pura

  6. Bhai Bat-Tees Barson Se Jo Saath Tha

Meine Waada Nibhaane Mein Woh Khodiya

Khaagayi Uske Shaano(N) Ko Ye Alqama

Woh Gaya Aur Darde Kamar Degaya

Mera Waada Huwa Pura

Mein Noke Sina Par Hun, Mera Waada Huwa Pura Nana, Mera Waada Huwa Pura

  7. Mere Nana Ye Dulha Ye Kamsin Jawaan

Aise Ronda Gaya Dasht Mein Al Amaan

Apne Bete Ko Pehchan Paayi Na Maan

Uski Dulhan Ne Khud Tordi Churiyaan

Mera Waada Huwa Pura

Mein Noke Sina Par Hun, Mera Waada Huwa Pura Nana, Mera Waada Huwa Pura

  8. Haan Woh Asghar Jo Sughra Ki Thi Zindagi

Jis Ki Khaatir Woh Bimaar Bachhi Meri

Chhote Chhote Se Kurte Jo Seeti Rahi

Uska Khun Apne Chehre Pe Malke Abhi

Mera Waada Huwa Pura

Mein Noke Sina Par Hun, Mera Waada Huwa Pura Nana, Mera Waada Huwa Pura

  9. Mere Nana Sakina Ka Gham Dekhiye

Umr Itni Si Itne Sitam Dekhiye

Jalti Reti Pe Uske Qadam Dekhiye

Kitne Majboor Hein Aaj Hum Dekhiye

Mera Waada Huwa Pura

Mein Noke Sina Par Hun, Mera Waada Huwa Pura Nana, Mera Waada Huwa Pura

  10. Shaam "Rehan-O-Sarwar" Jo Dhalne Lagi

Sar Se Shabbir Ke Ye Saada Aati Thi

Ay Behen Ab Yahaan Se Qayaadat Teri

Mere Wade Ki Khaatir Zuroori Huwi

Mera Waada Huwa Pura

Mein Noke Sina Par Hun, Mera Waada Huwa Pura Nana, Mera Waada Huwa Puri

Mei Noke Sina Par Hun

tracks.title: Pyaare Nabi Ki
tracks.lyrics:
(Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali Hai) X3

Pyaare Nabi Ki Pyaari Nawaasi

Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali He

Sabr Ki Malka Zehra Ki Pyaari

Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali He

(Pyaare Nabi Ki Pyaari Nawasi, Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali Hai) X2

  1. (Dekh Rahi He Koi To Aaye, Shaana Pakar Kar Kaash Bithaaye) X2

Na He Sawaari Na He Amaari, Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali He

(Pyaare Nabi Ki Pyaari Nawasi, Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali Hai) X2

  2. (Bhaai Bhateeje Bhaanje Bete, Saath Watan Se Aayi Thi Lekar) X2

Haaye Muqaddar Aaj Akeli, Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali He

(Pyaare Nabi Ki Pyaari Nawasi, Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali Hai) X2

  3. (Beton Ko Sadqa Bhaai Pe Karke, Jisne Kiye The Shukr Ke Sajda) X2

Chhor Ke Tanha Laash Ko Uski, Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali He

(Pyaare Nabi Ki Pyaari Nawasi, Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali Hai) X2

  4. (Jiski Kaneezein Nikle Na Baahar, Balwe Mein Laaye Usko Sitamgar) X2

Haaye Ye Ghurbat Binte Ali Ki, Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali He

(Pyaare Nabi Ki Pyaari Nawasi, Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali Hai) X2

  5. (Kitne Hi Qaidi Jitney Churaye, Aaj Woh Bibi Sar Ko Jhukaaye) X2

Eik Rida Ki Ban Ke Sawali, Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali He

(Pyaare Nabi Ki Pyaari Nawasi, Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali Hai) X2

  6. (Socho Woh Manzar "Sarwar-O-Rehan", Bhaai Ho Jiska Waarise Quran) X2

Kaise Woh Bibi Ashk Bahaati, Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali He

(Pyaare Nabi Ki Pyaari Nawasi, Shaam Ko Qaidi Ban Ke Chali Hai) X2

tracks.title: Qayd Khaane Mei
tracks.lyrics:
(Haay Saadat Aur Zindan) X2

(Haaye Sadaat Haaye Zindaan) X2

(Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai) X2

  1. Dukhtare Fatema Ghairat Se Mui Jaati He

Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai

  2. Aasman Door Zameen Sakht Kidhar Jaaoun Mein

Yahi Behtar He Ke Dunya Se Guzar Jaaoun Mein

Bibiyon Milke Duaa Maango Ke Marjaaun Mein

Maut Aati Hi Nahin Jaan Khichi Jaati He

Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai

  3. Amaad-E-Hind Ka Ghul Itrat-E-Shabbir Mein He

Shor-E-Matam Haram-E-Saahib-E-Tathir Mein Hein

Kehti He Jaaoun Kahan Paaon To Zanjeer Mein He

Paaon Uthta He To Zanjir Lipat Jaati He

Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai

  4. Aa Idhar Bibi Sakina Se Ye Zainab Ka Bayaan

Hind Darbar Se Jab Aayegi Su-E-Zindaan

Sabr Tum Ko He Dikhana Na Uthe Shoro Fughaan

Haaye Ye Din Bhi Aseeri Tumhe Dikhlaati He

Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai

  5. Dare Zindaan Pe Huwa Itne Mein Ambohe Kamaal

Jaane Haatim Ka He Zindaa(N) Mein Nuzoolo Ijlaal

Qaidiyon Uth Ke Dua Deke Karo Istikbaal

Zawja-E-Haakime Doraan He Jo Ye Aati He

Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai

  6. Hind Ne Dekhke Raandon Ki Taraf Di Ye Sada

Kiska Yusuf He Ye Zindaan Mein Giraftaare Bala

Bibiyaan Kiski Hai Rakhti Jo Nahin Sar Pe Rida

Un Ke Chehron Se To Kuchh Aur Jhalak Aati He

Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai

  7. Dekhti Kya He Ke Ik Sher He Aahan Mein Niha

Laagharo Khastatanon Faaqakasho Tashnadahaan

Naa To Chalne Ki Taqat He Na Koi Rishtae Jaan

Ghustakhaanon Se Larazne Ki Sada Aati He

Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai

  8. Aayi Nazdeek Jo Sajjad Ke Hind-E-Dilgeer

Boli Woh Konsi Isyan Ki Mili Ye Tazeer

Bole Dasween Ki Muharram Ki Joh Pehni Zanjeer

Aaj Taqdeer Bhi Qaidi Humein Kehlati He

Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai

  9. Hind Ne Puchha Maraz Kya He Kaha Bepadari

Ghar Jo Daryaft Kiya Kehne Lage Darbadari

Boli Leta He Khabar Kon Kaha Bekhabari

Jo Khabargeer The Unko To Lahed Bhaati He

Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai

  10. Baba Sahib Ke Gale Par Jo Na Khanjar Phirta

Inke Sar Khulte Na Mein Kaanton Pe Dar Dar Phirta

Aur Madine Ki Taraf Sab Ko Mein Le Kar Phirta

Yaad Hazrat Mei Watan Ki Humein Tarpaati He

Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai

  11. Hind Ne Naam Madine Ka Jo Abid Se Suna

Khaak Par Beth Gayi Haal Ye Taaqeer Huwa

Boli Kya Zainab-O-Kulsum Se Nisbat He Bhala

Aise Chehron Se To Khushbu-E-Wafaa Aati He

Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai

  12. Boli Zainab Ke Na Le Zainab-O-Kulthum Ke Naam

Woh Nabi Zaadiyan He Qaid Mein Unka Kya Kaam

Hind Boli Inhi Baton Mein Hein Sab Un Ka Kalaam

Kyun Meri Ruh Tumhe Dekh Ke Ghabraati He

Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai

  13. Jo Bhi Surat He Woh Maasum Nazar Aati He

Qudrate Khaaliq-E-Qayyum Nazar Aati He

Koi Zainab Koi Kulsum Nazar Aati He

Un Se Taqdeer Ye Kis Haal Mein Milwaati He

Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai

  14. Gird Aabid Ke Phiri Phir Woh Ba Haal-E-Tagheer

Bole Woh Kon Ye Chillai Kaneez-E-Shabbir

Assalaam Ay Rasan-O-Tauq-O-Salaasil Ke Aseer

Nawha Karti Huwi Qadmon Mein Giri Jaati He

Qaid Khaane Mein Talaatum He Ke Hind Aati Hai

  15. Bas "Dabeer" Ab Gham-E-Shabbir Se Larzaa He Jigar

Hind Bhi Mehw-E-Azaa Aaj Huwi Nang-E-Sar

Qaidkhaane Mein Huwa Sina Zani Se Mehshar

Yehi Majlis He Jo Khud Marsiya Kehlaati He

Haaye Sadaat Aur Zindaan

tracks.title: Meri Sakina
tracks.lyrics:
(Aakhri Salaam) X4

(Meri Sakina Is Terhaa Naa Rona) X2.

  1. (Tum Jawo Kaha(N) Allah Jane Maqtal Me Rahe Kis Haal Mei Hum) X2

(Aab Khwab Mei Baba Aayenge) X2 Chahe Shaam Kaa Ho Zindan Howe

(Meri Sakina Is Terhaa Naa Rona) X2

Naa Meri Bachi Naa Is Naa (Is Terhaa Naa Ronaa) X2

  2. Hum Jaate Hay Milne Baba Se Ab Lot Ke Hum Ko Aanaa Nahi

Kuch Der Lipat Jaa Sine Se Phir Baap Ka Sinaa Milnaa Nahi

(Sojanaa Jahaan Phuphiyaa(N) Kehde) X2

Chahe Shaam Kaa Ho Zindan Howe

Meri Sakina Is Terhaa Naa Rona

Naa Meri Bachi Naa (Is Terhaa Naa Ronaa) X2

  3. Jaane De Muje Maidaa(N) Ki Taraf Denaa Ye Tuje Kurbani Hai

Rahwaar Ke Mere Pawo(N) Na Per Meri Bachi Tu Sayyedani Hai

(Jinaa Hai Tuje Zehra Ki Terhaa) X2

Chahe Shaam Kaa Ho Zindan Howe

Meri Sakina Is Terhaa Naa Rona

Naa Meri Bachi Naa (Is Terhaa Naa Ronaa) X2

  4. (Aa Ponch Le Ansoo Ankho Se Tu Dekle Chehraa Baba Ka) X2

Kal Ho Saktaa Hai Aa Naa Sake Pehchan Me Chehraa Baba Kaa

(Hum Saath Teraa Naa Chorenge) X2

Chahe Shaam Kaa Ho Zindan Howe

Meri Sakina Is Terhaa Naa Rona

Naa Meri Bachi Naa (Is Terhaa Naa Ronaa) X2

  5. Abbas Kaa Dil Akber Ki Behan Jis Waqt Bandhe Gardan Me Rasan

Tum Baba Baba Mat Kehnaa Tarpenga Mera Be Gor Badan

(Asger Ki Terhaa Se Chup Rehnaa) X2

Chahe Shaam Kaa Ho Zindan Howe

Meri Sakina Is Terhaa Naa Rona

Naa Meri Bachi Naa (Is Terhaa Naa Ronaa) X2

  6. (Dekhaa "Rehan-O-Sarwar" Ne Khud Shaam Me Jaaker Ye Manzar) X2

Sailaab Hai Pursadaro Kaa Masroof-E-Fugaa Taa Hadtay Nazar Hai

(Nara Ilaakaa Bibi Kaa) X2 Chahe Shaam Kaa Ho Zindan Howe

Meri Sakina Is Terhaa Naa Rona

Naa Meri Bachi Naa (Is Terhaa Naa Ronaa) X2

(Akhri Salaam)X2

tracks.title: Bas Ya Hussain
tracks.lyrics:
(Hussain Ya Hussain) X3

Ay Hur Kise Mili Ye Shahadat Ki Zebo Zain, Baadi Pe Tere Aayi He Khud Maadare
Hussain, Is Martabe Ke Baad Sab Kuch To Milgaya, Ay Hur Hussain Milgaye, Rab
Tujhko Milgaya

  1. (Kuchh Nahin Mila) X2 Use Tu Nahin Mila Jise

(Tu Jisko Milgaya Rab Usko Milgaya) X3

(Bas Ya Hussain) X4

  2. Ye Bas Hussain Ki Ata (Ye Bas Hussain Ka Jigar) X2

Jo Kehdiya Who Motabar (Jo Dediya To Sara Ghar) X2

Karam Hussain Ka Karam Kisi Pe Hogaya Agar

Mile Kisi Ko Bale Par Kisi Ko Milgaye Pisar

(Hur Banadiya) X2 Use Jo Ek Baar Milgaya

Tu Jisko Milgaya Rab Usko Milgaya

(Bas Ya Hussain) X4

  3. (Wa Tu Izzu Man Tasha Wa Tuzzilu Man Tasha) X2

Adam Ki Puri Nasl Pe Ehsan Kon Tha

Jis Par Khuda Ko Naaz Who Insane Kon Tha

Kunbe Ke Saath Deen Pe Qurban Kon Tha

Noke Sina Pe Qariye Quran Kon Tha

Ay Karbala Bata Tera Mehman Kon Tha

(Bas Ya Hussain) X4

  4. (Bas Hussain Ka) X2 Jise Ye Ikhtiyaar Milgaya

Ye Ikhtiyaar Kitna Waseelo Buland He

Sara Jahaan Hussain Ki Mutthi Mein Band He

Badla He Karbala Mein Taqazae Inqilab

Neze Pe Ab Jo Sar He Wohi Sar Buland He

Ewane Imbisaat Mein Jannat Na Kar Talab

Ye Who Ghame Hussain Ke Aansu Mein Band He

(Bas Ya Hussain) X2

Tu Jisko Milgaya Rab Usko Milgaya

  5. Dastaan Hussain Ki Samajh Mein Aagayi Agar

To Hur Ki Rehguzaar Par Karega Ishq Ka Safar

Tarap Tarap Uthega Tu Kahega Raat Raat Bhar

Hussain Bas Hussain He Sina Pe Ya Zameen Par

(Shahe Karbala) X2 Se Jis Ke Bal Ka Taar Mitgaya

(Tu Jisko Milgaya Rab Usko Milgaya) X2

  6. Ik Do Pahar Mein Jisne Bhara Ghar Luta Diya

Nagaah Khuda He Jispe Who Sajda Ada Kiya

Apne Lahu Se Khaak Ko Khaake Shifa Kiya

Ashur Ek Roz Tha Sadiyon Pe Chha Gaya

Karbobala Ko Arshe Muwalla Bana Diya

(Bas Ya Hussain) X4

(Salam Ya Hussain) X2 Rab Ka Itebaar Milgaya

Tu Jisko Milgaya Rab Usko Milgaya

  7. Jab Ran Mein Zulfiqar E Ali Nadahaan Chali

Bhich Bhich Gayin Safon Pe Safeen Who Jahaan Chali

Chamki To Is Tarah Udhar Ayi Wahaan Chali

Dene Ko Daad Arsh Se Pyaase Ki Maa Chali

Muddat Ka Taal Mel Tha Barson Ka Saath Tha

Jaisi Who Zulfiqar Thi Waisa Hi Haath Tha

Khaak Aagayi Safon Ko Jidhar Aayi Zulfiqar

Geh Chupgayi To Gaah Nazar Aayi Zulfiqar

Sar Par Chamak Ke Taba Qamar Aayi Zulfiqar

Zi Kat Kar Zameen Pe Utar Aayi Zulfiqar

Phir To Ye Ghul Huwa Ke Duhaayi Hussain Ki

Allah Ka Ghazab He Laraayi Hussain Ki

(Hussain Ya Hussain) X4

Ayi Nidae Ghaib Ke Shabbir Marhaba

Is Khaak Ke Liye Thi Ye Shamsheer Marhaba

Ye Aab Ru Ye Jang Ye Tauqeer Marhaba

Bas Bas Hussain Bas Mere Dilgeer Marhaba

Waqte Namaaze Asr He Takbeer Marhaba

(Bas Ya Hussain) X4

Labbaik Keh Ke Tegh Rakhi Sheh Ne Myaan Mein

Palti Sipaah Aayi Qayamat Jahaan Mein

Lo Khanjaron Mein Teghon Mein Bhagon Mein Ghir Gaye

Tanha Hussain Barchiyon Waalon Mein Ghir Gaye

(Hussain Ya Hussain) X4

  8. "Rehan-O-Sarware" Hazeen Suno Ye Aisa Raaz He

Hussain Keh Rahe The Bas Khuda Pe Mujhko Naaz He

Na Bhai Na Pisar Raha Na Koi Chara Saath He

Azaan He Hussain He Khudaaye Beniyaz He

Na Seen Na Zameen Par Ye Aakhri Namaaz He

(Hussain Ya Hussain) X4

  9. Jiske Dil Mein Hussain Rehta He

Farsh Majlis Ka Jo Bichhata He

Jo Bhi Nawha Kahin Sunata He

Leke Name Hussain Rota He

(Usko Zehra Salam Karti He) X6

(Hussain Ya Hussain) X4

tracks.title: Abbas Bulaata Hai
tracks.lyrics:
(Dargaahe Alamdaar) X5

(Ya Babe Hawaaij Meri Tawkeer Barha De, Abbas Kate Haathon Se Taqdeer Bana De)
X2

  1. Zehra Se Wafadari Dunya Ko Sikhata He

(Parcham Ka Parehra Ye) X2 Lehra Ke Bata He

(Abbas Bulata Hai) X3

(Parcham Ka Parehra Ye) X2 Lehra Ke Bata He

(Abbas Bulata Hai) X3

  2. Dargaahe Abulfazlil Abbas Ke Saaye Mein

Tafreeq Nahin Koi Apne Mein Paraye Mein

(Jo Bhi Yahaan Aata He) X2 Khali Nahin Jaata He

(Abbas Bulata Hai) X5

  3. Be Aas Marizon Ko Dunya Ke Ghareebon Ko

Miskinon Ko Yateemon Ko Roti Huwe Aankhon Ko

(Har Tute Huwe Dil Ki) X2 Ye Aas Bandha Ta He

(Abbas Bulata Hai) X5

  4. Haidar Ke Malangon Ki Is Dar Pe Qataarein Hein

Huron Ke Farishton Ki (Is Dar Pe Qataarein Hein) X2

(Jis Jis Ka Bulawa He) X2 Dora Chala Ata He

(Abbas Bulata Hai) X5

  5. Who Maula Qadam Ho Ya Shahbaaz Ki Nagri Ho

Matam Jahaan Hota Ho Majlis Jahan Hoti Ho

(Dene Ke Liye Pursa) X2 Zahra Ko Jo Aata He

(Abbas Bulata Hai) X5

  6. Mashhad Ho Najaf Ho Ya Makka Ho Baqiyya Ho

Who Karbobala Ho Ya Shahzaadi Ka Roza Ho

(Dunya Ka Koi Zaair) X2 Jab Bhi Yahaan Aata He

(Abbas Bulata Hai) X5

  7. Bechain He Ghabrake Khaime Mein Tehelta He

Kya Jurm Kiya Aisa Kyun Haathon Ko Malta He

(Ay Hur Teri Kismat Ka) X2 Taara Ye Bata Ta He

(Abbas Bulata Hai) X5

  8. Girte Huwe Parcham Ko Dekha Shahe Wala Ne

Zainab Se Kaha Ro Kar Abbas Ke Maula Ne

(Hum Jaate Hein Darya Par) X2 Dil Doobta Jaata He

(Abbas Bulata Hai) X5

  9. Tum Sogaye Darya Par Dekho To Zara Uth Kar

Shabbir Ko Ghere Hein No Lakh Ka Ye Lashkar

(Jab Teer Koi Dil Par) X2 Aaqa Ke Rakha Ta He

(Abbas Bulata Hai) X5

  10. "Rehan" Ki "Sarwar" Ki Maula Se Wafaaein Hein

Abbas Ke Roze Pe Nawha Liye Aaye Hein

(Shahzaadi Sakina Ka) X2 Nawha Jo Sunata He

(Abbas Bulata Hai) X5

tracks.title: Haan Ye Hai Shehr-E-Shaam
tracks.lyrics:
(Haan Ye He Shehre Shaam) X3

Haan Ye He Shehre Shaam, Choti Shehzaadi Ka He Yahin Par Qayam, Aaj Roze Pe He
Roshni Subho Shaam, Pursa Daaron Ka He Maatmi Azhdahan, Phat Raha He Jigar
Sochta Hun Agar, Kaisa Tareeq Tha, Kaisa Weeran Tha, Kaisa Weeran Tha Kal Ye
Zindaan Tha, (Bara Roi Sakina Yahaan) X2

(Haan Ye He Shehre Shaam) X2

  1. Itni Wehshat Ke Ik Pal Na Guzre Jahaan

Chheekti Ho Jahaan Sirf Tanhaiyan

Rona Kya Siskiyon Par Bhi Pabandiyan

Rassiyon Beriyon Tauq Ke Darmiyan

(Bara Roi Sakina Yahaan) X2

(Haan Ye He Shehre Shaam) X2

  2. Sar Khule Khaak Par Ghamzada Bibiyan

Usmein Qasim Ki Akbar Ki Asghar Ki Maan

Maang Ujri Huwi Khali Thi Godiyan

Sab Ki Himmat Bandhati Thi Zainab Jahaan

(Bara Roi Sakina Yahaan) X2

(Haan Ye He Shehre Shaam) X2

  3. Haan Isi Shaam Ke Beech Bazaar Mein

Bibiyan Patharon Ki Thi Bochhar Mein

Khun Mein Dubi Muhammad Ki Thi Betiyan

Har Taraf Shaam Mein Jashn Ka Tha Samaan

(Bara Roi Sakina Yahaan) X2

(Haan Ye He Shehre Shaam) X2

  4. Dekh Kar Binte Zehra Ka Yun Sar Khula

Noke Neza Se Ghazi Ka Sar Girgaya

Haye Ghazi Ki Ghairat Ka Ye Imtehaan

Sar Patakne Lagi Saari Shehzadiyan

(Bara Roi Sakina Yahaan) X2

(Haan Ye He Shehre Shaam) X2



  5. Ik Qayamat Si Darbar Mein Aagayi

Jab Sakina Kaneezi Mein Mangi Gayi

Na Padar Na Chacha Bhai Bhi Natawa

Tori Sajjad Ghaiz Mein Beriyan

(Bara Roi Sakina Yahaan) X2

(Haan Ye He Shehre Shaam) X2

  6. Dukhtare Hind Boli Sakina Bata

Kaise Daman Jala Kyun He Kurta Phata

Aurni Tere Sar Ki Gayi He Kahan

Khainchi Kis Shaqi Ne Teri Baliyaan

(Bara Roi Sakina Yahaan) X2

(Haan Ye He Shehre Shaam) X2

  7. Boli Kya Haal Apna Bataaoun Tujhe

Chhor Ke Jabse Baba Gaye Hein Mujhe

Mein Yateem Hogayi Aur Kya Ho Bayaan

Meri Gardan Mein Bandhi Gayi Rassiyan

(Bara Roi Sakina Yahaan) X2

(Haan Ye He Shehre Shaam) X2

  8. Aur Ik Roz Zindan Rone Laga

Jab Sakina Ko Baba Ka Sar Milgaya

Boli Ab Aye Ho Tum Mere Baba Jaan

Itne Din Mujhse Dur Rahe Ho Kahaan

(Bara Roi Sakina Yahaan) X2

(Haan Ye He Shehre Shaam) X2

  9. Royi "Rehan-O-Sarwar" Ki Ankhein Lahu

Rozae Shahzaadi Pe Ki Guftagu

Haye Is Waqt Hum Tum Khare Hein Jahaan

Nur Hi Nur He Kal Thi Tarikiyan

(Bara Roi Sakina Yahaan) X2

(Haan Ye He Shehre Shaam) X2

tracks.title: Mujhe Pe Kyu Band Karte Ho Paani
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain) X3

Mera Nana Nabi Meri Maa Sayyada

Mera Baba Ali Mera Bhai Hasan

Hum Hi Hein Panjatan

Meri Kya He Khata, Mujhpe Kyun Band Karte Ho Pani

Kya Muhammad Ka Pyara Nahin Hun

(Kya Mein Zahra Ka Jaya Nahin Hun) X3

Kya Nabi Ka Nawasa Nahin Hun

  1. (Mere Nana Ne Kalma Sikhaya

Aur Quran Tumko Sunaya) X2

(Kya Ma Nana Ka Saaya Nahin Hun) X3

Kya Nabi Ka Nawasa Nahin Hun

Mujhpe Kyun Band Karte Ho Pani

Kya Muhammad Ka Pyara Nahin Hun

  2. (Who Madina Jahaan Mera Ghar He

Aur Masjid Mein Us Ghar Ka Ghar He) X2

(Kya Mein Us Ghar Mein Khela Nahin Hun) X3

Kya Nabi Ka Nawasa Nahin Hun

Mujhpe Kyun Band Karte Ho Pani

Kya Muhammad Ka Pyara Nahin Hun

  3. (Chakkiya Pees Kar Maan Ne Paala

Mujhko Nana Ne Jhula Jhulaya) X2

(Apna Bachpan Mein Bhula Nahin Hun) X3

Kya Nabi Ka Nawasa Nahin Hun

Mujhpe Kyun Band Karte Ho Pani

Kya Muhammad Ka Pyara Nahin Hun

  4. (Kamli Wale Ke Lab Chumta Tha

Kitna Pyara Mera Bachpana Tha) X2

(Kya Mein Unka Dulhara Nahin Hun) X3

Kya Nabi Ka Nawasa Nahin Hun

Mujhpe Kyun Band Karte Ho Pani

Kya Muhammad Ka Pyara Nahin Hun

  5. (Mein Jo Paani Kabhi Maangta Tha

Kyun Tarapti Thi Maa Ab Mein Samjha) X2

(Paas Asghar Ke Jaata Nahin Hun) X3

Kya Nabi Ka Nawasa Nahin Hun

Mujhpe Kyun Band Karte Ho Pani

Kya Muhammad Ka Pyara Nahin Hun

  6. (Mein Jo Chahun Baras Jaaein Badal

Khun Mein Duba Nazar Aaye Maqtal) X2

(Jang Karne Mein Aya Nahin Hun) X3

Kya Nabi Ka Nawasa Nahin Hun

Mujhpe Kyun Band Karte Ho Pani

Kya Muhammad Ka Pyara Nahin Hun

  7. (Ik Sada Thi Ye "Rehaan-O-Sarwar"

Kehrahe The Hussain Ibne Haider) X2

(Kya Mein Mehman Aaya Nahin Hun) X3

Kya Nabi Ka Nawasa Nahin Hun

Mujhpe Kyun Band Karte Ho Pani

Kya Muhammad Ka Pyara Nahin Hun

(Kya Mein Zahra Ka Jaya Nahin Hun) X3

Kya Nabi Ka Nawasa Nahin Hun

tracks.title: Shareek-E-Karbala
tracks.lyrics:
Shareeke Karbala Behan

Meri Musafira Behan

(Ya Hussain) X4

Rasan Mein Bandh Chukka Gala Lo Chal Para Who Kafila, Behan Ghareeb Nawha Gar,
Sina Pe Jab Parhi Nazar, Khamosh The Shaheed Sab, Akhi Ke Hilrahe The Lab,
(Sina Pe Ho To Kya Huwa) X2 Tu Hosla Na Haarna, (Behan Mein Saath Saath Hun)
X3

  1. Ghareebe Karbala Behan

Diler E Ba Wafa Behan

Ghamon Ki Alqama Behan

Meri Musafira Behan

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

Sina Pe Hun To Kya Huwa

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

(Behan Mein Saath Saath Hun) X2

  2. Wafae Waada Hochuka

Sina Talaq Mein Aagaya

Mein Apna Kaam Karchuka

Meri Shareeke Karbala

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

Sina Pe Hun To Kya Huwa

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

(Behan Mein Saath Saath Hun) X2

  3. Ye Rassiyan Ye Beriyan

Qadam Qadam Be Sakhtiyan

Rida Bagher Bibiyaan

Behan Kara He Imtehaan

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

Sina Pe Hun To Kya Huwa

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

(Behan Mein Saath Saath Hun) X2

  4. Agar He Rasta Kathan

Zara Na Dar Meri Behan

Tu Berida Mein Bekafan

He Waqt Hosla Shikan

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

Sina Pe Hun To Kya Huwa

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

(Behan Mein Saath Saath Hun) X2

  5. Qadam Qadam Shahadatein

Guzar Gayi Qayamatein

Abhi He Aur Afatein

Sambhale Ab Amaanatein

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

Sina Pe Hun To Kya Huwa

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

(Behan Mein Saath Saath Hun) X2

  6. Koi Bhi Ab Nahin Bacha

Bas Abide Shakista Pa

Ye Saare Bane Ghamzada

Gire Jo Khake Ghash Zara

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

Sina Pe Hun To Kya Huwa

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

(Behan Mein Saath Saath Hun) X2

  7. Behan Teher Teher Yahi

Laraz Rahi He Kyun Zameen

Sakina Girgay Kahin

Na Milsake Jo Who Hazeen

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

Sina Pe Hun To Kya Huwa

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

(Behan Mein Saath Saath Hun) X2

  8. Bohot Qareeb Shaam He

Hujoome Khaaso Aam He

Yazeede Bad Kalaam He

Ye Waqte Inteqaam He

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

Sina Pe Hun To Kya Huwa

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

(Behan Mein Saath Saath Hun) X2

  9. Ghareebe Karbala Behan

Diler E Ba Wafa Behan

Ghamon Ki Alqama Behan

Meri Musafira Behan

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

Sina Pe Hun To Kya Huwa

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

(Behan Mein Saath Saath Hun) X2

  10. "Rehaan-O-Sarware" Aza

Jo Sham Pohoncha Kafila

Sare Hussain Ne Kaha

Ulat De Takht Shaam Ka

Ghareebe Karbala Behan

Diler E Ba Wafa Behan

Ghamon Ki Alqama Behan

Meri Musafira Behan

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

Sina Pe Hun To Kya Huwa

Tu Hosla Na Haarna

(Behan Mein Saath Saath Hun) X2

tracks.title: Ye Maa(N) Kaha Na
tracks.lyrics:
Yasrib Mein Aayi Khaab Mein Zainab Ke Yun Butool

Maatha Bhara Tha Khun Mein Sar Par Rida Na Thi

Zainab Ne Puchha Kiske Lahu Se Jabeen Hein Laash

Amma Tum Par To Aafatein Safare Karbala Na Thi

Ro Kar Kaha Butool Ne Tum Yaad To Karo

Tum Apni Yaad Ko Zara Abaad To Karo

Kis Waqt Kis Jagah Mein Shareeke Aza Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahaan Na Thi

Zainab Safar Mein Saath Tere Maa Kaha Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

  1. Royi Tumhare Saath Bahattar Ki Laash Par

Akbar Ki Lash Par Ali Asghar Ki Lash Par

Zainab Mein Kis Shaheed Ki Sahib Aza Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

Zainab Safar Mein Saath Tere Maa Kaha Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

  2. Jhara Tha Kisne Balon Se Sehrae Karbala

Kisne Bichhaya Aake Musallae Karbala

Haye Haye Me Karbala Mein Shabe Qatl Kya Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

Zainab Safar Mein Saath Tere Maa Kaha Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

  3. Rakhte Qauhan Hussain Ne Manga Tha Jis Ghari

Khaime Mein Bibi Tum Ko Ghash Aya Tha Jis Ghari

Khaime Ke Peechhe Rone Ki Meri Sada Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

Zainab Safar Mein Saath Tere Maa Kaha Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

  4. Rukhsat Ko Aya Khaime Mein Jab Ibne Bu Turab

Thami Thi Tumne Jis Ghari Mazloom Ki Rakaab

Kyaa Sath Sath Ghore Ke Mein Nnd Paa Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

Zainab Safar Mein Saath Tere Maa Kaha Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

  5. Jab Tum Giri Thi Bhai Ke Laashe Pe Unt Se

Naaqe Pe Tum Sawaar Thi Bazu Rasan Mein The

Kya Baal Khole Laashe Pe Khairun Nisa Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

Zainab Safar Mein Saath Tere Maa Kaha Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

  6. Yasrab Se Taaba Maariya Aur Wahan Se Taba Sham

Hamraah Thi Qadam Ba Qadam Saath Gaam Gaam

Zainab Kahi Hussain Se Zehra Juda Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

Zainab Safar Mein Saath Tere Maa Kaha Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

  7. Zainab Ye Arz Ki Ke Baja Kehti He Janaab

Mein Sunrahi Hun Jo Ba Khuda Kehti Hein Janaab

Ay Waalida Mujhe Khabare Dasto Pa Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

Zainab Safar Mein Saath Tere Maa Kaha Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

  8. Imsaal Bhi Najaf Ka Irada Tha Ay "Dabeer"

Aur Karbala Bhi Jaaoun Ye Socha Tha Ay "Dabeer"

Par Rehgaye Tarap Ke Ke Kismat Rasa Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

Zainab Safar Mein Saath Tere Maa Kaha Na Thi

Ye Maa Kahan Na Thi

tracks.title: Saarbaan Saarbaan
tracks.lyrics:
(Maula Ghum Zada Natawan Sarbaan) X3

  1. Waapis Madine Agaya Lo Karwaan Ujra Huwa

Ujri Thi Saari Bibiyan, Sajjad Ka Nawha Ye Tha

(Roenge Tauqo Beriyan) X3

Who Shaam Aur Mein Alamaan

(Aisa Bana Mein Saarbaan) X2

(Maula Ghum Zada Natawan Sarbaan) X2

  2. Logo Madina Lutgaya

Koi Nahin Mere Siva

(Daghon Se He Sina Bhara) X2

Tanha Karun Kya Kya Bayaan

(Aisa Bana Mein Saarbaan) X2

(Maula Ghum Zada Natawan Sarbaan) X2

  3. Hajat Talaq Who Mehrebaan

Abbas Who Meere Karwaan

(Mara Gaya Kya Nagahaan) X2

Akhir Liye Unka Nishaan

(Aisa Bana Mein Saarbaan) X2

(Maula Ghum Zada Natawan Sarbaan) X2

  4. Kitna Kathan Tha Who Safar

Nezon Pe The Pyaron Ke Sar

(Uthti Na Thi Meri Nazar) X2

Beparda Behne Aur Maa

(Aisa Bana Mein Saarbaan) X2

(Maula Ghum Zada Natawan Sarbaan) X2

  5. Gham Tha Qayamat Se Bara

Charo Taraf The Ashkiya

(Naamus Meri Berida) X2

Rota Tha Sun Sun Kar Azaa

(Aisa Bana Mein Saarbaan) X2

(Maula Ghum Zada Natawan Sarbaan) X2

  6. Kya Ronake Bazaar Thi

Patthar Ki Bhi Bochhar Thi

(Aur Who Hasi Kuffar Ki) X2

Khamosh Thi Meri Zabaan

(Aisa Bana Mein Saarbaan) X2

(Maula Ghum Zada Natawan Sarbaan) X2

  7. Us Shaam Ke Bazaar Ne

Who Gham Diye Darbaar Ne

(Jab Mein Laga Lalkaarne) X2

Dene Lage Zaalim Azaan

(Aisa Bana Mein Saarbaan) X2

(Maula Ghum Zada Natawan Sarbaan) X2

  8. Hajat Talaq Who Mehrebaan

Abbas Who Meere Karwaan

(Mara Gaya Kya Nagahaan) X2

Akhir Liye Unka Nishaan

(Aisa Bana Mein Saarbaan) X2

(Maula Ghum Zada Natawan Sarbaan) X2

  9. Logo Madina Lutgaya

Koi Nahin Mere Siva

(Daghon Se He Sina Bhara) X2

Tanha Karun Kya Kya Bayaan

(Aisa Bana Mein Saarbaan) X2

(Maula Ghum Zada Natawan Sarbaan) X2

  10. "Rehan-O-Sarwar" Umr Bhar

Aankhein Rahengi Nawha Gar

(Jis Waqt Farshe Dard Par) X2

Nawhe Mein Hogaya Ye Bayaan

(Aisa Bana Mein Saarbaan) X2

(Maula Ghum Zada Natawan Sarbaan) X2

tracks.title: Ya Ali (As) Ya Hussain (As)
tracks.lyrics:
(Allah) X3



(Allah Hi Allah) X4

Tu Hi Tu Allah


Allah Tu Hi Tu Allah


Tu Hi Tu Allah



Jo Mohammad Ka Wafadar He Allah Uska,

Karbala Uski, Najaf Uska, Madina Uska,

Zindagi He To Bas Ali Ki Tarha, Maut Aye To Ya Hussain Hussain



(Ya Hussain) X6



(Ya Ali Ya Hussain) X4



1.     (Awaaze Muhammad Ka Asar Khatm Na Hoga) X2
Thak Jaayega Suraj Ye Safar Khatm Na Hoga



(Ya Ali Ya Hussain ) X3



2.     La Raib Pe Rasool Ki Donon He Zebo Zen
Pehlu Mein Ya Ali He To (Godi Me Ya Hussain) X2
Loho Qalam Ka Ilm Ka Sadiq He Ya Ali
Jab Tak Khuda Ka Mulk He (Malik He Ya Hussain) X2
Ye Ilm Ka Dar Sabr Ka Ghar Khatm Na Hoga



(Thak Jaayega Suraj Ye Safar Khatm Na Hoga) X2



3.     Ye Saltanate Ishq Hai Khuddar Milenge
Salmano Abuzar Se (Wafaadar Milenge) X2
Qasim Yahan Mesum Se Jigar Taar Milenge
Jeene Ke Liye Marne Pe (Tayyar Milenge) X2
Kat Jaye Zaban Ishq Magar Khatm Na Hoga



(Thak Jaayega Suraj Ye Safar Khatm Na Hoga) X2



4.     Muslim Bine Aqeel Safeere Hussain He
Hubbe Ali He Dil Mein (Masheere Hussain He) X2
Who Baadshah Aur Ye Wazeere Hussain He
Aisa Wazeer He Ke (Faqeere Hussain He) X2
Ta Hashr Sifarat Ka Safar Khatm Na Hoga



Thak Jaayega Suraj Ye Safar Khatm Na Hoga

(Ya Ali Ya Hussain) X3



5.     Hur Ko Sakhi Hussain Ne Aali Bana Diya
Aisa Ke Panjatan Ka (Sawaali Bana Diya) X2
Nade Ali Ne Isko Jalali Bana Diya
Rumale Fatema Ne (Missali Bana Diya) X2
Ye Dar He Ataaon Ka Ye Dar Khatm Na Hoga



(Thak Jaayega Suraj Ye Safar Khatm Na Hoga) X2



6.     Ay Mere Rabbe Jahaan
Ay Muhammad Ke Khuda
Ye Tera Ishk Hi Tha
Jiski Parwaaz Juda
(Ye Tera Ishk Hi Tha) X2
Panjetan Se Jo Mila
Ishq Ka Tere Safar
Ishq Haidar Me Mila
Kabhi Mesum Kabhi Miqdad O Abuzar Me Mila
Kabhi Salman Ke Dil Mein Kabhi Qambar Me Mila
Aur Maqtal Me Jo Dekha To Bahattar Me Mila
(Laike Ishq He Tu, Tera Jalwa Har Su) X2


7.     Ay Mere Rabbe Jahaan
Ay Mohammad Ke Khuda
Ishq Tune Bhi Diya
Aur Muhammad Tera
Jiski Chahat Ke Liye
Ye Jahaan Khalq Kiya
(Who Tera Ishq Hi Tha) X3

(Ay Mere Rabbe Jahaan) X2
Ik Ajab Ishq Huwa
Who Sare Karbobala
Tera Ashiq Hai Khara
Khun Mein Duba Huwa
De Chuka Lakhte Jigar
De Chukka Noore Nazar
De Chukka Sara Woh Ghar
Aur Khanjar Ke Tale
Us Ka Sajde Mein He Sar
Na Namaazi Aisi Na Ashiq Ka Kaleja Aisa
Noke Neza Pe Bhi Karta Hi Raha Zikr Tera



(Ya Ali Ya Hussain) X3



8.     Ek Zulfiqaar Khalq Me Do Haath Se Chali
Daste Hussain O Panjae Mushkil Kusha Ali
Ye Mustafa Ki Jaan Woh Allah Ka Wali
Donon Ka Martaba Bhi Do Alam Pe He Jail

Donon Ka Is Kamaal Se Sajda Ada Huwa
Haider Se Ibteda Huwi Ya Khatima Huwa



(Ya Ali Ya Hussain) X3



9.     Hai Waqte Asr Marziye Parwardigaar He
Ab Pushte Zuljana Pe Maula Sawaar He
Pehlu Mein Khun Roti Huwi Zulfiqaar He
Hum Rah Zuljanah Bhi Bohot Dil Figaar He
Qurban Zuljanah Pe Aur Zulfiqar Par
Chalte The Donon Marziye Parwardigar Par



(Ya Ali Ya Hussain) X3



10.                        Jaisi Who Zulfiqaar Thi Waisa Tha Zuljanah
Bachpan Se Saath Saath Hi Rehta Tha Zuljanah
Be Misl O Be Nazir Tha Aala Tha Zuljanah
Kyunkar Na Ho Rasool Ne Pala Tha Zuljanah
Pehla Sawaar To Nabiye Kirdigaar He
Aur Doosra Ye Doshe Nabi Ka Sawaar He



(Ya Ali Ya Hussain) X3



11.                        Jite Thi Jab Bhi Sheyr Chitwa(N) Hiran Ki Aankh

Chalta Tha Dekh Dekh Ke Shahe Zaman Ki Aankh

Parti Thi Yun Harif Pe Us Sab Shikan Ki Aankh

Larzi Ho Jese Halq Me Shamshir Zan Ki Aankh

Teghaayi Jispe Urh Kabhi Baar Urhte Chalgaya

Wo Sar Gira Gayi To Ye Lasha Uchalgaya



(Ya Ali Ya Hussain) X2



12.                        Kehta Tha Zulfiqaar Se Ab Meri Jang Dekh

Chal Tere Saath Saath Zara Mera Rang Dekh

Is Kaas Mei Laraayi Ka Mera Bhi Dhang Dekh

Raah-E-Hayaat Fitro(N) Pe Karta Hu(N) Tang Dekh

Mana Tu Zulfiqaar Hai Marhab Shikaar Hai

Leykin Ye Dekh Kon Ye Mujhpar Sawaar Hai



(Ya Ali Ya Hussain) X3



13.                        Simta Jamaa Urha Idhar Aya Udhar Gaya

Chamka Phira Jamaal Dikhaya Tha Har Gaya

Teero(N) Pe Urh Ke Barchiyo(N) Mei Bekhatar Gaya

Bar Haq Kiya Sabo(N) Ko Saro(N) Par Guzar Gaya

Aya Jo Zad Mei Iski Ajal Aagayi Usse

Is Saath Koi Zarb Zamee(N) Kha Gayi Usse



(Ya Ali Ya Hussain) X3



14.                        Allah Re Laraayi Mei Shokat Hussain Ki

Heete Wo Zuljanah Mei Sur’at Hussain Ki

Qudrat Baghor Zad Ki Thi Surat Hussain Ki

Chehre Udaas Sakina Hai Haybat Hussain Ki

(Bole Ali Hussain) X2 Ho Ab Bhi Hawaas Mei

Aisi To Jang Ham Na Lare Mulk-O-Yaas Mei



(Hussain Ya Hussain) X3



15.                        Ayi Sada-E-Ghayb Ke Bas Bas Hussain Bas

Dam Le Hawaa Mei Eik Nafas Bas Hussain Bas

Garmi Se Haanfta Hai Faras Bas Hussain Bas

Waqt-E-Namaaz Asr Hai Bas Bas Hussain Bas



(Hussain Ya Hussain) X3



16.                        Ye Sunte The Hazrat Jo Laga Pusht Pe Dhara

Qarboos Pe Tharra Ke Gire Hazrat-E-Waala

Jibreel Ne Qadmo(N) Se Rikaabat Ko Nikala

Aur Haatho(N) Ko Garden Mei Yadullah Ne Daala

Dekha Jo Zuljanah Ne Ghash Khate Zee(N) Par

Bas Beyth Gaya Dekh Ke Ghutno(N) Ko Zamee(N) Par

Quran Rehl-E-Zee(N) Se Sar-E-Farsh Gir Para

Dewaar-E-Kaba Beyth Gayi Arsh Gir Para



(Hussain Ya Hussain) X3



17.                        Chillayi Fatemah Mera Bacha Hai Be Gunaah

Ay Arz-E-Nainawah Mera Bacha Hai Be Gunaah

Ay Nehr-E-Alqamah Mera Bacha Hai Be Gunaah

Ay Zulfiqaar Tu Hi Bachaale Hussain Ko

Ay Zuljanah Tujhse Mei Luti Hussain Ko



(Hussain Ya Hussain) X3



18.                        Duba Lahu Mei Lot Ke Aaya Hai Zuljanaah

Samjhi Sakina Baba Ko Laaya Hai Zuljanah

Sar Khaak Per Patak Kar Gira Wo Rahwaar

Sayyedaniyo(N) Bichar Gaya Mujhse Mera Sawaar

Jaldi Utaarlo Ye Tabarruk Ye Zulfiqaar

Are Kat’ta Hai Waa Gulu-E-Shahenshaah-E-Naamdaar

Zahra Qareeb-E-Laash-E-Pisar Khaak Urhaati Hai

Are Khaymo(N) Mei Jaawo, Lutne Ko Foj Aati Hai



Hussain Ya Hussain

tracks.title: Bibiyan Rehgayi
tracks.lyrics:
(Sogaya Lashkar) X2

(Ay Shame Gharibaan) X3 Sogaya Lashkar

(Bibiyaan Rehgayin) X2



Jalte Huwe
Jalte Huwe Khaimon Ki Bujhti Raakh Par
(Bibiyaan Rehgayin) X2



1.     Dil Se Lagayae Daagh Bahattar Nawhagar


Bibiyaan Rehgayin
Jalte Huwe Khaimon Ki Bujhti Raakh Par
(Bibiyaan Rehgayin) X2



2. Shameghariban Se Kuchh Pehle
Jhula Chaadar Bistar Tha
Pehlu Mein Humshakle Payambar
God Mein Maa Ki Asghar Tha
Godiyaan
Godiyaan Khali Maange Ujri Bepisar


Bibiyaan Rehgayin

Jalte Huwe Khaimon Ki Bujhti Raakh Par
Bibiyaan Rehgayin



2.     Haan Ye Abu Talib Ka Kunba
Betiyan Saari Haidar Ki
Azmate Zehra Azmate Maryam
Izzat Thi Payghambar Ki
Chaadarein
Chaadarein Maangti Naame Payambar Darbadar


Bibiyaan Rehgayin

Jalte Huwe Khaimon Ki Bujhti Raakh Par
Bibiyaan Rehgayin



3.     Dhalta Suraj Soch Raha He
Waqte Sahar Kya Manzar Tha
Mehwe Ibadat Zere Alam
Shabbir Ka Sara Lashkar Tha
Sogaya
Sogaya Lashkar Jaagne Wali Raat Bhar


Bibiyaan Rehgayin

Jalte Huwe Khaimon Ki Bujhti Raakh Par
Bibiyaan Rehgayin



4.     Darya Mojein Maar Raha He
Pyaas Abhi Tak Baqi He
Shaayad Ghazi Lot Ke Aaye
Aas Abhi Tak Baqi He
Dekh Zara
Dekh Zara Zainab Ke Baradar Jaag Kar


Bibiyaan Rehgayin

Jalte Huwe Khaimon Ki Bujhti Raakh Par
Bibiyaan Rehgayin



5.     Koi Nahin Jo Puchhle Aakar
Kya Huwi Zainab Teri Chaadar
Tere To The Athara Baradar
Kyun He Akeli Pehre Par
Ham Safar
Ham Safar Maqtool Huwe Sab Ham Safar


Bibiyaan Rehgayin

Jalte Huwe Khaimon Ki Bujhti Raakh Par
Bibiyaan Rehgayin



6.     Socho Zara “Rehano Sarwar”
Shame Gharibaan Ka Wo Manzar
Chaak Girehban Aaye Jo Haidar
Dekh Ke Zainab Ko Pehre Par
Rodiye
Rodiye Haidar Khaime Maqtal Dekh Kar


Bibiyaan Rehgayin
(Ay Shame Gharibaan) X3 Sogaya Lashkar

tracks.title: Ye Mahe Muharram Hai
tracks.lyrics:
(Arze Karbala Arze Nainawa) X2

(Arze Arze Karabala) X3 Ay Arze Nainawa



(Ye Maahe Muharram He Ye Ayyame Aza He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He)



1.     Is Maah Mein Luti Gayi Zehra Ki Kamayi
Talwar Muhammad Ke Nawase Pe Chalayi
Is Maah Mein Jibreel Se Nauha Ye Suna He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



Ye Maahe Muharram He Ye Ayyame Aza He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



2.     Is Maahe Muharram Ne Qayamat Ye Dikhayi
Is Chaand Ne Sughra Ko Khabar Jaake Sunayi
Veeran Madina He Basi Karbobala He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



Ye Maahe Muharram He Ye Ayyame Aza He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



3.     Is Maah Mein Saadaat Ne Din Kaise Guzare
Masum Ko Pani Na Mila Nehr Kanare
Kya Zulm Muhammad Ke Gharane Ne Saha He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



Ye Maahe Muharram He Ye Ayyame Aza He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



4.     Jab Chaand Muharram Ka Nazar Aata He Humko
Sajda He Azaakhana To Yaad Ataa He Humko
Is Chaand Mein Khu(N) Aale Muhammad Ka Baha He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



Ye Maahe Muharram He Ye Ayyame Aza He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



5.     Aashur Ka Din Bhool Na Paayega Zamaana
Luta Gaya Us Roz Muhammad Ka Gharana
Us Roz Se Dunya Mein Bichhi Farshe Aza He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



Ye Maahe Muharram He Ye Ayyame Aza He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



6.     Kya Hosle Maaon Ke The Kya Sher The Bachhe
Woh Maqsade Zehra Thi Ye Haidar Ke Iraade
In Maaon Se Bachhon Se Bani Khake Shifa He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



Ye Maahe Muharram He Ye Ayyame Aza He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



7.     Wo Auno Muhammad Ali Akbar Ali Asghar
Wo Qasime Naushah Woh Abas-E-Dilawar
Maqtal Inhi Shehzadon Ke Zakhmon Se Saja He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



Ye Maahe Muharram He Ye Ayyame Aza He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



8.     (Ho “Sarwaro Rehan Shanawar Ke Ali Jee”) X2
He Naukri Virse Me Hussain Ibne Ali Ki
Awaazo Qalam Donon Isi Dar Ki Ata He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



Ye Maahe Muharram He Ye Ayyame Aza He
Matam Ye Muhammad Ke Nawaase Ka Bapa He



(Arze Arze Karabala) X3 Ay Arze Nainawa

tracks.title: Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega
tracks.lyrics:
(Sakina) X2

(Na Rona Sakina) X4
(Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Ayega Sakina) X3



1.     (Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina) X2
Ab Kon Tere Naaz Uthayega Sakina



Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)
Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)



2. (Bhai Se Fida Hoke Yun Farmaate The Maula) X2
Ab Kon Mere Ghar Ko Bachayega Sakina



Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)
Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)



3.     (Kya Hoga Zara Der Mein Malum He Humko) X2

Tar Khun Mein Alam Lehr Se Aayega Sakina



Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)
Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)



4. (Ik Shor Hai Kohram Hai Bibi Labe Darya) X2
Lagta Hai Ke Ab Sher Na Aayega Sakina



Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)
Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)



5. (Talwaron Mein Nezon Mein Ghira He Mera Bhai) X2
Woh Mashko Alam Kaise Bachayega Sakina



Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)
Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)



6. (Abbas Na Honge Tera Baba Bhi Na Hoga) X2
Ab Kon Teri Pyas Bhujayega Sakina



Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)
Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)



7. (Kiske Liye Bibi Dare Khaima Pe Khari Ho) X2
Ab Koi Tarayi Se Na Aayega Sakina



Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)
Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)



8. (Abbas Ka Wada He Ke Pani Na Piyega) X2
Pehle Tumhe Kauthar Me Pilayega Sakina



Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)
Abbas Na Ab Lot Ke Aayega Sakina (Na Rona Sakina)



9. (Ay “Sarwaro Rehan” Ye Kehte Rahe Maula) X2
Ye Gham Tujhe Ta Hashr Rulayega Sakina



(Na Rona Sakina) X2

tracks.title: Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain) X2


Ma’bud Taqabbal Minna

(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2
Mera Islam Rahega
Mera Pegham Rahega
(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2


1. Ay Foje Ashqiya Mera Islam Rahega
Quran Rahega Mera Peghaam Rahega
(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2
Mera Islam Rahega
Mera Pegham Rahega


(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2



2. Jab Zohr Tak Hussain Bahattar Ko Rochuke
Akbar Ko Rochuke Ali Asghar Ko Rochuke
Ik Dopahar Mein Bawafa Lashkar Ko Rochuke
Phir Foje Bad Nasab Se Mukhatib Huwe Imam
Hujjat Tamam Karta Hun Sunlo Mera Payaam


(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2
Mera Islam Rahega
Mera Pegham Rahega
(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2



3. Farmaate The Hussain Ke Mein Be Kasoor Hun
Roshan He Tumpe Chashme Payambar Ka Noor Hun
Faqon Se Mein Nidhal Hun Zakhmon Se Chhur Hun
Zakhmon Pe Zakhm Pyaas Ki Shiddat Mein Khawunga
Lekin Mein Nana Jaan Se Wada Nibhaunga


(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2
Mera Islam Rahega
Mera Pegham Rahega
(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2



4. Darya Ko Tum Ne Chheen Liya Maine Kuchh Kaha
Pani Dikha Dikha Ke Piiya Meine Kuchh Kaha
Daagh Akbare Jawaan Ka Diya Meine Kuchh Kaha
Haq Par Hun Mere Haq Mein Sina Bolrahi He
Sun Lo Who Azan Meri Zubaa(N) Bol Rahi He


(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2
Mera Islam Rahega
Mera Pegham Rahega
(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2



5. Maqsad He Lailah Ki Baqa Aur Kuchh Nahin
Wada Ho Zere Tegh Wafa Aur Kuchh Nahin
Iske Siwa Labon Pe Dua Aur Kuchh Nahin
Razi Ho Mujhse Mera Khuda Chahta Hun Mein
Mein Hun Hussain Sab Ka Bhala Chahta Hun Mein


(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2
Mera Islam Rahega
Mera Pegham Rahega
(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2



6. Maqsad Nahin He Jang Hamara Khuda Gawah
Khat Bhejke He Tumne Bulaya Khuda Gawah
Bejurm Tumne Mujhko Sataya Khuda Gawah
Khanjar Tale Baland Mein Takbir Karunga
Apne Lahu Se Khak Pe Tehreer Karunga


(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2
Mera Islam Rahega
Mera Pegham Rahega
(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2



7. Mein Aur Karun Yazeed Ki Bay’at Nahin Nahin
Badlun Ajal Ke Dar Se Shariyat Nahin Nahin
Jeene Ke Badle Chorun Shahadat Nahin Nahin
Tum Kon Ho Naqaab Rukhon Se Hataounga
Mein Kon Hun Ye Noke Sina Par Bataaounga


(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2
Mera Islam Rahega
Mera Pegham Rahega
(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2



8. Aakar Dare Khayam Pe Zainab Ko Di Sada
Aa Ay Mere Ghareeb Behen Aakhri Dua
Le Aakhri Salam Hussaine Ghareeb Ka
Maqsad He Mera Ka Ye Sabaq Tujhko Yaad He
Meri Shareeke Kaar Mujhe Etemaad He


(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2
Mera Islam Rahega
Mera Pegham Rahega
(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2

Zainab Tarap Ke Boli Ke Bhaya Samajhgayi
Bhaiya Tere Ishaare Ko Behna Samajh Gayi
Mein Kya Teri Ghareeb Sakina Samajh Gayi
Khutbon Se Mein Hilaungi Qasre Yazeed Ko
Marne Na Dungi Ab Mein Kisi Bhi Shaheed Ko

Hal Min Nasirin Yansurna



9. Uthtaa Ghobar Zulm Karakti He Bijliyan
Zee(N) Se Gire Hussain Uthi Surkh Aandhiyan
Nagaah Sar Hussain Ka Aaya Sare Sina
Quran Suna Ke Sayyade Mazloom Ne Kaha
Lo Nanajaan Wada Wafa Meine Kardiya


(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2
Mera Islam Rahega
Mera Pegham Rahega
(Mein Rahun Ya Na Rahun) X2

Ma’bud Taqabbal Minna



10. Ay “Sarwaro Rehan” Ye Lamha Ajeeb He
Neze Pe Lab Kusha Ye Hussaine Ghareeb He
Zainab Tumhari Shame Gharibaan Kareeb He
Sab Kuchh Tere Hawaale He Ab Tum Sambhalna
Apna Khayaal Rakhna Sakina Ko Paalna

tracks.title: Salaam Abbas Ya Maula
tracks.lyrics:
Ay Shere Nayastane Haidar
Ay (Sakhi Babul Haawaij) X2
Bawafa Abbas

As Salaam Ay Bawafa Babul Hawaij As Salam
Bekaso(N) Ka Aasra Babul Hawaij As Salam

(Qaime Ale Muhammad)X2 Kul Imamon Ka Salaam
Ey Duae Sayyada Babul Hawaij As Salam



Who Roz Ke Jiska Wada He
Who Roz Yaqeenan Aayega
Insaa(N) Ka Muqaddar Badlega
Jab Noore Imamat Chhayega
Gunje Gi Sadae Jaaul Haq
Aur Mehdie Dauraan Ayega
Us Roz Se Saare Aalam Me
Bas Ek Alam Lehraega

Ghazi Ka Alam Is Saya
Jo Kal Bhi Tha Jo Aaj Bhi He
Aur Is Ka Karam Kal Bhi Hoga

( Abbas ) X3



1.     Surajon Mein Chand Band Kar Is Tarah Zinda Raha
Chadare Zehra Ke Saaye Mein Sada Palta Raha
Ye Ali Ibne Abi Talib Ka Sarmaya Raha
Zainabo Kulthum Ki Bhi Aankh Ka Tara Raha


(Salam Abbas Ya Maula) X3



2.     Hurmate Deene Nabi Zehra Ke Ghar Ki Aabru
Dil He Ye Ummul Bane(N) Ka Aur Haidar Ka Lahu
Seerate Shabbir O Shabbar Ka Sarapa Hubahu
Panjatan Ke Darmiyaa(N) Kiska Sharaf Aisa


(Salam Abbas Ya Maula) X3



3.     Ye Woh Ghar He Jis Taraf Dekha Humein Maula Mila
Har Taraf Maula Hi Maula Ibteda Ta Inteha
Gird Maulaon Ke Ye Ghazi He Maulae Wafa
Ey Khuda Maula Nabi Maula Ali Maula


(Salam Abbas Ya Maula) X3



4.     Hay Ali Ki Baadshahi Aasma(N) Ho Ya Zamee(N)
Hay Ali Isme Ilaahi Mustafa Ka Jaanashee(N)
Doosra Haider Nahin He Doosra Ghazi Nahin
Ya Ali Kehta Zabaa(N) Ke Saath Dil Bola


(Salam Abbas Ya Maula) X3



5.     Barh Raha He Jaanibe Darya Alam Abbas Ka
Kon Rokega Bhala Barhta Qadam Abbas Ka
Haa(N) Magar Shabbir Ko Sehna He Gham Abbas Ka
Umre Shabbiri Se Apne Ghaiz Ko Roka


(Salam Abbas Ya Maula) X3



6.     Al Amaa(N) Woh Mashk Ka Chhidna Tarapna Sher Ka
Ya Sakina Alwida Kehkar Who Girna Sher Ka
Dekhti Hi Rehgayi Rasta Sakina Sher Ka
Marke Bhi Seene Se Liptaeya Tha Mashkiza


(Salam Abbas Ya Maula) X3



7.     Who Karam Lillah Barhaale Ghareeba(N) Ya Safeer
Aap Se Hi Lo Lagaye Hein Ye Saare Maatami
“Sarwaro Rehan” Ki Qayim Rahe Ye Naukri
Ey Sakhi Babul Hawaaij Fazl Ke Baba


(Salam Abbas Ya Maula) X3

Saqa-E-Sakina

tracks.title: Na Ro Maula
tracks.lyrics:
(Na Ro Maula) X4
Ayyuhal Mazloom
(Ya Ayyuhal Mazloom) X2


(Na Ro Maula ) X4

(Minhal Ne Ek Din Aake Kaha) X2
Ay Maula Mere Ay Zainul Aba
Gham Ziada Kahan Guzre Tumpar
Dil Thaam Liya Khun Rone Lage
Khun Rote Huwe Bas Itna Kaha


(Ash Sham) X3
(Sajjad Hay Sajjad) X3



1.     Minhal Tarap Kar Kehne Laga
Rone Ka Sabab Maula He Kya
Miraas Shahadat Aap Ki He
Maula Ne Kaha La Raib Magar
Uff Tune Nahin Insaaf Kiya
Beshak Miras Shahadat He
Ye Ale Nabi Ki Fitrat He
Sar Beparda Maa Behno Ka
Ek Ye Bhi Meri Miraas Thi Kya



(Ash Sham) X3
(Sajaad Haye Sajad) X3



2.     Minhal Mein Kaise Zinda Hun
Pal Pal Jeeta Hun Marta Hun
In Ankhon Ne Jo Kuchh Dekha
Ek Ye Bhi Meri Miraas Thi Kya



(Ash Sham) X3
(Sajjad Hay Sajjad) X3


3.     Aghaaz He Shame Gharibaa(N) Se
Khun Tapka Chashme Giryaa(N) Se
Behnon Ka Khula Sar Saamne Tha
Ek Ye Bhi Meri Miraas Thi Kya



(Ash Sham) X3
(Sajjad Hay Sajjad) X3

4.     Kaise Bhulun Us Manzar Ko
Neze Pe Phupi Ki Chadar Ko
Sahil Se Jo Ghazi Ne Dekha
Ek Ye Bhi Meri Miraas Thi Kya



(Ash Sham) X3
(Sajjad Hay Sajjad) X3


5.     Namoose Payambar Be Chaadar
Aur Sar Pe Baraste Woh Patthar
Tar Khoon Mein Tha Sab Ka Chehra
Ek Ye Bhi Meri Miraas Thi Kya



6.     (Na Gham Tauqo Zanjeer Ka Tha) X2
Gham Phupiyon Ka Hamsheer Ka Tha
Bazaar Ke Gham Ne Maar Diya
Ek Ye Bhi Meri Miraas Thi Kya



(Ash Sham) X3
(Sajjad Hay Sajjad) X3

7.     Allah Mere Ye Hadde Sitam
Pehro The Khare Darbaar Mein Ham
Aur Takht Pe Qatil Betha Tha
Ek Ye Bhi Meri Miraas Thi Kya



(Ash Sham) X3
(Sajjad Hay Sajjad) X3

8.     Ek Sham Ka Ik Zindaan Ka Gham
Masoom Si Nanni Jaan Ka Gham
Jo Ho Na Saki Marke Bhi Riha
Ek Ye Bhi Meri Miraas Thi Kya



(Ash Sham) X3
(Sajjad Hay Sajjad) X3

9.     “Rehano Sarwar” Sham Chalo
Aur Sham Ki Who Galiyaa(N) Dekho
Bimaar Jahan Kehta Hi Raha
Ek Ye Bhi Meri Miraas Thi Kya



Ayyuhal Mazloom
(Ya Ayyuhal Mazloom) X2

Salam Un Aleyk Ya Hussain As

do jahan zay dil bharam,

do jahan zay dil bharam,

Mera Zouq e Sukhan

Jis Pe Chalte Rahe Salman o Abuzar Qambar
Mere Maula Mujhe wo Raah Guzar Bhi Dede

Haider Maula,Haider Maula

tracks.title: Karbala Mashallah
tracks.lyrics:
Labbaik ya hussain..

Jiye shaah hussain,jiye shaah hussain.

zinda jaha’n mein taaba qayamat hai karbala
sadaat e karbala ki amanat hai karbala
duniya ke har ghareeb ki izzat hai karbala

Jiye shaah hussain, jiye shaah hussain

Jannat e maa karbala, rooh e azaa karbala
noor e khuda karbala, baab e dua karbala
khaak e shifa karbala, ghum ki dawa karbala, jannat e maa karbala

jannat e maa karbala

Karbobala khoon e Mohammad se saji hai
Karbobala ishq e hussain ibn e ali hai
teri zamee’n mo’alla.

Karbala karbala masha’allah,
tu rahegi sadaa insha’allah

Mashallah mashallah karbala.

Aao chale karbala
ban ke safeer e azaa
sar pe ho parcham khula
ishq e azaa saath rahe
ashko ki barsaat rahe
haatho mein bus haath rahe
teri zamee’n mo’alla

nainawa nainawa mashallah
tu rahegi sadaa insha’allah

Mashallah mashallah karbala

Jiye shaah hussain, jiye shaah hussain
Jiye shaah, jiye shaah

Karbobala khaak thi
khaak ko izzat mili
khaak e shifa bangayi
aaye hussain ibn e ali
surat e gulzar saji
ghazi ki jageer bani
teri zamee’n mo’alla

marhaba marhaba mashallah
tu rahegi sadaa insha’allah

Mashallah mashallah karbala

Jiye shaah hussain, jiye shaah hussain
Jiye shaah, jiye shaah

Hum tere zawwar hain
tere azadaar hain
khadim e darbaar hain
nara e labbaik mera
matam e shahe shohada
lo mai chala karbobala
teri zamee’n mo’alla

shukriya shukriya mashallah
tu rahegi sadaa insha’allah

Mashallah mashallah karbala

Jiye shaah hussain, jiye shaah hussain
Jiye shaah, jiye shaah

Meri dawa karbala
meri shifa karbala
meri baqa karbala
daulat e maa karbobala
quwwat e maa karbobala
izzat e maa karbobala
teri zamee’n mo’alla

rehnuma rehnuma mashallah
tu rahegi sadaa insha’allah

Mashallah mashallah karbala

Jiye shaah hussain, jiye shaah hussain
Jiye shaah, jiye shaah

Aye shahe karbobala
koi nahi aap sa
ek hai bus karbala
sarwar o rehan chalo
leke ye armaan chalo
nazr kare jaan chalo
teri zamee’n mo’alla

Jaane maa jaane maa mashallah
tu rahegi sadaa insha’allah

Mashallah mashallah karbala

Zindabad karbala, zindabad ya hussain
Jiye shaah, jiye shaah

Beshak ali ke laal ki mehnat hai karbala
Zehra ke khandaan ki daulat hai karbala

jo bhi yaha’n hussain ka zawwar ban gaya
hurr bangaya koi, koi mukhtaar ban gaya

Karbobala sayebaa’, karbobala paasbaa’n, karbobala noor e jaa’n

saari zameeno ki maa

ishq o mohabbat ka nisha’n
farsh pe hai arsh jahaa’n
jannat e arzi ka samaa
dee’n panaah, sajda gaah, madresa, darsgaah, hal yazah, hal ataah

tu hai dayaar e hussain, mashallah mashallah
tu dil e zahra ka chayn, mashallah mashallah
rooh e dil e mashraqain, mashallah mashallah
tere liye har dua, inshallah inshallah
tere liye har sadaa, inshallah inshallah 
jaari rahegi sadaa, inshallah inshallah

Karbala karabala

Hai hamari darsgaah, Karbala karabala
haq ka seedha raasta, Karbala karabala
Ibadato ka raabta, Karbala karabala
har ek hurr ki rahnuma, Karbala karabala
hussainiyat ka madrassa, Karbala karabala
Baqa e harf e laa ilaah, Karbala karabala
Hussain jiska baadshah, Karbala karabala
Hussain jiska baadshah, Karbala karabala
Hussain jiska baadshah, Karbala karabala

Labbaik ya hussain…
