tracks.title: Zahra Terey Gulshan Ka
tracks.lyrics:
Gulshan-e-Zahra s.a Gulshan-e-Zahra s.a
Fatima Zahra s.a
Gulshan-e-Zahra s.a Gulshan-e-Zahra s.a

Zahra s.a Terey Gulshan Ka Har Phool Nirala Hai
Har Phool Ne Sar De Ke Islam Ko Pala Hai
Zahra s.a Terey Gulshan Ka Har Phool Nirala Hai

Afsos Musalmano Aashur Ko Maqtal Main
Qura'an Key Paro'n Ko Naizo'n Pe Uchhala Hai
Har Phool Ne Sar De Kar Islam Ko Pala Hai
Zahra s.a Terey Gulshan Ka Har Phool Nirala Hai

Aye Mout Kabhi Tu Ney Zainab s.a Se Nahi Poocha
Athhara Baras Kaisey Iss Sheyr Ko Pala Hai
Har Phool Ne Sar De Kar Islam Ko Pala Hai
Zahra s.a Terey Gulshan Ka Har Phool Nirala Hai

Bus Qabar Hi Zahra s.a Ki Doobi Hai Andheyro'n Main
Halankey Madiney Main Har Simt Ujala Hai
Har Phool Ne Sar De Kar Islam Ko Pala Hai
Zahra s.a Terey Gulshan Ka Har Phool Nirala Hai

Sarka-e-Muhammad s.a.w.w Hon Ausat Hon Ke Aakhir Hon
Zahra s.a Key Charagho'n Se Har Simt Ujalaa Hai
Har Phool Ne Sar De Kar Islam Ko Pala Hai
Zahra s.a Terey Gulshan Ka Har Phool Nirala Hai

Fatima Zahra s.a

(Gulshan-e-Zahra s.a Gulshan-e-Zahra s.a) 2x

tracks.title: Way to Karbala
tracks.lyrics:
I remember days I used to see
Millions going to karbala
Today I'm on this road
I'll get to see you soon
O my Maula, O my Maula

Hussain Maula Hussain Maula
Ya aba abdillah

On our way to Karbala
Hussain Maula Hussain Maula
From Najaf to Karbala
Hussain Maula Hussain Maula

On our way, Hussain
Day by Day, Hussain
To Karbala...
Hussain Maula Hussain Maula

The day that I’ve prayed for is here
All of my dreams are coming true
Few more days and I'll be there
Maula I'm coming to you
Every Step, Hussain
Tears we shed, Hussain
To Karbala, Hussain Maula Hussain Maula
On our way to Karbala
Hussain Maula Hussain Maula
From Najaf to Karbala
Hussain Maula Hussain Maula

On our way, Hussain
Day by Day, Hussain
To Karbala...
Hussain Maula Hussain Maula

I've come from so far to Karbala
Saying Maula Labbaik to your call
Three days and three nights on the road
My feet are hurting from the walk
Day and night, Hussain
On your side, Hussain
To karbala, Hussain Maula Hussain Maula
On our way to Karbala
Hussain Maula Hussain Maula
From Najaf to Karbala
Hussain Maula Hussain Maula

On our way... Hussain
Day by Day... Hussain
To Karbala...

Hussain Maula Hussain Maula
Yaa Aba Abdillah

You are the peace in our heart
You give comfort to our mind
O Hussain
So many people around the world
Come to kiss your holy shrine
Far from home, Hussain
On this road, Hussain
To Karbala, Hussain Maula Hussain Maula

On our way to Karbala
Hussain Maula Hussain Maula
From Najaf to Karbala
Hussain Maula Hussain Maula

On our way, Hussain
Day by Day, Hussain
To Karbala,

Hussain Maula Hussain Maula
Yaa Aba Abdillah

Yaa Hussain

tracks.title: Aye Alamdar E Haram
tracks.lyrics:
(Saqi-e-Tishna Laban Aye Alamdar-e-Haram
Haidari Sheyr-e-Jawan Aye Alamdar-e-Haram) 

(Marhaba Sheyr-e-Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Alamdar-e-Haram) 

Saqi-e-Tishna Laban Aye Alamdar-e-Haram
Haidari Sheyr-e-Jawan Aye Alamdar-e-Haram

Aye Shehanshah-e-Wafa Sani-e-Haidar a.s Moula
Aye Sakina s.a Key Chacha Fatima s.a Zahra Ki Dua
Fouj-e-Shabbir a.s Key Salaar Alamdar-e-Wafa
Bani Hashim Ke Qamar Naz-e-Shah-e-Karbo Bala
Moula Qurban Dil O Jaan Aye Alamdar-e-Haram
Saqi-e-Tishna Laban Aye Alamdar-e-Haram

(Marhaba Sheyr-e-Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Alamdar-e-Haram) 

Haidari Sheyr-e-Jawan Aey Alamdar-e-Haram

Haaye Wo Sham-e-Ghareebaan Wo Qayamat Ka Sama
Haaye Sadaat Ke Jaltay Huay Khaimo'n Ka Dhuwaan
Bibiyaan s.a.a Karti Theen Ro Ro Ke Yehi Aah O Fughaan
Aao Abbas a.s Ridaao'n Ke Muhafiz Ho Kahan
Ho Kahan Sheyr-e-Jawan Aye Alamdar-e-Haram
Saqi-e-Tishna Laban Aye Alamdar-e-Haram

(Marhaba Sheyr-e-Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Alamdar-e-Haram) 

Haidari Sheyr-e-Jawan Aey Alamdar-e-Haram

Apna Bibi s.a Ko Alamdar Chacha a.s Yaad Aaya
Aaya Jab Sham Ka Bazaar Chacha a.s Yaad Aaya
Na Mila Saya-e-Deewar Chacha a.s Yaad Aaya
Jab Tamanchey Lagey Har Baar Chacha a.s Yaad Aaya
Thi Sakina s.a Ki Fughaan Aye Alamdar-e-Haram
Saqi-e-Tishna Laban Aye Alamdar-e-Haram

(Marhaba Sheyr-e-Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Alamdar-e-Haram) 

Haidari Sheyr-e-Jawan Aey Alamdar-e-Haram

Ham Azadaaro'n Ki Taqdeer Jaga Do Moula
Karbala Ka Hamain Zawwar Bana Do Moula
Apni Jageer Ka Deedaar Kara Do Moula
Roza-e-Hazrat-e-Shabbir a.s Dikha Do Moula
Hai Yehi Wird-e-Zabaan Aey Alamdar-e-Haram
Saqi-e-Tishna Laban Aye Alamdar-e-Haram

(Marhaba Sheyr-e-Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Jawan Aye Alamdar-e-Haram)

tracks.title: Haey Yeh Zulm Hua Baba May
Majlis E Aza Ki Khair Ho Meri Is
Sab Nad E Ali Aska Vird Karo
Karbala Ke Yeh Sada Hay La Ilaha Il Allah Swt
Nana Teray Rozay Par May Hall Sunanwan Aaiyan
Na Le Ja Na Le Ja Zuljanah
Sajjad Asmera Qaidi Ban Kar Bazar E Shaam
Ya Abul Fazl Il Abbas As
Aajawo Ali Asger
tracks.lyrics:
(Aajawo Ali Asger) X3

(Maa Jula Julaye) X4

Raato Ko Uth Kar Lori Sunaye Hai,

Ay Phool Sa Sipahi,

Tujko Salaam Mera,

Tune Kiya Hai Uncha,

Dunya Me Naam Mera,

Aajawo Tuje Maa Sine Se Lagaye Hai,

(Maa Jula Julaye) X2

Amu Hai Paas Tere,

Baba Hai Aur Akber,

Darna Na Zalimo Se,

Ay Be Zuban Asger,

Maa Ko Bulaana Jab Nind Na Aye Hai,

(Maa Jula Julaye) X2

Maa Teri Tashnagi Par,

Qurbaan Meri Jaani,

Kyu Beh Rahaa Hai Darya,

Tujko Mila Na Pani,

Aaja Ke Madar Paani Pilaye Hai,

(Maa Jula Julaye) X2

Tu Chaand Mere Ghar Ka,

Dunya Se Jane Waale,

Tu Kya Gaya Hai Gar Se,

Rukhsat Hu Ye Ujaale,

Taarikiyo Ke Badal Se Chhaaye Hai,

(Maa Jula Julaye) X2

Awlaad Ka Bicharna,

Sab Se Baraa Hai Sadma,

Ujri Hai Kokh Meri,

Dil Ro Raha Hai Mera,

Yeh Aag Dil Ki Maa Kaise Bujaye Hai,

(Maa Jula Julaye) X2

Madar Ke Samne Jab,

Paani Ka Jaam Aye,

Besaakh Ta Labo Par,

Tera Hi Naam Aaye,

Paani Me Tera Chehra Nazar Aaye Hai,

(Maa Jula Julaye) X2

Dil Se Nikal Rahi Hai,

Ab Yeh Duwae Har Pal,

Maa Ban Ke Tujko Paale,

Ye Sar Zamine Maktal,

Darti Hu Laykin Tu Khof Na Khaye Hai

(Maa Jula Julaye) X2

Sunti Hu Rodiya Tha,

Tuj Par Sitam Ka Lashkar,

Tu Muskura Raha Tha,

Jis Waqt Teer Kha Kar,

Kayse Tuje Maa Dilse Bhulaye Hai,

tracks.title: Alam Sajaawo
tracks.lyrics:
Bicha Ke Farshe Azaa

Fatema Ko Yaad Karo

(Alam Sajaawo Kisi Be Rida Ko Yaad Karo) X2

Siyah Kapre Badan Par Ho Sirf Is Gham Mein,

Ruke Na Ankh Se Ansoo Kabhi Muharram Mein,

(Libas Se Hazrate Zainul Aba Ko Yaad Karo) X2

(Alam Sajaawo Kisi Be Rida Ko Yaad Karo) X2

Kabhi Sabil Se Pani Piyo To Ye Kehkar,

Me Teri Pyas Pe Kurban Husain Ki Dukhtar,

(Kabhi Sakina Kabhi Ba Wafaa Ko Yaad Karo) X2

(Alam Sajaawo Kisi Be Rida Ko Yaad Karo) X2

Gale Mein Shale Azaa Aur Hath Sino Par,

Alam Utha Ke Chalo Yu Dahekte Sholo Par,

(Jo Bekaso Pe Huwi Us Jafaa Ko Yaad Karo) X2

(Alam Sajaawo Kisi Be Rida Ko Yaad Karo) X2

Jula Julawo Kisi Be Zabaan Ka Jab Bhi,

To Yaad Karna Zara Be Kasi Wo Banu Ki,

(Kabhi Rubab Ki Aaho Buka Ko Yaad Karo) X2

(Alam Sajaawo Kisi Be Rida Ko Yaad Karo) X2

Ghame Husain Mila Hai Tumhe Mukadar Se,

Sadaa Husain Ke Matam Ki Aaye Ghar Ghar Se,

(Husain Husain Karo Karbela Ko Yaad Karo) X2

(Alam Sajaawo Kisi Be Rida Ko Yaad Karo) X2

Wo Jisne Din Ke Khatir Luta Diya Gar Ko,

Khuda Ki Raah Me Jisne Kataa Diya Sar Ko,

(Par Ho Namaaz To Us Be Khataa Ko Yaad Karo) X2

(Alam Sajaawo Kisi Be Rida Ko Yaad Karo) X2

Alam Jo Hazrate Abbas Ka Utha Te Hai,

Dile Batul Se Lakho Duwae Paate Hai,

(Alam Ka Saye Mein Awo Duwa Ko Yaad Karo) X2

(Alam Sajaawo Kisi Be Rida Ko Yaad Karo) X2

Kabhi Ye Shoch Ke Tum Dekhna Pharere Ko,

Yahi To Zainabe Muztar Ki Aas Tha Logo,

(Alam Ko Dekho To Us Berida Ko Yaad Karo) X2

(Alam Sajaawo Kisi Be Rida Ko Yaad Karo) X2

Bahen Ke Samne Dulha Bane Koi Bhayi,

Jo Apne Bhayi Ka Sehra Na Dekhne Paye,

(Usi Gharib Behen Ki Sadaa Ko Yaad Karo) X2

Khuda Na Khasta Kismat Ye Din Jo Dikhlaye,

Kisi Jawan Ko Jawani Mein Maut Ajaaye,

(To Hum Shabihe Nabi Ki Kazaa Ko Yaad Kare) X2

tracks.title: Utho Abbas
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Abbas) X2

(Haye Abbas Utho) X2

(Utho Abbas Bahan Waqife-E Bazaar Nahi) X2

Ek Bhatija Ke Siwa Koi Madadgar Nahi

(Utho Abbas Bahan Waqife-E Bazaar Nahi) X2

Sham Jaana Hai Rida Sar Pe Nahi Hai Bhaya

(Haye Abbas Utho) X2

Dile Gham Zadaa Kare Ye Buka,

Behan Ka Nahi Koi Aasra,

(Utho Abbas Bahan Waqife-E Bazaar Nahi) X2

Ghar Se Nikli Thi To Mehmil Me Bithaya Tune

(Haye Abbas Utho) X2

Safar Dusra Shuroo Hai Mera,

Chali Chawd Ke Behan Karbela,

(Utho Abbas Bahan Waqife-E Bazaar Nahi) X2

Mayne Yasrab Ki Bhi Galiya Na Kabhi Dekhi Thi

(Haye Abbas Utho) X2

Behan Kya Kare Milenge Mujhe,

Naye Log Or Naye Raste,

(Utho Abbas Bahan Waqife-E Bazaar Nahi) X2

Maa Ki Tarha Se Mein Darbare Sitam Jawoongi

(Haye Abbas Utho) X2

Bataawo Zaraa Mere Bawafaa,

Garibul Watan Kare Kya Bhala

(Utho Abbas Bahan Waqife-E Bazaar Nahi) X2

Samne Kaise Me Shiri Ka Karungi Socho

(Haye Abbas Utho) X2

Karoo Mein Fugaa Bandhi Reshwa,

Huwi Kayd Sab Nabi Zaadiya,

(Utho Abbas Bahan Waqife-E Bazaar Nahi) X2

Kya Gawaara Hein Ke Sab Dekhe Khule Sar Mujko

(Haye Abbas Utho) X2

Duwa Do Mujhe Sikha Do Mujhe,

Chaloo Kis Tarha Bataado Mujhe,

(Utho Abbas Bahan Waqife-E Bazaar Nahi) X2

Shimr Marega Sakina Ko Behan Royengi

(Haye Abbas Utho) X2

Kerenge Sitam Laeen Har Kadam,

Tu Hein Har Kadam Bhulayenge Hum

(Utho Abbas Bahan Waqife-E Bazaar Nahi) X2

Kaise Jayengi Nabizadi Sitam Gharo Mein

tracks.title: Pardesi Musafir Ki
tracks.lyrics:
Halminasir Yansuruna X 4

(Pardesi Musafir Ki Purdard Kahani Hai) X2

(Kuch Sehme Huye Bache) X2

Behta Huwa Pani Hai

(Pardesi Musafir Ki Purdard Kahani Hai) X2

Ay Karbobala Tere,

Daman Mein Chupa Kya Kya,

(Bachpan Ali Asger Ka) X2

Akber Ki Jawaani Hai

(Pardesi Musafir Ki Purdard Kahani Hai) X2

Taabut, Alam, Jula,

Pani Ki Sabile Bhi,

(Jis Simt Nazar Jaaye) X2

Pyaaso Ki Nishani Hai

(Pardesi Musafir Ki Purdard Kahani Hai) X2

Mansoob Alam Se Jo,

Ek Mashke Sakina Hai,

(Amu Se Bhatiji Ki) X2

Ulfat Ki Nishaani Hai

(Pardesi Musafir Ki Purdard Kahani Hai) X2

Ansoo Na Ruke Logo,

Shabbir Ki Majlis Mein,

(Us Ujre Huye Gar Ki) X2

Yu Yaad Manaani Hai

(Pardesi Musafir Ki Purdard Kahani Hai) X2

Shabbir Ye Kehte The,

Mein Kaise Ijazat Du,

(Ay Qasim Tu Mere) X2

Bhayi Ki Nishaani Hai

(Pardesi Musafir Ki Purdard Kahani Hai) X2

Ye Laashaye Akber Par,

Layla Ne Kahan Ro Kar,

(Kyu Khoon Me Tar Teri) X2

Poshak Shahani Hai

(Pardesi Musafir Ki Purdard Kahani Hai) X2

De Te The Sadaa Sarwar,

Abbas Chale Aawo,

(Mayat Ali Akber Ki) X2

Ab Mujko Uthani Hai

(Pardesi Musafir Ki Purdard Kahani Hai) X2

Rota Hai Falak Ab Tak,

Shabbir Tere Gham Mein,

(Dunya Ye Samaj Ti Hai) X2

Barsaat Ka Paani Hai

(Pardesi Musafir Ki Purdard Kahani Hai) X2

Sheh Bole Bahan Zainab,

Zindaa Se Riha Ho Kar,

(Rudaade Sitam Jaakar) X2

Amma Ka Sunani Hai

(Pardesi Musafir Ki Purdard Kahani Hai) X2

Ey Mere Khuda Tujse,

Har Waqt Duwa Ye Hai,

(Maula Ki Safay Matam) X2

Har Gar Mein Bichani Hai

(Pardesi Musafir Ki Purdard Kahani Hai) X2

(Kuch Sehme Huye Bache) X2

Behta Huwa Pani Hai

tracks.title: Hay Kasim Jag Zara
tracks.lyrics:
Hai Kassim Jag Zara. Mera Pyare Jag Zara

  1. Teri Mehndi , Tera Upton, Tera Gehna

Ha Tera Sehra Zainab Layee Hai

Hai Bain Kare Farwa Hai Kassim Jag Zara. Mere Pyare Jag Zara

  2. Teri Mehndi Khuld Se Aayee Hai

Poshak Naye Banwaee Hai

Teri Sej Sajaye, Wawaila

Teri Rasm Himaee, Wawaila

Teri Mehndi , Tera Upton, Tera Gehna ……

  3. Teri Behne Shakan Manati Hai

Aur Neg Wo Lene Aati Hai

Abbas Dilawar, Wawaila

Maidan Me Kausar, Wawaila

Teri Mehndi , Tera Upton, Tera Gehna ……

  4. Jannat Se Guletar Aaye Hain

Poshak Abuzar Laye Hain

Aur Pahen Ke Dulha, Wawaila

Poshak Aur Kangan, Wawaila

Teri Mehndi , Tera Upton, Tera Gehna ……

  5. Sab Hur Aur Farishte Aayenge

Rizwan Kaside Sunayenge

Sab Khuld Ke Vaasi, Wawaila

Hai Tere Barati, Wawaila

Teri Mehndi , Tera Upton, Tera Gehna ……

  6. Tera Sehra Sunate Hai Shabbar

Mashnad Ko Bichate Hai Kambar

Teri Sej Urusi, Wawaila

Har Garne Sajayi Wawaila

Teri Mehndi , Tera Upton, Tera Gehna ……

  7. Kulsum Aur Fizza Aayi Hai

Do Salah Banakar Layi Hai

Abbase Dilawar, Wawaila

Maidane Kausar, Wawaila

Teri Mehndi , Tera Upton, Tera Gehna ……

  8. Phir Khwaab Yeh Toota Farwa Ka

Aur Peshe Nazar Ek Laasha Tha

Na Mehndi Uptan Wawaila

Na Masnad Dulhan, Wawaila

Teri Mehndi , Tera Upton, Tera Gehna ……

tracks.title: Karon Rooz Dua
tracks.lyrics:
Nana Neend Nahi Aundi

  1. Nana Neend Nahi Aundi Hai Karu Roz Duwawa X3

Viran Kyu Nahi Aaye Hai X3

Roro Tak Diya Rawa

Nana Neend Nahi Aundi Hai Karu Roz Duwawa X2

  2. Hai Muntazir Nigahe Baithi Hu Raah Par

Deti Hu Main Sadayen Baithi Hu Raah Par

Viran Kyu Nahi Aaye Hai ………….

  3. Nana Mere Baradar Kyon Chod Kar Gaye

Bimar Ko Rulakar Kyon Chod Kar Gaye

Viran Kyu Nahi Aaye Hai ………….

  4. Kasim Ko Yaad Kar Ke Roti Hu Raat Din

Ankho Main Ashk Bhar Ke Roti Hu Raat Din

Viran Kyu Nahi Aaye Hai ………….

  5. Tarsi Huvi Hain Aankhen Asger Tera Liye

Jula Bani Hai Bahain Asger Tere Liya

Viran Kyu Nahi Aaye Hai ………….

  6. Lene Na Mujko Aaye Naraz Kyo Huwe

Baba Bhi Gar Na Aaye Naraz Kyo Huwe

Viran Kyu Nahi Aaye Hai ………….

  7. Lo Aun Aur Jaffer Kyon Lawt Te Nahi

Nana Mere Baradar Kyon Lawt Te Nahi

Viran Kyu Nahi Aaye Hai ………….

  8. Hujro Mein Sab Ke Jakar Kar Ti Hu Yaad Mein

Akber Ko Jake Der Par Karti Hu Yaad Main

Viran Kyu Nahi Aaye Hai ………….

  9. Kisko Gale Lagau Ab Kaun Paas Hai

Kyon Roz Derpe Jau Kya Mujko Aas Hai

Viran Kyu Nahi Aaye Hai ………….

tracks.title: Ek Baar Watan Lot Ke Aaja
tracks.lyrics:
Isse Pehle,

Ke Muje Maut Aajaye,

Mere Bhaya,

Ali Akber,

(Ek Baar Watan Lot Ke Aaja) X2


Sugra Ki Kasam Hai Tujhe Akber

(Ek Baar Watan Lot Ke Aaja) X2

Kya Tujko Gawaara Hai Ke Mar Jawoo Tarap Kar

(Ek Baar Watan Lot Ke Aaja) X2

Aaja Mein Teri Chand Si Soorat Ki Balaloo,

Dulha Na Sahi Mein Tujhe Dulha Sa Banaaloo,

Dil Mein Hai Jo Armaan Nikale Teri Khwahar,

(Ek Baar Watan Lot Ke Aaja) X2

Bhabhi Ke Liye Meine Jo Poshak Banayi,

Roti Hu Use Dekh Kar Deti Hu Duhaee,

Hai Shaam-O-Sahar Ek Sadaa Mere Labo Par

(Ek Baar Watan Lot Ke Aaja) X2

Kiya Tujko Meri Yaad Sataa Ti Nahi Bhaya,

Mein To Tujhe Ek Pal Bhi Bhulati Nahi Bhaya,

Kyu Bhool Gaya Tu Mujhe Pardes Mein Jakar

(Ek Baar Watan Lot Ke Aaja) X2

Kaano Mein Jo Aawaz Azan Aati Hein Bhaya,

Tasweer Teri Dil Mein Utar Jaati Hai Bhaya,

Roti Hu Ye Kehkar Ali Akber Ali Akber

(Ek Baar Watan Lot Ke Aaja) X2

Roti Huye Har Eid Guzari Meri Bhaya,

Ati Thi Mujhe Yaad Tumhari Mere Bhaya,

Yaado Se Hai Abaad Tere Baad Mera Ghar

(Ek Baar Watan Lot Ke Aaja) X2

Bimar Tarap Ti Hai Dawaa Koi Nahi Hai,

Is Ghar Mein Udasi Ke Siwa Koi Nahi Hai,

Thakti Bari Yaad Se Diwaar Kabhi Gar

(Ek Baar Watan Lot Ke Aaja) X2

Rukhkar Ke Suwe Karbobela Roti Hu Bhayi,

Milne Ki Shabo Roz Duwa Karti Hu Bhayi,

Nana Ki Ziyarat Ko Taras Ti Hu Baradar

(Ek Baar Watan Lot Ke Aaja) X2

Tum Bin Mai Jiyu Ye Koi Aasan Nahi Hai,

Hoga Tera Phir Koi Armaan Nahi Hai,

Hoga Ye Tera Aakhri Ehsan Bahan Par

tracks.title: Sakina Utho
tracks.lyrics:
Sakina Utho

_

(Sakina Utho. Meri Jaan Utho. Rehaee Mili. Chalo Gar Chale) X3

  1. Ye Karti Thi Maa, Lahad Pe Bukaa. Meri Ladli, Chalo Gar Chale.

(Sakina Utho. Meri Jaan Utho. Rehaee Mili. Chalo Gar Chale) X2

  2. Yaha Se Chalo, Chale Karbala. Wahi Se Tumhe, Milenge Chacha. Sitam Jo Huwe, Bataana Une. Dikhaana Unhe, Ye Kurta Jalaa. Chacha Jaan Ko, Dikhana Zara, Ridaa Khun Bhare, Chalo Gar Chale.

(Sakina Utho. Meri Jaan Utho. Rehaee Mili. Chalo Gar Chale) X2

  3. Bataana Unhe, Kabhi Saktiya. Mili Jis Kadar, Tuje Gurkhiya. Hamari Ridaa, Luti Kis Tarha. Chini Jis Tarha, Teri Baliya. Bataana Une, Buji Kis Tarha, Teri Tishnagi, Chalo Gar Chale.

(Sakina Utho. Meri Jaan Utho. Rehaee Mili. Chalo Gar Chale) X2

  4. Padar Se Milo, To Dil Joee Ho. Bataana Unhe, Bahot Roi Ho. Kasam Lo Agar, Tumhare Bina. Sakina Kabhi, Kahi Soyi Ho. Lahad Bap Ki, Mile Jab Tuje, To Kehna Yahi, Chalo Gar Chale.

(Sakina Utho. Meri Jaan Utho. Rehaee Mili. Chalo Gar Chale) X2

  5. Lahad Jab Mile, Tuje Bhai Ki. To Kehna Use, Meri Ladli. Rehaee Mili, Hame Kaid Se. Hame Ab Nahi, Aziyat Koi. Mere Be Zuba, Utho Gar Chale, Shabi Hai Nabi, Chalo Gar Chale.

(Sakina Utho. Meri Jaan Utho. Rehaee Mili. Chalo Gar Chale) X2

  6. Labe Al Kama, Tu Karna Fugaa. Teri Moj Hai, Abhi Takh Rawa. Meri Pyas Par, Huye Jo Fida. Chacha Ke Mere, Hai Bazu Kahaa. Kahaa Mashk Hai, Kahaa Hai Alam, Kahaa Hai Zari, Chalo Gar Chale.

(Sakina Utho. Meri Jaan Utho. Rehaee Mili. Chalo Gar Chale) X2

  7. Na Ab Gham Koi, Na Uftad Hai. Wo Zanjir Se, Ab Aazad Hai. Puphi Bhi Teri, Tere Sath Hai. Tere Sath Hi, Wo Sajjad Hai. Meri Gham Zadaa, Shabe Gham Kati, Sahar Ho Chuki, Chalo Gar Chale.

(Sakina Utho. Meri Jaan Utho. Rehaee Mili. Chalo Gar Chale) X2

  8. Labo Par Tere, Yahi Baat Thi. Watan Jayenge, Kabhi Ham Puphi. Tuje Shimr Ka, Nahi Khof Ab. Satayenge Na, Tuje Ab Shaki. Nikal Kayd Se, Shuru Ham Kare, Nayi Zindagi, Chalo Gar Chale.

(Sakina Utho. Meri Jaan Utho. Rehaee Mili. Chalo Gar Chale) X2

  9. Gharibo Ka Ye, Luta Kafela. Wida Ho Ke Phir, Watan Jayenge. Tuje Payengi, Jo Sughra Teri. To Bimar Ko, Milengi Dawa. Gale Mil Ke Phir, Bohot Royengi, Wo Behna Teri, Chalo Gar Chale.

(Sakina Utho. Meri Jaan Utho. Rehaee Mili. Chalo Gar Chale) X2

  10. Mazar-E Nabi, Laraz Jayenga. Bahen Jab Teri, Karengi Bukaa. Kaha Hai Chacha, Kaha Hai Padar. Kaha Hai Bataa, Bhara Gar Mera. Suna Ne Use, Ye Rudaad-E Gham, Yehi Bebasi, Chalo Gar Chale.

(Sakina Utho. Meri Jaan Utho. Rehaee Mili. Chalo Gar Chale) X2

tracks.title: Ek Kafela Laya Tha Mein
tracks.lyrics:
Ek Kafela Laya Tha Mein

_

Sula Hai Kabr Mai Besheer Ko Husaini Ghareeb,

Har Ek Shaheed Ke Lashe Pe Aaye Hai Rote Huwe,

Labe Husain Se Suye Falak Aayi Sadaa

(Ek Kafela Laya Tha Mein) X3

Us Kafele Mein Tha Ali Akber Sa Ek Beta Jawaan,

Abbas Jesa Bhayi Tha,

(Masum Asgher Be Zubaan) X2

Kuch Bibiya Thi Saath Mein Mehshar Mein Jinka Naam Tha

(Ek Kafela Laya Tha Mein) X3

Ye Kafela Kaise Luta Ye Soch Ke Mai Ro Diya,

Pala Tha Jinko Naaz Se,

(Karbobala Mein Kho Diya),

Un Sab Ke Laashe Samne The Aur Hoto Par Buka

(Ek Kafela Laya Tha Mein) X3

Karyal Jawaan Ki Laash Hatho Par Uthayi Hai Abhi,

Ek Be Zuban Ki Kabr Bhi,

(Maine Banayi Hai Abhi) X2

Samaan Mere Katl Ka Karte Hai Ab Ye Ashkiya

(Ek Kafela Laya Tha Mein) X3

Pyase Mere Atfaal Hai Behta Hai Darya Samne,

Ek Be Watan Ko Dasht Mein,

(Luta Hai Foje Shaam Ne) X2

Roti Hai Mere Chah Ne Waalo Ke Laasho Par Kazaa

(Ek Kafela Laya Tha Mein) X3

Kismat Meri Laykar Muje Karbobala Tak Agayi,

Ab Barte Barte Bat

(Zainab Ki Rida Tak Agayi) X2

Ho Jawoonga Mein Katl To Chinjayegi Uski Rida

(Ek Kafela Laya Tha Mein) X3

Kuch Der Mein Kanjar Laeen Ka Halk Par Chal Jayenga,

Aur Baad Mere Khaym-E

(Sadaat Bhi Jal Jaayenga) X2

Ya Yu Koi Pardes Mein Aa Kar Lootaye Karbela

(Ek Kafela Laya Tha Mein) X3

Jab Katl Mein Ho Jawoonga Shaame Ghariba Ayengi,

Saydaniyo Ke Kalb Pe,

(Taaza Kayamat Dhayengi) X2

Us Waqt Uthengi Meri Laashe Buridaa Se Sadaa

(Ek Kafela Laya Tha Mein) X3

Lashe Sabhi Rehjayengi Jalti Zamin Par Bekafan,

Kaydi Banengi Mustufa

(Ki Aal Pabandhe Rasan) X2

Raho Mein Rota Jayenga Bimar Ye Karke Buka

(Ek Kafela Laya Tha Mein) X3

Reh Jayengi Bali Sakina Ki Fugaa Zindan Mein,

Kaydi Rahengi Saal Bhar,

(Saydaniya Zindan Mein) X2

Sajaad Mera Kayd Se Jayenga Ye Kehte Huwa.

tracks.title: Ya Zehra
tracks.lyrics:
Ya Zehra

_

(Fetema Zehra) X2

(Ya Zehra) X4

1. (Ay Meri Bibi) X2

Tere Dar Pe Istighasa He, Tera Mamnoon Meri Shehzadi Ye Jaha Sara Hai

(Ya Zehra) X4

2. Tu Hame Hifz Or Amaan Dede, Apni Chadar Ke Saiban Dede,

Teri Kudrat Me Kya Nahi Bibi, Tu Jise Chahe Do Jahaan Dede

(Ya Zehra) X4

3. (Ay Meri Bibi) X2

Aansu-O Mein Duwa Mangi Hai, Teri Tasbee Hi Parke Dil Ne Tuje Pukaara Hai

(Ya Zehra) X4

4. Tera Darbaar Wo Sakhi Dar Hai, Har Farishta Jahaan Gadaagar Hai,

Tere Makrooz Asmaan Waale Tera Makrooz Har Sikandar Hai

(Ya Zehra) X4

5. (Ay Meri Bibi) X2

Tu Sakhi Hai Tere Bache Bhi, Ek Raahi Nahi Gawaahi Me Jag Ye Saara Hai

(Ya Zehra) X4

6. Farshe Majlis Pe Aur Musalle Par, Har Jawaa Keh Raha Hai Roro Kar,

Ham Rahe Na Rahe Magar Bibi, Ta Qayamat Rahe Game Sarwar

(Ya Zehra) X4

7. (Ay Meri Bibi) X2

Tere Bacho Ka Gham Manaa Te Hai, Apni Awlaad Se Kahi Barke Gham Ye Pyara Hai

(Ya Zehra) X4

8. Karz Makrooz Ka Adaa Karde, Mufliso Ka Naseeb Wa Karde,

Jinki Godi Bhari Nahi Bibi Unko Awlaad Tu Ataa Karde

(Ya Zehra) X4

9. (Ay Meri Bibi) X2

Bas Tuhi Muraad Deti Hai, Teri Chawkhat Dare Ilahi Ka Isti Araa Hai

(Ya Zehra) X4

10. Farz Momin Se Gham Juda Karde, Bas Ghame Karbela Ataa Karde,

Be Khataa Kayd Me Hai Jo Momin, Mojize Se Unhe Rihaa Karde

(Ya Zehra) X4

11. (Ay Meri Bibi) X2

Gham Koyi Hussainiyo Ko Na De, Jo Hussaini Hai Tere Baba Ko Jaan Se Pyaara Hai

(Ya Zehra) X4

12. Un Shaheedo Ka Ye Mukadar Hai, Sayibaan Inka Teri Chadar Hai,

Unke Sino Pe Ay Meri Bibi Daaghe Maatam Nishaane Haider Hai

(Ya Zehra) X4

13. (Ay Meri Bibi) X2

Khuld Me Shaheed Jab Jaye, Teri Awaaz Aaye Aane Do Ye Hamaara Hai

(Ya Zehra) X4

14. Majlise Gham Me Ashk Barsaane, Aasake Ya Nahi Khuda Jaane,

Kya Bharosa Hamaari Saanso Ka, Ab Kahaa Ham Kahaa Azaa Khaane

(Ya Zehra) X4

15. (Ay Meri Bibi) X2

Ashke Gham Teri Amaanat Hai, Teri Awlaad Ke Hi Gham Ne Hame Sawaara Hai

(Ya Zehra) X4

16. Tujko Ummat Ne Yu Sataaya Hai, Marghe Mohsin Pe Bhi Rulaaya Hai,

Tujko Baba Ke Baad Ummat Ne, Haaye Darbaar Me Bulaaya Hai

(Ya Zehra) X4

17. (Ay Meri Bibi) X2

Kitne Sadme Utha Hai Tune, Ji Te Ji Tujko Meri Shehzadi Gham Ne Maara Hai

(Ya Zehra) X4

18. (Ay Meri Bibi) X2

Tere Darpe Sar Jukaa Te Hai, Har Hussaini Ka Tere Tukro Pe Hi Guzaara Hai

Warke Matam Sha (Fatema Zehra) X2 Aalame Walaa (Fatema Zehra) X2 Mere Man
Maula (Fatema Zehra) X2 Sarware Zehra (Fatema Zehra) X2 Aaha Wawayla

tracks.title: Mere Gharib Hussain
tracks.lyrics:
(As Salaamun Alayk Ya Gharib Hussaina) X2

(Ya Gharib Hussaina) X5

(Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain. Mere Shahid Hussain Ya Hussain Ya
Hussain. Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain) X2

  1. Godi Ke Pale Mare Ghaye Sab. Tu Hai Akayla Koi Nahi Ab. Bayn Ye Zehra Ne Kiye Dashte Bala Me

Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain. Mere Shahid Hussain Ya Hussain Ya
Hussain. Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

  2. Awno Muhammad Qasimo Asghar. Darde Judayi Degaye Akbar. Khune Hai Abbas Ka Zainab Ki Ridaa Me

Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain. Mere Shahid Hussain Ya Hussain Ya
Hussain. Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

  3. Lasho Pe Lashe Tune Uthaye. Girte Badan Pe Zakhme Bhi Khaye. Khak Hai Balo Me Lahu Teri Abaa Me

Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain. Mere Shahid Hussain Ya Hussain Ya
Hussain. Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

  4. Chor Gaye Sab God Ke Pale. Ho Gaye Rukhsat Gar Ke Ujale. Koi Nahi Laal Tera Dashte Bala Me

Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain. Mere Shahid Hussain Ya Hussain Ya
Hussain. Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

  5. Fakhr Se Uncha Sar Huwa Mera. Kon Hai Sani Dahar Mai Tera. Sabr Mai Ishaar Mai Juraat Pe Wafa Mai.

Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain. Mere Shahid Hussain Ya Hussain Ya
Hussain. Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

  6. Bit Rahi Hai Tujpe Kayamat. Dekh Rahi Hu Me Teri Gurbat. Pyaasa Raha Gar Bhi Luta Dashte Bala Me

Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain. Mere Shahid Hussain Ya Hussain Ya
Hussain. Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

  7. Jitne Bhi Laashe Be Goro Kafan The. Sab Ko Urhadi Khakh Hawa Na. Khakh To Ab Hashr Talab Hongi Hawa Mai.

Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain. Mere Shahid Hussain Ya Hussain Ya
Hussain. Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

  8. Laash Jawan Ki Tune Uthayi. Turbat Te Asger Tune Banayi. So Ta Hai Masoom Tera Deshte Kaza Mai.

Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain. Mere Shahid Hussain Ya Hussain Ya
Hussain. Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

  9. Charo Taraf Hai Bas Yahi Nawha Haye Husaina Haye Husaina Shor Hai Faryad Hai Khaymo Me Faza Me.

Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain. Mere Shahid Hussain Ya Hussain Ya
Hussain. Mere Gharib Hussain Ya Hussain Ya Hussain

tracks.title: Ye Kafela Layja
tracks.lyrics:
Ale Nabi Ka Kafela, Jab Shaam Ko Chala.

Kehne Lagi Hussain Se.

Hamshir Alvidaa.

Ane Lagi Ik Lashaye Be Sar Se Ye Sadaa



(Ye Kafela Layja Zainab, Kafela Layja) X2



(Maine Basayi Karbala) X3

Tu Shaam Ko Basaa



(Ye Kafela Layja Zainab, Kafela Layja) X2



1. Kuch Gham Na Kar Jo Raah Me Sehne Hai Sakhtiya

Sajaad Mera Kafele Ka Honga Sarwan

(Neze Pe Tere Saath Hi) X3

Jayenga Sar Mera



(Ye Kafela Layja Zainab, Kafela Layja) X2



2. Shiri Ka Ghar Bhi Raah Me Aayenga Ay Bahan

Tujko Agar Pehchan Na Paye Wo Purmehen

(Kehna Ke Pura Hogaya) X3

Waada Ye Gham Zadaa



(Ye Kafela Layja Zainab, Kafela Layja) X2



3. Ay Zainab Teri Raah Me Ayenga Ek Makaam

Hatim Bulaayenga Wahaa Le Le Ke Sabkaa Naam

(Karna Wahaa Bhi Sabr Tu) X3

Karna Na Bad Duwaa



(Ye Kafela Layja Zainab, Kafela Layja) X2



4. Aysi Bhi Manzil Raah Me Ayengi Nawha Ghar

Uthegi Teri Simt Jo Na Paak Har Nazar

(Quraan Sunayenga Wahi) X3

Neze Pe Sar Mera



(Ye Kafela Layja Zainab, Kafela Layja) X2



5. Ek Aysi Basti Ayengi Kuch Pehle Shaam Se

Takseem Hongi Chaadare Rahib Ki Naam Se

(Phir Chinlenge Chaadare) X3

Aakar Wo Ashkiya



(Ye Kafela Layja Zainab, Kafela Layja) X2



6. Ay Behna Tera Raah Me Hoga Ye Haal Bhi

Bache Judaa Hojayenge Jismo Se Khaal Bhi

(Har Ghaam Tere Haal Pe) X3

Rowengi Sayidaa



(Ye Kafela Layja Zainab, Kafela Layja) X2



7. Ja Zainab Ja Abaad Kar Zindaane Shaam Ko

Zainab Sulaadena Wahi Us Tishna Kaam Ko

(Jiske Gohar Bhi Chingaye) X3

Daman Bhi Hai Jalaa



(Ye Kafela Layja Zainab, Kafela Layja) X2



8. Shahzadi Meri Shaam Se Aye Jo Karbala

Kartithi Apne Bhayi Ki Markad Pe Ye Buka

(Zindaan Basaa Ke Aagayi) X3

Tumne Jo Ye Kahaa



(Ye Kafela Layja Zainab, Kafela Layja) X2

tracks.title: Naiza Sawar Baba
tracks.lyrics:
Ek Bachi Phool Si Jis Ka Sakina Naam Tha, Ro Rahi Thi Shaam Ki Rahon Mein
Wokarke Buka Karte The Tum Kitna Pyar Baba.

Ay Mere Naiza Sawar Baba X3

  1. Chal Nahi Sakti Sakina Raaste Dushwar Hai. Ablen Hein Pawon Mai Or Ab Lo Mai Khar Hai. Ankh Hai Nam Dil Figaar Baba.

Ay Mere Naiza Sawar Baba X3

  2. Nile Hein Rukhsar Mere Aur Gale Mai Hai Rasan Khushnagi Ba Warsi Lachari Ki Or Be Watan Ek Hai Dil Gham Hazar Baba.

Ay Mere Naiza Sawar Baba X3

  3. Aap Ke Sine Pe Baba Chein Se Soti Thi Mai Aap Tarapte Jo Kisi Bat Pe Roti Thi Mai Roti Hu Zaro Katar Baba.

Ay Mere Naiza Sawar Baba X3

  4. Be Rida Sab Bibi Ya Hai Shaam Ka Bazar Hai Zabt Gayara Nahi Hai Sabr Bhi Dushwar Hai. Sabr Ke Parwardigar Baba.

Ay Mere Naiza Sawar Baba X3

  5. Milna Sakungi Kabhi Mai Aap Se Ay Baba Jaan Aap Ka Roza Banenga Karbala Ke Darmiyan. Shaam Me Mera Mazar Baba.

Ay Mere Naiza Sawar Baba X3

  6. Yaad Isi Baat Pe Ata Hai Ghar Aksar Muje. Aaj Kanizi Mai Bula Ta Hai Sitamgar Muje. Koi Nahi Gham Guzar Baba.

Ay Mere Naiza Sawar Baba X3

  7. Khatithi Jab Bhi Tamache Shimre Sitamgar Se Aap Ke Chehre Ke Samt Ba Kasi Aur Yaad Se. Dekhti Thi Bar Bar Baba.

Ay Mere Naiza Sawar Baba X3

  8. Kon Hai Pursa Ne Haal Pyas Buja Yenga Kon Baliya Meri Sitamgaro Se Dilayenga Kon So Gaye Sab Jaanisar Baba


Ay Mere Naiza Sawar Baba X3

  9. Aap Ke Sina Pe Baba Chain Se Soti Thi Mai Aap Tarapte Jo Kisi Bat Pe Roti Thi Mai Roti Hu Zaro Katar Baba.

Ay Mere Naiza Sawar Baba X3

  10. Be Rida Sab Bibi Ya Hai Shaam Ka Bazar Hai Zabt Gayara Nahi Hai Sabr Bhi Dushwar Hai. Sabr Ke Parwardigar Baba.

Ay Mere Naiza Sawar Baba X3

  11. Mil Na Sakungi Kabhi Mai Aap Se Ay Baba Jaan Aap Ka Roza Banenga Karbala Ke Darmiyan. Shaam Me Mera Mazar Baba

Ay Mere Naiza Sawar Baba X3

tracks.title: Reh Gayi Ali Ki Beti Gham Utha Ne Ke Liye
tracks.lyrics:
Zainab Tanha Hai X4

Reh Gayi Ali Ki Beti Gham Utha Ne Keliya X 2

  1. Hussain Bhi Chalegaye Hai Sar Kata Ne Keliye X 2

Reh Gayi Ali Ki Beti Gham Utha Ne Keliya X 2

  2. Hussain Ki Nighah Bawafa Ko Dhund Ne Lagi X2

Kabra Che Mahi Ne Wali Ki Bana Ne Ke Liye

Reh Gayi Ali Ki Beti Gham Utha Ne Keliya X 2

  3. Jala Diye Sabhi Chirag Dasht Me Hussain Ne X2

Ek Beta Rehgaya Hai Shaam Jane Ke Liya

Reh Gayi Ali Ki Beti Gham Utha Ne Keliya X 2

  4. Kassim-E- Hazin Ki Laash Tukre Tukre Hogayi X2

Har Taraf Se Dasht-E- Karbela Saja Ne Ke Liye

Reh Gayi Ali Ki Beti Gham Utha Ne Keliya X 2

  5. Lagayenge Wo Aaj Aag Khaymaye Hussain Me X2

Aaye The Jo Fatema Ka Gar Jalaane Ke Liye

Reh Gayi Ali Ki Beti Gham Utha Ne Keliya X 2

  6. Ek Beti Jo Hussain Rota Chor Aye Hai X2

Ek Beti Saath Laye Kayd Khane Ke Liye

Reh Gayi Ali Ki Beti Gham Utha Ne Keliya X 2

  7. Sakina Keh Rahi Thi Baba Kayd Me Bhi Ayiye X2

Apne Sine Par Sakina Ko Sula Ne Ke Liye

Reh Gayi Ali Ki Beti Gham Utha Ne Keliya X 2

  8. Urhawo Khak Ay Hawaw Boli Zainabe Hazee X2

Bekafan Husaain Ko Kafan Urhane Ke Liye

Reh Gayi Ali Ki Beti Gham Utha Ne Keliya X 2

  9. Butool Zadiyo Ke Sar Se Chadare Bhi Chinli X2

Itne Sare Zulm Aur Is Gharaane Ke Liye

Reh Gayi Ali Ki Beti Gham Utha Ne Keliya X 2

  10. Jala Diye Sabhi Chirag Dasht Me Hussain Ne X2

Ek Beta Rehgaya Hai Shaam Jane Ke Liya

Reh Gayi Ali Ki Beti Gham Utha Ne Keliya X 2

  11. Wafaa Ka Taaj Unke Waaste Rakhaa He Khuld Me X2

Haath Jo Katayenge Alam Uthane Ke Liye

Reh Gayi Ali Ki Beti Gham Utha Ne Keliya X 2

tracks.title: Aey Karbala Aey Karbala
tracks.lyrics:
Ay Karbala X3

En Nara O Shevan En Girya O Zaari Dar Khaima-E-Shabbir Bapa Shaud

(Ai Karbala Karbala Ai Karbala) X2

  1. Jar Janib Hai Sitamgar (Be Khata Aal-E-Payambar) X2

Koi Be Makhna Aur Chadar (Koi Be Hosh Zamee Par) X2

Shud Zainab-E Girya Ba Haal-E-Pareshaa As Dast-E-Sitamgar Be Rida Shaud

(Ai Karbala Karbala Ai Karbala) X2

  2. Jal Uthao Aag Se Sehra (Kahi Khaima Kahi Jhoola) X2

Har Taraf Aik Hai Manzar (Kahi Matam Kahi Noha) X2
As Aatishe Shoza Aznaar-E-Farawa Paamaal-E-Sitam Aale Aba Shaud

(Ai Karbala Karbala Ai Karbala) X2

  3. Aya Yeh Kaisa Muharram (Bibiya Roti Hai Paigham) X2

Khoon Barsati Hai Aankhe (Khoon Me Duba Hai Parcham) X2

Aamacho Muharram Girya Khona Aalam Khoona Ba Fisha Chashme Aza Shaud

(Ai Karbala Karbala Ai Karbala) X2

  4. Hai Kahi Laasha-E-Akbar (To Kahi Turbat-E-Asghar) X2

Zakhm Kis Derja Lage Hai (Haye Bano Ke Jigar Par) X2

Ham Shakley Payambar Lakhte Dil-E-Sarwar Asteero Sina Asr-E-Kaza Shaud

(Ai Karbala Karbala Ai Karbala) X2

  5. Binte Zahra Ki Dukhaee (Saat Roti Hai Khudaee) X2

De Gaya Daag-E-Judaee (Haay Abbas Sa Bhai) X2

Be Taab Se Gham Khwaa Shut Sani-E-Zahra Abbas Labe Nehr Fiza Shaud

(Ai Karbala Karbala Ai Karbala) X2

  6. Aise Bikra Koi Lasha (Jaise Bikra Hua Sehra) X2

Khaak Par Bethi Hai Farwa (Aur Karti Hai Ye Noha) X2

Lakhte Dil-E-Farwa Gum Gashtare Sehra Paamaal-E-Sitam Noha Laka Shuad

(Ai Karbala Karbala Ai Karbala) X2

  7. Ik Taraf Pyaaso Ka Girya (Ik Taraf Rota Hai Darya) X2

Marsiya Parti Hai Fiza (Aur Kehti Hai Ye Zehra) X2

Gham Tashna Labara Darya-E-Rawara Intash Nalabe Kehro Bara Shaud

(Ai Karbala Karbala Ai Karbala) X2

tracks.title: Awo Akber Awo
tracks.lyrics:
_

Awo Akber Awo

_



(Awo Akber Awo, Mere Akber Awo) X2

  1. Madar Ke Gale Lagjawo

(Awo Akber Awo, Mere Akber Awo) X2

  2. Ay Laal Zaraa Ankhe Kholo (Maa Tumse Fida Kuch To Bolo) X2

Yu Maa Ko Nahi Tarpawo

(Awo Akber Awo, Mere Akber Awo) X2

  3. Socha Tha Dulhan Mai Lawoongi (Poshak Nayi Banwawoongi) X2

Aajawo Sehra Bandhawo

(Awo Akber Awo, Mere Akber Awo) X2

  4. Arman Me Pura Karna Saki (Tum Jee Na Sake Mai Marna Saki) X2

Is Dil Ki Duwa Layjawo

(Awo Akber Awo, Mere Akber Awo) X2

  5. Sughra Ne Likha Khat Me Rokar (Kya Bhool Gaye Wadaa Akber) X2

Sughra Ka Wadaa Nibhawo

(Awo Akber Awo, Mere Akber Awo) X2

  6. Maa Banke Tuje Paalaa Jisne (Wo Laash Teri Kayse Dekhe) X2

Zainab Ko Nahi Tarpawo

(Awo Akber Awo, Mere Akber Awo) X2

  7. Dil Mera Huwa Pamaal Suno (Kuch Apni Maa Ka Haal Suno) X2

Kuch Apna Haal Sunawo

(Awo Akber Awo, Mere Akber Awo) X2

  8. Kehti Hai Sakina Roro Kar (Kyu Ruth Gaye Bhaya Akber) X2

Na Aur Use Rulwawo

(Awo Akber Awo, Mere Akber Awo) X2

  9. Bete Jo Jawaan Hojate Hai (Maa Baap Ke Gham Mit Jaate Hai) X2

O Mere Dard Bataawo

(Awo Akber Awo, Mere Akber Awo) X2

  10. Madar Ke Gale Lagjawo

(Awo Akber Awo, Mere Akber Awo) X2

tracks.title: Ay Zuljana Ay Zuljana
tracks.lyrics:
_

Ay Zuljana Ay Zuljana

 _

Rahawari Ke Sumo Se Lipat Kar. Karti Thi Bain Bali Sakina.

(Ay Zuljana Ay Zuljana)X2

Ran Me Na Baba Ko Lay Ke Jaa

  1. Kya Tuje Maloom Nahi Dasht Hai Kaisa Jo Bhi Gaya Hai Wo Palat Kar Nahi Aya

Ab Man Le Kehna Baba Kona Layja

Kehti Hai Sakina

(Ay Zuljana Ay Zuljana)X2

  2. Meine Watan Tashna Dahan Or Ye Mazalim Aise Bure Wakt Me Tujpe He Ye Lazim

Ab Man Le Kehna Baba Kona Layja

Kehti Hai Sakina

(Ay Zuljana Ay Zuljana)X2

  3. Ek Kadam Tune Barhaya Jo Yahan Se Bali Sakina Bhi Guzar Jayengi Jaa Se Ab Man Le Kehna Baba Kona Layja

Kehti Hai Sakina

(Ay Zuljana Ay Zuljana)X2

  4. Dekh Tere Peiro Se Lipti Hai Sakina Dur Agar Mujse Huwe Shah E Madina

Ab Man Le Kehna Baba Kona Layja

Kehti Hai Sakina

(Ay Zuljana Ay Zuljana)X2

  5. Kitne Naye Zakhm Muje Denge Sitamgaar Baap Ka Saya Jo Utha Aspe Wafa Dar

Ab Man Le Kehna Baba Kona Layja Kehti Hai Sakina

(Ay Zuljana Ay Zuljana)X2

  6. Dekh Zara Koyi Mere Paas Nahi Hai Tujko Yatimi Ka Bhi Ehsas Nahi Hai.

Ab Man Le Kehna Baba Kona Layja

Kehti Hai Sakina

(Ay Zuljana Ay Zuljana)X2

  7. Muj Se Bichar Jayenga Jab Baap Ka Sina Khakh Pe Soyengi Bhala Kaise Sakina

Ab Man Le Kehna Baba Kona Layja

Kehti Hai Sakina

(Ay Zuljana Ay Zuljana)X2

  8. Darde Judayi Bhi Sahan Tashna Labi Bhi Mai Tera Ehsan Na Bhoolungi Khabhi Bhi

Ab Man Le Kehna Baba Kona Layja

Kehti Hai Sakina

(Ay Zuljana Ay Zuljana)X2

  9. Mai Mera Tan Tashna Dahan Aur Ye Mazalim. Aise Bure Wakht Me Tujpe Hai Ye Lazim

Ab Man Le Kehna Baba Kona Layja

Kehti Hai Sakina

(Ay Zuljana Ay Zuljana)X2

  10. Ek Kadam Tune Barhaya Jo Yahan Se Bali Sakina Bhi Guzar Jayengi Jaa Se

Ab Man Le Kehna Baba Kona Layja

Kehti Hai Sakina

(Ay Zuljana Ay Zuljanah) X2

tracks.title: Aa Mere Asghar
tracks.lyrics:
(Aa Mere Asghar) X6

Jula Julawu Lori Sunawu (Aa Mere Asghar)X3

  1. (Teri Judai Maar Gayi Hai Maa Ki Umide Tute Gayi Hai)X2

Maaki Umide Tut Gayi Hai

Tujko Jo Pawu Dil Se Lagawu

Aa Mere Asghar…

  2. (Kaise Sahu Ye Zakhme Judayi Teer Se Tune Pyaas Bujayi)X2

Teer Se Tune Pyaas Bujayi

Ashk Pilawu Pyaas Bujawu

Aa Mere Asghar…

  3. (Milbhi Gaya Agar Pani Meri Jaan Kaise Piyengi Bali Sakina)X2

Kaise Piyengi Bali Sakina

Pani Jo Pawu Tujko Pilawu

Aa Mere Asghar…

  4. (Tuhi Bata Ay Mere Gule Tar Dhund Kaha Ye Madare Muztar)X2

Dhund Kaha Ye Madare Muztar

Maidan Me Awu Darya Pe Jawu

Aa Mere Asghar…

  5. (Koi Kushi Ab Raas Nahi Hai Lakhte Jigar Jo Paas Nahi Hai)X2

Lakhte Jigar Jo Paas Nahi Hai

Paas Bulawu Neer Bahawu

Aa Mere Asghar

  6. (Saye Me Kaise Jayengi Madar Teri Lahad Hai Dhup Me Asghar)X2

Teri Lahad Hai Dhup Me Asghar

Saye Me Jawu Mai Marna Jawu

Aa Mere Asghar…

  7. (Koi Kushi Ka Din Bhi Na Aya Laal Mere Tu Khun Me Nahaya) X2

Laal Mere Tu Khun Me Nahaya

Khaima Sajawu Mannat Barawu

Aa Mere Asghar…

tracks.title: Alamdar
tracks.lyrics:
Alamdar Hai Alamdar X3



Roti Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Pyasi Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Kaidi Hai Zainab
(Hai Alamdar)

Alamdar Hai Alamdar X3



Shaam Chali Teri Behan Be Rida (Alamdar)

Kafela Salar Hai Zainul Iba (Alamdar)



Chor Ke Maktal Me Tuje Be Kafan Jati Hu Bazar Mere Ba Wafa

Roti Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Jati Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Kaidi Hai Zainab
(Hai Alamdar)



  1. Kaid Huwi Dekh Nabi Zadiya (Alamdar)

Bazu-O-Mai Bandhi Gayi Resuma (Alamdar)

Dekh Le Zainab Ki Zara Bakasi. Koi Nahi Koi Nahi Paas Baa

Roti Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Pyasi Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Kaidi Hai Zainab
(Hai Alamdar)



  2. Dard Hai Tanhaiyi Hai Faryad Bhi.(Alamdar)

Hashre Bapa Hai Dile Nashad Bhi (Alamdar)

Leke Chale Hai Ye Sitaam Gar Muje Alvida-Ye- Bhayi Teri Yaad Mai.

Roti Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Pyasi Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Kaidi Hai Zainab
(Hai Alamdar)



  3. Yaad Teri Ayengi Har Gaam Par. (Alamdar)

Kalb Ko Tarpayengi Har Gaam Par (Alamdar).

Tuj Se Juda Hoke Ye Teri Behan. Kehte Huwe Jayengi Har Gaam Par.

Roti Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Pyasi Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Kaidi Hai Zainab
(Hai Alamdar)



  4. Dard Se Lachar Behan Kya Kare (Alamdar)

Mere Alamdar Behan Kya Kare (Alamdar)

Koi Nahi Aaj Mera Dashte Mai Gham Me Giraftar Behan Kya Kare

Roti Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Pyasi Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Kaidi Hai Zainab
(Hai Alamdar)



  5. Dil Pe Har Ek Zakhmo Ko Sehte Huwe (Alamdar)

Shaam Talak Jayengi Rote Huwe (Alamdar)

Teri Judaai Me Mere Ba Wafa Aaj Sare Dasht Ye Kehte Huwe

Roti Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Pyasi Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Kaidi Hai Zainab
(Hai Alamdar)



  6. Baad Tere Dasht Mai Chadar Chini (Alamdar)

Nawha Khuna Mujpe Huwi Bekasi (Alamdar)

Tere Bina Kaise Bhala Jayengi Shaam Ke Darbar Mai Binte Ali.

Roti Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Pyasi Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Kaidi Hai Zainab
(Hai Alamdar)



  7. Loot Pari Aisi Ke Sab Loot Gaya (Alamdar)

Gar Tere Jane Ke Sabab Loot Gaya (Alamdar)

Wo Jo Bhara Gar Tha Tere Samne Aake Zara Dekh Wo Ab Loot Gaya

Roti Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Pyasi Hai Zainab (Hai Alamdar) Kaidi Hai Zainab
(Hai Alamdar)

tracks.title: Hal Min Nasurin
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Fatema Zahra) X4

Hal Min Nasireen, Yansurna

Tanha Sare Dashte Bala Darsaf-E- Adaa

Farzande Nabi, Jaano Dile Fatema Zehra

(Ya Fatema Zahra) X4

  1. Malike Arzo Samaa, Dilbare Shehre Khudaa, (Darsaf-E- Fawje Jafaa) X2 Asr Ashoor Kaha Saniye Zehra Ne Mera Bhayi Laeeno Me Gira Wawaila, Haye Sehroz Ka Pyaasa Wo Muhammed Ka Nawasa Jo Chalaa Marne Suwe Dast-E-Bala Suwe Dil Ne Kiya Nawha

Tanha Sare Dashte Bala Darsafe Adaa Farzande Nabi, Jaano Dile Fatema Zehra (Ya
Fatema Zehra) X3

  2. Hamil-E-Saif-O-Alam Janib-E-Mulke Adam (Ee Sitam Haiye Sitam) X2 Mere Allah Udhar Bhayi Akela Hai Idher, Abid-E-Mustar Ke Siwa Koyi Nahi. Hogaye Katl Alamdaar-E- Sina, Sina-E-Akber Mei Lagi Aun-O-Muhammed Bhi Gaye Wakht Paraa Kaisaa

Tanha Sare Dashte Bala Darsafe Adaa Farzande Nabi, Jaano Dile Fatema Zehra (Ya
Fatema Zehra) X3

  3. Rakib-E-Dosh-E-Nabi Rahat-E-Maula Ali (Nargha-E-Fowj-E-Shaki) X2 Ankh Roti Hai Zuban Kerti Hai Faryaad Ke Dunyaa Me Barader Ke Binaa Kiyaa Jinaa, Chakiya Pis Ke Amaa Ne Jise Nazo Se Palaa Thaa Use Nana Ke Umaat Ne Sataa Ya Hai Lab-E-Daryaa.

Tanha Sare Dashte Bala Darsafe Adaa Farzande Nabi, Jaano Dile Fatema Zehra (Ya
Fatema Zehra) X3

  4. Karbela Giryaa Shawan Dharalam Maula Sanad (Dhamadham Nauha Kunaa) X2 Karbala Roti Rahi Roti Rahi Mei Bhi Ye Saadaat Sabhi Zer-E-Aalam Is Gam Mei, Aaj Shabbir Pe Kiya Alam-E-Tanhayi He Hamraaha Na Beta Na Koyi Bhayi Hai Rota Hai Nabi Zaadaa

Tanha Sare Dashte Bala Darsafe Adaa Farzande Nabi, Jaano Dil-E- Fatema Zehra

  5. Al Madad Rab-E-Awlaa, Al Madad Shehre Khudaa, (Al Madad Ya Zahra) X2 Mere Bhayi Ko Sare Dasht Chamakti Huwi Talwaaro Se Nezo Se Bachalo Ama, Kon Imadaad Kare Koyi Nahi Koyi Nahi Koyi Nahi, Me Hu Ye Tanhayi Lasho Se Bharaa Sehra

Tanha Sare Dashte Bala Darsafe Adaa Farzande Nabi, Jaano Dile Fatema Zehra (Ya
Fatema Zehra) X3

  6. Barsare Karbobala, Baniye Farshe Azaa, (Mara Begirye Khuda) X2 Raas Ayi Na Muje Karbobala Chuta Watan Pyasi Rahi Aur Mera Gar Ujra Waqt Ne Lut Liya Dil Ka Sukoon Chin Liye Mujse Sitam Ghaaro Ne Sab Laalo Gohar Ab Ye Sitam Taazaa

Tanha Sare Dashte Bala Darsafe Adaa Farzande Nabi, Jaano Dile Fatema Zehra (Ya
Fatema Zehra) X3

  7. Qasime Tashnadaha, Jaani Be Khuld Rawa, (Ye Haram Nalaa Kunaa) X2 Raaj Kartithi Madine Me Yahaa Karti Hu Me Naala-O Faryad Koyi Sunta Nahi, Hogaya Dasht Me Pamaale Jafaa Ibne Hasan Aur Mera Asghar-E Besheer Bhi Dunyaa Se Gayaa Pyasaa

Tanha Sare Dashte Bala Darsafe Adaa Farzande Nabi, Jaano Dile Fatema Zehra (Ya
Fatema Zehra) X3

  8. Zainab-E-Khastaa Jigar, Hi Sitam Peshe Nazar (Bekhataa Khaak Basar) X2 Me Yaha Ret Ke Tile Pe Tarap Ti Hu Wahaa Khayme Me Saadaat Bukaa Karte Hai Aayiye Pehre Madad Shehre Khudaa Shahe Najaf Shahe Arab Shahe Umum Pehle Na Hojaye Pisar Pyasaa

Tanha Sare Dashte Bala Darsafe Adaa Farzande Nabi, Jaano Dile Fatema Zehra (Ya
Fatema Zehra) X3

  9. Hai Jari Peshe Khuda, Hi Duwa Subh Ho Masaa, (Behre Man Khuld Ataa) X2 Aaj Tak Sirf Isi Baat Pe Karte Hai Bukaa Mazharo Irfaan Hussaini Saare Haaye Afsos Buka Karti Rahi Zainabe Dilgir Chali Bhayi Pe Shamsheer Fazaawo Me Raha Nawha

Tanha Sare Dashte Bala Darsafe Adaa Farzande Nabi, Jaano Dile Fatema Zehra (Ya
Fatema Zehra) X3

  10. Udhar Shabbir Ki, Gardan Pe, Chalgayaa Khanjar, Idhar Zainab Ke Labo Par, Sadaa Rehgayi Mazhar,

tracks.title: Piyason Ki Aas
tracks.lyrics:
Asman Dekh Raha Tha, Sakka Koyi Faraat Pe Aye Tha Tashnalab, Mashkiza Bhar Ke
Jaanibe Khayma Chala Wo Jab, Barse Wo Teer Chidgayi Mashk-E-Sakina Jab, Roya
Alam Faraat Wafa Mashk Aur Sab. Gunji Maktal Mei Shah-E-Deen Ki Sada

(Qatl Darya Pe Alamdar Huwa) X2 Aur Pyaaso Ki Ye Aas Tut Gayi, Aya Maktal Se
Alam Khun Me Bhara

(Aur Pyaaso Ki Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2 Qatl Darya Pe Alamdar Huwa (Aur Pyaaso Ki
Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2

  1. (Din Dhala Sham-E-Ghariban Ke Andhere Chaaye) X2 Bas Sakina Ne Yahi Roke Kaha

(Aur Pyaaso Ki Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2 Qatl Darya Pe Alamdar Huwa (Aur Pyaaso Ki
Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2

  2. (Ab Mere Sar Se Ridaa Jayengi Zainab Ne Kaha) X2 Rodiye Sar Ke Shah-E-Karbobala

(Aur Pyaaso Ki Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2 Qatl Darya Pe Alamdar Huwa (Aur Pyaaso Ki
Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2

  3. (Tere Ammu To Teri Pyaas Pe Kurbaan Huwe) X2 Sheh Ne Ye Bali Sakina Se Kaha

(Aur Pyaaso Ki Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2 Qatl Darya Pe Alamdar Huwa (Aur Pyaaso Ki
Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2

  4. (Haath Mei Sukhe Huwe Kuze Liye Bethe The) X2 Marsiya Pyaas Ka Maula Se Suna

(Aur Pyaaso Ki Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2 Qatl Darya Pe Alamdar Huwa (Aur Pyaaso Ki
Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2

  5. (Khun-E-Abbas Jo Parcham Se Tapakte Dekha) X2 Dukhtar-E-Shah Ka Dil Dub Gaya

(Aur Pyaaso Ki Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2 Qatl Darya Pe Alamdar Huwa (Aur Pyaaso Ki
Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2

  6. (Roke Kulsum Se Fizza Ne Kaha Shehzadi) X2 Teri Chadar Ka Muhafiz Bhi Gaya
  7. (Dono Haatho Se Kamar Thame Huwe Sheh Ne Kaha) X2 Bujh Gaya Meri Ummido Ka Diyya

(Aur Pyaaso Ki Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2 Qatl Darya Pe Alamdar Huwa (Aur Pyaaso Ki
Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2

  8. (Alatash Kehke Jo Rote The Wo Khamosh Huwe) X2 Jaaye Mahaar Be Matam Ki Fazaa

(Aur Pyaaso Ki Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2 Qatl Darya Pe Alamdar Huwa (Aur Pyaaso Ki
Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2

  9. (Roye Sadat To Daryaa Ka Kanara Roya) X2 Zindagi Royi Kahi(N) Royi Kazaa

(Aur Pyaaso Ki Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2 Qatl Darya Pe Alamdar Huwa (Aur Pyaaso Ki
Ye Aas Tut Gayi) X2

tracks.title: Mei Panjo Pe
tracks.lyrics:
Zindan Ki Tarikiyoo Mei, Apne Sine Se Lagaaye Huwe Shabbir Ka Sar. Sakina
Kehti Thi, Baba, Baba, Suno Mera Safar

Are (Sab Ke The Shaane Bandhe, Mera Bandha Tha Ghala) X2

(Mei Panjo Pe Chalti Rahi Baba) X3

  1. Aap Se Kaise Kahu, Kaise Kata Wo Safar, Aal-E-Payambar Chali Rote Huwe Nange Sar (Aap Chale Neze Par, Kanto Pe Bhayi Chala) X2

(Mei Panjo Pe Chalti Rahi Baba) X3

  2. Mere Phuphi Raah Me Ashk Bahati Rahi, Zulm Rulaate Rahe Dhoop Jalaati Rahi (Zakhm Mere Pawo Ka Dhoop Se Jalta Raha) X2

(Mei Panjo Pe Chalti Rahi Baba) X3

  3. Mazi Ke Kuch Waakayey Yaad Jo Aye Muje, Sine Pe Kaise Muje Aap Sulaate Rahe (Yaado Mei Yu Kho Gayi Bhul Gayi Har Jafaa) X2

(Mei Panjo Pe Chalti Rahi Baba) X3

  4. Sabr Ka Daman Mere Haath Se Chuta Nahi, Neze Se Kya Aapne Baba Ye Dekha Nahi (Kichti Rahi Reesima Chalta Raha Kafla) X2

(Mei Panjo Pe Chalti Rahi Baba) X3

  5. Ankh Barasne Lage Kalb Huwa Nawha Ghar, Aya Nazar Jab Muje Neze Pe Asghar Ka Sar (Roti Rahi Mei Use Wo Muje Rota Raha) X2

(Mei Panjo Pe Chalti Rahi Baba) X3

  6. Tumko Kafan Dediya Reyt Kei Tufaan Nei, Baalo Se Parda Kiya Meri Phuphi Jaan Ne (Aur Mere Dard Ka Koi Madaawa Na Tha) X2

(Mei Panjo Pe Chalti Rahi Baba) X3

  7. Raah Me Ammu Ko Jab Dekha To Maine Kaha, Kholdo Meri Rasan God Mei Leylo Chacha (Dekhke Rote Rahe Meri Aseeri Chacha) X2

(Mei Panjo Pe Chalti Rahi Baba) X3

  8. Chen Mayassar Muje Aa Na Saka Aik Pal, Zakhmi Gala Hogaya Aur Mere Pawu Shal (Raat Safar Mei Kati Din Bhi Safar Mei Kataa) X2
  9. Baba Madine Ke Wo Din Bhi Muje Yaad Hai, Sabz Amari Mei Jab Beyt Ke Jaati Thi Mei (Aaj Zara Dekhiye, Kaise Safar Teykiya) X2

(Mei Panjo Pe Chalti Rahi Baba) X3

  10. Ek Rasan Mei Bandhe Chothe Baro Ke Ghale, Lasho Pe Rote Huwe Karbobala Se Chale (Haal Mera Dekh Ke Rone Lagi Karbala) X2

(Mei Panjo Pe Chalti Rahi Baba) X3

tracks.title: Qafla Hussain Ka
tracks.lyrics:
Ek Shab Hazrat-E-Shireen Ne Khwab Kya Dekha, Sarhaane Eik Zaeefa Ye Kar Rahi
Hai Bukaa, Mere Hussain Ne Kal Tujse Kiya Tha Wada, Mei Tere Ghar Kabhi
Aawunga, Aagaya, Uth Jaa.

Jaag Shireen, Jaag Ja, Ay Kaniz-E-Bawafa, Aa Raha Hai Ghar Tere (Qafla Hussain
Ka) X4

  1. Haay, Mere Bache Ko Sitamgharo Ne Tarpaya Hai, Dasht Mei Ghair Liya Paani Ko Tarsaya Hai, Haaye Is Zulmo Masaaib Mei Use Yaad Raha, Apna Wada Wo Nibhane Ke Liye Aya Hai

Jaag Shireen, Jaag Ja, Ay Kaniz-E-Bawafa, Aa Raha Hai Ghar Tere (Qafla Hussain
Ka) X4

  2. Haay, Kya Khabar Tujko Mere Gar Ko Ujaara Haay Haay, Kistarha Se Mere Shabbir Ko Mara Haay Haay, Neza Akbar Ke Kaleje Mei Utara Haay Haay, Phir Bhi Bhulaa Na Tere Wade Ko Pyaasa Haay Haay

Jaag Shireen, Jaag Ja, Ay Kaniz-E-Bawafa, Aa Raha Hai Ghar Tere (Qafla Hussain
Ka) X4

  3. Haay, Pani Lene Ko Gaya Nehr Pe Abbas Mera, Chid Gayi Mashk Kate Haath Alam Thanda Huwa, Mere Bache Ki Kamar Toot Gayi Phirbhi Use, Naam Allah Ka Aur Wada Har Ek Yaad Raha

Jaag Shireen, Jaag Ja, Ay Kaniz-E-Bawafa, Aa Raha Hai Ghar Tere (Qafla Hussain
Ka) X4

  4. Haay, Mere Besheer Ko Pani Ke Ye Baz Teer Mila, Uske Bachpan Ko Jawaani Ke Ye Baz Teer Mila, Har Sitam Sehke Tere Ghar Ki Taraf Aata Hai, Jisko Ummat Se Nishani Ki Ye Baz Teer Mila

Jaag Shireen, Jaag Ja, Ay Kaniz-E-Bawafa, Aa Raha Hai Ghar Tere (Qafla Hussain
Ka) X4

  5. Haay, Zakhm Itne Hai Kaleje Ka Bura Haal Huwa, Dasht Mei Ibn-E-Hassan Ghoro Se Pamal Huwa, Khun Se Dasht-E-Bala Laal Huwa Aur Darya, Ye Sitam Sehke Mera Laal Tere Ghar Ko Chala

Jaag Shireen, Jaag Ja, Ay Kaniz-E-Bawafa, Aa Raha Hai Ghar Tere (Qafla Hussain
Ka) X4

  6. Haay, Do Pisar Zainab-E-Dilgeer Ke Kurban Huwe, Haye Bin Pani Ke Wo Phul Bhi Bejaan Huwe, Sare Paiman Wafaa Pure Huwe Maktal Mei, Ab Tere Aka Tere Shehr Mei Mehmaan Huwe

Jaag Shireen, Jaag Ja, Ay Kaniz-E-Bawafa, Aa Raha Hai Ghar Tere (Qafla Hussain
Ka) X4

  7. Haay, Gyaarwi Subho Haram Chor Chale Dasht-E-Kitaal, Reyt Lasho Ka Kafan Chehr Ka Parda Huwe Baal, Sar Shaheedo Ke Sar-E-Noke Sina Qayd Haram, Is Gharibi Mei Raha Unko Magar Tera Khayaal

Jaag Shireen, Jaag Ja, Ay Kaniz-E-Bawafa, Aa Raha Hai Ghar Tere (Qafla Hussain
Ka) X4

  8. Haay, Ho Gayi Poori Tere Dil Ki Duwa Jaag Zara, Hai Yahi Teri Wafaao Ka Sila Jaag Zara, Ghar Ka Har Gosha Aza Khaana Banade Uthkar, Tera Aka Tera Mehman Huwa Jaag Zara

Jaag Shireen, Jaag Ja, Ay Kaniz-E-Bawafa, Aa Raha Hai Ghar Tere (Qafla Hussain
Ka) X4

tracks.title: Ghazi Paasa
tracks.lyrics:
Zainab Waey Jel Khanayna Raghla

(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2

Khud Raghla Jel Khanayna Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar

(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2

  1. (Ye Dekhe Mere In Shaano Par Hai Neel Rasan Ke Ghazi) X2 Faryad Kare Ye Behna, Haye Faryaad Kare Ye Behna, Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar

(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2 Khud Raghla Jel Khanayna Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar
(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2

  2. (Mei Teri Sakina Ko Ghazi, Zindaa Mei Chor Ke Ayi Hu) X2 Zakhmi Hai Ghamo Se Sina, Haye Zakhmi Hai Ghamo Se Sina, Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar

(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2 Khud Raghla Jel Khanayna Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar
(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2

  3. (Tu Hota Aghar Mere Ghazi Chinti Na Haram Ki Chadar) X2 Bechadar Hogayi Behna, Haaye Bechadar Hogayi Behna

Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar

(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2 Khud Raghla Jel Khanayna Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar
(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2

  4. (Kya Haal Huwa Bazaaro Mei, Bhayi Ne Sina Se Dekha) X2 Baalo Se Chupayya Chehra, Haaye Baalo Se Chupayya Chehra, Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar

(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2 Khud Raghla Jel Khanayna Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar
(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2

  5. (Tu Shehr-E-Khuda Ka Beta Mei Khatoon-E-Jina Ki Beti) X2 Kyu Bhul Gayi Ye Dunya, Haay Kyu Bhul Gayi Ye Dunya, Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar

(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2 Khud Raghla Jel Khanayna Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar
(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2

  6. (Mahol Sharabi Tha Ghazi, Kufe Me Gayi Jab Zainab) X2 Aur Aal-E-Nabi Be Parda, Haay Aur Aal-E-Nabi Be Parda, Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar

(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2 Khud Raghla Jel Khanayna Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar
(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2

  7. (Mei Awno-Muhammad Ki Lasho Par Royi Nahi Hu Ghazi) X2 De Unka Muje Tu Pursa, Haay De Unka Muje Tu Pursa, Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar

(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2 Khud Raghla Jel Khanayna Zera Ayliyam Ghamkhwar
(Ghazi Passa Kinarehna) X2

tracks.title: Shezada-E-Hassan
tracks.lyrics:
(Shezada-E-Hassan Shezada-E-Hussain)X3

(Janaat Ke Do Shezade Zehra Ke Dil Ke Chen)X2

  1. Ik Shahazada-E-Sabzkaba (Ummat Ne Jisko Zahr Diya)X2

Ik Shezade Per Teg Chali Roti He Jisko Kerbobala

(Janaat Ke Do Shezade Zehra Ke Dil Ke Chen)X2

  2. Tabut Ko Ik Shezade Ke (Tiro Ne Sajaya Wawaila)X2

Ik Shezade Ke Laashe Ko Tiro Ne Uthaya Wawaila

(Janaat Ke Do Shezade Zehra Ke Dil Ke Chen)X2

  3. Jo Teer Janeze Per Aye (Wo Teer Chale The Khaiber Se)X2

Paiwast Huwe Jab Lasho Me Wo Teer Bikhar Te The Nale

(Janaat Ke Do Shezade Zehra Ke Dil Ke Chen)X2

  4. Janaat Se Inhey Shezado Ke (Malboos Khuda Ne Bheje The)X2

Nam Pake Muhammed Ke Jinke Un Shezado Per Zulm Huwe

(Janaat Ke Do Shezade Zehra Ke Dil Ke Chen)X2

  5. Yasrab Me Rahen Ya Karbel Me (Ansu Na Kahi Rukh Ne Paye)X2

Ye Soch Ke Akser Rota Hu Ye Log Zamin Pe Kyu Ayen

(Janaat Ke Do Shezade Zehra Ke Dil Ke Chen)X2

  6. Kya Khub Bapa Ho Ka Badla (Dono Ko Diya Is Dunya Ne)X2

Be Dard Zamene Se Laikin Kaarte Hi Rahe Ta Umr Wafa

(Janaat Ke Do Shezade Zehra Ke Dil Ke Chen)X2

  7. Farman-E-Ali Ye Shehre Khuda Beto Ne Sahe Kya Rang Aur Mahan

Ik Shezada Ko Zehr Mila Ik Shezada Mehroom-E-Kafan

(Janaat Ke Do Shezade Zehra Ke Dil Ke Chen)X2

  8. In Shezado Ko Zehra Ne Kal Chaki Pis Ke Pala Thaa

Ye Shezade Jab Katl Huwe Kar Te The Paygamber Bhi Noha

(Janaat Ke Do Shezade Zehra Ke Dil Ke Chen)X2

  9. En Shezado Ke Julo Ko Jibril Julaya Ker Te The

Lasho Pe Inhi Shehzado Ke Ye Keh Ke Farishte Rote The

(Janaat Ke Do Shezade Zehra Ke Dil Ke Chen)X2

tracks.title: Jula To Nazar Ayenga
tracks.lyrics:
Jula Na Julawo Are Rona Hai Muqaddar Ab Ayenga Na Wo, Julne Walaa, Aay Madar-
E-Asgar

(Na Milengaa Na Milengaa) X2

(Jula To Nazar Ayenga, Asghar Na Milengaa) X2

  1. Ab Saari Khudayi Mei Asghar Naa Milenga

(Jula To Nazar Ayenga, Asghar Na Milengaa) X2

  2. Ab Julaa Julaane Ko Taras Jayengi Bahe(N), Khayme Mei Kabhi Dasht Me Dhundengi Nigahe

(Thak Jayengi Ye Ankhe) X2 Asghar Na Milengaa

(Jula To Nazar Ayenga, Asghar Na Milengaa) X2

  3. Ye Soch Ke Rotaa Hai Mera Dil Bhi Tarap Kar, Us Waqt Tere Qalb Pe Kiyaa Guzrengi Muztar

(Jab Raato(N) Ko Pehlu Mei) X2 Asghar Naa Milengaa

(Jula To Nazar Ayenga, Asghar Na Milengaa) X2

  4. Kya Waqt-E-Musibat Hai Zaraa Dekh Ay Dukhiyaa, Kal Jhule Mei Beshir Tha Aur Pani Nahi Tha

(Mil Jayengaa Jab Pani) X2 (Asghar Na Milengaa)X2

(Jula To Nazar Ayenga, Asghar Na Milengaa) X2

  5. Saaye Me Na Jawungi Tu Ghar Lawt Ke Ajaa, Har Waqt Tere Hoto(N) Per Hongaa Yahi Noha

(Bin Tere Suku(N) Maa Ko) X2 Asghar Na Milengaa

(Jula To Nazar Ayenga, Asghar Na Milengaa) X2

  6. Dhayenge Layee(N) Ham Per Abhi Aur Qayamat, Dhundenge Shaki Dasht Me Beshir Ki Turbat

(Shuhadaa Ke Saro Me Jab) X2 Asghar Na Milengaa

(Jula To Nazar Ayenga, Asghar Na Milengaa) X2

  7. Are Bin Pani Ke Dunya Se Sidhra Mera Asghar, Jab Ayenga Pani To Meri Pyaarisi Dukhtar

(Dhundengi Use Ban Me) X2 Asghar Na Milengaa

(Jula To Nazar Ayenga, Asghar Na Milengaa) X2

  8. Zinda(N) Se Riha Ho Ker Jab Jawonge Tum Ghar, Har God Me Dhundengi Bohat Royengi Muztar

(Jab Fatema Sughra Ko) X2 Asghar Na Milengaa

(Jula To Nazar Ayenga, Asghar Na Milengaa) X2

  9. Hatho Me Uthawongi Jab Pani Ka Kuza, Pani Me Nazar Ayengaa Besheer Kaa Chehra

(Bas Aas Nazar Ayengaa) X2 Asghar Naa Milengaa

(Jula To Nazar Ayenga, Asghar Na Milengaa) X2

  10. Yaad Ayenga Reh Reh Kar Jo Asghar Ka Huwakla, Aur Shok Shahadat Me Wo Jhule Me Machal Na

(Tum Dil Ko Mana Lena) X2 Asghar Na Milengaa

(Jula To Nazar Ayenga, Asghar Na Milengaa) X2

  11. Asghar Ke Shaluke Jab Nazar Ayenge Ghar Me, Ik Dard Se Us Waqt Bhi Uthenga Jigar Me

(Sab Honge Waha Leykin) X2 Asghar Na Milengaa

(Jula To Nazar Ayenga, Asghar Na Milengaa) X2

  12. Ab Saari Khudayi Mei Asghar Naa Milenga

(Jula To Nazar Ayenga, Asghar Na Milengaa) X2

tracks.title: Amman Achee Amman
tracks.lyrics:
Akhri Azan To Sunli, Amaa Achi Meri Amaa

Sine Se Lagalo Marne Ki Riza Do (Amma Achi Meri Amma) X2

  1. Ay Amma Phuphi Jaan Ke Do Laal Sidhare Darya Ka Kanare Tum Apne Jawan Laal Ko Shabbir Pe Waro Amma Achi Meri Amma

Sine Se Lagalo Marne Ki Riza Do (Amma Achi Meri Amma)X2

  2. Sehra Tera Bete Ke Muqadar Me Nahi Tha Ab Wakht Ye Aya Poshak -E-Shahani Ko Kafan Mera Banalo Amma Achi Meri Amma

Sine Se Lagalo Marne Ki Riza Do (Amma Achi Meri Amma)X2

  3. Wo Dekho Su-E-Dashte Bala Madar-E-Muztar Gere He Sitam Gar Kya Bap Ki Nusrat Na Karu Mujko Bata Do Amma Achi Meri Amma

Sine Se Lagalo Marne Ki Riza Do (Amma Achi Meri Amma)X2

  4. Mana Ke Nahi Bete Ki Furqat Koyi Aasan Pan Kya Karu Amma Yeh Sabre Ki Manzil Hai Zara Dil Ko Sambhala Lo Amma Achi Meri Amma

Sine Se Lagalo Marne Ki Riza Do (Amma Achi Meri Amma)X2

  5. Khuch Der Me Ye Laal Bhi Keh Layenga Lasha Hai Ek Tamana Bimar -E Madina Ko Madine Se Bula Lo Amma Achi Meri Amma

Sine Se Lagalo Marne Ki Riza Do (Amma Achi Meri Amma) X2

  6. Kya Tumko Gawara Hai Ke Zindaa Rahe Beta Aur Katl Ho Baba Me Is Liye Kehta Hu Na Jine Ki Saza Do Amma Achi Meri Amma

Sine Se Lagalo Marne Ki Riza Do (Amma Achi Meri Amma)X2

  7. Tarpongi Shab -O- Roz Meri Yaad De Me Har Dam Kerte Huwe Matam Ik Baar Muje Apne Kaleje Se Laga Lo Amma Achi Meri Amma

Sine Se Lagalo Marne Ki Riza Do (Amma Achi Meri Amma) X2

tracks.title: Shabbir Ka Zakir
tracks.lyrics:
Me Jahaa Bhi Gaya Tera Matam Kiyaa

Tera Nawha Parhaa

Tujko Pursaa Diya

(Pucha Duniya Ne Jab Mera Naam Or Nasab) X2

Fakhr Karte Huwe Mene Unse Kahaa

(Me Teen Shabo Roz Ke Pyaase Ka Hu Zakir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka
Zakir) X3

  1. Ha Uska Hu Zakir Ke Ali Jiska Tha Baba (Maa Fatema Zehra Thi Behen Zainabe Kubra) X2 Jo Log Muje Kehte Hai Kafir Hai Wo Kafir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka Zakir

(Me Teen Shabo Roz Ke Pyaase Ka Hu Zakir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka
Zakir) X3

  2. Ho Bus Me Agar Mere To Duniya Ko Bataadu (Har Gar Me Azaa Khana-E Shabbir Sajaa Du) X2 Hai Karbala Waalo Ke Liye Jaan Bhi Hazir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka Zakir

(Me Teen Shabo Roz Ke Pyaase Ka Hu Zakir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka
Zakir) X3

  3. Din Raat-E Dare Shah Pe Sajde Bhi Karunga (Jabtak Hai Meri Saas Yuhi Nawha Parunga) X2 Palaa Hai Mujhe Maa Ne Isi Kaam Ki Khatir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka Zakir

(Me Teen Shabo Roz Ke Pyaase Ka Hu Zakir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka
Zakir) X3

  4. Bachpan Me Mujhe Baap Ne Taalim Yahi Di (Har Saas Zamaanat Hai Hussain Ibne Ali Ki) X2 Hai Fikr Meri Shaam Ke Rasto Ke Musafir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka Zakir

(Me Teen Shabo Roz Ke Pyaase Ka Hu Zakir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka
Zakir) X3

  5. Rag Rag Me Lahu Banke Ghame Shah Rawaa Hai (Matam Se Koyi Rokle Mumkin Ye Kahaa Hai) X2 Tum Meri Zubaan Kaat Do Bolenga Lahu Phir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka Zakir

(Me Teen Shabo Roz Ke Pyaase Ka Hu Zakir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka
Zakir) X3

  6. Na Khof He Dushman Ka Na Duniya Ka Koyi Dar (Tufaano Se Takraata Hu Matam Ki Binaa Par) X2 Hai Baarwa Haider Hi Mera Haamiyo Naasir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka Zakir

(Me Teen Shabo Roz Ke Pyaase Ka Hu Zakir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka
Zakir) X3

  7. Fatwo Ki Hawaao Se Kabhi Me Nahi Darta (Jannat Ke Liye Majliso Matam Nahi Karta) X2 Jannat To Banaayi Khuda Ne Meri Khatir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka Zakir

(Me Teen Shabo Roz Ke Pyaase Ka Hu Zakir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka
Zakir) X3

  8. Aazayishe Duniya Ki Zaroorat Hi Nahi Hai (Ye Majlise Shabbir Hi Firdows Bari Hai) X2 Is Baat Pe Rehta Hu Shabo Roz-E Me Shakir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka Zakir

(Me Teen Shabo Roz Ke Pyaase Ka Hu Zakir, Shabbir Ka Zakir Hu Me Shabbir Ka
Zakir) X3

tracks.title: Allah Ka Zakir
tracks.lyrics:
Mujhe Bhool Jaaye Duniya, Me Agar Tujhe Bhuladu Ya Hussain

(Ya Hussain) X2

  1. Teeron Ki Musalleh Par Tune, Jo Sajda Kiya Koi Kar Na Sakaa

(Jis Khaak Pe Tera Khoon Bahaa) X2

Us Khaak Par Har Zayir Ne Kahaa

(Allah Ka Tu Zakir Hai) X2

Aur Tera Zaakir Me Hu Hussain

(Ya Hussain) X2

  2. Duniya Ye Bhulayegi Kaise, Bazaar Jafaa Me Jab Tune

(Quran Sunaya Naize Par) X2

Quran Mukhatib Tujse Huwa

(Allah Ka Tu Zakir Hai) X2

Aur Tera Zaakir Me Hu Hussain

(Ya Hussain) X2

  3. Chand Aur Sitaare Daame Falak, Rizwaane Jinaa Sab Huro Malak

(Sab Farsh Ke Sabke Aur Shajar) X2

Hai Sab Ke Labon Par Aik Sadaa

(Allah Ka Tu Zakir Hai) X2

Aur Tera Zaakir Me Hu Hussain

(Ya Hussain) X2

  4. Allah Ki Tune Laaj Rakhi, Tawheed Teri Makrooz Huwi,

(Allah Allah Ye Shaan Teri) X2

Phir Kyun Na Kahe Har Hamde Khuda

(Allah Ka Tu Zakir Hai) X2

Aur Tera Zaakir Me Hu Hussain

(Ya Hussain) X2

  5. Bartaa Tu Use Milti Na Ajar, Imdaad Teri Zahra Ke Pisar

(Mit Ta Tha Jahaan Se Deene Khuda) X2

Ab Kehta Rahega Deen Sadaa

(Allah Ka Tu Zakir Hai) X2

Aur Tera Zaakir Me Hu Hussain

(Ya Hussain) X2

  6. Tareekh Ke Boj Halhaatho Ne, Ye Baat Likhi Hai Rote Huwe

(Ay Shere Khuda Ke Laal Salaam) X2

Kehte Hai Tuje Khud Shere Khuda

(Allah Ka Tu Zakir Hai) X2

Aur Tera Zaakir Me Hu Hussain

(Ya Hussain) X2

  7. Wo Milta Ye Ghairat Binte Ali Jo Tere Sahaare Jeete Ti

(Jab Mehwe Tilawat Dekha Tuje) X2

Kehta Tha Dile Mehroome Ridaa

(Allah Ka Tu Zakir Hai) X2

Aur Tera Zaakir Me Hu Hussain

(Ya Hussain) X2

  8. Haaye Kushtae Teghe Zulmo Jafaa, Hai Tujsa Namaaze Kon Bhalaa

(Naize Se Aqaamat Tune Kahi) X2

Teeron Ke Muselleh Ne Ye Kahaa

(Allah Ka Tu Zakir Hai) X2

Aur Tera Zaakir Me Hu Hussain

(Ya Hussain) X2

  9. "Irfane" Nabi "Irfane" Khuda, Mujko To Azaa Khano Se Mila

(Ay "Mazhar" Yazdaan Ke Beche) X2

Sajde Me Yahi Mazhar Ne Kahaa

(Allah Ka Tu Zakir Hai) X2

Aur Tera Zaakir Me Hu Hussain

(Ya Hussain) X2

tracks.title: Aao Azadaro
tracks.lyrics:
(Abbas Alamdar) X3 Ab Tak Hai Zabano Pe Alamdar Alamdar (Abbas Alamdar) X3 Ay
Qafela-E-Shaah Ke Salar Alamdar (Abbas Alamdar) X3

  1. Eik Sada Kaano Mei Abhi Tak, Gunj Rahi Hai Logo Suno, Ye Hai Sada Khatoon-E-Jina Ki, Ham Bhi Kahe Aur Tum Bhi Kaho, (Kyu Na Kahe "Irfan" Aur "Mazhar") X2 Aao Dua Zehra Ki Paaye

(Aao Azadaro, Aao Alam Ghazi Ka Uthaaye) X2

  2. Ye Wo Alam Hai Jiska Pharayra Sani-E-Zehra Ki Chadar Hai, Ha Ye Alam Jis Ghar Pe Laga Ho, Saaya-E-Zehra Mei Wo Ghar Hai (Kya Hai Alam Kya Iski Ataa Hai) X2 Aao Zabane Kar Ko Bataaye

(Aao Azadaro, Aao Alam Ghazi Ka Uthaaye) X2

  3. Aao Zabane Kar Ko Bataaye, Ham Pe Abu Talib Ka Karam Hai, Paas Nahi Ayega Koi Gham, Saya Fighan Jab Tak Ye Alam Hai (Aao Alam Ke Saye Mei Aawo) X2 Ham Ka Har Ik Ehsaas Mitaaye

(Aao Azadaro, Aao Alam Ghazi Ka Uthaaye) X2

  4. Ham Ka Har Ik Ehsaas Mitaakar, Pyaar Kare Sarkar-E-Wafa Se, Pyaar Ke Badle Pyaar Milenga, Tumko Nabi Se Aur Khuda Se (Saath Chale Ham Kyu Dunya Ke) X2 Duniya To Apne Saath Chaalye

(Aao Azadaro, Aao Alam Ghazi Ka Uthaaye) X2

  5. Duniya Hamare Saath Chalengi Aur Qayadat Sheyr-E-Jari Ki, Sare Alam Juk Jaayenge Phir To, Baat Rahengi Eik Alam Ki (Khwaab Yahi Tha Bint-E-Ali Ka) X2 Kyu Na Isse Tabeer Banaaye

(Aao Azadaro, Aao Alam Ghazi Ka Uthaaye) X2

  6. Khwaab Ko Jab Tabeer Milengi, Qaul Ye Pura Honga Kisi Ka, Koi Kahenga Mera Hai Maula, Koi Kahenga Mera Hai Maula (Payenge Phir Har Ghar Se Yakeenan) X2 Nohey Ki Aur Matam Ki Sadaaye

(Aao Azadaro, Aao Alam Ghazi Ka Uthaaye) X2

  7. Nohey Ki Aur Matam Ki Sada Se, Gunj Raha Honga Ye Zamana, Saara Jahaa(N) Ye Baat Kahenga, Nad-E-Ali Hai Qaumi Tarana, (Qaumi Alam Aur Qaumi Parcham) X2 Dono Mei Hai Jo Far Ko Mitaaye

(Aao Azadaro, Aao Alam Ghazi Ka Uthaaye) X2

  8. Dono Mei Hai Jo Far Ko Mitaane, Kaise Chale The Sibt-E-Payambar, Chand Jawaa(N) Aur Kuch Bacho(N) Se Sheh Ne Diya Tarteeb Ke Lashkar (Aawo Ussi Lashkar Ki Yaade) X2 Saare Jahaa(N) Ke Dil Me Jagaaye

(Aao Azadaro, Aao Alam Ghazi Ka Uthaaye) X2

  9. Saare Jahaa(N) Ke Dil Me Jagaaye, Yaad Usi Ashoor Ki Shab Ki, Eik Alam Tha Aas Waha Par, Bali Sakina Aur Zainab Ki (Aas Bana Jo Ehl-E-Haram Ki) X2 Ham Bhi Ussi Se Aas Lagaaye

(Aao Azadaro, Aao Alam Ghazi Ka Uthaaye) X2

  10. Aas Gayi Farzand-E-Ali Ki, Jab Ye Alam Maqtal Mei Ghira Tha (Eik Taraf Shabbir Aur Zainab) X2 Eik Taraf Sadat Ka Nawha

Haay Qafela-E-Shaah Ke Salar Alamdar (Abbas Alamdar) X3

tracks.title: Bibi Fatema Zehra
tracks.lyrics:
Ya Fatema, Umme Abi Ha, Bint-E-Payambar, Khayrun-Nisaa, Ya Zehra, Ya Zehra

Tu Hai Siddiqa, Tu Tahira Aur Tuhi Shafi-E-Rawze Jazaa, Ay Meri Bibi, Waqt-E-
Madad Hai, Har Matami Ke Dil Ke Sadaa Hai

(Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai) X2 Aap Ke Darbar Mei Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai

  1. Dast-E-Dua Ko Jab Bhi Uthaaya, Manga Hai Teri Chadar Ka Saya, (Ya Zehra) X2 Waqt-E-Musibat Mei Har Hussaini Bas Naam Tera, Honto Pe Laaya, Ay Meri Bibi, Tang Dasht Hu Mei, Ye Kehke Daman Pheylaadiya Hai

(Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai) X2 Aap Ke Darbar Mei Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai

  2. Wo Bibi Jiski Hai Ghaud Khali, Chawkhat Pe Teri Hai Wo Sawaali (Ya Zehra) X2 Mujhko Bhi Dede Asghar Ka Sadqa Mene Tere Dar Se Lo Lagali, Ay Meri Bibi, Jin Godiyo Mei, Awlaad Hai Wo Teri Ata Hai

(Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai) X2 Aap Ke Darbar Mei Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai

  3. Jo Maaye Behne Be Aasra Ho Farsh-E-Aza Par Mehwe Bukaa Ho (Ya Zehra) X2 Tu Unke Pardo Ki Laaj Rakhiyo Jo Teri Zainab Ki Zakira Ho, Ay Meri Bibi, Zinda Rahe Wo, Bhaayi Jo Behno Ka Asra Hai

(Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai) X2 Aap Ke Darbar Mei Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai

  4. Jo Tifl Rokar Parte Hai Nawha, Har Aathwi Ko Bante Hai Saqqa (Ya Zehra) X2 Har Roshni Ki Hai Ye Zamaanat, Mei Har Charaagh-E-Bazm-E-Aza, Ay Meri Bibi, Bujhne Na Paya, Awn-O-Muhammad Ka Wasta Hai

(Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai) X2 Aap Ke Darbar Mei Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai

  5. Jo Apne Beto Ka Bhool Kar Gham, Karti Ho Tere, Akbar Ka Matam (Ya Zehra) X2 Un Maao Ko Tu, De Sabr Bibi Wo Phir Na Dekhe Awlaad Ka Gham, Ay Meri Bibi, Us Maa Ko Koi Gham Na Ho Jisko Ye Gham Mila Hai

(Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai) X2 Aap Ke Darbar Mei Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai

  6. Hai Yaad Abtak Purdard-E-Manzar Pyaase Ki Gardan, Zalim Ka Khanjar (Ya Zehra) X2 Hum Tere Pyaase Bete Ka Sadqa Yu(N) Mangte Hai Farsh-E-Aza Par, Ay Meri Bibi, Abad Rakhna Wo Ghar Ke Jisme Farsh-E-Aza Hai

(Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai) X2 Aap Ke Darbar Mei Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai

  7. Shabbir Ki Wo Mazloom Dukhtar, Zindaan Se Jo, Na Jaa Saki Ghar (Ya Zehra) X2 Sadqe Mei Uske, Ham Par Karam Kar, Bejurm-E-Qaydi Kehte Hai Rokar, Ay Meri Bibi, Ab Ye Aseeri Ho Khatm Abid Ka Wasta Hai

(Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai) X2 Aap Ke Darbar Mei Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai

  8. "Irfan-O-Mazhar" Ye Chahate Hai, Miljaaye Hamko Bas Ye Sa'adaat (Ya Zehra) X2 Jo Akhri Hai Hujjat Khuda Ki, Hojaaye Hamko Uski Ziyaraat, Ay Meri Bibi, Ye Baat Wo Hai, Jo Har Hussaini Ki Iltejaa Hai

(Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai) X2 Aap Ke Darbar Mei Bibi Zehra Ye Dua Hai

Aap Ke Darbar Mei, Kar Qubool Uftad

tracks.title: Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar
tracks.lyrics:
Noha Kare Maa Laashe Akbar Par, Aray Tum Qatl Huwe Beta, Jeeti Rahi Madar

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  1. Veeran Huwa Beta Tere Baad Mera Ghar

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  2. Kya Tujhko Teri Maa Ne Is Din Ke Liye Paalaa,

Is Maa Ko Zaeefi Me Kyu Chor Gaye Beta

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  3. Maa Roti Hai Laashe Pe Tere Aaj Khule Sar

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  4. Kehti Thi Phuphi Zainab Jab Pyaha Rachaugi

Akbar Teri Dulhan Ki Poshak Banaugi

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  5. Afsos Kafan Bhi Na Tujhe Aya Mayassar

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  6. Bimar Behen Sughra Tapti Hai Tera Rasta

Pardes Me Akar Kyu Bhool Gaye Wada

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  7. Itna Bhi Nahi Socha Ke Marjayegi Khwahar

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  8. Hamshakle Nabi Tumko Kehta Ta Jahaan Saraa

Zainab Tere Laashe Par Karti Hai Yahi Nawha

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  9. Nana Ki Ziyarat Ko Tarasjaungi Dilbar

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  10. Har Dil Ne Kiya Nawha Har Aankh Huwi Purnam

Kohram Hai Khaymo Me Janat Me Bapa Matam

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  11. Aur Khaak Urha Te Hai Yahi Kehke Payambar

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  12. Phupiyan Bhi Tarap Ti Hai Hamsheer Bhi Madar Bhi

Dada Bhi Tere Roye Shabbir Bhi Shabbar Bhi

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  13. Sadaat Ke Khaymon Me Qayamat Ka Hai Manzar

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  14. Jab Koyi Jawaan Laash Nazar Ayegi Beta

Wa Yaar Tujhe Karke Tarap Jayegi Beta

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

  15. Ek Roz Teri Yaad Me Marjayegi Madar

(Ay Mere Jawaan Akbar) X2

tracks.title: Na Dais Apna Hey
tracks.lyrics:
Karbala Se Chali Eik Bekas Behen. Bhaayi Se Aalam-E-Gurbat Watan Yaad Aya. Sab
Shaheedo Ko Kehti Huwi Alvida. Bhaayi Ki Laash Pe Pohnchi To Kafan Yaad Aya.
Khud Ko Naake Se Giraakar Zainab Kehne Lagi Roro Kar. Na Deys Apna Hai, Na Log
Apne Hai

(Na Deys Apna Hai, Na Log Apne Hai) X2

  1. Mei Kaise Kafan Du Mere Mazloom Baraadar

(Na Deys Apna Hai, Na Log Apne Hai) X2

  2. Ye Dekh Zara Ay Tashnadahan, Shaano To Mere Jakre Hai Rasan, Aur Uspe Sitam Hai, Sar Par Nahi Chadar, Mei Kaise Kafan Du Mere Mazloom Baraadar

(Na Deys Apna Hai, Na Log Apne Hai) X2

  3. Kal Saath Tere Har Ghaam Chali, Ab Qaydi Huwi Aur Shaam Chali, Is Dard Ke Maare Roti Hu Khule Sare, Mei Kaise Kafan Du Mere Mazloom Baraadar

(Na Deys Apna Hai, Na Log Apne Hai) X2

  4. Baba Hai Ameer-E-Auno Mada, Hai Tera Laqab Sardar-E-Jinaa, Zainab Ko Huwi Hai Bechadar Beghar, Mei Kaise Kafan Du Mere Mazloom Baraadar

(Na Deys Apna Hai, Na Log Apne Hai) X2

  5. Ay Bhaayi Teri Ghurbat Ki Kasam, Ta Mard Nahi Bhulungi Ye Gham, Pardes Mei Aakar, Na Khaa Hai Labo Par, Mei Kaise Kafan Du Mere Mazloom Baraadar

(Na Deys Apna Hai, Na Log Apne Hai) X2

  6. Kya Zulm Sahe Tujh Ko Hai Khabar, Hai Aun-O-Muhammad Khaak Basar, Ab Tumse Nahi Hai, Paani Bhi Mayassar, Mei Kaise Kafan Du Mere Mazloom Baraadar

(Na Deys Apna Hai, Na Log Apne Hai) X2

  7. Hota Jo Madina Bhaayi Mere, Miljaata Kafan Mazloom Tujhe, Is Dasht-E-Bala Mei, Majboor Hai Khwaahar, Mei Kaise Kafan Du Mere Mazloom Baraadar

(Na Deys Apna Hai, Na Log Apne Hai) X2

  8. Hai Kushta-E-Tegh-E-Zulm Bata, Jab Koi Mera Yawar Na Raha, Maqtool-E-Jafaa Hai, Abbas Aur Akbar, Mei Kaise Kafan Du Mere Mazloom Baraadar

(Na Deys Apna Hai, Na Log Apne Hai) X2

  9. Kya Kya Na Huwi Zainab Pe Jafaa, Sab Khayme Jale Asbaab Luta, Par Sab Se Baraa Hai, Ye Gham Mere Dil Par, Mei Kaise Kafan Du Mere Mazloom Baraadar

(Na Deys Apna Hai, Na Log Apne Hai) X2

  10. "Irfan" Aur "Mazhar" Kehna Sake, Jo Bint-E-Ali Ne Bayn Kiyey, Phat'ta Hai Kaleja, Is Baat Ko Sunkar, Mei Kaise Kafan Du Mere Mazloom Baraadar

(Na Deys Apna Hai, Na Log Apne Hai) X2

As-Salaam Alayka Ya Sayyed-O-Shuhadaa

tracks.title: Noke Neza
tracks.lyrics:
Jab Shaam Ke Bazaar Mei, Saydaaniya Aayi, Are Chadar Ki Jaga Khaak-E-Safar,
Baalo Pe Laayi. Naa Gaah Jab Ghazi Ki Nazar Kulsum Tak Aayi, Are Sar Khaak
Par, Abbas Ne Neze Se Giraaya. Dar Hai Kulsum Ke Chehre Pe Na Parh Jaaye
Nazar, Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi Abbas Ka Sar

Dar Hai Kulsum Ke Chehre Pe Na Parh Jaaye Nazar, (Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi
Abbas Ka Sar) X2

  1. Ik Gayyur Wafadaar Pe Ab Aur Sitam Kya Honga, Jiski Chadar Ka Muhafiz Tha Wohi Aaj Huwi Beparda, Shaam Walo Mei Se Ehsaas-E-Doraan-E-Safar, Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi Abbas Ka Sar

Dar Hai Kulsum Ke Chehre Pe Na Parh Jaaye Nazar, (Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi
Abbas Ka Sar) X2

  2. Gir Gayi Raah Mei Naake Se Sakina To Ye Zainab Ne Kaha, Ik Chacha Aur Bhatiji Ki Muhabbat To Zara Dekh Khuda, Pusht Naaka Pe Sambhalti Nahi Sheh Ki Dukhtar, Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi Abbas Ka Sar

Dar Hai Kulsum Ke Chehre Pe Na Parh Jaaye Nazar, (Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi
Abbas Ka Sar) X2

  3. Shaam Ke Log Tamashaayi Bane Aur Tamaasha Saadaat, Bewatan Aur Khule Sar Hai Sar-E-Raah Kare Kya Saadaat, Khun Ankho Se Bahaate Hai Shah-E-Jinn-O-Bashar, Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi Abbas Ka Sar

Dar Hai Kulsum Ke Chehre Pe Na Parh Jaaye Nazar, (Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi
Abbas Ka Sar) X2

  4. Aandhiyo Khaak Urhaawo Ka Bane Isse Haram Baparda, Gunji Jab Shaam Ki Gham Nok Fazaawo Mei Ye Zainab Ki Sada, Aasma(N) Rone Laga Rowi Zami(N) Ye Kehkar, Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi Abbas Ka Sar

Dar Hai Kulsum Ke Chehre Pe Na Parh Jaaye Nazar, (Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi
Abbas Ka Sar) X2

  5. Chashm-E-Sajjad Se Behne Lage Us Waqt Lahu Ke Dhaare, Jab Ke Masoom Sakina Ko Sitamghar Ne Tamaache Mare, Laasha Sahil Pe Tarapta Hai Udhar Aur Idhar, Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi Abbas Ka Sar

Dar Hai Kulsum Ke Chehre Pe Na Parh Jaaye Nazar, (Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi
Abbas Ka Sar) X2

  6. Rone Walo Sar-E-Bazaar Khule Sar Thi Ali Ki Beti, Ghir Gaya Farq-E-Wafadaar Jo Neze Se To Heyraa(N) The Shaqi, Pucha Abid Se Sitamghar Ne Bataawo Kyu Kar, Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi Abbas Ka Sar

Dar Hai Kulsum Ke Chehre Pe Na Parh Jaaye Nazar, (Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi
Abbas Ka Sar) X2

  7. Saath Sadaat Ke Shehzaadiy-E-Kawnaain Safar Karti Rahi, Nawha Karte Hai Nabi Khaak Urha Te Hai Hassan Aur Ali, Haay Kya Waqt Hai Rote Hai Sina Par Sarwar Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi Abbas Ka Sar

Dar Hai Kulsum Ke Chehre Pe Na Parh Jaaye Nazar, (Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi
Abbas Ka Sar) X2

  8. Kabhi Layla Kabhi Farwa Kabhi Kalsum Kahe Wawayla, Chehra Balon Se Chhupate Huwe Zainab Ne Yahi Ro Ke Kahaa(N), Amma Fiza Zaraa Dekho To Ye Gham Ka Manzar Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi Abbas Ka Sar

Dar Hai Kulsum Ke Chehre Pe Na Parh Jaaye Nazar, (Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi
Abbas Ka Sar) X2

  9. Nawha Likhte Huwe "Irfan" Ye "Mazhar" Ne Kahaa Tha Rokar, Kon Qirtas Pe Laasakta Awlade Payambar Ka Safar, Rodiye Qalb O Jigar Aik Hi Misra Likhkar Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi Abbas Ka Sar

Dar Hai Kulsum Ke Chehre Pe Na Parh Jaaye Nazar, (Noke Neza Pe Teherta Nahi
Abbas Ka Sar) X2

tracks.title: Pehchaano Khudara
tracks.lyrics:
Haay, Zindaa(N) Ki Qayd Kaatke, Jab Saniy-E-Zehra, Ponchi Watan To Koi Bhi
Pehchaan Na Paaya, Are Abdullah Bin Jaffar-E-Tayyar Ne Puche, Tu Kon Hai Kya
Naam Hai Tera Zaeefa, Ye Sunke Fugaa Karne Lagi Saniy-E-Zehra, Are Zawja Hu
Aap Ki Mujhe Pehchaano Khudara, (Mei Awn-O-Muhammad Ki Maa Hu) X2

  1. (Pehchaano Khudara) X2 Mujko To Jite Ji Gham-E-Shabbir Ne Mara

(Mei Awn-O-Muhammad Ki Maa Hu) X4

  2. Baalo Ki Safedi Ka Sabab Pucho Na Mujhse, In Ankho Ne Dekhe Hai Sitam Karbobala Ke, Ghar Lut Gaya Sadaat, Pehchaano Khudara, Mujko To Jite Ji Gham-E-Shabbir Ne Mara

(Mei Awn-O-Muhammad Ki Maa Hu) X4

  3. Chehre Se Numaya Jo Mere Karbobala Hai, Ye Haal To Abbas Ke Marne Se Huwa Hai, Chuta Wo Sahara, Pehchaano Khudara, Mujko To Jite Ji Gham-E-Shabbir Ne Mara

(Mei Awn-O-Muhammad Ki Maa Hu) X4

  4. Ik Zakhm Hai Qasim Ka Mere Kalb-O-Jigar Me, Jo Chaand Ujaalo Ka Sabab Tha Mere Ghar Mei, Wo Bhi Gaya Mara, Pehchaano Khudara, Mujko To Jite Ji Gham-E-Shabbir Ne Mara

(Mei Awn-O-Muhammad Ki Maa Hu) X4

  5. Bas Bhaayi Ki Matam Mei Rahi Qayd Bhi Kaati, Leykin Mei Kabhi Awn-O-Muhammad Ko Na Rowi, Ab Deti Hu Pursa, Pehchaano Khudara, Mujko To Jite Ji Gham-E-Shabbir Ne Mara

(Mei Awn-O-Muhammad Ki Maa Hu) X4

  6. Bazaar Mei Abid Pe Zaeefi Huwi Taari, Wo Aaj Bhi Rota Hai Aseeri Pe Hamari, Ghamkhwaar Hamara, Pehchaano Khudara, Mujko To Jite Ji Gham-E-Shabbir Ne Mara

(Mei Awn-O-Muhammad Ki Maa Hu) X4

  7. Are Sadaat Ke Halke Me Mujhe Aake Chupaaya, Jab Shaam Ke Hakim Ne Mera Naam Pukaara, Us Ranj Ne Maara, Pehchaano Khudara, Mujko To Jite Ji Gham-E-Shabbir Ne Mara

(Mei Awn-O-Muhammad Ki Maa Hu) X4

  8. Shiree(N) Se Mulakat Huwi Raah Mei Ik Baar, Pehchaan Nahi Paayi Mujhe Wo Bhi Dilakar, Dil Roke Pukaara, Pehchaano Khudara, Mujko To Jite Ji Gham-E-Shabbir Ne Mara

(Mei Awn-O-Muhammad Ki Maa Hu) X4

  9. Sab Ghayr Kujaara Hai Damishkaar Kuja Mei, Karbal Se Chali Hogaye Khud Karbobala Mei, Zulmat Ka Safar Tha, Pehchaano Khudara, Mujko To Jite Ji Gham-E-Shabbir Ne Mara

(Mei Awn-O-Muhammad Ki Maa Hu) X4

  10. "Irfan" Ye Alfaaz Jo "Mazhar" Ne Likhe Hai, Insaan To Kya Cheez Hai Patthar Ko Rula De, Jaise Ke Ye Jumla Pehchaano Khudara, Mujko To Jite Ji Gham-E-Shabbir Ne Mara

(Mei Awn-O-Muhammad Ki Maa Hu) X2

  11. (Pehchaano Khudara) X2 Mujhe Jit-E-Ji Gham-E-Shabbir Ne Maara

(Mei Awn-O-Muhammad Ki Maa Hu) X2

  12. (Pehchaano Khudara) X2 Mujhe Jit-E-Ji Gham-E-Shabbir Ne Maara

(Mei Awn-O-Muhammad Ki Maa Hu) X2

tracks.title: Saya E Khuda E Zulgalal
tracks.lyrics:
Aaye Jo Kabre Fatema Pe Sayad-E-Anaar Rukhsaar Rakh Ke Kabr Pe Rokar Kiya
Kalaam, Sehra Me Dil Ke Tukro Ki Basti Basawunga, Amma Madina Lawt Ke Aa Na
Paawunga, Kaampa Falak Larazne Lagi Qabr-E-Sayyeda, Ayi Janaab-E-Fatema Ki
Qabr Se Sadaa

(Jaao Mere Laal) X4 Tum Pe Har Qadam Rahe Dua Meri, Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zul
Jalaal

(Jaao Mere Laal) X2 Tum Pe Har Qadam Rahe Dua Meri, Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zul
Jalaal

  1. Jaa Rahe Ho Tum Jo Kehke Deen Haq Bachawunga (Amma Aap Ki Kasam Me Khoon Me Nahawunga) X3 Ab Ho Jo Bhi Haal, Tum Ho Payemaal, Tum Pe Har Qadam Rahe Dua Meri

Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zul Jalaal (Jaao Mere Laal) X2 Tum Pe Har Qadam Rahe Dua
Meri, Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zul Jalaal

  2. Bachpane Mei Jo Kiya Tha Wada Babajaan Se (Waqt Ab Wo Agaya Kafan Ko Sar Se Baandhne) X3 Dekh Mere Laal, Dee(N) Ka Hai Sawaal, Kamyaabiya Hai Tere Saath Hi, Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zul Jalaal

(Jaao Mere Laal) X2 Tum Pe Har Qadam Rahe Dua Meri, Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zul
Jalaal

  3. Chahiye Khuda Ke Deen Ko Aghar Amaa, (Wo Ridaay-E-Zainab-E-Hazee(N) Ka Sayebaa(N)) X3 Jawo Ab Shidad Ibn-E-Buturaab, Mei Tumhare Saath Babajaan Bhi,

Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zul Jalaal (Jaao Mere Laal) X2 Tum Pe Har Qadam Rahe Dua
Meri, Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zul Jalaal

  4. Deraha Hai Deen-E-Kibriya Tumhe Salaam (Almadad Hussain Almadad Shah-E-Huda) X3 Mei Watan Hussain, Mere Dil Ke Cheyn, Hamsafar Tumhare Saath Maa Huwi

Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zul Jalaal (Jaao Mere Laal) X2 Tum Pe Har Qadam Rahe Dua
Meri, Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zul Jalaal

  5. Shaan-E-Baba Faq Honge Jis Gari Kalam, (Rowenge Alam Ke Saaye Mei Tere Haram) X3 Rowengi Wafaa Aur Karbala, Rowengi Faraat Aur Tashnagi

Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zul Jalaal (Jaao Mere Laal) X2 Tum Pe Har Qadam Rahe Dua
Meri, Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zul Jalaal

  6. Akbar-E-Jawaa(N) Jigar Pe Khayenga Sina, (Maa Kahengi Mera Chaand Khogaya Kaha) X3 Uspe Nohakhwaan, Honge Meri Jaan, Mei Bhi Aur Hassan Bhi Aur Rasool Bhi

Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zul Jalaal (Jaao Mere Laal) X2 Tum Pe Har Qadam Rahe Dua
Meri, Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zul Jalaal

  7. Ye Sadaa Mazar-E-Sayyeda Se "Mazhar Abidi" (Sunke Rodiyey Hussain Mustafa Ki Aal Bhi) X3 Jaawo Mere Laal, Jaawo Mere Laal, Tumpe Har Qadam Rahe Dua Meri, Aur Saaya-E-Khuda-E-Zuljalaal

tracks.title: Aaj Ghar Mey Penjey
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain, Ya Hussain, Hussain) X2

(Zehra Sa Pehenji Majlis Mei, Aj Shaah-E-Shaheeda Aayo Aay) X2

Ho Aj Shaah-E-Shaheeda Aayo Aay

(Aj Ghar Mei Pehenje Maula Jo, Mu(N) Farsh-E -Aza, Bichaayo Aay) X3

  1. (Jab Chaand Muharram Ka Dekha, Aankho(N) Se Bahaaye Ashk-E-Aza) X2

Matam Huwa, Parcham Bhi Saja

Dil Rodiya, Karke Ye Bukaa

Hussain Ya Hussain

(Aj Ghar Mei Pehenje Maula Jo, Mu(N) Farsh-E -Aza, Bichaayo Aay) X2

  2. (Ik Jhula Sajaakar Chota Sa, Asghar Ki Pyaas Ko Yaad Kiya) X2

Phir Shaah Ko, Us Kamsin Ka

Pursa Diya, Aur Nawha Kiya

Hussain Ya Hussain

(Aj Ghar Mei Pehenje Maula Jo, Mu(N) Farsh-E -Aza, Bichaayo Aay) X2

  3. (Taboot Sajaya Jab Mene, Hamshakl-E-Payambar Ka Rokar) X2

Aisa Laga, Karti Hai Buka

Akbar Ki Maa(N), Dekar Ye Sada

Hussain Ya Hussain

(Aj Ghar Mei Pehenje Maula Jo, Mu(N) Farsh-E -Aza, Bichaayo Aay) X2

  4. (Mehendhi Jo Sajaayi Qasim Ki, Nawshaah Ka Sehra Aise Parha) X2

Sehra Tera, Ashko(N) Se Bana

Har Ashk Ne, Ye Nawha Kiya

Hussain Ya Hussain

(Aj Ghar Mei Pehenje Maula Jo, Mu(N) Farsh-E -Aza, Bichaayo Aay) X2

  5. (Wo Chote Chote Surkh Alam, Jab Nasb Kiye To Dil Ne Kaha) X2

Phele Alam, Un Bacho(N) Se

Zainab Ne Jo, Kurbaan Kiye

Hussain Ya Hussain

(Aj Ghar Mei Pehenje Maula Jo, Mu(N) Farsh-E -Aza, Bichaayo Aay) X2

  6. (Do Baaliyaa(N) Aur Ik Mashkiza, Ghazi Ke Alam Ke Saath Rakha) X2

Ik Alqama Ankho(N) Se Chali

Yaad Agayi, Phir Pyaas Teri

Hussain Ya Hussain

(Aj Ghar Mei Pehenje Maula Jo, Mu(N) Farsh-E -Aza, Bichaayo Aay) X2

  7. (Taboot Sajaya Jab Tera, Ay Shaah-E-Shaheeda Tashnadahan) X2

Maa(N) Sayyeda Ki Aayi Sada

Zakhm-E-Jigar, Phir Taaza Huwa

Hussain Ya Hussain

(Aj Ghar Mei Pehenje Maula Jo, Mu(N) Farsh-E -Aza, Bichaayo Aay) X2

  8. (Phir Eik Sabeel Banaayi Gayi, Pyaaso(N) Ki Pyaas Pe Rote Huwe) X2

Kuze Rakhe, Paani Bhi Rakha

Har Kuze Par, Tera Naam Likha

Hussain Ya Hussain

(Aj Ghar Mei Pehenje Maula Jo, Mu(N) Farsh-E -Aza, Bichaayo Aay) X2

  9. ("Irfan" Aur "Mazhar" Ki Jannat, Hai Majlis Matam Farsh-E-Aza) X2

Hai Bandagi, Ye Farsh-E-Aza

Aur Zindagi, Matam Hai Tera

Hussain Ya Hussain

tracks.title: Asghar Tera Jhula
tracks.lyrics:
Veeran Aagosh-E-Madar

Veeran Dil Sakina Ka

Kahymo(N) Ki Tarha Hai Veeran

(Asghar Tera Jhula) X4

  1. Ansu Bahaaye

Kaise Jhulaye

Bali Sakina Haay

(Asghar Tera Jhula) X2

  2. Jalti Zamee(N) Par, Tu Soraha Hai

(Furqat Mei Teri, Dil Roraha Hai) X2

Roti Hai Madar

Roti Hai Khwaahar

Karta Hai Nawha Haay

(Asghar Tera Jhula) X2

  3. Suna Hai Jangal, Suni Hai Godi

(Zakhm-E-Judaayi, Degaya Tu Bhi) X2

Veeran Dil Hai

Veeran Khayma

Ye Kehke Roya Haay

(Asghar Tera Jhula) X2

  4. Aa Mere Jaani, Aagaya Pani

(Aja Mita Du, Tashnadahani) X2

Kuza Uthakar

Rowi Sakina

Jaise Hi Dekha Haay

(Asghar Tera Jhula) X2

  5. Tera Humakna, Yaad Aaraha Hai

(Madar Ke Dil Ko, Tarpa Raha Hai) X2

Thaam Ke Royi

Jhule Ki Dori

Khali Jo Laaya Haay

(Asghar Tera Jhula) X2

  6. Maqtal Mei Tujhko, Kya Neend Ayi

(Kisne Waha Par, Lori Sunaayi) X2

Kal Tak Thi Jhula

Aagosh-E-Madar

Aaj Ye Sehra Haay

(Asghar Tera Jhula) X2

  7. Nazdeek Jakar, Jhule Ke Madar

(Kok Jali Ye, Kehti Hai Rokar) X2

Jaawu Kaha(N) Mei

Saare Jahaa(N) Mei

Hai Meri Duniya Haay

(Asghar Tera Jhula) X2

  8. Ankho(N) Mei Dajna Hai Ansuwo(N) Ka

(Lab Pe Bukaa Hai, Dil Matami Hai) X2

Hai Aza Khaana

Dil Teri Maa Ka

Aur Isme Beta Haay

(Asghar Tera Jhula) X2

  9. Maa Ki Fugha(N) Ka, Lori Samajh Kar

(Ay Mere Bache, Aja Palat Kar) X2

Kethi Hai Madar

Hoti Zabaa(N) Gar

Tujhko Bulaata Haay

(Asghar Tera Jhula) X2

  10. Baab-Ul-Hawaa'ij, Ay Maula Asghar

(Kehte Hai Sab Se, Irfan-O-Mazhar) X2

Paayi Duaaye(N)

Usme Ali Se

Jisne Uthaaya

(Asghar Tera Jhula) X4

tracks.title: Bharde Joli
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Muhammad, Ya Basheer, Ya Nazeer-O-Ya Mahmood) X2

Ya Mukarram Ya Mu'azzam Ya Muqaddam Ya Haadi

Ya Jaleel-O-Ya Jameel, Ya Mateen-O-Ya Taha

Hai Tuhi Aasra Ay Hussain Ke Nana

(Ya Rasoolallah) X2

  1. Hamne Darbar-E-Zehra Mei Ki Iltijaa

Aur Kabhi Bint-E-Zehra Se Mangi Dua

(Hamne Ghazi Ki Chokhat Pe Sajda Kiya) X2

Phir Jabee(N) Tere Dar Par Jjhukali

(Tera Dar Hai Jahaa Me Misali) X2

(Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad) X2 (Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali) X2

Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali

  2. Hai Sakhiyo(N) To Sara Gharana Tera

Do Jahaa(N) Pe Khula Hai Khazana Tera

(Parh Raha Hai Qasida Zamaana Tera) X2

Tune Sabki Musibat Hai Ttali

(Meri Jholi Abhitak Hai Khali) X2

(Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad) X2 (Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali) X2

Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali

  3. Jistarha Se Saji Mehfile Panjatan

Tu Muhammed Tera Bhai Khayber Shikan

(Aur Khayber Shikan Ka Pisar Hai Hassan) X2

De Hassan Ke Baradar Ka Sadqa

(Jisne Sajde Me Ghardan Kataali) X2

(Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad) X2 (Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali) X2

Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali

  4. Tu Masiha Hai Humko Dawaa Chahiye

Maut Ttaljaye Gar Tu Ishara Kare

(Hum Faqiro(N) Ko Tujhse Ye Nisbat Bhi Hai) X2

Hum Faqiro(N) Ke Kapre Hai Kaale

(Tere Khandhe Pe Kamli Hai Kaali) X2

(Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad) X2 (Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali) X2

Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali

  5. Har Hussaini Bahan Ki Hai Ye Iltija
