Tere Dar Se Na Mayoos Koyi Gaya

(Dede Asghar Ka Sadqa Habibe Khuda) X2

Ye Hai Un Bibiyo(N) Ki Sadaaye

(Jinki Aghosh Abtak Hai Khaali) X2

(Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad) X2 (Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali) X2

Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali

  6. Ye Jo Kamsin Hussaini Pareshan Hai

Farshe Majlis Pe Ashghar Ke Mehmaan Hai

(Haa(N) Ye Agle Zamaane Ke "Irfaan" Hai) X2

Hai Ye Awno Muhammed Ke Zakir

(Tu Inhe Umr De Khizr Waali) X2

(Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad) X2 (Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali) X2

Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali

  7. Akhri Iltaja Hai Ye Aqa Mere

Baap Ka Daste Shafkat Kabhi Na Uthe

(Sar Pe Maao(N) Ka Saaya Salamat Rahe) X2

Dede Umme Abiha Ka Sadqa

(Jo Hai Rutbe Me Maryam Se Aali) X2

(Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad) X2 (Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali) X2

Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali

  8. Aik Bimar Qaydi Ka Hai Waasta

Shaam Tak Khoo(N) Ke Ansu Jo Rota Raha

(Jiske Zanjir Parhti Rahi Marsiya) X2

Uske Sadqe Me Dede Rihaayi

(Jisne Teri Nabuwat Bachaali) X2

(Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad) X2 (Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali) X2

Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali

  9. Jab Azaao Kashkol Bharjayega

Qarz Jo Hai Qalam Par Utarjayega

(Zehn Parwaz Ki Oj Barhjayega) X2

Oj "Mazhar" Ka Kayse Ho Jese

(The "Zabeer-O-Anees-O-Rahali") X2

(Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad) X2 (Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali) X2

Bharde Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad Sab Hussaini Hai Tujhse Sawali

(Ya Rasoolallah) X2

tracks.title: Hind Roti Thi
tracks.lyrics:
Haaye Baap Ki Yaad Sakina Ko Jo Tarapti Thi

Waa Hussaina Ki Sada Deke Wo Chillati Thi

Ye Sada Hind Ke Kaanose Jo Takrati Thi

Are Hind Zindan Ke Darwaze Pe Ajati Thi

Hind Zindan Ke Darwaze Pe Ajati Thi

  1. Usne Ik Din Kaneezo(N) Se Puchha

Kuchh Batawo(N) Ke Hai Majra Kya

Kiski Rone Ki Hai Ye Sadaaye(N)

Kon Zinda(N) Me Karta Hai Nawha

Hind Roti Thi Zinda(N) Ki Darpar Ik Yateema Ki Awaz Sunkar

Hind Roti Thi Zinda(N) Ki Darpar

  2. Al Gharaz Agayi Zindan Talak Mehve Bukaa

Parh Ke Zinadaan Ke Darbano Ne Dar Khol Diya

Baabe Zindaan Me Dakhil Jo Huwi Wo Dukhiya

Are (Ek Bachhi Ko Andhere Me Tarapte Dekha) X2

Apne Sine Se Usko Lagaya

Ponch Kar Aashk Bachhi Se Puchha

Kyu(N) Hai Nawha Tera Wa Hussaina

Naam Badlade Apne Padar Ka

Hind Roti Thi Zinda(N) Me Aakar Ik Yateema Ki Awaz Sunkar

Hind Roti Thi Zinda(N) Aakar

  3. Hind Ne Puchha Watan Usne Kaha Bewatani

Kaam Jab Hind Ne Puchha To Kaha Sina Zani

Jurm Jab Puchha To Wo Boli Ghareebul Watani

Are (Dard Jab Puchha To Kehne Lagi Eeza Rasani) X2

Hind Ne Puchha Kabse Ho Qaydi

Peet Ke Sar Ko Boli Wo Bachhi

Saal Bhar Qayd Me Yu(N) Ghuzaara

Na Dawa Hai Na Marham Hai Koyi

Hind Roti Thi Zinda(N) Me Aakar Ik Yateema Ki Awaz Sunkar

Hind Roti Thi Zinda(N) Aakar

  4. Hind Ne Puchha Maraz Kya Hai Kaha Bepadari

Roke Wo Boli Dawa Kya Hai Kaha Nawha Ghari

Ghar Jo Dariyaft Kiya Kehne Lagi Darbadari

Are (Boli Leta Hai Khabar Kon Kaha Bekhabari) X2

Hind Ne Puchha Gham Ka Madawa

Boli Bus Aasra Hai Khuda Ka

Dard Dil Me Jo Uthta Hai Mere

Naam Leti Hu(N) Mushkil Khushaa Ka

Hind Roti Thi Zinda(N) Me Aakar Ik Yateema Ki Awaz Sunkar

Hind Roti Thi Zinda(N) Aakar

  5. Naam Haider Ka Suna Karne Lagi Hind Bukaa

Puchha Bachhi Se Bhala Inse Tera Rishta Kya

Roke Bachhi Ne Kaha Gham To Yahi Hai Dukhiya

Are (Baap Shabbir Hai Dada Hai Mere Shere Khuda) X2

Kya Kahe Aur "Irfan-O-Mazhar"

Phenk Di Hind Ne Sar Se Chaadar

Bichh Gaya Qayd Me Farshe Matam

Wa Hussaina Tha Sab Ki Zubaa(N) Par

(Haaye Hussaina) X4

tracks.title: Khoon Mei Duba
tracks.lyrics:
(Kya Qayamat Lab-E-Alqama Hai) X2

Mashk Chidi Pani Baha, Ho Gaye Bazu Kalam

Phool Se Abbas Ka, Surkh Huwa Jab Alam

Shor Utha Nehr Par, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Shaad Huwe Ehl-E-Shar, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Dekha Suw-E-Nehr To Shabbir Ne Rokar Kaha

(Khoon Mei Duba Alam Abbas Ka) X2

  1. Ab Mera Lashkar Kaha, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Mei Hu Watan Haa(N) Yaha, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Kyu(N) Na Qamar Ho Kama, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Kyu Na Lahu Ankho(N) Se Barsuo(N) Bataa Karbala

(Khoon Mei Duba Alam Abbas Ka, Dekha To Shabbir Ne Rokar Kaha) X2

  2. Rone Lagi Alqama, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Mojo(N) Ne Matam Kiya, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Dasht Se Ayi Sada, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Dekha Suw-E-Nehr To Zainab Ko Nazar Agaya

(Khoon Mei Duba Alam Abbas Ka, Dekha To Shabbir Ne Rokar Kaha) X2

  3. Khaymo(N) Mei Hai Shor-O-Sheyn, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Lut Gaya Zehra Ka Cheyn, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Roke Ye Bole Hussain, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Meri Sakina Ke Liye Hoga Payaam-E-Qaza

(Khoon Mei Duba Alam Abbas Ka, Dekha To Shabbir Ne Rokar Kaha) X2

  4. Karti Hai Zainab Bukaa, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Koyi Nahi Aasra, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Bhaayi Akela Huwa, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Sar Se Rida Jayengi Zainab Ko Yaqee(N) Hogaya

(Khoon Mei Duba Alam Abbas Ka, Dekha To Shabbir Ne Rokar Kaha) X2

  5. Fizza Ne Payi Khabar, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Haath Rakha Qalb Par, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Pheynki Ridaa Khaak Par, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Ehl-E-Haram Saath Huwe Parhne Lagi Marsiya

(Khoon Mei Duba Alam Abbas Ka, Dekha To Shabbir Ne Rokar Kaha) X2

  6. Bacho(N) Se Sheh Ne Kaha, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Toot Gaya Aasra, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Paani Nahi Ayenga, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Bhigi Huwi Ankho(N) Se Dekho To Suw-E-Alqama

(Khoon Mei Duba Alam Abbas Ka, Dekha To Shabbir Ne Rokar Kaha) X2

  7. Noha Hai Kulsoom Ka, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Kaise Jiyungi Bhala, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Mujhko Na Ayi Qaza, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Aas Meri Toot Gayi Dekha Jo Mere Khuda

(Khoon Mei Duba Alam Abbas Ka, Dekha To Shabbir Ne Rokar Kaha) X2

  8. Rote Hai Mushkil Kusha, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Nana Ne Nawha Kiya, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Kehti Hai Maa Sayyeda, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Dekh Naya Zakhm Mere Laal Tujhe Degaya

(Khoon Mei Duba Alam Abbas Ka, Dekha To Shabbir Ne Rokar Kaha) X2

  9. Karta Hai "Mazhar" Buka, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Khaak Urhaao Zara, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Nawha Hai "Irfaan" Ka, Qatl-E-Alamdar Shud

Are Peet'te Hai Sina-O-Sar Dekh Ke Ehl-E-Aza

(Khoon Mei Duba Alam Abbas Ka, Dekha To Shabbir Ne Rokar Kaha) X3

tracks.title: Rida Laake Ke Urhaade
tracks.lyrics:
Zainab Aagayi Hai Shaam

Meri Rida Ke Pasbaan

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

(Khula Hai Sar Khule Bazaar Rida Laake Urha De) X3

  1. Ay Mere Ghazi Alamdaar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

(Khula Hai Sar Khule Bazaar Rida Laake Urha De) X3

  2. Ye Buturab Ki Beti Ho Kyu(N) Na Fariyaadi

Agar Wo Toko Salaasil Se Paaye Azaadi

To Mera Abide Bimaar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Ay Mere Ghazi Alamdaar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Khula Hai Sar Khule Bazaar Rida Laake Urha De

  3. Wo Beridayi Ke Sadme Ko Kaise Jhelega

Ye Dard Abide Muztar Ki Jaan Lelega

Guzar Na Jaaye Dilafgar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Ay Mere Ghazi Alamdaar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Khula Hai Sar Khule Bazaar Rida Laake Urha De

  4. Mujhe Chhupale Mere Ghazi In Nigaaho(N) Se

Sabeel Aisi Banaa Koi Tay Ho Ye Raste

Na Dekhe Mujhko Sitamghaar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Ay Mere Ghazi Alamdaar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Khula Hai Sar Khule Bazaar Rida Laake Urha De

  5. Ghareeb Hogayi Ummat Ne Di Saza Mujhko

Tu Dekh Sakta Nahi Ghazi Berida Mujhko

Sina Se Gir Nahi Farwa

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Ay Mere Ghazi Alamdaar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Khula Hai Sar Khule Bazaar Rida Laake Urha De

  6. Tujhe Sakina Ke Ashko(N) Ki Hai Qasam Ghazi

Tamaam Umr Me Phir Tujhse Khuchh Na Mangungi

Hai Ibne Haidere Karrar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Ay Mere Ghazi Alamdaar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Khula Hai Sar Khule Bazaar Rida Laake Urha De

  7. Tujhe To Baba Ne Bakhshi Masnade Aali

Sawali Koi Tere Dar Se Kab Gaya Khali

Zamane Bhar Ke Madadghaar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Ay Mere Ghazi Alamdaar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Khula Hai Sar Khule Bazaar Rida Laake Urha De

  8. Kabhi Jo Ghar Se Nikalti Me Saal Me Ik Baar

Tu Barh Ke Logo(N) Se Kehta Tha Band Karo Bazaar

Wahi Behan Wahi Bazaar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Ay Mere Ghazi Alamdaar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Khula Hai Sar Khule Bazaar Rida Laake Urha De

  9. Sare Hussain Bhi Rota Hai Noke Neza Par

Padar Bhi Rote Hai Nana Bhi Bas Yahi Kehkar

Khule Saro(N) Ke Wafadar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Ay Mere Ghazi Alamdaar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Khula Hai Sar Khule Bazaar Rida Laake Urha De

  10. Sada Ye Shaam Se Aati Hai "Mazahar-O-Irfan"

Tarap Ke Aaj Bhi Kehti Hai Zainabe Zeeshaan

Meri Rida Ke Nigehbaan

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Ay Mere Ghazi Alamdaar

Rida Laake Ke Urha De

Khula Hai Sar Khule Bazaar Rida Laake Urha De

tracks.title: Sajjad Se Pucho
tracks.lyrics:
(Sajjad Se Pucho) X2

Zainab Ne Jo Puchi Gayi, Rudad-E-Safar Ki, Dil Thaam Ke, Kehne Lagi, Ye
Zainab-E-Muztar

(Kya Beet Gayi Shaam Ke Bazaar Me Logo, Sajjad Se Pucho) X2

  1. Maghmoom Aseeri Ka, Khula Shaam Mei Jaakar

Jab Nawha Kuna Nok-E-Sina Par Huwe Sarwar

Bhayya Ne Jo Nawha Kiya, Yasrab Ke Makeeno

Sajjad Se Pucho, Kya Beet Gayi Shaam Ke Bazaar Me Logo, Sajjad Se Pucho

  2. Mehfooz Hai Ankho(N) Mei, Aziyyat Ke Wo Lam Hai

Sadaat Khule Sar The Tamashayi Khare The

Us Dard Ki Shiddat Ko Agar Poochna Chaaho

Sajjad Se Pucho, Kya Beet Gayi Shaam Ke Bazaar Me Logo, Sajjad Se Pucho

  3. The Haath Passe Pusht Bandhe Sar Mei Pari Khaak

Sadmo(N)Ho Se Kaleje The Gharebaa(N) Ki Tarha Chaak

Ay Logo Mile Zakhm Jo Un Aaho(N) Kham To

Sajjad Se Pucho, Kya Beet Gayi Shaam Ke Bazaar Me Logo, Sajjad Se Pucho

  4. Jab Girta Tha Abbas Ka Sar Nok-E-Sina Se

Kya Is Ka Sabab Hai Jo Laee(N) Poochne Aate

Mei Kehti Thi Mujhse Nahi, Ye Baat Laeeno(N)

Sajjad Se Pucho, Kya Beet Gayi Shaam Ke Bazaar Me Logo, Sajjad Se Pucho

  5. Patthar Kahi Barsaaye Gaye Ehl-E-Haram Par

Baghi Kabhi Kehlayi Gayi Aal-E-Payambar

Afsos Yahi Hai Ke Musalmaa(N) The Sabi To

Sajjad Se Pucho, Kya Beet Gayi Shaam Ke Bazaar Me Logo, Sajjad Se Pucho

  6. Jab Girgayi Naake Se Mere Bhaayi Ki Dukhtar

Wo Neza Ruka Jispe Rakha Tha Sar-E-Sarwar

Us Dam Jo Aziyyat Huwi Awlaad-E-Nabi Ko

Sajjad Se Pucho, Kya Beet Gayi Shaam Ke Bazaar Me Logo, Sajjad Se Pucho

  7. Jab Milgayi Zindaa(N) Se Aseero(N) Ko Rihaayi

Ghar Jaayenge Na Jaaye Kaho Fatema Jaayi

Rokar Kaha Zainab Ne Ke Mujhse Nahi Paano

Sajjad Se Pucho, Kya Beet Gayi Shaam Ke Bazaar Me Logo, Sajjad Se Pucho

  8. Jab "Mazhar-O-Irfan" Kiya Sughra Ne Nawha

Zainab Ki Zaeefi Ka Sabab Maa(N) Se Jo Pucha

Maa(N) Kehne Lagi Roke Kaleje Ko Sambhaalo

Sajjad Se Pucho, Kya Beet Gayi Shaam Ke Bazaar Me Logo, Sajjad Se Pucho

tracks.title: Shaam-E-Ghariba
tracks.lyrics:
Sog Me Dubi Duniya Thi Saari

Aayi Ali Ki Ban Me Sawaari

(Pehre Pe Zainab Dard Ki Maari) X2

Baap Ko Dekha Roke Pukaari

Dekho To Baba, Haay, Dekho To Baba

(Shaam-E-Ghariba Ka Ye Manzar) X2

  1. Kehti Thi Rokar Zainab-E-Muztar

Shaam-E-Ghariba Ka Ye Manzar, Kehti Thi Rokar Zainab-E-Muztar, Shaam-E-Ghariba
Ka Ye Manzar

  2. (Deti Thi Zainab Ban Me Duhaayi, Haaye Mujhe Kyu Mawt Na Aayi) X2

Khencha Gaya Beemaar Ka Bistar

Shaam-E-Ghariba Ka Ye Manzar (Kehti Thi Rokar Zainab-E-Muztar, Shaam-E-Ghariba
Ka Ye Manzar) X2

  3. (Teero(N) Ne Chayda Baap Ka Sina, Soye Kaha Par Bali Sakina) X2

Nawha Kuna Hai Wo Jalti Zamee(N) Par

Shaam-E-Ghariba Ka Ye Manzar (Kehti Thi Rokar Zainab-E-Muztar, Shaam-E-Ghariba
Ka Ye Manzar) X2

  4. (Sukhe Huwe Kuzo(N) Ki Sada Hai, Pyaase Idhar Hai Udhar Darya Hai) X2

Nawha Yahi Hai Khushk Labo(N) Par

Shaam-E-Ghariba Ka Ye Manzar (Kehti Thi Rokar Zainab-E-Muztar, Shaam-E-Ghariba
Ka Ye Manzar) X2

  5. (Dasht-E-Bala Mei Bikhre Hai Laashe, Tute Huwe Talwaar Aur Neza) X2

Dekho Zara Ay Fatah-E-Khaybar

Shaam-E-Ghariba Ka Ye Manzar (Kehti Thi Rokar Zainab-E-Muztar, Shaam-E-Ghariba
Ka Ye Manzar) X2

  6. (Kaisi Luti Haay Aal-E-Payambar, Legaye Zalim Cheen Ke Chadar) X2

Chaand Sitare Roye Ye Kehkar

Shaam-E-Ghariba Ka Ye Manzar (Kehti Thi Rokar Zainab-E-Muztar, Shaam-E-Ghariba
Ka Ye Manzar) X2

  7. (Door Huwe Jab God Ke Paale, Rut Gaye Is Ghar Se Ujale) X2

Rone Lagi Hai Dekh Ke Madar

Shaam-E-Ghariba Ka Ye Manzar (Kehti Thi Rokar Zainab-E-Muztar, Shaam-E-Ghariba
Ka Ye Manzar) X2

  8. (Khaak Mere Baalo(N) Mei Pari Hai, Khaak Basar Awlad-E-Nabi Hai) X2

Sare Kahani Kehta Hai Rokar

Shaam-E-Ghariba Ka Ye Manzar (Kehti Thi Rokar Zainab-E-Muztar, Shaam-E-Ghariba
Ka Ye Manzar) X2

  9. (Baba Inhe Tawfeeq Ye Dena, Hashr Talak Parhte Rahe Nawha) X2

Yaad Rahe "Irfan" Aur "Mazhar"

Shaam-E-Ghariba Ka Ye Manzar (Kehti Thi Rokar Zainab-E-Muztar, Shaam-E-Ghariba
Ka Ye Manzar) X2

tracks.title: Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)
tracks.lyrics:
(Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)) X3

Zainab Teri Hayaa Ko, Haya Ka Salaam Hai, Naam-E-Khuda Bachaya Durood-O-Salaam
Hai, Qaydi Huwi Aseer Huwi, Ghar Ujar Gaya, Jur'rat Ko Teri Ruh-E-Wafa Ka
Salaam Hai

(Sehra Jangal Waa Diya, Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)) X2

  1. Ansu Aa Hai Khushk Gala

(Wawayla Haaye Wawayla) X2

(Beyn Kare Hai Aasmaan) X2

Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)

(Sehra Jangal Waa Diya, Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)) X2

  2. Roti Chali Namus-E-Nabi

(Wird-E-Zubaa(N) Hai Naad-E-Ali) X2

(Dhoop Ka Sar Pe Saayebaa(N)) X2

Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)

(Sehra Jangal Waa Diya, Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)) X2

  3. Sholo Mei Hai Ik Jhula

(Jhulne Wala Wo Bacha) X2

(Pyaasa Gaya Hai Su-E-Jinaa) X2

Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)

(Sehra Jangal Waa Diya, Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)) X2

  4. Behta Huwa Ankho(N) Se Lahu

(Kaise Rakhe Dil Par Kabu) X2

(Bichri Huwi Bacho(N) Se Maa) X2

Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)

(Sehra Jangal Waa Diya, Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)) X2

  5. Roke Sakina Beyn Kare

(Bhaayi Chacha Baba Ke Liye) X2

(Dil Ki Sada Sehra Ki Azaa(N)) X2

Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)

(Sehra Jangal Waa Diya, Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)) X2

  6. Sina-E-Akbar Aur Barchi

(Wo Akbar Hamshakl-E-Nabi) X2

(Nikli Kaleja Leke Sina) X2

Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)

(Sehra Jangal Waa Diya, Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)) X2

  7. Lashkar-E-Sheh Ka Sher-E-Jari

(Wo Saqqa Abbas-E-Ali) X2

(Khun Mei Bhara Tha Jiska Nishaa(N)) X2

Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)

(Sehra Jangal Waa Diya, Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)) X2

  8. Nanni Lahad Zindan-E-Sitam

(Ghor Andhera Sar Ka Qadam) X2

(Dil Me Rihaayi Ka Armaa(N)) X2

Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)

(Sehra Jangal Waa Diya, Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)) X2

  9. Rok Qalam "Rehan" Hazeen

(Dil Mei Kisi Ke Daab Nahi) X2

(Daba Falak Hai Shor Fugha(N)) X2

Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)

(Sehra Jangal Waa Diya, Beparda Shahzadiyaa(N)) X2

tracks.title: Abbas Mera Naam Hai
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Abbas) X4

Abbas Jo Aye Darya Par

Mojo(N) Mei Utha Ik Shor Udhar

Chehre Ki Jalalat Kehti Thi

Rakhdenga Ulat Kar Ye Lashkar

(Ya Abbas) X2

Abbas Ye Bole Lashkar Se

Aayi Hai Shuja’at Haider Se

Mei Nehr Utha Lejaawunga

Ye Dars Liye Hai Khayber Se

(Ya Abbas) X2

Mei Sher-E-Khuda Ka Hu(N) Beta

Thokar Mei Meri Hai Ye Darya

Hu(N) Bali Sakina Ka Saqqa

Roke Na Koi Mera Rasta

(Ya Abbas) X2

Abbas Mera Naam Hai, Shaamiyo Pehchaanlo, Abbas Mera Naam Hai

Mei Hu(N) Saqqa-E-Haram

Saqqayi Mera Kaam Hai

(Ya Abbas) X2

Abbas Mera Naam Hai, Shaamiyo Pehchaanlo, Abbas Mera Naam Hai

  1. Foj Ka Salaar Hu(N)

Azm Ki Deewaar Hu(N)

Pekar-E-Isaar Hu(N)

(Haideri Kirdaar Hu(N)) X2

Dosh Par Dee(N) Ka Alam

Dil Mei Hai Pyaaso(N) Ka Gham

(Ya Abbas) X2

Abbas Mera Naam Hai, Shaamiyo Pehchaanlo, Abbas Mera Naam Hai

  2. Barti Foje Rok Du(N)

Darya Ki Moje Rok Du(N)

Mei Agar Hamla Karu(N)

(Dozakh Mei Sab Ko Jhonk Du(N)) X2

Hu(N) Shehanshah-E-Wafa

Kufr Ke Sar Par Qaza

(Ya Abbas) X2

Abbas Mera Naam Hai, Shaamiyo Pehchaanlo, Abbas Mera Naam Hai

  3. Ayn Hai Ayn-E-Ali

Be Bahaddur Baap Ki

Hai Alif Isme Jail

(Seen Hai Sajjad Ki) X2

Ik Dil-E-Hassas Hu(N)

Isliye Abbas Hu(N)

(Ya Abbas) X2

Abbas Mera Naam Hai, Shaamiyo Pehchaanlo, Abbas Mera Naam Hai

  4. Mei Bara-E-Karbala

Fatema Ki Hu(N) Dua

Hu(N) Alamdar-E-Wafa

(Baap Ka Parcham Mila) X2

Zaat Mei Lashkar Hu(N) Mei

Saani-E-Haider Hu(N) Mei

(Ya Abbas) X2

Abbas Mera Naam Hai, Shaamiyo Pehchaanlo, Abbas Mera Naam Hai

  5. Jang To Ik Khayl Hai

Mat Ulaj Abbas Se

Ye Khabar Bhi Hai Tujhe

(Muztarib Hu(N) Pyaas Se) X2

Zabt Karna Hai Mujhe

Mashk Bharna Hai Mujhe

(Ya Abbas) X2

Abbas Mera Naam Hai, Shaamiyo Pehchaanlo, Abbas Mera Naam Hai

  6. Algharaz Kabza Huwa

Nehr Pe Abbas Ka

Pehle Mashkiza Bhara

(Phir Su-E-Khayma Chala) X2

Gunjti Thi Nara-E-Abbas-E-Ghazi Se Faza

(Ya Abbas) X2

Abbas Mera Naam Hai, Shaamiyo Pehchaanlo, Abbas Mera Naam Hai

  7. Foj Ka Salaar Hu(N)

Azm Ki Deewaar Hu(N)

Pekar-E-Isaar Hu(N)

(Haideri Kirdaar Hu(N)) X2

Dosh Par Dee(N) Ka Alam

Dil Mei Hai Pyaasa Ka Gham

(Ya Abbas) X2

Abbas Mera Naam Hai, Shaamiyo Pehchaanlo, Abbas Mera Naam Hai

  8. Barti Foje Rok Du(N)

Darya Ki Moje Rok Du(N)

Mei Agar Hamla Karu(N)

(Dozakh Mei Sab Ko Jhonk Du(N)) X2

Hu(N) Shehanshah-E-Wafa

Kufr Ke Sar Par Qaza

(Ya Abbas) X2

Abbas Mera Naam Hai, Shaamiyo Pehchaanlo, Abbas Mera Naam Hai

  9. Jhuk Gayi Sheh Ki Kamar

Jab Suni Gham Ki Khabar

Lasha-E-Abbas Par

(Shabbir Pohnche Nawhaghar) X2

Kehte The Bhaayi Mera

Ik Baar Phir Se Do Sada

(Ya Abbas) X2

Abbas Mera Naam Hai, Shaamiyo Pehchaanlo, Abbas Mera Naam Hai

  10. Rok Apna Kalam

Hogaya Nawha Rakam

Barh Chuka Hai Hadse Gham

(Ankh Hai "Rehan" Nam) X2

Gunjti Hai Nara-E-Abbas Se Bazm-E-Aza

(Ya Abbas) X2

tracks.title: Jaa Wapas Jaa Sughra
tracks.lyrics:
(Haae Sughra) X8

  1. (Akber Nahi Aayega) X2 Na Aas Laga Sughra

(Jaa Wapas Jaa Sughra) X4

  2. Paigaam Mera Dena Sughra Ko Ay Namabar, Barchi Aliakber Ke Sine Mei Lagi Aakar, (Barchi Ne Jigar Kaata) X2 Na Aas Laga Sughra

(Jaa Wapas Jaa Sughra) X4

  3. Qaasim Ke Janaaze Ke Tukre Mere Daaman Mei, Is Tarha Simat Aaye Ke Phul Ho Gulshan Mei (Tha Khun Mei Bhara Sehra) X2 Na Aas Laga Sughra

(Jaa Wapas Jaa Sughra) X4

  4. Ik Mashk Ke Bharne Mei Bedast Huwa Ghazi, Us Sher Ke Marne Se Tuti Hai Qamar Meri, (Dunya Se Gaya Saqqa) X2 Na Aas Laga Sughra

(Jaa Wapas Jaa Sughra) X4

  5. Sughra Tere Asghar Ko Teeron Ne Sulaaya Hai, Kaise Mei Kahun Usne Paani Nahi Paaya Hai, (Wiraan Huwa Jhulaa) X2 Na Aas Laga Sughra

(Jaa Wapas Jaa Sughra) X4

  6. Ab Baad Mere Beti Kya Kya Na Sitam Honge, Pardes Mei Bechadar Sab Ehle Haram Honge, (Jal Jaaega Har Khaima) X2 Na Aas Laga Sughra

(Jaa Wapas Jaa Sughra) X4

  7. Sajjad Ke Pairon Mei Zanjeer Pari Hogi, Beparda Phuphi Teri Balwe Mei Khari Hogi, (Lut Jaaega Sab Kunbaa) X2 Na Aas Laga Sughra

(Jaa Wapas Jaa Sughra) X4

  8. Pyaasa Hun Kaai Din Se Marne Pe Huwa Maandaa, Garden Pe Meri Khanjar Chal Jaaega Ai Sughra, (Baaqi Hai Abhi Sajda) X2 Na Aas Laga Sughra

(Jaa Wapas Jaa Sughra) X4

  9. "Rehan" Shahe Waala Kehte The Yahi Rokar, Shabbir Huwa Tanha Sab Maara Gaya Lashkar, (Beti Se Meri Kehna) X2 Na Aas Laga Sughra

(Jaa Wapas Jaa Sughra) X2

Akber Nahi Aayega

Qaasim Nahi Aayega

Ghazi Nahi Aayega

Asghar Nahi Aayega

Na Aas Laga Sughra

tracks.title: Roti Hai Alam Sine
tracks.lyrics:
(Haae Sakina) X4

  1. Zindaan Se Pehle Hi Naa Marjaae Sakina

(Roti Hai Alam Sine Se Liptaae Sakina) X2

  2. Behte Huwe Ashkon Mei Alamdaar Ka Gham Hai, Wo Tashnalabi Hai Ke Rakha Hoton Pe Dam Hai, Darya Se Bhi Aati Hai Sada, Haae Sakina

(Haae Sakina) X2

Zindaan Se Pehle Hi Naa Marjaae Sakina

(Roti Hai Alam Sine Se Liptaae Sakina) X2

  3. Roro Ke Yehi Kehti Hai Amma Se Phuphi Se, Is Aalam-E-Ghurbat Mei Koi Kya Sare Jee Ke, Lo Amma Dua Jaa(N) Se Ghuzar Jaae Sakina

(Haae Sakina) X2

Zindaan Se Pehle Hi Naa Marjaae Sakina

(Roti Hai Alam Sine Se Liptaae Sakina) X2

  4. Rukhsaaron Pe Aajaata Hai Khun Kaano Se Behkar, Khaamosh Hai Majbur Hai Har Zulm Ko Seh Kar, Rudaade Alam Ab Kise Batlaae Sakina

(Haae Sakina) X2

Zindaan Se Pehle Hi Naa Marjaae Sakina

(Roti Hai Alam Sine Se Liptaae Sakina) X2

  5. Sina Shahe Waala Ka Na Aagosh Chacha Ki, Palte Na Chacha Nehr Se Roti Rahi Bachi, Maqtal Mei Andhera Hai Kidhar Jaae Sakina

(Haae Sakina) X2

Zindaan Se Pehle Hi Naa Marjaae Sakina

(Roti Hai Alam Sine Se Liptaae Sakina) X2

  6. Akber Ko Sada Di Kabhi Qaasim Ko Pukaara, Had Hogayi Cheh Maah Ka Asghar Bhi Sidhaara, Hai Dar Pe Khari Haaton Ko Phailaae Sakina

(Haae Sakina) X2

Zindaan Se Pehle Hi Naa Marjaae Sakina

(Roti Hai Alam Sine Se Liptaae Sakina) X2

  7. Baandha Gaya Rassi Mei Gala Khaae Tamache, Shaano Se Kalam Dekhe Hai Baazu Bhi Chacha Ke, Batlaao Koi Kaise Sukuun Paae Sakina

(Haae Sakina) X2

Zindaan Se Pehle Hi Naa Marjaae Sakina

(Roti Hai Alam Sine Se Liptaae Sakina) X2

  8. "Rehan" Rihaai Ki Tamanna Mei Who Bachi, Soti Nathi Ik Roz Magar Kis Tarha Soyi, Maa Kehti Rahi Haae Utho Haae Sakina

(Haae Sakina) X2

Zindaan Se Pehle Hi Naa Marjaae Sakina

(Roti Hai Alam Sine Se Liptaae Sakina) X2

tracks.title: Sunta Nahi Hai
tracks.lyrics:
(Haae Sajjad Haae Bimaar) X3

(Sunta Nahi Hai Koi Bimaar Ki Sadaae) X2

  1. (Zaalim Huwa Zamana) X2 Bedard Hai Hawaae

(Sunta Nahi Hai Koi Bimaar Ki Sadaae) X2

  2. Bhaai Ko Apne Roye Matam Kare Padar Ka, Har Ik Kadam Hai Mushkil Us Shaam Ke Safar Kaa, (Sajjad Karbala Mei) X2 Kis Kis Ka Gham Manaae

(Sunta Nahi Hai Koi Bimaar Ki Sadaae) X2

  3. Ek Jhula Jal Raha Hai Maasum Bezubaan Ka, Jhule Ke Saath Dekho Dil Jal Gaya Hai Maa Ka, (Aazaad Haath Hon To) X2 Jhule Ko Who Bhujaae

(Sunta Nahi Hai Koi Bimaar Ki Sadaae) X2

  4. Zainab Ki Ye Dua Hai Karbobala Ke Ban Mei, Laashe Pare Na Dekhe Sajjad Jaake Ran Mei, (Aakar Jalaal Mei Ye) X2 Talwaar Naa Uthaae

(Sunta Nahi Hai Koi Bimaar Ki Sadaae) X2

  5. Sab Kunbaa Kat Gaya Hai Tanhaa Khare Hai Maula, Aankhon Ke Saamne Hai Sibte Nabi Ka Laasha, (Kunbe Pe Mustafa Ke) X2 Umaat Ne Ki Jafaae

(Sunta Nahi Hai Koi Bimaar Ki Sadaae) X2

  6. Har Majlise Azaa Mei Bimaar Mera Maula, Aata Hai Khun Bahaane Aankhon Se Pane Dilka, (Har Matami Ko Apne) X2 Deta Hai Who Duaae

(Sunta Nahi Hai Koi Bimaar Ki Sadaae) X2

  7. Hasrat Hai Eik Dil Mei Jis Roz Ho Qayamat, Nauho Ki Ho Azaane Matam Ki Ho Akaamat, ("Rehan Azmi" Ham) X2 Nawha Yehi Sunaae

(Sunta Nahi Hai Koi Bimaar Ki Sadaae) X2

tracks.title: Haaye Mei Hogayi
tracks.lyrics:
(Haae Faryaad) X6

  1. (Darya Se Kyun Nahi Aaya) X2 Abbas Sa Bhai Mera

Haae Mei Hogayi Beparda, Ye Zulm Huwa Baba, Mei Hogayi Beparda

  2. Who Shame Gharibaan Mei Baba Jalte Huwe Khaimon Ka Manzar, (Ali Ya Ali) X2

Jis Waqt Ridaae Chinti Thi Bimaar Ka Jalta Tha Bistar

(Us Waqt Kahaan The Baba) X2, Jab Koi Na Tha Mera

Haae Mei Hogayi Beparda, Ye Zulm Huwa Baba, Mei Hogayi Beparda

  3. The Auno Mohamed Mere Pisar Don One Kataae Dasht Mei Sar, (Ali Ya Ali) X2

Tha Shukr Ka Sajda Maine Kiya Pohnchi Jo Dare Khaima Pe Khabar

(Qurbaan Kiya Bachon Ko) X2, Bhai Na Bacha Mera

Haae Mei Hogayi Beparda, Ye Zulm Huwa Baba, Mei Hogayi Beparda

  4. Qaasim Ke Lagi Khun Ke Mehndi Sehre Ki Lari Matti Me Mili, (Ali Ya Ali) X2

Paamaal Kiya Ghoro Ne Badan Faryaad Kare Ik Shab Ki Dulhan

(Paamaal Huwa Tha Pyaasa) X2, Qaasim Ka Mere Laasha

Haae Mei Hogayi Beparda, Ye Zulm Huwa Baba, Mei Hogayi Beparda

  5. Chalti Thi Churi Bhai Pe Mere Jaari Tha Meri Aankhon Se Lahu, (Ali Ya Ali) X2

Thi Nehr Kinaare Mashk Pari Saahil Ke Pare The Do Baazu

(Kyun Aap Na Aaye Baba) X2, Mei Roti Rahi Baba

Haae Mei Hogayi Beparda, Ye Zulm Huwa Baba, Mei Hogayi Beparda

  6. Ab Aaye Jab Ghar Khaak Huwa Bhai Bhi Mera Zindaa Na Raha, (Ali Ya Ali) X2

Mei Naade Ali Dohraati Rahi Pohnchi Na Najaf Tak Meri Sada

(Dekhoge Bhala Tum Kaise) X2, Bechadar Sar Mera

Haae Mei Hogayi Beparda, Ye Zulm Huwa Baba, Mei Hogayi Beparda

  7. Sine Pe Jo Shah Ke Soti Thi Bachi Who Bilak Kar Roti Thi, (Ali Ya Ali) X2

Deti Thi Sada Baba Baba Kaano Mei Chubhan Jab Hoti Thi

(Tha Khouf Use Zaalim Ka) X2, Daman Bhi Jala Uska

Haae Mei Hogayi Beparda, Ye Zulm Huwa Baba, Mei Hogayi Beparda

  8. Mei Shaam Chali Hun Roti Huwi Sajjad Ki Aas Bandhaati Hun, (Ali Ya Ali) X2

Nana Ka Din Bachaane Ko Mei Qaide Sitam Mei Jaati Hun

(Sunlo Ye Guzaarish Meri) X2, Nana Se Nahi Kehna

Haae Mei Hogayi Beparda, Ye Zulm Huwa Baba, Mei Hogayi Beparda

  9. "Irfan" Ki Zabaan Se Ye Nawha "Rehan" Sunenge Ehle Azaa, (Ali Ya Ali) X2

Majlis Mei Bapaa Hoga Matam Haq Purse Ka Yun Hoga Adaa

(Har Ankh Karegi Giryaa) X2, Jab Gunjega Nawha

Haae Mei Hogayi Beparda, Ye Zulm Huwa Baba, Mei Hogayi Beparda

tracks.title: Ghazi Ke Baad
tracks.lyrics:
(Ghazi Ke Baad Misle Alamdaar Thi Zainab) X2

  1. Khud Qaafela Aur Qaafela Saalaar Thi Zainab

(Ghazi Ke Baad Misle Alamdaar Thi Zainab) X2

Jab Fouje Huseini Ka Alam Daar Margaya

Mashkiza Khun Mei Baali Sakina Ka Bhar Gaya

Lashkar Uduu Ka Laashon Ko Paamaal Kar Gaya

Karbobala Ka Dard Se Chehra Utar Gaya

(Mouje Faraat) X3 Ranj Ka Ehsaas Bangayi

Zainab Alam Ko Thaamke Abbas Bangayi

  2. Daaman Se Ashk Ponch Ke Haider Ki Laadli

Lekar Haram Qaafela Yun Shaam Ko Chali

Tewar Who The Ke Jaafaare Tayyaar Thi Zainab

(Ghazi Ke Baad Misle Alamdaar Thi Zainab) X2

  3. Chadar Nathi To Baalon Ko Chadar Banaa Liya

Khutbon Ko Dil Malul Ne Khanjar Banaa Liya

Abbas Ke Jalaal Ka Izhaar Thi Zainab

(Ghazi Ke Baad Misle Alamdaar Thi Zainab) X2

  4. Haider Ki Guftugu Ka Sarapa Bani Huwi

Abbas Ke Alam Ka Phareraa Bani Huwi

Bachon Ke Haq Mei Saayaae Diwaar Thi Zainab

(Ghazi Ke Baad Misle Alamdaar Thi Zainab) X2

  5. Ponchi Dayaare Shaam Mei Haider Ki Shaan Se

Naade Ali Ka Wird Tha Jaari Zubaan Se

Soya Huwa Tha Waqt To Bedaar Thi Zainab

(Ghazi Ke Baad Misle Alamdaar Thi Zainab) X2

  6. Khutbon Se Apne Takhte Yazidi Hilaa Diya

Zaalim Ka Taaj Pairon Mei Apne Giraa Diya

Kehne Ko Ranjo Gham Mei Giraftaar Thi Zainab

(Ghazi Ke Baad Misle Alamdaar Thi Zainab) X2

  7. Aayi Palat Ke Shaam Se Karbobala Mei Jab

Dekha Ke Jalti Ret Pe Laashe Pare Hai Sab

Deti Kafan Kahaan Se Ke Laachaar Thi Zainab

(Ghazi Ke Baad Misle Alamdaar Thi Zainab) X2

  8. "Rehan" Farshe Gham Jo Bichaa Hai Hussein Ka

Matam Jo Do Jahaan Mei Bapaa Hai Hussein Ka

Dunya Mei Pehli Sheh Ki Azadar Thi Zainab

(Ghazi Ke Baad Misle Alamdaar Thi Zainab) X2

tracks.title: Amma Kaha Thi
tracks.lyrics:
Raavi Bayaan Karta Hai Pur Dard Waaqea

Ehle Haram Ka Qaafela Jab Shaam Ko Chala

Who Neza Jispe Tha Sare Mazloome Karbala

Naagaah Ik Muqaam Par Aakar Theher Gaya

Aawaaz Di Bahan Ko Qayamat Guzar Gayi

Zainab Meri Sakina To Naake Se Gir Gayi

Zainab Sukhan Ye Sunke Imame Gharib Ka Bechain Hoke Phir Ti Thi Sehra Mei Jaa
Bajaan

Dekha Ke Ik Zaeefa Hai Aafat Mei Mubtila

Godi Mei Uski Sar Hai Sakina Ka Yun Rakha

Kehti Hai Tu Jahaan Hai Meri Jaan Wahaan Hun Mei

Mat Ghair Mujko Jaaniyo Zainab Ke Maa Hun Mei

Zainab Ne Maa Ko Dekh Ke Be Saakhta Kahaa

Amma Kahaan Thi Tum

Are Kat Taa Tha Jis Gari Mere Shabbir Ka Gala

(Amma Kahaan Thi Tum) X6

  1. Amman Na Baazuon Pe Mere Tum Nazar Karo

Baalon Se Apna Chehra Chupaae Hu Dekhlo

Itna Bataao Ghore Se Abbas Jab Gira

(Amma Kahaan Thi Tum) X4

  2. Ik Do Ka Gham Nahi Hai Bahattar Ka Daagh Hai

Gere Zamine Karbobala Har Charaag Hai

Jab Gul Charaage Panjatane Paak Hogaya

(Amma Kahaan Thi Tum) X4

  3. Barchi Sitam Ki Sinaae Akber Mei Jab Lagi

Dam Tor Te Jawaan Ko Maa Dekhti Rahi

Jab Mit Rahi Thi Dasht Mei Tasweere Mustafa

(Amma Kahaan Thi Tum) X4

  4. Do Laal Mere Auno Mohammad The Jinke Naam

Pyaase The Dono Qatl Huwe Dono Tashna Qaam

Sadqa Jab Apne Bhai Pe Maine Unhe Kiyaa

(Amma Kahaan Thi Tum) X4

  5. Asghar Sa Sheer Khwaar Tarap Taa Guzar Gaya

Maasum Bezubaan Ko Paani Nahi Mila

Cheda Gaya Tha Teer Se Asghar Ka Jab Gala

(Amma Kahaan Thi Tum) X4

  6. Zainab Ke Bain Sunke Pukaari Who Dil Fighaar

Paigam Nasida Tujpe Ho Madar Teri Nisaar

Mei Saath Saath Hun Tere Tune Ye Kya Kahaa

(Amma Kahaan Thi Tum) X4

  7. "Rehan Azmi" Teri Bakshish To Hashr Mei

Mumkin Hai Sayyada Se Ye Binte Ali Kahe

Jab Kabr Mei Raihaan Pe Mushkil Ka Waqt Tha

(Amma Kahaan Thi Tum) X4

tracks.title: Aajaao Ali Asghar
tracks.lyrics:
(Aajaao Aliasghar) X4

(Tumhe Loriyaa De Madar) X2

  1. (Maa Jhula Jhulaati Hai Asghar Ko Khayaalon Mei) X2

Aur Loriyaan Deti Hai Is Laal Ko Khwaabon Mei

(Aajaao Aliasghar) X2

(Tumhe Loriyaa De Madar) X2

  2. Ai Laal Tujhe Khokar Mujhe Neend Nahi Aati

Ab Gham Ke Siwaa Beta Kuch Bhi To Nahi Baaqi

Hai Raat Ka Andhyaara Tuj Bin To Ujaalon Mei

(Aajaao Aliasghar) X2

(Tumhe Loriyaa De Madar) X2

  3. Mei Paani Pilaaungi Tu Lout Ke Ghar Aaja

Dekhungi Kahaan Tak Mei Ai Laal Tera Rasta

Asghar Mei Sulaaungi Lekar Tujhe Baahon Mei

(Aajaao Aliasghar) X2

(Tumhe Loriyaa De Madar) X2

  4. Jangal Hai Bayabaa(N) Hai Aur Dhup Kaai Beta

Aise Mei Tumhe Gharse Jaane Ki Pari Beta

Beithungi Nahi Mei Bhi Tere Binaa Chaaon Mei

(Aajaao Aliasghar) X2

(Tumhe Loriyaa De Madar) X2

tracks.title: Abbas Mere Sar Ki Qasam Kha
tracks.lyrics:
Abbas

Ghar Se Chale Jab Behre Safar, (Sibte Payambar) X2

Kehne Lagi Abbas Ki Madar, (Shere Dilawar) X2

Eik Nasihat Karti Hu(N) Me, (Ay Mere Dilbar) X2

Gham Koi Bhi Shabbir Ke Ayega Nahi Paas, Abbas

Ujrega Na Zehra Ka Bhara Ghar, Abbas Mere Sar Ki Qasam Kha

(Abbas Mere Sar Ki Qasam Kha) X2 Abbas

  1. Ay Buzu-E Shabbir Wafadar Qasam Kha,

Ujrega Nahi Zehra Ka Gharbar Qasam Kha,

Rakh Haath Mere Sar Pe Tu Ik Baar Qasam Kha, Abbas,

Aaqa Pe Fida Hoga Tera Sar

(Abbas Mere Sar Ki Qasam Kha) X2 Abbas

  2. Jab Tak Tera Shano Pe Rakha He Ye Tera Sar,

Ayenge Nahi Khayma-E Sarwar Me Sitaghar,

Gar Aaye Su-E Khayma Laeeno Ka Wo Lashkar, Abbas

Jaa(N) De Ke Bachana Hai Tujhe Ghar

(Abbas Mere Sar Ki Qasam Kha) X2 Abbas

  3. Ye Bazu Nigehbaan Hai Zainab Ki Rida Ke,

Narghe Ho Agar Charo Taraf Ehle Jafa Ke,

Tu Rakhega Shehzadi Ko Parde Me Chhupa Ke, Abbas

Jaegi Na Shehzadi Ki Chadar

(Abbas Mere Sar Ki Qasam Kha) X2 Abbas

  4. Saqa Hai Tu Saqayi Pe Jaa(N) Apni Lutana,

Pyasi Ho Agar Aal-E-Nabi Paani Pilana,

Din Raat Sakina Ko Kaleje Se Lagana, Abbas

Roegi Na Shabbir Ki Dukhtar

(Abbas Mere Sar Ki Qasam Kha) X2 Abbas

  5. Kar Wada Ke Ye Qafla Hargiz Na Lutega,

Jis Tarha Chala Ghar Se Ye Waisa Hi Milenga,

Ye Jhula Bhi Aur Jhoolne Wala Bhi Rahenga, Abbas

Ajayenge Ghar Laut Ke Asghar

(Abbas Mere Sar Ki Qasam Kha) X2 Abbas

  6. Doran-E-Safar Dhyan Rahe Ehle Haram Ka,

Har Waqt Unhe Saya Mile Tere Alam Ka,

Ik Pal Bhi Na Sadat Ko Ehsas Ho Gham Ka, Abbas

Na Dhup Parhegi Kabhi Unpar

(Abbas Mere Sar Ki Qasam Kha) X2 Abbas

  7. Ye Baat Mere Laal Tujhe Bhi To Khabar Hai,

Tu Fatema Zehra Ki Duawo(N) Ka Samar Hai,

Sarwar Ho Agar Dhup Me Tu Misle Shajar Hai, Abbas

Khanjar Na Chalega Shahe Dee(N) Par

(Abbas Mere Sar Ki Qasam Kha) X2 Abbas

  8. Phir "Mazhar-O-Irfan" Ye Bola Wo Dilawar,

Ye Jaan Bhi Qurban Hai Zehra Ke Pisar Par,

Kyu(N) Aap Ye Kehti Hai Meri Madar-E-Muztar, Abbas

Lut Jaye Na Zehra Ka Bhara Ghar

tracks.title: Allahu Akbar
tracks.lyrics:
(Allahu Akbar Allahu Akbar) X2

(Subhe Aashoor Zara Sun Azaan-E-Akbar Hai) X2

  1. Laila Ke Phool Ki

Shakle Rasool Ki

Azaane Aakhir Hai

Subhe Aashoor Zara Sun Azaane Akbar He

(Allahu Akbar) X2

(Ashhadu Al-La Illaha Illallah) X2

  2. Bol-E-Hussain Sun Kar Takbeer Ki Sada Ko

Bejang Tumne Akbar Jeeta Hai Karbala Ko

Lehjaa Ye Mustafa Ka Ab Gunjta Rahega

Jo Tere Lab Par Hai

Subhe Aashoor Zara Sun Azaane Akbar He

(Allahu Akbar) X2

(Ashhadu Anna Muhammadur Rasoolullah) X2

  3. Sar Par Kafan Sajaaye Hein Sab Ba Sab Namaazi

Sun Kar Azaan Iqaamat Kehne Lage Hein Ghazi

Hein Mutma'in Imamat Nazdeek Hai Shahadat

Ye Subhe Mehshar He

Subhe Aashoor Zara Sun Azaane Akbar He

(Allahu Akbar) X2

Ashhadu Anna Alliyun Waliyullah

Ashhadu Anna Alliyun Hujjatullah

  4. Kya Azm Hosla Hai Ansar Shah-E-Dee(N) Ka

He Us Taraf Jafaayein Sajda Idhar Yaqee(N) Ka

Teeron Ka Abr Barsa Jaari Hai Phir Bhi Sajda

Ajeeb Manzar Hai

Subhe Aashoor Zara Sun Azaane Akbar Hai

(Allahu Akbar) X2

(Hayya Alas Salaah) X2

  5. Jhoole Mein Sone Waala Bedaar Hochuka He

Nusrat Ko Shah-E-Dee(N) Ki Tayyar Hochuka He

Maa Kehrahi Hai Beta Be Teygh Jang Karna

Ye Hukm-E-Maadar He

Subhe Aashoor Zara Sun Azaane Akbar He

(Allahu Akbar) X2

(Hayya Alal Falaah) X2

  6. Zainab Bhi Laadlon Ko Apne Saja Rahi Hai

Ibn-E-Hasan Ko Farwa Dulha Banaa Rahi Hai

Naad-E-Ali Hai Lab Par Sar Par Dua Ki Chaadar

Ye Sheh Ka Lashkar Hai

Subhe Aashoor Zara Sun Azaane Akbar He

(Allahu Akbar) X2

(Hayya Ala Khairil Amal) X2

  7. Pyaason Ko Apni Jaanib Darya Bulaa Raha Hai

Lekin Har Eik Pyaasa Maqtal Ko Jaa Raha Hai

Na Khof Hai Na Dar Hai Har Ek Ko Ye Khabar Hai

Ye Raahe Kausar Hai

Subhe Aashoor Zara Sun Azaane Akbar He

(Allahu Akbar) X2

(Allahu Akbar) X2

  8. "Rehan" Ke Qalam Se "Irfan" Tera Lehja,
Nowho(N) Me Dhal Ke Ubhre Tute Na Ab Ye Rishta,
Is Par Dua-E-Zehra Har Dam Kiye Hai Saya
Ye Aisa Shaa'ir Hai

Subhe Aashoor Zara Sun Azaane Akbar He

(Allahu Akbar) X2

(La Illaha Illallah) X2

tracks.title: Ghar Chalo Bhai Mehndi Laga Lo
tracks.lyrics:
Haay, Shaame Aashur Jab Rote Rote Ghash Khaagayi Sakina

Khwaab Mein Dekhti Hai Sakina

Bhaiya Qaasim Ka Aya He Sehra

Jab Na Aaya Nazar Usko Dulha

Are Maqtal Mein Usko Dhundne Nikli Woh Jaa Ba Jaa

(Nagaah Usko Laasha-E-Qasim Nazar Aaya) X2

(Laashe Qasim Pe Boli Sakina, Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo) X2

  1. (Ghar Mein Shaadi Ki Masnad Bichhi He) X2

Fatima Kubra Dulhan Bani He

Dhoom Shaadi Ki Ran Mein Machi He

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

Laashe Kaasim Pe Boli Sakina

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

  2. (Manqabat Dada Haider Ki Parh Kar) X2

Haath Mein Tera Sehra Utha Kar

Tujhko Awaaz Deti He Khahar

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

Laashe Kaasim Pe Boli Sakina

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

  3. (Ye Ghari Mujhko Rab Ne Dikhaayi) X2

Aaj Hai Teri Rasme Hinaai

Neg Mehndi Ka Dena He Bhaai

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

Laashe Kaasim Pe Boli Sakina

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

  4. (Kaisa Kubra Ka Bigra Muqaddar) X2

Siyaah Kapre Hai Uske Badan Par

Kyun Ye Kehti Hun Mein Ban Mein Ro Kar

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

Laashe Kaasim Pe Boli Sakina

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

  5. (Jis Ghari Tuta Khwaab-E-Sakina) X2

Khud Ko Usne Sar-E-Dasht Paaya

Peet Ke Sar Pukaari Woh Dukhya

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

Laashe Kaasim Pe Boli Sakina

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

  6. (Hai Phupi Ke Labon Par Ye Nauha) X2

Hogaya Qatl Maqtal Mein Dulha

Raegaa(N) He Mera Ab Ye Kehna

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

Laashe Kaasim Pe Boli Sakina

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

  7. (Amma Farwa Ko Kaise Sambhaalun) X2

Kis Tarha Mei Tasalli Unhe Du(N)

Pehle Khud Ko Ye Kehke Sambhaalo

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

Laashe Kaasim Pe Boli Sakina

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

  8. (Dasht Mein Tha Jo Pur Dard Manzar) X2

Kehrahi Paaye Irfaano Mazhar

Kaanpti Thi Zamee(N) Bas Ye Sunkar

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

Laashe Kaasim Pe Boli Sakina

Ghar Chalo Bhaai Mehndi Lagaalo

tracks.title: Pani Le Aao Aamo Jaan
tracks.lyrics:
Jaan Sakina Ki Jab Aayi Labo(N) Par,

Suka Huwa Mashkiza Layi Wo Muztar,

(Dekha Bari Yaas Se Bachi Ne Chacha Ko) X2,

Daste Adab Jhor Ke Kehne Lagi Rokar,

  1. Lelo Mashko Alam Tumko Meri Qasam,

Awo Diladu Me Izne Shehe Umam,

Rakhlo Sakina Ka Ye Maa(N)

(Paani Layawo Amu Jaa(N)) X3

  2. Hasrat He Yaas Is Darja Pyaas Hai,

(Kya Meri Pyaas Ka Tumko Ehsas Hai) X2

Ayi Labo(N) Pe Ab Ye Jaa(N)

(Paani Layawo Amu Jaa(N)) X3

  3. Bache Tashnajigar Bethe Hai Nawha Ghar,

(Pyaas Ke Chhale Hai In Sab Ke Honto Par) X2

Pyaaso(N) Ke Tumho Nigehbaa(N)

(Paani Layawo Amu Jaa(N)) X3

  4. Alatash Ki Sada Sunti Hai Alqama,

(Sunte Hai Mashkize Nawha Sakina Ka) X2

Gar Tumko Pyaaso(N) Ka Hai Dhya(N)

(Paani Layawo Amu Jaa(N)) X3

  5. Nazish-E-Karbala Tumho Fakhre Wafa,

(Pyaaso(N) Ki Aas Ho Phuphiyo(N) Ki Ho Rida) X2

Lillah Sherena Yazda(N)

(Paani Layawo Amu Jaa(N)) X3

  6. Jawo Hafiz Khuda Misle Khaybar Khusha,

(Darya Ko Cheen Kar Bharlena Mashkiza) X2

Bazuwe Sayede Zeesha(N)

(Paani Layawo Amu Jaa(N)) X3

  7. Wada Nibhana Hai Darya Pe Jaana Hai

(Paani Bhi Lana Tumko Bhi Aana Hai) X2

Tum Mujhpe Me Tumpe Qurba(N)

(Paani Layawo Amu Jaa(N)) X3

  8. Sakina Meri Pyaari Sakina, Sakina, Meri Pyari Sakina

Sunkar Bhatiji Ki Baat Shere Jari,

(Bola Qurban Hai Tumpar Ye Jaa(N) Meri) X2

Tum Jo Kehti Ho Meri Jaa(N)

(Paani Layawo Amu Jaa(N)) X3

  9. Mange "Mazhar" Dua Rab-E-Mushkilkhusha,

(Roze Mehshar Kahe Tujhse Khayrun Nisa) X2

Nawha Suna Wohi "Irfa(N)"

(Paani Layawo Amu Jaa(N)) X3

tracks.title: Qulla Asalukum
tracks.lyrics:
Aoodhu Billahi Minash Shaitaanir Rajeem

Bismillahir Rahmaanir Rahim

Harbul Li Man Haarabahum

(Wa Silmul Li Man Saalamahum) X2

Aduwwul Li Man Aata Hum

(Wa Muhibbul Liman Ahabbahum) X2

Isiliye To Apne Nabi Se Kehta Hai Allah

(Qul La Asalukum Alaihi Ajran Illal Mawaddata Fil Qurba) X2

  1. Hukme Khuda Quran Me Ayaa

Ajre Risaalat Maanglo Apna

Mere Nabbi-E-Haq He Tumhara

Yaani Mawaddat Ehle Qurba

(Qul La Asalukum Alaihi Ajran Illal Mawaddata Fil Qurba) X2

  2. Inse Adaawat Mujhse Adaawat

Inse Muhabbat Mujhse Muhabbat

Hoga Wahi Mehroome Shifa-At

Jisne Bhi Inko Dukh Pohonchaya

(Qul La Asalukum Alaihi Ajran Illal Mawaddata Fil Qurba) X2

  3. Midhat O Girya Majlis O Matam

Yaani Rajab Shabaan O Muharram

Inki Khushi Aur Inka Har Gham

Ajre Risaalat Iske Siwaa Kya

(Qul La Asalukum Alaihi Ajran Illal Mawaddata Fil Qurba) X2

  4. Inka Madeena Inka He Kaaba

Jannat He Inki Kauthar Inka

Waarise Adam Waarise Isa

Kehdo Nabi Man Kunto Maula

(Qul La Asalukum Alaihi Ajran Illal Mawaddata Fil Qurba) X2

  5. Qaule Nabi Irshaade Khuda Ko

Kisne Nibhaya Kaisa Dekho

Sibte Nabi Par Rone Waalo

Kya Kehta He Aakhri Sajda

(Qul La Asalukum Alaihi Ajran Illal Mawaddata Fil Qurba) X2

  6. Ajre Risaalat Bandishe Paani

Ajre Risaalat Ye Mehmaani

Gardane Sheh Khanjar Ki Rawaani

Kehta Raha Har Khun Ka Qatra

(Qul La Asalukum Alaihi Ajran Illal Mawaddata Fil Qurba) X2

  7. Apna He Ye "Irfan" Aqeeda

Shah Ka Gham Na Ruka Na Rukega

Kaise Ruke "Rehan" Ye Girya

Isme He Shaamil Rabbe Kaba

(Qul La Asalukum Alaihi Ajran Illal Mawaddata Fil Qurba) X2

tracks.title: Ye Hussaini Kaafla
tracks.lyrics:
(Chehlum Karke Hussain Ka) X2

Maqtal Se Chala Kaafila

Zainab Ne Di Sadaa

Ay Mere Sajjad Sun Kafla Salaar Sun

Ye Hussaini Kaafla Tu Watan Tak Leke Jaa

  1. Haay - Majlise Chehlume Shabbir Sare Dashte Bala

Kar Chuke Ehle Haram Girya O Maatam Barpa

(Kaasimo Akbaro Abbas Ka Pursa Bhi Diya) X2

Ye To Sab Hogaya Ek Kaam Bacha He Tera

Ay Mere Sajjad Sun Kafla Salaar Sun

Ye Hussaini Kaafla Tu Watan Tak Leke Jaa

  2. Haay - Jaanti Hun Ke Ghamo Ranj Se Lachar He Tu

Yaad Mein Baali Sakina Ki Giriftaar He Tu

(Meri Tarha Se Bahattar Ka Azadar He Tu) X2

Kaarwaane Shahe Mazloom Ka Salaar He Tu

Ay Mere Sajjad Sun Kafla Salaar Sun

Ye Hussaini Kaafla Tu Watan Tak Leke Jaa

  3. Haay - Yun To Ye Kaam Bhi Karsakti Hun Mein Tashna Jigar

Qalbe Zainab Ki Yehi Aakhri Khwahish He Magar

(Ek Imam Aaya Tha Hum Sab Ko Watan Se Lekar) X2

Ek Imam Apne Dilafghaaron Ko Lejaaye Ghar

Ay Mere Sajjad Sun Kafla Salaar Sun

Ye Hussaini Kaafla Tu Watan Tak Leke Jaa

  4. Haay - Apne Nana Ko Ye Rudad Sunane Ke Liye

Zakhm Pardes Mein Jo Paaye Dikhaane Ke Liye

(Dadi Zehra Ko Har Ek Baat Bataane Ke Liye) X2

Fatima Sughra Ko Seene Se Lagaane Ke Liye

Ay Mere Sajjad Sun Kafla Salaar Sun

Ye Hussaini Kaafla Tu Watan Tak Leke Jaa

  5. Haay - Wada Shabbir Ka He Beta Agar Yaad Tujhe

Dil Se Ay Beta Bhulaani He Har Uftaad Tujhe

(Laaj Rakhni He Meri Sayyade Sajjad Tujhe) X2

Phir Se Nana Ka Shehr Karna He Abaad Tujhe

Ay Mere Sajjad Sun Kafla Salaar Sun

Ye Hussaini Kaafla Tu Watan Tak Leke Jaa

  6. Haay - Naqsh Is Dil Pe Mere Laal Musibat He Teri

Ruh Ke Zakhmon Men Pewast Azziat He Teri

(Jo Hua So Woh Huwa Beta Ye Kismet He Teri) X2

Ab Bhi Nana Ke Madeene Ko Zaroorat He Teri

Ay Mere Sajjad Sun Kafla Salaar Sun

Ye Hussaini Kaafla Tu Watan Tak Leke Jaa

  7. Haay - Dekh Ay Laal Ye Tujhko Bhi He Mujh Ko Bhi Yaqeen

Khoon Royegi Mere Haal Pe Yathrib Ki Zameen

(Fatima Sughra Ka Mein Saamna Karsakti Nahin) X2

Isliye Kehti Hun Tujhse Ay Mere Maah Jabeen

Ay Mere Sajjad Sun Kafla Salaar Sun

Ye Hussaini Kaafla Tu Watan Tak Leke Jaa

  8. Haay - Haaye Kya Mazharo Irfan Qayamat Thi Bapa

Peet Kar Seena O Sar Karte The Saadat Buka

(Baap Ki Kabr Se Woh Kaafla Salaar Utha) X2

Thaam Kar Baazue Sajjad Jo Zainab Ne Kaha

Ay Mere Sajjad Sun Kafla Salaar Sun

Ye Hussaini Kaafla Tu Watan Tak Leke Jaa

tracks.title: Manam Safeer-E-Aza
tracks.lyrics:
Bar Muhammad Wa Aal-E-Muhammad Salawaat

Allahuma Salle Ala Muhammadin Wa Aal-E-Muhammad

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 Manam Safeer-E-Karbala

  1. Zamee(N) Pe Hamko Bhejkar (Nabi Se Rabne Kehdiya) X2

Yahi To Hai Wo Kaam Jo Karengi Zikr-E-Karbala

Qabila Inka Eik Hai, Wasila Inka Eik Hai

Hussain Ke Hai Matami Jo Kehrahe Hai Par Mala

Maa(N) Ki Godi Mei Suni Mene Ye Nawho(N) Ki Azaan

Gutniyo(N) Chalne Jo Paaya To Mila Farsh-E-Aza

Sheer-E-Madar Se Mere Khun Mei Ye Baat Basi

Jab Talak Saans Rahe, Jaari Rahe Lab Pe Sada

Manam Safeer-E-Aza

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

  2. Labo(N) Pe Hai Yahi Sada, (Mujhe Hai Fakhr Bakhuda) X2

Sabab Mere Wujood Ka Bani Dua-E-Sayyeda

To Kyu(N) Na Jaawu(N) Har Jaga, Bara-E-Majlis-E-Aza

Sikaarte Aza Ka Kaam Sayyeda Ne De Diya

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

  3. Suno(N) Mere Hussayniyo, (Meri Sada Mei Saath Do) X2

Nadeem-E-Shaah-E-Karbala Jo Mei Bhi Hu(N) Jo Tum Bhi Ho

Kaho Ye Baat Har Jaga, Saja Ke Lab Pe Karbala

Tumhaare Khu(N) Ki Eik Eik Bund Se Uthe Sada

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

  4. Gineez Book Hai Cheez Kya (Falak Pe Likha Jaayenga) X2

Tumhaara Naam Aur Iska Saath Safeer-E-Aza

Magar Bas Eik Shart Hai, Zabaa(N) Tumhaari Jab Khule

Sunaao(N) Maqsad-E-Hussain Bas Ye Kehke Har Jaga

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

  5. Jo Hai Yazeed Ke Pisar (Zabaa(N) Kaat De Agar) X2

Lahu Se Ik Sada Uthe, Kare Hawaao(N) Mei Safar

Yazeed Ke Sipaahiyo(N), Suno Meri Sada Suno

Tumhare Bas Ki Baat Hi Nahi Ke Mujhko Do Qaza

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

  6. Hamari Dars Gaah Ka (Pata Hai Sirf Karbala) X2

Hamara Dil Pe Hukmaraan Hai Pisaar Batool Ka

Jahaa(N) Bhi Ham Rakhe Qadam, Rahenga Dosh Par Alam

Alam Utha Ke Bawafa Ka Ham Kahenge Har Jaga

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

  7. Sikhaaya Waalidayn Ne (Lahu Pe Tere Qarz Hai) X2

Ye Zikr-E-Shaah-E-Karbala Labo(N) Pe Har Ghari Rahe

Charaagh-E-Haq Jaalaye Jaa, Zamane Ko Bataaye Jaa

Mei Zakir-E-Hussain Hu(N), Hasab Nasab Hai Ye Mera

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

  8. Meyaan-E-Dasht-E-Karbala (Har Ik Shaheed-E-Basafa) X2

Badan Pe Teer Khaa Ke De Raha Tha Bas Yahi Sada

Shaheed-E-Tashnakaam Hu(N), Hussain Ka Ghulaam Hu(N)

Meri Hayaat Ka Do Aam, Hai Yahi Laqab Mera

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

  9. Wo Bint-E-Shaah-E-La Fatah (Huwi Jo Qayd Se Riha) X2

To Usne Qayd-E-Zulm Mei Manaaya Gham Hussain Ka

Wo Pehli Majlis-E-Aza, Bapa Huwi To Ye Kaha

Hussain Tu Gawaah Hai, Bani Hu(N) Baad-E-Karbala

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

  10. Sada Hai Ye "Irfan" Ki (Suno To "Mazhar Abidi") X2

Gham-E-Hussain Ke Liye Hai Waqf Meri Zindagi

Jahaa(N) Talaq Mere Khuda, Karengi Zindagi Wafa

Mere Badan Se Ruh Se Lahu Se Aayengi Sada

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

(Manam Safeer-E-Aza) X2 (Manam Safeer-E-Karbala) X2

tracks.title: Sham E Ghareeban
tracks.lyrics:
Kaisi Qayamat Laikar Aayi, Dasht-E-Balaa Mai Sham-E-Gharibaa(N)

Saani-E-Zehra Thi Pehre Par, Tashna Dahan Ba Haale Parishaa(N)

Aaye Ali, Jab Dashte Balaa Mai, Baap Ko Beti Ne Pehchaana

Phenk Diya Tuta Huwa Neza, Kadmon Me Ghir Kar Boli Who Dukhiya

Yeh Dekhiye Kya Haal Hai, Awlaade Nabi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

Yeh Dekhiye Kya Haal Hai, Awlaade Nabi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

  1. Aap Aagaye Is Dasht Mei, Accha Kiya Baba

Khud Dekhiye Kis Haal Mei, Hai Aapka Kunba

Hai Baap Kisi Ka Yahaa(N), Beta Hai Kisi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

Yeh Dekhiye Kya Haal Hai, Awlaade Nabi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

  2. Paamaal Huwa Dil Mera, Qasim Ki Tarha Se

Saughaat Mujhe Kya Mili, Is Karbobala Se

Kaata Hai Pas-E-Pusht Se, Sar Mere Akhi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

Yeh Dekhiye Kya Haal Hai, Awlaade Nabi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

  3. Khaimo(N) Ki Bachi Raakh Hai, Saadaat Ka Bistar

Kya Soyegi Is Raakh Par, Shabbir Ki Dukhtar

Ye Jalti Huwi Ret Hai, Gehwaara Kisi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

Yeh Dekhiye Kya Haal Hai, Awlaade Nabi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

  4. Paivast Mere Qalb Mei, Barchhi Ki Ani Hai

Zainab Ki Toh Is Dasht Mei, Jaagir Luti Hai

Who Dekhiye Laasha Mere, Hamshakle Nabi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

Yeh Dekhiye Kya Haal Hai, Awlaade Nabi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

  5. Ay Baba Usse Khaagaye, Gham Karbobala Ke

Paala Tha Jisse Aapne, Saaye Mei Abaa Ke

Hai Dasht Mei Begoro Kafan, Laasha Ussi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

Yeh Dekhiye Kya Haal Hai, Awlaade Nabi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

  6. Maanga Tha Jisse Aapne, Khaaliq Se Dua Mei

Matam Hai Ussi Sheyr Ka, Maqtal Ki Fazaa Mei

Gham Khagaya Uss Sheyr Ko, Bas Tashna Labi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

Yeh Dekhiye Kya Haal Hai, Awlaade Nabi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

  7. "Mazhar" Yeh Bayaa(N) Sunte Hii, Rone Lagaa Irfa(N)

Thi Aale Nabi Dasht Mei, Kis Darja Pareshaa(N)

Yeh Dekh Ke Tukre Huwa, Dil Gham Se Ali Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

Yeh Dekhiye Kya Haal Hai, Awlaade Nabi Ka

Matam Hai Bapaa Dasht Mei, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

Abbas-E-Jari Ka, Abbas-E-Jari Ka

tracks.title: Khat-E-Sughra
tracks.lyrics:
Haaye Sughra, Udaasi Ghar Mai Nauha Khwaan Thi

Haaye Sughra, Shabihe Zehra Pareshaan Thi

Haaye Sughra, Jab Yaad Sataane Lagi Ahl-O-Ayaal Ki

Sughra Ne Ik Charaagh Jalakar, Baba Ko Khat Likha

  1. (Watan Mai Chhorgaye, Apni Shahzadi Ko) X2

Hamaare Baad Khushi Koi, Jab Manaaenge

(Ay Baba Ham Bhi Tumhe Yaad Bohot Aayenge) X3

  2. Salaam Bheja Hai Sughra Ne, Bas Yehi Kehkar

Na Maut Aayi Na Tum Aaye, Na Ali Akber

Parinde Lout Ke Jab Bhi, Gharon Ko Jaaenge

(Ay Baba Ham Bhi Tumhe Yaad Bohot Aaenge) X3

  3. Yeh Baap Beti Ki Ulfat Toh, Kam Nahin Hogi

Dukhe Huwe Mere Iss Dil Ko, Hai Sukun Yehi

Ghale Se Baali Sakina Ko, Jab Lagaaenge

(Ay Baba Ham Bhi Tumhe Yaad Bohot Aaenge) X3

  4. Mera Shabihe Nabi Akber, Jab Azaa(N) Dega

Zohr Ho Fajr Ho Maghrib Ho, Asr Ho Ke Isha

Namaz Parhte Jo Daste, Dua Uthaayenge

(Ay Baba Ham Bhi Tumhe Yaad Bohot Aaenge) X3

  5. Chalaa Tha Ghar Se Safar Ko Jo, Kaarwaa(N) Mera

Humak Ke Gowdi Me Aaya Tha, Bezubaa(N) Mera

Jab Aap Jhulaa Mere Bhai, Ka Julaaenge

(Ay Baba Ham Bhi Tumhe Yaad Bohot Aaenge) X3

  6. Chacha Bhatiji Ki Ulfat Toh, Yaad Hai Baba

Alam Ke Saaye Mai Rehti Thi, Fatema Sughra

Mere Chacha Ka Alam Jab, Wahaa(N) Sajaaenge

(Ay Baba Ham Bhi Tumhe Yaad Bohot Aaenge) X3

  7. Safar Pe Jaane Se Pehle Yeh, Baat Hoti Thi

Ke Sab Se Pehle Dulhan Aaye, Ghar Mai Qasim Ki

Jab Aap Dasht Mai Dulha, Usse Banaaenge

(Ay Baba Ham Bhi Tumhe Yaad Bohot Aaenge) X3

  8. Yeh Itminaan Mere Baba, Hai Mere Dil Ko

Koi Kaniz Ho Kubra Ho, Ya Sakina Ho

Kisi Ko Pyaar Se Jab Bhi, Ridaa Urhaaenge

(Ay Baba Ham Bhi Tumhe Yaad Bohot Aaenge) X3

  9. Safar Mai Eid Jab Aayegi, Sayyed-E-Zeesha(N)

Chacha Ho Aap Ho Akber Ho, Ya Phuphi Amma(N)

Sakina Bibi Ko Jab, Baaliya(N) Penaaenge

(Ay Baba Ham Bhi Tumhe Yaad Bohot Aaenge) X3

  10. Jo Khat Mai Bayn The Sughra Ke, "Mazhar-O-Irfa(N)"

Pisar Ki Laash Pe Parhte The, Sayyed-E-Zeesha(N)

(Watan Mai Chhodgaye Apni Shahzadi Ko) X2

Hamaare Baad Khushi Koi Jab Manaaenge

(Ay Baba Ham Bhi Tumhe Yaad Bohot Aaenge) X3

tracks.title: Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa
tracks.lyrics:
(Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa) X4

Chu Raha Hai Aasmaa(N) Tera Nishaa(N)

Momino(N) Pe Saayebaa(N) Tera Nishaa(N)

Tera Nishaa(N), Lashkar Ki Shaa(N)

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

(Tera Nishaa(N)) X2 (Lashkar Ki Shaa(N)) X2

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

  1. Ay Jaan-E-Haider, Zahra Ke Bete

(Parcham Uthaana Sikha Hai Tujhse) X2

Aaye Hawaa Jab Tere Alam Se

(Ye Dil Ye Jaa(N)) X2 Ho Yak Zabaa(N)

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

(Tera Nishaa(N)) X2 (Lashkar Ki Shaa(N)) X2

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

  2. Aath Muharram Ham Yu(N) Manaaye

(Bacho(N) Ko Apne Saqqa Banaaye) X2

Sharbat Pe Teri Nazre Dilaaye

(Zainab Ka Maa(N)) X2 Sarwar Ki Jaa(N)

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

(Tera Nishaa(N)) X2 (Lashkar Ki Shaa(N)) X2

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

  3. Baab-Ul-Hawaaij, Tera Laqab Hai

(Abhi Wafaao(N) Ka Tu Hi Rab Hai) X2

Wo Baat Kehdu Jo Zeyr-E-Lab Hai

(Shah-E-Zeeshaa(N)) X2 Rab-E-Subhaa(N)

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

(Tera Nishaa(N)) X2 (Lashkar Ki Shaa(N)) X2

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

  4. Mashko Alam Hai Teri Nishaani

(Ye Shor-E-Darya Ke Hai Mahaani) X2

Tere Qaside Parhta Hai Paani

(Saara Jahaa(N)) X2 Mere Mehmaa(N)

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

(Tera Nishaa(N)) X2 (Lashkar Ki Shaa(N)) X2

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

  5. Kehta Hai Sabse Teri Kahaani

(Ye Charta Suraj, Ye Behta Paani) X2

Gunji Dahaari Tashnadahani

(Bole Har Aa(N)) X2 Fakhr-E-Azan

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

(Tera Nishaa(N)) X2 (Lashkar Ki Shaa(N)) X2

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

  6. Dekha Julooso(N) Mei Hamne Aksar

(Dhoop Ki Shiddat Aayi Jo Sar Par) X2

Tere Alam Ke Saaye Me Aakar

(Hai Yak Zabaa(N)) X2 Peer-O-Jawaa(N)

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

(Tera Nishaa(N)) X2 (Lashkar Ki Shaa(N)) X2

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

  7. Tera Alam Jab Ley Aaye Sarwar

(Kulsoom Royi Sheh Se Lipat Kar) X2

Hasrat Se Dekhi, Zainab Ne Chadar

(The Tashna Kaa(N)) X2 Marsiya Khwaa(N)

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

(Tera Nishaa(N)) X2 (Lashkar Ki Shaa(N)) X2

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

  8. Ay Mere Ghazi, Ay Ibn-E-Haider

(Teri Ata Se Likhta Hai "Mazhar") X2

Kehta Hai Teri, Chawkhat Pe Aakar

(Tera "Irfa(N)") X2 Har Nawha Khwaa(N)

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

(Tera Nishaa(N)) X2 (Lashkar Ki Shaa(N)) X2

Tere Qurbaan Alamdaar-E-Wafa

tracks.title: Chale Aao Baba
tracks.lyrics:
(Chale Aao Baba, Chale Aao Baba, Chale Aao Baba) X2

Sunaati Hai Mujhko Phuphijaan Kahaani, Karun Kya Magar Neend Aati Nahin Hai

(Chale Aao Baba, Chale Aao Baba, Mujhe Khaak Par Neend Aati Nahi Hai) X2

  1. Kaleje Mai Uthta Hai Ik Dard Aisa,

Ke Jiske Liye Na Dawaa Na Dilaasa

Mai Kal Tak Toh Sine Pe Soti Thi Baba,

Yehi Soch Kar, Neend Aati Nahin Hai

(Chale Aao Baba, Chale Aao Baba, Mujhe Khaak Par Neend Aati Nahi Hai) X 2

  2. Huwaa Kyun Na Jaane Sitamgar Zamaana,

Kabhi Gurkhiyan De Kabhi Taziyana

Yehi Khauf Hai Jo Satata Hai Mujhko,

Issi Baat Par, Neend Aati Nahin Hai

(Chale Aao Baba, Chale Aao Baba, Mujhe Khaak Par Neend Aati Nahi Hai) X 2

  3. Rulaati Hai Mujhko Laeenon Ki Baatein,

Guzarti Hai Aise Yateemi Ki Raatein

Kahin Shimr Aakar Tamaache Na Maare,

Hai Dil Mai Yeh Dar, Neend Aati Nahin Hai

(Chale Aao Baba, Chale Aao Baba, Mujhe Khaak Par Neend Aati Nahi Hai) X 2

  4. Khabar Hai Yeh Mujhko Khataa Meri Kya Hai,

Yehi Na Ke Jadd Mera Mushkil Kusha Hai

Sunaaye Woh Mushkil Kusha Mujhko Lori,

Unhe Do Khabar, Neend Aati Nahin Hai

(Chale Aao Baba, Chale Aao Baba, Mujhe Khaak Par Neend Aati Nahi Hai) X 2

  5. Yateemi Ka Ehsaas Hii Ik Sitam Hai,

Musalsal Tarapne Se Hoton Pe Gham Hai

Agar Ab Yeh Zindaan Hii Ghar Hai Mera,

Chale Aao Ghar, Neend Aati Nahin Hai

(Chale Aao Baba, Chale Aao Baba, Mujhe Khaak Par Neend Aati Nahi Hai) X 2

  6. Kabhi Maine Socha Nahin Tha Yeh Baba,

Ke Tumse Bichhadkar Bhi Jeena Padhega

Tumhaare Bina Hii Mujhe Ab Hai Jeena,

Yehi Jaankar, Neend Aati Nahin Hai

(Chale Aao Baba, Chale Aao Baba, Mujhe Khaak Par Neend Aati Nahi Hai) X 2

  7. Phuphi Jaa(N) Se Aksar Suna Hai Yeh Nauha,

Tadapta Hai Ban Mai Shah-E-Dee(N) Ka Laasha

Mere Paas Aajaao Maqtal Se Baba,

Tumhe Bhi Agar, Neend Aati Nahin Hai

(Chale Aao Baba, Chale Aao Baba, Mujhe Khaak Par Neend Aati Nahi Hai) X 2

  8. Masaaeb Ne Yeh Haal Sab Ka Kiya Hai,

Ke Din Raat Matam Hai Aaho Bukaa Hai

Phuphi Ho Ke Sajjad Ho Ya Sakina,

Kisi Ko Idhar, Neend Aati Nahin Hai

(Chale Aao Baba, Chale Aao Baba, Mujhe Khaak Par Neend Aati Nahi Hai) X 2

  9. Yeh "Irfan-O-Mazhar" Ke Dil Ki Sadaa Hai,

Jaha Shahzadi Ka Madfann Banaa Hai

Hai Jisne Bhi Dekha Sitam Ka Wo Zindaan,

Usse Umr Bhar, Neend Aati Nahin Hai

(Chale Aao Baba, Chale Aao Baba, Mujhe Khaak Par Neend Aati Nahi Hai) X2

tracks.title: Alvidaa Shehzada-E-Qasim
tracks.lyrics:
Alwidaa Shehzada-E-Qasim Alwidaa

Saji Huwi Hai Karbala, Jaao Tumhe Allah Ko Sompa, Magar,

Ab Kisse Kehke Bulaunga Mai Tasweer-E-Hassan

Alwidaa Gulpairahan, Qasim-E-Tashna Dahan

(Alwidaa Gulpairahan, Qasim-E-Tashna Dahan) X2

  1. Zainab-E-Khasta Jigar, Aur Kulsum-E-Hazeen

Hoke Masruf-E-Bukaa, Ghash Pe Ghash Khaane Lagi

Roke Kehti Hai Phuphi, Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Izne Dekho Na Akhi, Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Tu Sifarish Ke Liye Laaya Jo Tawiz-E-Hassan

(Alwidaa Gulpairahan, Qasim-E-Tashna Dahan) X2

  2. Bhai Shabbar Ki Mere, Ik Nishaani Tum Ho

Kaise Marne Ke Liye, Bhejdun Mai Tumko

Tumhi Akber Ho Mere, Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Tumhi Lashkar Ho Mere, Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Sang Iss Dil Pe Rakhaa Phir Yeh Kiye Maine Sukhan

(Alwidaa Gulpairahan, Qasim-E-Tashna Dahan) X2

  3. Dediya Izne-Wighaa, Thaam Ke Qalbo-Jigar

Tum Bhi Hojaao Judaa, Ay Mere Nure-Nazar

Jaao Hafiz Hai Khuda, Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Roke Sarwar Ne Kahaa, Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Alwidaa Tujhko Kahaa, Hone Lagi Dil Mei Chubhan

(Alwidaa Gulpairahan, Qasim-E-Tashna Dahan) X2

  4. Maa Ke Armaan Hai Kya, Yeh Nahin Socha Kabhi

Kya Hai Behnon Ki Dua, Yeh Nahin Socha Kabhi

Tum Jo Marne Ko Chale, Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Zakhm-E-Dil Gehre Huwe, Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Bewaa Lagne Lagi Yeh Kehte Hii Ik Shab Ki Dulhan

(Alwidaa Gulpairahan, Qasim-E-Tashna Dahan) X2

  5. Maardalega Mujhe, Teri Furqat Ka Yeh Gham

Tu Suwe Dasht Na Jaa, Tujhko Sughra Ki Qasam

Waqt Yeh Kaisa Padaa, Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Jo Ho Manzur-E-Khudaa, Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Dasht Se Laaunga Gathri Mei Tera Tukde Badan

(Alwidaa Gulpairahan, Qasim-E-Tashna Dahan) X2

  6. Ban Mei Jab Jaaoge Tum, Yeh Toh Mujhko Hai Khabar

Tan Se Kardoge Judaa, Arzaqe Shaami Ka Sar

Hai Magar Yeh Bhi Yaqee(N), Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Tujhko Gheirenge Laee(N), Ay Mere Shere-E-Jawaan

Haaye Hojaaega Paamaal Yeh Naazuk Sa Badan

(Alwidaa Gulpairahan, Qasim-E-Tashna Dahan) X2

  7. Dashte Ghurpat Pe Mujhe, Sab Ke Sab Chhodgaye

Aur Shahadat Ke Liye, Tum Qamar Bastaa Huwe

Meri Mayyat Ke Liye, Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Chaar Kaandhe Na Rahe, Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Ab Yaqee(N) Hogaya Rehjaaunga Begoro Kafan

(Alwidaa Gulpairahan, Qasim-E-Tashna Dahan) X2

  8. Dekh Maadar Ki Taraf, Kaisi Karti Hai Bukaa

Aankh Mei Dajlaae Gham, Aur Honton Pe Sadaa

Dekh Marjaaye Na Maa(N), Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Kaise Bhejun Me Wahaa(N), Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Tu Jahaan Jaane Ko Kehta Hai Woh Hai Mawt Ka Ban

(Alwidaa Gulpairahan, Qasim-E-Tashna Dahan) X2

  9. Roke "Mazhar" Ne Kahaa, Yeh Hai "Irfan"-E-Aza

Jab Tasawwur Mei Gaya, Mera Dil Qaamp Uthha

Kaise Maula Ne Kahaa, Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Jaa Sue Dashte-Qazaa, Ay Mere Sher-E-Jawaan

Aaj Bhi Rota Hu(N) Jab Honton Pe Aata Hai Sukhan

(Alwidaa Gulpairahan, Qasim-E-Tashna Dahan) X3

tracks.title: Khuda Hafiz-O-Nasir
tracks.lyrics:
Khuda Hafiz-O-Nasir, Khuda Hafiz-O-Nasir

Khuda Hafiz-O-Nasir

(Ab Ham Bhi Sue Dashte Balaa Jaate Hai Behna) X2

(Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge) X2

Ab Ham Bhi Sue Dashte Balaa Jaate Hai Behna

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

  1. Waise Bhi Ab Iss Duniya Mai Jine Ka Mazaa Kya

(Hamshakle Payamber Hai Na Abbas Hai Mera) X2

Rukhsat Karo Shabbir Ko Ye Kehke Khudaara

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

Ab Ham Bhi Sue Dashte Balaa Jaate Hai Behna

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

  2. Dil Sine Mai Betaab Hai Aur Lab Pe Bukaa Hai

(Iss Dasht Mai Ab Tera Nigehbaan Khuda Hai) X2

Yeh Sochke Maqtal Ko Chalaa Bhai Tumhara

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

Ab Ham Bhi Sue Dashte Balaa Jaate Hai Behna

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

  3. Logo Ne Hamei(N) Lutliya Ghar Se Bulaakar

(Baitha Hu Abhi Laashon Se Maqtal Ko Sajaakar) X2

Allah Se Ummeed Rakho Ay Meri Behna

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

Ab Ham Bhi Sue Dashte Balaa Jaate Hai Behna

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

  4. Har Gaam Pe Yeh Jumla Tumhe Honsla Degaa

(Jab Ahmed-E-Mursal Na Rahe Kaun Rahega) X2

Mat Girya Karo Degi Yehi Baat Sahara

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

Ab Ham Bhi Sue Dashte Balaa Jaate Hai Behna

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

  5. Padh Naade Ali Bhai Pe Rone Ke Bajaaye

(Takte Hai Meri Raah Wahaa(N) Mawt Ke Saaye) X2

Yeh Kehte Huwe Rota Hai Mera Bhi Kaleja

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

Ab Ham Bhi Sue Dashte Balaa Jaate Hai Behna

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

  6. Tum Qaatib-E-Taqdeer Se Shikwa Nahi Karna

(Ham Ghar Se Chale Jaaye Toh Girya Nahin Karna) X2

Bas Marzi-E-Maabud Pe Imaan Hai Apna

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

Ab Ham Bhi Sue Dashte Balaa Jaate Hai Behna

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

  7. Woh Aun-O-Muhammed Ho Ya Abbas Ya Akber

(Qasim Sa Hasee(N) Phul Ke Hurr Jaisa Dilawer) X2

Har Eik Ko Yeh Kehke Tere Bhai Ne Bhejaa

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

Ab Ham Bhi Sue Dashte Balaa Jaate Hai Behna

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

  8. Kulsum Ko Kubra Ko Lo Baba Ko Sambhaalo

(Roro Ke Na Marjaaye Sakina Ko Sambhaalo) X2

Yeh Keh Toh Diya Usne Sidhaaro Mere Baba

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

Ab Ham Bhi Sue Dashte Balaa Jaate Hai Behna

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

  9. Kuch Der Huwi Tumne Toh Dekha Tha Yeh Manzar

(Hamshir Se Yeh Kehke Chalaa Tha Ali-Asgher) X2

Mai Nusrate Shabbir Ko Jaata Hu(N) Sakina

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

Ab Ham Bhi Sue Dashte Balaa Jaate Hai Behna

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

  10. Ay Kaash Yeh Din Hamko Bhi Dikhlaaye Muqaddar

(Ho "Mazhar-O-Irfan" Bhi Qabre Shah-E-Dee(N) Par) X2

Aur Jaate Huwe Hamse Kahe Zehra Ka Beta

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

Ab Ham Bhi Sue Dashte Balaa Jaate Hai Behna

Zindagi Rahi Toh Phir Milenge

tracks.title: Zehra Ko Do Pursa
tracks.lyrics:
Karbobala Ke Dasht Mai, Be Aasra Aale Nabi

Maare Gaye Ansar Sab, Zakhmi Huwa Ibne Ali

Munis Nahi Yawar Nahi, Ghazi Nahi Akber Nahi

Bikhde Pade Hai Jaa Bajaa, Laashe Kahin Aur Sar Kahin

Matam Karo Ehle Aza, Ghar Lutgaya Shabbir Ka

Purse Ko Aayi Sayyeda, Matam Karo Ehle Aza

Pursa Bhare Ghar Ka Hai Yeh, Jo Karbala Mai Lutgaya

(Sab Milke Azadaro, Zehra Ko Do Pursa) X2

  1. Barbaad Huwa Ran Mai, Ghar Aale Payambar Ka

Ik Do Pahar Mei Lutgaya, Makhdum-E-Alam Ka Ghar

Kaunain Ki Shahzadiyan, Nauha Kuna Hai Nange Sar

Tumse Ali Ki Laadli Kehti Hai Yeh Sar Pit Kar

(Sab Milke Azadaro, Zehra Ko Do Pursa) X2

  2. Barbaad Huwa Ran Mai, Ghar Aale Payambar Ka

Ai Rone Waalo Kya Kahe, Kaisi Huwi Ham Par Jafaa

Kohe-Musibbat Ghir Paraa, Ham Hogaye Be Aasra

Har Majlise Shabbir Mai, Aati Hai Zainab Ki Sadaa

(Sab Milke Azadaro, Zehra Ko Do Pursa) X2

  3. Barbaad Huwa Ran Mai, Ghar Aale Payambar Ka

Paamaal Hai Farwaa Ka Dil, Paamaal Qasim Ka Badan

Mara Gaya Nawshaah Bhi, Pardes Mai Tashna Dahan

Shaale Azaa Pehne Huwe, Kehti Hai Ik Shab Ki Dulhan

(Sab Milke Azadaro, Zehra Ko Do Pursa) X2

  4. Barbaad Huwa Ran Mai, Ghar Aale Payambar Ka

Nana Ki Jo Taswir Tha, Rukhsat Huwa Khaakar Sinaa(N)

Ik Haath Sine Par Rakhe, Behosh Hai Akber Ki Maa(N)

Zindaa Rahun Kaise Bhalaa, Hai Umme Laila Ki Fughaa(N)

(Sab Milke Azadaro, Zehra Ko Do Pursa) X2

  5. Barbaad Huwa Ran Mai, Ghar Aale Payambar Ka

Kya Asr Ka Hungaam Tha, Jab Shaah Par Khanjar Chalaa

Woh Teraa Zarbe Shimr Ki, Mazlum Ka Sukha Galaa

Maadar Ko Dekha Dasht Mai, Aur Zere-Lab Kehne Laga

(Sab Milke Azadaro, Zehra Ko Do Pursa) X2

  6. Barbaad Huwa Ran Mai, Ghar Aale Payambar Ka

Shame-Ghariba Aagayi, Karbobala Roti Rahi

Jalti Huwi Uss Khaak Par, Baithi Rahi Aale Nabi

Dashte Balaa Mai Marsiya. Karti Rahi Binte Ali

(Sab Milke Azadaro, Zehra Ko Do Pursa) X2

  7. Barbaad Huwa Ran Mai, Ghar Aale Payambar Ka

Hai "Mazhar-O-Irfan" Bhi, Farshe Aza Par Maatami

Aankhon Se Jaari Alqama, Purse Ka Hai Haq Toh Yehi

Marham Dil-E-Zehra Ka Hai, Nauhagari Sinazani

(Sab Milke Azadaro, Zehra Ko Do Pursa) X2

Barbaad Huwa Ran Mai, Ghar Aale Payambar Ka

tracks.title: Meri Tarhaa Koi Yateem Na Ho
tracks.lyrics:
Qafla Shah Ka, Haay Warid-E-Kufa Jo Huwa,

Aan Kar Umme Habiba Ne Sakina Se Kaha,

Ay Yatima Tu Mere Waste Yeh Maang Dua,

Are Teri Tarhaa Se Kise Ko Na Yatimi De Khuda,

Sunke Bazaar Me Ye Umme Habiba Ki Buka,

Are Rookh Suwe Neza Kiya Aur Sakina Ne Kaha, Baba

Dua Mei Karti, Aamin Kaho, Meri Tarhaa Koi Yatim Na Ho

Sakina Kehti Thi Ro Ro Kar, Babajaan, Meri Tarhaa Koi Yateem Na Ho

  1. Baba Yateem Ho Kar, Ehsaas Ye Huwa Hai, Kya Cheez Hai Yatimi, Har Saas Hi Sazaa Hai, Babajan

Yeh Meri Dil Ki Hai Aawaaz Suno, Meri Tarhaa Koi Yatim Na Ho

Sakina Kehti Thi Ro Ro Kar (Babajaan)Meri Tarhaa Koi Yateem Na Ho

  2. Awlaad Waalay Mujhe Ko, Kehne Lagay Yatima, Pardes Me Sakina, Par Waqt Kaisa Aya, Babajan

Yeh Kehke Sar Pe Merey Haath Rakho, Meri Tarhaa Koi Yatim Na Ho

Sakina Kehti Thi Ro Ro Kar, Babajaan, Meri Tarhaa Koi Yateem Na Ho

  3. Yeh Aap Jaantey Hai, Jo Kaifiyat Hai Meri, Socha Kabhi Nahi Tha, Bazaar Me Phiroongi, Babajan

To Ab Dua Mei Mera Saath To Do, Meri Tarhaa Koi Yatim Na Ho

Sakina Kehti Thi Ro Ro Kar, Babajaan, Meri Tarhaa Koi Yateem Na Ho

  4. Kya Haal Kar Diya Hai, Dekho To Ashkiya Ne, Khaane Ko Kya Milaa Hai, Zaalim Ki Taaziyaane, Babajan

Lagay Jo Pyaas To Bas Ashkh Piyo, Meri Tarhaa Koi Yatim Na Ho

Sakina Kehti Thi Ro Ro Kar (Babajaan)Meri Tarhaa Koi Yateem Na Ho

  5. Jeenay Se Mera Dil To, Bezaar Hochuka Hai, Baazu Bandhe Hai Sabke, Mera Gala Bandha Hai, Babajan

Meri Aseeri Ko Dekho Socho, Meri Tarhaa Koi Yatim Na Ho

Sakina Kehti Thi Ro Ro Kar (Babajaan)Meri Tarhaa Koi Yateem Na Ho

  6. Kyu(N) Zinda Hai Sakina, Itne Ghamo Ko Seh Kar, Zaalim Mujhe Bulaae, Apni Kaneez Keh Kar, Babajan

Me Khud Se Kaisay Kahu(N) Sabr Karo Baba, Meri Tarhaa Koi Yatim Na Ho

Sakina Kehti Thi Ro Ro Kar, Babajaan Meri Tarhaa Koi Yateem Na Ho

  7. Beti Ki Baat Sun Kar, Sar Shah Ka Pukaara, Sakina, Sun Kar Fughaa Tumhaari, Rota Hai Dil Humaara, (Meri Jan)

Khuda Se Mai Yehee Kehta Hu Suno, Teri Tarhaa Koi Yatim Na Ho

Sakina Kehti Thi Ro Ro Kar, Babajaan Meri Tarhaa Koi Yateem Na Ho

  8. "Irfan" Aur "Mazhar", Rota Hai Is Fughaa(N) Par, Shabir Ki Who Dukhtar, Kehti Hai Hum Se Rokar (Zaakiro)

Ye Marsiya Meri Majlis Me Parho, Meri Tarhaa Koi Yatim Na Ho

Sakina Kehti Thi Ro Ro Kar, Babajaan Meri Tarhaa Koi Yateem Na Ho

albums.title: Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain A.S

tracks.title: Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain
tracks.lyrics:
(Hussain Hussain Hussain) X2

Ye Konsi Wiqar He

Bala Ka Sheh Sawar He

Ye Bil Yaqeen Hussain He

Nabi Ka Noore Ain He

Libas He Phata Huwa

Lahu Mein He Ata Huwa

Tamam Jisme Naznee(N) Chidha Huwa Kata Huwa

Magar Kuchh Ada Se Aya Fatima Ka Ladla

Lahu Lahu Huwi Furat Aur Sukoot Chha Gaya

Kuchh Aisa Ran Para Ke Kaante Pargaye Zabaan Par

Khuda Ne Iske Khoon Se Likha Ye Aasman Par

Jo Ghar Luta Chukka

Ali Ka Ladla

To Boli Karbala

Hussain Marhaba

Khuda Ke Saath Saath Tera Zikr Hoga Ay Ghareebe Nainawa

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya (Hussain)X3

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

  1. Karbobala Mein Dasween Muharram Ka Roz Tha

Khanjar Tale Hussain Ne Sajde Mein Sar Rakha

Rokar Pukari Zehra Ise Kon Royega

Dashte Bala Mein Haatife Ghaibi Ne Di Sada

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya (Hussain)X3

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

  2. Woh Dil Bujhe Huwe Woh Hawaein Thami Huwi

Woh Ek Behan Ki Bhai Pe Nazrein Jami Huwi

Arzo Saman Ki Saas Thi Goya Ruki Huwi

Zainab Ki Zindagi Ka Khulasa Ye Bangaya

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya (Hussain)X3

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

  3. Din Bhar Utha Ke Lata Raha Aqraba Ki Laash

Hamshakle Mustafa Ki Kabhi Bawafa Ki Laash

Qasim Se Shahzada E Gulbu Qaba Ki Laash

Aalam Ko Jisne Kehne Pe Majboor Kardiya

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya (Hussain)X3

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

  4. Jiska Hujoom E Dardo Alam Se Ye Haal Tha

Sina Tha Pash Pash Jigar Paemal Tha

Rukh Par Tha Tishnagi Ka Dhuwan Dil Nidhaal Tha

Mojon Ki Isteraf Se Aane Lagi Sada

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya (Hussain)X3

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

  5. Tujhsa Shaheed Kon He Alam Me Ay Hussain

Tu He Har Ek Deedae Purnam Me Ay Hussain

Rote Hein Do Jahaan Tere Gham Me Ay Hussain

Zinda Rahega Halqae Matam Mein Bhi Sada

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya (Hussain)X3

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

  6. Hussain Be Kafan

Hussasin Be Khata

Shaheede Karbala

Binae La Ilah

Khuda Ke Saath Saath Tera Zikr Hoga Ay Ghareebe Nainawa

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya (Hussain)X3

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

  7. Har War Mein Lainon Ne Chaha Ye Barha

Mit Jaye Is Jahaan Se Ye Majlise Aza

Baqi Rahe Na Naam Zameen Par Hussain Ka

Lekin Nabi Ki Beti Se Allah Keh Chuka

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya (Hussain)X3

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

  8. Hai Daimi Hayat Tere Naqshe Pa Ke Baad

Ye Raaz Chaah Na Dunya Ne Teri Qaza Ke Baad

Te Hogayi Ye Baat Bhi Karbobala Ke Baad

Haq Aur Yazeediat Ka Rahega Ma’arka

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya (Hussain)X3

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

  9. Ho Dor Koi Ali Ke Bete

Jo Baat Haq He Yuhin Rahegi

Tere Lahu Ka Ye Mojiza He

Ye Khak Khake Shifa Banegi

Anees Ho Ya Dabeer Koi

Lahu Me Jabtak He Josh Baqi

Khuda Ne Wajib Kiya He Sab Par

Qalam Likhega Zaban Kahegi

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya (Hussain)X3

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

  10. Koi "Irfan" Ho Ya Ho "Mazhar"

Hum Agar He Sada Yahi Labpar

Qabl Az Karbala Khuda Hi Khuda

Bad Az Karbala Hussain Hussain

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya (Hussain)X3

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

Ab Zindagi Bhar Ya Hussain

tracks.title: Aa Gai Sham Say
tracks.lyrics:
Aa Gai Sham Se Lo Aapki Hamsheer Hussain
Marsiya Karti He Ye Zainabe Dilgeer Hussain


(Aap Mehroome Kafan Aur Mein Mehroome Rida) X2
Who Naseeb Apka Aur Ye Meri Taqdeer Hussain

(Ho Salamatei(N) Dukhe Dil Thi Mere Veer Hussain) X2
Aagayi Qaid Nibha Kar Teri Hamsheer Hussain

  1. Shaam Ki Galiyon Se Guzri Sare Darbaar Gayi
Koi Kehsakta Nahin Teri Behan Haar Gayi
(Haaye Be Makna O Chaadar Bhi Na Dastaar Gayi) X2
Phir Bhi Kab Dil Se Miti Aapki Tasweer Hussain

(Ho Salamatei(N) Dukhe Dil Thi Mere Veer Hussain) X2
Aagayi Qaid Nibha Kar Teri Hamsheer Hussain

  2. Rah Mein Khushk Na Hopaye Mere Deedae Nam
Mein Zabaa(N) Band Bhi Karlun To Shahannshahe Umam
(Eik Ik Zakhm Sunayega Who Rudade Sitam) X2
Who Safar Pusht Pe Durron Se He Tehreer Hussain

(Ho Salamatei(N) Dukhe Dil Thi Mere Veer Hussain) X2
Aagayi Qaid Nibha Kar Teri Hamsheer Hussain

  3. Teri Ghurbat Pe Fida Ey Mere Mazloom Akhi
Waqt Ik Aisa Bhi Aya Ke Behan Kaamp Gayi
(Hukm Bachhi Ki Kaneezi Ka Suna Ta Tha Shaqi) X2
Bas Usi Waqt To Ghabrayi Thi Hamsheer Hussain

(Ho Salamatei(N) Dukhe Dil Thi Mere Veer Hussain) X2
Aagayi Qaid Nibha Kar Teri Hamsheer Hussain

  4. Tey Safar Kaise Huwa Kaise Mein Batlaun Bhala
Koi Hodaj Thi Na Mehmil Na Amaari Na Rida
(Bas Isi Dard Se Khu(N) Rota Raha Zainul Iba) X2
Who Jo Rota To Buka Karti Thi Zanjeer Hussain

(Ho Salamatei(N) Dukhe Dil Thi Mere Veer Hussain) X2
Aagayi Qaid Nibha Kar Teri Hamsheer Hussain

  5. Jis Ko Suraj Ne Nahi Dekha Tha Na Sar Nange Kabhi
Sham Ki Galiyon Mein Sar Nange Wohi Shehzaadi
(Eik Chadar Ki Talabgaar Laeeno(N) Se Huwi) X2
Royi Neze Pe Meri Chaadar-E-Tatheer Hussain

(Ho Salamatei(N) Dukhe Dil Thi Mere Veer Hussain) X2
Aagayi Qaid Nibha Kar Teri Hamsheer Hussain

  6. Karbala Hogayi Aabad Luti Ale Nabi
Haaye Islah Na Ki Ummat Se Ye Soghat Mili
(Be Ghari Nawha Gari Aho Buka Sina Zani) X2
Kya Yahi Ajre Risalat Ki He Tafseer Hussain

(Ho Salamatei(N) Dukhe Dil Thi Mere Veer Hussain) X2
Aagayi Qaid Nibha Kar Teri Hamsheer Hussain

  7. Rah Mein Ale Payambar Ka Dilasa Mein Bani
Sham Ke Log Tamashai Tamasha Mein Bani
(Teri Rudade Masaib Ka Khulasa Mein Bani) X2
Khwabe Ajdad Ko Yun Milgayi Tabeer Hussain

(Ho Salamatei(N) Dukhe Dil Thi Mere Veer Hussain) X2
Aagayi Qaid Nibha Kar Teri Hamsheer Hussain

  8. Mein Bohot Royi Sakina Ko Wahan Dafna Kar
Kaam Ye Pehla Kiya Hukme Rihai Paa Kar
(Qaid Khaane Mein Tera Farshe Aza Bichwakar) X2
Tere Chehlum Ke Liye Aagayi Dilgeer Hussain

(Ho Salamatei(N) Dukhe Dil Thi Mere Veer Hussain) X2
Aagayi Qaid Nibha Kar Teri Hamsheer Hussain

  9. Shiddate Gham Se Utha Farsh-E-Aza Par Kohraam
Bas Yahi "Mazhar-O-Irfan" Karo Khatm Kalaam
(De Hame Is Ki Jaza Shahe Najaf Shahe Anaam) X2
Ab Mile Ya Na Mile Khuld Ki Jageer Hussain

(Ho Salamatei(N) Dukhe Dil Thi Mere Veer Hussain) X2
Aagayi Qaid Nibha Kar Teri Hamsheer Hussain

tracks.title: Aoun (As) O Muhammad (As)
tracks.lyrics:
Al-Amaa(N) Hazar

Kuchh Aise Lare Jang Mein Zainab Ke Dulhare

Maidaan Se Udu Bhage Sabhi Khof Ke Mare

Ghulthakeran Aisa Kabhi Parte Nahin Dekha

Bachhon Ko Is Andaaz Se Larte Nahin Dekha

Barhte The Kabhi Gah Sarak Jaate The Abbas

Jab Waar Who Karte The To Ye Farmaate The Abbas

Jeete Raho Auno Muhammad

(Jeete Raho Auno Muhammad) X2

  1. Tegh Zameen Ka Hunar Tumhi Dikhate Raho

Khoon Se Talwaar Ki Pyaas Bhujate Raho

Dushmane Shabbir Ki Hasti Mitate Raho

Haidari Jaaho Hasham Aur Barhate Raho

Aise Laro Phir Hi Kahein Fatehe Khaiber

(Jeete Raho Auno Muhammad) X3

  2. Aise Chale Tegh Ab Dashto Daman Kaat De

Waar Karo Sar Pe Tum Kar Who Badan Kaat De

Marhabo Antar Ke Dil Tere Kafan Kaatde

Nehr Ki Har Moj Ko Tashnadahan Kaat De

Jhoom Ke Khud Teghe Ali Bole Muqarrar

(Jeete Raho Auno Muhammad) X3

  3. Qalb Mein Jaakar Laro Lashkare Kuffar Ke

Chehr Pe Tewar Rakho Jafare Tayyar Ke

Zarb Mein Andaaz Ho Haidare Karrar Ke

Jag Uthe Dasht Se Ehle Sitam Haar Ke

Aye Baqiyyah Se Sada Doshe Hawa Par

(Jeete Raho Auno Muhammad) X3

  4. Saye Se Talwar Ke Mot Bhi Bachkar Chale

Ek Qadam Aage Na Peeche Ye Lashkar Chale

Charon Taraf Dasht Mein Mot Ka Manzar Chale

Mot Kahe Kaam Kya Donon Jari Gar Chale

Mere Hunar Tumne Dikhaye Hein Yahaan Par

(Jeete Raho Auno Muhammad) X3

  5. Har Baar Sada Dete The Ey Gaysuo Walo

Kya Kehna He Phir Bhar Ke Wahi Haat Nikalo

Rahwar Barhe Jaate Hein Baaghon Ko Sambhalo

Halka He Kari Aankh Zira Poshon Pe Dalo

In Hathon Ke Boson Ke Liye Aye Payambar

Qasim Bhi Kahe Mein Bhi Kahun Aur Ali Akbar

(Jeete Raho Auno Muhammad) X3

  6. Aun Ye Kehne Lage Khub Muhammad Lare

Goya Muhammad Huwe Aun Bhi Behad Lare

Maut Ko Bhi Dasht Mein Karte Huwe Rad Lare

Donon Lare Is Tarah Jaise Ab O Jad Lare

Maa Bhi Dare Khaima Pe Kehne Lagi Rokar

(Jeete Raho Auno Muhammad) X3

  7. Larte Huwe Nehr Par Aagaye Al Akhtasar

Narghae Ada Mein Phir Girgaye Donon Pisar

Teer Kahin Se Chale Aur Kahin Se Tabar

Shah Ko Awaz Di Girte Huwe Khaak Par

Pohonche Shahe Karbobala Tha Yahi Lab Par

(Jeete Raho Auno Muhammad) X3

  8. Agaye Abbas Ki Ankhon Mein Ashke Aza

Jeet Gaye Pyaas Se Nehr Par Who Mehlaqa

Nargae Aada Mein Bhi Donon Ko Ye Yaad Tha

Maa Ki Naseehat Pe Hi Hogaye Donon Fida

Shukr Ke Sajde Mein Giri Madare Muztar

(Jeete Raho Auno Muhammad) X3

  9. Donon Ko Maidan Se Khaime Mein Laye Hussain

Halqa Kiye Lashon Ka Karne Lage Sab Hi Bain

Fizza Ne Awaz Di Binte Shahe Mashreqain

Shah Pe Sadqe Huwe Dekh Tere Nure Ain

Zainabe Muztar Ne Kaha Shane Hila Kar

(Jeete Raho Auno Muhammad) X3

  10. Kya Hashr Tha Khaime Mein Bapa Mazharo Irfan

Shabbir Jo Lasho(N) Pe Huwe Lashon Chaak Girehban

Lashon Se Mukhatib Yun Huwi Zainabe Zishan

Tum Bhai Pe Qurban Huwe Tujpe Mein Qurban

Jo Kehke Chale Ghar Se Wohi Karke Dikhaya

Ab Qadr Huwi Maa Ko Bara Fakhr He Tumpar

(Jeete Raho Auno Muhammad) X3

tracks.title: Sadqa Ali Asghar Ka
tracks.lyrics:
Inkar Asmaa(N) Ko He

Razi Zameen Nahi(N)

Asghar Tumhare Khoo(N) Ka Thikana Kahi(N) Nahi(N)

Chehre Pe Khun Mal Ke Shahenshahe Behrobar

Ehsaan Kardiya He Bara Qainat Par

Ye Zameen –Asghar Ka Sadka

Asmaan –Asghar Ka Sadka

(Roze Ashura Se Ab Tak) X2

Khaa Rahe Hein Dono(N) Jahaa(N )

Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

  1. Yunhi Nahin Ye Bezubaan

Babul Hawaij Bangaya

Is Ke Waseele Se Khuda

Sunta Raha Sab Ki Dua

Dunya Ke Har Zi Nafs Ko

Likhna Para Kehna Para

(Roze Ashura Se Ab Tak) X2

Khaa Rahe Hein Donon Jahaan Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

  2. Malik He Ye Kaunain Ka

Beta He Ye Hasnain Ka

Is Bezaban Se Lo Laga

Zamin He Ye Sukh Chain Ka

Jab Milgayi Gham Se Shifa

Nara Bana Darain Ka

( Roze Ashura Se Ab Tak) X2

Khaa Rahe Hein Donon Jahaan Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

  3. Ye Rizk Jo Khate Hei(N) Hum

Kaise Mila Kyunkar Mila

Sunkar Zamee(N) Is Baat Ko

Kehne Lagi Ye Bar Mala

Mein Banj Hojati Agar

Girta Lahu Besheer Ka

(Roze Ashura Se Ab Tak) X2

Khaa Rahe Hein Donon Jahaan Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

  4. Tum Jab Kabhi Pani Piyo

Shukre Ali Asghar Kaho

Shukre Ali Asghar Kaho

Jab Rizk Ki Tangi Na Ho

Ye Baat Mein Ne Kyun Kahi

Is Ka Sabab He Momino

(Roze Ashura Se Ab Tak) X2

Khaa Rahe Hein Donon Jahaan Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

  5. Shabbir Ke Besheer Ka

Jhula Kahin Jo Dekhlo

Pehle Karo Usko Salam

Aur Phir Ziyarat Bhi Karo

Koi Sabeel Aaye Nazar

Jab Rah Mein To Ye Kaho

(Roze Ashura Se Ab Tak) X2

Khaa Rahe Hein Donon Jahaan Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

  6. Ye Raz He Ya Mashwara

Sunlo Magar Ahle Aza

Jab Bhook Ki Shiddat Barhe

Miljaye Jab Aabo Ghiza

Karna Isi Besheer Se

In Ne’maton Ka Shukriya

(Roze Ashura Se Ab Tak) X2

Khaa Rahe Hein Donon Jahaan Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

  7. Is Dard Mein Dube Huwe

Qirtas Ne Samjha Diya

Chehre Pe Jo Sheh Ne Mala

Us Khun Ne Batladiya

Meine Parhi Jab Karbala

Ehsaas Ne Samjha Diya

(Roze Ashura Se Ab Tak) X2

Khaa Rahe Hein Donon Jahaan Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

  8. Har Majlise Shabbir Mein

Kehta He Har Zakir Yahi

Is Majlise Shabbir Mein

Bethi He Maa Shabbir Ki

Miljata He Unko Sukoon

Kehte Hein Jab Ye Maatami

(Roze Ashura Se Ab Tak) X2

Khaa Rahe Hein Donon Jahaan Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

  9. Jo Zojae Hur Laayi Thi

Pyasion Ki Khaatir Haziri

Ghar Ghar Mein Ye Ehle Aza

Karte Hein Uski Perawi

Jab Dekhte Hein Haziri

Kehta He Dil Ro Kar Yahi

(Roze Ashura Se Ab Tak) X2

Khaa Rahe Hein Donon Jahaan Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

  10. Irfano Mazhar Abidi

Pegham He Apna Yahi

Socho Agar To Rizq Hein

Ye Ilm Or Ye Agahi

Unke Karam Ki Bheek He

Ye Lafz Aur Ye Shairi

(Roze Ashura Se Ab Tak) X2

Khaa Rahe Hein Donon Jahaan Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

Sadka Ali Asghar Ka

Asghar Tumhare Hasne Pe Roti He Foje Sham

Tum Teer Kha Ke Aye Ho Ya Teer Maarke

Deene Haq Ke Tazkiron Ko Is Tarah Se Aam Kar

Name Asghar Ka Wazifa Har Ghari Har Gaam Kar

Jab Khuda Ke Deen Ke Saare Sahara Chhut Gaye

Tab Chala Deene Khuda Asghar Ki Ungli Thaam Kar

tracks.title: Kehti Thi Sakina Ro Ro Kar
tracks.lyrics:
Haye Sakina (X6)

Shab Ki Tareeki Mein Aksar

Zindane Sham Mein Ghabrakar

Shimr Ke Ddar Se Yaade Padar Se

Maa Se Lipat Kar

(Kehti Thi Sakina Ro Ro Kar, Ay Amma Yahan Se Riha Ho Kar, Ya Najaf Chalo Ya
Watan Chalo) X2

  1. Koi Sunta Nahin Faryad Meri

(He Zakhm Bara Is Dil Pe Yahi) X2

Dada Se Kahungi Ghum Apne

Jis Roz Yahan Se Jaaoungi

Kab Tak Mein Rahungi Nawhagar

Kehti Hun Jabhi To Mein Aksar

(Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo) X2

Kehti Thi Sakina Ro Ro Kar

Ay Amma Yahan Se Riha Ho Kar

Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo

  2. Dada Ki Lahad Par Jaaoungi

(Ye Neel Unhe Dikhlaungi) X2

Ye Zakhmi Kaan Jala Kurta

Sughra Ko Dikhane Jaaoungi

Yaad Aye Kabhi Mujhko Khwahar

Yaad Ayein Kabhi Dada Haidar

(Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo) X2

Kehti Thi Sakina Ro Ro Kar

Ay Amma Yahan Se Riha Ho Kar

Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo

  3. Jo Bibi Payambar Zaadi He

(Wo Bhi To Yahaan Faryaadi He) X2

Yasrab Ke Tasawwur Ne Amma

Ek Rahe Sukoon Dikhlaati He

Ho Khatm Aziyyat Ka Ye Safar

Bhar Jaayenge Sare Zakhme Jigar

(Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo) X2

Kehti Thi Sakina Ro Ro Kar

Ay Amma Yahan Se Riha Ho Kar

Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo

  4. Ab Aur Ghamo(N) Ki Taap Nahin

(Ro Ro Ke Ye Ankhein Khushk Huwi) X2

Kya Tum Ko Gawara He Amma

Ban Jaye Mera Marqad Bhi Yahi

Kuchh Khauf Nahin Marne Ka Magar

Ehsaan Karo Itna Mujhpar

(Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo) X2

Kehti Thi Sakina Ro Ro Kar

Ay Amma Yahan Se Riha Ho Kar

Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo

  5. Har Raat Huwi Matam Mein Basar

(Har Din Hi Guzara Ro Ro Kar) X2

Ye Zakhme Aseeri Zakhme Jigar

Zalim Ke Tamaache Yaade Pidar

Milti He Sazae Maut Agar

Ye Akhri Khwahish He Maadar

(Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo) X2

Kehti Thi Sakina Ro Ro Kar

Ay Amma Yahan Se Riha Ho Kar

Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo

  6. Azad Parindon Par Aksar

(Ay Amma Meri Jaati He Nazar) X2

Us Waqt Khayal Ata He Mujhe

Kab Qaid Se Chhut Kar Jaayenge Ghar

He Khof Laino(N) Ka Dilpar

Faryaad Karun Kyu(N) Na Rokar

(Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo) X2

Kehti Thi Sakina Ro Ro Kar

Ay Amma Yahan Se Riha Ho Kar

Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo

  7. Ankhon Ko Rasai Dene Lage

(Sab Zakhm Duhai Dene Lage) X2

Jab Mot Mere Sar Par Aayi

Ye Log Rihai Dene Lage

Ye Lamhe Ghaneemat He Maadar

Ye Zakhm Banenge Rakhte Safar

(Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo) X2

Kehti Thi Sakina Ro Ro Kar

Ay Amma Yahan Se Riha Ho Kar

Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo

  8. Dada Ko Wahaan Pursa Denge

(Phir Fateha Khani Karlenge) X2

Jab Dil Ko Sukoon Miljayega

Ham Log Watan Ko Jaayenge

Sab Royenge Qabre Zehra Par

Jo Meine Kaha Socho Manzar

(Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo) X2

Kehti Thi Sakina Ro Ro Kar

Ay Amma Yahan Se Riha Ho Kar

Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo

  9. "Irfan" Aur Mazhar Apna Watan

(He Bibi Sakina Ka Madfan) X2

Nisbat He Najaf Ki Matti Se

Payenge Usi Dharti Ka Kafan

Jab Waqte Qaza Hoga Humpar

Kehdenge Farishto(N) Se Rokar

(Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo) X2

Kehti Thi Sakina Ro Ro Kar

Ay Amma Yahan Se Riha Ho Kar

Ya Najaf Chalo Ya Watan Chalo

tracks.title: Bazaar Agaya He
tracks.lyrics:
Noke Sina Pe Farqe Burida Salam Le
Ay Fatima Ke Qalbe Darida Salam Le
Kya Tera Faisla He
Behan Kya Kare Bata


(Bazaar Agaya He, Behan Kya Kare Bata) X2

  1. Athara Bhaiyon Ki Behan Aur Berida
Dekho Khare Hein Kitne Tamashaai Ja Baja
Dil Roke Puchhta He, Behan Kya Kare Bata

(Bazaar Agaya He, Behan Kya Kare Bata) X2

  2. Khutbon Ki Tegh Saath He Aur Sabr Dhaal He
Zakhmon Se Chur Chur Badan Dil Nidhal He
Ye Meri Karbala He, Behan Kya Kare Bata

(Bazaar Agaya He, Behan Kya Kare Bata) X2

  3. Naaqon Pe Ehle Bayt Bhi Gham Ke Safeer Hein
Pathhar He Taziyane Hein Neze Hein Teer Hein
Zakhmon Ki Ye Dawa He, Behan Kya Kare Bata

(Bazaar Agaya He, Behan Kya Kare Bata) X2

  4. Na Paak In Zabaanon Pe Ab Naam He Mera
He Qafele Ka Karwan Ghairat Ka Ik Khuda
Ye Gham Bohot Bara He, Behan Kya Kare Bata

(Bazaar Agaya He, Behan Kya Kare Bata) X2

  5. Aankho(N) Se Kyu Na Ho Meri Seylaab-E-Gham Rawaa(N)

Qaydi Rasool-E-Zaadiyaa(N), Sajjad Saarebaa(N)

Sadmo(N) Ki Inteha Hai, Behan Kya Kare Bata

(Bazaar Agaya He, Behan Kya Kare Bata) X2

  6. Jana He Sar Khule Mujhe Darbaar Kuchh Bata
Ey Karwane Dard Ke Salar Kuchh Bata
Tu Zabt Ka Khuda He, Behan Kya Kare Bata

(Bazaar Agaya He, Behan Kya Kare Bata) X2

  7. Nake Se Girgayi He Sakina Mere Hussain
Kya Jaane Ab Kahan He Hazina Mere Hussain
Anjaan Rasta He, Behan Kya Kare Bata

(Bazaar Agaya He, Behan Kya Kare Bata) X2

  8. Darbaar Aaraha He Behan Kya Kare Bata
Kulsum Ham Nawa He Behan Kya Kare Bata
Har Zakhm Puchhta He, Behan Kya Kare Bata

(Bazaar Agaya He, Behan Kya Kare Bata) X2

  9. "Irfan" Dard He Tujhe Aur Gham Se Agahi
Likhti Kitabe Ranjo Alam "Mazhar Abdi"
Aur Naam Ye Rakha He, Behan Kya Kare Bata

(Bazaar Agaya He, Behan Kya Kare Bata) X3

tracks.title: Mera Ghazi Na Jaane Kahaan He
tracks.lyrics:
Jab Huwe Maqtool Ghazi, Zulm Ki Shamsheer Se
Marsiya Nikla Tha Logo, Ye Dil-E-Shabbir Se
Nau Shabein Jaaga Huwa Tha, Paasbaane Ehle Bayt
Sogaya Pehra Badal Kar, Zainabe Dilgeer Se

Ye Sada Barsare Karbala Hai
(Mera Ghazi Na Jaane Kahaan Hai) X2
Ye Sada Barsare Karbala He

  1. Suna Ban He Sitamgar Hai Ye Shab
(Pehra Deti He Khaimon Ka Zainab) X2
Phir Bhi Hoton Pe Ye Marsiya He

(Mera Ghazi Na Jaane Kahaan He) X2
Ye Sada Barsare Karbala He

  2. Sabr Kaise Kare Ab Sakina
(Pyaas Karti He Dushwaar Jeena) X2
