Khushk Hoton Pe Bas Ye Buka He


(Mera Ghazi Na Jaane Kahaan He) X2
Ye Sada Barsare Karbala He

  3. Janibe Khaima Aata He Lashkar
(Ye Na Ho Shimr Le Jaaye Chaadar) X2
Bibi Kulsum Ki Ye Sada He


(Mera Ghazi Na Jaane Kahaan He) X2
Ye Sada Barsare Karbala He

  4. Kya Kahe Kis Tarah De Dilase
(Mar Na Jaayein Tarap Kar Ye Pyaase) X2
Nawha Khwaan Binte Khairun Nisa He

(Mera Ghazi Na Jaane Kahaan He) X2
Ye Sada Barsare Karbala He

  5. Bibi Fizza Ye Karti He Ye Naale
(Koi Mushkil Kusha Ko Bulale) X2
Zulm Ki Zad Pe Ale Aba He

(Mera Ghazi Na Jaane Kahaan He) X2
Ye Sada Barsare Karbala He

  6. Shor Utha Who Aaye Sitamgar
(Chhin Gayin Chadarein Aur Jala Ghar) X2
Ek Ik Bibi Mehwe Buka He


(Mera Ghazi Na Jaane Kahaan He) X2
Ye Sada Barsare Karbala He

  7. Bain Karti He Zainab Ye Rokar
(Ek Neze Pe He Bhai Ka Sar) X2
Ek Neze Pe Meri Rida He


(Mera Ghazi Na Jaane Kahaan He) X2
Ye Sada Barsare Karbala He

  8. Lut Gaye Jab Haram Aaye Haider
(Baap Se Boli Zainab Ye Ro Kar) X2
Dekho Ujri Huwi Karbala He


(Mera Ghazi Na Jaane Kahaan He) X2
Ye Sada Barsare Karbala He

  9. Aise "Irfan-O-Mazhar" Buka Ho
(Nawha Khwani Ka Haq To Ada Ho) X2
Jab Ke Misra Ye Khud Marsiya He


(Mera Ghazi Na Jaane Kahaan He) X2
Ye Sada Barsare Karbala He

tracks.title: Sakina Ka Janaza
tracks.lyrics:
Hai Bekasi Sajjad Ki

Ehsaas Huwa Jab Ke Qaza Kargai Sakina

Hasrat Se Bandhe Hathon Ko Mein Dekh Raha Tha

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza

Sajjad Ka Zindaane Sitam Mein Tha Ye Nawha

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza - Hai Bekasi Sajjad Ki

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza

  1. Faqon Pe Basar Karta Raha Mein Nahin Roya

Kanton Pe Safar Karta Raha Mein Nahin Roya

Is Gham Ne Mujhe Ankhon Se Haye Khun Rulaya

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza - Hai Bekasi Sajjad Ki

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza

  2. Pathrayi Huwi Ankhon Ne Mujhko Ye Khabar Di

Ehsaas Huwa Jab Ke Qaza Kargayi Bachhi

Hasrat Se Bandhe Hathon Ko Mein Dekh Raha Tha

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza - Hai Bekasi Sajjad Ki

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza

  3. Taqdeer Ne Ay Baba Sitam Kaisa Kiya He

Maut Aane Se Pehle Hi Mujhe Maar Diya He

Zindaan Mein Aakar Mujhe Batlaao Khudara

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza - Hai Bekasi Sajjad Ki

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza

  4. Hei(N) Beriya(N) Pero(N) Mei(N) Magar Dil He Giraftar

Ye Kaisi Ghari Ayi Imamat Huwi Lachaar

Ejaze Imamat Na Dikhau(N) To Karu(N) Kya

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza - Hai Bekasi Sajjad Ki

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza

  5. Na Taaqti Aisi He Ke Chalne Nahi(N) Deti

Zainab Ne Kaha Uspe Ye Zanjeer He Bhari

Sajjad Sambhalu(N) Mei(N) Tujhe Ya Mere Beta

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza - Hai Bekasi Sajjad Ki

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza

  6. Chipka Tha Badan Se Jo Wohi Kurta Kafan He

Ye Soch Ke Khun Rota Ye Mehroome Watan He

Kis Tarah Sakina Ko Yahaa(N) Dafn Karunga

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza - Hai Bekasi Sajjad Ki

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza

  7. Is Bachhi Ne Ghurbat Mei(N) Bohot Saath Diya Tha

Peene Ko Mila Pani To Zanjeero(N) Pe Dala

Afsos Ke Mei(N) Uski Madad Kar Nahi(N) Paya

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza - Hai Bekasi Sajjad Ki

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza

  8. Zanjeer Bhi He Nawha Kuna Mein Bhi Haram Bhi

Zindan Mein He Masroofe Fugha Mein Bhi Haram Bhi

Is Manzare Ghamnaak Pe Sab Karte Hei(N) Girya

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza - Hai Bekasi Sajjad Ki

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza

  9. "Irfan-E-Aza" Tera Har Ek Lafz He "Mazhar"

Phir Bhi Tu Raqam Kar Nahin Paya He Who Manzar

Ye Baat He Sajjad Ke Nawhe Ka Khulasa

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza - Hai Bekasi Sajjad Ki

Zanjeer Sambhalun Ke Sakina Ka Janaza

(Hai Bekasi Sajjad Ki)X3

tracks.title: Alamdaar Alamdaar
tracks.lyrics:
(Alamdaar) X3

  1. (Ankhon Mein Asu, Haathon Mein Kuze) X2

Pyason Ke Lab Par He Ye Buka

(Alamdaar) X6

  2. Jeene Nahin Payegi Bali Sakina

Pyaas Se Marjaayegi Bali Sakina

Nehr Se Aao Haye Alamdaar

Aas Bandhawo Haye Alamdaar

Kehne Lagi Zainabe Lachaar

(Alamdaar) X6

  3. Pyason Ki Saqai Ab Kon Karega

Mein Jo Karungi Buka Kon Sunega

Dasht Mein Tanha Haye Alamdar

Bhai He Mera Haye Alamdaar

Kaise Jiye Sayade Abraar

(Alamdaar) X6

  4. Thaame Kamar Haath Se Shahe Huda He

Dashte Bayabaan Mein Mehwe Buka He

Mein Hu(N) Akela Haye Alamdaar

Chahe Dilasa Haye Alamdaar

Ghere He Ye Lashkare Kuffar

(Alamdaar) X6

  5. Bali Sakina Yahi Kehti He Rokar

Koi Chachajaan Se Kehde Ye Jaakar

Mein Huwi Be Ass Haye Alamdar

Koi Nahin Paas Haye Alamdaar

Ab Nahin Pani Ki Talabgaar

(Alamdaar) X6

  6. Bain He Kulsum Ke Jeeke Karun Kya

Tera Alam Dekh Ke Karti Hu(N) Nawha

De Gaya Tu Gham Haye Alamdaar

Karti Hu(N) Matam Haye Alamdaar

Ay Mere Parde Ke Nigehdaar

(Alamdaar) X6

  7. Chalne Lagi Jis Ghari Bhayi Pe Shamsheer

Ro Ke Ye Kehne Lagi Zainabe Dilgeer

Bhai Ko Mere Haye Alamdaar

Aake Bachaale Haye Alamdaar

Kon Bane Sheh Ka Madadgaar

(Alamdaar) X6

  8. Dhal Gaya Din Dasht Mein Sham Jab Aayi

Aale Payambar Ki Thi Ban Mein Duhai

Ban Ke Maseeha Haye Alamdaar

Lot Ke Aaja Haye Alamdaar

Ghar Na Jalaade Ye Sitamgaar

(Alamdaar) X6

  9. Parti He Nade Ali Ale Payambar

Kehti He Rokar Yahi Aale Payambar

Kisse Kahein Hum Haye Alamdaar

Apne Sabhi Gham Haye Alamdaar

Hum Huwe Lachaar-O-Dilafgaar

(Alamdaar) X6

  10. "Mazharo Irfan" Wo Kaisa Tha Manzar

Lut Gaye Ehle Haram Chin Gayi Chadar

Boli Ye Fizza Haye Alamdaar

Kyun Nahin Aaya Haye Alamdaar

Ban Gayi Khud Zainab-E-Lachaar

(Alamdaar) X6

tracks.title: Ho Salam Us Pe Jo Qaidi
Aie Gul E Narjis S A Biya Biya
Zehra A S Ko Do Pursa
Amma Fizza
tracks.lyrics:
Haye.....3

Sajjad (As) Ka Beta..... Shehzada Baqir (As).....Jub Aaya Madine.....sota Hi Nahi Tha..... Bus Rota Tha

Ek Shab Fizza Ne Aa Ke Kaha Shehzade..... Kyun Sote Nahi Ho Mere Aaqa Zade (As)

Maula Baqir (As) Ne Ro Kar Kaha......amma.....

Deka  Hai In Aankhon Baba Ke Kate Sar Ko

Na Bhoolunga Mai Woh Karbobala Padhung Sada Yahi Marsiya.....haan Mai Rounga

Dekha Hai In Aankhon Ne, Jub Karbobala Pohuche

Daria Pe Lage Khaime, Daria Se Hate Khaime.....

Na Boolunga Mai Woh Siflo Jawan

The Tashna Dahan Labe Alkama

Mai Rounga.....

Dekha Hai In Aankhon Ne Ashur Ka Woh Manzar

Lashe Hi Bayabaan Se Sheh (As)  Laate Rahe Din Bhar

Na Boolunga, Mai Woh Ranjo Alam, Sare Daste Gham Hue Sar Kalam

Mai Rounga

Dekha Hai In Aaknon Naizon Pe Shaheedon Ko

Aur Sham Ek Gariban Mein Jalte Hue Khaimon Ko

Na Bhoolunga Mai, Chini Chadaren, Jali Masnadi Mere Saamne

Mai Rounga

Dekha Hai In Aankhon Ne Kaunain Ki Shehzadi  (Sa)

Jis Waqt Bani Kaidi, Gazi Ko Bulati Thi

Na Boolunga Mai, Haram Ka Safa, Chale Nange Sar, Rasan Pahankar

Mai Rounga

Dekha Hai In Ankhon Ne, Kanton Pe Safar Karna

In Shaam Ke Galion Mein , Ek Qaidi Ka Khoon Rona

Na Bhoolunga Mai Saaj E Bamodar Har Ek Naam Par Woh Naizon Pe Sar

Mai Rounga

Dekha Hai In Aankhon Ne Us Waqt Aseeri Me

Shabbir  (As) Ki Dukhtar Ko Jub Maanga Kanizi Mein

Na Boolunga Mai, Haram Ro Diye, Subhi Dard Se, Tadap Ne Lage

Dekha Hai In Aankhon Ne Zindan Ka Woh Manzar

Lasha Tha Sakina  (Sa) Ka , Beemar Ke Hathon Par

Na Bhoolunga Mai, Phuphi Ki Qaza, Kafan Bangaya Woh Kurta Jala

Mai Rounga

Dekha Hai In Aankhon Ne, Zinda Se Riha Ho Ke

Woh Ujde Hue Qaidi, Jub Karbobal Pohuche

Na Bhoolung Mai, Ke Dadi Meri, Yeh Keh Ne Lagi, Ke Bahan Aa Gai

Mai Rounga

Dekha Hai In Aankhon Ne, Irfan E Aza Ban Kar

Dekho Mere Chehre Ko, Har Gam Ka Hai Yeh Mazhar

Na Bhoolung Mai Kabhi Karbala , Woh Qaid E Jafa, Dayar E Saza

Mai Rounga

tracks.title: Zamin Hai Imam-e-Raza
tracks.lyrics:
Ya Saiyadi, Ya Maulai , Ya Imam E Reza (As) X2

Aai Ahle Aza , Fe Imam E Reza (As) X2

Mashad Se Sada Dete Hai Yeh Maula Reza (As) , Aai Ahel Aza

Bazu Pe Agar Baandhlo Taweez E Reza

Zamin Hai Imam E Reza (As) Ka.....3



Yeh Rasm Nahi Yeh Kaul Hai Yeh Maula Reza (As) Ka

Sikka Nahi Taweez Hai Yeh Radd E Bala Ka

Mushkil Hi Nahi Raah Se Tal Jaaie Qaza , Aai Ahel Aza

Bazu Pe Agar Bandhlo Taweez E Reza (As)



Zamin Hai Imam E Reza (As) X2



Maa, Behno Ko Bacchon Ko Bhi Pehnao Yeh Sikka

Har Majlis E Shabbir (As) Mein Batwao

Banjaaoge Batil Ke Liye Kehre Khuda, Aai Ahel Aza

Bazu Pe Agar Bandhlo Taweez E Reza (As)


Zamin Hai Imam E Reza (As) X2



Hoga Na Koi Kahuf Balaon Ka Kabhi Bhi

Tootenga Yazidon Ka Bharam Dekhna Khud Hi

Khud Maut Pilaengi Tumhe Aab E Baqa, Aai Ahel Aza

Bazu Pe Agar Bandhlo Taweez E Reza (As)



Zamin Hai Imam E Reza (As) X2


Taweez E Reza (As) Ho Ya Alamdar (As) Ka Parcham

Dono Hi Mita Dete Hai Taqdeer Ke Sub Gam

Gazi (As) Ka Alam Dega Tumhe Khud Hi Dua, Aai Ahel Aza

Bazu Pe Agar Bandhlo Taweez E Reza (As)


Zamin Hai Imam E Reza (As) X2



Taboot Uthe Jub Bhi Kahin Maula Reza (As) Ka

Taboot Se Taweez Dua Kar Ke Utha Na

Jo Mangoge Us Waqt Tumhe Dega Khuda, Aai Ahel Aza

Bazu Pe Agar Bandhlo Taweez E Reza (As)


Zamin Hai Imam E Reza (As) X2


Har Nasl Me Har Daur Mein Raij Ho Yeh Sikka

Jo Nasl Abhi Aiiengi Uska Ho Yeh Wirsa

Khatoon E Qaiyamat (Sa) Bhi Tumhe Dengi Dua, Aai Ahel Aza

Bazu Pe Agar Bandhlo Taweez E Reza (As)



Zamin Hai Imam E Reza (As) X2

tracks.title: Haye Sakina
tracks.lyrics:
Hay Sakina (Sa) X4

Meri Jaan Sakina (Sa),

Tum Baad Mere Dekho Yun Rona Na Sakina (Sa) X2

Tum Baad Mere Dekho Yun Rona Na Sakina (Sa) X2

Kal Sar Pe Tere Baap Ka Saya Na Rahenga

Yeh Ahle Sitam Ab Tujhe Dikhlaienge Kinah

Maangu Ga Dua Main Tere Khatir Yeh Khuda Se

Mehfooz Rakhe Woh Tujhe Har Ranj O Bala Se

Jo Dard Tujhe Denge Laeen Main Bhi Sahunga

Tum Nake Pe Aur Barsare Niza Mai Chalunga

Wada Hai Akela Tumhe Chorunga Kabhi Na


Tum Baad Mere Dekho Yun Rona Na Sakina (Sa) X2


Ho Jaiengi Tu Kaid Teri Aah O Buka Bhi

Madar Teri Phupia Bhi Aur Zinnul Liba Bhi

Tum Ko Ushi Zindan Mein Sona Hai Hazina


Tum Baad Mere Dekho Yun Rona Na Sakina (Sa) X2



Aai Mazhar O Irfan Qaiyamat Hai Yeh Jumle

Tum Baad Mere Dekho Yun Rona Na Sakina (Sa) X2

Ya Hussein X6

Hay Hurmala (La) Ka Teer Tha X2 , Jis Ke Liye Mehve Kalam

Kehne Lagi Karbobal X2 , Zinda Rahe Dono Ka Naam



Maula Haq Imam , Ya Hasan (As), Ya Hussein(As) X2



Gyarah Moharram Aa Gai, Aale Nabi (As) Ka Karwan

Woh Aabid E Beemar (As) Tha, Chal Ne Se Jo Lachar Tha

Mehve Buka Gamkhwar Tha X2 , Kehta Chala Har Ek Gaam

Khutba Jo Zainab (Sa) Ne Diya X2 ,  Lab Per Tha Yeh Kalma Madham

Irfan O Mazhar Abdi Karte Raho Har Dam Yeh Bain

Bus Zindagi Bhar Ya Hasan (As), Bus Zindagi  Bhar Ya Hussein (As)

Nauhe Ka Yun Haq Ho Ata, Jub Barsare Farshe Aza

Maula Haq Imam , Ya Hasan (As), Ya Hussein(As) X2
