tracks.title: Haza Min Karam Hussain Ibne Ali
Labo Per Haey Hussaina Aska Wird
Aey Alqama Ki Mojon
tracks.lyrics:
(Alqamah Alqamah) X2

(Aey Alqamah Ki Mojon Khamosh Kion Ho Bolo) X3

  1. (Kya Raaz-E-Tashnagi Tha) X2 Kuch To Zuban Kholo

(Aey Alqamah Ki Mojon Khamosh Kion Ho Bolo) X2

  2. Ghazi(A.s.) Kay Ghum Mein Bachchay Ro Rokay So Chukay Hain

Aankhon Mein Meri Aansoo Sab Khushk Hochukay Hain

(Abbas Kay Alam Say) X2 Tum Hi Lipat Kay Rolo

(Aey Alqamah Ki Mojon Khamosh Kion Ho Bolo) X2

  3. Koozay Zamin Peh Rakhkar Be Aash Ho Chuki Hai

Yaani Sakina(S.a.) Ab To Pani Say Dar Rahi Hai

(Pani Kay Naam Say Bhi) X2 Darti Hai Ab Woh Dekho

(Aey Alqamah Ki Mojon Khamosh Kion Ho Bolo) X2

  4. Baazoo Qalam Huey Hain Dariya Peh Jis Jari Kay

Saidaniyan(S.a.) Jamaa Hain Us Kay Alam Kay Neechay

(Mashk-E-Sakina Koi) X2 Is Alam Say Kholo

(Aey Alqamah Ki Mojon Khamosh Kion Ho Bolo) X2

  5. Do Neem Hogai Hai Ghum Say Kamar Hamari

Kehtay Thay Shah-E-Waal Ghazi Main Tujh Peh Waari

(Hasrat Hai Yeh Humari) X2 Eik Baar Bhai Kehdo

(Aey Alqamah Ki Mojon Khamosh Kion Ho Bolo) X2

  6. Zainab Pukarti Hain Meri Rida Ka Zamin

Dariya Peh Sogaya Hai Guzreingay Kis Tarha Din

(Aey Bibiyon Ab Apni) X2 Chadar Say Haath Dholo

(Aey Alqamah Ki Mojon Khamosh Kion Ho Bolo) X2

  7. Har Soo Bapa Hai Matam Hardil Tarap Raha Hai

Eik Sher Alqamah Ki Godi Mein Soraha Hai

(Soya Hua Hai Thak Kar) X2 Ahistigi Say Bolo

(Aey Alqamah Ki Mojon Khamosh Kion Ho Bolo) X2

  8. Kehta Tha Fazl Rokar Aey Meray Baba Jaan

Rehnay Na Doonga Laasha Aada Kay Darmiyan

(Main Aaraha Hoon Baba) X2 Lillah Tum Na Roko

(Aey Alqamah Ki Mojon Khamosh Kion Ho Bolo) X2

tracks.title: Woh Sub Sey Pheley Mazar
tracks.lyrics:
Kisi Nay Aakay Madinay Mein Aam Ki Yeh Khabar

Safar Say Aatay Hain Ibn(A.s.)-E-Batool(S.a.) Laut Kay Ghar

Hain Saath Akbar(A.s.)-O-Abbas(A.s.) Qasim(A.s.)-O-Asghar(A.s.)

Sawaar Shaan Say Hain Bibiyan(S.a.) Bhi Oonton Par

Khushi Manaao Madinay Mein Aarahi Hai Bahar

(Watan Mein Laut Kay Aatay Hain Syed-E-Abrar) X2

  1. Gharon Ko Apnay Sajaao Hussain(A.s.) Aatay Hain

Sabilein Aaj Lagaao Hussain(A.s.) Aatay Hain

Charagh Ghar Mein Jalaao Hussain(A.s.) Aatay Hain

Khabar Yeh Sab Ko Sunaao Hussain(A.s.) Aatay Hain

(Woh(A.s.) Aarahay Hain Woh(A.s.) Tohfay Bhi Saath Laengay) X2

(Woh(A.s.) Sab Say Pehlay Mazaar-E-Nabi(S.a.w.w.) Peh Jaaengay) X3

  2. Yeh Sun Kay Ghar Say Nikal Aey Mard-O-Zan Saaray

Keh Aarahay Hain Khuda Aur Rasool(S.a.w.w.) Kay Piyaray(A.s.)

Watan Mein Aatay Hain Zehra(S.a.) Ki Aankh Kay Taaray

Kitab-E-Haq Kay Madinay Mein Aatay Hain Paaray

(Saheliyon Nay Khabar Dee Yeh Jakay Sughra(S.a.) Ko) X2

(Chal Uth Kay Dekhlay Sughra(S.a.) Tu Apnay Baiyya(A.s.) Ko) X3

  3. Pukarin Sughra(S.a.) Keh Din Eik Ka Naseeb Hua

Lo Meri Simt Bhi Mael Mera Tabeeb Hua

Khushi Ka Koi To Lamha Meray Qareeb Hua

Magar Yeh Saneha Sughra(S.a.) Peh Kia Ajeeb Hua

(Basheer Khaak Urha Kar Sada Yeh Deta Tha) X2

(Aray Hussain(A.s.) Maray Gaey Syeda(S.a.) Ka Ghar Ujrha) X3

  4. Madinay Waalon Madinay Peh Chagai Hai Khizaan

Gharoon Mein Chain Say Baithay Huey Ho Aaj Kahan

Zamin Karti Hai Matam Falak Hai Mehw-E-Fughan

Rasool(S.a.w.w.) Giriya Kunan Fatima(S.a.) Hain Ashk Fishan

(Mahallah-E-Bani Hashim(A.s.) Mein Sog Taari Hai) X2

(Labon Peh Haaey Hussaina(A.s.) Ka Wird Jaari Hai) X3

  5. Pukaarin Sughra(S.a.) Yeh Kis Tarha Aai Ho Amman(S.a.)

Kahan Hai Bhai(A.s.) Hamaray Kahan Hain Baba Jan(A.s.)

Phophi(S.a.) Kay Shaanon Peh Kion Hai Rasan Kay Daagh Ayan

(Kahan Hai Asghar(A.s.)-E-Besheer Aur Sakina(S.a.) Kahan) X2

(Chacha Kay Hotay Huey Kis Tarha Yeh Haal Hua) X3

Shaheed Karbobala Mein Ali(A.s.) Ka Lal(A.s.) Hua

  6. Zaeef Kon Hai Amman(S.a.) Jo Saath Chalta Hai

Kabhi Woh Girta Hai Girkar Kabhi Sambhalta Hai

Bataao Jald Kay Seena Say Dam Nikalta Hai

Mujhay Khabar Na Thi Keh Waqt Yoon Badalta Hai

(Nabi(S.a.w.w.) Kay Lal(A.s.) Ko Ummat Nay Qatl Kar Dala) X2

(Aray Qusoor Kia Tha Kay Mara Gaya Mera Kunba) X3

  7. Pukarin Baano(S.a.) Yeh Boorhha Hai Syed-E-Sajjad(A.s.)

Hoi Hai Is(A.s.) Peh Bhi Baad-E-Hussain(A.s.) Woh Bedaad

Yeh(A.s.) Roraha Hai Unhin Manzaron Ko Kar Kay Yaad

Koi Nahin Tha Jo Sunta Gharib Ki Fariyad

(Dawa Kay Badlay Isay Tariyanay Lagtay Thay) X2

(Jo Neend Aati To Aada Jaganay Lagtay Thay) X3

  8. Sinan Kalejay Peh Khakar Guzar Gaey Akbar(A.s.)

Sitam Kay Teer Say Maaray Gaey Ali Asghar(A.s.)

Gulu-E-Sibt(A.s.)-E-Payambar(S.a.w.w.) Peh Chalgaya Khanjar

Phophi(S.a.) Kay Sar Say Utari Laeen Nay Chadar

(Shaheed Hogaey Abbas(A.s.) Hum(A.s.) Aseer Huey) X2

(Ameer Baap(A.s.) Kay Bachchay(A.s.) Sabhi Faqeer Huey) X3

tracks.title: Alwida Alwida
tracks.lyrics:
(Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa) X2

  1. Baba(A.s.) Kaisay Kahon Alwidaa Alwidaa

(Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa) X2

  2. Aap(A.s.) Jatay Nahin Jaan Janay Lagi

Zindagi Mujh Say Daman Churhanay Lagi

Saans Seenay Mein Ruk Ruk Kay Aanay Lagi

Ab Meray Saath Hain Aah Aur Hichkiyaan

(Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa) X2

  3. Kio Piyon Main Dawa Hochuki Bas Shifa

Chorh Kar Mujh Ko Mera Masiha Chala

Aisa Lagta Hai Mujh Say Hue Tum(A.s.) Khafa

Meri Hamjoliyaan Ab Hain Tanhaiyaan

(Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa) X2

  4. Kaisay Behlaaon Dil Kuch To Bolo Padar(A.s.)

Qabr Say Kam Nahin Haaey Ab Mera Ghar

Mot Hai Ab Meri Aap(A.s.) Ka Yeh Safar

Bolti Hai Nazar Chup Hai Meri Zuban

(Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa) X2

  5. Din To Kat Jaeyga Shab Na Kat Paeygi

Aap(A.s.) Kay Hijr Mein Neend Kab Aaeygi

Neend Aai To Woh Mot Ban Jaeygi

Roey Ga Meri Gurbat Peh Ab Aasmaan

(Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa) X2

  6. Kon Jaata Hai Beemar Ko Chorh Kar

Haath Rakhtay Hain Beemar Kis Nabz Par

Us Ki Dil Joi Kartay Hain Shaam-O-Sahar

Rakhtay Hain Thanday Paani Ki Bhi Pattiyan

(Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa) X2

  7. Lo Meray Ghar Say Rukhsat Ujaala Hua

Jata Hai Bhai(A.s.) Naazon Ka Paala Hua

Ranj Is Baat Say Hai Dobala Hua

Tum(A.s.) Rahogay Wahan Main(S.a.) Rahoongi Yahan

(Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa) X2

  8. Haaey Baba(A.s.) Meray Din Yeh Garmi Kay Hain

Saath Bachchon Ka Hai Yeh Safar Naa Karein

Ya To Phir Saath Mujh(S.a.) Ko Bhi Lekay Chalein

Keh Raha Hai Yehi Ab To Ashk-E-Rawan

(Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa) X2

  9. Bhai Akbar(A.s.) Chalay Aur Asghar(A.s.) Chalay

Mujh Mein Aur Mot Mein Kam Huey Faaslay

Meri Jaanib Barhhay Dard Kay Qaaflay

Aakhri Baar Akbar(A.s.) Sunado Azaan

(Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa) X2

  10. Kum Say Kum Nanhay Asghar(A.s.) Ko Yaan Chorh Dein

Saans Ki Toot Ti Doriaan Jorh Dein

Mot Ka Rukh Meri Simt Say Morh Dein

Aur Kuch Roz Jeeloongi Main(S.a.) Natawaan

(Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa) X2

  11. Aap Ki Ghar Say Baba(A.s.) Sawari Chali

Dam Karoon Aap Par Baba(A.s.) Naad-E-Ali(A.s.)

Mein Dua-E-Safar Bhi Karoongi Abhi

Mera Kia Hai Khuda Hai Mera Meharbaan

(Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa Alwidaa) X2

tracks.title: Amaa Mey Aey Hoon
tracks.lyrics:
(Amman Mein Aai Hoon Amman Mein Aai Hoon) X2

  1. Teri Qabr-E-Peh Amman(S.a.) Dard-E-Jigar Sunaaon
Yeh Khoon Bhara Kurta Kaisay Tujhay Dikhaaon

(Amman Mein Aai Hoon Amman Mein Aai Hoon) X2

  2. Amman(S.a.) Yeh Aik Kurta Samaan Mein Bacha Hai

Amman(S.a.) Meray Akhi Ka Kurta Lahoo Bhara Hai

Marqad Mein Is Ko Rakh Lo Soghaat-E-Shaam Samjho

Tum Is Ko Piyar Karlo Aankhon Say Mein Lagaaon

(Amman Mein Aai Hoon Amman Mein Aai Hoon) X2

  3. Amman(S.a.) Libaas-E-Kohna Manga Tha Jab Akhi Nay

Amman(S.a.) Mujhay Tha Maara Us Waqt Zindagi Nay

Mein To Samajh Gai Thi Marnay Chala Hai Bhai(A.s.)

Woh Dastaan Sunakar Mein Khud Hi Mar Na Jaaon

(Amman Mein Aai Hoon Amman Mein Aai Hoon) X2

  4. Amman(S.a.) Tera Gulshan Karbobala Mein Ujrha

Amman(S.a.) Tera Kunba Seh Roz Raha Piyasa

Khaimay Jalay Hain Amman(S.a.) Looti Gaein Ridaen

Main(S.a.) Dastaan Safar Ki Kia Kia Tujhay Bataon

(Amman Mein Aai Hoon Amman Mein Aai Hoon) X2

  5. Amman(S.a.) Meri Rida Ka Zamin Jo Eik Jari Tha

Amman(S.a.) Woh Mera Bhaiyya(A.s.) Jo Aks-E-Haidery(A.s.) Tha

Baazoo Qalam Tha Usk Ka Ghum Ko Bhi Ghum Tha Us Ka

Us Khoon Bharay Alam Ko Palkon Peh Mein Uthaon

(Amman Mein Aai Hoon Amman Mein Aai Hoon) X2

  6. Amman(S.a.) Woh Shaam Walay Nana(S.a.w.w.) Kay Ummati Woh

Amman(S.a.) Qasam Khuda Ki Thay Is Qadar Shaqi Woh

Bachchon Peh Zulm Kar Kay Khushian Mana Rahay Thay

Rahon Mein Marnay Walay Bachchay Kahan Say Laaon

(Amman Mein Aai Hoon Amman Mein Aai Hoon) X2

  7. Amman(S.a.) Tumhari Beti(S.a.) Woh Kaam Kar Kay Aai

Amman(S.a.) Wahan Bhi Mein Nay Farsh-E-Aza Bichaai

Kehtay Hain Jis Ko Zindaan Us Ki Zamin Thi Hairaan

Khud Keh Keh Raha Tha Zindan Farsh-E-Aza Bichaaon

(Amman Mein Aai Hoon Amman Mein Aai Hoon) X2

  8. Amman(S.a.) Ridaen Sar Say Cheni Gaein Hamari

Amman(S.a.) Safar Ki Khatir Be Parda Thi Amari

Pathar Baras Rahay Thay Sar Say Lahoo Tha Jari

Haal-E-Safar Sunakar Ab Kia Tumhein Rulaaon

(Amman Mein Aai Hoon Amman Mein Aai Hoon) X2

  9. Amman(S.a.) Mein Shaam Jakar Zinda Rahi Hoon Kaisay

Amman(S.a.) Safar Ki Sakhti Zahir Hai Bazoon Say

Bazoo Peh Jo Nishan Hain Soghat Hain Safar Ki

Chehray Ki Gard Apnay Kis Tarha Say Chupaaon

(Amman Mein Aai Hoon Amman Mein Aai Hoon) X2

  10. Amman(S.a.) Main Thak Gai Hoon Seenay Say Ab Lagaalo

Amman(S.a.) Mujhay Khudara Pehloo Mein Tum Sulaalo

Tukhrhay Jigar Hai Mera Kaisa Safar Hai Mera

Tum Hi Bataao Amman(S.a.) Kab Tak Main Chalti Jaaon

(Amman Mein Aai Hoon Amman Mein Aai Hoon) X2

tracks.title: Assalam Ghazi Mere
tracks.lyrics:
(Assalam Assalam) X2

(Assalam Ghazi Meray Assalam) X2

  1. Jano Dil Qurbaan Tujh Par Jan(A.s.)-E-Haider(A.s.) Assalam
Baazoo-E-Sibt(A.s.)-E-Payambar(S.a.w.w.) Jan-E-Haider(A.s.) Assalam

(Assalam Ghazi Meray Assalam) X2

  2. Dast-E-Haider(A.s.) Aks-E-Haider(A.s.) Marzi-E-Shabbir(A.s.) Hai

Qalb-E-Zehra(S.a.) Ki Dua Hai Azm-E-Khaiber Geer(A.s.) Hai

Hai Akela Misl-E-Lashkar Jan-E-Haider(A.s.) Assalam

(Assalam Ghazi Meray Assalam) X2

  3. Teray Baazo Zulfeqaar-E-Haidery(A.s.) Say Kam Nahin

Ghaiz Mein Aaen To Zarb-E-Haidery(A.s.) Say Kam Nahin

Saani-E-Zehra(S.a.) Ki Chadar Jan-E-Haider(A.s.) Assalam

(Assalam Ghazi Meray Assalam) X2

  4. Tera Parcham Parcham-E-Islam Ban Kar Reh Gaya

Tera Baazoo Baazoo-E-Eeman Ban Kar Reh Gaya

Ibn-E-Mola(A.s.)-E-Abuzar(A.s.) Jan-E-Haider(A.s.) Assalam

(Assalam Ghazi Meray Assalam) X2

  5. Teri Haibat Teri Jurrat Aur Yeh Tera Alam

Koi Khasakta Nahin Ab Bhi Teri Jhooti Qasam

Aey Bahadur Aur Safdar Jan-E-Haider(A.s.) Assalam

(Assalam Ghazi Meray Assalam) X2

  6. Hai Dua-E-Zainabi(S.a.) Say Tu Alamdar-E-Wafa(A.s.)

Apna Beta(A.s.) Maanti Hain Khud Janab-E-Syeda(S.a.)

Waah Ray Teray Muqaddar Jan-E-Haider(A.s.) Assalam

(Assalam Ghazi Meray Assalam) X2

  7. Tu Hai Quraan-E-Wafa Tafseer Hai Eesaar Ki

Moj Kay Seena Peh Tu Nay Dastaan Tehreer Ki

Mashk Mein Bharkay Samandar Jan-E-Haider(A.s.) Assalam

(Assalam Ghazi Meray Assalam) X2

  8. Hashr Tak Dariya Peh Qabza Karbala Jageer Hai

Tu Hussaini(A.s.) Azm Kay Quraan Ki Tafseer Hai

Tera Dushman Hoga Abtar Jan-E-Haider(A.s.) Assalam

(Assalam Ghazi Meray Assalam) X2

  9. Hogaey Baazo Qalam Jab Mashk Zakhmi Hogai

Janib-E-Khaima Teri Janay Ki Himmat Naa Rahin

Haaey Abbas(A.s.)-E-Dilawar Jan-E-Haider(A.s.) Assalam

(Assalam Ghazi Meray Assalam) X2

tracks.title: Ghar Jal Geya Farmayey Keya Karon
tracks.lyrics:
(Haey Shaam-E-Gharibaan Haey Shaam-E-Gharibaan) X2

Aey Hain Agar App To Ruk Jaiyay Baba (Ghar Jalgaya Main Kia Karon Farmaiyay
Baba) X2

  1. Ab Aey Hain Jab Fauj-E-Khuda(A.s.) Sogai Ran

Jab Khoon Bhara Parcham Hai Alamdar Ka Ban Mein

Seenay Say Alam Ghazi(A.s.) Ka Liptaiyay Baba

Aey Hain Agar App To Ruk Jaiyay Baba (Ghar Jalgaya Main Kia Karon Farmaiyay
Baba) X2

  2. Maidaan Mein Laasha Hai Meray Bhai(A.s.) Ka Uriyan

Poshaak Meray Bhai(A.s.) Ki Hai Khoon Main Ghaltaan

Lillha Kafan Bhai(A.s.) Ko Pehnaiya Baba

Aey Hain Agar App To Ruk Jaiyay Baba (Ghar Jalgaya Main Kia Karon Farmaiyay
Baba) X2

  3. Abid(A.s.) Ko Bacha Lai Hoon Jaltay Huey Ghar Say

Go Shimr-E-Laeh Legaya Chadar Meri Sar Say

Sar Peh Meray Amamay Ko Phailaiyay Baba

Aey Hain Agar App To Ruk Jaiyay Baba (Ghar Jalgaya Main Kia Karon Farmaiyay
Baba) X2

  4. Baba Mujhay Jana Hai Abhi Qaid-E-Sitam Mein

Hona Hai Izafa Abhi Kuch Aur Bhi Ghum Mein

Dam Nad-E-Ali(A.s.) Baazoo Peh Kar Jaiyay Baba

Aey Hain Agar App To Ruk Jaiyay Baba (Ghar Jalgaya Main Kia Karon Farmaiyay
Baba) X2

  5. Baba Main(S.a.) Bohat Tarhpi Hoon Shabbir(A.s.) Kay Ghum Mein

Dil Tukrhay Hai Baba Mera Gazi Kay Alam Mein

Matam Karoon Yeh Reesmaan Khulwaiyay Baba

Aey Hain Agar App To Ruk Jaiyay Baba (Ghar Jalgaya Main Kia Karon Farmaiyay
Baba) X2

  6. Baba Main(S.a.) Rasan Basta Suey Shaam Chali Hoon

Lagta Hi Nahin Mujh Ko Keh Main Bint(S.a.)-E-Ali(A.s.) Hoon

Hamraah Najaf Ab Mujhay Lejaiyay Baba

Aey Hain Agar App To Ruk Jaiyay Baba (Ghar Jalgaya Main Kia Karon Farmaiyay
Baba) X2

  7. Khaimon Ki Jali Raakh Peh Baithi Hai Sakina(A.s.)

Sonay Kay Liey Dhondti Hai Baap Ka Seena

Shabbir(A.s.) Na Aaengay Yeh Samjhaiyay Baba

Aey Hain Agar App To Ruk Jaiyay Baba (Ghar Jalgaya Main Kia Karon Farmaiyay
Baba) X2

  8. Abbas(A.s.) Mera Sogaya Dariya Kay Kinaray

Pardes Mein Cheenay Gaey Sab Meray Saharay

Main Kis Kay Saharay Jiyon Batlaiyay Baba

Aey Hain Agar App To Ruk Jaiyay Baba (Ghar Jalgaya Main Kia Karon Farmaiyay
Baba) X2

  9. Had Hogai Asghar(A.s.) Sa Mujahid Bhi Nahin Hai

Aur Hoosh Mein Is Waqt To Abid(A.s.) Bhi Nahin Hain

Abbas(A.s.) Ko Dariya Say Bula Laiyay Baba

Aey Hain Agar App To Ruk Jaiyay Baba (Ghar Jalgaya Main Kia Karon Farmaiyay
Baba) X2

  10. Aththara Baras Pala Tha Jis Ko Woh Kahan Hai

Tooti Hui Ab Seena-E-Akbar(A.s.) Mein Sina Hai

Maidan Say Akbar(A.s.) Ko Utha Laiyay Baba

Aey Hain Agar App To Ruk Jaiyay Baba (Ghar Jalgaya Main Kia Karon Farmaiyay
Baba) X2

  11. Baba Mujhay Koofay Mein Phiraengay Siamgar

Le Jaaeyga Bazaaron Mein Yeh Shaam Ka Lashkar

Chadar Meray Sar Kay Liey Ban Jaiyay Baba

Aey Hain Agar App To Ruk Jaiyay Baba (Ghar Jalgaya Main Kia Karon Farmaiyay
Baba) X2

tracks.title: Goya Pisar Ki Laash Sey
tracks.lyrics:
Inkaar Aasman Ko Hai Raazi Zamin Nahin

Asghar(A.s.) Teray Lahoo Ka Thikana Kahin Nahin

Maidan Mein Garmi Hai Matti Hai Dhool Hai


Jalti Hai Yeh Zamin Tu Nanha Sa Phool Hai, Goya Pisar Ki Laash Say Sibt-E-
Rasool Hai, Jalti Hai Yeh Zamin Tu Nanha Sa Phool Hai

  1. Asghar(A.s.) Ki Qabr Khood Kar Rotay Raha Hussain

Kehtay Thay Haaey Lakht-E-Jigar Meray Dil Kay Chain

Teray Liey Hussain(A.s.) Bohat Dil Malool Hai

Jalti Hai Yeh Zamin Tu Nanha Sa Phool Hai, Goya Pisar Ki Laash Say Sibt-E-
Rasool Hai, Jalti Hai Yeh Zamin Tu Nanha Sa Phool Hai

  2. Khaimay Ki Simt Kis Tarha Jaaon Meray Pisar(A.s.)

Kis Tarha Teray Marg Ki Baano(S.a.) Ko Doon Khabar

Us Ko Teray Baghair To Marna Qubool Hai

Jalti Hai Yeh Zamin Tu Nanha Sa Phool Hai, Goya Pisar Ki Laash Say Sibt-E-
Rasool Hai, Jalti Hai Yeh Zamin Tu Nanha Sa Phool Hai

  3. Ab Hum(A.s.) Bhi Marnay Jaatay Hain Aey Laal(A.s.) Alwidaa

Laasha Hamara Hona Hai Pamaal Alwidaa

Bach Jaey Deen Nana Ka Mehnat Wusool Hai

Jalti Hai Yeh Zamin Tu Nanha Sa Phool Hai, Goya Pisar Ki Laash Say Sibt-E-
Rasool Hai, Jalti Hai Yeh Zamin Tu Nanha Sa Phool Hai

  4. Laasha Hai Us Kay Haat Peh Khoon Mein Bhara Hua

Jisko Lab-E-Furaat Bhi Pani Na Mil Saka

Jis Kay Liey Rasool Kay Sajday Ko Tool Hai

Jalti Hai Yeh Zamin Tu Nanha Sa Phool Hai, Goya Pisar Ki Laash Say Sibt-E-
Rasool Hai, Jalti Hai Yeh Zamin Tu Nanha Sa Phool Hai

  5. Aey Fauj-E-Kibria(A.s.) Kay Mujahid(A.s.) Tujhay Salam

Kia Shaan-E-Be Zubani Say Tu Nay Kia Kalam

Tareekh-E-Guftugu Ka Anokha Usool Hai

Jalti Hai Yeh Zamin Tu Nanha Sa Phool Hai, Goya Pisar Ki Laash Say Sibt-E-
Rasool Hai, Jalti Hai Yeh Zamin Tu Nanha Sa Phool Hai

  6. Zakhmi Tera Gala Hai Lahoo Phool Sa Badan

Khaimay Kay Dar Peh Baali Sakina(S.a.) Teri Behan(S.a.)

Kehti Hai Teray Baad Ghumon Ka Nuzool Hai

Jalti Hai Yeh Zamin Tu Nanha Sa Phool Hai, Goya Pisar Ki Laash Say Sibt-E-
Rasool Hai, Jalti Hai Yeh Zamin Tu Nanha Sa Phool Hai

tracks.title: Haye Ali Akbaram
tracks.lyrics:
Haye Ali Akbaram

_

(Haay Ali Akbaram Hae Ali Akbaram) X2

  1. Jan-E-Padar Kushta-E-Talwaar Ali Akbaram(A.s.)

(Haay Ali Akbaram Hae Ali Akbaram) X2

  2. Maah-E-Manam Sher-E-Jigar Dar Ali Akbaram(A.s.)

(Haay Ali Akbaram Hae Ali Akbaram) X2

  3. Husn-E-Rukhat Mah-E-Falak

Seem Tanat Rashk-E-Malak

Lal-E-Laban Khanda-E-Gul

Aey Gul-E-Gulzaar Ali Akbaram(A.s.)

(Haay Ali Akbaram Hae Ali Akbaram) X2

  4. Dolat-E-Bedaar Man Ast

Andak-E-Bisiyar Man Ast

Daaro-E-Aazar Man Ast

Aey Gul-E-Gulzaar Ali Akbaram(A.s.)

(Haay Ali Akbaram Hae Ali Akbaram) X2

  5. Da Gham-E-Tu Naala Kasham

Az Paey Tu Giriya Kunam

Aey Pisaram(A.s.) Aey Pisaram(A.s.)

Aey Gul-E-Gulzaar Ali Akbaram(A.s.)

(Haay Ali Akbaram Hae Ali Akbaram) X2

  6. Aah Pisar Raft Kuja

Gum Zay Nazar Raft Kuja

Zoor-E-Kamar Raft Kuja

Aey Gul-E-Gulzaar Ali Akbaram(A.s.)

(Haay Ali Akbaram Hae Ali Akbaram) X2

  7. Banda-E-Razi Ba Raza

Shud Hadaf-E-Jor-O-Jafa

Qatl Udu Kard Tora

Aey Gul-E-Gulzaar Ali Akbaram(A.s.)

(Haay Ali Akbaram Hae Ali Akbaram) X2

  8. Haif Dar Aan Dasht-E-Bala

Shakl-E-Rasool-E-Dosara(S.a.w.w.)

Kushta-E-Shud Jor-O-Jafa

Aey Gul-E-Gulzaar Ali Akbaram(A.s.)

(Haay Ali Akbaram Hae Ali Akbaram) X2

  9. Giriya-E-Laila(S.a.) Paey Tu

Ashk-E-Sakina(S.a.) Paey Tu

Nauha-E-Sughra(S.a.) Paey Tu

Aey Gul-E-Gulzaar Ali Akbaram(A.s.)

(Haay Ali Akbaram Hae Ali Akbaram) X2

  10. Teera Jahan Dar Nazaram

Zakhm Zada Dar Jigaram

Aah Che Shum Aey Pisaram(A.s.)

Aey Gul-E-Gulzaar Ali Akbaram(A.s.)

(Haay Ali Akbaram Hae Ali Akbaram) X2

  11. Tu Sar-O-Samaan-E-Man(A.s.) Ast

Tu Pisaram(A.s.) Jaan-E-Man(A.s.) Ast

Hasrat-O-Armaan-E-Man(A.s.) Ast

Aey Gul-E-Gulzaar Ali Akbaram(A.s.)

(Haay Ali Akbaram Hae Ali Akbaram) X2

  12. Kun Sukhan Aawaz Be Kun

Az Basat Awaz Be Kun

Qatl Dilam Baaz Bekun

Aey Gul-E-Gulzaar Ali Akbaram(A.s.)

(Haay Ali Akbaram Hae Ali Akbaram) X2

  13. Aey Keh Tu Lakht-E-Jigaram

Aey Keh Tu Rashk-E-Qamaram

Aey Keh Tu Noor-E-Nazaram

Aey Gul-E-Gulzaar Ali Akbaram(A.s.)

(Haay Ali Akbaram Hae Ali Akbaram) X2

tracks.title: Jaraha Hon Karbala Mey
tracks.lyrics:
(Jaraha Hoon Jaraha Hoon) X2
(Karbala) X4

Jaraha Ho Karbala Main Jarha Hoon Karbala Main

  1. (Mominon Mil Kar Chalo) X2 Yeh Hai Hussaini Qafla

(Nauha Parhho Matam Karo) X2 (Hussain Ya Hussain) X2 (Jaraha Ho Karbala Main)
X2

  2. Farz Hai Ganj-E-Shahidan Ki Ziarat Is Tarha

Farz Quraan Ki Tilawat Aur Ibadat Jis Tarha

Karbalal Ghum Ka Madina Karbala Kaaba Numa

(Nauha Parhho Matam Karo) X2 (Hussain Ya Hussain) X2 (Jaraha Ho Karbala Main)
X2

  3. Woh Zamin Jo Mool Li Thi Syed-E-Abrar(A.s.) Nay

Us Zamin Par Sheh(A.s.) Ko Mara Shimr-E-Bad Atwar Nay

Us Zamin Ki Khaak Ko Sheh(A.s.) Nay Kia Khaak-E-Shifa

(Nauha Parhho Matam Karo) X2 (Hussain Ya Hussain) X2 (Jaraha Ho Karbala Main)
X2

  4. Karbala Kia Hai Moalla Adam(A.s.)-O-Eesa(A.s.) Ka Hai

Karbala Dar-Ul-Khilafa Khum Kay Us Mola(A.s.) Ka Hai

Jo Kay Hai Nafs-E-Payambar(S.a.w.w.) Jo Kay Hai Sher-E-Khuda(A.s.)

(Nauha Parhho Matam Karo) X2 (Hussain Ya Hussain) X2 (Jaraha Ho Karbala Main)
X2

  5. Yeh Zamin Woh Hai Jahan Sota Hai Zehra(S.a.) Ka Pisar

Ambia(A.s.) Kartay Hain Sajda Ab Bhi Us Ki Khaak Par

Apnay Bachchon Kay Liey Mehw-E-Fughaan Hain Syeda(S.a.)

(Nauha Parhho Matam Karo) X2 (Hussain Ya Hussain) X2 (Jaraha Ho Karbala Main)
X2

  6. Gardan-E-Shabbir(A.s.) Par Khanjar Chala Tha Jis Jagah

Seena-E-Akbar(A.s.) Mein Naiza Tha Jahan Toota Hua

Gulshan-E-Zehra(S.a.) Kay Gul Bootay Jahan Hain Ja Baja

(Nauha Parhho Matam Karo) X2 (Hussain Ya Hussain) X2 (Jaraha Ho Karbala Main)
X2

  7. Roza-E-Abbas(A.s.) Par Jakar Azadari Karein

Roza-E-Shabbir(A.s.) Par Aankhon Say Khoon Jaari Karein

Alqama Peh Jakay Piyason(A.s.) Ki Karein Majlis Bapa

(Nauha Parhho Matam Karo) X2 (Hussain Ya Hussain) X2 (Jaraha Ho Karbala Main)
X2

  8. Haaey Woh Shaam-E-Ghariban Jis Mein Zainab(S.a.) Lut Gai

Baap Say Baali Sakina(S.a.) Beton(A.s.) Say Maan(S.a.) Chut Gai

Asghar(A.s.)-E-Maasoom Ka Jis Dasht Mein Jhoola Jala

(Nauha Parhho Matam Karo) X2 (Hussain Ya Hussain) X2 (Jaraha Ho Karbala Main)
X2

tracks.title: Juda Na Karo Bhai Sey Mujhey
tracks.lyrics:
Baba(A.s.) Kay Liey Qaid Mein Roti Thi Sakina(S.a.)
Yeh Kon Hai Kia Naam Hai Hakim Nay Yeh Poocha
Darbaan Nay Hakim Ko Yeh Tab Jakay Bataya
Eik Bachi Hai Rassi Say Gala Dukhta Hai Jiska
Main Is Juda Karta Hoon Jab Bhai(A.s.) Say Is(S.a.) Kay
Yeh Khauf Zada Hokay Yehi Karti Hai Naalay

  1. (Juda Naa Karo Mujhay Bhai(A.s.) Say Andhera Bohat Yeh Zindan Hai)X2
Aray Zalimon Sitam Na Karo Labon Par Ruki Meri Jaan Hai

(Juda Naa Karo Mujhay Bhai(A.s.) Say Andhera Bohat Yeh Zindan Hai)X2

  2. Behan(S.a.) Kehti Thi Yeh Sajjad(A.s.) Ki Sifarish Karo Laen Say Meriyeh Tum(A.s.) Say Mujhay Juda Na Karay Meray Haal Par Mujhay Chorh Dayyahan Tum Raho Wahan Main Rahon To Bas Mot Ka Hi Imkan Hai

(Juda Naa Karo Mujhay Bhai(A.s.) Say Andhera Bohat Yeh Zindan Hai)X2

  3. Padar(A.s.) Aur Chacha(A.s.) Kay Sar Hain Juda Mera Bhai(A.s.) Bhi To Mara Gayayeh Beemar(A.s.) Jo Mera Bhai Hai Yahan Is(A.s) Ko Bhi Qaza Lai Haijuda Hokay Hum(A.s.) Na Jee Paengay Saza Yeh Na Do To Ehsaan Hai

(Juda Naa Karo Mujhay Bhai(A.s.) Say Andhera Bohat Yeh Zindan Hai)X2

  4. Ujaalon Mein Main(S.a.) Hamaisha Rahi Na Bhai Mujhay Kabhi Teergi

Yeh Tanhaiyan Yeh Tarikiyan Meri Umr Say Barhi Sakhtiyan

Main Zakhmi Badan Main Tashna Dahan Meri Mot Ka Yeh Saamaan Hai

  5. Chalo Ab Kabhi Nahin Rouongi Aziyat Mein Hoon Magar Souongi

Chalo Ab Rahogay Tum Chain Say Na Jagoo Gay Tum Meray Bain Say Mujhay Hai
Khabar Main(S.a.) Roi Agar To Zulm-O-Sitam Ka Toofaan

  6. Tamanchay Lagay Main Chup Hi Rahi Gohar Chin Gaey Main Chup Hi Rahi Giri Oont Say Rah-E-Shaam Mein Tamanchay Milay Hain Inaam Mein Mujhay Ronay Do Aray Zalimon Mera Dil Bohat Pareshaan Hai

  7. Khuda Kay Liey Sitam Yeh Na Kar Kisi Say Nahin Khuda Say To Dar

Nabi(S.a.w.w.) Ka Agar Tu Hai Ummati Yeh Be Hurmati Sar-E-Shaah Ki

Kudara Na Kar Aray Bad Nazar Yeh Sar Deen Hai Yeh Quraan Hai



(Juda Naa Karo Mujhay Bhai(A.s.) Say Andhera Bohat Yeh Zindan Hai) X2



  8. Mujhay Hai Khabar Na Jee Paaongi Yahan Say Na Ab Main Ghar Jaaongi

Karay Ga Na Ab Koi Bhi Madad Isi Qaid Main Banaygi Lahad

Mera Perahan Banayga Kafan Keh Maskan Mera Yeh Zindaan Hai



(Juda Naa Karo Mujhay Bhai(A.s.) Say Andhera Bohat Yeh Zindan Hai) X2



  9. Hai Jaari Lahoo Meray Kaan Say Yeh Kaisa Sitam Hai Mehmaan Say

Phophi(S.a.) Say Alag Hoon Maan Say Juda Hai Kurta Mera Lahoo Say Bhara

Meri Zindagi Dukhon Say Bhari Yeh Mazloomiat Meri Shaan Hai



(Juda Naa Karo Mujhay Bhai(A.s.) Say Andhera Bohat Yeh Zindan Hai) X2

tracks.title: Aaiye Mola As
tracks.lyrics:
Isteghasa Hai "Rehan Azmi" Mera

Bargah-E-Aakhir-Uz-Zamaan(A.s.) Mein Aey Khuda

Lashkar-E-Imam(A.s.) Mein Hon Saaray Matmi

"Farhan" Majlis-E-Hussain(A.s.) Mein Karay Dua

(Aeay Maula Aeay Maula, Lashkar-E-Hussain Ban Kay Aeay Maula) X2

  1. Gharian Intezar Ki Tamam Ho Chukin

Zulm-O-Jor Ki Fizaen Aam Ho Chukin

Aap(A.s.) Kay Zahoor Ki Jo Thin Nishanian

Roonuma Woh Sab Har Aik Gaam Ho Chukin

Dair Ho Chuki Sahib-Uz-Zamaan(A.s.)

Lashkar-E-Hussain(A.s.) Ban Kay Aeay Maula

(Aeay Maula Aeay Maula, Lashkar-E-Hussain Ban Kay Aeay Maula) X2

  2. De Rahay Hain Kab Say Al-Ajal Ki Hum Sada

Bhaijtay Hain Har Baras Areezay Aur Dua

Mauj Ko Banalia Hai Apna Namah Bar

Jaanti Hai Mauj Hi To Aap(A.s.) Ka Pata

Aapp(A.s.) Kay Liey Hum Tarhaptay Hain

Lashkar-E-Hussain(A.s.) Ban Kay Aeay Maula

(Aeay Maula Aeay Maula, Lashkar-E-Hussain Ban Kay Aeay Maula) X2

  3. Masjidein Pukarti Hain Har Namaz Mein

Bargahein Dhondti Hain Har Ghari Tumhain

Majlison Mein Parhtay Hain Dua-E-Nahia

Aarzoo Hai Is Sadi Mein Tum Ko Daikhlein

Daur Khatm Ho Ab Yeh Ghaib Ka

Lashkar-E-Hussain(A.s.) Ban Kay Aeay Maula

(Aeay Maula Aeay Maula, Lashkar-E-Hussain Ban Kay Aeay Maula) X2

  4. Intezar-E-Adl Hai Adalaton Ko Bhi

Aap(A.s.) Aakhri Imam(A.s.) Barhwein(12Th) Ali(A.s.)

Aap(A.s.) Aeay To Dil Ko Chain Aaeyga

Aap(A.s.) Hi Kay Intezar Mein Hai Zindagi

Taigh-E-Haidery(A.s.) Aap(A.s.) Laengay

Lashkar-E-Hussain(A.s.) Ban Kay Aeay Maula

(Aeay Maula Aeay Maula, Lashkar-E-Hussain Ban Kay Aeay Maula) X2

  5. Hain Libas-E-Deen Mein Mukhalif-E-Aza

Baichnay Lagay Khateeb Zikr-E-Karbala

Para Para Kardia Hai Ittehad Ko

Majlison Say Hai Namaz Ka Muqabla

Waris(A.s.)-E-Aza Deer Na Laga

Lashkar-E-Hussain(A.s.) Ban Kay Aeay Maula

(Aeay Maula Aeay Maula, Lashkar-E-Hussain Ban Kay Aeay Maula) X2

  6. Parhtay Hain Namaz Sheh(A.s.) Kay Saaray Matmi

Zikr Hai Namaz Ka To Majlison Mein Bhi

Sajda-E-Hussain(A.s.) Ka Jisay Khayal Hai

Janta Hai Manzilat Ko Woh Namaz Ki

Is Tafarraqay Ko Mitaeay

Lashkar-E-Hussain(A.s.) Ban Kay Aeay Maula

(Aeay Maula Aeay Maula, Lashkar-E-Hussain Ban Kay Aeay Maula) X2

  7. Paash Paash Aap(A.s.) Ka Bhi Dil Hai Ya Imam(A.s.)

Yaad Aap(A.s.) Ko Bhi Hai Woh Karbala Ki Shaam

Jab Ridaen Bibion(S.a.) Kay Sar Say Chin Gaen

Jal Rahay Thay Jis Gharhi Hussain(A.s.) Kay Khayam

Pursa Lejiey Har Shaheed(A.s.) Ka

Lashkar-E-Hussain(A.s.) Ban Kay Aeay Maula

(Aeay Maula Aeay Maula, Lashkar-E-Hussain Ban Kay Aeay Maula) X2

  8. Ris Raha Hai Khoon Ab Bhi Jis Kay Kaan Say

Woh Sakina(S.a.) Qaid Say Na Aai Laut Kay

Qaid-E-Shaam Mein Lehad Hai Us(S.a.) Ki Aaj Bhi

Aati Hai Sada Yeh Aaj Us(S.a.) Ki Qabr Say

Zalimon Say Ab Intaqaam Lein

Lashkar-E-Hussain(A.s.) Ban Kay Aeay Maula

(Aeay Maula Aeay Maula, Lashkar-E-Hussain Ban Kay Aeay Maula) X2

  9. Intaqaam Shah(A.s.)-E-Karbala Ka Leingay Aap(A.s.)

Majlison Mein Zikr-E-Karbala Kareingay Aap(A.s.)

Matam-E-Hussain(A.s.) Kay Urooj Kay Liey

Apnay Jad(A.s.) Kay Haal Ka Nauha Parhheingay Aap(A.s.)

Ghazi(A.s.) Ka Alam Hoga Haath Mein

Lashkar-E-Hussain(A.s.) Ban Kay Aeay Maula

(Aeay Maula Aeay Maula, Lashkar-E-Hussain Ban Kay Aeay Maula) X2

tracks.title: Baba Aao Na
tracks.lyrics:
Eik Bibi(S.a.) Yaad Mein Baba Ki
Moti Ashkon Kay Piroti Hai
Jaagti Hai Naa Soti Hai
Bas Ro Rokar Yeh Kehti Hai
Meray Baba Haey Baba Aao Na

(Baba Aao Na) X2

Din Kat Tay Hain Ro Rokar Ratein Katein Fariyadon Mein

(Baba Aao Na) X2

Bain Karon Kab Tak Baba Main(S.a.) Ashkon Ki Barsaaton Mein

(Baba Aao Na) X2

  1. Tum Jab Say Gaey Saathi Meri Beemari Hai Tanhai Hai

Uthta Hi Nahin Sar Bistar Say Kuch Aisi Naqahat Chai Hai

Ashkon Kay Deep Jalati Hoon Tanhai Ki In Raaton Mein

(Baba Aao Na) X2

  2. Dukh Beemari Ka Kaafi Tha Kion Dard-E-Judai Dekay Gaey

Eik Choti Behan(S.a.) Humjoli Thi Tum(A.s.) Saath Usay Bhi Lekay Gaey

Woh(S.a.) Hoti To Dil Behlati Main Us Say Baton Baton Mein

(Baba Aao Na) X2

  3. Maen To Sahar Hoti Hain Baiti Kay Liey Har Toofan Mein

Main Kaisay Guzarongi Lamhay Tanhai Kay Aisay Zindan Mein

Khat Likhnay Ko Bas Rehta Hai Qirtaas-O-Qalam Ab Hathon Mein

(Baba Aao Na) X2

  4. Cheh Maah Hue Aai Na Khabar Pardes Ko Janay Walon Ki

Khojaey Na Rotay Rotay Kahin Beenai Hamari Aankhon Ki

Dil Darta Hai Uftaad Na Ho Meray Baba Teri Raahon Mein

(Baba Aao Na) X2

  5. Khaali Hujray Khaali Bistar Jab Daikhti Hoon Baba Ghar Mein

Eik Hook Si Dil Mein Uthti Hai Eik Dard Sa Hota Hai Sar Mein

Hojatay Hain Aansoo Bhi Shamil Baba Sughra(S.a.) Ki Aanhon Mein

(Baba Aao Na) X2

  6. Woh Aangan Soona Soona Hai Jahan Ghutnion Chalta Tha Asghar(A.s.)

Mehraab Woh Dil Tarpaati Hai Detay Thay Azan Jis Mein Akbar(A.s.)

Aaja Asghar(A.s.) Aaja Akbar(A.s.) Aawaz Hai Meri Karahon Mein

(Baba Aao Na) X2

  7. Jis Din Say Gaey Ho Tum(A.s.) Baba Main Soochti Rehti Hoon Aksar

Te Kaisay Kia Hoga Tum Nay Sehraaon Mein Garmi Ka Yeh Safar

Jab Koi Shajar Rastaky Mein Nahin Lagay Khaimay Kaisay Chaaon Mein

(Baba Aao Na) X2

  8. Kia Rooth Gaey Baba Mujh Say Kion Suntay Nahin Fariyad Meri

Kia Aati Nahin Tum Ko Baba Thorhi Si Bhi Ab Yaad Meri

Hasrat Hai Kitni Aey Baba Aakar Dekho In Aankhon Mein

(Baba Aao Na) X2

  9. Eik Waaday Par Main(S.a.) Zinda Hon Waada Jo Kia Tha Asghar(A.s.)

Lenay Mujhay Aaengay Bhaiyya(A.s.) Khud Mujh Say Kaha Tha Akbar(A.s.) Nay

Hai Mujh(S.a.) Ko Yaqeen Meray Baba Sachchai Hai Un Kay Waadon Mein

(Baba Aao Na) X2

  10. Shabaan Gai Ramzan Gaya Aur Eid Bhi Guzri Rotay Huey

Main(S.a.) Bewaris Si Lagti Hoon Pooray Kunbay Kay Hotay Huey

Bin Aap Kay Yoon Lagta Hai Mujhay Hain Zehr Ghula Meri Saansoon Mein

(Baba Aao Na) X2

  11. Woh Din Bhi Kabhi Ab Aaeyga Jab Aun(A.s.)-O-Mohammad(A.s.) Aaengay

Dastak Dekar Darwazay Par Seenay Say Meray Lag Jaaengay

Main(S.a.) Apni Phophi(S.a.) Kay Bachchon(A.s.) Ko Lelongi Apni Baanhoon Mein

(Baba Aao Na) X2

tracks.title: Bhayi Kamar Torh Gaey
tracks.lyrics:
(Haaey Kamar Torh Gaey Bhayi Kamar Torh Gaey) X2

Tanha Humein Dasht Mein Kaisay Bhala Chorh Gaey, Haaey Kamar Torh Gaey, Bhayi
Kamar Torh Gaey

  1. Aray, Degaey Ho Itnay Ghum Jee Sakeingay Kaisay Hum(A.s.)

Aray, Hogaya Kaisa Sitam Ghum Say Kamar Hai Yeh Khum

Guzri Meray Dil Peh Kia Kaisay Bataaon Tujhay

(Haaey Kamar Torh Gaey Bhayi Kamar Torh Gaey) X2

  2. Aray, Dekh Meri Bebasi Karbobala Kay Ali(A.s.)

Aray, Had Say Barhhi Tashnagi Ghairay Hain Mujh(A.s.) Ko Shaqi

Halq Peh Kia Janiey Kab Meray Khanjar Chalay

(Haaey Kamar Torh Gaey Bhayi Kamar Torh Gaey) X2

  3. Aray, Tum(A.s.) To Alamdar Thay Bhayi Kay Gumkhuar Thay

Aray, Kitanay Wafadar Thay Fauj Kay Saalaar Thay

Ab Yeh Alam Fauj Ka Hum(A.s.) Bhala Daingay Kisay

(Haaey Kamar Torh Gaey Bhayi Kamar Torh Gaey) X2

  4. Aray, Doon Main(A.s.) Kisay Ab Sada Ran Mein Hon Tanha Kharha

Aray, Waqt-E-Ajal Aagaya Khushk Hai Mera Gala

Chalnay Ko Talwaar Hai Khushk Galay Par Meray

(Haaey Kamar Torh Gaey Bhayi Kamar Torh Gaey) X2

  5. Aray, Baad Meray Hoga Kia Yeh Nahi Tujh(A.s.) Ko Pata

Aray, Sab Saron Say Rida Looteingay Yeh Ashkia

Fauj-E-Sitam Bandhay Gi Aihl-E-Haram(A.s.) Kay Galay

(Haaey Kamar Torh Gaey Bhayi Kamar Torh Gaey) X2

  6. Aray, Aankh Main Khoon Hai Bhara Teer Hai Aisa Laga

Aray, Hogaey Baazoo Juda Sar Bhi Dopara Hua

Bhai Yeh Halat Teri Jeenay Na Degi Mujhay

(Haaey Kamar Torh Gaey Bhayi Kamar Torh Gaey) X2

  7. Aray, Taigh Talay Shah(A.s.) Deen Sajday Main Rakhkar Jabeen

Aray, Kehtay Thay Sun Aey Zamin Ab Mera Koi Nahin

Woh Jo Thay Baazoo Meray Neht Peh Kaatay Gaey

(Haaey Kamar Torh Gaey Bhayi Kamar Torh Gaey) X2

  8. Aray, Teray Saharay Bahan(S.a.) Chorh Kay Aai Watan

Aray, Bhar Gaya Laashon Say Ban Lashein Hai Sab Bekafan

Kis Ko Pukaray Bahan(S.a.) Sar Say Jo Chadar Chinay

(Haaey Kamar Torh Gaey Bhayi Kamar Torh Gaey) X2

  9. Aray, Bali Sakina(S.a.) Teri Jo Hai Teri Ladli

Aray, Mashk Tujhay Dechuki Dar Peh Hai Ab Bhi Kharhi

Nehr Ko Takti Hai Woh Hathon Mein Kooza Liey

(Haaey Kamar Torh Gaey Bhayi Kamar Torh Gaey) X2

  10. Aray, Jee Kay Karon Kia Main Ab Hogaya Aisa Ghazab

Aray, Jeetay Thay Jis Kay Sabab Janay Mileingay Woh(A.s.) Kab

Qatl Kareingay Udo Tanha Humein Dekh Kay

(Haaey Kamar Torh Gaey Bhayi Kamar Torh Gaey) X2

tracks.title: Hosla Baba
tracks.lyrics:
(Main Kaisay Doongi Hatimoon Ko Hosla Baba) X2

  1. Bujha Rahi Hai Diyay Shaam Ki Hawa Baba(A.s.)

(Main Kaisay Doongi Hatimoon Ko Hosla Baba) X2

  2. Tumhara Saamna Kaisay Karay Haya Meri

Udo Nay Cheenli Baba(A.s.) Abhi Rida Meri

Hamari Mushkilein Tum Hi Karo Kusha Baba(A.s.)

(Main Kaisay Doongi Hatimoon Ko Hosla Baba) X2

  3. Jaltay Khaimon Ka Dhuwan Daikh Rahay Ho Baba(A.s.)

Ashk Aankhon Say Rawan Daikh Rahay Ho Baba(A.s.)

Guzar Gaya Meray Kunbay Peh Saneha Baba(A.s.)

(Main Kaisay Doongi Hatimoon Ko Hosla Baba) X2

  4. Tamam Din Woh Manazir Nazar Nay Daikhay Hain

Woh Daikho Ganj-E-Shahidaan Mien Kitnay Lashay Hai

Uthakay Lashay Mera Bhai(A.s.) Thak Gaya Baba(A.s.)

(Main Kaisay Doongi Hatimoon Ko Hosla Baba) X2

  5. Meray Ghareeb(A.s.) Ko Lakhon Nay Milkay Maara Hai

Har Aik Zakhm Peh Us Nay Tumhain Pukara Hai

Baghair Dhaar Ka Khanjar Tha Aur Gala Baba(A.s.)

(Main Kaisay Doongi Hatimoon Ko Hosla Baba) X2

  6. Main Haath Malti Rahi Sheh(A.s.) Peh Chal Gaya Khanjar

Hai Meray Bhai(A.s.) Ka Laasha Bhi Jalti Reti Par

Kafan Bhi Bhai(A.s.) Ko Meray Nahin Mila Baba(A.s.)

(Main Kaisay Doongi Hatimoon Ko Hosla Baba) X2

  7. Azan Jo Di Ali Akbar(A.s.) Nay Parh Kay Bismillah

Tarhap Tarhap Kay Main Roi Hoon Subhey Ashura

Main Jaanti Thi Bicharhta Hai Mehlaqa Baba(A.s.)

(Main Kaisay Doongi Hatimoon Ko Hosla Baba) X2

  8. Janaza Amman Ka Shab Mein Uthaya Tha Tum Nay

Main Roi Thi To Galay Say Lagaya Tha Tum Nay

Tumhari Beti(S.a.) Hai Maqtal Mein Be Rida Baba(A.s.)

(Main Kaisay Doongi Hatimoon Ko Hosla Baba) X2

  9. Chupalo Apni Aba Mein Keh Thak Gai Hoon Main

Aseer Hokay Suey Shaam Jaarahi Hoon Main

Safar Taweel Hai Dushwaar Raasta Baba(A.s.)

(Main Kaisay Doongi Hatimoon Ko Hosla Baba) X2

  10. Bachakay Sholon Say Abid(A.s.) Ko Lai Hoon Baba(A.s.)

Main Ghumzada Hoon Falak Ki Satai Hoon Baba(A.s.)

Kaleja Dard Say Zainab(S.a.) Ka Phat Gaya Baba(A.s.)

(Main Kaisay Doongi Hatimoon Ko Hosla Baba) X2

tracks.title: Ilayya Ya Bunaiyya
tracks.lyrics:
Ilayya Ya Bunaiyya
(Ilayya Ilayya Ya Bunaiyya) X2

  1. Ter Baba(A.s.) Sota Hai Yahan

(Ilayya Ilayya Ya Bunaiyya) X2

  2. Thookrain Khaati Hui Maqtal Mein Kion Aai Hai Tu

Mujh Ko Dikhlanay Tamanchon Kay Nishan Lai Hai Tu

Neend Say Aankhein Hai Bojhal Aa Meray Nazdeek Aa

Tera Baba(A.s.) Sota Hai Yahan

(Ilayya Ilayya Ya Bunaiyya) X2

  3. Jaanta Hoon Meray Senay Par Sada Soi Hai Tu

Teri Aankhein Keh Rahi Hain Kis Qadar Roi Hai Tu

Is Andheray Dasht Mein Kion Daiti Hai Mujh Ko Sada

Tera Baba(A.s.) Sota Hai Yahan

(Ilayya Ilayya Ya Bunaiyya) X2

  4. Aaj Ki Shab Maan(S.a.) Kay Paihloo Mein Hi Sona Tha Tumhain

Piyasay Bachon Aur Phuphi(S.a.) Sath Rehna Tha Tumhain

Aa Meray Teeron Bharay Seenay Peh Aakay Lait Jaa

Tera Baba(A.s.) Sota Hai Yahan

(Ilayya Ilayya Ya Bunaiyya) X2

  5. Hogai Hai Shaam Phir Bhi Garm Hai Saari Zamin

Daikh Teray Paoon Mein Chalay Na Parh Jaen Kahin

Kion Nikal Aai Hai Khaimay Say Barehna Pa Bata

Tera Baba(A.s.) Sota Hai Yahan

(Ilayya Ilayya Ya Bunaiyya) X2

  6. Sogaey Wehshi Darinday Tu Hai Ab Tak Jaagti

Phir Rahi Hai Baba(A.s.) Baba(A.s.) Kehti Meri Laadli

Main Yahan Aur Nehr Peh Betab Hotay Hain Chacha(A.s.)

Tera Baba(A.s.) Sota Hai Yahan

(Ilayya Ilayya Ya Bunaiyya) X2

  7. Aa Meri Aaghosh Mien Kuch Dair Aakay Lait Ja

Phir To Sooey Shaam Jaega Hamara Qafla(A.s.)

Teri Gardan Mein Rasan Bandhay Gi Yeh Fauj-E-Jafaa

Tera Baba(A.s.) Sota Hai Yahan

(Ilayya Ilayya Ya Bunaiyya) X2

  8. Tujh Ko Paidal Mujh Ko Naizay Par Safar Karna Hai Ab

Karbala Sar Hochuki Hai Shaam Sar Karan Hai Ab

Daikh Marqad Chorh Kay Maqtal Mein Aaen Syeda(S.a.)

Tera Baba(A.s.) Sota Hai Yahan

(Ilayya Ilayya Ya Bunaiyya) X2

  9. Beh Raha Hai Khoon Kaanon Say Sakina Kis Qadar

Askh Say Chehra Hai Bheega Khon Say Poshak Tar

Daikh Kar Tujh Ko Pukara Laasha-E-Besar Mera

Tera Baba(A.s.) Sota Hai Yahan

(Ilayya Ilayya Ya Bunaiyya) X2

tracks.title: Maa Meri Piyari Maa
tracks.lyrics:
(Maa Meri Piyari Maa Paas Bulalay Maa) X2

  1. Waqt-E-Shahadat Aa Pohncha Hai Khanjar-E-Qatil Bhi Piyasa Hai

Piyas Bujhanay Taigh-E-Sitam Ki Tera Lahoo Maqtal Jata Hai

Hota Hoon Ghar Say Rawaan Paas Bulalay Maa

(Maa Meri Piyari Maa Paas Bulalay Maa) X2

  2. Mein Nay Kafan Ki Surat Mein Ab Pehna Hai Malboos Purana

Janay Kab Khanjar Chal Jaey Khoon Mein Apnay Kab Ho Nahana

Ghum Say Kamar Hai Kamaa Paas Bulalay Maa

(Maa Meri Piyari Maa Paas Bulalay Maa) X2

  3. Sajda-E-Aakhir Ko Jana Hai Choorh Kay In Rotay Bachon Ko

Mein Nay Deen Par Waar Dia Hai Jhoolay Mein Sotay Bachon Ko

Hogaya Waqt-E-Azaan Paas Bulalay Maa

(Maa Meri Piyari Maa Paas Bulalay Maa) X2

  4. Maa Yeh Nana Ki Ummat Hai Zulm Ki Bani Aisi Hai Yeh

Qatl Kiya Eik Aik Jari(A.s.) Ko Meray Khoon Ki Piyasi Hai Yeh

Jaaon Ab Mein Kahaan Paas Bulalay Maa

(Maa Meri Piyari Maa Paas Bulalay Maa) X2

  5. Meri Behan Zainab(S.a.) Woh Kharhi Hai Kahimay Kay Dar Say Daikh Rahi Hai

Sabr Khuda Day Meri Behan(S.a.) Ko Amman Dua Do Sakht Gharhi Hai

Rooti Hain Sab Bibiaan(S.a.) Paas Bulalay Maa

(Maa Meri Piyari Maa Paas Bulalay Maa) X2

  6. Teray Senay Par Sar Rakh Kar Soey Huey Barson Beetay Hain

God Mein Sooun Teri Jaisay Jhoolay Mein Bachay Sotay Hain

Chahiey Mujh Ko Amaa Paas Bulalay Maa

(Maa Meri Piyari Maa Paas Bulalay Maa) X2

  7. Amman Tumhain Woh Yaad To Hoga Tum Say Kaha Tha Jo Nana(S.a.w.w.) Nay

Dasht-E-Bala Mein Tanha Hoga Lal(A.s.) Yeh Tera Khoon Mein Naha Kay

Ab Tum Ho Saebaan Paas Bulalay Maa

(Maa Meri Piyari Maa Paas Bulalay Maa) X2

  8. Chalni Hua Akbar(A.s.) Ka Kaleja Seenay Mein Toota Hai Naiza

Noor Gaya Meri Aankhon Ka Milta Nahin Hai Mujh Ko Rasta

Mar Gaya Karhial Jawaan Paas Bulalay Maa

(Maa Meri Piyari Maa Paas Bulalay Maa) X2

  9. Moon Ko Chupalo Balon Say Apnay Daikh Sakogi Kaisay Yeh Manzar

Kaisay Sahogi Daikh Kay Amman Apnay Pisar(A.s.) Kay Halq Peh Khanjar

Yeh Hai Mera Imterhaan Paas Bulalay Maa

(Maa Meri Piyari Maa Paas Bulalay Maa) X2

  10. Laashon Par Laashein Laya Ho Maqtal Say Mein Tanha Amman

Dil Mein Nahin Hai Taqat Meray Uthta Nahin Hai Sadma Amman

Khushk Hai Meri Zubaan Paas Bulalay Maa

(Maa Meri Piyari Maa Paas Bulalay Maa) X2

  11. Baad Meray Zainab(S.a.) Dukhiyari Kaisay Sambhalay Gi Bachon Ko

Amman Us Ka Saath Tu Dena Khutbay Sunaey Shaam Mein Jab Woh

Deen Ki Hai Nigraan Paas Bulalay Maa

(Maa Meri Piyari Maa Paas Bulalay Maa) X2

  12. Bali Sakina(S.a.) Rok Rahi Hai Maqtal Mein Janay Nahin Deti

Kis Kay Seenay Par Soegi Amman Meri Piyari Baiti(S.a.)

Us Peh Karo Aihsaan Paas Bulalay Maa

(Maa Meri Piyari Maa Paas Bulalay Maa) X2

  13. Zakhmon Say Khoon Aankh Say Aansoo Maqtal Mein Kab Tak Barsaaon

Kis Ki Laash Ko Tanha Chorhoon Kaandhay Peh Kis Ki Laash Uthaon

Aik Akeli Jaan Paas Bulalay Maa

(Maa Meri Piyari Maa Paas Bulalay Maa) X2

tracks.title: Shaam Ki Galiyan
tracks.lyrics:
(Shaam Haey Shaam Haey Shaam Haey Shaam) X2

(Haey Shaam Ki Galian Aaein Hai) X2

  1. Naizon Peh Shahidon Kay Sar Hain Beemar(A.s.) Bhi Chalta Jaata Hai

(Haey Shaam Ki Galian Aaein Hai) X2

  2. Zanjeer Ulajh Kar Peron Say Kehti Hai Yeh Ghum Kay Maaron Say

Kuch Dair Mein Paththar Barseingay

Is Shehr Kay Baala Khanon Say Sajjad(A.s.) Ka Dil Gharbrata Hai

(Haey Shaam Ki Galian Aaein Hai) X2

Be Ghar Hain Musafir Bechadar Hai Kitni Aziyat Ka Yeh Safar

Bazoo Hain Bandhay Maan Behnon Kay

Sar Baap(A.s.) Chacha(A.s.) Kay Khoon Mein Tar Beemar(A.s.) Bohat Sharmata Hai

(Haey Shaam Ki Galian Aaein Hai) X2

  3. Eik Rassi Hai Aur Bara Galay Yeh Qafla Aakhir Kaisay Chalay

Jalti Hai Zamin Kanton Say Bhari

Ronay Lagay Peron Kay Chalay Khoon Zakhmon Say Rista Jata Hai

(Haey Shaam Ki Galian Aaein Hai) X2

  4. Kothon Peh Tamashai Hain Kharhay Aur Shaam Kay Baam-O-Dar Hain Sajay

Ummat Hai Nabi(S.a.w.w.) Ki Chaar Taraf

Parhti Hai Nabi(S.a.w.w.) Zadi(S.a.) Khutbay Aur Ashk Falak Barsata Hai

(Haey Shaam Ki Galian Aaein Hai) X2

  5. Darbaar Ka Dar Nazdeek Aya Bazaar-E-Sitam Ab Khatm Hua

Kuch Dair Aseeron(A.s.) Ko Roko

Yeh Hukm-E-Yazidi Hai Aya Darbar Sajaya Jata Hai

(Haey Shaam Ki Galian Aaein Hai) X2

  6. Darbar-E-Sitam Ki Aaraish Aur Takht-E-Laen Ki Zebaish

Jab Hochuki Poori Tab Jakar

Badkar Nay Ki Yeh Farmaish Lo Jashn Manaya Jata Hai

(Haey Shaam Ki Galian Aaein Hai) X2

  7. Ba Parda Kanizein Baithi Hain Saidanian Saari Roti Hain

Fizza(S.a.) Ko Banakar Jab Parda

Zehra(S.a.) Ki Betian(S.a.) Chupti Hain Sajjad Ko Ghash Ajata Hai

(Haey Shaam Ki Galian Aaein Hai) X2

  8. Zalim Nay Ajab Yeh Kaam Kia Zainab(S.a.) Ka Achanak Naam Lia

Ghabrakay Ali(A.s.) Ki Beti(S.a.) Nay

Haathon Say Jigar Ko Thaam Lia Abid(A.s.) Ko Jalal Aajata Hai

(Haey Shaam Ki Galian Aaein Hai) X2

  9. Zanjeer Chatakh Kar Toot Gai Beemar(A.s.) Nay Eik Angrhai Jo Li

Darbar-E-Sitam Mein Shor Utha

Kia Aaj Najaf Say Aaey Ali(A.s.) Ya Waqt-E-Qayamat Aata Hai

(Haey Shaam Ki Galian Aaein Hai) X2

  10. Darbar Say Jab Zindan Mein Gaey Sajjad(A.s.) Phophi(S.a.) Say Kehnay Lagay

Yeh Kaisa Andhera Zindan Hai

Yaan Zinda Raheingay Hum(A.s.) Kaisay Dil Mera Dooba Jata Hai

(Haey Shaam Ki Galian Aaein Hai) X2

  11. Zindaan Mein Sakina(S.a.) Nay Poocha Ghar Jaengay Hum(A.s.) Kis Din Bhaiyya(A.s.)

Ya Aur Koi Baqi Hai Sitam

Ghut Ta Hai Yahan To Dam Mera Ab Saans Ukharhta Jata Hai

tracks.title: Yaa Rab
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Rab Ya Rab) X2

Dar Karbala Aab-E-Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud, Ya Rab Ya Rab, Dar Karbala Aab-E-
Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud

  1. (Yeh Nehr Ye Mojein Yeh Machalta Hua Pani) X2

(Aankhon Mein Meri Kanta Sa Chubhta Hua Pani) X2

Kehta Hai Meray Khon Sa Ubalta Hua Pani

Ya Rab

Dar Karbala Aab-E-Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud, Ya Rab Ya Rab, Dar Karbala Aab-E-
Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud

  2. (Meray Khuda Dekh Meri Tashna Labi Ko) X2

(Khoon Rulatay Hain Yeh Din Aal(A.s.)-E-Nabi Ko) X2

Milti Nahin Nehr Say Eik Boond Kisi Ko

Ya Rab

Dar Karbala Aab-E-Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud, Ya Rab Ya Rab, Dar Karbala Aab-E-
Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud

  3. (Waada Hai Mera Tashna Dahan Bachchon Say Maula) X2

(Le Aaonga Khaimon Ki Taraf Khainch Kay Dariya) X2

Lekin Meri Taqdeer Mein Hai Aur Kuch Likha

Ya Rab

Dar Karbala Aab-E-Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud, Ya Rab Ya Rab, Dar Karbala Aab-E-
Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud

  4. (Meri Wafa Sakht Musibat Mein Ghiri Hai) X2

(Main Hon Alamdar(A.s.) Laqab Mera Jari(A.s.) Hai) X2

Piyasi Bhatiji(S.a.) Dar-E-Khaima Peh Kharhi Hai

Ya Rab

Dar Karbala Aab-E-Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud, Ya Rab Ya Rab, Dar Karbala Aab-E-
Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud

  5. (Mash To Main Bhar Chuka Faujon Ko Bhagakar) X2

(Lekin Tu Gawah Rehna Meray Lab Na Huey Tar) X2

Jana Hai Khaimon Ki Taraf Mashk Bachakar

Ya Rab

Dar Karbala Aab-E-Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud, Ya Rab Ya Rab, Dar Karbala Aab-E-
Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud

  6. (Mera Jo Alam Nehr Kay Seenay Peh Garha Hai) X2

(Be Taigh Yeh Qabza Jo Abhi Main Nay Kia Hai) X2

Seh Roz Say Ya Rab Tu Magar Dekh Raha Hai

Ya Rab

Dar Karbala Aab-E-Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud, Ya Rab Ya Rab, Dar Karbala Aab-E-
Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud

  7. (Waaday Ko Nibhanay Ki To Mohlat Mujhay Deday) X2

(Sharmina Na Kar Bachchon Say Izzat Mujhay Deday) X2

Yeh Baat Na Dohraaon Woh Taqab Mujhay Deday

Ya Rab

Dar Karbala Aab-E-Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud, Ya Rab Ya Rab, Dar Karbala Aab-E-
Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud

  8. (Pani Ko Kabhi Aag Lagatay Nahin Dekha) X2

(Piyasay Ko Musafir Ko Satatay Nahin Dekha) X2

Ashkon Ko Lahoo Mein Nay Banatay Nahin Dekha

Ya Rab

Dar Karbala Aab-E-Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud, Ya Rab Ya Rab, Dar Karbala Aab-E-
Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud

  9. (Paani Nay Yahan Khoon Mera Kardia Paani) X2

(Yaad Aati Hai Bachchon Ki Mujhay Tashna Dahani) X2

Dil Rota Hai Jab Sunta Hoon Bachchon Ki Zubani

Ya Rab

Dar Karbala Aab-E-Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud, Ya Rab Ya Rab, Dar Karbala Aab-E-
Rawan Zehmat-E-Jan Shud

  10. (Bin Pani Liey Nehr Say Jaaey Ga Na Abbas) X2

(Soorat Kisi Piyasay Ko Dikhaeyga Na Abbas) X2

Baat Is Kay Siwa Lab Peh Nahin Laega Abbas(A.s.)

Ya Rab

tracks.title: Zarb E Hyderi As
tracks.lyrics:
Ho Eik Hai Naara Haidery
Ya Ali Ya Ali Ya Ali(A.s) Haider(A.s.)

(Eik Hai Naara Haidery Eik Hai Zarb-E-Haidery) X2

  1. Aisa Naara Mil Kay Lagao Soi Hui Ummat Ko Jagao

Jaen Najaf Tak Is Ki Sadaen Mushkil Ko Khatir Mein Na Laao

(Jhomay Najaf Ki Har Gali) X2 Eik Hai Nara Haidery

(Eik Hai Naara Haidery Eik Hai Zarb-E-Haidery) X2

  2. Yeh Naara Islami Naara Yeh Naara Hai Khair-E-Amal

Is Naaray Ki Zad Peh Rahay Hain Khyber Khandaq Jang-E-Jamal

(Akhir Duniya Maan Gai) X2 Eik Hai Naar Haidery

(Eik Hai Naara Haidery Eik Hai Zarb-E-Haidery) X2

  3. Khail Kay Maidanon Say Lekar Batil Kay Aiwanon Tak

Is Naaray Ki Gonj Suni Hai Maqtal Say Zindanon Tak

(Bol Rahi Hai Har Sadi) X2 Eik Hai Naara Haidery

(Eik Hai Naara Haidery Eik Hai Zarb-E-Haidery) X2

  4. Pakistani Fauj Ka Naara Allaho Ya Haidery Naara

Hanafi Naara Jaffery Naara Har Maslak Har Qaum Ka Naara

(Sab Ki Baqa Bhi Hai Yehi) X2 Eik Hai Naara Haidery

(Eik Hai Naara Haidery Eik Hai Zarb-E-Haidery) X2

  5. Yeh Naara Naara Hi Nahin Hai Zarb Hai Qalb-E-Batil Par

Le Aya Tha Nooh Ki Kashti Ko Yeh Naara Sahil Par

(Jis Mein Chupi Hai Zindagi) X2 Eik Hai Naara Haidery

(Eik Hai Naara Haidery Eik Hai Zarb-E-Haidery) X2

  6. Donon Jahan Mein Aey Maula Tu Hai Aur Teri Sarkaar

Tujh Ko Dia Hai Nabi(S.a.w.w.) Nay Alam Rab Nay Bhaiji Hai Talwar

(Baat Yeh Kitnon Ko Khali) X2 Eik Hai Zarb-E-Haidery

(Eik Hai Naara Haidery Eik Hai Zarb-E-Haidery) X2

  7. Zarb-E-Ali To Zarb-E-Khuda Hai Taigh-E-Ali Bhi Taigh-E-Khuda Hai

Tum Chahay Mano Na Mano Yeh Dekho Tareekh Mein Kia Hai

(Kehtay Rahay Iqbal Bhi) X2 Eik Hai Zarb-E-Haidery

(Eik Hai Naara Haidery Eik Hai Zarb-E-Haidery) X2

  8. Zarb-E-Ali Hai Aik Ibadat Zarb-E-Ali Maqsood-E-Risalat(S.a.w.w.)

Zarb-E-Ali Ki Zad Mein Aakar Bach Nahin Sakti Kufr Ki Quwwat

(Jaan Gaey Yeh To Sabhi) X2 Eik Hai Zarb-E-Haidery

(Eik Hai Naara Haidery Eik Hai Zarb-E-Haidery) X2

  9. Momin Ki Naslon Ko Bachakar Batil Ko Dozakh Mein Girakar

Do Hisson Mein Tol Kay Katay Zarb-E-Ali Nay Zulm Kay Lashkar

(Taigh Bhi Hai Meezan Bhi) X2 Eik Hai Zarb-E-Haidery

(Eik Hai Naara Haidery Eik Hai Zarb-E-Haidery) X2

tracks.title: Abbas Ka Maidan
tracks.lyrics:
Ghazi Ki Shahaadat Se, Saadaat Pe Kya Guzri

(Maula Ki Qamar Tuti, Zainab Ki Rida Utri) X2

(Abbas Ka Maidan Mei Ghore Se Utar Naa) X3 Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se
Khabar Lo

  1. (Are Khaimon Mei Yatimon Ke Piyaalon Ka Bikharna) X2

Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo (Abbas Ka Maidan Mei Ghore Se Utar
Naa) X2 Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo

  2. Are Shabbir Ko Ghazi Ki Sunani Jo Sunaai, (Bechain Huwe Dasht Mei Dhunde Kiye Bhai) X2, (Mazlum Ki Aankhon Ka Wahaan Kaam Na Karna) X2

Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo (Abbas Ka Maidan Mei Ghore Se Utar
Naa) X2 Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo

  3. Are Sajjad Pe Zaalim Ke Tamaachon Ki Woh Baarish, (Maasum Sakina Pe Tamachon Ki Woh Baarish) X2 (Haan Shimr Ka Woh Shaame Gharibaan Mei Na Darna) X2

Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo (Abbas Ka Maidan Mei Ghore Se Utar
Naa) X2 Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo

  4. Are Rone Pe Koi Zulm Tarapne Pe Koi Bain, (Haathon Mei Rasan Khun Mei Tar Jism Khule Sar) X2 (Ye Kaafela Shabbir Ki Maqtal Se Guzarna) X2

Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo (Abbas Ka Maidan Mei Ghore Se Utar
Naa) X2 Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo

  5. Are Tatheer Ki Parwasta Ko Galiyoin Mei Phiraana (Har Shehr Ke Har Mor Pe Hi Eid Manaana) X2 (Ujre Huwe Ko Dekh Ke Logon Ka Sawarnaa) X2

Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo (Abbas Ka Maidan Mei Ghore Se Utar
Naa) X2 Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo

  6. Are Karne Pare Bimaar Ko Taamil Hazaaron, (Be Aasra Sayyedaaniyan Aur Neel Hazaaron) X2 (Ab Tak Hi Yatimon Ka Koi Zakhm Na Bharna) X2

Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo (Abbas Ka Maidan Mei Ghore Se Utar
Naa) X2 Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo

  7. Are Zainab Pe Khuli Rehti Thi Baazaar Ki Aankhen, (Roti Hi Rahi Khun Woh Bimaar Ki Aankhen) X2 (Sajjad Ka Har Roz Mei So Baar Ka Marna) X2

Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo (Abbas Ka Maidan Mei Ghore Se Utar
Naa) X2 Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo

  8. Are Maaruf Kabhi Shoukato Farhaan Na Hote, (Lafzon Pe Agar Shaah Meherbaan Na Hote) X2 (Alfaaz Mei Hota Kabhi Nauhe Ka Asar Naa) X2

Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo (Abbas Ka Maidan Mei Ghore Se Utar
Naa) X2 Shabbir Se Pucho Kabhi Zainab Se Khabar Lo

tracks.title: Aey Hussainio Jaag Hutto
tracks.lyrics:
(Hai Waqt Karaa Sar Par Aaya, Hai Chaaron Taraf Gham Ka Saaya) X2

(Phir Aaj Bani Hai Karbobala) X2 Phir Karbobala Ne Yaad Kiya

(Ay Hussayniyon) X2 (Jaag Utho) X3 Hussayniyo, Ai Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon

  1. Ek Jaan Hoke Saare Huseini Chalo, Apni Hasti Sawaare Huseini Chalo, Is Alam Ke Sahaare Huseini Chalo, Faatema Ke Pyaare Huseini Chalo, (Sirf Ghazi Ka Parcham Uthaa Kar Chalo) X2 (Jaag Utho) X3

Hussayniyon, Ay Hussayniyon, Ay Hussayniyon

  2. Apni Taarikh Par Mehr Baani Karo, Ilm Ke Des Pe Hukm Raani Karo, Apne Dushman Ko Ab Paani Paani Karo, Naam Akber Ke Apni Jawaani Karo, (Ilmo Hikmat Ki Shamma Jalaakar Chalo) X2 (Jaag Utho) X3

Hussayniyon, Ay Hussayniyon, Ay Hussayniyon

  3. Akl Ki Jang Afkaar Se Jeetlo, Har Mubah-La Ko Guftaar Se Jeetlo, Zulm Ko Sabr Ke Waar Se Jeetlo, Saari Dunya Ko Kirdaar Se Jeetlo, (Khud Ko Apne Hussaynio Banaakar Chalo) X2 (Jaag Utho) X3

Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon

  4. Zikre Shabbir Hi Apna Manshur Hai, Usse Ham Duur Hai Sheh Se Woh Duur Hai, Har Zamin Karbala Se Hi Maamur Hai, Apna Har Yawm Hi Yawme Aashur Hai, (Karbala Apne Dilme Basaakar Chalo) X2 (Jaag Utho) X3

Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon

  5. Jiska Aain Kerdaar Saadhi Bhi Hai, Waqt Ki Jiske Haathon Mei Baazi Bhi Hai, Jo Shahadat Ka Talib Hai Ghazi Bhi Hai, Matami Hai Wohi Jo Namazi Bhi Hai, (Apne Kirdaar Se Ye Batakar Chalo) X2 (Jaag Utho) X3

Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon

  6. Apne Maazi Se Pucho Ke Tum Koun Ho, Tum Ho Musa Agar Koi Firaun Ho, Tum Khuda Wand Ke Aun Ke Aun Ho, Har Nayi Karbala Ke Liye John Ho, (Khaakh Mei Dushmanon Ko Milaa Kar Chalo) X2 (Jaag Utho) X3

Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon

  7. Dehr Mei Ab Bhi Halmin Ki Aawaaz Hai, Tum Woh Ho Jinpe Shabir Ko Naaz Hai, Shah Ka Gham Muqaddar Ki Parwaaz Hai, Matami Kehl Waana To Ehsaas Hai, (Apne Seeno Pe Tum Gha Sajaa Kar Chalo) X2 (Jaag Utho) X3

Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon

  8. Fikr Ko Har Badi Se Muarra Karo, Bas Musalmaan Hone Pe Gharra Karo, Dil Yazidi Safon Se Mubarra Karo, Panjatan Ke Udu Pe Tabarra Karo, (Naaraa-E-Hydery Tum Lagaa Kar Chalo) X2 (Jaag Utho) X3

Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon

  9. Zikre Shabbir Hi Apna Manshur Hai, Usse Ham Duur Hai Sheh Se Woh Duur Hai, Har Zamin Karbala Se Hi Maamur Hai, Apna Har Yawm Hi Yawme Aashur Hai, (Karbala Apne Dilme Basaakar Chalo) X2 (Jaag Utho) X3

Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon

  10. Apni Taarikh Par Mehr Baani Karo, Ilm Ke Des Pe Hukm Raani Karo, Apne Dushman Ko Ab Paani Paani Karo, Naam Akber Ke Apni Jawaani Karo, (Ilmo Hikmat Ki Shamma Jalaakar Chalo) X2 (Jaag Utho) X3

Hussayniyon, Ay Hussayniyon, Ay Hussayniyon

  11. Akl Ki Jang Afkaar Se Jeetlo, Har Mubah-La Ko Guftaar Se Jeetlo, Zulm Ko Sabr Ke Waar Se Jeetlo, Saari Dunya Ko Kirdaar Se Jeetlo, (Khud Ko Apne Hussaynio Banaakar Chalo) X2 (Jaag Utho) X3

Hussayniyon, Ay Hussayniyon, Ay Hussayniyon

  12. Shoukaton Zikr Maula Ka Irfaan Hai, Ye Aqeeda Malango Ke Pehchaan Hai, Jo Bhi Shabbir Pe Dilse Qurbaan Hai, Woh Azadaar Jannat Mei Farhaan Hai, (Ye Aqeeda Sabhi Ko Sunaakar Chalo) X2 (Jaag Utho) X3

Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon, Ai Hussayniyon

tracks.title: Ay Mere Maula
tracks.lyrics:
*Dua-E-Ilaahi Adhmal Balaa*

(Ai Mere Maula) X2 Sab Logon Ka Imaan Jaga Dijiye Maula (Ai Mere Maula) X2

  1. Bar Rahi Hai Kaisi Dilon Mei Ye Nafrate (Ho Rahi Hai Kaisi Mominon Ki Haalaate) X2 Dur Ho Rahi Hai Dilon Se Mohabbate (Ai Mere Maula) X2, Zehnon Ki Kadurat Ko Mitaa Dijiye Maula

(Ai Mere Maula) X4

  2. Bar Rahi Hai Meri Nasib Joro Jafaa Se, (Jaata Raha Husne Asar Baste Dua Se) X2, Mit Gaye Hai Ehle Hunar Kaare Wafa Se, (Ai Mere Maula) X2 Ab Raaz Ka Manzil Ka Bataa Dijiye Maula

(Ai Mere Maula) X4

  3. Nazme Gaahe Deen Mei Tha Naam Hamara, (Saltanat Lagaa Na Saki Daam Hamara) X2, Khouf Pe Mabni Huwa Har Kaam Hamara, (Ai Mere Maula) X2, Phir Maisamo Mukhtar Bana Dijiye Maula

(Ai Mere Maula) X4

  4. Naazon Ke Hawaale Se To Ik Khwaab Bhi Ham Hai, (Taarikh Mei Bas Waarise Mehraab Bhi Ham Hai) X2, Is Daur Mei Ab Saahibe Mizraab Bhi Ham Hai, (Ai Mere Maula) X2, Jine Ki Hame Shams Dikhaa Dijiye Maula

(Ai Mere Maula) X4

  5. Parti Rahi Taarikh Hamara Hi Qasida, (Nezon Pe Faqat Tune Parha Haq Ka Jarida) X2, Shaitan Ki Zad Mei Hai Malango Ka Aqeeda, (Ai Mere Maula) X2, Mirfat Ka Koi Jaam Pilaa Dijiye Maula

(Ai Mere Maula) X4

  6. Ye Deen Amanat Hai Khayanat Se Bachaae, (Is Basme Wilayat Ko Khilaafat Se Bachaae) X2, Aankhon Ki Ita'at Ko Siyasat Se Bachaae, (Ai Mere Maula) X2, Bas Majlison Matam Ko Jilaa Dijiye Maula

(Ai Mere Maula) X4

  7. Sadiyon Se Hi Aulaade Nabi Giryaa Kuna Hai (Shabbir Ke Aangan Mei Udhaasi Hai Fizaa Hai) X2, Haa Fatema Zehra Ko Bhala Chain Kahaan Hai, (Ai Mere Maula) X2, Us Qalbe Shikasta Ko Dawaa Dijiye Maula

(Ai Mere Maula) X4

  8. Mazlum Qabile Ki Madad Ke Liye Aaye, (Asghar Hai Pyaasa Use Paani Bhi Pilaae) X2, Ik Dhuup Mei Baithi Huwi Maa Ko Bhi Uthaae, (Ai Mere Maula) X2, Sughra Ko Bhi Asghar Se Milaa Dijiye Maula

(Ai Mere Maula) X4

  9. Sab Ehle Azaa Hoke Pareshaan Pukaare, (Is Aalaame Ismaam Ke Insaan Pukaare) X2, Har Saans Mei Hi Shoukato Farhaan Pukaare, (Ai Mere Maula) X2, Parde Se Hi Parde Ko Hataa Dijiye Maula

(Ai Mere Maula) X4

tracks.title: Haaye Mere Hussain
tracks.lyrics:
(Haae Mere Hussein Aaja) X7

  1. (Aa Tujhko Bulaae Maa) X2 Aa Maa Ke Paas Aaja, Haae

(Haae Mere Hussein Aaja) X3

  2. Pyaasa Hai Bohot Bete, Mei Ashk Pilaati Hun, Bachpan Ki Tarah Se Mei, Godi Mei Sulaati Hun, (Aa Tujhko Bulaae Maa) X2 Aa Maa Ke Paas Aaja, Haae

(Haae Mere Hussein Aaja) X3

  3. Ghore Se Utar Ne Mei, Ai Laal Na Ghabraao, Phailaa Hai Mera Daaman, Aagosh Mei Aajaao, (Aa Tujhko Bulaae Maa) X2 Aa Maa Ke Paas Aaja, Haae

(Haae Mere Hussein Aaja) X3

  4. Jo Baap Ki Zeenat Hai, Jangal Mei Na Ghabraae, Tujse Bhi Kahin Pehle, Zainab Hi Na Marjaae, (Aa Tujhko Bulaae Maa) X2 Aa Maa Ke Paas Aaja, Haae

(Haae Mere Hussein Aaja) X3

  5. Ummat Nahi Choregi, Poshaake Badan Lelo, Behno Ki Ridaaon Kaa, Shabbir Kafan Lelo, (Aa Tujhko Bulaae Maa) X2 Aa Maa Ke Paas Aaja, Haae

(Haae Mere Hussein Aaja) X3

  6. Ek Haath Se Pehlu Ke, Zakhmon Ko Sambhaalungi, Ek Haath Se Mei Teri, Sab Teer Nikaalungi, (Aa Tujhko Bulaae Maa) X2 Aa Maa Ke Paas Aaja, Haae

(Haae Mere Hussein Aaja) X3

  7. Hasnain Ke Chehron Par, Kya Karb Ka Ghaaza Hai, The Teer Janaaze Par, Teeron Pe Janaaza Hai, (Aa Tujhko Bulaae Maa) X2 Aa Maa Ke Paas Aaja, Haae

(Haae Mere Hussein Aaja) X3

  8. Farhaan Aur Shoukat Ne, Taarikh Sunaadi Hai, Yun Fatema Zehra Ne, Jangal Mei Sada Di Hai, (Aa Tujhko Bulaae Maa) X2 Aa Maa Ke Paas Aaja, Haae

(Haae Mere Hussein Aaja) X3

tracks.title: Khaak Urhaawo
tracks.lyrics:
(Haae Zainab) X3 Haae Madina

(Are Logo, Ab Khaak Urhaao) X3

  1. Pardes Se Lut Kar Aaya, Shabbir Ka Kunbaa Saara

(Are Logo, Ab Khaak Urhaao) X2

  2. Jo Mera Hussein Tha Logo, Jo Yasrab Ka Tha Ujala, Pardes Bulaa Kar Usko, (Aada Ne Maar Hi Daala) X2 Khaime Se Mei Chillayi, Pyaasa Hai Mera Bhai

(Are Logo, Ab Khaak Urhaao) X2

  3. Aabaad Kabhi Hota Tha, Ab Hai Wiraan Madina, Naa Mei Asghar Ko Laai, (Na Aayi Saath Sakina) X2 Ik Dashte Bala Ko Dhaaya, Ek Ne Hai Shaam Basaaya

(Are Logo, Ab Khaak Urhaao) X2

  4. Lo Akber Ki Bhi Sunlo, Usne Taqdeer Rulaadi, Shabbir Ke Haath Pe Usne (Karli Hai Mout Se Shaadi) X2 Uski Baatein Howengi, Sabki Behne Rowengi

(Are Logo, Ab Khaak Urhaao) X2

  5. Us Waqt Ghazab Mei Aayi, Kehte Hai Aap Karimi, Jab Khaak Par Khun Mei Tarpi, (Qaasim Ki Paak Yatimi) X2 Kuch Shah Khaimon Mei Laaye, Kuch Ab Tak Dund Na Paae

(Are Logo, Ab Khaak Urhaao) X2

  6. Us Dasht Mei Kufi Shaami, Kehte The Koun Mohammed, Shabbir Pe Sadqa Karke, (Bheje Hai Aun Mohammed) X2 Na Mei Ab Tak Soyi Hun, Na Bachon Ko Royi Hun

(Are Logo, Ab Khaak Urhaao) X2

  7. Shoukat Farhaan Bataado, Sab Gham Ke Baab Sunaado, Zainab Chillayi Mujhko, (Bas Maa Ki Qabr Dikhaado) X2 Kab Shehr Mei Reh Paaungi, Mei Shaam Chali Jaaungi

(Are Logo, Ab Khaak Urhaao) X2

tracks.title: Kya Muje
tracks.lyrics:
Haaye Amma, Are Suno Ama, Are Aapse Mei Bayaan, Dil Ka Haal Karun, Are Dil Mei
Uth Ta Hai Jo, Ik Sawaal Karun

(Qaid Se Jab Rihaai Haram Paaenge) X2 (Kya Meri Qabr Pe Phir Nahi Aaenge) X2
(Sirf Ranjo Alam) X3 Mujhko Tarpaaenge

(Kya Mujhe Chor Kar Sab Chale Jaaenge) X2

  1. Qaid Se Jab Rihaai Haram Paaenge

(Kya Mujhe Chor Kar Sab Chale Jaaenge) X2

  2. Kya Isi Qaid Mei Gut Ke Marjaaungi, Kya Mei Do Gaz Kafan Bhi Nahi Paaungi, Mele Kurte Mei Kya Mujhko Dafnaaenge

(Kya Mujhe Chor Kar Sab Chale Jaaenge) X2

  3. Sarse Paaun Talak Mei Lahu Mei Hu Tar, Mera Zakhmon Bhara Ye Badan Dekh Kar, Sirf Zaalim Nahi Zulm Pashtaaenge

(Kya Mujhe Chor Kar Sab Chale Jaaenge) X2

  4. Shaam Waale Karenge Abhi Kuch Sitam, Mujhko Khaae Chala Jaa Raha Hai Ye Gham, Ye Meri Qabr Pe Shimr Ko Laaenge

(Kya Mujhe Chor Kar Sab Chale Jaaenge) X2

  5. Dekh Kar Zakhm Baba Ke Ghabraayi Mei, Hashr Mei Baap Ke Paas Jab Aayi Mei, Dekh Kar Mujhko Baba Bhi Ghabraaenge

(Kya Mujhe Chor Kar Sab Chale Jaaenge) X2

  6. Karbala Hai Kahaan Aur Kahaan Shaam Hai, Na Mujhe Chain Naa Unko Aaraam Hai, Woh Mujhe Karbala Roz Bulwaaenge

(Kya Mujhe Chor Kar Sab Chale Jaaenge) X2

  7. Karbala Jaake Baba Se Ye Puchna, Hashr Mei Unse Jab Ho Mera Saamna, Kya Mujhe Apne Sine Se Liptaaenge

(Kya Mujhe Chor Kar Sab Chale Jaaenge) X2

  8. Kehna Sughra Se Apna Chaman Milgaya, Ho Mubarak Tumhe To Watan Milgaya, Hashr Tak Ham Musaafir Hi Keh Laaenge

(Kya Mujhe Chor Kar Sab Chale Jaaenge) X2

  9. Shaam Mei Hi Meri Shaam Hojaaegi, Ye Kahaani Agar Aam Hojaaegi, Baap Beti Se Kab Pyaar Farmaaenge

(Kya Mujhe Chor Kar Sab Chale Jaaenge) X2

  10. Ham Na Funkaar Hai Aur Na Ehle Kalam, Hai Ye Farhaano Shoukat Pe Unka Karam, Hamse Shabbir Nauha Kehel Waaenge

(Kya Mujhe Chor Kar Sab Chale Jaaenge) X2

tracks.title: Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta
tracks.lyrics:
(Haaye Sajjad, Haaye Bimaar) X3

Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta, Qaidi Hun Mei Amma, Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta

  1. (Aankhon Se Lahu Meri) X2 Ik Pal Bhi Nahi Rukta

Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta, Qaidi Hun Mei Amma, Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta

  2. Ye Khun Jo Behta Hai, Is Pak Ka Matam Hai, Mujhe Touk Aur Beri Ke, Gham Se Bhi Sawa Gham Hai, (Maa Behne Phuphi Aayi) X2 Baazaar Mei Be Parda

Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta, Qaidi Hun Mei Amma, Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta

  3. Bas Mere Kaleje Pe, Us Waqt Qazaa Utri, Naamu Se Mohammed Ki, Jis Waqt Ridaa Utri, (Baazaar Mei Aaya Hai) X2 Zindaan Ye Mera Laashaa

Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta, Qaidi Hun Mei Amma, Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta

  4. Tatheer Ke Parwardaa, Ummat Ne Phiraaye Hai, Us Bibi Ko Logon Ne, Darbaar Dikhaaye Hai, (Jis Bibi Ka Baba Ne) X2 Chehra Bhi Nahi Dekha

Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta, Qaidi Hun Mei Amma, Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta

  5. Jab Ehle Sitam Ham Par, Barsaane Lage Pathar, Kya Jaane Kya Guzri, Us Waqt Mere Dil Par, (Jab Maa Ne Kahaa Mujhse) X2 Tum Koun Ho Ai Betaa

Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta, Qaidi Hun Mei Amma, Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta

  6. Lachaar Behen Meri, Sehme Huwe Rehti Thi, Maasum Sakina Ye, Har Mour Pe Kehti Thi, (Kya Dafn Huwe Honge) X2 Karbal Mei Mere Baba

Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta, Qaidi Hun Mei Amma, Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta

  7. Abbas Ko Mehshar Tak, Ye Dard Rulaaega, Zainab Ke Khule Sar Ko, Woh Dekh Na Paaega, (Ghairat Ke Khuda Ka Sar) X2 Neze Pe Nahi Rukta

Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta, Qaidi Hun Mei Amma, Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta

  8. Akber Ka Hasin Chehra, Jo Dekhte Rehte Hai, Sab Kufiyon Shami Bhi, Roro Ke Ye Kehte Hai, (Is Husn Ke Paikar Ki) X2 Ab Tak Hai Maa Zindaa

Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta, Qaidi Hun Mei Amma, Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta

  9. Maa Behne Khule Sar Hai, Raahon Mei Tamashaai, Aulaade Mohammed Ko, Taqdeer Kahaan Laayi, (Paa Bande Silaasil Hun) X2 Kaanton Se Bhara Rasta

Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta, Qaidi Hun Mei Amma, Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta

  10. Tera Hi Kalam Maula, Teri Hi Zabaan Maula, Farhaan Aur Shoukat Ki, Aukaat Kahaan Maula, (Tauheed Bhi Karti Hai) X2 Har Waqt Tera Giryaa

Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta, Qaidi Hun Mei Amma, Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta

  11. (Aankhon Se Lahu Meri) X2 Ik Pal Bhi Nahi Rukta

Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta, Qaidi Hun Mei Amma, Mei Chal Bhi Nahi Sakta

tracks.title: Utho Akbar
tracks.lyrics:
Qaasid Ko Leke Aaye Hai Maqtal Mei Jab Hussein

Zakhmon Ka Ek Hujuum Tha Maula Ke Saath Mei

Akber Ki Laash Uthi Hai Taazim Ke Liye

Aakhir Behen Ka Khat Jo Tha Maula Ke Haath Mei

Bete Se Keh Rahe The Ke Behnaa Ka Khat Suno

Hai Qarb Qaaenaat Ka Har Ek Baat Mei

Utho Akber, Khat Aaya Hai, Khat Aaya Hai

(Utho Akber, Khat Aaya Hai) X4

  1. Khat Mei Likha Hai Pehli Satar Par, Ay Mere Pyaare Bhayya Akber, Meri Dua Hai Ay Mere Bhayya, Tujhpe Ho Qurbaan Teri Khwahar, Aanchal Dua Ko Phailaaya Hai

(Utho Akber, Khat Aaya Hai) X3

  2. Pucha Hai Beta Teri Bahan Ne, Akber Ke Sehra Kaisa Laga Hai, Hasrat Se Usne Ye Bhi Likha Hai, Sehre Mei Chehra Kaisa Laga Hai, Baaton Ne Uski Tarpaaya Hai

(Utho Akber, Khat Aaya Hai) X3

  3. Kisne Lagaayi Akber Ke Mehndi, Kuch To Bataao Ay Baba Jaani, Shaadi Ka Jora Jab Usne Pehna, Kaisi Lagi Thi Uski Jawaani, Aisa Woh Mera Maa Jaayaa Hai

(Utho Akber, Khat Aaya Hai) X3

  4. Usne Likha Hai Akber Ke Dam Se, Kaisi Saji Hai Karbal Ki Baadi, Pucha Hai Usne Mei Jo Nahi Thi, Kaisi Rahi Hai Akber Ki Shaadi, Akber Pe Kaisa Roop Aaya Hai

(Utho Akber, Khat Aaya Hai) X3

  5. Abbas Chacha Ki Takbeer Sunkar, Maidaan Saara Dehelta To Hoga, Baali Sakina Ki Ungli Pakar Kar, Ab Mera Asghar Chalta To Hoga, Uska Bhi Kurta Bhijwaaya Hai

(Utho Akber, Khat Aaya Hai) X3

  6. Khaane Lagi Hai Dilko Udaasi, Mushkil Huwa Hai Ab Mera Jina, Betab Raahe, Khamosh Galiyaa, Sunsaan Aangan Viraan Madina, Ik Hu Ka Aalam Saa Chaaya Hai

(Utho Akber, Khat Aaya Hai) X3

  7. Dekha Hai Maine Ik Khwaab Jisme, Giryaa Kuna Hai Saari Fazaaen, Dekha Hai Maine Daryaa Lahu Ka, Bikhri Huwi Hai Jisme Ridaaen, Mera Kaleja Ghabraaya Hai

(Utho Akber, Khat Aaya Hai) X3

  8. Sughra Ko Ab Mei Likhne Laga Hun, Akber Se Milne Ki Ummeed Choro, Ab Umr Bhar Hai Matam Hi Matam, Har Shaad Choro Har Eid Choro, Tumpe Ghamon Ka Ab Saaya Hai

(Utho Akber, Khat Aaya Hai) X3

  9. Farhaan Tumpe Lamha Ba Lamha, Akber Ki Ujri Behen Ka Karam Hai, Shoukat Ke Haathon Pe Akber Ke Damse, Har Waqt Maqtal Shana Sa Kalam Hai, Nauha Usi Ne Likhwaaya Hai

(Utho Akber, Khat Aaya Hai) X3

tracks.title: Watan Tarasha Baba Jan
tracks.lyrics:
(Lot Ke Aawo) X4 (Watan Ko Baba Jaan) X3

(Watan Tarasha Baba Jaan) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

(Watan Tarasha Baba Jaan) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

(Nishta Sukoon Baba Jaan) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

  1. Wai Da Ma Tanhai Da Lala Zamaan Door De

Jism Sala Baba Jaan Qalb-E-Hazeen Choor De

Maray Gi Tanhai Yeh Bhayi Mera Door Hai

Sath Meray Jism Kay Dil Bhi Mera Choor Hai

(Dil Ko Gham Jalaa Gaya) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

(Watan Tarasha Baba Jaan) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

  2. Poochti Hoon Dil Say Main Aap Ki Paheliyan

Dekhti Hoon Roz-O-Shab Apni Yeh Hatheliyan

Dukh Meray Aziz Hain Ghurbatein Saheliyan
Aik Mein Ghareeb Hoon Aur Bhari Hawliyan

(Aik Gham Sa Chaa Gaya) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

(Watan Tarasha Baba Jaan) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

  3. Baba Jaan Sochuka Saey Zamaan Naseeb De

Sukh Zamaan Raqeeb De Dukh Zamaan Qareeb De

Baba Jaan Sochieay Kia Mera Naseeb Hai

Sukh Meray Raqeeb Hain Dukh Meray Qareeb Hai

(Ab To Ghum Hi Bhaa Gaya) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

(Watan Tarasha Baba Jaan) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

  4. Kia Taweel Gham Mila Mujh Ko Arz-O-Tool Ka

Tukrhe Tukrhe Hogaya Baba Dil Malool Ka

Har Gali Mein Bain Hai Dadi Jaan Batool Ka

Bujh Gaya Charagh Bhi Roza-E-Rasool Ka

(Mera Dil Bujhaa Gaya) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

(Watan Tarasha Baba Jaan) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

  5. Aghay Pa Gham Ke Jaarh Ma Da Zamaan Khushali Da

Gul Che Rana Laarh Zamaan Gul Shoyara Joand Zamaan

Us Kay Gham Mein Rona Hi Ab To Hai Meri Khushi

Jab Say Chala Gaya Gul Hui Hai Zindagi

(Zindagi Ka Kia Gayaa) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

(Watan Tarasha Baba Jaan) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

  6. Di Khizaan Ne Yeh Sada Ab Bahaar Chorh De

Apnay Har Qaraar Ko Be Qaraar Chorh De

Aankh Ki Umeed Ko Ashk Baar Chorh De

Keh Raha Hai Dil Mujhay Intezaar Chorh De

(Intezaar Khaa Gayaa) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

  7. Ghat Ghonde Yo Daagh Oo Husn P' Shabab Ke

Ror Akhpal Okato Maash Pe P' Khuwab Ke

Ek Barhaa Sa Daagh Tha Husn Kay Shabab Mein

Dekha Apnay Bhayi Ko Raat Main Nay Khuwab Mein

(Khuwab Bhi Dukha Gayaa) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

(Watan Tarasha Baba Jaan) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

  8. Nauha Aur Hussain Ka Kab Bashar Ka Kaam Hai

Zikr Is Imam Ka Zikr Ka Imam Hai

Karbala Usool Hai Karbala Payaam Hai

Karbala Ki Baat Hai Shaukat-E-Kalam Hai

(Karbala Jagaa Gayaa) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

(Watan Tarasha Baba Jaan) X2 Haey Baba Musafira

tracks.title: Aey Rakib E Dosh E Shah E Lolak Saww
Ali Ali Ali Ali
tracks.lyrics:
To Mazhar-E-Noor-E-Khuda

To Sheer E Khuda

Us Ka Nam Allah Ali

Tera Nam Ali

Tujh Sey Pehley Asmanoun Mein Thi Sada Allah-Hu

Aaj Har Zaban Pe Tera Nam Hei

  1. Kalandaroun Ki Hei Sada, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Peghambaroun Ney Ye Kaha, Ali Ali Ali Ali

To Hei Deen Ka Rasta, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Tujhe Sey Mera Vasta, Ali Ali Ali Ali

(Ho Meri Aan Ali Meri Shan Ali) X2 Meri Aan Ali Shan Ali Jan Ali Haq Ali

  2. Laboun Pe Ho Har Ik Pal, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Tamam Mushkiloun Ka Hal, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Tera Nahi Koei Badal, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Hai Mera Fesala Atal, Ali Ali Ali Ali

(Ho Meri Aan Ali Meri Shan Ali) X2 Meri Aan Ali Shan Ali Jan Ali Haq Ali

  3. Khuda Ka To Mizaj Hei, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Diloun Pe Tera Raj Hei, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Tujhe Sey Appni Laj Hei, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Ghamoun Ka To Ielaj Hie, Ali Ali Ali Ali

(Ho Meri Aan Ali Meri Shan Ali) X2 Meri Aan Ali Shan Ali Jan Ali Haq Ali

  4. Khuda Ki To Nigah Hei, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Rasool Khud Gavah Hei, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Khuda Ki Jis Mien Chah Hie, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Vohei To Meri Rah Hei, Ali Ali Ali Ali

(Ho Meri Aan Ali Meri Shan Ali) X2 Meri Aan Ali Shan Ali Jan Ali Haq Ali

  5. Nasab Tera Azeem Hei, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Raheem Hei Kareem Hei, Ali Ali Ali Ali

To Aayat E Kareem Hie, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Sirat E Mustakeem Hei, Ali Ali Ali Ali

(Ho Meri Aan Ali Meri Shan Ali) X2 Meri Aan Ali Shan Ali Jan Ali Haq Ali

  6. To Iesa Karsaz Hei, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Ghamoun Ka Chara Saz Hei, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Khuda Ka To Hei Raz Hei, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Hakeekat E Namaz Hei, Ali Ali Ali Ali

(Ho Meri Aan Ali Meri Shan Ali) X2 Meri Aan Ali Shan Ali Jan Ali Haq Ali

  7. Ye Keh Rahi Hie Inaama, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Bata Rahi Hei Haal Ata, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Suna Rahi Hie Kuol Kafa, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Kitab E Haq Ney Keh Diya, Ali Ali Ali Ali

(Ho Meri Aan Ali Meri Shan Ali) X2 Meri Aan Ali Shan Ali Jan Ali Haq Ali

  8. Bata Rahi Hei Karbala, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Laho Mien Dubti Fiza, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Hussain Teera Ladla, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Ye Keh Key Deen Bacha Gaya, Ali Ali Ali Ali

(Ho Meri Aan Ali Meri Shan Ali) X2 Meri Aan Ali Shan Ali Jan Ali Haq Ali

  9. Chali Jo Shah Pe Churi, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Haram Key Lab Pe Tha Yehi, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Madad Ko Aaye Ali, Ali Ali Ali Ali

To Karbala Bhi Keh Uthi, Ali Ali Ali Ali

(Ho Meri Aan Ali Meri Shan Ali) X2 Meri Aan Ali Shan Ali Jan Ali Haq Ali

  10. Iseer Jab Hoye Haram, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Jiger Figar Mahvey Gham, Ali Ali Ali Ali

To Is Ghari Shahe Umam, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Ye Keh Rahy The Dam Badam, Ali Ali Ali Ali

(Ho Meri Aan Ali Meri Shan Ali) X2 Meri Aan Ali Shan Ali Jan Ali Haq Ali

  11. Kahan Talak Likhy Koei, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Tumhari Shan Ya Ali, Ali Ali Ali Ali

To Kiyoun Na Phir Kahien Yahi, Ali Ali Ali Ali

Anees-O-Mazhar Abidi, Ali Ali Ali Ali

(Ho Meri Aan Ali Meri Shan Ali) X2 Meri Aan Ali Shan Ali Jan Ali Haq Ali

tracks.title: Ghabrayi Hei Zainub
tracks.lyrics:
(Ghabrayi Hei Zainub Aaya Hei Madina) X3

  1. Labreez Hei Gham Sey Har Bibi Ka Seena

(Ghabrayi Hei Zainub Aaya Hei Madina) X2

  2. Ik Saal Guzara Hei Zindan-E-Sitam Mein

Din Baqi Guzarey Gi Zainub Isi Gham Mein

Maqtal Mien Hei Asghar Zindan Mein Sakina

(Ghabrayi Hei Zainub Aaya Hei Madina) X2

  3. Aye Ahle Madina Tu Khamosh Hi Rehna

Zainub Sey Khudara To Ik Lafz Na Kehna

Jo Sansein Bachi Hai Khodey Gi Hazeena

(Ghabrayi Hei Zainub Aaya Hei Madina) X2

  4. Ye Soch Key Roti Hei Bemar Hei Sughra

Har Farz Key Baare Mein Ab Poochy Gi Dukhya

Eisa Na Ho Sun Key Marjaey Hazeena

(Ghabrayi Hei Zainub Aaya Hei Madina) X2

  5. Har Baat Batadoungi Jab Poochengi Sughra

Baloun Ki Safedi Ka Batlaoun Sabab Kya

Tha Is Sey To Behter Zindan Mei Jeena

(Ghabrayi Hei Zainub Aaya Hei Madina) X2

  6. Jab Pursa Mujhe Diengey Sab Loog Vatan Key

Kis Tarha Chupaoungi Ye Neel Rasan Key

Ahval Safer Ka Kehdein Ye Kahien Na

(Ghabrayi Hei Zainub Aaya Hei Madina) X2

  7. Har Zakham Suna Dey Ga Ahval Safar Ka

Phat Jaye Na Dil Us Ka Jab Dekhegi Sughra

Peeshani-E-Sajaad Ur Surkh Paseena

(Ghabrayi Hei Zainub Aaya Hei Madina) X2

  8. Hujroun Mein Jo Jaoungi Mein Awn-O-Muhammad Key

Us Dil Ko Rulayeingey Bachoun Key Khiloney

Dil Shiddat-E-Gham Sey Phat Jaye Kahien Na

(Ghabrayi Hei Zainub Aaya Hei Madina) X2

  9. Sab Kuch To Luta Aayi Pardees Mein Zainub

Mazlooma Musafir Ye Kia Jee Key Karey Ab

Bin Bhai Key Ab To Dushvar Hei Jeena

(Ghabrayi Hei Zainub Aaya Hei Madina) X2

  10. Zainub Key Khayaloun Mien Aawaz Ye Aayi

Mahmil Sey Uter Kar Jab Fizza Ney Sada Di

Dil Tham Lo Bibi Lo Aaya Madina

(Ghabrayi Hei Zainub Aaya Hei Madina) X2

  11. Kehta Hei Jiger Thaamey "Farhan" Tarap Kar

Roodad Karo "Mazhar" Bas Khatam Yahien Par

Ghabrayi Hei Zainub Aaya Hei Madina

(Ghabrayi Hei Zainub Aaya Hei Madina) X2

tracks.title: Mera Bhai Salamat Rahe
tracks.lyrics:
Ik Khoon Ka Rishta Hai Ye Hai Bol Raha Hai
Bhai Behen Ka Ye Rishta Anmoll Raha Hai
Behna To Ik Naimat-E-Parwardegar Hai
Dunya Mein Har Behen Ko Baradar Sey Piyar Hai
Han Us Hai Piyar Ka Ye Izzhar Hai
Dunya Mein Har Behen Key Ye Dil Ki Pukar Hai

(Mera Bhai Salamat Rahe) X4

  1. Har Behen Ka Ye Ahsas Hai
Bhai Mera Meri Aas Hai
Bhai Jab Tak Rahe Saamney
Door Gham Hai Khushi Pas Hai
Kyun Na Dil Ye Duayein Karey


(Mera Bhai Salamat Rahe) X4

  2. Bhai Jesa Bhi Ho Han Mager
Hai Behen Key Liye Khoob Tar
Saath Deti Hai Har Mor Par
Bhai Takleef Mei Ho Ager
Manatoun Key Piyaley Bharey


(Mera Bhai Salamat Rahe) X4

  3. Har Behen Ko Ye Idraak Hai
Han Ye Rishta Bara Pak Hai
Door Hojaye Bhai Ager
Zindagi Behen Ki Khak Hai
Is Liye Har Behen Ye Kahe


(Mera Bhai Salamat Rahe) X4

  4. Thi Madina Mein Bhi Ik Behen
Us Ko Rehta Tha Bas Ye Mahan
Kheriyat Sey Ho Bhai Mera
Honajaye Ghareeb Ul Watan
Raat Din Ro Key Bas Ye Kahe


(Mera Bhai Salamat Rahe) X4

  5. Deikha Chashme Tasawwur Mein Ye Kya
Ik Behen Thi Sar-E-Karbala
Bhai Par Aayi Mushkil Ghari
Us Ney Bachoun Ko Sadkey Kia
Ye Rahe Na Rahe Vo Rahe


(Mera Bhai Salamat Rahe) X4

  6. Shab-E-Ashoor Ka Waqt Tha
Ik Behen Dey Rahi Thi Sada
Aye Khuda Aye Khuda Aye Khuda
Ik Majboor Ki Hai Dua
Ghar Jaley Chahe Chader Chine


(Mera Bhai Salamat Rahe) X4

  7. Pani Amu Sey Payegi Jo
Pas Asghar Key Aaye Gi Wo
Sab Sey Chota Hai Bhai Mera
Pani Aaya To Chahegi Wo
Mujh Sey Pehley Ye Pani Piye


(Mera Bhai Salamat Rahe) X4

  8. Yaad "Farhan" Aaye Mujhe
Bibi Zainab Key Jo Bain The
Kesi Ab Dil Ki "Mazhar" Likho
Jab Behen Koi Ro Kar Kahe
Mera Bhai Salamat Rahe


(Mera Bhai Salamat Rahe) X4

tracks.title: Ay Mere Baba
tracks.lyrics:
Sham E Ghareba Aag Ka Manzar
Aaye Najaf Sey Fateh E Kheber
Ujri Huwi Zainab Ne Dekha
Rote Huwe Jab Bap Ka Chehra
Maqtal Mein Gunja Zainab Ka Noha

(Ay Merey Baba Haye Merey Baba) X2

  1. Kya Kya Masaib Tooty Hein Mujhe Par

Batla Raha Hei Ye Khuni Manzar
Ik Din Mein Ujra Mera Bhara Ghar
Na Rahe Bhayi Na Koi Beta

(Ay Merey Baba Haye Merey Baba) X2

  2. Ye Karbala Hei Ya Khuni Jangal
Dekho To Baba Tum Suw-E-Maqtal
Sab Key Lahu Sey Bhiga Hei Anchal
Sarey Azeezoun Ka Gham Uthaya

(Ay Merey Baba Haye Merey Baba) X2

  3. Dekh Sako To Ye Dekho Baba
Bikhra Huwa Hai Qasim Ka Sehra
He Tukrey Tukrey Dulha Ka Lasha
Dil Ko Sambhaley Rooti Hai Farva

(Ay Merey Baba Haye Merey Baba) X2

  4. Bhuley Ga Kese Ye Qalb Mera

Ghazi Ke Shaney Akber Ka Seena
Bano Ka Noha Asghar Ka Jhula
Dil Mein Hei Merey Ye Dagh Kesa

(Ay Merey Baba Haye Merey Baba) X2

  5. Pala Tha Jis Ko Ma Ban Key Mene
Chida Kaleja Us Ka Sina Ney
Suno Zara Noha Us Ki Maa Sey
Laila Ka Dil Bhi Gham Sey Chida Tha

(Ay Merey Baba Haye Merey Baba) X2

  6. Kia Tum Ney Baba Deikhi Tarayi
Bazu Burida Hei Mera Bhayi
Baad Us Key Ham Pe Uftad Aayi
Tha Us Key Dam Sey Parda Hamara

(Ay Merey Baba Haye Merey Baba) X2

  7. Abid Ko Sholo Sey Bhi Nikala
Deiti Thi Bachoun Ko Mein Sahara
Ehl-E-Haram Ko Mein Ney Sambhala
Tanha Diya Hei Khaimo(N) Ke Pehra

(Ay Merey Baba Haye Merey Baba) X2

  8. Ye Merey Ansu Kehte Hai(N) Baba
Is Tarha Roney Sey Kia Miley Ga
Jesey Bhi Ho Ab Jeena Parey Ga
Zindagi Bhar Ka Gham Mein Ney Paya

(Ay Merey Baba Haye Merey Baba) X2

  9. "Farhan-O-Mazhar" Kaisa Tha Manzar
Baap Key Qadmo(N) Sey Wo Lipat Kar
Kehti Thi Zainab Tera Luta Ghar
Waqt-E-Madad Tha Koi Na Aaya..

(Ay Merey Baba Haye Merey Baba) X2

(Maqtal Mein Gunja Zainab Ka Noha) X3

tracks.title: Pyaari Sakina
tracks.lyrics:
Namaz E Shab Mein Dua Karte The Shabbir
Ik Phool Si Beti Dey Mujhe Katib E Taqdeer


Haay, Shabbir Ko Khaliq Ney Sakina Jo Ata Ki
Zainab Ki Si Surat Thi Sab Us Mah Laqa Ki
Jis Dam Diya Godi Mein Usey Laker Chacha Ki
Hathoun Pa Us Ko Ley Kar Ghazi Ney Dua Di
Rakhe Tujhe Aye Laadli Allah Salamat
Dunya Mein Terey Sar Pa Rahy Shah Salamat

Sakina Sakina

(Shah Ki Piyari Sakina Laadli Abbas Ki) X3

  1. Seerat-E-Zehra Thi Jis Mein Thi Sakina Wo Kitab
God Mein Lete The Ghazi Aur Kabhi Umme Rabab
Seena-E-Shabbir Par Jo Phool Si Khilti Rahi
Zainab-O-Kulsoom Key Jo Saye Mein Palti Rahi

(Shah Ki Piyari Sakina Laadli Abbas Ki) X2

  2. Na Kisi Gham Ka Tasawwur Tha Na Ranj-O-Yaas Ka

Paya Is Bachi Ney Jhula Bazu-E-Abbas Ka
Naksh Tha Us Nazneen Ke Dil Pe Nam Abbas Ka
Youn Samjh Lo Pehney Rehti Thi Vo Taveez-E-Wafa

(Shah Ki Piyari Sakina Laadli Abbas Ki) X2

  3. Naz Uthathi Thi Sakina Ke Sabhi Shehzadiyan
Kisa-E-Khaiber Suna Kar Deti Thi Maa Loriyan
Zanu-E-Mader Pe Takiya Tha Kabhi Taqdeer Par
Cheyn Sey Sooti Thi Shab Ko Seena-E-Shabbir Par

(Shah Ki Piyari Sakina Laadli Abbas Ki) X2

  4. Dekhti Hi Dekhti Wo Do Baras Ki Hogayi
Bachiyo(N) Sey Khilney Ki Umr Hoti Hai Yahi
Khelti Thi Ghar Key Angan Mein Kabhi Sughra Ke Saath
Ghumney Jati Kabhi Akber Kabhi Baba Key Saath

(Shah Ki Piyari Sakina Laadli Abbas Ki) X2

  5. Khelke Doran Lagti Thi Sakina Ko Jo Piyas
Door Key Jati Thi Bachi Us Ghari Amu Ke Paas
Haye Kya Din The Keh Pani Manga Ur Pani Mila

Ur Ik Vo Waqt Piyasi Thi Sar-E-Karbobala

(Shah Ki Piyari Sakina Laadli Abbas Ki) X2

  6. Algharaz Behr-E-Safer Jab Ghar Sey Nikle Shah-E-Deen
Rah Mein Kitni Aziyat Sehgayi Wo Nazneen
Dasht Mein Piyasi Rahi Aur Baap Ki Furkat Sahi
Qayd Ho Kar Phir Wo Bachi Sham Ke Zinda(N) Gayi

(Shah Ki Piyari Sakina Laadli Abbas Ki) X2

  7. Umr Se Baqi Jo Din The Wo Guzarey Qayd Mei
Kal Talak Aabad Tha Ghar Ab Hai Sare Qayd Mei
Qayd Khane Ke Masaib Qalb Par Sehti Rahi
Haye Baba Haye Baba Raat Din Kehti Rahi

(Shah Ki Piyari Sakina Laadli Abbas Ki) X2

  8. Mar Dala Qayd Khaney Ney Usey Uftad Ney
Qabr Mei Us Ko Utara Sayyad-E-Sajad Ney
Roza-E-Bali Sakina Par Jo "Mazhar Abidi"
Jayega "Farhan" Lab Par Hoga Noha Bas Yehei

(Shah Ki Piyari Sakina Laadli Abbas Ki) X2

tracks.title: Nafs E Mutmainna
tracks.lyrics:
(Hussain Marhaba) X4

Karbala Ki Shaam Hai

Asr Ka Hangaam Hai

Hussain(A.s) Zuljanah Per Sawaar Hai

Larh Raha Hai Teen Shaboroz Ka Pyasa

Hathfe Ghaibi Ki Yeh Gunji Sada

Ya Ayatuhan Nafsul Mutmainnah Irja'ee Ila Rabek

Lot Aa Lot Aa Nafse Mutmainna (Ya Hussain(A.s)) X3

  1. Ghar Se Chala Tu Isi Imaan Per

Aanch Nahi Ayegi Quran Per

Qarz Tera Khun Hai Insan Per

Hogi Khushi Tujh Ko Yahi Jaan Kar

Tu Nay Mujhay Jeet Liya Ya Hussain(A.s)

Lot Aa Lot Aa Nafse Mutmainna (Ya Hussain(A.s)) X3

  2. Teen Shabo Roz Tu Pyasa Raha

Lashon Pay Lashay Bhi Uthata Raha

Sabr K Johar Bhi Dekhata Raha

Shukr Mera Lab Pay Saja Ta Raha

Tu Nay Mujhay Jeet Liya Ya Hussain(A.s)

Lot Aa Lot Aa Nafse Mutmainna (Ya Hussain(A.s)) X3

  3. Doob Gaya Nehar May Beyat Ka Naam

Teri Shujahat Pay Karonga Kalaam

Tunay Kia Hur Ko (A.s)

Ku Na Kaho Fakhr Say Ay Teshnakam

Tu Nay Mujhay Jeet Liya Ya Hussain(A.s)

Lot Aa Lot Aa Nafse Mutmainna (Ya Hussain(A.s)) X3

  4. Apnay Bharay Ghar Ko Luta Kar Hussain(A.s)

Lashay Akbar(A.s) Ko Utha Kar Hussain(A.s)

Lasho Say Maqtal Ko Saja Kar Hussain(A.s)

Waday Tifni Ko Nibha Kar Hussain(A.s)

Tu Nay Mujhay Jeet Liya Ya Hussain(A.s)

Lot Aa Lot Aa Nafse Mutmainna (Ya Hussain(A.s)) X3

  5. Moot Pay To Dasht May Aisay Gira

Moot K Mathey Pay Pasena Mila

Kehtay Hai Sub Olya Sub Ambya

Jo Na Koi Kar Saka Tu Nay Kia

Tu Nay Mujhay Jeet Liya Ya Hussain(A.s)

Lot Aa Lot Aa Nafse Mutmainna (Ya Hussain(A.s)) X3

  6. Tu Nay Sitamgaro Ok Ruswa Kia

Perchamay Islam Ko Uncha Kia

Zulm Saha Sabr Ka Sajda Kia

Jo Kisi Insan Nay Aisa Kia

Tu Nay Mujhay Jeet Liya Ya Hussain(A.s)

Lot Aa Lot Aa Nafse Mutmainna (Ya Hussain(A.s)) X3

  7. Tu Meray Quran Ki Tafseer Hai

Tu Hi Meray Deen Ki Taqdeer Hai

Karbobala Khuld Ki Tasveer Hai

Meri Riza Ab Teri Jaageer Hai

Tu Nay Mujhay Jeet Liya Ya Hussain(A.s)

Lot Aa Lot Aa Nafse Mutmainna (Ya Hussain(A.s)) X3

  8. Jo Bhi Gaya Dasht May Bay Sir Hwa

Khoon May Ghazi(A.s) Ka Alam Tar Hwa

Kis Tarhan Barbaad Tera Ghar Hwa

Qatl Teray Haathon Pay Asghar(A.s) Hwa

Tu Nay Mujhay Jeet Liya Ya Hussain(A.s)

Lot Aa Lot Aa Nafse Mutmainna (Ya Hussain(A.s)) X3

  9. Moot Nay Manga Tha Fakat Aik Sir

Tu Nay Dye Us Ko Bahatar Magar

Nuktay Ba Sirf Hai Tera Padar

Manye Zibhay Azeem Mamat Pisar

Tu Nay Mujhay Jeet Liya Ya Hussain(A.s)

Lot Aa Lot Aa Nafse Mutmainna (Ya Hussain(A.s)) X3

  10. Teri Madad Ke Lye Ay They Sub

Zehra(S.a) Thi Hum Rahay Amer-E-Arab

Jafar-E-Jin Ay They Behray Adab

Reh Gay Khamoosh Magar Teray Lab

Tu Nay Mujhay Jeet Liya Ya Hussain(A.s)

Lot Aa Lot Aa Nafse Mutmainna (Ya Hussain(A.s)) X3

  11. Roti Rahi Zainab-E-(S.a)Nashad Bhi

Teri Sakina(S.a) Teray Sajjad(A.s) Bhi

Teri Tarhan Thi Teri Aulaad Bhi

Kartay Rahay Shukr Bhi Faryad Bhi

Tu Nay Mujhay Jeet Liya Ya Hussain(A.s)

Lot Aa Lot Aa Nafse Mutmainna (Ya Hussain(A.s)) X3

  12. Or Kahay "Mazhar-O-Farhan" Kia

Teray Bina Fikr Kia Imaan Kia

Deen Kia Tauheed Kai Quran Kia

Teray Lye Kehta Hai Subhan Kia

Tu Nay Mujhay Jeet Liya Ya Hussain(A.s)

Lot Aa Lot Aa Nafse Mutmainna (Ya Hussain(A.s)) X3

Qutelal Hussain(A.s)-O-Be Karbala

Zibhal Hussain(A.s)-O-Be Karbala

Karbala

Ghut Ghut K Youn Jenay Wali Yeh Sughra

Kal Ho Na Ho Kya Khabar Baba(A.s) Kal Ho Na Ho Kya Khabar

Kal Ho Na Ho Kya Khabar Baba(A.s) Kal Ho Na Ho Kya Khabar

  3. (Kismat Sakina(S.a) Ki Achi Hai Baba(A.s), Jo Aap Ke Saath Rehti Hai Baba(A.s)) X2

Kal Ho Na Ho Kya Khabar Baba(A.s) Kal Ho Na Ho Kya Khabar

Kal Ho Na Ho Kya Khabar Baba(A.s) Kal Ho Na Ho Kya Khabar

Kal Ho Na Ho Kya Khabar Baba(A.s) Kal Ho Na Ho Kya Khabar

Kal Ho Na Ho Kya Khabar Baba(A.s) Kal Ho Na Ho Kya Khabar
