tracks.title: Aik Ehsan Kar
tracks.lyrics:
Jub Shaam Ka Bazaar A Gaya

Or Cheeni Gay Jub Chadar

Jub Zaalim Nay Zainab(S.a) Ka Naam Pukara

Zainab(S.a) Zainab(S.a) Zainab(S.a)

Yeh Pukari Ro Kar

(Aik Ahsaan Kar Meray Ghazi(S.a) Zaleemo Say Meri Rida La Day) X3

  1. (Phir Us Ke Baad Kuch Na Mangoongi) X2

Zaleemo Say Meri Rida Laday

(Aik Ahsaan Kar Meray Ghazi(S.a) Zaleemo Say Meri Rida La Day) X2

  2. Laash To Kab Ki Ban Chuki Hoon May

Dil To Bas Aadatan Dharakta Hai

Maar Dalay Na Yeh Sitam Mujh Ko

Meray Bhai Yeh Mujh Ko Lagta Hai

(Jo Chahta Hai Zindagi Meri) X2

Zaleemo Say Meri Rida Laday

(Aik Ahsaan Kar Meray Ghazi(S.a) Zaleemo Say Meri Rida La Day) X2

  3. Dekh Sajjad(A.s) Ki Taraf Ghazi(A.s)

Tujh Say Karti Hai Yeh Fughaan Zainab(S.a)

Aik Yahi Bojh Us Ke Dil Per Hai

Kahan Bazar Or Kahan Zainab(S.a)

(Hai Aik Raah Us Ke Jeenay Ki) X2

Zaleemo Say Meri Rida Laday

(Aik Ahsaan Kar Meray Ghazi(S.a) Zaleemo Say Meri Rida La Day) X2

  4. Kaise Tanay Sahoon May Logon Kay

Ghum Say Phatnay Laga Hai Dil Mera

Sub Yeh Kehtay Hai Yeh Woh Zainab(S.a) Hai

Jis Ka Abbas(A.s) Jaisa Bhai Tha

(Zabanay Bandh Karday Tu Sub Ki) X2

Zaleemo Say Meri Rida Laday

(Aik Ahsaan Kar Meray Ghazi(S.a) Zaleemo Say Meri Rida La Day) X2

  5. Meri Haalat Meri Gharebi Per

Bhai Nezay Say Khoon Rota Hai

Amma Roti Hai Aur Baba(A.s) Bhi

Kyun Ke Ab Waqt Aisa Aya Hai

(Ab Aa Rahi Hai Ik Kaneez Meri) X2

Zaleemo Say Meri Rida Laday

(Aik Ahsaan Kar Meray Ghazi(S.a) Zaleemo Say Meri Rida La Day) X2

  6. Karbala Bas Gayi Hai Aankhon May

Marsiya Ban Gaya Mera Chehra

Taziyaano Nay Ay Meray Ghazi(S.a)

Pusht Per Likh Diya Safar Mera

(Hai Is Kay Baad Bhi Buka Meri) X2

Zaleemo Say Meri Rida Laday

(Aik Ahsaan Kar Meray Ghazi(S.a) Zaleemo Say Meri Rida La Day) X2

  7. Ik Sitam Or Bhi Yeh Baki Hai

Kis Tarhan Tay Yeh Marhala Ho Ga

Haath Rasi May Or Khulay Sar Hoon

Kaisay Shereen Say Saamna Ho Ga

(Ya Ay Moot Ya Meray Ghazi(A.s)) X2

Zaleemo Say Meri Rida Laday

(Aik Ahsaan Kar Meray Ghazi(S.a) Zaleemo Say Meri Rida La Day) X2

  8. Dekhti Hai Mujhay Najis Aankhay

Naam Mera Shakee Ke Lab Per Hai

Kash Kha Jaye Yeh Zameen Mujh Ko

Aisay Jeenay Say Yahi Behtar Hai

(Yeh Aakhri Hai Iltija Meri) X2

Zaleemo Say Meri Rida Laday

(Aik Ahsaan Kar Meray Ghazi(S.a) Zaleemo Say Meri Rida La Day) X2

  9. Ja Kay "Farhan" Un Kay Rozay Per

Tum Suna Dayna Yeh Kalaam Mera

Bibi Zainab(S.a) Kaha Hai "Mazhar" Nay

Teri Azmat Ko Hai Salaam Mera

(Jo Apnay Bhai Ko Yeh Kehti Rahi) X2

Zaleemo Say Meri Rida Laday

(Aik Ahsaan Kar Meray Ghazi(S.a) Zaleemo Say Meri Rida La Day) X2

  10. (Phir Us Ke Baad Kuch Na Mangoongi) X2

Zaleemo Say Meri Rida Laday

Aik Ahsaan Kar Meray Ghazi(S.a) Zaleemo Say Meri Rida La Day

tracks.title: Parah Parah Ma Shud
tracks.lyrics:
Kushta Shud Barozay Ashura Hussain(A.s)

Dar Zameene Karmay Karbala Hussain(A.s)

Teshna Lab Futa Adab Has Jafa Hussain(A.s)

(Parah Parah Mashud Parah Parah Mashud, Jisme Shahenshahe Zaman) X3

  1. (Dasht May Tukray Hwa) X2 Hay Shahadeen Ka Badan

(Parah Parah Mashud Parah Parah Mashud, Jisme Shahenshahe Zaman) X2

  2. Baal Khulay Huway Zehra(S.a) Yeh Buka Karnay Lagi

Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)

Meray Bachay Ka Koi Mohniso Ghamkhwar Nahi

(Ek Musafir Ko Milay) X2

Kitnay Yahan Ranjho Mahan

(Parah Parah Mashud Parah Parah Mashud, Jisme Shahenshahe Zaman) X2

  3. Jis Ka Moo Chumkay Kehtay They Rasol-E-(S.a.w) Dosara

Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)

May Hoon Shabir(A.s) Say Or Mujh Say Hai Shabir(A.s) Mera

(Woh Muhammad(S.a.w) Ka Pisar) X2

Qatl Hwa Teshnadahan

(Parah Parah Mashud Parah Parah Mashud, Jisme Shahenshahe Zaman) X2

  4. Koi Mehman Pay Kya Karta Hai Is Tarhan Jafa

Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)

Tera Zarbo Say Kiya Shimr Nay Sar Tan Say Juda

(Teen Din Tak Woh Raha) X2

Dasht May Bay Goro Kafan

(Parah Parah Mashud Parah Parah Mashud, Jisme Shahenshahe Zaman) X2

  5. Khaak Aloda Badan Dekh Ke Kehtay Hai Nabi(S.a.w)

Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)

Ay Musalman Bata Ajr-E-Risalat Hai Yahi

(Kaisay Paamal Kiya) X2

Tu Nay Yeh Nazuk Sa Badan

(Parah Parah Mashud Parah Parah Mashud, Jisme Shahenshahe Zaman) X2

  6. Qatl Ke Baad Bhi Kartay Hai Sitam Ahl-E-Jafa

Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)

Teray Lashay Ko Sitamgaro Nayu Pamaal Kya

(Bain Karti Hi Rahi) X2

Dasht May Mazloom Behan

(Parah Parah Mashud Parah Parah Mashud, Jisme Shahenshahe Zaman) X2

  7. Aik Behan Rait Ke Telay Pay Buka Karnay Lagi

Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)

Phair Di Shimr-E-Sitamgaar Nay Gardan Per Chori

(Karbala Kaanp Uthi) X2

Roti Rahi Shah Ki Behan

(Parah Parah Mashud Parah Parah Mashud, Jisme Shahenshahe Zaman) X2

  8. Baday Pamaal Laino Nay Sitam Yeh Bhi Kye

Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)

Kati Angosht Sitamgar Nay Anghoti K Lye

(Yeh Sitam Kaisa Huwa) X2

Ronay Lagay Dasht-O-Daman

(Parah Parah Mashud Parah Parah Mashud, Jisme Shahenshahe Zaman) X2

  9. Tum Bhi "Farhan" Saray Farshe Aza Karna Dua

Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)

Bazme Matam May Jo Allah(J.j) Say "Mazhar" Nay Kaha

(Mawt Jab Aye Mujhay) X2

Ho Meray Hoton Pay Sukhan

(Parah Parah Mashud Parah Parah Mashud, Jisme Shahenshahe Zaman) X2

tracks.title: Karbala Ma
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)) X4

(Karbala Ma So Bala Ma) X2 Kunbay Shabir Chay

(Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)) X2

(Karbala Ma So Bala Ma) X2 Kunbay Shabir Chay

(Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)) X2

  1. Raza Di Akbar(A.s) Ko Shah Nay Run Ki

(Kaha Yeh Phir Fojay Ashkya Say) X2

(Maro Akbar(A.s) Mustafa(S.a.w) Ni) X2

Bolti Tasveer Chay

(Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)) X2

(Karbala Ma So Bala Ma) X2 Kunbay Shabir Chay

(Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)) X2

(Hussain(A.s)-O-Abbas(A.s) Or Akbar(A.s)) X2

(Aaj Kunba Ni Muhafiz) X2

Zainab(S.a)-E-Dilgeer Chay

(Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)) X2

(Karbala Ma So Bala Ma) X2 Kunbay Shabir Chay

(Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)) X2

(Tu Ghum Say Abid(A.s) Nay Sar Jhukaya) X2

(Tok Che Gardan Ma Ayna) X2

Haath Ma Zanjeer Chay

(Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)) X2

(Karbala Ma So Bala Ma) X2 Kunbay Shabir Chay

(Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)) X2

  4. May Khaimay Shah May Kyu Na Pohncha

(Kay Pyasay Bachay Tarap Rahay They) X2

(Aaj Per Sharminda Shah Ki) X2

Alqama No Neer Chay

(Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)) X2

(Karbala Ma So Bala Ma) X2 Kunbay Shabir Chay

(Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)) X2

  5. Rabab(S.a) Saye May Kaisay Bethey

(Kay Us Ki Dunya Ujarh Gay Hai) X2

(Shaam Ma Chay Haay Sakina(S.a)) X2

Karbala Baysheer Chay

(Ya Hussain(A.s) Ya Hussain(A.s)) X2

(Karbala Ma So Bala Ma) X2 Kunbay Shabir Chay

Khuld Ni Jaagir Chay

tracks.title: Mehmaan Sakina
tracks.lyrics:
Mayda Baba(A.s)

Hayo Baba(A.s)

Mayda Baba(A.s)

  1. (Hik Waar To Awin Haan) X2

Hay Mar Bachri Wanjheena

Kuch Din De Hai Mehmaan Sakina(S.a)

  2. Inj Baad Teday Baba Hai Umat Nay Sataya

Rat Abiday(A.s) Bemaar Di Ankhya Kon Ruvaya

Zindagi Day Har Ek Pal K Thiya Moot Da Saya

(Hay Moot Day Darya Vech) X2

Ay Saahwan Da Safeena

(Kuch Din Di Hai Mehmaan Sakina(S.a)) X2

  3. Ek Lamha Masaeb Di Jhari Nay Ruki Baba(A.s)

Aa Dekh Medi Ankhya Haan Da Dhi Runi Baba(A.s)

Dhaavi Tu Ajaantay May Koi Nay Suti Baba(A.s)

(Kuch Dair May Samjhi Haan) X2

Milay Teda Jay Seena

(Kuch Din Di Hai Mehmaan Sakina(S.a)) X2

  4. Zindan Day Vich Rokay Hai Faryaad Karaindi

May Naal Jo Sanri Day Rahi Qaid Nebhaindi

Hum Rondi Ta Har Sainr May Koi Hosala Dandi

(Tanha May Thai Qaid Haan) X2

Honrh Koi Koi Na

(Kuch Din Di Hai Mehmaan Sakina(S.a)) X2

  5. Day Jhorhka Teday Laash Ton Kaatil Nay Uthaya

Kan Maiday Thai Zakhmi Sitam Aisa Kamaya

Hay Naal Makon Ghoray Day Zaalim Nay Bhajaya

(Ay Baad Teday Milya) X2

Hai Dardaanda Khazeena

(Kuch Din Di Hai Mehmaan Sakina(S.a)) X2

  6. Kan Dukh Day Sada Sainr Day Hin Khoon Rawa Hai

Masroof Rasan Sainr Da Gal Paak Raja Hai

Quaim Ko Sada Dayndi Karaindi Yeh Fughan Hai

(Bahlool Aja Sainr Hai) X2

"Farhan" Thai Na

(Kuch Din Di Hai Mehmaan Sakina(S.a)) X4

tracks.title: Gham E Hussain Rahey
tracks.lyrics:
Dekh Kay Giryao Matam

Har Aik Farsh-E-Aza Per

Duay Karta Hoon Mola(A.s)

(Jub Talak Hai Yeh Jahan) X2

Hai Dua Meray Khuda(J.j)

(Gham-E-Hussain Rahe, Ye Azadar Rahe) X2

  1. Jub Talak Hai Yeh Jahan, Hai Dua Meray Khuda(J.j)

(Gham-E-Hussain Rahe, Ye Azadar Rahe) X2

  2. Teray Huzoor Dua Mangtay Hai Ahl-E-Aza

Kubool Kar Lay Bahakay Rasool(S.a.w) Sub Ki Dua

Hamesha Baki Rahay Zikr-E-Shahenshahay Wafa

Ay Khuda(J.j) Ay Khuda(J.j)

Hum Rahay Ya Na Rahay Rahay Baki Yeh Sada

(Gham-E-Hussain Rahe, Ye Azadar Rahe) X4

  3. Zamana Laakh Badalta Rahay Nigah Magar

Dilon Say Mitnay Nahi Paye Karbala Ka Asar

Azan Kay Saath Karay Matmi Sada Bhi Safar

Ay Khuda(J.j) Ay Khuda(J.j)

Jub Chala Zikr Tera Dil Nay Mangi Yeh Dua

(Gham-E-Hussain Rahe, Ye Azadar Rahe) X4

  4. Yazedi Fikr Ko Tu Khaak May Milata Rahay

Faza May Perchamay Abbas(A.s) Lahlahata Rahay

Hussaini(A.s) Azm Yazeedon Ka Sar Jhukata Rahay

Ay Khuda(J.j) Ay Khuda(J.j)

Sar Jo Sajday May Gaya Hum Nay So Baar Kaha

(Gham-E-Hussain Rahe, Ye Azadar Rahe) X4

  5. Ghamay Hussain(A.s) Ko Mehfooz Rakh Jafaon Say

Hussainiat(A.s) Ka Shajar Door Ho Khizaon Say

Saja Diya Hai Musalay Ko In Duaon Say

Ay Khuda(J.j) Ay Khuda(J.j)

Lab Kusha Jub Bhi Huwa Har Hussaini(A.s) Nay Kaha

(Gham-E-Hussain Rahe, Ye Azadar Rahe) X4

  6. Hamaray Zakhmo Ka Marham Hai Yeh Azay Hussain(A.s)

Sub Hi Ibadatay Kartay Hai Hum Baray-E-Hussain(A.s)

Labo Pay Taba Qayamat Sada Ho Haaye Hussain(A.s)

Ay Khuda(J.j) Ay Khuda(J.j)

In Duao(N) May Khuda(J.j) Saath Hai Karbobala

(Gham-E-Hussain Rahe, Ye Azadar Rahe) X4

  7. Rahay Wafa May Kabhi Dagmaga Na Paye Qadam

Hamaray Dosh Pay Lehraye Ba Wafa Ka Alam

Hamaray Azm Say Larza Rahay Yeh Ahl-E-Sitam

Ay Khuda(J.j) Ay Khuda(J.j)

Jub Bicha Farsh-E-Aza Matmi Kehnay Laga

(Gham-E-Hussain Rahe, Ye Azadar Rahe) X4

  8. Yeh Majlise Bhi Khuda(J.j) Madresoon Say Kam To Nahi

Tera Rasool Bhi Kehta Hai Sirf Hum To Nahi

Ghamay Hussain(A.s) Bara Hai Hamara Ghum To Nahi

Ay Khuda(J.j) Ay Khuda(J.j)

Apnay Ghum Bhol Gaya Jis Nay Rokar Yeh Kaha

(Gham-E-Hussain Rahe, Ye Azadar Rahe) X4

  9. Wikare Majliso Matam Barhatay Jayengay

Charagh Ashk-E- Aza Jalatay Jayengay

Hussaini(A.s) Fikr Dilo May Jagatay Jayengay

Ay Khuda(J.j) Ay Khuda(J.j)

Jub Kalam Chalnay Laga Keh Uthi Fikr-E-Rasa

(Gham-E-Hussain Rahe, Ye Azadar Rahe) X4

  10. Yahi Akeeda Hai "Farhan" Aur "Mazhar" Ka

Kay Ek Qabelay Kay Afrad Hai Yeh Ahl-E-Aza

Yeh Nawha Khwan Yeh Shair Sabhi Ki Hai Yeh Sada

Ay Khuda(J.j) Ay Khuda(J.j)

Hum Rahay Ya Na Rahay Rahay Baki Yeh Sada

(Gham-E-Hussain Rahe, Ye Azadar Rahe) X8

tracks.title: Ali Waris Ali Waris
tracks.lyrics:
Ali Waris Bila Waris Milaa Waris. Lazat-E-Ishq Ali Kiya Hain Zamane Walo Isko
Darvaish Sifat Log Samaj Paate Hain

Kon Waris He Tera Kon Mera Waris Hai Awo E Ahele Jahhan Hum Tumhe Samjate Hai



Ali Waris Ali Waris



(Nara Dervaish Ka Har Gari Har Jagaa) X2

Ali Waris Ali Waris



1.     Mei Kahoo(N) Tum Kaho(N) Jo Nabi Ne Kahaa(N)



Ali Waris Ali Waris



2.     Koyi Mushkil Jab Bhi Aye Lab Pe Thi Nade Ali
Rahe Mei Ayi Rukawat Barh Gayi Jab Be Kali

Ik Sahara Milgaya Mene Dil Se Keh Diya



(Ali Waris Ali Waris) X2



3.     Mustafa Bhi Milgaye Aur Milgayaa Usko Khuda
Ilm Jisko Hogaye Ke Hain Ali Mushkil Khusha

Tal Gaye Har Ik Balaa Jisne Mushkil Me Kaha



(Ali Waris Ali Waris) X2



4.     Har Namaz-E-Ishq Apni Narae Haider Mei Hai
Ye Jo Tughra Name-E-Haider Ka Hamare Ghar Me Hai
Ishq Ne Samjhadiya Iska Matlab Ye Huwa

5.

(Ali Waris Ali Waris) X2



6.     Deti Hai Taarikh Ham Ko Ye Gawahi Dam Pe Dam
Jange Khaibar Me Nabi Ne De Ke Haider Ko Alam
Rakh Ke Maidan Me Kadam Apne Lashkar Se Kaha



(Ali Waris Ali Waris) X2



7.     He Hamari Mehfilo Ki Abaru Zikari Ali
Ye Du’a Sayeda Se Manzilate Hum Ko Mili Akherat Ki Fikr Kya,
Fikre Ho Duniya Ki Kya



(Ali Waris Ali Waris) X2



8.     Ho Wali Ajmeer Koyi Bu Ali Ho(N) Ya Nizam
Ho Koyi Shehbaz Ya Ho Rabea Basri Ka Naam
Sab Ka Maslak Ek Tha Sab Ka Naraa Ek Tha



(Ali Waris Ali Waris) X2



Hum Hote Nahi Parashan Ali Waris Hai Mushkile Hoti Ha Asaan Ali Waris Hai



Hum Us Kabile Ke Afrad Hai
Ye Rasme Jisme Hamasha Se Hain
Ho Imteham Ya Koyi Mareka
Ghar Se Jo Nikle To Maa Ne Kaha
(Ja Tera Waris Hai Mushkil Khusha
Hai Kamiyabi Mukadar Tera) X2
Dushman Tere Kuch Na Kar Payenga
Saya Figan Tuj Pe He Ye Du’a.

Fatha Tera Nasib Aur Teri Bakaa

(Ali Waris Ali Waris) X2



9.     Mashwara Hai Ye Hamara Aaj Har Insaan Ko
Dushmano Se Gar Bachana Chaho Pakistan Ko
Hai Nizame Mustafa Har Taraf Ho Ye Sadaa



(Ali Waris Ali Waris) X2



10.                        Din-E-Maula Karbala Me Aasra Ab Kon Hai
Hai Bhawar Me Ye Safina Na Khuda Ab Kon Hai
Deen Ki Sun Kar Sadaa Keh Uthi Karbobala



(Ali Waris Ali Waris) X2



11.                        Mashk De Kar Ye Sakina Ne Kaha Abbas Se
Khushk Hai Mera Gala Me Mar Na Jawu(N) Piyas Se
Dam Karo Nade Ali Pani Le Awo Ay Chacha



(Ali Waris Ali Waris) X2



12.                        Akhri Ruksat Ko Khaime Me Juhin Aye Imam
Dekh Ke Bhayi Ka Chehera Tha Ye Zainab Ka Kalaam
Gham Naa Khao Tum Mera Jawo Bhayi Alwida



(Ali Waris Ali Waris) X2



13.                        Be Rida Saydaniyon Se Shimr Ne Jab Ye Kaha
Ab Hifazat Ko Tumhari Kon Aayega Bhala
Bekason Ko Dekh Kar Roke Zainab Ne Kaha


(Ali Waris Ali Waris) X2



14.                        Har Gari Ishke Ali Me Lab Khusha “Farhan” He
Aur “Mazhar Abidi” Ka Bas Yahi Iman Hai
Ta Abad Ik Asara Aj Bhi Hai Kal Bhi Tha



(Ali Waris Ali Waris) X2

tracks.title: Abbas Abbas
tracks.lyrics:
Jab Dasht Se Hussain Ko Ghazi Ne Di Sada
Dunya Se  Kuchh Karta Hun Ab Yaa Shahe Huda
Ye Sunte Hi Hussain Pe Kohe Alam Gira
Are Thaami Kamar Ik Haath Se Ik Haath Dil Pe Tha
Hasrat Se Suwe Zainabe Muztar Nigaah Ki
(Phir Dekha Sakina Ko Tarapkar Ye Aah Ki) X2
Abbas Abbas Abbas

1.     Yaad Aaraha He Mujhko
Kehte The Baba Haider
Ek Roz Chheen Lenge
Ada Behan Ki Chadar
(Chadar Rahegi Tabtak) X2
Jab Tak Rahega Sar Par

Abbas (Alan In Kasara Zahri)

2.     Akbar Ko Sath Lekar
Phir Dasht Ko Sidhare
Thame Huwe Kaleja
Ranjo Alam Ke Mare
(Jab Ran Mein Khayi Thokar) X2
Sheh Dard Se Pukare

Abbas (Alan In Kasara Zahri)

3.     Nagaah Sheh Ne Paya
Ek Bazue Baradar
Ya Eliya Pukare
Chuma Use Uthakar
(Faryad Gham Se Aayi) X2
Be Saakhta Labon Par

Abbas (Alan In Kasara Zahri)

4.     Do Gaam Hi Chale The
Phir Who Maqam Aya
Jab Doosra Bhi Baazu
Bhayi Ka Sheh Ne Paya
(Lasha Yahi(N) Kahi(N) He) X2
Bazu Ne Ye Bataya

Abbas (Alan In Kasara Zahri)

5.     Ye Kehte Jaarahe The
Awaz To Sunao
Kis Jaa Parhe Ho Zakhmi
Tumhi Hame Batawo
(Ghurbat Me Bekasi Mein) X2
Yu(N) Chhor Ke Na Jawo

Abbas (Alan In Kasara Zahri)

6.     Al Muqtasir Ke Pohoncha
Bhayi Ke Paas Bhayi
Zanu Pe Sar Ko Rakha
Di Roke Ye Duhayi
(Hum Bhi Nahin Rahenge) X2
Di Tum Ne Gar Judayi

Abbas (Alan In Kasara Zahri)

7.     Maula Pukare Rokar
Rukhsat Ki Ye Ghari He
Ek Teer Aankh Me He
Zakhmi Jabee(N) Teri He
(Bhayi Mujhe Pukaro) X2
Hasrat Ye Aakhri He

Abbas (Alan In Kasara Zahri)

8.     “Mazhar” Ye Baat Sun Kar
Wo Bawafa Pukara
Khaime Me Le Najaana
Lasha Kahi(N) Hamaara
Aka Se Ki Wasiyyat
Aur Khuld Ko Sidhara

Abbas (Alan In Kasara Zahri)

tracks.title: Chalo Sham Chalien
tracks.lyrics:
Din Ye Qismat Ne Tumko Dikhaya He Aaj
Aasuon Se Ye Daaman Bhigone Chalo
Jinke Ghurbat Pe Rote Rahe Umr Bhar
Unke Roze Pe Ab Unko Rone Chalo
(Chalo Sham Chalein) X2

Chalo Sham Chalein
(Pursadaaro(N) Aawo Bibi Ne Bulaya He) X2
Chalo Sham Chalein

1.     Pursa Unko Aansuon Se Denge Unke Bhayi Ka
Shaame Ghurbat Ke Andhero(N) Ka Kabhi Tanhayi Ka

Chalo Sham Chalein
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo Bibi Ne Bulaya He
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo

2.     Pursa Denge Be Saron Ka Matami Zanjeer Se
Pursadari Ka Ye Moka Milgaya Taqdeer Se

Chalo Sham Chalein
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo Bibi Ne Bulaya He
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo

3.     Faisla He Apne Haq Mein Katibe Taqdeer Ka
Bibi Ke Roze Pe Chehlum Hum Karein Shabbir Ka

Chalo Sham Chalein
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo Bibi Ne Bulaya He
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo

4.     Jinko Who Bibi Na Royi Gardishe Aalaam Me
Matame Auno Muhammad Barpa Karne Sham Me

Chalo Sham Chalein
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo Bibi Ne Bulaya He
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo

5.     Tees Ghanto(N) Mein Jahaa(N) Se Guzri Aale Mustafa
Pursa Dena Dekh Kar Manzar Usi Bazaar Ka

Chalo Sham Chalein
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo Bibi Ne Bulaya He
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo

6.     Khutba Zainab Ne Diya Tha Jis Jagah Par Momino
Dekhne Apni Nigaaho(N) Se Usi Darbaar Ko

Chalo Sham Chalein
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo Bibi Ne Bulaya He
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo

7.     Rote Rote Jaanibe Di Thi Sakina Ne Jahaan
Zakhme Dil Bhar Jaaye Maa Ka Aise Rona Tum Wahaa(N)

Chalo Sham Chalein
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo Bibi Ne Bulaya He
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo

8.     Is Tarah Bechadari Ka Bibi Se Bantenge Gham
Shaam Jaa Kar Aurton Ko Chaadarein Baantenge Hum

Chalo Sham Chalein
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo Bibi Ne Bulaya He
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo

9.     Jaane Kab Mera Bulawa Hoga “Mazhar Abidi”
Jab Mere Kaano(N) Mein Gunjegi Sada “Farhan” Ki

Chalo Sham Chalein
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo Bibi Ne Bulaya He
Pursaadaro(N) Aawo

tracks.title: Kaise Rehti Ho Bibi
tracks.lyrics:
Haye Jab Mein Bibi Sakina Ke Roze Pe Tha
Dekh Kar Unke Roze Ko Dil Ne Kaha
Kal Ye Roza Hi Bibi Ka Zindaan Tha
Dekha Roza To Maazi Me Mein Khogaya
Saamne Mere Zindaan Tha Sham Ka
Us Ghari Mere Lab Par Fughaa(N) Aagayi
Roshni Ka Safar Bhi Nahi(N)
Aur Hawa Ka Guzar Bhi Nahi(N)
Kis Qadr Hafz He Al Amaa(N)

Kaise Rehti Ho Bibi Yahaan

Haye Haaye

1.     Tum Ko Yaade Padar Sone Deti Nahi(N)
Aur Uspe Sitam He Ye Khaufe La-In
Zabte Gham Eik Azaar He
Saans Lena Bhi Dushwaar He
Tum To Tum Qaid Le Sisikiya

Kaise Rehti Ho Bibi Yahaa(N)

Haye Haye

2.     Zakhm Khaati Ho Aur Ashk Peeti Ho Tum
Mujhko Hairat He Kis Tarha Jeeti Ho Tum
Taziyaane Dawa Ban Gaye
Ya Andhere Shifa Ban Gaye
Qaid Me Aisa Mumkin Kahaa(N)

Kaise Rehti Ho Bibi Yahaa(N)

Haye Haye

3.     Meri Bibi Mujassam Fughaa(N) Hogayi
Kya Khata Thi Ke Qaidi Yahaa(N) Hogayi
Kam Sini Mein Yateemi Mili
Ghar Se Nikli Aseeri Mili
Sun Raha Hun Ye Kehti He Maa(N)

Kaise Rehti Ho Bibi Yahaa(N)

Haye Haye

4.     Fitrati Saair Baatein Mujhe Hei(N) Khabar
Qaid Mein Qaidi Ko Yaad Aata He Ghar
Phul Banke Chaman Me Rahi
Kitne Nazo(N) Se Ghar Mei(N) Pali
Ab Ye Gham Ye Sitam Sakhtiyaa(N)

Kaise Rehti Ho Bibi Yahaa(N)

Haye Haye

5.     Sham Ki Aurto(N) Se Suna He Yahi
Tum Jo Roti Ho Sota Nahi(N) He Shaqi
Maarta He Who Sajjad Ko
Seh Ke Sajjad Uftaad Ko
Karte Rehte Hein Bas Ye Fughaa(N)

Kaise Rehti Ho Bibi Yahaa(N)

Haye Haye

6.     Dil Pe Kohe Garaa(N) Ek Ehsaas He
Chhote Bachhe To Darte Hei(N) Tanhaayi Se
Har Ghari Pehradaaro(N) Ka Dar
Saath Koi Nahi(N) Nawha Gar
Na Padar Na Chacha Aur Na Maa(N)

Kaise Rehti Ho Bibi Yahaa(N)

Haye Haye

7.     Tum Jo Ehle Haram Se Juda Qaid Ho
Phir To Haq He Tumhara Ke Nawha Karo
Haye Qismat Ye Na Hosaka
Hukm Zalim Se Tujhko Mila
Nawha Khaani Pe Pabandiyaa(N)

Kaise Rehti Ho Bibi Yahaa(N)

Haye Haye

8.     Aayi Kaanon Mein Ye Qaidiyo(N) Ki Fughaa(N)
Roke Kehti Hei(N) Zindaa(N) Mei(N) Kuchh Bibiyaa(N)
Hum Ye Keh Keh Ke Matam Karein
Is Yateema Ko Zindaan Mei(N)
Pursa Deti He Tanhaiyaa(N)

Kaise Rehti Ho Bibi Yahaa(N)

Haye Haye

9.     Phir Tasalsul Tasawwur Ka Toota Mera
Mir Arshe Nazar Roza Bibi Ka Tha
Haath Masroof Matam Huwe
Ashk Ankho(N) Se Girne Lage
Phir Bhi Hoto(N) Pe Thi Ye Fughaa(N)

Kaise Rehti Ho Bibi Yahaa(N)

Haye Haye

10.                        Lafz “Mazhar” Ke Ehsaas “Farhaan” Ka
Woh Ye Kehta He Bibi Se Meine Kaha
Meine Ye Kehke Matam Kiya
Jin La-Inon Ne Ki Thi Jafa
Un Ke Aulad Ke Darmiyaa(N)

Kaise Rehti Ho Bibi Yahaa(N)

Haye Haye

tracks.title: Maan Dekh
tracks.lyrics:
Haaye, Ghore Se Jab Zameen Par
Aye Shahe Zaman
Dekha Ke Ban Me Fatema Zehra He Mojizan
Are Balon Se Jharti He Zamee(N) Qatlagah Ki
Madar Ko Dekha Aur Ye Maula Ne Aah Ki
(Maa) X2 Dekh Meine (Sab Luta Diya) X3
Maa Dekh Meine Sab Luta Diya
Maa Dekh Meine (Sab Luta Diya)  X2

1.     Sehra Ko Apne Khun Se Meine Basa Diya
Jo Karsaka Na Koi Woh Karke Dikha Diya
Lashon Se Meine Dashte Bayabaa(N) Sajadiya
Bachpan Mein Who Jo Wada Kiya Tha Nibhadiya

Maa Dekh Meine Sab Luta Diya
Maa Dekh Meine (Sab Luta Diya)  X2

2.     Khaak Aur Khoo(N) Mein Jalta  Badan Dekhle Mera
Barbaad Ho Chuka He Chaman Dekhle Mera
Kaante Pare Huwe Hein Dahan Dekhle Mera
Dil Muztarib He Aisa Ke Jaise Bhujadiya

Maa Dekh Meine Sab Luta Diya
Maa Dekh Meine (Sab Luta Diya)  X2

3.     Who Dekho Hum Shabihe Payambar Ki Laash Ko
Tukre Pare Hein Qasime Muztar Ke Dekhlo
Asghar Ki Qabr Dashte Bayabaa(N) Mein Dekhlo
Zainab Ke Laadlo(N) Ko Bhi Ban Me Suladiya

Maa Dekh Meine Sab Luta Diya
Maa Dekh Meine (Sab Luta Diya)  X2

4.     Ghore Se Jab Zameen Pe Aya Jawaan Pisar
Mein Ban Me Aya Thokre Khata Bachashme Tar
Barchi Ka Phal Jo Khencha To Tukre Huwa Jigar
Is Gham Ne Jeeteji Mujhe Lasha Bana Diya

Maa Dekh Meine Sab Luta Diya
Maa Dekh Meine (Sab Luta Diya)  X2

5.     Aisa Huwa Shaheed Who Qasim Sa Nek Naam
Tukron Mein Bat Ke Rehgaya Us Ka Badan Tamam
Qasim Ki Maa Ke Azm Ko Meine Kiya Salam
Marne Ke Waste Use Dulha Banadiya

Maa Dekh Meine Sab Luta Diya
Maa Dekh Meine (Sab Luta Diya)  X2

6.     Teere Sitam Tha Ek Magar Zakhmi Kargaya
Asghar Ka Halq Maa Ka Kaleja Jigar Mera
Asghar Ko Leke Khaime Me Wapis Na Ja Saka
Is Karbala Ki God Mein Usko Chhupa Diya

Maa Dekh Meine Sab Luta Diya
Maa Dekh Meine (Sab Luta Diya)  X2

7.     Qurban Mujhpe Hogaye Zainab Ke Ladle
Meri Nazar Mein Yeh Bhi To Akbar Se Kam Ne The
Laashe Utha Ke Dono Ke Laaya Jo Dasht Se
Zainab Ki Khamshi Ne Ye Nauha Suna Diya

Maa Dekh Meine Sab Luta Diya
Maa Dekh Meine (Sab Luta Diya)  X2

8.     Amma Tere Hussain Ka Woh Pehla Jaanisaar
Jo Fitratan Bhi Hur Tha  Huwa Akse Aashkar
Ghazi Ki Tarha Hur Ke Liye Mein Hun Sogwaar
Hur Jaise Bawafaa Ko Bhi Meine Gawadiya

Maa Dekh Meine Sab Luta Diya
Maa Dekh Meine (Sab Luta Diya)  X2

9.     Amma Gayi He Furqate Abbas Tor Kar
Zainab Ki Aas Pyason Ka Dil Aur Meri Kamar
Lipti Alam Se Baali Sakina He Nawhagar
Bhai Ke Gham Ne Mujhko Yahi Marsiya Diya

Maa Dekh Meine Sab Luta Diya
Maa Dekh Meine (Sab Luta Diya)  X2

10.                        Apne Pisar Ke Khu(N) Se Wuzu Kar Chukka Husain
Laasho(N) Se Karbala Ki Zamee(N) Bhar Chukka Husain
Subha Se Kitni Baar Yaha(N) Marchuka Hussain
Aaghosh Mein Sulade Ghamo(N) Ne Thaka Diya

Maa Dekh Meine Sab Luta Diya
Maa Dekh Meine (Sab Luta Diya)  X2

11.                        Kya “Mazhar Abidi” Likhe “Farhan” Kya Pare
He Kisme Itni Taap Ke Maqtal Bayan Kare
Awaaz Ab Bhi Ati He Dashte Kitaal Se
Is Karbala Ko Arshe Mualla Bana Diya

Maa Dekh Meine Sab Luta Diya
Maa Dekh Meine (Sab Luta Diya)  X2

tracks.title: Mere Pardesi Baba
tracks.lyrics:
Faryad Kare Sugra (Kab Awoge) X2

Mere Pardesi Baba Kab Awonge



Ghar Suna Para Hai, Ay Baba

Honto Pe Buka Hai, Ay Baba

Dil Dub Raha Hai, Ay Baba



(Mere Pardesi Baba Kab Awoge) X2



1.     Jis Din Se Gaye Ho Ay Baba Hai Lab Pe Mere Faryadei(N)

Din Roh Ke Guzarta Hai Mera Matam Me Guzaru Raate I(N)

Hujre Huwe Khali, Ay Baba

Nazo Ki Pali, Ay Baba

Sughra Hai Sawali, Ay Baba



(Mere Pardesi Baba Kab Awoge) X2



2.     Ay Baba Namaze Shab Me Bhi, Me Zeyb-E-Musalla Ho Ker

Tasbi Hi Bana Ker Ashko(N) Ki Aur Allaho Akbar Keh Ker

Mei Kehti Ho Rokar, Ay Baba

Mer Jayengi Muztar, Ay Baba

Abad Karo Ghar, Ay Baba



(Mere Pardesi Baba Kab Awoge) X2



3.     Awaz-E-Azaan Jab Kaano(N) Mei, Ati Hai Allahu Akber

Dil Mera Tarap Ker Kehta Hai Le Aagaye Tera Akber

Ho Khwab Ye Pura , Ay Baba

Aye Mera Bhaya, Ay Baba

Batla Do Khudara, Ay Baba



(Mere Pardesi Baba Kab Awoge) X2



4.     Jab Maut Muje Ajayengi Kunbe Ki Yaad Me Rokar

Talqeen Paranga Kon Meri Na Aap Na Bhayya Akber

Me Bekas-O-Muztar, Ay Baba

Ab Maut Hai Ser Per, Ay Baba

Ik Boj Hai Dil Par, Ay Baba



(Mere Pardesi Baba Kab Awoge) X2



5.     Ghar Qabr Ke Jaisa Lag Ta Hai Dasti Hai Muje Tanhayi

Har Saath Me Dejati Hai Kuch Zakhm Naye Tanhayi

Har Lamha Jafaa Hai, Ay Baba

Jina Bhi Sazaa Hai, Ay Baba

Ab Kehna Para Hai, Ay Baba



(Mere Pardesi Baba Kab Awoge) X2



6.     Ik Dard Musalsal Rehta Hai Is Qalb-E-Hazee(N)E Mei Baba

Ay Kash Ke Marne Se Pehle Ghar Laut Ke Ayei(N) Baba

De Kon Dilase, Ay Baba

Kya Puchu Khuda Se, Ay Baba

Tum Karbobala Se, Ay Baba



(Mere Pardesi Baba Kab Awoge) X2



7.     Jab Aun O Muhammed Ke Hujre Dekhu To Tarap Jati Hu(N)

Asger Ka Humakna Baba Sochu To Tarap Jati Hu(N)

Tarsi Hain Nigaahei(N), Ay Baba

Sab Yaad Jo Ayei(N), Ay Baba

Deti Hu(N) Sadaye(N) , Ay Baba



(Mere Pardesi Baba Kab Awoge) X2



8.     “Farhan” Masayib Likhte Huwe “Mazhar” Ne Ashk Bahaye

Kiya Khune Jigar Se Sugra Ne Baba Ko Likha Ta Haye

Ker Ker Ke Nawha, Ay Baba

Jab Thak Gaye Sugra, Ay Baba

Tehreer Mei Pucha, Ay Baba



(Mere Pardesi Baba Kab Awoge) X2

tracks.title: Sajjad Ko Be Maut
tracks.lyrics:
Hai Shaam Ka Bazaar Or Abid-E-Bimar

Tarikh Me Gar Bazaar Na Hota

Shabbir Ka Beta Kabhi Bimar Na Hota



(Sajjad Ko Be Maut Ye Gham Maar Gaya Hai) X2



1.     Be Parda Haraam Saath Hai Aur Shaam Chalaa Hai



(Sajjad Ko Be Maut Ye Gham Maar Gaya Hai) X2



2.     (Zainab Ko Koyi Dekh Na Paye Isi Khatir) X2

(Neze Pe Sar-E-Sibte Nabi Bol Raha Hai) X2



(Sajjad Ko Be Maut Ye Gham Maar Gaya Hai) X2



3.     (Zainab Na Tamasha Bane Dekhe Muje Sab Log) X2

(Ye Soch Ke Sar Ghazi Ka Neze Se Gira Hai) X2



(Sajjad Ko Be Maut Ye Gham Maar Gaya Hai) X2



Abid Ko Dawa Aur Na Ghiza Dete Hai

Sote Hai To Zanjir Hila Dete Hai



4.     (Ay Shimr Layin Kispe Tu Barsa Ta Hai Kore) X2

(Abid To Bari Der Se Behosh Para Hai) X2



(Sajjad Ko Be Maut Ye Gham Maar Gaya Hai) X2



5.     (Ay Shimr Sakina Ko Na Tu Maar Tamache) X2

(Ahsas Yatimi Ki Bari Sakht Saza Hai) X2



(Sajjad Ko Be Maut Ye Gham Maar Gaya Hai) X2



6.     (Na Tok Hai Wazni Ka Na Naqahat Ka Sabab Hai) X2

(Sar Sayed-E-Sajjad Ka Ghirat Se Juka Hai) X2



(Sajjad Ko Be Maut Ye Gham Maar Gaya Hai) X2



7.     (Fizza Ki Himayat Me Kinchi Teg Hazaro) X2

(Zainab Ki Himayat Me Bas Ik Qaidi Khara Hai) X2



(Sajjad Ko Be Maut Ye Gham Maar Gaya Hai) X2



8.     (Phir Shimr Ne Napaak Zaban Se Ye Bataya) X2

(Ye Laila, Ye Kulsum Ye Zainab Be Rida Hai) X2



(Sajjad Ko Be Maut Ye Gham Maar Gaya Hai) X2



9.     (“Farhan” Ye Zainab Ke Masayib Ka Asar Hai) X2

(Chaalis Baras Mola Mera Rota Raha Hai) X2



(Sajjad Ko Be Maut Ye Gham Maar Gaya Hai) X2

tracks.title: Subha E Ashur Hai
tracks.lyrics:
Dhal Gayi Aashur Ki Raat
Pheli Safedi Subh Ki
Roke Bola Ibne Zehra
Waqt Aya He Azaan Ka
Ey Shabihe Mustafa

(Subhe Ashoor He
Dede Akbar Azaa(N)) X3

1.     (Ey Shabihe Mustafa) X2
Ey Mere Karyal Jawaa(N)
Mere Nawjawaa(N)
De Aisi Azaa(N)
Jo Pohonche Jina
Rahe Ta Jaaha(N)
Jaane Baba

(Subhe Ashoor He
Dede Akbar Azaa(N)) X3

2.     (Ey Shabihe Mustafa) X2
Ey Mere Karyal Jawaa(N)
Shabihe Nabi
Yahaan He Tuhi
Sare Karbala
Phuphi Ka Teri
He Yeh Nawha

(Subhe Ashoor He
Dede Akbar Azaa(N)) X3

3.     (Ey Shabihe Mustafa) X2
Ey Mere Karyal Jawaa(N)
Dile Ghamzada
Kare Ye Buka
Meri Jang Ki
Ho Yun Ibteda
Mere Beta

(Subhe Ashoor He
Dede Akbar Azaa(N)) X3

4.     (Ey Shabihe Mustafa) X2
Ey Mere Karyal Jawaa(N)
Ye Gham Ka Samaa(N)
Jo Dekha Yahaa(N)
Behan Nawhagar
Musalle Pe Maa
Boli Fizza

(Subhe Ashoor He
Dede Akbar Azaa(N)) X3

5.     (Ey Shabihe Mustafa) X2
Ey Mere Karyal Jawaa(N)
Azaa(N) Ho To Yu(N)
Mujhe Ho Suku(N)
Hare Ek Lafz Mein
Nazar Aaye Khun
Mere Jad Ka

(Subhe Ashoor He
Dede Akbar Azaa(N)) X3

6.     (Ey Shabihe Mustafa) X2
Ey Mere Karyal Jawaa(N)
Azaa(N) Me Asar
Ho Itna Pisar
Rakhe Jab Hawa
Use Dosh Par
Sun Le Sughra

(Subhe Ashoor He
Dede Akbar Azaa(N)) X3

7.     (Ey Shabihe Mustafa) X2
Ey Mere Karyal Jawaa(N)
Abhi He Yahaa(N)
Mere Naujawaa(N)
Sunenge Azaa(N)
Mere Nanajaan
Tere Dada

(Subhe Ashoor He
Dede Akbar Azaa(N)) X3

8.     Ey Shabihe Mustafa
Ey Mere Karyal Jawaa(N)
Aza Bête Ki
Jo “Mazhar” Suni
Kaha Shah Ne
Yahi Us Ghari
Shukre Maula

(Subhe Ashoor He
Dede Akbar Azaa(N)) X3

tracks.title: Zainabam Zainabam
tracks.lyrics:
(Zainabam) X3

 (Zainabam Zainabam Khawahare Gham Par Waram) X2

1.     Jaaunga Me Jahaan Jahaan Sehne Parenge Hame Gham

(Zainabam Zainabam Khawahare Gham Par Waram) X2

2.     Koi Baqi Na Raha Baandh Li Humne Bhi Kamar
He Chamakte Huwe Neze Mere Marne Ie Khabar
(Mere Hawale He Behan) X2

Tifl Mere Mere Haram

(Zainabam Zainabam Khawahare Gham Par Waram) X2

3.     Shaam Dhal Jaye To Ye Wada Nibhana Bibi
Apne Sine Pe Sakina Ko Sulana Bibi
(Kon Sambhalega Use) X2
Jab Na Rahenge Yahaa(N) Hum

(Zainabam Zainabam Khawahare Gham Par Waram) X2

4.     Jab Mere Halq Pe Shamsheere Sitam Chalne Lage
Zulm Ki Foj Mein Naqqara Agar Bajne Lage
(Dekhna Abid Na Uthe) X2
Kheche Huw Teghe To Dam

(Zainabam Zainabam Khawahare Gham Par Waram) X2

5.     Jab Tumhe Sham Ke Darbar Mein Lejaye Shaqi
Yaad Karlena Jo Amma Pe Uftaad Huwi
(Log Wohi Zulm Wohi) X2
Baat Wohi Aur Wohi Hum

(Zainabam Zainabam Khawahare Gham Par Waram) X2

6.     Sab Ke Shaane Huwe Rasan Basta Sakina Ka Gala
Aisa Aalam Mein Bhi Karna Nahin Ummat Se Gila
(Sanie Zahra Ho Behan) X2
Sehna Usi Tarha Sitam

(Zainabam Zainabam Khawahare Gham Par Waram) X2

7.     Berida Dekh Na Paye Tujhe Dunya Ki Nazar
Isliye Neze Se Girjayega Abbas Ka Sar
(Qariye Quran Wahan) X2
Honge Isi Dard Se Hum

(Zainabam Zainabam Khawahare Gham Par Waram) X2

8.     Yaad Rakhna Ye Sitam Hovega Dorane Safar
Tez Naaqe Se Jo Girjayegi Meri Dukhtar
(Dhund Ke Tum Lana Use) X2
Kaafile Ko Rokenge Hum

(Zainabam Zainabam Khawahare Gham Par Waram) X2

9.     Kon Ham Dard Yahan Baqi He Pyaase Ke Liye
Ek Naseehat Kiye Jaata Hun Dilase Ke Liye
(Haya Ala Khairil Amal) X2
Tum Ye Kaho Aur Kahe Hum

(Zainabam Zainabam Khawahare Gham Par Waram) X2

10. Dame Rukhsat Thi Ye “Farhan” Shahe Deen Ki Fughan
Baad Mere Jo Sitam Honge Karu Kaise Bayaa(N)
(Saath Nahin Deti Zabaa(N)) X2
Ban Gaya Khud “Mazhare” Gham

(Zainabam Zainabam Khawahare Gham Par Waram) X2

(Zainabam) X3

albums.title: Wah Hussain A.S Sab E Kaba

tracks.title: Abbas As Tere Janay Kay Bad
Wah Hussain As Sab E Kaba
Zainab As Ko Ghazi As Yaad Aaya
Eik Abid As Eik Shabbir As
Fatah E Lashkar Ya Ali As
Soldiers Of Imam As English Noha
Main Paidal Chala Karbala Farhan Ali Waris
Aaja Way Laal Asghar As Punjabi
Shahadat Tiflan E Muslim As Riwayat
Kadan Walsein Bhira Akbar As Saraiki
Sabeel E Hussain As Jab Bhi Piyo Pani

albums.title: Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai

tracks.title: Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai
tracks.lyrics:
Ameer Hussain
Ghareeb Hussain

(Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai) X2


Hussain Mehboob E Kibriya Hai

Hussain Ghurbat Ki Inteha Hai
Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai


(Hussain Maqsood E Karbala Hai) X2

Hussain Mazloom E Karbala Hai


(Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai) X2
Hussain Mehboob E Gibriya Hai

Hussain Ghurbat Ki Inteha Hai
Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai



1.     (Ameer Aisa Kafan Ki Soghat Jis Keh Rozey Se Bat Rahe Hai) X2

Ghareeb Aisa Keh Khud Ko Ab Tak Kafan Mayesar Nahi Huwa Hai



Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai

Hussain Ghareeb Hussain



2.     (Ameer Aisa Keh Jis Ka Jhula Nabi Jhoolayein Ali Jhoolayein) X2

Ghareeb Aisa Keh Jis Keh Bachey Ka Ban Mei Jhula Bhi Jal Gaya Hai



Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai

Hussain Ghareeb Hussain



3.     (Ameer Aisa Keh Rasm-E-Parda Dari Chali Hai Ussi Keh Ghar Se) X2

Ghareeb Aisa Keh Sham O Kufa Mei Us Ki Hamsheer Berida Hai



Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai

Hussain Ghareeb Hussain



4.     (Ameer Aisa Sakina Jaisi Khuda Neh Beti Jisey Ata Ki) X2

Ghareeb Aisa Ussi Keh Moo Par Koi Tamachey Laga Raha Hai



Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai

Hussain Ghareeb Hussain



5.     (Ameer Aisa Keh Jis Ki Baba Ki Milkiyyat Mei Hai Hawze Kausar) X2

Ghareeb Aisa Keh Teen Din Se Ussi Ko Pani Nahi Mila Hai



Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai

Hussain Ghareeb Hussain



6.     (Ameer Aisa Ke Jiska Beta, Shabih-E-Sardaar-E-Ambhiya Hai) X2

Ghareeb Aisa Ke Wohi Seene Mei Barchi Khaaye Tarap Raha Hai



Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai

Hussain Ghareeb Hussain



7.     (Ameer Aisa Khuda Ka Dee(N) Jis Keh Dam Se Hai Aj Tak Salamat) X2

Ghareeb Aisa Keh Ran Mei Jis Ka Badan Salamat Nahi Raha Hai



Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai

Hussain Ghareeb Hussain



8.     (Ameer Aisa Keh Patharo Ko Bana Deh Gohar Wohi “Takallum”) X2

Ghareeb Aisa Keh Patharo Mei Ussi Ka Lasha Chupa Huwa Hai

(Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai) X2
Hussain Mehboob E Gibriya Hai

Hussain Ghurbat Ki Inteha Hai
Ameer Bhi Hai Ghareeb Bhi Hai

Ameer, Hussain

Ghareeb, Hussain

tracks.title: Aay Sham Kay Logo
tracks.lyrics:
(Mei Bint E Ali Hoon) X3

(Aey Sham Keh Logo Mei Bint E Ali Hoon) X3



1.     (Mei Waris E Tatheer Hoon) X2

Namoos-E-Nabi Hoon



(Aey Sham Keh Logo Mei Bint E Ali Hoon) X2



2.     Bazaar Se Darbar Mei Leh Aye Ho Muj Ko

Chaho Tou Jala Saktiee Hoon Khutboo Se Mei Tum Ko

Sabir Ki Behan Hoon Jo Mei Khamosh Khari Hoon



(Aey Sham Keh Logo Mei Bint E Ali Hoon) X2



3.     Afsoos Kanizi Mei Usse Mang Rahey Hoo

Tum Jis Keh Ghulamo Ki Ghulami Mei Rahey Hoo

Yeh Zulm Na Ho Ga Kabhi Mei Zinda Abhi Hoon



(Aey Sham Keh Logo Mei Bint E Ali Hoon) X2



4.     Tum Apney Payambar Ko Agar Dikhna Chahoo

Nazey Pe Jo Yeh Sar Hai Issey Ghour Se Dekhoo

Humshakal E Payambar Hai Yeh Mei Is Ki Phupi Hoon



(Aey Sham Keh Logo Mei Bint E Ali Hoon) X2



5.     Aur Iss Se Kathan Waqt Kya Hoo Gaa Mere Mabood

Fiza Keh Taraf Dar Hai Darbar Mei Majood

Mei Pusht Pe Fiza Keh Khari Dekh Rahe Hoon



(Aey Sham Keh Logo Mei Bint E Ali Hoon) X2



6.     Zehra Ko Bhi Darbar Mei Tum Neh Tha Bulaya

Darbar May Mei Bhi Hoo Magar Farq Hai Itnaa

Pardey Mei Thi Woh Aur Mei Be Parda Kari Hoon



(Aey Sham Keh Logo Mei Bint E Ali Hoon) X2



7.     Zanjeero Mei Jakra Jo Yeh Beimaar Khraa Hai

Sajda Isey Kaabey Ki Faseelo Neh Kiya Hai

Mansab Mei Bara Woh Hai Mei Rishtey Mei Bari Hoon



(Aey Sham Keh Logo Mei Bint E Ali Hoon) X2



8.     Zinda Tha Tou Dar Dar Keh Hameshaa He Larey Hoo

Ab Sar Hai Tou Honto Pe Chari Mar Rahey Hoo

Tum Kitney Bahaddur Ho Mei Yeh Dikh Rahi Hoon



(Aey Sham Keh Logo Mei Bint E Ali Hoon) X2



9.     Honeh Lagi Darbar Mei Mushtarka Azanein

“Rehan” Idhar Naam E Nabi Gunja Fizza Mei

(Bibi Neh Kaha Fakhr Se) X2 (Mei Jeet Gayi Hoon) X 3

tracks.title: Akbar Ne Kaha Rokar
tracks.lyrics:
Shabih E Imam E Zama(N) Khechte Hain

Tasawwur Mei Tasweer E Jaan Khechte Hain

Shabih E Imam E, Kaha Roo Keh Akbar Neh Aiy Dard Tham Jaa

Ke Seene Se Baba Sinaa Khechte Hain

Shabih E Imam E



(Akbar Neh Kaha Roo Kar Aiy Dard Zara Tham Jaa, Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech
Rahey Hain) X2



1.     (Aiy Behtey Lahu Rukjaa) X2 Hai Wasta Sughra Ka



Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain

Akbar Neh Kaha Roo Kar Aiy Dard Zara Tham Jaa

Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain



2.     Patee Mere Baba Neh Ankho(N) Pe Nahi Bandhi

Di Hai Khuley Aankho(N) Se Ran Mei Meri Qurbani

Ai Dada Khaleel Awo Hai Waqt Qayamat Ka



Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain

Akbar Neh Kaha Roo Kar Aiy Dard Zara Tham Jaa

Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain



3.     Yasrab Ki Taraf Ankhey Har Dam Meri Rehti Hai

Ab Waqt Bohat Kam Hai Sansei(N) Bhi Ulajti Hain

Qasid Meri Sughra Ke Jaldi Se Zara Aajaa



Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain

Akbar Neh Kaha Roo Kar Aiy Dard Zara Tham Jaa

Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain



4.     Akbar Ki Guzarish Hai Lillaha Na Rad Karna

Jab Aap Ka Shewa Hai Duniya Ki Madad Karna

Baba Ki Madad Karney Aajayie Ay Dada



Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain

Akbar Neh Kaha Roo Kar Aiy Dard Zara Tham Jaa

Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain



5.     Dekha Nahi Jaayegaa Aankho(N) Se Kabhi Meri

Tarpuga Agar Mei To Taklif Unhe Hogi

Ulfat Ka Takaza Hai Larzey Na Badan Mera



Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain

Akbar Neh Kaha Roo Kar Aiy Dard Zara Tham Jaa

Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain



6.     Armaan Jo Dil Mei Hai Dil Mei Hi Na Dafna Deh

Aisa Na Ho Zainab Ko Jaa Kar Koi Batladeh

Pyari Phupi Amaa(N) Se Bardaasht Na Yeh Hoo Gaa



Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain

Akbar Neh Kaha Roo Kar Aiy Dard Zara Tham Jaa

Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain



7.     Marney Ka Nahi Hai Gham Gham Hai Tou Bus Itnaa Hai

Darwzey Pe Muddat Se Bethi Huwi Sughra Hai

Sun Kar Ye Khabar Shayad Mar Jaayegi Woh Dukhiyaa



Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain

Akbar Neh Kaha Roo Kar Aiy Dard Zara Tham Jaa

Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain



8.     Kehta Tha “Takkllum” Woh Himmat Jo Meri Hoti

Khud Apney Hi Hathoo Se Mei Khechta Yeh Barchi

Taklif Nahi Apni Hai Dard Mujhay Iss Ka



Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain

Akbar Neh Kaha Roo Kar Aiy Dard Zara Tham Jaa

Baba Mere Seene Se Sinaa Khech Rahey Hain

tracks.title: Koi Ghaybat Mei
tracks.lyrics:
(Koi Ghaibat Mei Betha Khoon Keh Aansoo Bahata Hai) X2



1.     Usse Zainab Ka Jaab Bazar Jana Yaad Ata Hai



(Koi Ghaibat Mei Betha Khoon Keh Aansoo Bahata Hai) X2



2.     (Koi Ghamkhar Ghaibat Mei Mayesar Hi Nahi Usko) X2

(So Tanhayi Mei Har Nauha) X2 Woh Khud Ko Hi Sunataa Hai



(Koi Ghaibat Mei Betha Khoon Keh Aansoo Bahata Hai) X2



3.     (Unhi Galiyon Mei Chal Chal Kar Jaha Chalti Rahe Zainab) X2

(Nisha(N) Zainab Keh Qadmo(N)) X2 Keh Woh Hathoo Se Mita Ta Hai



(Koi Ghaibat Mei Betha Khoon Keh Aansoo Bahata Hai) X2



4.     (Baqiyye Mei Sada E Wa Hussaina Ghunj Uthti Hai) X2

(Woh Jaab Bhi Qabr E Zahra) X2 Aa Keh Seene Se Lagata Hai



(Koi Ghaibat Mei Betha Khoon Keh Aansoo Bahata Hai) X2



5.     (Nahi Thamte Hai Uski Aankh Se Aansoo Kisi Soorat) X2

(Usse Behsheer Ka) X2 Jab Muskarana Yaad Ata Hai



(Koi Ghaibat Mei Betha Khoon Keh Aansoo Bahata Hai) X2



6.     (Pidar Ki God Ki Khatir Sakina Jab Bhi Roti Hai) X2

(Woh Lori Baap Ke) X2 Lehjey Mei Beti Ko Sunata Hai



(Koi Ghaibat Mei Betha Khoon Keh Aansoo Bahata Hai) X2



7.     (Khayaal Ata Hai Jab Bhi Parda E Zainab Ka Mehdi Ko) X2

(Kabhi Talwar Par) X2 Woh Haath Rakhta Hai Hatata Hai



(Koi Ghaibat Mei Betha Khoon Keh Aansoo Bahata Hai) X2



8.     (Woh Hujjat Hai Ussi Ka Kaam Hai Iss Dard Ko Sehna) X2

(Kisi Khaqi Keh Dil Mei) X2 Juan Yeh Gham Kaab Samata Hai



(Koi Ghaibat Mei Betha Khoon Keh Aansoo Bahata Hai) X2

tracks.title: Asghar As Ko Lay Kay Gaud Main
Kar Madad Meri Baqir As Beta
Kiwain Darbar Gaye Bayrida Bint E Ali As
Rohi Wa Jismi Lakal Fida Title
Teri Zehra Sa Pay Musibat Ke Ghari Hay
Faras Ke Zeen Say Bayshak Utar Gaye Hain Hussain
Aaj Bhi Zainab As Ke Aati Hay Sada
Du Hosla Baba Zainab As Ko
Maa Umul Baneen Say Mat Kehna
Ya Mehdi As Al Ajal Title
Abbas Kahan Ho
tracks.lyrics:
(Aina Akhi Abbas) X 4

(Bazaar Mai Binte-Ali Deti Thi Sadaa Bhai Abbas Kahaan Ho) X 2

  1. (Sar Par Bhi Nahi Chaadar) X 2 Laakhon Hai Tamashaai

Abbas (Kahaan Ho) X 2 (Abbas Abbas) X 4

  2. Is Aalam-E-Ghurbat Mai Koi Bhi Nahi Meraa,

Hai Khaake Safar Sar Par Aur Haath Rasan Bastaa,

Pardes Mai Zainab Ko Taqdeer Kahaan Laayi

Abbas (Kahaan Ho) X 2 (Abbas Abbas) X 4

  3. Paivast Hai Neze Mai Sar Shaahe Shahidaan Ka,

Yeh Dekh Ke Ai Ghaazi Phat-Taa Hai Mera Sina,

Marjaaegi Is Gham Mai, Shabbir Ki Majaayee

Abbas (Kahaan Ho) X 2 (Abbas Abbas) X 4

  4. Dariyaa Ke Kanaare Tum Aadaa Se Gaye Larne,

Sab Dekh Rahi Thi Mai Darvaaza-E-Khaima Se,

Ab Jung Hamaari Bhi Dekho To Zaraa Bhai

Abbas (Kahaan Ho) X 2 (Abbas Abbas) X 4

  5. Duniyo Ka Sahara Hai Baba Jo Hamaraa Hai,

Mushkil Mai Magar Maine Tumko Hi Pukaara Hai,

Ab Dhundhti Hai Tumko Bhayya Meri Binaai

Abbas (Kahaan Ho) X 2 (Abbas Abbas) X 4

  6. Be Munis-O-Yawar Hai Batlaawo Kidhar Jaaye,

Is Tarha To Jine Se Behtar Hai Ke Marjaaye,

Fariyaad Kare Kisse Hoti Nahi Sunwaayi

Abbas (Kahaan Ho) X 2 (Abbas Abbas) X 4

  7. Ai Sher Yehi Meri Imdaad Ko Aajaao

Maanga Hai Kanizi Mai Zaalim Ne Sakina Ko

Hai Waqt Qayamat Ka Maasum Hai Ghabraayi

Abbas (Kahaan Ho) X 2 (Abbas Abbas) X 4

  8. Ahmed Ki Nawaasi Ka "Yassir" Yehi Nauha Thaa

Na Bhaai Bache Mere Na Koi Bachaa Beta

Ab Jiike Karungi Kya Gar Maut Nahi Aayi

Abbas (Kahaan Ho) X 2 (Abbas Abbas) X 4

tracks.title: Bhayya Ghareeb
tracks.lyrics:
(Ay Mere Bhai Hussain) X4

(Bhaya Gharib Zainab Tera Kafan Na Layi) X3

  1. Lash-E-Hussain Par Hai, Zainab Ki Ye Duhaayi

(Bhaya Gharib Zainab Tera Kafan Na Layi) X2

  2. Misl-E-Batool Haq Se Mehroom Hu Mei Ab Tak

Shabbir Tere Gham Mei, Maghmoom Hu Mei Ab Tak

Tarpa Rahi Hai Mujhko, Abbas Ki Judaayi

Bhaya Gharib Zainab Tera Kafan Na Layi (Ay Mere Bhai Hussain) X2

  3. Afsos Ke Sakina, Nazo(N) Se Jo Pali Hai

Jo Tum Ko Yaad Karke, Zindaa Mei Chalbasi Hai

Usko Mili Na Bhayya, Zindaan Se Rihaayi

Bhaya Gharib Zainab Tera Kafan Na Layi (Ay Mere Bhai Hussain) X2

  4. Ham Par Sitam Ay Bhayya, Dhate Rahe Sitamghar

Sayyedaniyo(N) Ke Sar Mei, Ati Thi Khaak Urhkar

Bazaar Ka Wo Manzar, Zainab Na Bhool Paayi

Bhaya Gharib Zainab Tera Kafan Na Layi (Ay Mere Bhai Hussain) X2

  5. Baalo(N) Se Mu(N) Chupa Kar, Bazaar Mei Gayi Thi

Narghe Mei Ashkiya(N) Ke, Beparda Mei Khari Thi

Guzri Hai Kya Behen Par, Kaise Batawu Bhaayi

Bhaya Gharib Zainab Tera Kafan Na Layi (Ay Mere Bhai Hussain) X2

  6. Sajjad Ke Ye Dil Par, Dushwaar Marhala Tha

Zanjeer Ko Sambhaale, Beemar Ro Raha Tha

Aal-E-Nabi Khule Sar, Darbar Mei Jo Ayi

Bhaya Gharib Zainab Tera Kafan Na Layi (Ay Mere Bhai Hussain) X2

  7. Sabse Bari Musibat, Kya Hai Kisi Ne Poocha

Beemar Sar Jhuka Kar, Rote Huwe Ye Bola

Behno(N) Ko Shaam Jana, Zainab Ki Beridaayi

Bhaya Gharib Zainab Tera Kafan Na Layi (Ay Mere Bhai Hussain) X2

  8. Misl-E-Batool Akse Mehroom Hu Mei Ab Tak

Shabbir Tere Gham Mei, Maghmoom Hu Mei Ab Tak

Tarpa Rahi Hai Mujhko, Abbas Ki Judaayi

Bhaya Gharib Zainab Tera Kafan Na Layi (Ay Mere Bhai Hussain) X2

  9. Is Aik Saanhay Par, Aksar Muhib Ne Socha

Barbaad Ho Gaya Jab, Aal-E-Nabi Ka Kumba

Baad-E-Hussain Kyu Kar, Baaqi Rahi Khudaayi

Bhaya Gharib Zainab Tera Kafan Na Layi (Ay Mere Bhai Hussain) X2 (Tera Kafan
Na Layi) X3

tracks.title: Boli Zehra
tracks.lyrics:
(Meri Fizza) X6

(Boli Zehra Zainab Ka Yun Saath Nibhaana) X3

(Aghyaar Ke Majme Mein) X2

Fizza Tu Ridaa Banke, Zainab Ko Chhupana

(Boli Zehra Zainab Ka Yun Saath Nibhaana) X2

  1. Pehli Manzil To Kerbala He Magar, Saath Abbas Bhi Wahaan Hoga

Dard Karbobala Ka Apni Jagah, Zakhm Mujhe Shaam Ka He Ran Fizza

(Khud Dekh Chuki Hun Mein) X2

Mushkil He Bohot Fizza, Darbaar Mein Jaana

Boli Zehra Zainab Ka Yun Saath Nibhaana

  2. Tashnagi Had Se Barh Gayi Hogi, Chhote Bachhon Ko Woh Sambhaalegi

Apne Hisse Ka Aab Bhi Zainab, Pyaase Bachhon Mein Baant Daalegi

(Khud Apne Hi Hisse Se) X2

Kuchh Paani Bacha Phir Tum, Zainab Ko Pilaaana

Boli Zehra Zainab Ka Yun Saath Nibhaana

  3. Mujh Ko Maalum He Yateemi Mein, Log Jab Rokte Hein Rone Se

Us Ghari Dil Pe Kya Guzarti He, Mein Samajhti Hun Dukh Sakina Ke

(Dil Kholke Baba Ki) X2

Mayyit Pe Woh Role To, Mayyit Se Uthaana

Boli Zehra Zainab Ka Yun Saath Nibhaana

  4. Kaafla Jab Chalega Sehra Se, Koi Maqtal Mein Choot Jaayegi

Us Se Pehle Ke Pohonche Zainab Tak, Shimr Ke Haath Aayegi Bachhi

(Tab Shimr Ke Haathon Se) X2

Tum Mere Sakina Ke, Baalon Ko Churana

Boli Zehra Zainab Ka Yun Saath Nibhaana

  5. Tashnagi Had Se Barh Gayi Hogi, Chhote Bachhon Ko Woh Sambhaalegi

Apne Hisse Ka Aab Bhi Zainab, Pyaase Bachhon Mein Baant Daalegi

(Khud Apne Hi Hisse Se) X2

Kuchh Paani Bacha Phir Tum, Zainab Ko Pilaaana

Boli Zehra Zainab Ka Yun Saath Nibhaana

  6. Sunke Binte Nabi Ki Baton Ko, Boli Saqlain Fizza Zehra Se

Hamse Bibi Yahi Guzarish He, Jitne Waade Kiye He Fizza Ne

(Mein Kaise Nibhaati Hun) X2

Un Shaam Ki Galiyon Mein, Tum Dekhne Aana

Boli Zehra Zainab Ka Yun Saath Nibhaana

tracks.title: Khud Baap Jawaan
tracks.lyrics:
(Khud Baap Jawaan Laal Ki Mayyit Ko Uthaaye) X2 Khud Baap Jawaan Laal Ki

  1. (Ya Rab Kisi Dushman Pe Bhi Yeh Waqt Na Aaye) X 2

Khud Baap Jawaan Laal Ki Mayyit Ko Uthaaye, Khud Baap Jawaan Laal Ki

  2. (Sheh Se Ali-Akber Ka Janaza Na Uthega) X 2

(Dariyaa Se Koi Jaake Alamdar Ko Laaye) X 2

Khud Baap Jawaan Laal Ki Mayyit Ko Uthaaye, Khud Baap Jawaan Laal Ki

  3. (Yunh Tez Kadam Jaanibe Khaima Chale Sarwar) X 2

(Ghabraake Kahin Ran Mai Na Zainab Nikal Aaye) X 2

Khud Baap Jawaan Laal Ki Mayyit Ko Uthaaye

Khud Baap Jawaan Laal Ki …..

  4. (Sehre Ki Jagaa Dekhe Jawaan Bete Ki Mayyat) X 2

(Taqdeer Kisi Maa Ko Yeh Manzar Na Dikhaaye) X 2

Khud Baap Jawaan Laal Ki Mayyit Ko Uthaaye

Khud Baap Jawaan Laal Ki …..

  5. (Yunh Shaam Pohonchne Ki "Taqallum" Ko Hai Jaldi) X 2

(Nauha Ali-Akber Ka Woh Zainab Ko Sunaaye) X 2

(Khud Baap Jawaan Laal Ki Mayyit Ko Uthaaye) X 2

tracks.title: Kis Tarha
tracks.lyrics:
Kis Terha Apni Tabahi Ki Khabar Lejaye

Paas Zainab Ke Bacha Kya Hai Jo Ghar Lejaaye

(Kis Terha Apni Tabahi Ki Khabar Lejaye) X2

  1. Paas Zainab Ke Bacha Kya Hai Jo Ghar Lejaaye

(Kis Terha Apni Tabahi Ki Khabar Lejaye) X2

  2. (Lai Gayee Baap Ka Saya To Saro(N) Se Unke) X2

Ab Yateemon Ko Hawa Chaahe Jidhar Le Jaaye

Paas Zainab Ke Bacha Kya Hai Jo Ghar Lejaaye

(Kis Terha Apni Tabahi Ki Khabar Lejaye) X2

  3. (Aik Do Gul Ke Charaghon Ko Bujha De Leykin) X2

Cheen Ker Koi Na Umeedai(N), Sahar Lai Jaayai

Paas Zainab Ke Bacha Kya Hai Jo Ghar Lejaaye

(Kis Terha Apni Tabahi Ki Khabar Lejaye) X2

  4. (Paon Zakhmi Hai(N) To Raho(N) Main Hai(N) Pathar Kaantay) X2

Jaane Aabid Ko Kaha(N) Tak Yeh Safar Le Jaaye

Paas Zainab Ke Bacha Kya Hai Jo Ghar Lejaaye

(Kis Terha Apni Tabahi Ki Khabar Lejaye) X2

  5. (Boli Hongi Ali Akbar Ko Saja Ker Zainab) X2

Chaand Ko Mere Kissi Ki Na Nazar Le Jaaye

Paas Zainab Ke Bacha Kya Hai Jo Ghar Lejaaye

(Kis Terha Apni Tabahi Ki Khabar Lejaye) X2

  6. (Sochti Hogi Yeh Bano Mera Bach Jaaye Suhaag) X2

Hurmula Mujh Sai Mere Lakht-E-Jiger Lejaaye

Paas Zainab Ke Bacha Kya Hai Jo Ghar Lejaaye

(Kis Terha Apni Tabahi Ki Khabar Lejaye) X2

  7. (Rakh Ke Ankhon Ke Sulagtay Huwe Is Maqtal Mei) X2

Laash Bacho(N) Ki Ke Shabbir Ka Sar Lejaaye

Paas Zainab Ke Bacha Kya Hai Jo Ghar Lejaaye

(Kis Terha Apni Tabahi Ki Khabar Lejaye) X2

  8. (Shaiyari Ki Meri Maiyaar Yehi Ho Gi "Nazeer") X2

Zikr-E-Sarwar Main Mujhe Mout Agar Lejaaye

Paas Zainab Ke Bacha Kya Hai Jo Ghar Lejaaye

(Kis Terha Apni Tabahi Ki Khabar Lejaye) X2

tracks.title: Mei Hussain Hu
tracks.lyrics:
(Ya Hussain) X6

(Gunji Ba Waqat-E-Asr Sada Mei Hussain Hu(N)) X3

  1. (Kaato Na Mera Khusk Gala) X2 Mei Hussain Hu(N)

Gunji Ba Waqat-E-Asr Sada Mei Hussain Hu(N), Gunji Ba Waqt-E-Asr Sada

  2. (Amma Kissi Nai Paani Ka Ik Bhund Bhi Na Di) X2

(Mei Baar Baar Kehta Raha) X2 Mei Hussain Hu(N)

Gunji Ba Waqat-E-Asr Sada Mei Hussain Hu(N), Gunji Ba Waqt-E-Asr Sada

  3. (Sookhi Huwi Hai Sang Mere Halq Teer Se) X2

(Aahista Tu Churri Ko Chala) X2 Mei Hussain Hu(N)

Gunji Ba Waqat-E-Asr Sada Mei Hussain Hu(N), Gunji Ba Waqt-E-Asr Sada

  4. (Shireen Ke Ghar Pe Pohncha Jo Rano(N) Ka Qaafila) X2

(Naizai Sai Aik Sar Na Kaha) X2 Mei Hussain Hu(N)

Gunji Ba Waqat-E-Asr Sada Mei Hussain Hu(N), Gunji Ba Waqt-E-Asr Sada

  5. (Darbaar Main Laeen Ke Kohraam Mach Gaiya) X2

Mukhtaar Se Jo Sar Nai Kaha, Mei Hussain Hu(N)

Gunji Ba Waqat-E-Asr Sada Mei Hussain Hu(N), Gunji Ba Waqt-E-Asr Sada

  6. (Zano(N) Pe Rakh Ke Sar Ko Kaha Ik Za'eef Ne) X2

(Akber Kaha(N) Hai Jald Bata) X2 Mei Hussain Hu(N)

Gunji Ba Waqat-E-Asr Sada Mei Hussain Hu(N), Gunji Ba Waqt-E-Asr Sada

  7. (Aai Shaamiyo Kafan Na Diya, Mujh Ko Gham Nahi) X2

(Dai Do Meri Behan Ko Rida) X2 Mei Hussain Hu(N)

Gunji Ba Waqat-E-Asr Sada Mei Hussain Hu(N), Gunji Ba Waqt-E-Asr Sada

  8. (Amma Kissi Nai Paani Ka Ik Bhund Bhi Na Di) X2

(Mei Baar Baar Kehta Raha) X2 Mei Hussain Hu(N)

Gunji Ba Waqat-E-Asr Sada Mei Hussain Hu(N), Gunji Ba Waqt-E-Asr Sada

  9. (Mehsus Ho Raha Hai Ke, Maqtal Se Aaj Bhi) X2

(Aawaz Aa Rahi Hai "Raza") X2 Mei Hussain Hu(N)

(Gunji Ba Waqat-E-Asr Sada Mei Hussain Hu(N)) X2

tracks.title: Ro Raha Hai Khud
tracks.lyrics:
(Haay Sakina) X5

(Roraha Hai Khud Andhera Shaam Ke Zindaan Mein) X3

  1. (Rehgayi Tanha Sakina) X2

Shaam Ke Zindaan Mein

(Roraha Hai Khud Andhera Shaam Ke Zindaan Mein) X2

  2. (Margayi Ye Kehte Kehte Be Watan Pardes Mein) X2

(Kya Nahin Aayenge Baba) X2

tracks.title: Umm E Laila Sa Sanbhal Zainab Sa Ko
Aye Aun-O-Muhammad
tracks.lyrics:
Kehti Thi Yeh Zainab X 2, Yun Maa Ka Maan Nibhaana X 2



Aye Aun-O-Muhammad, Aye Aun-O-Muhammad X 2



Shabbir Ka Tum Sadka Ho, Ab Khaime Mai Beta, Tum Laut Kar Na Aana



Aye Aun-O-Muhammad, Aye Aun-O-Muhammad X 2



1.     Hai Maa Ko Yaqeen, Tum Maa Ki Baat Rakhoge,

Yeh Yaad Rahe, Khaimo Mai Hai Pyaase Bache,

Dariya Pe Agar Jaana Ho, Seh Roz Ke Pyaaso, Tum Pyaas Na Bujhaana



Aye Aun-O-Muhammad, Aye Aun-O-Muhammad X 2



2.     Har Haal Pe Tum Par, Laazim Hai Shukr Khuda Ka,

Aye Shehzaadon, Hai Sabr Tumhaara Virsaa,

Farzand Ho Tum Zainab Ke, Shikwa Nahi Karna, Jab Zakhm Koi Khaana



Aye Aun-O-Muhammad, Aye Aun-O-Muhammad X 2



3.     Kab Ham Pe Sitam, Karne Ke Liye Aaye Hai,

Yeh Badro-Ohad Ke, Badle Ke Liye Aaye Hai,

Laazim Hai Razaz Se Pehle, Maidaan Mai Tum Par, Madhe-Ali Sunaana



Aye Aun-O-Muhammad, Aye Aun-O-Muhammad X 2



4.     Jab Saans Tumhaari, Bacho Ho Utarne Waali,

Uss Waqt Sirhaane, Aayegi Maadar Meri,

Dil Ki Yeh Mere Khwaahish Hai, Uss Dam Meri Maa Se, Zakhmon Ko Tum Chhupaana



Aye Aun-O-Muhammad, Aye Aun-O-Muhammad X 2



5.     Qaatil Pe Karam, Nana Ki Tarha Kardena,

Yun Laaj Mere, Bhai Ke Naam Ki Rakhna,

Jo Waasta De Bhai Ka, Maidaan Pe Uss Par, Tum Tegh Na Chalaana



Aye Aun-O-Muhammad, Aye Aun-O-Muhammad X 2



6.     Jab Laashe Uthaakar, Khaime Mai Laaye Sarwar,

Zainab Yeh Boli, Askhon Ko Apne Chhupaakar,

Mai Bhi Na Tumhe Rowungi, Aur Mere Liye Bhi, Aansu Na Tum Bahaana



Aye Aun-O-Muhammad, Aye Aun-O-Muhammad X 2



7.     Taazeem Ki Khaatir, Kyun Uthte Nahi Ab Beta,

Dekho Toh Sirhaane, Aaye Hai Mere Bhayya,

Jaago Mere Shehzaado, Kya Bhoolgaye Ho, Qadmo Pe Sar Jhukaana



Aye Aun-O-Muhammad, Aye Aun-O-Muhammad X 2



8.     Shabaash Mere, Bacho Hun Mai Tumse Raazi,

Yeh Kehke Taqallum, Khamosh Huwi Shahzaadi,

Nezo Pe Safar Karke, Hamraah Hamaare, Tumko Hai Shaam Jaana



Aye Aun-O-Muhammad, Aye Aun-O-Muhammad

tracks.title: Pehlu Bhi Shikasta Hai
tracks.lyrics:
Haaye Sayyeda X 4



Pehlu Bhi Shikasta Hai, Turbat Bhi Shikasta Hai



Kya Haal Yeh Ummat Ne, Zehra Ka Banaaya Hai



1.     Khatoon Koi Gham Se Yun Chur Nahi Dekhi,

Aisi Koi Duniya Mai, Mastoor Nahi Dekhi,

Athhaara Baras Mai Hii, Lagti Jo Zaeefa Hai



Pehlu Bhi Shikasta Hai, Turbat Bhi Shikasta Hai



2.     Darbaar Mai Zaalim Ne, Kee Aisi Pazeeraai,

Kis Tarha Se Tu Bibi, Phir Laut Ke Ghar Aayi,

Baalon Ki Safedi Ne, Sab Haal Sunaaya Hai



Pehlu Bhi Shikasta Hai, Turbat Bhi Shikasta Hai



3.     Tu Roti Rahi Ghar Mai, Haider Se Bhi Chhup Chhup Ke,

Ismat Ki Tarha Dukh Bhi, Parde Mai Rahe Tere,

Kuch Dard Tere Bibi, Bas Jaanti Fizza Hai



Pehlu Bhi Shikasta Hai, Turbat Bhi Shikasta Hai



4.     Do Aise Janaaze Hai, Taarikh Mai Jo Utthe,

Bas Ghar Ke Hii Logo Ne, Dono Ko Diye Kaandhe,

Ik Fatema Zahra Hai, Ik Baali Sakina Hai



Pehlu Bhi Shikasta Hai, Turbat Bhi Shikasta Hai



5.     Marham Tere Zakhmon Ka, Bibi Na Milaa Ab Tak,

Aulaade Umayya Ki, Baaqi Hai Jafaa Ab Tak,

Rone Pe Bhi Pehra Tha, Turbat Pe Bhi Pehra Hai



Pehlu Bhi Shikasta Hai, Turbat Bhi Shikasta Hai



6.     Mismaar Tera Rauza, Ummat Ne Kiya Jab Se,

Baba Tera Rehta Hai, Turbat Pe Teri Tab Se,

Kab Ghumbad-E-Khizra Mai, Baba Tera Rehta Hai



Pehlu Bhi Shikasta Hai, Turbat Bhi Shikasta Hai



7.     Mehdi Se Koi Puchhe, Kya Uss Pe Guzarti Hai,

Awaaz Baqayya Se, Jab Rone Ki Aati Hai,

Aankhon Se Lahu Rokar, Woh Bhi Yehi Kehta Hai



Pehlu Bhi Shikasta Hai, Turbat Bhi Shikasta Hai



8.     Tasweer Haqiqat Ki, Khwaabon Ko Banaadijiye,

Ai Bibi Taqallum Ko, Taabir Dikhaadijiye,

Matam Teri Turbat Pe, Hote Huwe Dekha Hai

Pehlu Bhi Shikasta Hai, Turbat Bhi Shikasta Hai

tracks.title: Shaam Waalo
tracks.lyrics:
Shaam Waalo X 6



Shaam Waalo Na Sataao X 2



Kehta Tha Muhaari, Ghurbat Pe Hamaari, Bass Kar Na Rulaao,



Shaam Waalo Na Sataao X 3



1.     Sar Chacha Ka Mere Iss Waaste Girjaata Hai,

Inko Behno Ka Khulaa Sar Jo Nazar Aata Hai,

Ghayoor Ke Sar Ko, Lillaah Na Logo, Neze Pe Uthaao



Shaam Waalo Na Sataao X 3



2.     Haaye Kya Kya Na Sitam Dhaaye Hai Ham Par Tumne,

Hadd Yeh Hai Chhinli Tatheer Ki Chaadar Tumne,

Ab Tum Wahi Chadar, Neze Pe Uthaakar, Hamko Na Dikhaao



Shaam Waalo Na Sataao X 3



3.     Ham Ulil-Amr Hai Shaayad Yeh Nahi Tumko Khabar,

Ham Agar Chaahe Toh Barse Abhi Tum Par Patthar,

Majboor Samajhkar, Haaye Tum Aale Nabi Par, Pathhar Na Giraao



Shaam Waalo Na Sataao X 3



4.     Kaise Neze Pe Uthaaya Gaya Sar Asgher Ka,

Kaise Paamaal Kiya Ibne-Hassan Ka Laasha,

Yeh Zulm Ke Kisse, Mat Saamne Jaake, Maao Ko Sunaao



Shaam Waalo Na Sataao X 3



5.     Shaam-E-Aashur Se Yeh Soyi Nahi Hai Ab Tak,

Mai Toh Roya Hun Yeh Royi Bhi Nahi Hai Ab Tak,

Tum Maarlo Mujhko, Haaye Par Meri Phuphi Ko, Durre Na Lagaao



Shaam Waalo Na Sataao X 3



6.     Raaste Bhar Yeh Tarapte Rahe Paani Ke Liye,

Tumko Maalum Nahi Kabse Hai Pyaase Bache,

Bacho Ko Dikhaakar, Iss Tarha Zamin Par, Paani Na Bahaao,



Shaam Waalo Na Sataao X 3



7.     Aaj Batki Hai Wahaan Naam Pe Zainab Ke Ridaa,

Kal Taqallum Wahaa Bimaar Mera Kehta Rahaa,

Yeh Aale Nabi Hai, Haaye Tum Aise Na Inko, Beparda Phiraao



Shaam Waalo Na Sataao X 3

tracks.title: Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar
tracks.lyrics:
Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai X 4



Kahaa Roke Baqir Ne Aabid Se Baba, Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai X 2



Hai Baba Yahaan Par Baraa Sa Andhera, Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai



Kahaa Roke Baqir Ne Aabid Se Baba, Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai,

Kahaa Roke Baqir Ne Aabid Se Baba ...



1.     Haan Dekha Hai Maine Safar Mai Yeh Manzar, Jahaan Paani Hota Tha Iss Ko Mayassar,

Toh Khud Apne Hisse Ka Paani Hamesha, Giraati Thi Yeh Aap Ki Beriyon Par,

Mayassar Hai Ab Hamko Paani Toh Pyaasa, Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai



Kahaa Roke Baqir Ne Aabid Se Baba, Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai,

Kahaa Roke Baqir Ne Aabid Se Baba ...



2.     Jhukaaye Huwe Apna Sar Rorahi Hai, Rihaai Ki Sunkar Khabar Rorahi Hai,

Tarapti Hai Daadi Rubab Aise Baba, Ke Amma Bhi Thaame Jigar Rorahi Hai,

Bataayenge Kya Ghar Unhone Ye Puchha, Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai



Kahaa Roke Baqir Ne Aabid Se Baba, Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai,

Kahaa Roke Baqir Ne Aabid Se Baba ...



3.     Mujhe Yaad Hai Khud Yeh Kehte The Daada, Madina Hai Iss Ke Sabab Se Madina,

Ke Meri Nazar Mai Woh Ghar Ghar Nahi Hai, Nazar Jis Mai Aaye Na Mujhko Sakina,

Na Iss Ke Siwa Phir Basega Madina, Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai



Kahaa Roke Baqir Ne Aabid Se Baba, Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai,

Kahaa Roke Baqir Ne Aabid Se Baba ...



4.     Madina Ho Ya Shaam Karbobala Ho, Ke Bazaaro Darbaar Ka Marhalaa Ho,

Sadaa Hat Sitam Ham Ne Jhelaa Hai Milkar, Toh Phir Kyun Na Yeh Mere Dil Ki
Sadaa Ho,

Mujhe Bhi Yahin Chhorna Ay Baba, Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai



Kahaa Roke Baqir Ne Aabid Se Baba, Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai,

Kahaa Roke Baqir Ne Aabid Se Baba ...



5.     Mujhe Aaj Yaad Aaraha Hai Woh Lamha, Giri Thi Jo Naaqe Se Ik Din Sakina,

Lage Aap Ki Pusht Par Taaziyaane, Magar Aapne Qaafila Rok-Ke Rakhaa,

Rukaale Yuhin Qaafila Aaj Baba, Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai



Kahaa Roke Baqir Ne Aabid Se Baba, Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai,

Kahaa Roke Baqir Ne Aabid Se Baba ...



6.     Achaanak Nigaahe Pari Jo Lahad Par, Sawaalaat Phir Lab Pe Aaye Na Akbar,

Sakina Ki Turbat Ko Sine Lagaaye, Padar Se Yeh Kehne Lage Roke Baqir,

Samajh Mai Meri Ab Hai Baba Yeh Aaya, Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai



Sakina Ko Kyun Chhor Kar Jaa Rahe Hai X 3

tracks.title: Bohot Der Lagi
tracks.lyrics:
Qabr Asgher Ki, Banaane Mai, Bohot Der Lagi X 2



Sheh Ko Ik Chaand Chhupaane Mai, Bohot Der Lagi



1.     Kuch Qadam Door Hai Bazaar Se, Darbaar Magar, X 2

Phir Bhi Shehzaadi Ko Aane Mai, Bohot Der Lagi



Qabr Asgher Ki, Banaane Mai, Bohot Der Lagi



2.     Sheh Ne Har Laash Ko Jaldi Se, Uthaaya Laikin, X 2

Laashe Akber Ki Uthaane Mai, Bohot Der Lagi



Qabr Asgher Ki, Banaane Mai, Bohot Der Lagi



3.     Tukre Chunte Huwe Qasim Ke, Kahaa Maula Ne, X 2

Haaye Afsos Ke Aane Mai, Bohot Der Lagi



Qabr Asgher Ki, Banaane Mai, Bohot Der Lagi



4.     Iss Qadar Pyaas Se Sukha Tha, Gulu-E-Sarwar, X 2

Shimr Ko Tegh Chalaane Mai, Bohot Der Lagi



Qabr Asgher Ki, Banaane Mai, Bohot Der Lagi



5.     Karbala Jaake Taqallum Ne, Yehi Puchha Tha, X 2

Mujhko Sarkaar Bulaane Mai, Bohot Der Lagi



Qabr Asgher Ki, Banaane Mai, Bohot Der Lagi

tracks.title: Hussein Chup Hai
tracks.lyrics:
Ya Hussein, Haaye Hussein



Ya Ghareeb Imam, Ya Ghareeb Ya Hussein

Ujargaya Hai Batul Ka Ghar, Hussein Chup Hai



Khuda Ki Marzi, Mai Sar Jhukaakar, Hussein Chup Hai



Ya Ghareeb Imam, Ya Ghareeb Ya Hussein

Ujargaya Hai Batul Ka Ghar, Hussein Chup Hai



1.     Ye Sabr Ki Kounsi Hai Manzil, Pisar Ka Barchhi Se Chhidgaya Dil,

Woh Hass Rahaa Hai Sirhaane Qaatil, Ya Hussein,

Uthaaye Haatho Pe Laashe Akber, Hussein Chup Hai



Ya Ghareeb Imam, Ya Ghareeb Ya Hussein

Ujargaya Hai Batul Ka Ghar, Hussein Chup Hai



2.     Kharaa Hai Laakhon Mai Woh Akela, Chalaaye Jaate Hai Teer Aadaa,

Kahin Se Barchhi Kahin Se Bhaala, Ya Hussein,

Baras Rahe Hai Kahin Se Pathhar, Hussein Chup Hai



Ya Ghareeb Imam, Ya Ghareeb Ya Hussein

Ujargaya Hai Batul Ka Ghar, Hussein Chup Hai



3.     Lagaa Hai Kyun Mere Dil Ko Dharkaa, Lahu Se Kiske Yeh Tar Hai Chehra,

Kahaan Hai Asgher Bataaye Maula, Ya Hussein,

Sawaal Asgher Ki Maa Ka Sunkar, Hussein Chup Hai



Ya Ghareeb Imam, Ya Ghareeb Ya Hussein

Ujargaya Hai Batul Ka Ghar, Hussein Chup Hai



4.     Naseeb-E-Raahib Jo Shehne Badlaa, Wahaan Pe Khaamosh Kibriyaa Tha,

Magar Yeh Manzar Hai Karbala Ka, Ya Hussein,

Yahaan Pe Dekar Khuda Ko Akber, Hussein Chup Hai



Ya Ghareeb Imam, Ya Ghareeb Ya Hussein

Ujargaya Hai Batul Ka Ghar, Hussein Chup Hai



5.     Kahaa Ye Qaasid Ne Roke Maula, Mareez Beti Ka Khat Hun Laaya,

Salaam Sabko Hai Ussne Likha, Ya Hussein,

Salaam Ka Bas, Jawaab De Kar, Hussein Chup Hai



Ya Ghareeb Imam, Ya Ghareeb Ya Hussein

Ujargaya Hai Batul Ka Ghar, Hussein Chup Hai



6.     Huwe Hai Zakhmon Se Chur Maula, Badan Se Behta Hai Khun Ka Dariya,

Kahe To Rakhdu Ulatke Duniya, Ya Hussein,

Madad Ko Aaya, Hai Ran Mai Zaafar, Hussein Chup Hai



Ya Ghareeb Imam, Ya Ghareeb Ya Hussein

Ujargaya Hai Batul Ka Ghar, Hussein Chup Hai



7.     Ladhi Akele Mai Woh Ladhaayi, Duhaai Dene Lagi Khudaayi,

Sadaa Juhi Irjaee Ki Aayi, Ya Hussein,

Neyaam Mai, Zulfiqar Rakh Kar, Hussein Chup Hai



Ya Ghareeb Imam, Ya Ghareeb Ya Hussein

Ujargaya Hai Batul Ka Ghar, Hussein Chup Hai



8.     Hussein Gohar Yeh Jaanta Hai, Safar Ye Chouda-So Saal Ka Hai,

Sitam Jo Ab Tak Woh Seh Raha Hai, Ya Hussein,

Laraaz Iss Mai Koi Toh Akber, Hussein Chup Hai



Ya Ghareeb Imam, Ya Ghareeb Ya Hussein

Ujargaya Hai Batul Ka Ghar, Hussein Chup Hai

tracks.title: Allah Ye Kaisa Manzar Hai
tracks.lyrics:
Yeh Kaunsi Mastoora Hai, Kya Maang Rahi Hai. Islam Ki Khidmat Ka Silaa Maang
Rahi Hai.

Har Saahib-E-Ghairat Se Ridaa Maang Rahi Hai, Pardes Mai Marne Ki Dua Maang
Rahi Hai.

Afsurda Hai Aflaaq Siyaah-A-Bosh Zamin Hai, Jibreel Zara Dekh Yeh Zainab Toh
Nahi Hai.



Allah, Allah Yeh Kaisa Manzar Hai X 2



Beparda Shaamiyon Mai X 2, Aulaade Payamber Hai



Allah, Allah Yeh Kaisa Manzar Hai X 2



1.     Nidaa De Raha Hai Ye Hasskar Manaadi,

Ay Logo Gharo Se Nikal Aao Jaldi,

Sazaae Do Inko Yeh Baaghi Hai Baaghi,

Bajhte Hai Shaadiyane X 2, Har Haath Mai Pathhar Hai



Allah, Allah Yeh Kaisa Manzar Hai X 2



2.     Kahaan Khauf Khaata, Hai Zaalim Kisi Se,

Bulaata Hai Ik Ik, Ko Woh Naam Leke,

Har Ik Bibi Chhupti Hai Zainab Ke Pichhe,

Khud Ko Chhupaaye Zainab X 2, Fizza Ki Pusht Par Hai



Allah, Allah Yeh Kaisa Manzar Hai X 2



3.     Bataata Hai Shimr Aake Khud Shaamiyon Ko,

Ke Kaata Hai Mai Ne Issi Se Saro Ko,

Dikhaata Hai Lehraake Phir Bibiyon Ko,

Haatho Mai Uss Shaqi Ke X 2, Ik Khun Bhara Khanjar Hai



Allah, Allah Yeh Kaisa Manzar Hai X 2



4.     Huwa Hai Asar Itna Binaaiyon Par,

Ajab Kashmakash Mai Hai Asgher Ki Maadar,

Har Ik Neza Bardaar Ke Paas Jaakar,

Roroke Puchhti Hai X 2, Kya Ye Mera Asgher Hai



Allah, Allah Yeh Kaisa Manzar Hai X 2



5.     Aseero Pe Kaisi Musibat Bani Hai,

Har Ik Bibi Bazaar Mai Dhundhti Hai,

Sakina Kahin Bheer Mai Khogayi Hai,

Mehshar Se Pehle Barpaa X 2, Bazaar Mai Mehshar Hai



Allah, Allah Yeh Kaisa Manzar Hai X 2



6.     Qayamat Mai Kaisi Qayamat Hai Barpaa,

Taqallum Hai Godi Mai Asgher Ka Laasha,

Adalat Mai Khaaliq Ki Aati Hai Zehra,

Nazre Jhuki Hai Sabki X 2, Nabiyon Ke Labon Par Hai



Allah, Allah Yeh Kaisa Manzar Hai X 2

tracks.title: Hik Wari Sir Mere Baba Da
Awaaz To Dey Akbar
tracks.lyrics:
(Aina Ali-Akbar) X4

(Awaaz To Dey Akbar, Haaye) X2

  1. Kariyal Jawaan Ki Laash Par, Kehta Rahaa Rokar Padar

(Awaaz To Dey Akbar, Haaye) X2

  2. Girtaa Huwa Uthtaa Huwa, Haan Khogaya Hun Mai Magar, Gum Hogaya Nure Nazar

(Awaaz To Dey Akbar, Haaye) X3

  3. Tu Nawjawaan Hai Akbar, Aur Hai Zaaef Baba

Tu Nawjawaan Hai Akbar

Kaise Uthaaun Mayyat, Mujhko Toh Bataade Itna

Jaana Hai Ab Khayyaam Tak, Kaise Karun Mai Yeh Safar

Kham Hogayi Mari Kamar

(Awaaz To Dey Akbar, Haaye) X3

  4. Aayi Sadaa Jidhar Se, Mai Us Taraf Barhunga

Aayi Sadaa Jidhar Se

Awaaz Sunte Sunte, Tujhe Ran Mai Dhundh Hi Lunga

Tu Hai Jidhar Pyaare Mere, Dheere Se Yeh Kehte Huwe

Baba Idhar, Baba Idhar

(Awaaz To Dey Akbar, Haaye) X3

  5. Sughra Ke Naamwar Ko, Khat Ka Jawaab Kya Du(N)

Sughra Ke Naamwar Ko

Jo Muntazir Hai Usko, Barchhi Ka Haal Sunadun

Raste Se Ab Nazren Hata, Maara Gaya Bhaai Tera

Kya Bhejdun Usko Khabar Haaye

(Awaaz To Dey Akbar, Haaye) X3

  6. Teri Sadaa Ko Sunkar, Woh Phir Se Jee Uthegi

Teri Sadaa Ko Sunkar

Hamshir Teri Warna, Shaayad Nahin Jee Paayegi

Sine Ki Barchhi Thaamke, Sughra Ko Uske Naam Se

Ek Baar Himmat Jor Kar

(Awaaz To Dey Akbar, Haaye) X3

  7. Barchhi Se Bas Kalejaa, Tera Nahi Chhidaa Hai

Barchhi Se Bas Kalejaa

Maqtal Mai Fatema Ne, Dil Apnaa Thaam Liya Hai

Bhaai Hassan Nana Nabi, Baba Ali Daadi Teri

Mawjud Hai Sab Hi Idhar

(Awaaz To Dey Akbar, Haaye) X3

  8. Kaise Bayaan Karun Mai, Woh Dardnaak Manzar

Kaise Bayaan Karun Mai

Sakhte Mai Thi Khudaai, Rota Tha Saara Lashkar

Jab Fatema Ke Laal Ne, Haathon Pe Lekar Khaak Se

Rakh Kar Kahaan Zaanun Pe Sar

(Awaaz To Dey Akbar, Haaye) X3

  9. Laashe Ke Dono Jaanib, Baithi Hai Maaen Dono

Laashe Ke Dono Jaanib

Sine Pe Bosen Dekar, Leti Hai Malaaen Dono

Zainab Idhar Laila Idhar, Chume Tera Zakhmi Jigar

Inse Toh Koi Baat Kar

(Awaaz To Dey Akbar, Haaye) X3

  10. Teri Sadaa Ko Sunkar, Woh Phir Se Jee Uthegi

Teri Sadaa Ko Sunkar

Hamshir Teri Warna, Shaayad Nahin Jee Paayegi

Sine Ki Barchhi Thaamke, Sughra Ko Uske Naam Se

Ek Baar Himmat Jor Kar

(Awaaz To Dey Akbar, Haaye) X3

  11. Akbar Janaabe Akbar, Khaamosh Ho Gaye The

Akbar "Janaabe Akbar"

Shabbir Sar Jhukaaye, Laashe Ke Paas Khade The

Zainab Kabhi Laila Kabhi, Behnne Kabhi Kabhi Naamwar

Kehta Rahaa Yeh Saara Ghar

(Awaaz To Dey Akbar, Haaye) X5

tracks.title: Main Pyaasa Hun Amma
tracks.lyrics:
Ya Qatile Jafaa, Ya Hussein-E-Shaheed

(Ya Hussein, Mawla Hussein) X2

(Main Pyaasa Hun Amma, Main Pyaasa Hun Amma) X2

  1. (Hai Khushk Galaa Mera) X2

Aur Saamne Hai Dariyaa, Haaye

(Main Pyaasa Hun Amma, Main Pyaasa Hun Amma) X2

  2. Tumne Toh Sadaa Apne, Pehlu Mai Sulaaya Hai

Jab Pyaas Lagi Mujhko, Khud Paani Pilaya Hai

(Seh Roz Se Ab Maine) X2 Paani Hii Nahi Dekha, Haaye

(Main Pyaasa Hun Amma, Main Pyaasa Hun Amma) X2

  3. Khanjar Meri Gardan Par, Ab Shimr Chalaayenga

Amma Yeh Samaa Tumhse, Dekha Nahi Jaayenga

(Jalti Huwi Reti Par) X2 Karna Hai Mujhe Sajdaa, Haaye

(Main Pyaasa Hun Amma, Main Pyaasa Hun Amma) X2

  4. Zakhmon Me Mere Amma, Hai Reyt Bayaabaan Ki

Jalta Huwa Sehra Hai, Saaya Bhi Nahin Koi

(Mai Maalike-Qawsar Hun) X2 Hai Phir Yeh Sitam Kaisa, Haaye

(Main Pyaasa Hun Amma, Main Pyaasa Hun Amma) X2

  5. Ab Ham Nahin Aayenge, Zainab Ko Bataadena

Maasum Sakina Ko, Tum Paani Pilaadena

(Hargiz Na Pukaarega) X2 Ab Aap Ka Yeh Beta, Haaye

(Main Pyaasa Hun Amma, Main Pyaasa Hun Amma) X2

  6. Har Haal Mai Dariyaa Par, Abbas Ko Jaana Tha

Yeh Mashke Sakina Toh, Bas Eik Bahaana Tha

(Dil Uska Bhi Jalta Tha) X2 Ghazi Bhi Samajhta Tha, Haaye

(Main Pyaasa Hun Amma, Main Pyaasa Hun Amma) X2

  7. Hamshakle Payambar Ne, Jis Dam Se Azaan Dii Hai

Uss Dam Se Laeenon Ne, Muhlat Hii Nahin Dii Hai

(Ab Aap Ki Godi Mai) X2 Hai Yaad Mujhe Aaya, Haaye

(Main Pyaasa Hun Amma, Main Pyaasa Hun Amma) X2

  8. Bachpan Se Yeh Aadat Thi, Jab Pyaas Mujhe Lagti

Bin Maange Huwi Ghazi, Ley Aata Thaa Khud Paani

(Leyaae Zara Paani) X2 Ghazi Ko Sadaa Dena, Haaye

(Main Pyaasa Hun Amma, Main Pyaasa Hun Amma) X2

  9. Qausar Pe Mera Lashkar, Jis Waqt Gaya Hoga

Har Chhota Baraa Jaakar, Baba Se Milaa Hoga

(Har Eik Ne Yeh Jaakar) X2 Unse Bhi Kahaa Hoga, Haaye

(Main Pyaasa Hun Amma, Main Pyaasa Hun Amma) X2

  10. Ay "Meer Taqallum" Ho, Manzar Thaa Bhalaa Kaisa

Royi Jo Nabi-Zaadi, Ik Shor Qayaamat Tha

(Jab Chalne Lagaa Khanjar) X2 Kehte Hii Rahe Mawlaa, Haaye

(Main Pyaasa Hun Amma, Main Pyaasa Hun Amma) X3

tracks.title: Shaam Ki Aurton
tracks.lyrics:
Shaam Ki Aurton Eik Waada Karo, Roz Qabre Sakina Pe Aaogi Tum

(Shaam Ki Aurton Ek Waada Karo, Roz Qabre Sakina Pe Aaogi Tum) X2

  1. (Jab Talak Laut Kar Mai Na Aaun) X2 Aake Shamma Jalaaogi Tum

(Shaam Ki Aurton Ek Waada Karo, Roz Qabre Sakina Pe Aaogi Tum) X2

  2. Surate Shahe Dee(N) Bekafan Bhi, Mere Jaisi Aseer-E-Mehen Bhi

Khaali Kurte Mai Madhfun-E-Ghurbat, Misl-E-Asghar Rahi Bekafan Bhi

Kya Kafan Ki Tarah Roz Chadar, Iss Lahad Par Chadhaaogi Tum

Shaam Ki Auraton Ek Waada Karo, Roz Qabre Sakina Pe Aaogi Tum

Shaam Ki Auraton Ek Waada Karo

  3. Eik Yasrab Ki Thi Shaahzaadi, Uska Saqqa Tha Abbas Ghaazi

Mashq Laikar Gaya Su-E-Dariyaa, Aur Qabze Mai Karli Taraayi

Loriyon Mai Yeh Sachi Kahaani, Roz Isko Sunaaogi Tum

Shaam Ki Auraton Ek Waada Karo, Roz Qabre Sakina Pe Aaogi Tum

Shaam Ki Auraton Ek Waada Karo

  4. Hamne Zindaan Se Paayi Rihaai, Ab Behen Paas Hogi Na Bhai

Baat Itni Si Bas Yaad Rakhna, Meri Bacchi Hai Gham Ki Sataayi

Tumne Bazaar Main Toh Sataaya, Ab Na Isko Sataaogi Tum

Shaam Ki Auraton Ek Waada Karo, Roz Qabre Sakina Pe Aaogi Tum

Shaam Ki Auraton Ek Waada Karo

  5. Jab Kabhi Qaid Khane Main Aana, Beridaa Bibiyon Ko Na Laana

Tumko Asghar Bhi Dega Duaaen, Iski Tanhaiyaan Yun Mitaana

Chhote Chhote Se Baccho Ko Laakar, Paas Iske Sulaaogi Tum

Shaam Ki Auraton Ek Waada Karo, Roz Qabre Sakina Pe Aaogi Tum

Shaam Ki Auraton Ek Waada Karo

  6. Qabre Bekas Pe Aansun Bahaane, Haal Qaide Sitam Ka Sunaane

Qaafla Karbala Ko Chalaa Hai, Iske Baba Ka Chehlum Manaane

Itna Kehdo Hamaari Taraf Se, Iska Chehlum Manaaogi Tum

Shaam Ki Auraton Ek Waada Karo, Roz Qabre Sakina Pe Aaogi Tum

Shaam Ki Auraton Ek Waada Karo

  7. Shaamiyon Ki Bahu Betiyon Se, Keh Rahi Thi Woh "Akber" Yeh Roke

Yeh Amaanat Hai Pardesiyon Ki, Kar Rahi Hun Tumhaare Hawaale

Mujhse Ik Baar Bas Itna Kehdo, Apna Waada Nibhaaogi Tum

Shaam Ki Auraton Ek Waada Karo, Roz Qabre Sakina Pe Aaogi Tum

Shaam Ki Auraton Ek Waada Karo

tracks.title: Ye Kon Si Basti Hai
tracks.lyrics:
(Shaam Haaye Shaam) X 4

(Hai Sab Ki Jolion Me Pathhar, Ye Koun Si Basti Hai Fizza) X3

(Hotaa Hai Charaaghaan Kyun Ghar Ghar) X2 Ye Koun Si Basti Hai Fizaa

(Shaam Haaye Shaam) X2 Hai Sab Ki Jolion Mai Pathhar, Ye Koun Si Basti Hai
Fizza

  1. Puchho Toh Zaraa Amma Inse, Kyun Dekhne Hamko Aate Hai

Har Simpt Khushi Ka Aalam Hai, Bazaar Sajaaye Jaate Hai

(Kyun Eid Ke Jaisa Hai Manzar) X2 Ye Koun Si Basti Hai Fizza

(Shaam Haaye Shaam) X2 Hai Sab Ki Jolion Mai Pathhar, Ye Koun Si Basti Hai
Fizza

  2. Sajjad Ki Aankhon Se Ab Tak, Aansun Hi Baraste Dekhe The

Ab Dekh Rahi Hun Mai Uski, Aankhon Se Musalsal Khun Behte

(Puchho Toh Kisi Se Yeh Jaakar) X2 Ye Koun Si Basti Hai Fizza

(Shaam Haaye Shaam) X2 Hai Sab Ki Jolion Mai Pathhar, Ye Koun Si Basti Hai
Fizza

  3. Baaghi Aaye Baaghi Aaye, Ye Kaisi Manaadi Hoti Hai

Lagta Hai Zamaane Baad Koi, Is Shehr Mai Shaadi Hoti Hai

(Kuch Aise Saje Hai Baamo-Dar) X2 Ye Koun Si Basti Hai Fizza

(Shaam Haaye Shaam) X2 Hai Sab Ki Jolion Mai Pathhar, Ye Koun Si Basti Hai
Fizza

  4. Ham Sab Ke Saron Se Behte Hai, Kis Waaste Yeh Khun Ke Dhaare

Koi Qaul Sa Paani Phenktaa Hai, Koi Phenk-Rahaa Hai Angaare

(Sab Milkar Maarte Hai Pathhar) X2 Ye Koun Si Basti Hai Fizza

(Shaam Haaye Shaam) X2 Hai Sab Ki Jolion Mai Pathhar, Ye Koun Si Basti Hai
Fizza

  5. Waada Jo Kiyaa Thaa Yasrab Mai, Aata Hai Yaad Wahin Waada

Mehsus Mujhe Yeh Hota Hai, Tak-Taa Hai Koi Mera Rastaa

(Kya Sheereen Ka Hai Paas Mai Ghar) X2 Ye Koun Si Basti Hai Fizza

(Shaam Haaye Shaam) X2 Hai Sab Ki Jolion Mai Pathhar, Ye Koun Si Basti Hai
Fizza

  6. Qur’aan Sunaate Jaate The, Shabbir Sare Naouke Nezaa

Rotaa Tha "Taqallum" Ibne Ali, Jab Puchhti Thi Binte Zehra

(Kyun Girtaa Hai Abbas Ka Sar) X2 Ye Koun Si Basti Hai Fizza

(Shaam Haaye Shaam) X2 Hai Sab Ki Jolion Mai Pathhar, Ye Koun Si Basti Hai
Fizza

tracks.title: Tu Na Aaya Ghazi
tracks.lyrics:
(Haaye Mere Abbas) X4

(Jab Ridaa Sar Se Chhini, Mai Sadaa Deti Rahi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi) X2

  1. Aale-Imraan Kahaan, Aur Zindaan Kahaan

Ye Behen Qaid Huwi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

Jab Ridaa Sar Se Chhini, Mai Sadaa Deti Rahi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

  2. Hamko Paani Na Mile, Teri Khushbu Toh Rahe

Tere Baazu Na Kate, Chaahe Mashkiza Chhide

Yeh Magar Ho Na Saka, Tere Baazu Hai Judaa,

Mujhpe Hai Tashna-Labi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

Jab Ridaa Sar Se Chhini, Mai Sadaa Deti Rahi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

  3. Dhup Mai Tu Thaa Shajar, Tujhse Aabaad Thaa Ghar

Hai Barehna Mera Sar, Kya Nahin Tujhko Khabar

Ay Alamdaare-Wafaa, Is Behen Ko Bakhuda

Tujhse Dhaaras Thi Bari, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

Jab Ridaa Sar Se Chhini, Mai Sadaa Deti Rahi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

  4. Aagayi Shaam-E-Alam, Lutgaye Ehle-Haram

Ret Par Jalti Huwi, Hogaya Thanda Alam

Pursaa Dene Ke Liye, Mujhse Milne Ke Liye

Aagaye Baba Ali, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

Jab Ridaa Sar Se Chhini, Mai Sadaa Deti Rahi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

  5. Kya Kahun Sher Mere, Beridaa Hamko Liye

Ye Musalmaa(N) Saare, Shehr Dar Shehr Gaye

Khilqate Kufa Kabhi, Khilqate Shaam Kabhi

Aur Haa(N) Ham Pe Hassi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

Jab Ridaa Sar Se Chhini, Mai Sadaa Deti Rahi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

  6. Kitni Bebas Thi Behen, Ai Shehenshaahe Wafaa

Naam Leleke Mera, Jab Ye Zaalim Ne Kahaa

Naaz Tha Jispe Tujhe, Ab Bulaaona Usse

Aur Mai Roti Rahi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

Jab Ridaa Sar Se Chhini, Mai Sadaa Deti Rahi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

  7. Qaid Khaane Mai Qazaa, Jab Sakina Ko Mili

Deke Kurte Ka Kafan, Bacchi Dafnaayi Gayi

Us Ghari Naam Tera, Surate Naade-Ali

Dukh Mai Dohraati Rahi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

Jab Ridaa Sar Se Chhini, Mai Sadaa Deti Rahi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

  8. Roya "Rehan" Kalam, Karke Yeh Baat Raqam

Khun Mai Dub Gaya, Mere Ghazi Ka Alam

Zakhmi Zainab Ka Jigar, Khun-Fishaan Shah Ka Sar

Aaye Khaimon Mai Shaqi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

Jab Ridaa Sar Se Chhini, Mai Sadaa Deti Rahi, Tu Na Aaya Ghazi

(Tu Na Aaya Ghazi) X2

tracks.title: Asghar Ho Tum Kahaan
tracks.lyrics:
(Ay Aliasgher, Ay Aliasgher) X2

  1. Maqtal Mai Baithi Khaak Par, Nawha Kunaa Hai Maa

(Asgher Ho Tum Kahaan, Asgher Ho Tum Kahaan) X2

  2. Jhulaa Jalaa Toh Jalgaye, Armaan Bhi Mere

Mai Jee Rahi Thi Ek Hi, Hasrat Liye Huwe

(Dulha Tumhe Banaaungi) X2 Kab Honge Tum Jawaan

(Asgher Ho Tum Kahaan, Asgher Ho Tum Kahaan) X2

  3. Bikhde Huwe Yeh Chaand, Sitaare Zameen Pe Hai

Zindaa Nahi Hai Koi Magar, Sab Yahin Pe Hai

(Ik Teri Laash Hii Nahin) X2 Laashon Ke Darmiyaan

(Asgher Ho Tum Kahaan, Asgher Ho Tum Kahaan) X2

  4. Do Chaar Din Bhi Zindaa Nahi, Reh Sakungi Main

Itna Teri Ghareebi Pai, Matam Karungi Mai

(Ay Laal Mere Haathon Ki) X2 Khulwaade Rassiyaan

(Asgher Ho Tum Kahaan, Asgher Ho Tum Kahaan) X2

  5. Maqtal Se Kaafle Ko, Guzaraa Gaya Thaa Jab

Pyaaron Ko Apne Deten The, Rokar Sadaaen Sab

(Ye Kehte Kehte Bandh Gayi) X2 Baano Ki Hichkiyaan

(Asgher Ho Tum Kahaan, Asgher Ho Tum Kahaan) X2

  6. Majlis Wahin Pe "Meer Takallum" Bapaa Huwi

Maa Turbate-Saghir Par, Kehti Thi Jis Ghadi

(Jaata Hai Su-E-Shaam Ab) X2 Lutkar Ye Kaarwaan

(Asgher Ho Tum Kahaan, Asgher Ho Tum Kahaan) X2

(Ay Aliasgher, Ay Aliasgher) X2

tracks.title: Din Dhala Toh
tracks.lyrics:
(Haaye Shaam-E-Gharibaan) X2

(Din Dhalaa Toh Rulaane Ko Shaam Aagayi) X2

  1. Zulm Zainab Pe Dhaane Ko Shaam Aagayi

(Din Dhalaa Toh Rulaane Ko Shaam Aagayi) X2

  2. (Sab Ko Bichhde Huwe Yaad Aane Lage) X2

Phir Dukhe Dil Dukhaane Ko Shaam Aagayi

(Din Dhalaa Toh Rulaane Ko Shaam Aagayi) X2

  3. (Suuni Ho Ujri Maang Aur Atash Ki Sadaa) X2

Sab Ka Sabr Aazmaane Ko Shaam Aagayi

(Din Dhalaa Toh Rulaane Ko Shaam Aagayi) X2

  4. (Kaun Roke Na Akber Na Abbas Hai) X2

Sheh Ke Khaime Jalaane Ko Shaam Aagayi

(Din Dhalaa Toh Rulaane Ko Shaam Aagayi) X2

  5. (Aarahe Hai Sakina Ke Jaanib Aduu) X2

Kya Tamaache Lagaane Ko Shaam Aagayi

(Din Dhalaa Toh Rulaane Ko Shaam Aagayi) X2

  6. (Koi Aaya Na Laashon Pe Rone Ko Jab) X2

Khud Hii Aansun Bahaane Ko Shaam Aagayi

(Din Dhalaa Toh Rulaane Ko Shaam Aagayi) X2

  7. (Saamne Hai "Nazir" Eik Jaltaa Makaam) X2

Kya Bataawun Zamaane Ko Shaam Aagayi

(Din Dhalaa Toh Rulaane Ko Shaam Aagayi) X2

tracks.title: Mei Parda-E-Ghaibat Se
tracks.lyrics:
(Anaa Yabna-Zahra, Anaa Yabna-Zahra) X2

Imam Parda-E-Ghaibat Se De Rahe Hai Sadaa

Anaa Yabna-Zahra, Anaa Yabna-Zahra

Nazar Mai Rehti Hai Har Waqt Mere Karbobala

Anaa Yabna-Zahra, Anaa Yabna-Zahra

Mei Parda-E-Ghaibat Se Samaa Dekh Raha Hun

(Mei Parda-E-Ghaibat Se Samaa Dekh Raha Hun) X2

  1. (Sajjad Ke Khaimon Ka) X2 Dhuwan Dekh Raha Hun

(Mei Parda-E-Ghaibat Se Samaa Dekh Raha Hun) X2

  2. (Zainab Chali Jis Aag Mei Aabid Ko Bachaane) X2

(Uss Raat Mei Pairon Ke) X2 Nishaan Dekh Raha Hun

(Mei Parda-E-Ghaibat Se Samaa Dekh Raha Hun) X2

  3. (Jis Sar Pe Sajaa Karti Thi Dastaare-Muhammad) X2

(Uss Sar Ko Sare Noke) X2 Sinaa Dekh Raha Hun

Main Parda-E-Ghaibat Se Samaa Dekh Raha Hun X 2

  4. (Bas Teer Hai Chalne Ko Ab Asghar Ke Gale Par) X2

(Zaalim Ki Mei Khamraa) X2 Kamaa Dekh Raha Hun

(Mei Parda-E-Ghaibat Se Samaa Dekh Raha Hun) X2

  5. (Jis Rukh Ke Liye Karte The Bosse Shahe Waala) X2

(Uss Rukh Pe Tamaachon Ke) X2 Nishaa(N) Dekh Raha Hun

(Mei Parda-E-Ghaibat Se Samaa Dekh Raha Hun) X2

  6. (Maqtal Mei Kahaan Saani-E-Zehra Ki Ridaa Hai) X2

(Abbas Ke Baazu Hai) X2 Kahaan Dekh Raha Hun

(Mei Parda-E-Ghaibat Se Samaa Dekh Raha Hun) X2

  7. (Aaye Na Watan Laut Ke Phir Aun-O-Muhammad) X2

(Ujraa Huwa Zainab Ka) X2 Makaa(N) Dekh Raha Hun

(Mei Parda-E-Ghaibat Se Samaa Dekh Raha Hun) X2

  8. (Maa Baap Behen Bhaayi Phuphi Aur Aizzah) X2

(Ik Teer Mei Kitno Ki) X2 Mei Jaan Dekh Raha Hun

(Mei Parda-E-Ghaibat Se Samaa Dekh Raha Hun) X2

  9. ("Gohar" Hai Jahaa(N) Dafn Saqeefa Ki Shaheeda) X2

(Uss Qabr Ko Benaamo) X2 Nishaan Dekh Raha Hun

(Mei Parda-E-Ghaibat Se Samaa Dekh Raha Hun) X2

Anaa Yabna-Zahra, Anaa Yabna-Zahra, Anaa Yabna-Zahra

tracks.title: Amma Fizza
tracks.lyrics:
(Haay Shaam Haay Haay Shaam) X3

(Amma Fizza Bata De Mujko Pathar Kyu Aarahai) X3

Kaysa Hai Yeh Charakhaa

Dil Dubey Jaa Rahai Hai

Kya Shaam Aagaya Hai

(Amma Fizza Bata De Mujko Pathar Kyu Aarahai) X3



  1. Hone Lagi Azaane, Kayse Saron Ko Dhaampe

Bazu Bandhe Huwe Hai, Khu(N) Ro Rahi Hai Aankhei

Aankho(N) Ke Khu(N) Se Raste, Khu(N) Mei Naha Rahe Hai

Kya Shaam Aagaya Hai

(Amma Fizza Bata De Mujko Pathar Kyu Aarahai) X3



  2. Sajjad Ka Kaleja, Sad Paash Ho Raha Hai

Ik Eik Zakhm Inka, Is Gham Me Ro Raha Hai

Zainab Ka Naam Lekar, Adaa Bula Rahe Hai

Kya Shaam Agaya Hai

(Amma Fizza Bata De Mujko Pathar Kyu Aarahai) X3



  3. Nayze Pey Jitne Sar Hai, Ik Sar Hai Unmei Aysa

Aankhein Hai Bandhe Uski, Aur Khaak Par Hai Girta

Abbas Ka Yeh Sar Hai, Teywar Bata Rahai Hai

Kya Shaam Aagaya Hai

(Amma Fizza Bata De Mujko Pathar Kyu Aarahai) X3



  4. Itna Chale Hai Pedhal, Kanto(N) Pe Sare Qaydi

Thak Jati Chalte Chalte, Chalti Agar Zamin Bhi

Pero(N) Ke Able Bhi, Ansu Bahaa Rahe Hai

Kya Shaam Agayi Hai

(Amma Fizza Bata De Mujko Pathar Kyu Aarahai) X3



  5. Hai Log Kistarha Ke, Humse Dua Karaye

Aai Qaydiyon Dua Do, Yeh Din Na Ham Pe Aaye

Lekar Duayen Hamse, Dil Bhi Dukha Rahai Hai

Kya Shaam Aagaya Hai

(Amma Fizza Bata De Mujko Pathar Kyu Aarahai) X3



  6. Maaon Ke Gaudiyon Se, Lipte Huwe Hai Bache

Hai Haath Rassiyo(N) Mei, Maao(N) Ke Aise Jhakre

Bachhey Jo Gir Rahey Hai, Wo Marte Jaarahai Hai

Kya Shaam Aagaya Hai

(Amma Fizza Bata De Mujko Pathar Kyu Aarahai) X3



  1. "Rehan" Qaydiyo(N) Me, Barpa Tha Shor Girya

Palko(N) Se Kar Rahi Thi, Matam Jo Binte Zahra

Sajad Nawha Khwan Hai, Nawha Suna Rahe Hai

Kya Shaam Agaya Hai

(Amma Fizza Bata De Mujko Pathar Kyu Aarahai) X3

tracks.title: Sakina So Rahi Hai
tracks.lyrics:
(Sunaayi Kisne Yeh Zindaa(N) Me Lori Sakina So Rahi Hai) X2

  1. Khudara Zor Se Bole Na Koi

Sakina So Rahi Hai

(Sunaayi Kisne Yeh Zindaa(N) Me Lori Sakina So Rahi Hai) X2

  2. Kahan Banu Ne Utho Shahzadi

Huwi Kya Baat Kyun Madarse Ruthi,

(Utho Baba Ka Sar Aaya Hai Bibi) X2

Magar Zinda(N) Ki Har Diwar Boli

Sakina So Rahi Hai

(Sunaayi Kisne Yeh Zindaa(N) Me Lori Sakina So Rahi Hai) X2

  3. Tumhaare Goshwaare Milgaye Hain

Dar-E-Zindaan Saare Khulgaye Hain

(Rihayi Milgayi Jaati Hun Gharko) X2

Magar Sajjad Ki Awaaz Aayi

Sakina So Rahi Hai

(Sunaayi Kisne Yeh Zindaa(N) Me Lori Sakina So Rahi Hai) X2

  4. Huwe Jab Shaam Ke Saaye Bhi Gehre

Parinde Chehchahahte Jaa Rahe The

(Kahan Banu Ne Ay Urte Parindon) X2

Sadaayen Roklo Kuch Der Apni

Sakina So Rahi Hai

(Sunaayi Kisne Yeh Zindaa(N) Me Lori Sakina So Rahi Hai) X2

  5. 4.Banaane Kabr Jab Sajjad Uthe

To Woh Naad-E-Ali Dohra Rahe The

(Bande Hatoun Se Chahaa Kabr Khoden) X2

Achanak Paun Ki Zanjir Chanki

Sakina So Rahi Hai

(Sunaayi Kisne Yeh Zindaa(N) Me Lori Sakina So Rahi Hai) X2

  6. 5 Na Ab Maarega Koi Bhi Tamaache

Na Honge Phirse Yeh Rukhsaar Neele

(Galaa Bandaa Najaayega Rasan Mei) X2

Jo Aayaa Shimr To Usse Kahungi

Sakina So Rahi Hai

(Sunaayi Kisne Yeh Zindaa(N) Me Lori Sakina So Rahi Hai) X2

  7. Adab Ki Jaah Ye "Rehan" Dekho

Buland Awaaz Mei Har Giz Na Bolo

(Yaha To Fateha Bhi Dheere Parhna) X2

Yaha Awaaz Hojaye Na Unchi

Sakina So Rahi Hai

(Sunaayi Kisne Yeh Zindaa(N) Me Lori Sakina So Rahi Hai) X2

  8. Khudara Zor Se Bole Na Koi

Sakina So Rahi Hai

(Sunaayi Kisne Yeh Zindaa(N) Me Lori Sakina So Rahi Hai) X2

tracks.title: Jab Bhi Ho Karbobala Aap Ka Jana Bhayya
Rida Mei Chupa Lo Hussain Ko
Sakina Ki Yeh Aati Thi Sada
Shaam Walon Ali Di Dee Han Mei
Tu Agar Hota To Aisa Nahi Hota Ghazi
Abid Ko Jahan Ghash Ata Hai
